column2: Labeenang keɓe ka yuu zɔ̃ng ɓɔɔ zang yi Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɔɔ ɓi zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓɛɛ.
Ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, Ibirayi yi Ishaaku,
Ishaaku naa yi Yakubu,
a Yakubu naa yi Yahuda nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung.
Yahuda naa yi Periza nɛɛ Zera nɛɛ bìí ɓeeso Tama,
a Periza naa yi Heziron,
Heziron naa yi Arama,
Arama naa yi Aminada,
Aminada naa yi Naashong,
a Naashong naa yi Salimo.
Salimo naa yi Buwaza nɛɛ bìí ɓeeso Rahab,
a Buwaza naa yi Obida nɛɛ bìí ɓeeso Rut,
Obida naa yi Jeesi,
a Jeesi naa yi kpanti Dawuda.
A kpanti Dawuda naa yi Sulemanu nɛɛ bìí ɓeeso, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓi soro Yuriya ɓɛɛ.
Sulemanu naa yi Rehobuwam,
Rehobuwam naa yi Abiya,
a Abiya naa yi Asa.
Asa naa yi Jehoshafa,
Jehoshafa naa yi Joram,
a Joram naa yi Yuziya.
Yuziya naa yi Jotang,
Jotang naa yi Ahaza,
a Ahaza naa yi Hezikiya.
Hezikiya naa yi Manase,
Manase naa yi Among,
a Among naa yi Josaya.
Josaya naa yi Jakoniya nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang see ri zang daa nɛɛ mani ka Babila ɓɛɛ.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang daa tɔ nɛɛ ri ka Babila,
Jakoniya naa yi Shalitiyel kati.
A Shalitiyel naa yi Zerubabe.
Zerubabe naa yi Abiyu,
Abiyu naa yi Eliyakim,
a Eliyakim naa yi Azɔ.
Azɔ naa yi Zadokiya,
Zadokiya naa yi Akimu,
Akimu naa yi Aliyuda.
Aliyuda naa yi Eliyaza,
Eliyaza naa yi Matan,
a Matan naa yi Yakubu.
Yakubu naa yi Yusufu varɛ Marayamu.
Marayamu kɔ nàá Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi (ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ).

Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ bìí Ibirayi, a, à ka bìí Dawuda nandon, zɔ̃ng kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti. Ɓɔɔ ti naa gaayu nɛɛ bìí Dawuda, à ka diki ɓɔɔ zang see zang Yahudi jaafoo zang daa nɔng ka Babila, ti kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti. A ɓɔɔ gaayu ka diki ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri ka Babila, a nɔng ka bìí Kirisi, ti kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti.
Wee naa ɓɔɔ zang yi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Yusufu hangsɛ nyaa Marayamu geenang tɔ nandon, a ɓang bii kaa gngn nɛɛ wu kpang. A Marayamu zirɛ nɛɛ wu tuu jaa tɔ kaa nɛɛ bii Suru Kpanti Laa.
Ɓeevɛ Yusufu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, zi tɔ nɛɛ wu gee Marayamu takpang. Kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ wu bɛ̃ɛ wu kaa nɛɛ nwĩiri.

Ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ doo ka naa ɓɛɛ, zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa a ka bìí ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang tɔɔ, “Yusufu jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, mɔ́ɔ káa vɔrɔ soro ɓaaɓɛ Marayamu shinnang kpang. Jaa kɔ wu tuu ka yeti ɓee, a ɓi nɛɛ bìí Suru Laa.
Naa yi jaa zang varɛ, mɔ́ɔ ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ (zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ). Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ naa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Vuu keɓe nandon nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ,
“Jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn kpang, naa tuu jaa ditɔ, naa yi jaa zang varɛ, zang naa ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Imanuwe.” (Kpanti Laa nwàng kaa teteng ɓuru.)
Ɓɔɔ Yusufu naa seepaa kaa nɛɛ hingro, a naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ kati. Shing soro ɓiɓɛ Marayamu kati.
Yusufu ɓang bii nɛɛ Marayamu doo gbete kpang, a Marayamu naa yi jaa kaa zang varɛ, a Yusufu ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.

Zang yi Yeesɔ tɔ ka gari Bɛtalami ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudi, ka diki ɓɔɔ Hiridu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ sang nwang ɓɛɛ, ri seepaa kaa nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, ri a ka gari Urushalima. A ri hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ,
“Jaa ɓɔɔ zang yirɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang kpanti zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ, ɓu kiya? Ruu zi sang ɓiɓɛ ka paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu arɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu naa bang wu.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Kpanti Hiridu tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima nandon.

A Hiridu kpalɛ Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri túsú zang labeenang nyaa dannang Laa, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, Labeenang nyaa dannang Laa tɔ̀ɔ́, zang naa yi Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ, ɓu ka niya?
A ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ka Bɛtalami ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa bée nɔngkɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ,
“ ‘Bɛtalami kɔ ka tipi Yahudi ɓee,
wu mɔkɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng gari bang bang
ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi kpang,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓɔɔ náa gãng jĩng ka zang mɛɛ Isirela
naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A Hiridu ɓáa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ɓɛɛ dang gbete, nɛɛ wu tãa diki ɓɔɔ sang nwang nyaa tĩng shɔɔnang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
A shong ri ka Bɛtalami, nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kãa nɔng jaa keɓe tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ĩi wu tɔ, nɔɔ naa kɔɔ m, tɔɔ n daa bang wu kaa jong.”

Ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Hiridu kɔɔ ri tɔ, a ri yi gbalang daanang ɓarɛ kati. Ɓɔɔ ri zi sang ɓɔɔ ri zi tĩng shɔɔnang, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. Sang kaɓa daa ka tĩng ɓarɛ sasak, a naa shii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ jaa kagn ɓɛɛ.

A ri a ka yeti gãa, ri naa zi jaa rɛ̃ɛting kaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ Marayamu. A ri tang nɛɛ gutu, ri bang wu. Ri puu nyaa duku ɓarɛ, ri see saka ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓáa nɛɛ zinariya, nɛɛ nung ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓáa nɛɛ muru ɓɛɛ, ri a jaa. Ri tɔɔ, ri gbãayu kaa tɔ,
a ri sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔgn, ri daa gãa ɓarɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shaarɛ ri nyaa ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang, nɛɛ ri sɔ̀ɔ bii kpanti Hiridu takpang ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang kaɓa, ri daa tɔ, zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ naa nwang nyaa kaa Yusufu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang tɔɔ, “Seepaa mɔɔ tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, mɔɔ yurɛ, mɔɔ daa nwang nɛɛ ri ka tipi Masara. N naa kɔɔ mɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa nɔng kaɓa ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ kpanti Hiridu naa kãa jaa keɓe ditɔ, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu nyɔ jaa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yusufu seepaa tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ zĩi, a daa nɔng ka tipi Masara.

Yusufu nwang ka tipi Masara sasak, kpanti Hiridu naa vɔ kati. Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N naa ɓáa jaa mɛɛ nyaa nɛɛ tipi Masara.”

Ɓɔɔ Hiridu naa zirɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ri nwãarɛ wu tɔ naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa wu dɔɔli. Shong zang nɛɛ zang daa nyɔkɔ wujɛ varɛ nandon ɓɔɔ saa ɓarɛ ɓa ziti gn kpang ɓɛɛ vɔrɔ, ka gari Bɛtalami nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ kiiri Bɛtalami nyaa naabm. Hiridu palɛ nɔngkɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa diki ɓɔɔ sang nwang nyaa ting shɔɔnang ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu keɓe nwang, ka naa vuu ɓɔɔ Irimiya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Irimiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang tãa nyavɔ ka Rama.
Rahila kaa nyavɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ,
ɓɔɔ vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ.
Kasɛ nɛɛ zang bakɛ wu kpang.”
Hiridu naa vɔ tɔ, a zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa nwang nyaa kaa Yusufu tɔkn, ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang ka Masara,
a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, mɔɔ daa nɔng tipi Isirela. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa yuu jaa keɓe nyɔnang, ri vɔlɔ tɔ.”
A Yusufu seepaa tuu jaa kaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, daa kaa nɔng tipi Isirela.
Ɓɔɔ Yusufu naa tãa nyaa tɔɔ, Akeliyu jaa Hiridu kɔ roo kpanti ka nyaa tipi Yahudi ka nɔng diiɓɛ, a kaa vɔrɔ Yahudi daanang kati. Kpanti Laa ti naa kɔɔ wu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang, nɛɛ wu daa ka tipi Galili.
A Yusufu daa nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nazara ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ yɔɔ Nazara.”
Ka diki kaɓa, Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima rǎng zang yee Laa ka waala Yahudi, diki diki.
Kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, nɔ́ɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa rang yee ka yuu Yɔhana keɓe kɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang tãa yee zang ɓɔɔ kagn,
rang yee Laa ka yeti waala tɔɔ,
Nɔɔ palɛ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta,
nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo.”
Yɔhana hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ shãngti vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ hòlòng ɓɛɛ, a ti mã guruji ka sang ɓiɓɛ. Vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓi zɔɔrɔ nɛɛ mii warɛ.
A zang Urushalima nɛɛ zang Yahudi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang Urudung dɔɔli, ri alɛ ka bìí Yɔhana.
Ri kɔɔrɔ Laa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, a Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ka mii rang Urudung.

Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yɔhana zi zang Farisi nɛɛ zang Saduki, ɓɔɔ ri alɛ̀ gaagaa nɛɛ wu naa pàlɛ̀ ri batizima hn ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ pudi keɓe, ɓu wi kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ yúu jĩng dannang ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ a kana naabm wiya?
Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔ́ɔ shing danggn manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ naa wɔ jĩng dannang kaɓa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ Ibirayi ɓɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Kpanti Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwàngsɛ́ Ibirayi jaa nɛɛ tari kɔ ka tipi ɓee katɔ.
Kãntang keɓe, zang ɓáa nyaa kãasãng tɔ ka dimbang laa, laa piti ɓɔɔ ra jaa tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang dɔngnɛ zang tasɛ ka yeti waa.
“N pàlɛ́ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, ka ruu yeti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ, ɓá m bannang katɔ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ n tu koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wukɔ naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ waa.
Vuu ɓɔɔ wu hã́lɛ̀ vuu nɔng, kagn naa ɓiɓɛ, naa kòoró dadong ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kpalɛ jĩng vuu ɓiɓɛ ka bɔ̃nɔ, wu yaa gãrɛ ɓiɓɛ, wu dɔɔ nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ Galili, a ka rang Urudung, nɛɛ Yɔhana wu naa palɛ wu batizima.
A Yɔhana kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ batizima kaa takpang. A hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ́ m batizima jong, mɔɔ nɛɛ nkɔ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ jong ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Pàlɛ̀ m gbã̀ágbãa, tɔ̀ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi, wu ɓee nyaa kati.” A Yɔhana naa kasɛ, palɛ Yeesɔ batizima kati.
Ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pàlɛ̀ wu batizima hn, Yeesɔ nwang kaa nɛɛ mii, a lapa tantɛ kaa puunang, a zi Suru Laa shooro kaa naa koro, naa nwáng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ lapa tɔɔ, “Wee jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ wu gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
A Suru Laa túu Yeesɔ daa nɔng ka waala nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Sheetang wu daa gãsɛ wu.
Yeesɔ seng nyaalaa tɔ ka waala diki laa ziti, a nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ wu kati.
A Sheetang arɛ naa gãsɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa, risi tari keɓe ta, ri rì borodi.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu vuu shaanang kɔ lusu shɔnzang yuu gbete kpang, ɓi yee piti ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ lusu zang yuu.”
A Sheetang túu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima, a daa shing wu ka sɔ̃ngsɔ̃ng yuu Gãa Laa.
A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa, shɛ̃ɛ ta ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Laa kɔɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ
ɓɔɔ ka lapa ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ,
ri naa ta mɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ ka gbalang,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ doo ɓaaɓɛ ka tari ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ti kasɛ Sheetang nyaa tɔkn tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu gãsɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang ɓɛɛ kpang.’ ”
A Sheetang tuu wu tɔkn daa nɛɛ wu ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ beebang ɓɛɛ, a tusu wu koolaa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm nandon, nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn piti.
A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng mɛɛ, mɔɔ dɔɔ m, n a mɔɔ veɓe katɔ nandon.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa nɛɛ kaaɓa, mɔ́ɔ yàa m bii Sheetang. Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Shɔnzang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ wu ti bang wukɔ gbete.’ ”
A Sheetang daayi, yaa Yeesɔ kati. Zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri arɛ, ri naa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ naa tãa nyaa tɔɔ, zang loo Yɔhana tɔ ka sãa a naa yupaa daa ka Galili.
Yaa Nazara, a daa nwang ka Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ka nyaa mii waapo ɓɔɔ ka tipi Zebuluna nɛɛ Nafitali ɓɛɛ.
Vuu keɓe, nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ Ishaya ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang tipi Zebuluna nɛɛ tipi Nafitali
ɓɔɔ ka gbalang mii waapo ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung ka dang ɓɛɛ,
a ɓɔɔ zang tipi Galili,
ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang keɓe piti ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, a
ri zi nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ bang tɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ, vɔrɔ diki diki,
nɔng yakɛnang nwang nyaa tɔ ka ri.”
A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung yee Laa rannang ka diki kaɓa kɔ. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, nɔ́ɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kagn a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ rakɛ kana ka nyaa mii waapo Galili, a zi zang ziti, Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru. Ri yi jaazĩi nɛɛ jang ka mii waapo, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jaazĩi yinang ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dũng m ta, ń tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa m zang nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri yaa jang jaazĩi ɓarɛ tantɛnang, ri dũng wu.

Nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa ka tĩng tɔkɔlɔng, ti zi zang ɓɔɔgn ziti tɔkn nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ. Yakub nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana, a ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ Zebedi ka yeti tonsi, ri palɛ jang jaazĩi ɓarɛ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana nyaa.
A ri tantɛ tonsi nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ yaanang ri dũng wu.

Yeesɔ ra ka tipi Galili nandon, tùsú zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi. Ti rang zang yee ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tùsú zang nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ. A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang yiki ri ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng nandon.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng ka tipi Siriya nandon. A zang atɛ wu zang kɔnang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ɓarɛ dang ri jĩng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mã katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ masɛ ri kaa nandon.
Zang dɔɔli ri a ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ Galili, nɛɛ Dekapoli, nɛɛ Urushalima, nɛɛ Yahudi, a ri dũuru Yeesɔ ka knti nɛɛ zang nyaa rang Urudung ɓɔɔ dang ɓɛɛ nandon.
Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, a vang kɔpɔ, daa nwang ka tipi. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
A gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kati, tɔɔ,
“Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ nɛɛ,
vuu Suru Laa ɓi kagn naa ɓarɛ kpang,
Laa naa a rikɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu,
nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri káa katɔ ɓɛɛ,
Kpanti Laa naa àlɛ́ ri miiri ditɔ.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Laa naa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi,
nɛɛ wu a ri ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ katɔ gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu
ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kasɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ gbete ɓɛɛ.
Laa naa a ri gbalang ditɔ ri palɛ vuu keɓe.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng ri katɔ.
Gn ɓarɛ naa kɔng Kpanti Laa ditɔ jong.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
Rikɔ naa zi Kpanti Laa.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ
zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang naa ɓaa rikɔ nɛɛ wujɛ Laa.
Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang dang ri jĩng,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa naa a rikɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
“Tĩnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ, naa zang dãa nɔɔ, zang dang nɔɔ jĩng, a zang ti kɔɔ ruu shi kpang nɛɛ sèé ka yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ dɔɔ bii ta, nɔ́ɔ ti tãa tĩnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shing nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn lapa ɓɛɛ. Zang dàng zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ri a ka tĩng manɛ jĩng doo nɔngkɔ.
“Nɔkɔ tãa ka koo keɓe. Naa lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang pálɛ̀ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu ri tãa tɔkn viya? Zang pálɛ̀ vuu ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔng kpang. Zang vang ɓi kaa tɔ, zang naalɛ nɛɛ doo.
“Nɔkɔ nɔng yakɛnang ka koo keɓe. Gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ka nɔng dɛɛrɛ, waasɛ bii ɓi jong kpang.
Zang ti mang waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓi jong, zang zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Zang shing ɓi ka yuu vuu kɔ jong, tɔɔ wu yakɛ zang nɔng kati.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ manɛ waasɛ̃ ka jĩng zang, tɔ̀ɔ ri zi shonang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ, ri dɔ̀ɔ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ lapa kati.”
“Nɔ́ɔ tɔɔ kpang, nɛɛ n arɛ, nɛɛ n naa kɔ̃sɔ nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔ̀ɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri túsú ɓɛɛ katɔ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ n naa shingnɛ ri ɓee nyaa katɔ kɔ jong.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, lapa nɛɛ tipi ri nɛɛ doogn, vuu gbete ka teteng rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi naa shaarɛ kpang. Ri naa ɓee nyaa ditɔ nandon.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a ti tusu zang naa ɓɔɔ ri ɓa ɓɛɛ jong, wukɔ zang tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang piti ɓɔɔ dũng Ruu Laa keɓe, a ti tusu zang nɛɛ ri dũng jong, wukɔ zang bang ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ naa tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ɓá ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Farisi kpang, nɔɔ naa daa manɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti kpang tingkiring.”
“Nɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ zang ka tĩng tɔ. Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ nyɔ shɔnzang vɔrɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, zang naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu katɔ.’

A kãntang keɓe, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tuu gnvɔ nɛɛ ɓeezung, zang naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu katɔ. Naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓeezung nɛɛ ‘Rang waati keɓe.’ Zang daa nɛɛ wu ka dabang kpanti. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ti ɓaa ɓeezung nɛɛ ‘Shoko.’ Zang tasɛ wu ka waa.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a Laa vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu kagn, a mɔɔ naa kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lasɛ ɓaazung yeti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ,
yaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ a Kpanti Laa ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ daa gaa wu, wu yaa mɔɔ gbalang. Tɔɔ mɔɔ gbãayu, mɔɔ naa a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓaaɓɛ kati.

“Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa pati ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa mɔɔ nyaavaa nɛɛ daa tuu mɔɔ wu a zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang tuu mɔɔ a jaa doo kpanti ri loo mɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, mɔɔ hàngsɛ́ nyaa saka shunang ka gbongkarɛ nandon tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu naa nwangsɛ mɔɔ.
“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ zang tɔ. Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ɓang bii nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔ kpang.’
A kãntang keɓe n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi zang soro, a suru bii daa wu nɛɛ wu, ɓang bii ɓi tɔ nɛɛ wu ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
Jĩng nakn ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ shing mɔɔ mɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang zɔ̃ng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Nwang nɛɛ jĩng dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ bii bang ɓaaɓɛ ka waa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.
Náa nakn ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ ti shing mɔɔ mɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Nwang nɛɛ naa dang gbete kɔ gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ bii bang ɓaaɓɛ ka waa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
“Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔyi tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hing soro ɓiɓɛ, wu a wu labeenang soro hinnang ka naa.
A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa soro zang roo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn kpang, a varɛ ɓiɓɛ hing wu, varɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shing wu palɛ dũndũng. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing soro ɓɔɔ zang hing katɔ, pálɛ̀ ɓi doo dũndũng kɔ.
“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tĩng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔ́ɔ tũng vuu nɛɛ sèé kpang. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a Kpanti Laa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ katɔ.’
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ tũng vuu kpang tingkiring. Nɔ́ɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ lapa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ lapa keɓe, wukɔ nɔng nwannang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ tipi keɓe kpang kɔ doori, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tipi ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa tɛ̃ɛ doo kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ Urushalima kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ Gãa bang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ yuu manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zunung naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ risi suuyuu manɛ gbete wu rì puru kɔ vĩiri kpang ɓɛɛ.
Yee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rang piti wu di nyaa ka, ‘Nn.’ Nɛɛ, ‘Kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning’. Yee ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa ‘Nn.’ Nɛɛ, ‘Kpang katɔ, a ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Sheetang, zang shi kpang.’
“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tĩng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu lɔ́ngsɔ́ jĩng nɛɛ jĩng. Zang wu ti lɔ́ngsɔ́ tãri nɛɛ tãri kɔ doori.’
A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ lɔngsɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ doori kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nɛɛ nyɔ mɔɔ ka kashoo ɓɔɔ nakn, mɔɔ raa wu ɓɔɔ nagang jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓaa mɔɔ nyaavaa, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ta fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ, a wu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zuu sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ nɛɛ mani piti.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu shing mɔɔ nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, mɔɔ shing wu mɛli gbete, daa nɛɛ wu mɛli ziti.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gàa vuu ka naa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ zãa wu kpang. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ti ta vuu nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ ti a wu.
“Nɔɔ ti tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tĩng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ kàsɛ́ ruu zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ, nɔ́ɔ bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.’
A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti gaa Kpanti Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jĩng ɓɛɛ,
tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nwang wujɛ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa shingnɛ laa ɓiɓɛ wu nwang ka yuu zang shi kpang nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ piti ɓɛɛ. Ti a zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zang shi kpang mii lapa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa nɔɔ kàsɛ́ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ ɓu vi ka bii Kpanti Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, ri palɛ wu nɔngkɔ doori kpang ya?
Naa nɔɔ ti jee rɛɛ ɓaazung kɔ nyaa shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang, ri palɛ ɓu doo nɔngkɔ kpang ya?
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ doo naa ɓɔɔ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa nwang ɓɛɛ kɔ.

“Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ning. Nɔ́ɔ pálɛ̀ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔɔ zang ri zi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu á nɔɔ ɓɛɛ takpang.

“Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu, mɔɔ jèe vuukãng ka gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang, ri palɛ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi nɛɛ nyaa gbabang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang dɔɔ ri kati ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe, ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛ̀ɛ́ a ri ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon.
A mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, mɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu, mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ kagn wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Tɔ̀ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang, zang ɓɔɔgn, ri zi kaa takpang. Tɔɔ Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ nwĩiri, wu naa a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kati.”

“Nɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ gaa Laa, nɔ́ɔ palɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri kasɛ Laa gaanang doo paa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ gbabang ɓee zɔɔ, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi ri kati. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ a ri tɔ nandon.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ gaa Laa, tu ka yeti jaka ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ku nyaa gãa, tɔɔ mɔɔ gaa Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ wu naa a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ kati.

“Mɔɔ nɛɛ gaa Laa, mɔɔ paasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang keɓe gbete sasak naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang paasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Laa tãa ri, ka ruu yee ɓɔɔ ri paasɛ sasak ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔ́ɔ palɛ manɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gàa tɔɔsung nyaa puunang gn kpang, Daa manɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓii tɔ.
Nɔɔ gaa Laa naa weɓe:
“Daa ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ,
zang wu dɔɔ nung tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta.
Zang ri zirɛ, nɛɛ mɔkɔ kpanti.
Zang ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe,
naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
A ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lɛɛkɔ jong, lɛɛkɔ.
Mɔ́ɔ ti yàa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ,
naa ɓɔɔ ruu yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ yaa Sheetang wu gãsɛ ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ta ruu katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ.
“Naa nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa yàá nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
A naa nɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, Daa manɛ yaa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ doo kpang kɔ.”

“Nɔɔ nɛɛ seng nyaalaa nɔ́ɔ kãngtɛ nyaa tĩng naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri risi nyaa tĩng ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ ri seng nyaalaa. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ bii zang ɓi tɔ nandon.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ seng nyaalaa, sɔɔ jĩng katɔ, mɔɔ ti tũuru nung ka yuu,
tɔ̀ɔ ri zi nyaalaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ seng kaa takpang. Tɔɔ Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang, wukɔ wu zi gbete. Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, wu a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ kati.
“Nɔ́ɔ kpalɛ vuu naa manɛ ka koolaa keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tùurú nɛɛ sisaa ri lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Shɔngɓɔ ri ti lasɛ nyaa gãa, ri daa ɓɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ kpálɛ́ vuu naa manɛ ka nɔng Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tùurú nɛɛ sisaa ri lasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Shɔngɓɔ ri ti lasɛ nyaa gãa, ri ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang shing danggn ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kpálɛ̀ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kagn kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
“Jĩng kɔ waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii. Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ yakɛ katɔ nandon.
A jĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, bii ɓaaɓɛ nandon nwang ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng ka nɔng yakɛnang, a ɓeekpang mɔɔ doo ka nɔng tɔɔnang, nɔng tɔɔnang kaɓa bang dɔɔli.

“Zang gbete pàlɛ̀ zang ziti shonang ka laa gbete kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ruu zang gbete wu bɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ gbete. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ gbete wu risi ɓɔɔ gbete naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang wu ɓakɛ Laa dũnnang ɓi nɛɛ vuu naa kãanang kpang.

“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu nwannang manɛ dɔɔli kpang nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ walɛ vuu shaanang, nɛɛ mii ɓoonang, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii manɛ ka niya kpang. Suru bii ɓa vuu shaanang kpang ya? Bii shɔnzang ti ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang ya?
Nɔɔ zi jaaning karɛ, ri ɓaa jĩng vuu kpang, ri yee kpang, ri ti kpalɛ vuu ɓarɛ jong ka bɔ̃nɔ kpang, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, a ri vuu shaanang katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓa jaaning kpang ya?
Zang gbete ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, zunung diki gbete gisinang katɔ ka yuu diki nwannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ wiya?
“A nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ mangwaa vuu ri bangkɛ ka waala ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ shonang kpang, ri ti sée yuu ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ bii kpang.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ, kpanti Sulemanu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shili katɔ nandon, shirɛ daa doo ɓarɛ gbete kpang.

Mangwaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi lɛɛkɔ, ɓuru waatɛ kaa tɔ, zang tasɛ kaa waa ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Laa nɛɛ pàlɛ́ ri shinang katɔ naa weɓe, pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa ri katɔ manɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn ka bii Kpanti Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔ́ɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ, nɔɔ walɛ vuu shaanang ka niya, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓooyi, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãlɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kɔ, ri shing jĩng ka vuu keɓe. A Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa zi tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ vuu keɓe katɔ piti.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe, nɔɔ kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ Laa wukɔ Kpanti, nɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ, gisi nɔɔ vuu keɓe ditɔ jong nandon.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔ́ɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu diki ɓɔɔgn kpang. Vuu ɓi ka naa Laa kɔ gbete. Nɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ lɛɛkɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, vuu lɛɛkɔ ɓɔɔ kpãa nɔɔ, daa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jĩng ka rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ.
“Nɔ́ɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, Kpanti Laa wu ti naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu kaa takpang kɔ doori.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu, Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Waka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zang vuu nɛɛ mani, Laa naa mã nɔɔ manɛ, doo nɛɛ wukɔ.
“Ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shing jĩng ka zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaazung kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, mɔɔ yee laa ɓáa ka lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ kpang viya?
Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaazung ɓu ka biya, nɛɛ, ‘N kaaɓi n zɔ̃ng mɔɔ zũng laa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ, a mɔɔ yaa lawaa ɓɔɔ bang ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ, ka nɔngkɔ viya?’
Mɔkɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓi, zɔ̃́ng lawaa bang, ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ sha zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaazung kati.
“Nɔ́ɔ a zaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri naa raa jĩng ri yi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ti tàsɛ̀ gãnya vutu jasang palɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ nàalɛ́ nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ gaa ta ka naa Laa, a nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ kãa ta, nɔɔ ti ĩi katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓáa nyaa ta, Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ gaa vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ, walɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ kãayi ti ĩi katɔ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓáa wu nyaa, kasɛ wu nyaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Zang ɓɔɔ nàá jaa ɓiɓɛ gàa vuu shaanang ka naa ɓiɓɛ, ka teteng manɛ, tuu tari a wu wiya?
Naa jaa ɓiɓɛ ti gaa jaazĩi, a wu sɔkɔ katɔ wiya?
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shi kpang, naa nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a wujɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, a zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang ya?
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ palɛ ri doo nɔngkɔ. Ruu keɓe kɔ, Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ tú nɛɛ nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ daa ka nɔng vɔrɔ, bang ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng vɔrɔ kaɓa nɛɛ mani, ti kpãa ɓi kpang.
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri tú nɛɛ nyaa gãa keɓe dɔɔli.
Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ mani, kpãa dɔɔli, nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng ɓi ti tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ĩi gbalang kaɓa, ri shang kpang.
“Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang sèé ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri a ka bii manɛ náa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ zang vuu kpang ɓɛɛ, a yeti ɓarɛ nwang naa zaa wisi ɓɔɔ jĩng raa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi ri núng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang hã́ mangɔrɔ katɔ ka kɔkɔ gbantang ya? Zang ti hã jaa sĩiri katɔ nɛɛ bii daapaajong ya?
Laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ra jaa ɓi doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Laa shi kpang, ti ra jaa ɓi doo shi kpang kɔ.
Laa tɔ̃ɔ, ra jaa shi kpang ɓi jong kpang. A ɓɔɔ shi kpang ti ra jaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi doo kpang kɔ.
Laa piti ɓɔɔ ra jaa tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang dɔngnɛ, zang tasɛ ka waa.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi ri nung ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Wu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ɓaarɛ m nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, Kpanti’ kɔ naa daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, ri daayi.

Zang dɔɔli ri naa kɔɔ m ka diki ɓɔɔ, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, rùu kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa wu nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ kɔ kpang ya? Ruu ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang, a ɓɔɔ shonang bang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ kɔ kpang ya?’
A n naa kɔɔ ri m dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ, ‘N zi nɔɔ m gn, gn kpang. Nɔɔ dita kaaɓa, zang shi kpang kiɓi.’
“Zang piti ɓɔɔ tãa ruu mɛɛ keɓe, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãayi, nwang naa zang zũnang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ.
Mii naa arɛ, kpaa gaagaa, a jasung ti naa rarɛ, zĩiti gãa, zĩiti gãa, gãa ɓiɓɛ watɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, loo doo ɓiɓɛ ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ.
A shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu mɛɛ keɓe, a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa kpang, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ zũng kpang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu seseele ɓɛɛ.
Mii naa arɛ, kpaa gaagaa, jasung ti naa rarɛ, zĩiti gãa, zĩiti gãa, gãa ɓiɓɛ ji gbusuk jinang ɓiɓɛ shing baabii dɔɔli.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu tusunang ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu zang vuu naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa ɓɛɛ. Wu náa ɓɔ̀ɔ́, zang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tusu ri labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ, a zang dɔɔli ri dũuru wu ka knti.
A zang ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa katɔ, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ dĩi naa, lee zang vuu bii kati. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kasɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.” A vuu bii yàa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daayi, mɔ́ɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ dɔ́ɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti dɔ̀ɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kagn, nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.”
Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ Kafanahu tɔ, a yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ wu yi wu naa jong bii.
A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang shonang mɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, roo ka gãa, dang jĩng dɔɔli.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N daa ditɔ, ń daa masɛ wu.”
A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja naa risi nyaa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, n daa naa ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu doo ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ a ka gãa mɛɛ kpang. Rang yee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, bii valɛ zang shonang mɛɛ katɔ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwang m ka naa zang ɓɛɛ. A zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn naa mɛɛ kɔ doori. Naa n kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete, n tɔɔ ‘Dita’, daa katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ, ‘Arɛ’, ti a katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ zang shonang mɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Palɛ veɓe’, ti palɛ katɔ.”

Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa yee ɓɔɔ yɔɔ rang naa weɓe, mã naa ka danggn. A kɔɔ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, n zi zang Isirela ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bìí Kpanti Laa gngn naa zang zanti keɓe kpang.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang zanti dɔɔli naa a nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn, naa nwàng nɛɛ rɛɛ Ibirayi nɛɛ Ishaaku, a ɓɔɔ Yakubu ka nɔng vuu shaanang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.

A zang naa nwangsɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn nɛɛ rikɔ naa daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ jong, zang tasɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri naa kaayi ri ti shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja tɔɔ, “Dita, vuu keɓe nwang ditɔ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing danggn ka bìí Laa ɓɛɛ.” A bii valɛ zang shonang yɔɔ ɓɔɔ roo kɔnang ka gãa ɓɛɛ, kaa tantɛnang ka laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ naa a ka gãa Bituru, a zi Bituru ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi soro Bituru roo tɔ ka latãng, bii zàa wu katɔ.
A Yeesɔ lee Bituru ɓeekpeng nɛɛ naa, a bii ɓɔɔ zàa wu, yaa wu nɔng kati. A Bituru ɓeekpeng seepaa, gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kãa Yeesɔ vuu shaanang kati.
Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, zang átɛ́ wu zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, a nwàngsɛ̀ ri suru shi kpang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ nandon.
Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, ɓèe ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang kaɓa kɔ naa masɛ ruu,
wu ti naa see kɔnang ɓuru.”
Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ri ta rang ri daa ka nyaa rang dang.
A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, arɛ naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa piti, n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ning.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeng roonang yaka jĩngti kagn, a saara jaaning ti kagn, a nɔng ɓɔɔ naa Jaa Shɔnzang shing yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ kagn kpang.”
A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, yaa m ta, n daa gbãa daa mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta, mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ Suru Laa gn kpang ka nɔngkɔ, ri gbãa zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ.”
Yeesɔ vang tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa vang kaa jong nɛɛ wu.
Ri daa kana, a jasung bang naa seepaa rannang ka yuu waapo. A mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ, kpalɛ ka bii tonsi. Tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ katɔ. A Yeesɔ roo ɓi kaa tɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hingsi wu, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ta rùu jong Kpanti, rùu ɔ̃ɔ kana.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang kɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓee, nɔɔ káa vɔrɔ vi nɔngkɔ viya?” A seepaa mangkɛ jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri kàa kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri mã naa ka danggn, ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ zang viya, jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ viya?”

Yeesɔ ta rang tɔ ka dang ka tipi zang Ganasara, a zang ziti ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng yusàa ɓɔɔ zang gbã́lɛ̀ vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri raa jĩng dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ tɛɛ gbalang kaɓa kpang.
Ri sãa nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Rúu ɓaaɓɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ rùu ya, Jaa Laa? Diki a gn kpang, mɔɔ arɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ naa dang ruu jĩng kaa naa talang ya?”
Ka laa kaɓa, gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn nɔngkɔ nɛɛ dalɛ kàá gaagaa.
A suru shi kpang ri gàa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwangsɛ ruu katɔ, hing ruu ta, ruu daa ka bii gãnya kɔ ri shaa ɓa.”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita.” A ri nwangkɛ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa ka dalɛ ɓɛɛ. A gãnya kɔ gaagaa ɓa, yuku nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng kɔ soo nyaa katɔ ɓa, a ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii waapo nandon, ri vɔlɔ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa gãnya, ri yuku, ri daa ka gari, ri daa kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ gãnya, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.
A zang gari ri nwangkɛ nandon, ri daa ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri daa zi wu tɔ, a ri bakɛ wu ri tɔɔ, “Dita, mɔɔ yaa ruu tipi ɓuru.”
Yeesɔ vang tonsi, a ta rang a ka gari ɓiɓɛ.

A zang atɛ wu, zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ta ka laa. Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ, mɔ́ɔ rɛ̃rɛ kpang. N yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, rangkɛ kana naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, rangkɛ ruu shi kpang ka yuu Kpanti Laa.”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang vi ka yeti manɛ nɔngkɔ viya?
Ɓɔɔ kpãa kpang ka teteng yee keɓe kiya, ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.’ Nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa ta, mɔɔ rarɛ wiya’?

N másɛ̀ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ, ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gba lang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Seepaa ta, mɔɔ tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta mɔɔ kagn, mɔɔ daa gãa.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, seepaa a tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta wu kagn daa gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri dɔɔ Kpanti Laa kati. Kaa ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ a zang naa vuu keɓe palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ, daa kana gbalang, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Matiyu nwang tɔ ki yeti jaka saka tipi tanang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa wu nyaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.”
A Matiyu seepaa dũng Yeesɔ Kati.

Yeesɔ daa nwang tɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang ka gãa Matiyu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ɓɛɛ, ri naa nwang nɛɛ wu.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang manɛ shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ka ruu viya?”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri katɔ kɔ ri daa shɛ̃ɛning.

Nɔɔ kãa dĩiri yèé Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kasɛ m ruu vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ m kpang, n kasɛ nɛɛ gn zɔɔ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ kɔ jong.’ N arɛ, nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Rùu seng nyaalaa nɛɛ zang Farisi, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang ka ruu viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ri seng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ, sinyɛ ɓeevɛ doo nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ ya? Diki ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu sinyɛ ɓeevɛ kagn a doo naa, tɔɔ ri naa seng nyaalaa kati.
“Zang lù fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala ɓi jong nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ naa lɔɔsɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala, yaa yeng kaa bang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.

Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ sàa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zàáng gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. Náa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, sãa zàáng katɔ. Sàa ti tɛ̃ɛ ɓi ka tipi. A naa zang tɛ̃ɛ sàa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ka zàáng ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kɔ doori, zàáng lasɛ kpang, saa ti tɛ̃̀ɛ ka tipi kpang.”

Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa ka nyaa nɛɛ ri, yɔɔ zang bang Yahudi arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ. A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔng vɔrɔ doo kãntang, arɛ mɔɔ daa ĩi wu naa ɓaaɓɛ jong ka bii, tɔɔ wu gãntɛ jĩng kati.”
A Yeesɔ seepaa, daa kaa nɛɛ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a jaa soro ɓɔɔ zĩi kpaa wu daa sáa kopi tu ziti, arɛ naa lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ knti.
Kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa n lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang mɛɛ, waa nyaa katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ yaa danggn naa kpang manjaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti Laa masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.” A kɔnang yaa jaa soro bii kaa tantɛnang ka làa kaɓa.
Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ gãa yɔɔ zang bang tɔ, a zi zang ɓɔɔ ri jee leere nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri gòoró nyaa kana.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ta ka biling. Jaa keɓe vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.” Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri laarɛ wu.
Zang nwangsɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng vɔrɔ tɔ ka biling nandon, a Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa, daa yi jaa kaa naa, a jaa yupaa kati.
Nyaa vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, bàa tipi kaɓa kaa nandon.
Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ, daa kana gbalang, a zang jĩng ringtang ziti ri dũuru wu ka knti. Ri ti mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A Yeesɔ naa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔgn, a ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ ka yeti manɛ, nɛɛ n zunung vuu keɓe palɛnang katɔ ya?”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, rùu zi tɔ, mɔɔ zunung katɔ Kpanti.”
A Yeesɔ lee naa ka jĩng ɓarɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Wu nwang ta ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ.”
A jĩng ɓarɛ ɓèlè kaa tɔkn. A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang.”
A ri daayi, ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, ri seepaa daanang tɔ, a zang atɛ Yeesɔ zang nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati.

Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang tɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ naa rang yee kati. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka tipi Isirela kpang.”
A zang Farisi ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi doo nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ kpanti suru shi kpang a wu kɔ.”
A Yeesɔ daarɛ ka gari bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng piti. Tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang Yahudi, a ti rang zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang Laa. A masɛ zɔ̃ng kɔnang ɓɔɔ yiki zang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ri nandon.
Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu, ka ruu jĩng ɓɔɔ ri dang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii kpang. Ri nwang naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ jagãng ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
A raa jĩng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zee zũng tɔ dɔɔli, a zang yeenang ri haa kaa takpang.
Nɔɔ gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang jaa ɓɛɛ ta, wu shong zang zee yeenang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kopi tu ziti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri arɛ. A á ri naa suru shi kpang nwangsɛnang, nɛɛ zɔ̃ng kɔnang piti masɛnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ zang ka bii nandon.
Zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shong ri, zang ɓaa nung ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Siman ɓɔɔ zang ti ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru, a ɓɔɔ Yakub jaa Zebedi nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana,
nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Batolomi, nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Matiyu ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Yakub jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Tadayu,
nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ shong zang kopi tu ziti keɓe kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ daa ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Nɔ́ɔ ti daa gari zang Samariya gbete kpang.
Nɔɔ daa ka bii zang Isirela ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kana, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ.’
Nɔ́ɔ ti masɛ zang kɔnang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ paa. Nɔ́ɔ ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang. Nɔɔ tà waati, nɔɔ á zang doo waati kɔ.
Nɔ́ɔ daa nɛɛ saka ka baajaa kpang.
Nɔ́ɔ ti tuu duku nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nɛɛ koodoo, a ɓɔɔ labalang ka naa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang shonang doo ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Gari bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dàá kagn piti, nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ nɔng shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ daa nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ, wu a nɛɛ mani.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kana yeti gãa, nɔɔ jee zang nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ nwáng tɔ̃ɔ.’
Zang gãa ri nɛɛ ta nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete, naa nwáng ditɔ nɔngkɔ. A zang gãa nɛɛ ta nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang, naa nwáng nɔngkɔ kpang.

Zang gãa nɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rang piti, nɔɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃sɔ kaa gari ɓɔɔgn, nɔɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ. (Nɔɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, Ruu ɓuru hãa ɓi tɔɔgn nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, tɔɔ nɔɔ daayi.)
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, jĩng dannang ɓarɛ naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang gari Sɔɔdom nɛɛ Gomora katɔ.
“Kãntang keɓe, n shong nɔɔ naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ka teteng zaa wisi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zũng katɔ naa sɔkɔ, nɔɔ ti nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ naa koro ɓɔɔ palɛ zang vuu ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang naa yi nɔɔ ditɔ, zang daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, ri ti naa nyɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ.
Zang ti naa gɔ̃ nɔɔ, zang daa nɔng ka tĩng rɛɛ gɔmna nɛɛ rɛɛ Kpanti, ka ruu mɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa rǎng ri yee Laa ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓarɛ nandon.
Zang nɛɛ daa tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ rɛ̃rɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kasɛ zang nyaa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa naa a nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ditɔ ka laa kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔkɔ daa rang yee kpang, ɓi Suru Daa manɛ kɔ daa rang nɛɛ nyaa manɛ.
“Shɔnzang ti naa a zang ɓeezung ditɔ, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ. Daa jaa ti naa a zang jaa ɓiɓɛ ditɔ zang nyɔ vɔrɔ. Wujɛ ri ti naa shíi varɛ ditɔ nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ, ri ti a zang daa ɓarɛ, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ.
Zang piti ri naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ, ka ruu nung mɛɛ. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn sasak, wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.

Zang nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jĩng kana ka gari gbete, nɔɔ yurɛ nɔ́ɔ daa ka gari ɓɔɔgn. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa shonang manɛ palɛnang gn gari zang Isirela nandon kpang.
“Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu, ɓa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu kpang. Zang shonang ti ɓa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang.

A zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii zang, nɛ̀ɛ́ nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang shonang nɛɛ ti nwáng tɔ naa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zang ɓàa zang bang gãa nɛɛ Bahazabu, kpanti suru shi kpang, zang naa ɓáa zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓi ka biya? (Ɓɔ̀ɔ́ ɓarɛ naa ɓá ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓi katɔ.)
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓarɛ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, a zang màkɛ̀ piti, Laa naa nwangsɛ ditɔ. Ruu ɓɔɔ zang ti kɔɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri, zang naa tãa ditɔ nandon.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri, nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa nwangsɛ ka dalɛ. Ɓɔɔ n ti ɓɔɔlɔ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ, nɔɔ ti daa váng ka yuu gãa nɔɔ kɔɔ zang.
Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ gãmpãng bii, a ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ suru bii kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ Kaa vɔrɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ nyɔ gãmpãng bii nɛɛ suru bii piti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ waa ning ɓi jong kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang màlɛ́ jaaning tɔkɔsisi wu ziti kɔpɔ gbete kpang ya? A naa Daa manɛ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ kpang ɓɔɔ vɔ kagn ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete kpang.
Nɔɔ zi ta, Laa gã̀ suuyuu manɛ kɔ ka yuu ɓee, ɓi katɔ nandon.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa tɔkɔsisi ɓɔɔ dɔɔli katɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ka tĩng zang nɛɛ wu zang mɛɛ, n ti naa kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka tĩng daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ wu zang mɛɛ.
A naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa nyaa mɛɛ ka nɔng zang, n ti naa laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ ka tĩng Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”
“Nɔ́ɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ n arɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang ka nɛɛ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka koo keɓe kpang. N à m zang basɛnang kɔ jong.
“N arɛ, nɛɛ n naa,
kpaa m yuu daa jaa kɔ jong
nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ,
zang soro nɛɛ niiɓɛ.
Ń ti kpaa shɔngkpeng ɓɔɔ soro yuu nɛɛ ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ soro.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa zang,
rikɔ naa raa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang kaa jong.
“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu diiɓɛ, kɔ niiɓɛ, ɓá ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ m katɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ kɔ ɓɔɔ soro, ɓá ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ m, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu dang jĩng ka ruu mɛɛ kpang, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu suru bii ɓiɓɛ, walɛ ɓi kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ mãlɛ́ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu nung mɛɛ, wukɔ naa wàlɛ́ jong.”
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ tà nɔɔ, ri ta ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà m, ta ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta zang nyaa shonang Làa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa, ti naa ta ɓi doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, ti naa ta ɓi doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing zang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang piti ɓɔɔ a jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe mii valabm, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa keɓe mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, zang kaɓa naa ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ yee rannang tɔ, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, a daa ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili. Tusu zang vuu a ti rang zang yee Laa.
Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang mã wu ka sãa, tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Kirisi palɛ, a shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka bii Yeesɔ,
nɛɛ ri daa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓu mɔkɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya, kɔ ruu gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔgn?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gbãayu ta, nɔ́ɔ daa kɔɔ Yɔhana vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti zi ɓɛɛ.

Zang jĩng ringtang ri zi nɔng kana, zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ ri ti ra kana, a kɔnang zang vuu bii ti yaa ri nɔng kana. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo gbooto ri ti tãa nɔng kana, n ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ paa kana. Zang ti rǎng zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kana.
Tĩnang tãanang, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ yaa danggn naa, ka ruu mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana naa seepaa daanang tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa kɔɔ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ruu Yɔhana kati. Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dàa ɓu vi zinang ka jĩngti viya? Lagaa ɓɔɔ jasung zĩiti ɓɛɛ ya?
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, nɔɔ daa vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ zinang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka gãa rɛɛ kpanti.
A nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa ka ruu zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa zinang ya? Nɔ́ngkɔ̀, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔ, ti ɓa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓi katɔ.
Wee yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee ruu ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang Laa kɔ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N shong zang shonang mɛɛ ditɔ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ, wu palɛ mɔɔ gbalang.’

“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, ka teteng shɔnzang ɓɔɔ zang yiki ka koo keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kagn kpang. A zang tɔkɔlɔng piti, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓa wu bannang katɔ.”
Zang yeti shi kpang gaa tɔɔsung Kpanti roonang Laa lasɛnang nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima rang yee Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri ta ɓɛɛ doo kana kɔ sasak.
Zang nyaa shonang Laa piti, nɛɛ Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, ri kɔɔ ruu Kpanti roonang Laa sasak, a à nɔng ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu keɓe tanang katɔ, Yɔhana kɔ Iliya ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ naa a ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.
“N gãsɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ri nwang naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ tãa shoo kpang, ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka lumang, ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang pĩirinang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
‘Rùu jee nɔɔ leere, a nɔɔ sɔ̀ dang kpang. Ruu ti ɓàa nyaavaa nɔɔ ti kaa nyavɔ kpang.’
Yɔhana arɛ seng nyaalaa, ɓoo sàa kpang, a zang tɔɔ, ‘Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.’

Jaa Shɔnzang àrɛ, shaa katɔ, ti ɓoo katɔ. Zang ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ zi zang nyɔkɔ keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo saa dɔɔli. Wusang zang saka tipi tanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.’ Zũnang Laa tusu bii ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung zang gari ɓɔɔ wu palɛ shonang ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔɔli mangkɛnang kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang gari Korazing nɛɛ Bɛsɛda. Naa vuu bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ zang palɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓee, zang nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ ka Taya nɛɛ Sidong, zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, ri nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ. Ri nɛɛ ti hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ yeti lasɛnang tɔ. Ri nɛɛ ti tɛ̃ɛ pũngku tɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, gn zang Taya nɛɛ Sidong naa kɔng wu ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ.

A ɓɔɔ manɛ, zang Kafanahu, zang naa tuu nɔɔ ditɔ ka lapa ya? Kpang. Zang naa tasɛ nɔɔ ka yeti waa bang kɔ jong. Zang nɛ̀ɛ́ palɛ vuu bang kɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓee, ka Sɔɔdom, zang Sɔɔdom ri nɛɛ doogn diki keɓe.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, gn zang Sɔɔdom naa kɔng wu ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ.”

Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa gàa Laa tɔɔ, “N zãa mɔɔ tɔ Dada, Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang dɔɔli vuu keɓe, a mɔɔ naa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
Nɔngkɔ Dada, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kasɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, a m vuu piti tɔ ka naa. Zang ɓɔɔ zi m Jaa Laa, kagn gbete kpang, ɓi Daa mɛɛ kɔ gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi Daa mɛɛ kagn gbete kpang, ɓi nkɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ n zirɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu ri Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ, zang piti ɓɔɔ dang jĩng, a ti rɛ̃rɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n á nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔnang katɔ.
Nɔɔ yaa m ta n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n tuu yuu kpang N ti lakɛ jĩng kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ wàlɛ́ ɔ̃sɔnang katɔ.
Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ nɔ́ɔ palɛ m, kpãa ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ nɔ́ɔ ti tuuyi, ti kpiti ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi, Yeesɔ sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ ka yeti jaa zee. Nyɔkɔ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zee lɔɔrɔnang, ri shaa kati.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ri palɛ shonang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang. Ri ta nyaa dannang tɔ.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu gngn kpang ya?
Naa ɓɔɔ wu daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, a tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning, a shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”

A Yeesɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ gngn ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa vuu ri palɛ shonang ka yeti Gãa Laa, ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi kpang ya? A Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, kpang.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Gãa Laa bannang katɔ, kagn nihn.
Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ zi Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kasɛ m ruu gn shɔnzang kɔnang, wu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ m kpang.’ Nɔɔ nɛɛ dɔng zang tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ruu kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang kɔ kpanti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi.”
A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang Yahudi.
A zang ɓɔɔ náa ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu masɛ zang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, naa mã mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, gbete kɔ nwani, a mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓiɓɛ shi ka yeti too ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, yaa ka nɔngkɔ, zɔ̃ng kpang wiya?
Shɔnzang ɓa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ kpang ya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ náa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dĩi náa ɓaaɓɛ ta.” A dĩi náa ɓiɓɛ, a náa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔkn naa ɓɔɔ dang gbete.
A zang Farisi ri nwangkɛ, ri daa tɔ̀ng zɔɔ kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ zi tɔ naa weɓe, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daayi. Zang dɔɔli ri dũuru wu ka knti, a masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ nandon.
A shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ri daa kɔɔ zang nɛɛ wukɔ Jaa Laa kpang.
Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, ɓèe ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Wee zang shonang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n zɔ̃ngnɛ,
n ti kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng kɔ.
N a wu suru mɛɛ ditɔ,
wu tusu zang doo laa ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti,
ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kati.
Naa gàa nyaa ɓi kpang.
Ti naa sãlɛ nyaa ɓi kpang.
Zang ti naa tãa yee ɓiɓɛ ɓi ka gbalang kpang.
Ti naa ka lagaa ɓɔɔ lang katɔ kpang.
Ti naa ningsi waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓɔɔ ning kana kpang.
Wu ti yi tĩng nɛɛ Ruu Laa sasak,
zang piti ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang nɛɛ mani.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang naa shing gn ka nung ɓiɓɛ kɔ.”
A zang naa atɛ wu zang jĩng ringtang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓɛɛ, a nyaa ti nɔɔ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ masɛ wu kati. A zang kaɓa gaayu yee rannang kaa nɛɛ nɔng zinang piti.
Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn, ri tɔɔ “Zang keɓe ɓu Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda ka ya?”
Ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ “Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi nɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu Kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.”

Yeesɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ, ri shàarɛ̀ ɓarɛ tɔ. Zang gari nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ, gari ɓarɛ shàarɛ̀ ɓi tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ, ri naa nwang ɓi takpang kɔ doori.
Naa Sheetang nwangsɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, basɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ. Kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ nwang ɓu kaa biya?

Naa n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu kpanti suru shi kpang a m, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ ri nwangsɛ ɓi kaa nɛɛ naa viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ ri palɛ, wukɔ tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ ruu manɛ ɓi niizang kpang.
A n nɛɛ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ Suru Laa, kpanti roonang Laa a bii manɛ tɔ.
“Zang daa biya ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli zang see vuu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ viya? Zang mã wu katɔ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔɔ zang see vuu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ǹ kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ ǹ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kpalɛ vuu nɛɛ n kpang, tantɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, vuu shi kpang nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang piti, ɓɔɔ zang rangnɛ, Laa yaa zang gbalang ɓi katɔ. Naa zang rang yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka yuu Suru Kpanti Laa, Laa yaa zang gbalang ɓi kpang dòndòng.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Jaa Shɔnzang, Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi katɔ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Suru Laa, Laa yaa wu gbalang ka koo keɓe nɛɛ koo ɓɔɔ naa a ka tĩng ɓɛɛ kpang.
“Láa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ti naa ra jaa ɓi doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Laa nɛɛ shi kpang, ti naa ra jaa ɓi doo shi kpang kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi laa nung ɓi ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ.
Nɔkɔ shi kpang naa sɔkɔ pudi ɓi, nɔɔ palɛ biya, yee manɛ wu nwang ɓi kaa tɔ̃ɔ viya? Shɔnzang kɔɔ ɓi doo ruu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
Zang tɔ̃ɔ ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Zang shi kpang ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi doo ka ruu yee shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ kɛɛm kɛɛm ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Laa naa yaa mɔɔ náa ɓi doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ka koo keɓe kɔ. Laa ti naa dɔng mɔɔ ruu ɓi doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
Ka teteng zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.”

Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang yeti shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang ka koo jaa knti keɓe, kasɛ nɛɛ zang tusu ri vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang tusu nɔɔ kpang. Zang tusu nɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang pálɛ́ ka bii Yunana, zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Yunana nwang ka yeti jaazĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi diki taati ɓɛɛ. Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwáng doo nɔngkɔ ka tipi dii, nɛɛ laagɛ̃, nɛɛ zĩi diki taati.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, zang Ninivi ri naa kɔɔ zang koo jaknti keɓe ruu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Ninivi ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ka diki ɓɔɔ Yunana rang ri yee Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yunana katɔ, kagn nihn.

“Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, zang soro ɓɔɔ roo Kpanti ka tipi Sheeba, naa kɔɔ zang koo jaa knti ruu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a nɛɛ koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpala kpala, nɛɛ wu naa tãa zũnang kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa kpanti Sulemanu katɔ, kagn nihn.”
“Naa zang nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii zang tɔ, sɔɔrɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang. Kãarɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ĩi kpang,
wu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘N gbãayu ka gãa gbaala mɛɛ tɔkn.’ Ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu, naa ĩi gãa waati, vuu kagn kpang. Zang kooro tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ a zang ti kpalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.

Daayi, daa atɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa wu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ manziti. A suru shi kpang manziti kaɓa, ri naa turɛ, ri nwang ka yeti zang kaɓa. Nwannang shɔnzang keɓe, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang lasɛnang ɓi kaa tɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, naa nwang nɔngkɔ.”
Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a nàá Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá Yeesɔ ri shii ka biling. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nàá ɓaaɓɛ ri shii ka biling nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá ɓaaɓɛ. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ “Ɓu wi nàá mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ wiya?”
A tusu naa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, zang keɓe rikɔ nàá mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, wukɔ jaa nàá mɛɛ, nɛɛ nàá mɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ nwang kaa nɛɛ yeti gãa, ka diki kaɓa, a daa nwang ka nyaa mii waapo.
Zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛyi daa nwang ka yeti tonsi. Zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓi ti kaa nyaa gãnggãng.
A rang zang yee dɔɔli nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangnɛ, nɛɛ wu daa vang jĩng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
Vang jĩng vuu kana, a jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka gbalang, a jaaning ri arɛ ri yakɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔɔli kpang ɓɛɛ. A naa tantɛ takɛnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru dɔɔli kpang ɓɛɛ.
A ɓɔɔ laa naa tuuyi ri tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔng ɓarɛ daa tipi dii kpang ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, a kɔkɔ naa bangkɛ mulu ri.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, a ri naa shing jĩng. Ɓɔɔ jĩng ɓiɓɛ laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ rang zang yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ka ruu viya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa a nɔkɔ náa ruu niizang ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ ka yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi zinang tɔ, a zang a ri ɓarɛ kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wukɔ vuu ɓɔɔgn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Tɔɔ, vuu ɓiɓɛ wu shang kaa gaagaa. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, naa doo ɓɔɔ wu yiti ka naa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ti tarɛ, zang yaa wu naa waati.
N rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu, ri zi kaa takpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti ɓaa shoo ri tãa kaa takpang, a ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa rang nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ wu nwáng kaa niizang ka bii zang keɓe. Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ,
“ ‘Ri tãa ɓi katɔ nɔngkɔ, a
ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kaa takpang.
Ri ti zirɛ, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kaa takpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti zang keɓe rɛ̃rɛ takpang, shoo ɓarɛ ti huuru tɔ,
ri tãa takpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti mung jĩng ɓarɛ tɔ,
nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔngkɔ kpang ri nɛɛ zi katɔ.
Ri nɛɛ ti tãa tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓarɛ,
ri nɛɛ zi tɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ.
Ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ ka bii mɛɛ,
n nɛɛ masɛ ri tɔ.’
“A tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jĩng manɛ zi vuu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Shoo manɛ ti tãa nɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang nyaa shonang Laa, nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli, ri gãng jĩng nɛɛ ri zi vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee, ri zi kpang. Ri ti ɓaa shoo nɛɛ ri tãa vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, ri tãa kpang.
“Nɔɔ tãa dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang zang ɓɔɔ daa jĩng vuu vannang ɓɛɛ ta.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang, nwang ɓi kaa naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu Kpanti roonang Laa, a zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, Sheetang arɛ naa ta vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔɔli kpang, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ tãa Ruu Laa, a ta nɛɛ yeti gbete tantɛnang ɓɛɛ.
A zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ruu kaɓa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mã danggn ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A jĩng dannang, nɛɛ zang kpãanang naa seepaa ka ruu, Ruu Kpanti Laa, a tantɛ Ruu Laa yaanang.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa, a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang, naa mulu Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ kati, a ruu bìí naa nwàng ri vuu kaa takpang.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi ka zang ɓɔɔ tãa Ruu Laa, a ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu Laa nwang ri vuu tɔ̃ɔ, a ri naa nwang ka naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ra jaa, laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jĩng zee tɔ̃ɔ ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang, naa arɛ ɓaa zee lɔɔwɔ ka yeti jaa ɓiɓɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ zang rooro katɔ, a daa kati.
A zee ɓɔɔ zang jaa ɓayi naa bangkɛ tasɛ yuu, a zee lɔɔwɔ tasɛ yuu kaa jong ka teteng ɓarɛ.
“A zang shonang yɔɔ gãa ri naa arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang gãa mɔɔ ɓáa wu jĩng zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang ya? Zee lɔɔwɔ a ɓi kaa nɛɛ niya?’
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ n kpang kɔ palɛ vuu keɓe.’ A zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Ruu dita, ruu daa ruku ya?’
A yɔɔ gãa kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Kpang, nɔɔ yaa ka nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ ruku zee lɔɔwɔ, nɔɔ daa ruku nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ning ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ, ri bangkɛ nɛɛ zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbã̀ágbãa, diki ɓɔɔ zang yee zee wu a nɛɛ mani. N naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee ditɔ, nɛɛ, ri gaayu nɛɛ zee lɔɔwɔ kɔ kpalɛnang shɔɔnang. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri gɔɔ ka jɔɔ jɔɔ, ri dɔ́ɔ kati. Ri ti kpalɛ zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kaa bɔ̃nɔ mɛɛ.’ ”
A ti rang ri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa, jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita, ɓɔɔ zang jaa tuuyi daa ɓaa ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng masita keɓe kɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka yeti zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaarɛ nandon. A nɛɛ bang tɔ, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. Wu raa laa kati, jaaning ri ti naa kɔ̃ng saara ka nasãng ɓiɓɛ.”

Yeesɔ ti rang ri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ yisi ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ya tɔkɔlɔng nwɛ̃ɛtɛ nɛɛ zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani, waka bang bang taati, wu shingnɛ zũng wu puuyi ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ rang zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ yee keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon. Kɔɔ ri ruu ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ nyaa waati gbete kpang. (Rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon.)
Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, ɓee ɓi ka nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa rang yee nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
“N naa rang zang yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang,
n ti naa kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi gngn kpang,
doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa gaa tɔɔsung koo keɓe mãanang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ naa yaa zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a daa ka yeti gãa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ ruu dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang zee lɔɔwɔ ɓɔɔ takɛ ka jaa ɓɛɛ ta.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jĩng zee tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi Jaa Shɔnzang.
Jaa ɓɔɔ zee ta kagn ɓi koolaa. Jĩng zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri tà Laa, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zee lɔɔwɔ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Sheetang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang, ɓɔɔ ɓaa zee lɔɔwɔ, kaɓa, ɓi Sheetang. Diki zee yeenang, ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ koolaa naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang zee yeenang ɓi ti kaa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
“Naa ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zee lɔɔwɔ, zang dɔ́ɔ ka waa, zang naa palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.

Jaa Shɔnzang naa shong zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ditɔ, nɛɛ ri kpalɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ shing zang vuu shi kpang palɛnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang nandon.
Ri vǎng ri ka yeti waa bang. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri naa kaayi, ri shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, naa kɔlɔ ɓarɛ naa làa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa ɓarɛ roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.”

“Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa vuu naa ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ ka tipi ka jaa, a zang ɓɔɔgn naa ĩiyi, a setee ka nɔngkɔ. Tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daayi daa mãlɛ́ vuu ɓiɓɛ nandon, a naa hoo jaa kaɓa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.”
“Kpanti roonang Laa ti nwang naa zang vuu malɛnang ɓɔɔ kãa vuu tu ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
A naa walɛ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli, a daayi, daa mãlɛ́ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, a naa hoo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ ti rang nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa jang jaazĩi yinang ɓɔɔ zang vang ka mii waapo, raa jaazĩi ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ jang jaazĩi naa yi nyaa, zang jaazĩi yinang ri gɔ̃ ka nyaa dang gãnggãng. Ri nwang ka tipi, a ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka yeti waka, a ri vang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kati.
Diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa, nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri naa arɛ, ri zɔ̃ngkɔ zang shi kpang ka teteng zang tɔ̃ɔ,
ri vang ri ka yeti waa bang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi dĩiri yee keɓe ɓu tɔ nandon ya?”
A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn.”

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa, a ti zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti, zang keɓe nwang naa zang gãa ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shɔɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gbaala nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu tɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee keɓe rannang tɔ, nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, a seepaa daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn.

Daa shɛ̃ɛ gari ɓiɓɛ tɔ, a gaa zang tɔɔsung vuu tusunang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa yee ɓiɓɛ, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, walɛ zũnang keɓe ka niya? Ɓu wi a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu kɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ mani wiya?
Wee wu jaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ seere laa ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Wu Marayamu kɔ niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ, Yakub nɛɛ Yusufu, nɛɛ Siman nɛɛ Yahuda kɔ jaa niiɓɛ kpang ya?
Ɓu ti jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔ ri nwang nɛɛ ruu ka nihn piti kpang ya? Yɔɔ wàlɛ̀ vuu keɓe piti ɓi ka niya?”
A ri bɛ̃ɛ wu kati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang a zang nyaa shonang Laa bannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn piti, ɓi zang gari ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a wu bannang ɓi kpang.”
Yeesɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka nɔng kaɓa dɔɔli kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka diki kaɓa, Hiridu ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Galili tãa nyaa Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ sãlɛ nɔng,
a kɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe ɓi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kɔ hingsi jĩng nɛɛ vɔrɔ tɔkn, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, walɛ naa a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn keɓe.”
Hiridu kɔ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang yi Yɔhana, zang mãrɛ. Zang loo ka sãa ka ruu Hirodiya, soro jaa niiɓɛ Filibu ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana kɔɔrɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dàa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing Hirodiya kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Hiridu nɛɛ wu nyɔ Yɔhana katɔ ka tipi tang, a kaa vɔrɔ zang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang tɔɔ, Yɔhana zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ.

Diki ɓɔɔ zang yi Hiridu kagn naa raa bii. A kpanti Hiridu gaarɛ zang nɛɛ zang naa shaa vuu shaanang. A Jaa Hirodiya ɓɔɔ soro sɔ dãng ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Dãng ɓɔɔ jaa sɔrɛ, daa Hiridu ka yeti dɔɔli,
a tĩ̀ng jaa kaɓa Laa ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ piti, n a mɔɔ katɔ.”

A nàá jaa dɔ̃lɔ jaa nyaa tɔɔ, jaa wu gàa yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. A jaa naa kɔɔ kpanti Hiridu tɔɔ, “A m yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima, ka yeti pɛntɛng kãntang keɓe.”
Ɓɔɔ kpanti tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, a vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ takpang, ka Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ wu tĩ̀ng jaa ka shoo zang zanti ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri a jaa vuu ɓɔɔ jaa gàa ɓɛɛ ta.
A shong zang, nɛɛ zang daa dɔ̀ng wu yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
A zang atɛ yuu kporontong Yɔhana, zang a jaa ka yeti pɛntɛng. A jaa daa a niiɓɛ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana arɛ naa tuu bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, ri daa gbãa kati. A ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati.
Yeesɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa vang tonsi, daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang dɔɔli ri tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ daayi, ri seepaa nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ doo, ri dũuru wu.
Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ nyaa dang gãnggãng tɔ, a zi zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri kɔng wu gn, a masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ katɔ, ka teteng ɓarɛ kati.
Nɛɛ laarang ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Laa ɓa tɔ, yaa zang naa ta, zang ɓu daa hoo vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ka gari, ka ruu ɓɔɔ gãa ka nihn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ri daa biya? Nɔɔ a ri vuu ta, ri shaayi.”
Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Borodi ɓuru, yaa ɓi ka maani nɛɛ jaazĩi ziti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ atɛ m ta nihn.”

A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang ta ka yuu wisi. A see borodi maani nɛɛ jaazĩi ziti kaɓa, a tuu jĩng ka lapa. Zãa kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri alɛ zang nimbang kati.
Zang kaɓa, ri shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, ri yaa knti. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ sàáng kopi tu ziti.
Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kaɓa, ri daa labang maani katɔ. Zang gã zang soro nɛɛ wujɛ ɓi kagn kpang.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ri shɛ̃ɛ ta yeti tonsi, ri ta waapo ri gbãayu ka knti ɓɔɔ ri a ɓɛɛ, ka tĩng. Nɛɛ wu jee zang nimbang doo nyaa ka gbongkarɛ, ri daayi.
Jee zang nyaa tɔ, a naa vang ka kɔpɔ, nɛɛ wu daa gaa Laa. A laa hãa wu nyaa ka nɔngkɔ ka bm.
Ka laa kaɓa, knti tonsi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri vangnɛ ti bee ɓi tɔ nɛɛ nyaa dang gãnggãng. Jasung ti ráarɛ̀ tonsi kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung raa jĩng ka bii ɓarɛ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii waapo nɛɛ yuu gãndi, a daa ka bii ɓarɛ.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii waapo naa weɓe, ri sengnɛ, ri kaa vɔrɔ. Ri kaa nyaa ka lapa, ri tɔɔ, “Raanang kaɓa.”
A Yeesɔ rang yee kaa tantɛnang nɛɛ ri, tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Ɓi nkɔ.”
Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, nɛɛ mɔkɔ, kɔɔ m ta, n ra ka yuu paa mii, n a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “A ta.” A Bituru seepaa nɛɛ yeti tonsi, ra ka yuu paa mii, daa kana bii Yeesɔ.
A Bituru zi jasung, a kaa vɔrɔ, a gaa tɔɔsung ɔ̃nang ka mii. Kaa nyaa tɔɔ, “Ta m jong, Kpanti.”
A Yeesɔ dĩi naa ɓiɓɛ kaa tantɛnang yi wu, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ rɛ̃rɛkɛ viya? Mɔɔ yaa danggn naa ka ruu viya?”
Ri shɛ̃ɛ tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a jasung vɔ nyaa kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti tonsi dɔ̀ɔ Yeesɔ kati. Ri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ Jaa Laa kɔ niizang.”
Ri ta mii tɔ, ri a ka tipi Janesara.
Zang tipi Janesara ri zi Yeesɔ nung, a ri shongko nyaa ka bii zang doo laa kaɓa nandon. A zang ãatɛ Yeesɔ zang kɔnang ɓarɛ kaa nandon.
A ri gaa wu, nɛɛ wu yaa zang kɔnang jong, ri lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ piti, kɔnang ɓarɛ yaa ri bii nandon.
A zang Farisi ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ Urushalima. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru dang ka ruu viya? Ka ruu vi, ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ náa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu rùu kpang viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi nɔɔ yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ nɔɔ dũng kaa nyaa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dangnɛ viya?
Kpanti Laa dang nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu shing jĩng ka diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, wu ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, zang wu nyɔ vɔrɔ ka tipi tang.’
A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu kɔɔ niiɓɛ nɛɛ diiɓɛ nɛɛ, n a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ a nɔɔ tɔ nandon.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ ‘Zang wu shing jĩng ka diiɓɛ kpang.’ Nɔɔ yaa Ruu Laa, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka yuu manɛ niizang kɔ nwani.
“ ‘Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ,
Zang keɓe ri dɔɔ m ka nyaa lapa waati,
a yeti ɓarɛ
ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii mɛɛ naabm kpang.
Ri dɔɔ m ɓarɛ waati.
Ri tusu zang ɓarɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dang ɓɛɛ,
ɓi Ruu Laa kpang.’ ”
A Yeesɔ naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang shaa ka yeti kɔ raa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa Kpang. Yee ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti nyaa zang kɔ, shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi ɓu tɔ nɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri tãa ruu kaɓa, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ katɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa shɔrɛ kpang, zang naa ru ɓi ditɔ.

Nɔɔ yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jĩng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang jĩng ringtang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Naa zang jĩng ringtang tɔɔ wu tusu zang ɓɔɔ doo jĩng ringtang kɔ doori gbalang, ri dáa gɔlɔ zɔɔ ɓarɛ ka too nandon.”
A Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nwangsɛ ruu dĩiri yee kɔ mɔɔ rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓee ta.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi gn kpang naa rikɔ kɔ sasak ya?
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang, sharɛ dàá ɓi ka buru ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ dii kpang ya?
A vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti nyaa shɔnzang, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ raa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti shɔnzang kɔ shing zang, zang rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang. Zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, roonang nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔgn, roonang nɛɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang gee ka takpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ti ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ, zang zɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa, zang ti rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang.

Vuu keɓe kɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa. A naa zang shaa vuu shaanang, zang sɔɔ naa ɓi naa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ tusu zang kpang, shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa kpang.”
A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Taya nɛɛ Sidong.
A jaa soro Kaana ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi kaɓa, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Kaa nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Suru shi kpang dang jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang soro jĩng dɔɔli.”
A Yeesɔ ã̀a wu nyaa ɓi ka bii kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa gaa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Hing jaa soro keɓe ta, wu daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ kaarɛ nyaa ka knti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang shong m ka ruu zang Isirela, ɓɔɔ naa mɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
A jaa soro kaɓa, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, yi m naa jong bii.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa zang tuu vuu shaanang wujɛ, zang a zaa, tɔ̃ɔ ya?”
A jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Shi kpang niizang Kpanti. Zaa ri yakɛ kɔkɔlɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ shili nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ mã ri ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, mɔɔ shing gn ka bii mɛɛ dɔɔli, N á mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.” A suru shi kpang yaa jaa ɓiɓɛ bii kaa tantɛnang, ka laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, a naa sɔɔ nyaa dang gãnggãng mii waapo Galili, a daa vang kɔpɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ.

A zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri atɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang jĩng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɛɛ zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ kaa gn gaagaa. Ri tɛ̃ɛ ri ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a masɛ ri kati.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bìí Yeesɔ, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri zi zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ri rang yee kana ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, ri lakɛ, zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, ri ti ra kana, a zang jĩng ringtang ri ti zi nɔng. Ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ri zi naa weɓe, ri dɔ̀ɔ Làá zang Isirela kati.

A Yeesɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe gn ɓarɛ kɔng m dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ n daa diki taati, vuu shaanang ɓarɛ takpang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ, n tɔɔ, n jee ri nyaa nɛɛ nyɔkɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, doo nɛɛ daa kàá ri ka gbalang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Rùu walɛ borodi ka niya dɔɔli, ka waala keɓe, ruu a zang kɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓee wiya?”
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ nɛya?” A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Yaa manziti nɛɛ jaazĩi ɓɔɔ seseere wu dɔɔli kpang.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ta ka tipi.
A tuu borodi manziti kaɓa nɛɛ jaazĩi, a zãa Kpanti Laa. Shalɛ, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang nimbang ta.
Zang keɓe piti, ri shaa vuu shaanang, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ ka sang manziti.
Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ri labang dɛ̃ɛti. Zang gã́ zang soro nɛɛ wujɛ ɓi kagn kpang.
Yeesɔ jee zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa tɔ, a naa vang tonsi daa ka tipi Magadang.
Zang Farisi nɛɛ Saduki, ri arɛ nɛɛ ri naa gãsɛ Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ mɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔng laarang nɛɛ raa bii tɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ tɔɔ, ɓuru nɔng naa nwang lɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, làa raa nɔng lɛ̀ɛ́ katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ ti lɛ̀ɛ́ nɛɛ gãndi, nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Mii a lɛ̀ɛ́ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lapa raayi, a ti nwang lɛ̀ɛ́ ɓirɛnzing ɓɛɛ. Lapa nɛɛ risi bii tɔ, nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ tɔ.’ A nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ palɛ ka koo keɓe kãntang kpang.

Nɔɔ zang yeti shi kpang koo jaknti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa Kpang ɓee, nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. N tùsù nɔɔ kpang, zang tusu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka bii Yunana zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A yaa ri daayi.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri ta mii waapo Galili tɔ, danggn ning ri a ri tuu borodi ka naa kpang.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yisi, vuu ɓɔɔ puu zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani, ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Farisi nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Saduki ning.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nwĩiri. Ri tɔɔ, “Rang rùu yee keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu a nɛɛ borodi ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ ri rang nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang kɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓi. Nɔɔ rangkɛ ɓu ka ruu vi, ka naa manɛ nɛɛ, nɔɔ a nɛɛ borodi ka naa kpang viya?
Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpaa danggn borodi maani ɓɔɔ zang labang maani ri shaayi, ri yaa knti kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti sàáng nɛya?
Nɔɔ ti kpaa danggn borodi manziti ɓɔɔ zang labang dɛ̃ɛti ri shaayi kpang ya? Ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, nɔɔ kpalɛ sàáng nɛya?
Ka ruu vi nɔɔ zi gn kpang, nɛɛ n rang yee m ka yuu borodi kpang viya? N kɔɔ m nɛɛ nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yisi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Farisi nɛɛ Saduki ning.”

A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa zi kaa nɛɛ knti, nɛɛ Yeesɔ, kɔɔ ri ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri gãng jĩng ka yisi ɓɔɔ puu zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɛɛ ri gãng jĩng ɓarɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang Farisi nɛɛ Saduki ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ naa a tɔ ka tipi Kayisariya Filipi, a hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, n ɓu wiya?”

A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓáa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓáa Iliya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓáa Irimiya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓáa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ, nkɔ wiya?”
Siman Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi, (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.) Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Laa wu a mɔɔ tĩnang tãanang ta, Siman Bituru jaa Yunana. Vuu keɓe, wu shɔnzang tusu mɔɔ kpang. Ɓi Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa tùsù mɔɔ.
N kɔɔ mɔɔ, mɔkɔ Bituru. Dĩiri nung keɓe ɓi pɛngkɛ. N mãa gãa mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa shing gn ka bii mɛɛ, ka yuu pɛngkɛ keɓe kɔ. Vɔrɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ kpang.

N ti naa tusu mɔkɔ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang gbalang, zang zirɛ nɛɛ Laa kɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ka koo keɓe piti, zang bɛ̃ɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe, zang ti kasɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa.”
A Yeesɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang gn kpang nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ kpang.

Yeesɔ gàa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔsung yee rannang ka diki kaɓa, nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima ditɔ. Wu daa dang jĩng ditɔ gbãng gbãng, ka naa zang bang gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. A Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.
A Bituru ɓaa wu nyaa dang gbete, a mangkɛ wu tɔɔ, “Laa wu kɔsɔ vuu keɓe katɔ Kpanti, vuu keɓe wu naa pálɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔngkɔ kpang.”
Yeesɔ raa jĩng kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Dita kaaɓa Sheetang! Mɔkɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ m gbalang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓáa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa rɛ̃rɛ kpang, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓáa vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu kagn, wu dũng m.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A zang piti ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ, naa walɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
Naa shɔnzang walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon, a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu koo keɓe nwǎng wu ɓu viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kɔ̃sɔ suru bii ɓiɓɛ nɔng kagn ya?
Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ditɔ nɛɛ bannang diiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa alɛ zang vuu, ka naa vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
