N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang keɓe, ri vɔ kpang. Ri zi naa ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ka yeti bannang kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ.”
Diki mangbete naa ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru, a ɓɔɔ Yakub nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka kɔpɔ beebang.
A bii Yeesɔ risi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn ka jĩng ɓarɛ. Waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ kaa naa làa, a fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ti risi nwang ka puru shãa shãa.
A ri zi Musa nɛɛ Iliya, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee ruu ka nihn ɓee wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, ń wàa putali ka nihn taati. Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.”

Bituru rang yee doo naa nyaa, sãmbong ɓɔɔ puru shãa shãa arɛ naa zuu ri kati. A ri tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong nɛɛ, “Wee Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãng gbãng kɔ. N tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri kaa vɔrɔ, a ri zuu nung ka dii.
A Yeesɔ arɛ naa lee ri naa ka bii, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ seepaa ta. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang.”
Ri tuu jĩng ka lapa, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ takpang, ri zi kaa Yeesɔ kɔ gbete.
Ri shooro doo naa nɛɛ kɔpɔ, Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Nɔ́ɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee kpang, Kpanti Laa wu wisi Jaa Shɔnzang paa nɛɛ vɔrɔ ka gbongkarɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ka ruu viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Iliya kɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang tɔ̀ɔ Kirisi wu arɛ viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Iliya kɔ a shɔɔnang niizang, wu naa shĩ̀lí vuu piti.
A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, Iliya a tɔ, ri zi wu nung kpang. Ri palɛ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa dang Jaa Shɔnzang jĩng doo nɔngkɔ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi kati, nɛɛ rang ri yee ɓi ka yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
Ri a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, a zang gbete naa a ka bii Yeesɔ, a tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
“Kpanti, gn jaa mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Kɔnang ɓɔɔ mã zang katɔ, dang wu jĩng dɔɔli. Looro wu ka waa nɛɛ mii diki diki.
N à nɛɛ wu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri masɛ wu kpang.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang shi kpang koo jaa knti kɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓee, nɔɔ nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ ń mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ atɛ m jaa ta.”
A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang, a suru shii kpang nwangnɛ. A kɔnang yaa jaa bii kaa tantɛnang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri naa arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ nwĩiri tɔɔ, “Rùu zunung nwangsɛnang ɓuru kpang ka ruu viya?”

A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa nɛɛ kagn tɔkɔlɔng naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita, nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ ‘Wɔɔ ta nɛɛ nihn, mɔɔ daa kaaɓa,’ nɛ̀ɛ́ ti wɔɔ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa nɔɔ yuu palɛnang kagn kpang.”
[Suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, nwang ɓi jong waati kpang, zang nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ Laa gaanang, nɛɛ nyaalaa sennang.]
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon ka Galili, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ naa tuu m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ naa a zang.
Ri naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ. Laa naa wisi m paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli.
Yeesɔ naa a tɔ Kafanahu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri talɛ saka gãa Laa, ri arɛ ri naa hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Maalang manɛ shu saka gãa Laa ɓi kpang ya?”
A Bituru kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Shu katɔ.”

A Bituru naa yaa ri, a ka yeti gãa, a Yeesɔ kɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ wu. Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ viya, Siman? Kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ri ta saka tipi ɓu ka naa wiya? Ri ta ka naa wujɛ ɓarɛ ya, kɔ ka naa zang zanti?”
A Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ri ta ka naa zang zanti.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wujɛ shu ɓarɛ kpang.

A ka ruu ɓɔɔ rùu nɛ̀ɛ́ lasɛ ri yeti ɓɛɛ, dita ka mii waapo, mɔɔ daa loo galong. Tuu jaazĩi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaayu yinang mɔɔ puu nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Mɔɔ wàlɛ́ saka ɓɔɔ daa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ gãa Laa shunang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ piti ditɔ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Tuu saka kaɓa, mɔɔ a ri, ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ.”
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi zang bang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti wiya?”
A Yeesɔ ɓaa jaa tɔkɔlɔng nyaa, a shing wu ka teteng ɓarɛ.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ risi yuu manɛ, nɔɔ nwang naa wujɛ seseere kpang, nɔɔ naa daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kagn kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ a nwang kaa naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng keɓe, wukɔ zang bang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ta jaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ka ruu nung mɛɛ, ta nkɔ.

“Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jaa tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng wujɛ seseere ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ a ri yaa danggn shinnang, jĩng dannang zang kaɓa ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ zang nɛɛ mã̀ wu ree bang ka turu, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti sàá mii waapo katɔ.
Jĩng dannang kagn yuu koo keɓe, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, a ɓi katɔ, a jĩng dannang kagn yuu shɔnzang ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

“Náa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng katɔ mɔɔ tasɛ. Nɛɛ ti doo ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ jong, mɔɔ ti dɔngnɛ mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ naa dang gbete, nɛɛ doo dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ naa ziti ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ doo ziti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, ka waa ɓɔɔ wàa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.

Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zɔ̃ng katɔ mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ jĩng dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ jĩng ziti ɓaaɓɛ piti, ka nɔng waa bang ɓɛɛ.

“Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔ́ɔ pɛ̃́ɛrɛ̀ jaa tɔkɔlɔng gbete ka teteng wujɛ keɓe nɛɛ jĩng gɔɔnang kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓi waa nyaating Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa diki diki.
Jaa Shɔnzang arɛ nɛɛ wu naa ta ɓi yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri ning katɔ ɓɛɛ.

“Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti manɛ viya? Naa shɔnzang mã mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ laa maani, a ɓɔɔ gbete ning ka teteng ɓarɛ, palɛ biya? Yaa ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ka kɔpɔ ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, wu daa kãa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nɛɛ ĩi tɔ, tĩnang ɓɔɔ wu tãa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ wu tãa ka yuu ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ning kpang kaɓa katɔ.
Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Kasɛ nɛɛ jaa tɔkɔlɔng gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe, wu shaarɛ kpang.
“Ɓaazung nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang, daa ka bm ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo tɔ ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang, mɔɔ ti daayi, mɔ́ɔ daa ɓaa zang gbete kɔ zang ziti ɓɔɔgn nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ziti kɔ taati nɛɛ kɔɔ nyaa gbete ka yuu ruu, ruu keɓe ɓi niizang kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ ti tãa nyaa zang kaɓa kpang kɔ doori, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang kati. Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang kpang kɔ doori, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ yaa wu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, kɔ zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ.
“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ka koo keɓe, zang bɛ̃ɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ka koo keɓe, zang ti kasɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa.
“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, nɔ́ɔ tãa tɔkn. Naa zang ziti ka teteng manɛ ri mã̀ zɔɔ naa ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri gaayi, Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa palɛ ri katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ziti, kɔ zang taati ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn, ka ruu nung mɛɛ, n kagn teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Bituru naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, naa manzung palɛ m vuu shi kpang diki diki, n yaa wu gbalang doo nɛya? Nung dakn manziti ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ, wu dakn manziti kpang, ɓi dakn laa taati tu kopi dakn manziti.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, nwang naa yɔɔ kpanti ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu zili saka ɓɔɔ wu alɛ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ɓɛɛ.
Gaa tɔɔsung saka ɓiɓɛ gãnang kana. A zang atɛ wu zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka ka naa ɓiɓɛ jaka labang kopi a naa walɛ saka ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔrɔ wu nɔng kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang mãlɛ́ wu ta nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu gãa ɓiɓɛ piti, tɔɔ zang sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ nɔng.
A zang shonang kaɓa tang ka tĩng kpanti, a gaa wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang mɛɛ, n zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, shii ka gbongkarɛ, n sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ mɔɔ saka ɓaaɓɛ ditɔ nandon.’
A zang shonang kaɓa, gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng kpanti, a kpanti yàa wu saka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ kati, nɛɛ wu dita.

“Zang shonang kaɓa naa nwang tɔ ka biling, a naa ɓee yuu nɛɛ ɓeesang shonang ɓɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ ta saka nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ jaka gbete ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Yi wu ka vɔ̃ɔrɔ tap, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ ta.
A ɓeesang shonang kaɓa, tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a bakɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Shii ka gbongkarɛ, n sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ mɔɔ saka ɓaaɓɛ ditɔ nandon.’
A kasɛ kpang, a tuu ɓeesang daa loo ka sãa, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ka gbongkarɛ.
“Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ ɓeesang shonang ɓɔɔgn ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, a ri daa kɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa palɛ nandon.
A kpanti ɓarɛ, ɓaa wu nyaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Yɔɔ keɓe, yeti ɓaaɓɛ shi kpang. N yàa mɔɔ saka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ tɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa m katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu vi, gn ɓaasang shonang kɔng mɔɔ jong naa ɓɔɔgn ɓaaɓɛ kɔng m, mɔɔ yàa wu saka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kpang viya?’
A gnvɔ shaa kpanti, kpanti tuu wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri mã zang ka sãa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ka gbongkarɛ nandon.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa palɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ gbete, gbete, nɔɔ nɛɛ yàa zɔɔ gbalang ka yeti manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ, a seepaa nɛɛ Galili daa ka tipi Yahudi ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang dɔɔli dũuru wu ka knti. A masɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ.

A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang Farisi ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri gãsɛ wu katɔ. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa wu ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã gngn nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ mã́a zang ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, mã́a ri, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang varɛ yaa niiɓɛ nɛɛ diiɓɛ, ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ ri ziti keɓe ri nwang kaa bii gbete.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɔ̀ɔ́ ziti kpang, ri kaa gbete. Vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa nɛɛ ɓakɛ tɔ, shɔnzang wu basɛ takpang.”
A zang Farisi hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “A Musa kɔɔ zang ka ruu vi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ, wu a wu labeenang soro hinnang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu hing wu kati viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa a nɔɔ naa soro manɛ hinnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpãa nyaa vuu tusunang katɔ ɓɛɛ. A vuu keɓe wu nɔngkɔ ka tĩng kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa shɔnzang hing soro ɓiɓɛ naa wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, roo nɛɛ zang varɛ ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ kpang, a shing soro ɓɔɔgn, zang keɓe palɛ ɓi dũndũng nɛɛ soro ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nwannang zang varɛ nɛɛ ɓeeso, nɛɛ nwang nɔngkɔ, zang wu shing soro kpang gbã̀ágbãa.”
Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wu shɔnzang piti zunung ruu keɓe tanang kpang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa a ri naa kɔ ta shɛ̃ɛning.

Zang ɓɔɔgn, ri roo soro kpang, bii varɛ ɓarɛ vɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔgn zang palɛ ri katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti bɛ̃ɛ soro roonang nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ka ruu kpanti roonang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta ruu keɓe katɔ, wu tarɛ.”
A zang atɛ wu wujɛ seseere nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu tɔ̀ɔ wu ti gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri, mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ kati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ seseere ka nɔngkɔ ri a ka bii mɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ nɔ̀ɔ ri gbalang kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.”
Shìng ri naa tɔ ka yuu, gaa ri Laa, a seepaa daa kati.
A zang ɓɔɔgn arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naa n palɛ, n walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓu viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ m ruu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu viya? Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa dang ɓɛɛ.”
A hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ń dũng ɓu nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kìya?” Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔ́ɔ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang, mɔ́ɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔ́ɔ kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ sèé ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa daaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ naaɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwalɛ nɛɛ ri, doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.”
Yɔɔ jasang kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu keɓe tɔ nandon, yàa m ɓu kaa viya?”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbete kpang, ka tĩng Laa, dita mɔɔ daa mãlɛ́ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang saka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ malɛ ɓɛɛ kati. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng m.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ yɔɔ jasang kaɓa tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, a daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, daanang zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti, naa kpãa dɔɔli.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔkn, daanang zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti, kpãa nyaa ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ hòlòng ɓú nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “A ɓu wi walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wiya?”
Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu keɓe shɔnzang zunung palɛnang kpang, a Laa zunung vuu piti palɛnang ɓi katɔ.”
Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa vuu piti tɔ, ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee, ruu naa walɛ ɓu kaa viya?”

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ, naa nwang ka laa kpanti nɛɛ naa bannang ɓiɓɛ ka koo shɔɔ. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũ̀ng knti mɛɛ, nɔɔ naa nwáng ditɔ jong ka laa nwannang kopi tu ziti. Tɔ̀ɔ nɔ́ɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zɔ̃ng wujɛ Isirela ɓɔɔ kopi tu ziti ruu kati.

Zang piti ɓɔɔ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ diiɓɛ, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ tipi jaa lannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ, naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ ditɔ dakn laa maani. Ti walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
A zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang kɔ ri ka tĩng kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa waa nyaa knti. Zang kɔ ri ka knti kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa sɔɔ zang tĩng kaa jong.”
“Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa yɔɔ jaa laa inabi ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, nɛɛ wu daa kãa zang shonang ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ wu shonang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ri kà zɔɔ laa nɛɛ zang shonang nɛɛ, wu naa shu ri saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ. A dɔ̃ ri ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri dita, ri daa palɛ wu shonang.
Làa naa yuu táà, ti daa ĩi zang shonang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ waati ka nyaa lumang,
a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ dita jong nɔɔ daa palɛ m shonang ka jaa mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ n a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.’ A zang shonang kaɓa ri daa kati.
A yɔɔ jaa kaɓa ti naa paarɛ zang shonang kãanang nɛɛ laagɛ̃ a ɓɔɔ kaa naa ɓɔɔ laa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A ti palɛ doo naa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ.
Ti naa daa nɛɛ laarang tɔkn, a daa ĩi zang shonang ɓɔɔgn, ri shiiri tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ shiiri waati ka ruu vi, doo nɛɛ gãndi sasak viya?’
A zang shonang ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa ruu nyaa shonang palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.’ A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ dita jong nɔɔ daa palɛ shonang ka jaa mɛɛ.’

“Kaa nɛɛ làa nyaa vàa, yɔɔ jaa kɔɔ zang bang zang shonang, ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Ɓaa zang shonang nyaa ta, mɔɔ shu ri saka shonang ɓarɛ. Gaayu nɛɛ zang doo knti kɔ shɔɔnang, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa ka nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.’
A zang shonang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu jaa lannang nɛɛ laarang naa arɛ, zang shu ri saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu jaa lannang tĩng shɔɔnang, naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ naa, saka ɓarɛ, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri a doo knti ɓi katɔ. Zang shu ri doo saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ri ta saka shonang ɓarɛ tɔ, a ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee nɛɛ yɔɔ jaa nɛɛ,
‘Zang ɓɔɔ ri a doo knti, ri palɛ shonang diki bee kpang, mɔɔ shu rùu ɓɔɔ ruu dang jĩng, laa ti nyɔ ruu sasak, saka nɛɛ ri nyaa kiiri, ka ruu viya?’
A yɔɔ jaa kasɛ zang gbete ɓarɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Masang, n mulu mɔɔ katɔ kpang. Mɔkɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n shu mɔɔ saka ɓɔɔ zang a zang ka ruu shonang diki gbete kpang ya?
Dita nɛɛ saka ɓaaɓɛ. Nkɔ tiisi n a zang doo knti, naa ɓɔɔ n a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
N daa naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ vuu mɛɛ kpang ya? Gnvɔ shàá mɔɔ ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ ya?’ ”
A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang doo knti kɔ naa raa zang tĩng. Zang tĩng ri ti raa zang knti.”
Yeesɔ daa kana Urushalima, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti dang gbete, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,

“Rùu daa kana Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ri naa jɛ̃̀ɛ m ruu ɓɔɔ zang naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa tuu m, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ ri kpaa m, ri nyɔ m nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ ri daa ɓaa m naa ka laa. A Kpanti Laa naa wisi m paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
A soro Zebedi nɛɛ, wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ, naa tang ka tĩng Yeesɔ, a gaa vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ viya?”
A nàá rɛɛ Yakubu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N tɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ, wujɛ mɛɛ ziti keɓe, ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwang ka naa nakn ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ gbete wu ti nwang ka naa nagang ɓaaɓɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa kpang. Nɔɔ naa zunung jĩng dannang katɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ n naa dang ɓɛɛ ya?”
A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung katɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dang jĩng ɓi katɔ nɔngkɔ, a ɓɔɔ nwannang ka naa nakn, nɛɛ naa nagang mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ a zang naa kpang. Nɔng nwannang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ ri ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ yaa kopi, tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana dɔɔli.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang bang bang ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zirɛ nɛɛ, rikɔ zang bang.
A ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang ka teteng manɛ piti, wukɔ wu nwang zang shonang jong.
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang ka tĩng, wukɔ wu nwang jaafoo manɛ jong.
Naa ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n arɛ, nɛɛ zang shong m shonang kpang, n arɛ nɛɛ n shong m zang kɔ jong, n ti mãlɛ́ bii mɛɛ ka ruu zang dɔɔli nɛɛ tɔɔ n ta yuu ɓarɛ.”
Yeesɔ ri seepaa daanang nɛɛ Gari Jeriko nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a zang dɔɔli ri dũng wu ka knti.
Zang jĩng ringtang ziti ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nyaa gbalang, ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ tɛɛ kana, a ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ ka knti, mangkɛ ri, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa ta. Ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm tɔkn ka lapa nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A Yeesɔ shiiyi, ɓaa ri nyaa, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ viya?”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ,
“Kpanti, ruu kasɛ mɔɔ pùu ruu jĩng jong, ruu zi nɔng.”
Gn ɓarɛ kɔng Yeesɔ, a lee naa ka jĩng ɓarɛ. Jĩng ɓarɛ tantɛ kaa puunang, ri zi nɔng, a ri dũng Yeesɔ kati.
Ri a tɔ nɛɛ Urushalima naabm, a ri naa a ka Bɛtafaji ɓɔɔ ka doo Kɔpɔ Zeetung ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, shong ri ka tĩng.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita ka gari tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka tĩng manɛ ɓá, nɔɔ daa ĩi seesaa ɓɔɔ zang mã ka laa ditɔ nɛɛ jaa ka doo. Nɔɔ kã̀lɛ́, nɔ́ɔ atɛ m ri.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, Kpanti Yeesɔ kasɛ seesaa keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ning. Yaa seesaa kaɓa ditɔ nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang.”
Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang gari Siyona nɛɛ,
‘Kpanti manɛ a kana bii manɛ.
Tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, vang seesaa, ka jaa seesaa.’ ”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa palɛ kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
Ri daa atɛ seesaa kaa nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ. Ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn seesaa, a Yeesɔ vangnɛ nwang kagn.
Zang dɔɔli ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ, ka gbalang. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti dɔ́lɔ́ nasãng laa nung manja ri wɔɔrɔ ka gbalang.
Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng Yeesɔ, a ɓɔɔ ri ti ka knti ɓiɓɛ, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Jaa Dawuda ta. Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ tĩnang tãanang. Zang wu ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ta.”
Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima tɔ, zang zi naa gari ɓi takpang. Zang gari ri hɛ̃ɛ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe, ɓu wiya?”
A zang kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi Yeesɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ Nazara, ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
Yeesɔ daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, daa hing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ka biling. A ti zĩili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ saka, nɛɛ nɔng nwannang zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ ning koro kati.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka labeenang Kpanti Laa nɛɛ Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Gãa mɛɛ, zang naa ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ Gãa Laa gaanang, a nɔɔ raayi nwang nɔɔ manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri waa kagn ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A zang jĩng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka yeti Gãa Laa, a masɛ ri kati.

Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ naa weɓe, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wujɛ goo ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Jaa Dawuda,” gnvɔ shaa ri dɔɔli.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wujɛ keɓe, ri kɔɔ ɓu tɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nɔɔ gã gngn ka yeti labeenang Laa kpang ya? Zang beeyi nɛɛ,
“ ‘Laa kpɛ̃ɛrɛ wujɛ seseere
naa ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ yaa ri, nwang kaa nɛɛ yeti gari, daa roo ka Bɛtani.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ gbãayu kana gari tɔkn, a nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu kati.

A zi laa sĩiri ka nyaa gbalang naabm, a daa ka doo ɓiɓɛ. A sĩiri ra jaa ka laa kpang. Zi gɔpɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A kù laa sĩiri nyaa ka bii tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ra jaa takpang dòndòng.” A laa sĩiri naa tantɛ kaa tɔɔrɔnang.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Laa sĩiri tɔɔrɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ tantɛnang viya?”

A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, nɔɔ yaa danggn naa kpang, nɔɔ palɛ wu vuu kɔ n palɛ laa sĩiri ɓee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe katɔ nɛɛ, ‘Rúu ta nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa watɛ ka mii waapo.’ Ti palɛ katɔ nɔngkɔ.
Naa nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa tɔ̃ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gàa wu piti, nɔɔ walɛ katɔ.”

A Yeesɔ naa daa tɔkn yeti Gãa Laa. Tusu zang vuu kana, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ walɛ naa vuu palɛnang keɓe ka niya? Ɓu wi, a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang wiya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ m tɔ, n ti kɔɔ nɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ n walɛ naa vuu palɛnang keɓe kagn ɓɛɛ.”
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi a Yɔhana naa Batizima ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ zang wiya? Laa a wu ya, kɔ shɔnzang a wu?”
A ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu kɔɔ wu ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ Laa a wu, naa hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ, ‘A ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shing danggn ka ruu Yɔhana kpang viya?’
Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Shɔnzang a wu,’ ruu káa vɔrɔ zang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi kpang.”
Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ n walɛ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang kagn doo kpang kɔ.”
“Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti manɛ viya? Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn, wujɛ ɓiɓɛ zang varɛ ziti. Daa kɔɔ ɓeejaa ɓɔɔ bang tɔɔ, ‘Jaa mɛɛ, daayi mɔɔ daa palɛ shonang, lɛ̀ɛ́ ka jaa laa inabi.’
“A jaa kaɓa, kasɛ diiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ ‘N daa m kpang.’ Làa nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, naa kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ, a daa kati.
A yɔɔ ti daa kɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ wu daa palɛ shonang ka jaa laa inabi. A jaa kaɓa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘N daa ditɔ dada.’ A naa daa kpang.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka teteng wujɛ ziti kaɓa, zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ kasɛ, ɓu wiya?”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ shing jĩng ka varɛ kãanang, ri yee nɔɔ yuu daanang nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kana.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana arɛ, nɛɛ wu naa tusu nɔɔ gbalang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng ka varɛ kãanang kɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ jong. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti naa zi tɔɔ naa weɓe, nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”

Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tãa nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn ta. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn shɔlɔ laa inabi ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a mang gbãng ɓee nyaa jaa nɔng kiiri kiiri. Ti palɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kãng mii jĩng laa inabi kagn, nɛɛ putali ɓɔɔ zang shi kagn, zang gãng jĩng ka jaa ɓɛɛ. A yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka jaa, a seepaa daa zanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn.
Diki jĩng laa inabi hãnang naa raa bii, a yɔɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang ɓiɓɛ. Shong ri ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa ta wu jĩng laa.
“A zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa ri jaa, yiki zang shonang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ jaa shongnɛ, a ri nyɔ ɓɔɔ gbete zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, ri ti tuu ɓɔɔ gbete ri nyɔ ka tipi tang, a ri ti luku ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ tari.
Yɔɔ jaa ti naa shong zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ka bii ɓarɛ gaagaa, ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang katɔ. Ri ti dang zang doo knti jĩng doo nɔngkɔ.
Diki naa bee tɔkɔlɔng, a yɔɔ jaa naa paasɛ shong kaa jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa kasɛ, ri tãa kaa nyaa jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
“A ɓɔɔ ri zi jaa yɔɔ a kana, ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Wee jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɔɔ a ta ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔ̀ɔ jaa wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓuru kati.’
A ri seepaa ri yi jaa, ri nwangsɛ wu ka nyaa jaa biling, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka nɔngkɔ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa arɛ, palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓiɓɛ ka naa biya?”
Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa, naa nyɔkɔ zang yeti shi kpang kaɓa vɔrɔ katɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ naa alɛ wu jĩng laa ka diki ɓɔɔ zang hã jĩng laa inabi kagn ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ gngn ka yeti labeenang Kpanti Laa kpang ya? Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ:
“ ‘Tari ɓɔɔ zang gãa mãanang ri bɛ̃ɛyi,
wukɔ ràa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa kati.
Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ veɓe.
Ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓuru, ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.’
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang naa ta gbalang ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa kɔ Kpanti ditɔ nɛɛ naa manɛ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
[Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa watɛ ka tari keɓe, bii ɓiɓɛ naa kaka ditɔ. Tari kɔ nɛɛ watɛ jong ka yuu shɔnzang, shɔnzang kaɓa nangkɛ náà zũng tapuru.]”
Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisi ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang naa weɓe, ri tantɛ zinang ka yeti ɓarɛ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ ràng yee keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ katɔ, a ri kaa vɔrɔ zang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔli shing danggn nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ rang ri yee kaa tɔkn nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ,
“Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi nwang naa ruu yɔɔ Kpanti ɓɔɔ palɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ vuu shaanang kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ.
A naa shong zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ, nɛɛ ri á ta, a ri bɛ̃ɛ anang kati ɓɛɛ.

“A yɔɔ kpanti ti naa shong zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ n hangsɛ vuu shaanang palɛnang tɔ. N yele guu napo mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ɔ̃lɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ tɔ. N shĩili vuu shaanang tɔ. Nɔɔ a nɔng kn sinyɛ shaanang ta.’
“A zang ɓɔɔ kpanti gaarɛ kaɓa, ri yee laa ɓarɛ kagn kpang. A ri daarɛ ɓarɛ ri. Zang gbete daa ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ gbete daa ka nɔng vuu ɓiɓɛ malɛnang.
A zang ɓɔɔ kpanti gaarɛ, ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, ri yiki zang shonang kpanti, ri dang ri jĩng, a ri nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
A gnvɔ shaa kpanti, kpanti shong zang sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri daa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, a ri dɔɔ gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ waa kpayi kpayi.
“A Kpanti naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Zang hangsɛ kn sinyɛ palɛnang tɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ n gaarɛ ri, ri daa naa ɓɔɔ ri shaayi kaa takpang.
Nɔɔ dita nyaa gbabang, nɔɔ daa gaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ĩi piti, ri a nɔng kn sinyɛ.’
A zang shonang yɔɔ ri daa ka nyaa gbabang, ri daa kpalɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ĩi ɓɛɛ kati. Zang shi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ piti. A zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ, ri yi nyaa nɔng kn sinyɛ kati.
“A yɔɔ kpanti naa arɛ, nɛɛ wu naa leng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ, a naa zi shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔgn nɔngkɔ, hãa zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang kn sinyɛ shaanang, hãlɛ ka bii kpang.
A hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Masang, mɔɔ palɛ bɛ̀ɛ́, mɔɔ a ka nihn, fɔ̃ɔrɔ kn sinyɛ shaanang kagn bii kpang viya?’ Yɔɔ shii tɔ wek, vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ takpang.

“A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ yi wu ta, nɔ́ɔ ta naa nɛɛ doo. Nɔ́ɔ daa tasɛ ka biling, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ, ri dɔɔli, a zang ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛrɛ, ri kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔɔli kpang.”
A zang Farisi ri daa tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ka yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.

A ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng knti Kpanti Hiridu tɔɔ, ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang, ruu zi tɔ, mɔɔ suu see ɓáa kpang. Mɔɔ tùsú zang ɓáa vuu ɓɔɔ niizang, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓáa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu ruu keɓe ta. Ruu shu Kpanti Kayisa, Kpanti Rooma saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ gãsɛ m ka ruu viya?
Nɔɔ tusu m saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shu saka tipi nɔng ta.”
A ri atɛ wu saka kati.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wi ka yuu saka keɓe wiya?”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ Kayisa.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a Kayisa vuu ɓiɓɛ ta, nɔɔ ti a Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri yaa wu ri daa kati.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang Saduki ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, zang seepaa ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ saa kpang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
“Maalang, Musa kɔɔ rùu tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yi jaa kagn nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ kpang, nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yi wu jaa kati.
Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng ɓuru, nàá ɓarɛ yi ri manziti. Jamari ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang shing soro, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, a vɔrɛ yàa ɓeezung ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn ɓiɓɛ soro ɓiɓɛ.

A ɓeezung naa sɔɔrɔ wu, a ti yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, ti vɔrɛ yaa soro kaɓa. Ɓeezung knti ɓɔɔgn ti naa sɔɔrɔ soro kaɓa tɔkn, a ti yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, ti vɔrɛ yaa wu. Dɔ̃lɔ nɔngkɔ, daa nɔng ka yuu ɓarɛ manziti nandon.
A jaa soro kaɓa naa vɔ kaa nɛɛ knti.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, jaa soro kaɓa naa nwang ɓu kaa soro wi gbete ka teteng zang manziti kɔ ri shĩili wu ɓáa wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shĩili wu katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ning katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi labeenang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ náa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Zang nɛɛ naa wisi zang paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, zang shing soro ɓi takpang, zang ti naa a zang wujɛ soro ɓi takpang nɛɛ zang gee ri kpang. Zang naa nwalɛ ɓi kaa naa zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
Ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, gngn kpang ya?

Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Laa Ibirayi, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ishaaku, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yakubu.’ Zang keɓe ri vɔlɔ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ. Wee Laa ɓaa yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu Laa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ zang wisi ri paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi Làá zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ kpang, ɓi Laa zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tãa tɔ naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ yée zang Saduki yuu tɔ nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, a ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng gbete.
A zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli ka teteng ɓarɛ, gãsɛ Yeesɔ, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
“Maalang, ka yeti nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa dangnɛ, ɓu wi bang wiya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ kasɛ ruu Kpanti Laa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ piti, nɛɛ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ piti, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ piti.
Wee nyaa bang ɓɔɔ Laa dang kɔ. Wukɔ ka tĩng.
Ɓɔɔ ɓàng doo ɓiɓɛ, ɓi weɓe. ‘Kàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwalɛ nɛɛ ri doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.’
Labeenang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ri kɔɔrɔ piti, di yuu ɓi ka nyaa kɔ Kpanti Laa dang ziti ɓee kɔ.”
Zang Farisi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔng gbete, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ,
“Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ɓu wiya? Ɓu jaa zɔ̃ng wiya?”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda.”
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A ka ruu vi, Suru Laa tusu Dawuda gbalang, a zirɛ, a ɓaa Kirisi nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti’ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“ ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ Kpanti mɛɛ tɔɔ,
“Nwang ta naa nakn mɛɛ,
n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ,
mɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ doo ɓaaɓɛ.” ’
Dawuda nɛɛ ɓàa wu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti,’ ɓu wi bang ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya?”
Zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa takpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu ka diki kaɓa, zang gbete ɓɔɔ paasɛ wu ruu hɛ̃ɛnang ɓɔɔgn kpang.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisi, rikɔ tèng doo Musa.

“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ka vuu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ kati. A nɔ́ɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ri ĩi zang nyaa ka vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa katɔ palɛnang, a ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri lee naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang.

Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, ri palɛ ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi ri kati ɓɛɛ. Ri pu jaa baajaa ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ Ruu Laa ɓarɛ kagn nɛɛ koo zaa nwɛ̃ɛri pokoto pokoto, ri mã kaa waa nyaating ɓarɛ. Ri ti hãlɛ ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓiɓɛ beebang beebang ɓɛɛ.
Ri kasɛ nwannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang bang ri nwalɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn zang shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ.
Ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang jeere ri nyaa ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓaarɛ ri nɛɛ maalang.
“Zang wu ɓàa nɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ ‘Maalang kpang.’ Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Maalang manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa naa jaa nàá zɔɔ kɔ nandon.
Nɔ́ɔ ti ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Dada, ka koo keɓe kpang’ Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔng nwannang ɓiɓɛ ɓi ti ka lapa.
Zang ri ti ɓaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang bang kpang.’ Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang bang manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Zang bang kaɓa wukɔ Kirisi.
Shɔnzang bang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ piti wukɔ wu raa zang ɓɔɔ shong nɔɔ jong.
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ piti, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu jong ka dii. A zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii, zang naa tuu wukɔ jong ka lapa.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisi, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɔ̀ɔ́ zang gbalang ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ta wu kpang, a nɔɔ ti yàa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu tanang katɔ gbalang kpang ɓɛɛ.

Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisi. Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ mulu suvɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti gaa Laa sasak, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi nɔɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Kpanti Laa naa dang nɔɔ jĩng ditɔ dɔɔli, ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang piti.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisi. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ rakɛ ka yuu tipi, nɛɛ yuu mii waapo piti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kãa zang gbete ɓɔɔ dũng knti manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ĩi tɔ, nɔɔ risi wu, wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ɓa nɔɔ vuu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ dakn ziti, ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ning ka waa bang.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang jĩng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Naa zang tũng Laa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kagn kpang. A naa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa, wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng ɓɛɛ ta.’
Nɔɔ shoko zang jĩng ringtang. Ɓu vi bang viya? Zinariya ya, kɔ Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ risi zinariya keɓe nwang vuu Laa ɓɛɛ?
Nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ ‘Naa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ́ɔ Kpanti Laa vuu kagn, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kagn kpang. A náa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng ɓɛɛ ta.’

Nɔɔ zang jĩng ringtang, ɓu vi bang viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Kpanti Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ́ɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɛɛ ya? Kɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu, ɓɔɔ risi vuu keɓe, ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa nwang vuu Laa ɓɛɛ ya?
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tũng Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu, tũng Laa ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tũng Laa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, tũng Laa ɓi nɛɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tũng Laa nɛɛ lapa, tũng ɓi nɛɛ laa nwannang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ning.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisi, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a Kpanti Laa vuu gbete ka yeti kopi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ langkɛ naa rɛɛ zitaa, nɛɛ seteng, a ɓɔɔ yaaji kɔ̃ɔlaa ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. A nɔɔ dũng ruu bang ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Kpanti Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ gn zang wu ti kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nimbang ning.
Zang jĩng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yàkɛ́ vuu seseere ɓɔɔ naa pũng, ka mii ɓoonang manɛ, a nɔɔ mã vuu bang, ɓɔɔ naa napo kɔ jong.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisi. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang naa waka, nɛɛ gbanti ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ dakn biling kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ̀ɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeti manɛ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Yeti manɛ ɓi ɓangge nɛɛ yuu kasɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Yɔɔ Farisi kɔ jĩng ringtang ɓi, gaayu nɛɛ yeti juwa, nɛɛ gbanti kɔ sɔɔnang shɔɔnang, tɔɔ dakn ɓarɛ wu pu kaa jong.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisi. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ, nwang naa, yuu sàa ɓɔɔ zang mãarɛ, zang nwãa kponsi puru ka bii ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri shi kaa nɛɛ biling ɓɛɛ. A yeti ɓarɛ ɓi kaka shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ pũlu katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Nɔɔ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka jĩng zang, a vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti manɛ, ɓi zang nwãarɛnang nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisi. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gbarɛ mãanang yuu sàá zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ.
A nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Naa ruu nɛɛ nwang jong ka diki daa ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka tĩng, ruu nɛɛ yí naa ɓuru ka zang nyaa shonang Laa nyɔnang nɛɛ ri kpang.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ nɔkɔ wujɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ daa manɛ ri yaa ɓɛɛ ta.
“Sɔkɔ keɓe, nɔkɔ wujɛ sɔkɔ pudi ɓi. Nɔɔ naa wɔ daanang ka yeti waa bang ɓu kaa biya?

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shong nɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ditɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ ditɔ, nɔɔ ti ɓaarɛ ɓɔɔ naa ka laa. Nɔɔ ti naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang manɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa hingki ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ gari manɛ piti.

Tɔ̀ɔ, jĩng dannang zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti, wu nwang ka yuu manɛ. Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ bii Habila, a naa a ka yuu Zakariya jaa Berikiya ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nyɔ ka teteng Gãa Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ ka ruu vuu keɓe piti, naa nwang ɓi ka yuu zɔ̃ng doo jaa knti keɓe kɔ.

“Zang Urushalima, zang Urushalima, nɔkɔ nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa. A nɔɔ ti luku zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ka bii manɛ nɛɛ tari. Diki ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ, n kpalɛ nɔɔ yuu ka zɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nàá kn kpalɛ jaa seseere ɓiɓɛ ka dii nasãng daa kaa nɛya? A nɔɔ kasɛ kpang.
Zang naa yaa nɔɔ gãa ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima ditɔ, wu raa dãzãa.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, nɔɔ naa paasɛ m zinang tɔkn, nɔɔ nɛɛ naa kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, ‘Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a ka nung Kpanti Laa tĩnang tãanang ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Yeesɔ nwang tɔ nɛɛ Gãa Laa, daa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri tusu wu Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ɓɛɛ kati.
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe tɔ nandon niizang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang naa yaa tari ɓɔɔ pãng ka yuu zɔɔ gbete kpang. Zang naa jili ditɔ ka tipi nandon.”

Yeesɔ daa nwang tɔ ka yuu Kɔpɔ Zeetung, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka naa ɓarɛ. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ vuu keɓe ta. Mɔɔ ti kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gbãayu kagn, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ wu nwãarɛ nɔɔ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang dɔɔli naa a nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, nɛɛ rikɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ri naa nwãarɛ zang dɔɔli.
Nɔɔ ti naa tãlɛ nyaa sĩiri tanang ditɔ nɛɛ ruu sĩiri ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, vuu keɓe a ɓi katɔ, a ɓi gn diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang tipi ɓɔɔ naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔ ti naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ Kpanti ɓɔɔgn. Nyɔkɔ bang, nɛɛ tipi ruutunang, ri ti naa nwang ditɔ ka tipi koo dɔɔli.
Vuu keɓe piti, ɓi doo jĩng dannang gaayu naa ɓɔɔ jaa gaa zang soro yuu kɔnang ɓɛɛ.
“Zang ti naa yiki nɔɔ ditɔ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jĩng, tɔɔ ri nyɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ kati. Zang koo keɓe piti naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka ruu nung mɛɛ.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang dɔɔli ri naa yaa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Kpanti Laa ditɔ. Ri naa kasɛ ruu zɔɔ takpang, ri naa malɛ yuu zɔɔ ditɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shonang Laa, ri naa arɛ ri nwãarɛ zang dɔɔli.
Ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa shangkɛ ɓɛɛ, zang naa kasɛ ruu zɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔɔli kpang.
A zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa mã danggn sasak, wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.
Zang naa rang zang koolaa keɓe Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa ditɔ nandon, tɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, koo keɓe wu naa waa nyaa kati.”
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ naa zi vuu baabii ɓɔɔ Daninya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔyi, shii tɔ ka nɔng nwannang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa.” (Zang ɓɔɔ bee Labeenang Laa katɔ, wu zi kati.)
Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu keɓe tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi, ri yurɛ, ri daa ka kɔpɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu gãa, wu shooro tɔ̀ɔ́ tipi, nɛɛ wu naa ya vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka jaa, wu ti gbãayu tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ wu naa tuu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu zang soro ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa ka naa, ka diki kaɓa.
Nɔɔ gaa Kpanti Laa nɛɛ, vuu keɓe wu palɛ nɛɛ gãmbang guusi, kɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang manɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jĩng dannang bang kagn diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Zang zi jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka koo keɓe doo gbete kpang. Zang naa paasɛ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe takpang.
Kpanti Laa nɛ̀ɛ́ sɔ́ɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe ka knti tɔkɔlɔng kpang, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wɔ kagn gbete gãagãa kpang. A Kpanti Laa naa sɔ́ɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ka nihn, kɔ ka kaaɓa, nɔɔ yee laa manɛ kagn kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kirisi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shonang Laa naa alɛ ditɔ, ri tusu vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang kati. Naa ri zunung zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nwãarɛnang katɔ, ri nɛɛ nwáarɛ̀ ri katɔ.
Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nɛɛ naa kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, Kirisi ka jĩngti, nɔɔ daa kpang. Ri nɛɛ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wee ka yeti jaka tĩng ɓee, nɔɔ yee láa kagn kpang,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, anang Jaa Shɔnzang nwang ɓi naa shala mii ɓɔɔ mangkɛ nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a zang ɓɔɔ ka dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn ri ti zi katɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu vɔ kagn, jãa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
“Jĩng dannang bang kaɓa nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ hn,
“ ‘laa kɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓee, naa tɔ̀ɔ katɔ,
shala ti naa yàkɛ̀ nɔng takpang
sang ri ti naa shili nɛɛ lapa,
vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa piti naa rùutú katɔ.’

“Tɔ̀ɔ zang naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka lapa ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n a kana ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti, ri naa kaa ditɔ. Ri ti naa zi m kati, ka ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ, nɛɛ bannang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.

N naa shong zang nyaa shonang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ lapa ditɔ nɛɛ vuukãng ɓɔɔ káa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ ri kpalɛ m zang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛrɛ ka koo keɓe piti, nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ta, ka bii laa sĩiri.
“Nasãng laa sĩiri nɛɛ lɔ̀ɔ gɔpɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ shɔɔ nɛɛ lusu tɔ,
nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu keɓe tɔ piti naa weɓe, nɔ́ɔ zi kati nɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang a naabm tɔ, ka nyaa gãa.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, koo jaa knti keɓe naa ɓa kpang, vuu keɓe naa palɛ tɔ niizang gbongkarɛ nandon.
Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa shaarɛ ditɔ nandon, a ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang.
“Zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi diki, nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kagn kpang. Zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ n ɓɔɔ n Jaa Laa piti, ruu zi kpang, ɓi Kpanti Laa kɔ zi gbete.
Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a kagn, nwang naa diki ɓɔɔ Nuhu nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ mii lapa bang a gn kpang, zang shaa vuu shaanang, zang ɓoo ɓɔɔ ɓoonang, zang gee soro, a zang ti á zang wujɛ soro ɓarɛ, zang shingnɛ. Ri palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak, Nuhu naa daa nɔng ka yeti Laana.
Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ knti kpang. A mii lapa bang naa arɛ, see ri nandon. Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ nwang doo nɔngkɔ.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ziti ri lang jaa, Laa naa tuu zang gbete wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete.
Zang soro ziti ɓɔɔ ri naa nang vuu ka yuu ree, Laa ti naa tuu gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete.
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti manɛ a kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa zang gãa nɛ̀ɛ́ tãa nyaa diki ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a vuu ɓɔɔnang kagn tɔ, nɛ̀ɛ́ gãng jĩng ka gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Shɔngɓɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ naa shɛ̃ɛ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ see wu vuu ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang a ka làa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
“A ɓu wi zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ, ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ yaa wu zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu alɛ ri vuu shaanang ka laa ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kagn wiya?
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ, zang shonang kaɓa kɔ, dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa ĩi wu palɛ doo shonang ɓɔɔ wu yaa wu ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, dabang ɓiɓɛ naa shing wu ka yuu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon.
A náa zang shonang kaɓa, yeti ɓiɓɛ shi kpang, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Dabang gãa mɛɛ a ɓi pati kpang?’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓeezung shonang nyɔkɔnang kati. A shaa vuu shaanang, a ti ɓoo sàa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ sàa palɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A dabang gãa zang shonang kaɓa, naa a ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shonang kaɓa shing danggn anang ɓiɓɛ kpang nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ wu zi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Dabang ɓiɓɛ naa dang wu jĩng ditɔ, wu ti shing wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.
“Ka diki kaɓa kpanti roonang Laa naa nwang naa ruu rɛɛ ja soo kopi ɓɔɔ ri daa kn sinyɛ shaanang ɓɛɛ. Ri yaka waa zàáng sɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa ɓee sinyɛ ɓeevɛ yuu.
Ka teteng ja soo kopi kaɓa, ɓɔɔ maani zũng kpang, a ɓɔɔ maani zũng ɓarɛ katɔ.
Ɓɔɔ zũng kpang maani kaɓa, daa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nung waa ka zàáng kpang.
A ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ maani kaɓa, daarɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ nung waa ka zàáng ning.
“Ri daa nwang tɔ, a sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a pati kpang, a hingro naa yiki ri.
Kaa nɛɛ teteng gãmbang, zang sãa nyaa ka lapa, nɛɛ, ‘Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a kana, nɔɔ nwang ta, nɔɔ kpisi wu yuu.’
“A rɛɛ ja soo kopi kaɓa ri seepaa, ri gisi waa ɓɔɔ ka zàáng sɔɔ ɓarɛ.
A ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng kpang kaɓa, kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ rùu nung manɛ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓuru ning kana ɓɛɛ.’
“A, rɛɛ ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ kaɓa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nung ɓuru, daa ɓɔɔ ruu basɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ dita, nɔ́ɔ daa hoo ɓɔɔ manɛ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ ɓɛɛ.’

“Ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng kpang kaɓa, ri daa tɔ nɔng nung hoonang, a sinyɛ ɓeevɛ naa a ka knti ɓarɛ. Ja soo maani ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ kaɓa, ri daa ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ wu, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shaa kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang ku nyaa gãa kati.
“Knti nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, ja soo maani ɓɔɔ ri daa nung waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓarɛ hooronang, ri naa arɛ. Ri ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ, puu ruu nyaa gãa jong.’
“Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ kɔ nwani, n zi nɔɔ nung kpang.’ ”
A Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi diki nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
“Kpanti roonang Laa, naa nwang naa ruu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu daa zanti, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, yàa ri vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Yɔɔ kaɓa, a zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete saka jaka maani, ti a zang gbete jaka ziti, a ti a zang gbete jaka gbete ka naa zũnnang ɓarɛ. A seepaa daa zanti kati.
Zang shonang yɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka jaka maani kaɓa, tuu saka ɓiɓɛ daa hooro vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa mãlɛ́ nɛɛ mani tantɛnang. A naa walɛ jaka ɓɔɔgn nɔ́ng maani.
A zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka jaka ziti, ti daa walɛ ɓɔɔgn nɔ́ng ziti.
A, zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta jaka gbete kaɓa, daayi daa gbãa tipi, a waasɛ saka yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ kagn.
“Diki bee tɔ, a yɔɔ gãa rɛɛ zang shonang kaɓa naa gbãayu kati. A ɓaa ri nyaa, hɛ̃ɛlɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ saka ɓɔɔ wu alɛ ri ɓɛɛ kati.
A zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a wu jaka maani, arɛ naa a wu kaa jaka kopi. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, mɔɔ a m jaka maani, n walɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔ nɔ́ng maani.’

“Yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nn hn, mɔɔ zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang, ti palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n shing mɔɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A ta, mɔɔ tãa tĩnang nɛɛ n.’
“A zang shonang yɔɔ gãa gbete ɓɔɔ yɔɔ a wu jaka ziti, ti arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, mɔɔ a m jaka ziti n walɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔ nɔ́ng ziti.’
“Yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nn hn zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang, ti palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n shing mɔɔ ka yuu ɓɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A ta, mɔɔ tãa tĩnang nɛɛ n.’

“A zang shonang yɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ yɔɔ a wu jaka gbete naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, n zi tɔ, mɔɔ kpãa nyaa ɓaa katɔ, mɔɔ yée vuu ɓáa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓáa kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti kpalɛ vuu ɓáa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ vang jĩng vuu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kaa vɔrɔ, a n daayi, n daa waasɛ saka ɓaaɓɛ ka tipi. Vuu ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, ta, ta.’
“A yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ɓáa zang shonang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ lagn dɔɔli. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ n yée vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n ɓaa kpang. N ti kpalɛ vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n vang kpang.
A ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shìng m saka mɛɛ ka gãa ɓɔɔ zang shing saka kagn kpang viya? Wee n gbãayu, n nɛɛ naa ta kaa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gisi zang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ning, kpang ya?’
“A raa jĩng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ ta saka ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ ta, nɔ́ɔ a zang shonang ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kopi ɓɛɛ,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn zang naa gisi wu ɓɔɔgn ditɔ tɔkn, tɔ̀ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ wu shang kati. A zang piti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn dɔɔli kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ditɔ.’
A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang tɔkn nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ tasɛ zang shonang shi kpang keɓe ta ka biling, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.’ ”
“Ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ka naa bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa piti, naa nwang ka yuu laa nwannang Kpanti ɓiɓɛ.
Zang naa kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ditɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ nandon, tɔɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kaa naa ɓɔɔ jagãng shɛ̃ɛrɛ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nɛɛ teteng jàa ɓɛɛ.
Wu naa kpalɛ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ka naa nakn, jàa ɓi kaa naa nagang ɓiɓɛ.
Kpanti wu naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka naa nakn ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a ri tĩnang tãanang tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ a ta nɔ́ɔ ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ shĩili nɔɔ, doo ka diki ɓɔɔ wu gaayu koo keɓe mãanang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyɔkɔ nyɔ m, nɔɔ a m vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ. Sutu ti mãa m nyaa, nɔɔ a m vuu ɓoonang. N ti a zanti, nɔɔ ta m ka gãa manɛ.
N nwang bii waati, a nɔɔ hãa m fɔ̃ɔrɔ. Kɔnang yi m, nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka n. Zang mã m ka sãa, a nɔɔ lengke jĩng ka n ɓɛɛ.’
“A zang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, naa kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, nyɔkɔ nyɔ mɔɔ gn vi, ruu zi mɔɔ, a ruu a mɔɔ vuu shaanang viya? Sutu ti mã mɔɔ nyaa gn vi, ruu a mɔɔ vuu ɓoonang viya?
Mɔɔ ti á zanti gn vi, ruu zi mɔɔ, a ruu ta mɔɔ ka gãa ɓuru viya? Mɔɔ ti nwang bii waati gn vi, ruu ti hãa mɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ viya?
Kɔnang ti yi mɔɔ gn vi, a zang ti mã mɔɔ gn vi ka sãa, a ruu zirɛ, ruu daa leng jĩng ka mɔɔ viya?’
“A Kpanti naa kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang gbete ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng rɛɛ manzung keɓe, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ nkɔ.’

“A naa kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ka naa nagang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa ku nɔɔ nyaa tɔ ka bii, ka ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ dita yeti waa ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka ruu Kpanti suru shi kpang nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyɔkɔ nyɔ m, nɔɔ a m vuu shaanang kpang ɓɛɛ. Sutu ti mã m nyaa, nɔɔ ti a m vuu ɓoonang kpang.
N a zanti, nɔɔ ti ta m ka gãa manɛ kpang. N nwang bii waati, nɔɔ hãa m fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang. Kɔnang yi m, a zang ti mã m ka sãa nɔɔ lengke jĩng ka n kpang.’

“A ri naa kasɛ wu nyaa doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti Laa, ruu zi mɔɔ gn vi nyɔkɔ nyɔ mɔɔ katɔ, sutu mãa mɔɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ ti waati, a ruu yi mɔɔ naa ka bii kpang viya? Mɔɔ ti a zanti gn vi, a ruu ta mɔɔ ka gãa ɓuru kpang viya? Kɔnang ti palɛ mɔɔ gn vi, ruu ti zi mɔɔ gn vi ka sãa a ruu lengke jĩng ka mɔɔ kpang viya?’
“A Kpanti naa kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng rɛɛ manzung keɓe kpang, nɔɔ palɛ nkɔ kpang.’
“Ri naa daa ɓarɛ ka nɔng jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ri naa wàlɛ́ ɓarɛ kaa suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee keɓe rannang tɔ nandon, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
“Nɔɔ zi tɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika yaa lɛ̀ɛ́ kaa ziti. Zang naa yi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri naa ɓaa m naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.”
Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka yeti gãa Kayifa, Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa.
A ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri, ri nyɔ wu ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Rúu palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ pálɛ̀ nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
Diki ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn Yeesɔ ka Bɛtani, ka gãa Siman ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ vuu bii shaa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A jaa soro ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn, a nɛɛ nung tũurunang ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli, ka zàáng nung ɓɔɔ shi dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, a tũngku Yeesɔ ka yuu bɛ̀ɛ́ shaa vuu shaanang.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa ri, ri tɔɔ, “Zang lasɛ nung keɓe ka ruu viya?
Zang nɛ̀ɛ́ màlɛ̀ nung keɓe saka gaagaa, tɔɔ zang alɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kóngsò jaa soro keɓe ka ruu viya? Jaa soro keɓe pàlɛ́ m vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Nɔɔ nwálɛ̀ manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang diki diki, a n nwáng nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak kpang.
Nung kɔ jaa soro tũngku m ka bii ɓee, tũuru m kaa nung vɔrɔ kɔ nwani.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa rang tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kagn koo keɓe piti, zang naa kɔɔ ruu vuu kɔ jaa soro keɓe palɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn jaa soro keɓe nɛ̀ɛ́ ning zang ɓɛɛ.”
A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahuda Isikariyoti, daa ka bii zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa,
a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Naa n a nɔɔ Yeesɔ, nɔɔ a m viya?” A ri gã saka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ azurufa bmati tu kopi, nɛɛ ri naa a wu.
A Yahuda gaa tɔɔsung gbalang kãanang ɓɔɔ wu naa mãlɛ́ zang Yeesɔ kaa nɛɛ diki kaɓa kɔ.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gaayu shaanang nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu pàlɛ́ mɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa shaa ka nyaalaa Pasika ka niya?”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ daa ka bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ka gari, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ‘Maalang tɔɔ, diki mɛɛ a tɔ naabm, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ.’ ”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa palɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu shaanang Pasika kati.
Yeesɔ naa nwang tɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ laarang,
ri shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ, naa mãlɛ́ m ditɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli. A ri gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kati nɛɛ, “Ɓu wiya maalang? Nkɔ ya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ hãa naa nɛɛ n ka gbanti, wukɔ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ.
Jaa Shɔnzang naa vɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A jĩng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ yi zang kaɓa kpang kɔ gbã̀ágbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ daa wu.”
A Yahuda ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ ya maalang?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, mɔkɔ.”
Ri shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ tuu borodi zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tá ta nɔɔ shaayi. Weɓe yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ kɔ.”
A ti tuu juwa, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a ri kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tá ta, nɔɔ ɓooro ka yuu manɛ nandon.
Wee zĩi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ naa tusu zang nɛɛ nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang, naa nwang kaa niizang ɓɛɛ. Zĩi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu zang dɔɔli, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n naa ɓoo mii jĩng laa inabi tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang, n naa ɓoo kaa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓoo nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
A ri naa gaa soo, ri daa kaa Kɔpɔ Zeetung.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zĩi, nɔɔ naa yuku ditɔ nandon nɔɔ yaa m. Laa kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
“ ‘N nyɔ jagãng vɔrɔ ditɔ,
tɔɔ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ri naa tantɛ kati.’
“N nɛɛ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, nɔɔ naa ĩi m kaa nɛɛ Galili.”
A Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naa ri yuku doo piti ri yaa mɔɔ, n yaa mɔɔ m kpang.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zĩi keɓe, bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ laa nyaa tɔ daa doo taati, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung ɓáa kpang.”
Bituru ti kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔkn, tɔɔ, “Naa zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ m doo katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ning piti, n laa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ m kpang.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ, ri ti kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
Yeesɔ naa a kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Gesemani ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, n daa gaa doo Kpanti Laa ka kaaɓa.”
A Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ Bituru, nɛɛ wujɛ Zebedi ɓɔɔ ziti ɓɛɛ. A bii soo wu, gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang kati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii soo m tɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, nɔ́ɔ gãng jĩng nɛɛ n ning.”

Yeesɔ daa tɔ ka tĩng tɔkɔlɔng, a zuu kaa nɛɛ buru ka tipi, a gaa Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, gbalang nɛɛ kagn, kɔsɔ m jĩng dannang keɓe katɔ. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
A naa gbãayu ĩi zang taati ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, hingro yiki ri tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãng jĩng nɛɛ n naa gbete kpang ya?
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, nɔɔ ti gaa Kpanti Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sheetang nɛ̀ɛ́ nwãarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Suru bii manɛ kasɛ ɓi katɔ, a bii manɛ kɔ lakɛ ɓi kaa takpang.”
A Yeesɔ ti paarɛ tɔkn, daa gaa Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ jĩng dannang keɓe wu ɓa kpang, n dàng katɔ, wu ti nwang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ti gbãayu naa ĩi ri, hingro yiki ri tɔ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ hingro kpiti ri jĩng tɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ ti yaa ri, daa nɔng Laa gaanang daa kaa doo taati. Ti daa paasɛ doo nyaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ.
A gbãayu naa ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rooyi, nɔɔ ɔ̃̀sɔ́ manɛ doo naa ya? Nɔɔ zirɛ, laa yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng. Zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ.
Nɔɔ seepaa ta ruu gbãayu. Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ kɔ a kana ɓa.”

Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a Yahuda zang gbete ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ a kati. Yahuda a nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ́ɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri shong ɓɛɛ ning. Zang kaɓa, ri see yere bang, nɛɛ labasaa ka naa ning.
Yahuda ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, kɔɔ ri tɔ, ka tĩng nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n daa kɔng wu, wukɔ Yeesɔ. Nɔ́ɔ yi wu.”
Yahuda ri naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ a sharɛ daa kɔng Yeesɔ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nwang tɛya Maalang?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ atɛ mɔɔ tà masang.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Yahuda ri tɛɛyi, ri daa yi Yeesɔ kati.
Zang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ gbete, zɔ̃ng yere bang ɓiɓɛ, wɔng shoo jaafoo kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani kak.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Hãa yere bang ɓaaɓɛ ta ka kpãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng yere bang, naa vɔ ɓi doo nɛɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa n gàa Daa mɛɛ, shong m zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ɓa tìng kopi tu ziti katɔ tantɛnang kpang ya?
A n nɛɛ palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, vuu keɓe naa nwang ditɔ naa weɓe, nwang kaa bɛ̀ɛ́ niizang viya?”

A Yeesɔ raa jĩng, hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu yinang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see yere bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa gaagaa, nɛɛ nɔɔ naa yi ɓu nkɔ naa zang shɔngɓɔ ya? N nwalɛ ka yeti Gãa Laa kɔ diki diki, n tusu zang vuu, nɔɔ yi m kpang.
Vuu kɔ zang palɛ ɓée, ɓee ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri yuku nandon ri yaa wu.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka bii Kayifa, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
Bituru dũuru wu ka knti katara sasak, daa nɛɛ wu ka dàbang Kayifa. A Bituru turɛ daa nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka gãa, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu zi naa ɓɔɔ zang hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kati.
A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, tɔ̀ɔ ri nyɔ wu kati ɓɛɛ.
Zang sèé dɔɔli ri kɔɔrɔ ruu see ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang. Nɛɛ knti, zang sèé ziti ɓɔɔgn, ri naa seepaa kati. Ri a ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
Ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu zunung ɓɔɔ wu jili Gãa Laa ka tipi, wu mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ.”
A Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, seepaa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. A Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu kà Gãa Laa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ ruu jong. Mɔkɔ Kirisi Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Nn nkɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ naa zi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa zi naa ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong ditɔ.”

Ɓɔɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa tãa naa weɓe, lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔ ruu shi kpang tɔ, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu Jaa Laa. Ruu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ rùu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ takpang. Nɔɔ tãa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kãntang keɓe tɔ nɛɛ shoo manɛ.
Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti manɛ viya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dàa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ.”
A ri tùlù wu sisãa ka jĩng, ri ti ma wu nɛɛ naa tung, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nyɔ wu nɛɛ naa.
Ri kpaa wu tɔɔ, “Kirisi, ɓàa ruu núng zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ mɔɔ ta.”
Ka laa kaɓa, Bituru nwang doo ka dàbang Kayifa. A jaa shonang zang soro tɔkɔlɔng naa arɛ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓáa doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ yɔɔ Galili kɔ.”
A Bituru laa nyaa ruu keɓe ka tĩng ɓarɛ nandon tɔɔ, “N zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.”
Bituru naa seepaa daa nwang kaa nyaa gãa naabm, a jaa shonang zang soro tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔgn ti naa zi wu. A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Bɛ̀ɛ́ yɔɔ keɓe nwang ɓi doo nɛɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara kɔ.”
A Bituru ti laa nyaa tɔkn nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ keɓe nung m kpang.”
Laa nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ri arɛ. Ri kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ niizang. Náa yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ka yeti nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, wukɔ nwangsɛ mɔɔ yuu.”
A Bituru kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ keɓe nung m kpang. N nɛɛ suu sèé, Laa wu palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A kǹ naa ɓaa nyaa kaa tantɛnang.
A Bituru naa kpaa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kǹ naa ɓáa nyaa, bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ tɔ daa doo taati.” A Bituru nwangnɛ, daa kaa ka biling zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
A ri mã wu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii gɔmna Bilatu.

Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yahuda ɓɔɔ malɛ Yeesɔ zirɛ, zang jɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu tɔ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kaa tɔ, naa kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ. A see saka azurufa bmati tu kopi ɓɔɔ zang a wu ka ruu Yeesɔ, daa sɔɔrɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n nyɔ nɔɔ yuu shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ tãa zang ruu kpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓuru hãa ɓi tɔɔgn kpang, ɓi kaa ruu ɓaaɓɛ.”
A Yahuda vang ri saka kaɓa ka Gãa Laa, a daayi daa bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a vɔ kati.

Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri see saka azurufa kaɓa kati. Ri tɔɔ, “Naa ruu tɛ̃ɛ saka keɓe ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu tɛ̃ɛ saka kagn ka Gãa Laa tɔkn, ruu ɓa nyaa labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, saka ɓɔɔ zang hoo shɔnzang nɛɛ mani ɓi saka zĩi ɓɛɛ.”
A ri mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ ri see saka keɓe ri daa hoo tipi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mãa ɓari ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ wu nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ zang zanti kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓaa tipi kaɓa doo naa nɛɛ, “Tipi zĩi shɔnzang.”

Vuu kɔ zang palɛ ɓee, ɓee ɓi ka nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Irimiya zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Irimiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ri see saka azurufa bmati tu kopi kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ ri shu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ,
ri hoo tipi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mãa ɓari nɛɛ mani, naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa tusu m ɓɛɛ.”
Zang a tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka tĩng gɔmna, a gɔmna hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudi ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ.”
A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, a ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang.
Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tãa vuu piti kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ ti ã̀a wu nyaa ɓi ka bii kpang. Ti kasɛ nyaa ɓi ka yuu vuu gbete ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Gɔmna Bilatu mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Diki vuu shaanang nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ a tɔ, gɔmna yaarɛ zang, zang gbete ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ naa katɔ.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baraba, ɓɔɔ zang zi wu nung tɔ nandon, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, kagn yeti sãa.
Zang kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon, a Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “N yaa nɔɔ ɓu wi naa wiya? Baraba ya, kɔ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ?”
Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zi ɓi tɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri atɛ wu Yeesɔ ɓi ka ruu sũnyaa kaanang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Bilatu nwang doo ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓeeso shong wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ yi naa ka bii shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ kiɓi kpang. N dang jĩng ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang nɛɛ zĩi lɛɛkɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli.”
A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri dɔ̃lɔ zang dɔɔli nyaa nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Bilatu nɛɛ wu yaa Baraba kɔ naa, wu nyɔ Yeesɔ.
Gɔmna Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka teteng zang ziti keɓe, n yaa nɔɔ ɓu wi naa wiya?”
Ri tɔɔ, “Baraba.”
A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Ń palɛ vi nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi, viya?”
Ri goo nyaa nandon tɔɔ, “Yaa wu, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn, nɛɛ, “Ka ruu viya? Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓu viya?”
Ri ti goo nyaa tɔkn nabm ka lapa nandon nɛɛ, “Yaa wu, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Bilatu zirɛ, nɛɛ zang kaɓa ri ɓa wu yuu katɔ, ri ti shii varɛ tɔ, tuu mii sɔɔ naa ɓiɓɛ nɔng ka jĩng ɓarɛ nandon. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Naa mɛɛ ɓi kagn ruu zĩi yɔɔ keɓe kpang. Ɓi kaa ruu manɛ.”
A ri goo nyaa nandon nɛɛ, “Rúu zĩi yɔɔ keɓe wu naa nwang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ wujɛ ɓuru gbã̀ágbãa.”
A Bilatu yàa ri Baraba naa kati. A kɔɔ zang, nɛɛ zang nyɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ gbãa, a tuu Yeesɔ a zang kati, nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa.
A rɛɛ sɔɔja gɔmna tuu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa gɔmna. Ri kpalɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ nimbang nandon, ri kiiri Yeesɔ nyaa kaa teteng.
Ri tu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a ri lu wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ nwɛ̃ɛri, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ kpanti ri lu ɓɛɛ.

Ri ti, ti kɔkɔ naa lapoo yuu kãnang kpanti, ri hãa wu ka yuu. A ri tuu labalang naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ kpanti, ri a wu ka naa nakn. Ri ti tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ri kpaa wu. Ri tɔɔ, “Ruu jee mɔɔ nyaa kpanti zang Yahudi.”
Ri ti tùlù wu sisãa ka bii. Ri tuu labalang ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ, ri nyɔkɔ wu nɔng ka yuu.
Ri kpaa wu tɔ sasak, a ri zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ nwɛ̃ɛri kaɓa, ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kati. A ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ ri daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa.
Ri nwang tɔ, ri daa kana ka gbalang, a ri naa ɓee yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ gari Kiranɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siman. A ri yi wu nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ri naa a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Golgota, (dĩiri nung keɓe ɓi, nɔng ɓɔɔ nwáng yuu zɔ̃ɔpi ɓɛɛ.)
Ri tuu sàa ɓɔɔ zang nwɛ̃ɛtɛ nɛɛ gãnang, ɓɔɔ palɛ zang, zang tãa kɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri a Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu ɓooyi. Yeesɔ tãa ka nyaa, a bɛ̃ɛ ɓoonang.
Ri ɓaa Yeesɔ naa tɔ ka laa. A ri naa shaa laa, ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ka naa ɓarɛ.
Ri nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ri gãng jĩng ka wu.
A ri bee vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓang ka yuu paa laa ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri beeyi tɔɔ, “Wee Yeesɔ Kpanti zang Yahudi kɔ.”
Zang ti ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge naa jong ka laa, ka kagn Yeesɔ. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka naa nakn a ɓɔɔ gbete ka naa nagang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɛɛ gbalang, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ, ri ti waa yuu ɓarɛ kpɔkpɔk,
ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jili Gãa Laa, mɔɔ mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ, ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta. Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, shooro ta ka tipi, nɛɛ láa kɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ naa kagn ɓi.”
Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri ti kpaa wu doo nɔngkɔ. Ri tɔɔ,
“Ta yuu zang ɓɔɔgn, a zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wu mɔkɔ Kpanti Isirela kpang ya? Náa shóorò nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓee, ruu shing danggn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
Shing danggn ka bii Laa, Laa nɛɛ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu ta wu ta. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wukɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa ka laa ka kagn Yeesɔ, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
Nɔng tɔ̀ɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon nɛɛ laagɛ̃ sasak, laa naa kpɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ mani.
Laa naa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama Sabatani.” Dĩiri yee keɓe, ɓi “Laa mɛɛ, Laa mɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa m ka ruu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri kaɓa, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi, ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓaa nyaa kana Iliya.”
A zang gbete ɓarɛ tantɛ yunang daa tuu sɔ̀ɔsɔ, hãa ka mii ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ sàa kagn ɓɛɛ, a màa ka laa, á Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu ɓoo ta.
A zang ɓɔɔ yaa knti ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa wu ka nɔngkɔ, Iliya wu arɛ, wu ta wu, ruu zirɛ.”
A Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa kaa tɔkn ka lapa, a vɔ kati.
Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nɔng tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani, lɔɔsɔ ka làá kaɓa. Gaayu lɔɔsɔnang nɛɛ paa daa nɔng ka dii. Tipi ruutu, a pɛngkɛ ti puusu.
Nyaa sàa ɓɔɔ zang gbã́alɛ́ vɔrɔ kagn ti pulu, zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, ri seepaa kati.
Ri naa nwangkɛ nɛɛ sàa, ka knti ɓɔɔ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa tɔ nɛɛ saa, ri daa ka Urushalima. Ri daa nwang nyaa ka bii zang dɔɔli.
Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja, nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka Yeesɔ, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ tipi ruutu, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ palɛ, bii kàa ri vɔrɔ. Ri tɔɔ, “Bɛ̀ɛ́ yɔɔ keɓe, Jaa Laa kɔ niizang.”
Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri yìkí Yeesɔ naa ka bii, ka diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu nɛɛ Galili, ri kagn ka nɔngkɔ gaagaa. Ri shii nɛɛ nɔng beebang ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka teteng zang soro kaɓa, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nàá rɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yusufu, a ɓɔɔ nàá rɛɛ wujɛ Zebedi ri kagn.
Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, yɔɔ gari Arimataya ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yusufu, ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli naa a kati. Yusufu ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng knti Yeesɔ kɔ.
Yusufu dàa gaa bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka naa Bilatu. A Bilatu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang wu daa a wu bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ta.
A Yusufu tuu bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ, kãng nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ puru ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
A daa wɔɔ ka yeti sàa shɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu shu ka tari bang ɓɔɔ naa yeng puru ɓɛɛ. A jĩiri tari bang, ku nyaa sàa ka nɛɛ mani, a daa kati.
Marayamu Magadaliya, nɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ gbete, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ naa dang.
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Bilatu.
Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ruu kpaa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sèé kaɓa kɔɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ wu doo ningkãari tɔ. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa seepaa ditɔ nɛɛ saa, ka lee ɓɔɔ diki naa daa taati ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang ta, zang daa gãng jĩng ka yuu saa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, diki taati wu ɓa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri nɛ̀ɛ́ naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, Seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ. Sèé ɓɔɔ knti, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kaa tɔ.”
A Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see sɔɔja ta, nɔɔ daa gã yuu sàa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”
A ri daayi, ri daa rangsɛ nyaa sàa, a ri ɓang vuu kpanti ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ, Bilatu dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu puu nyaa sàa kpang ɓɛɛ, ka yuu sàa. A ri shing zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã yuu saa ka nɔngkɔ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ gbete, ka knti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa leng jĩng ka yuu saa.
A tipi ruutunang ɓɔɔ bang ruutu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa shooro, daa ka nɔng yuu sàa, a jĩiri tari ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa sàa nɛɛ mani, nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ, nwang naa shala mii ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ ɓɛɛ. Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ti puru shãa shãa.
Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka yuu saa, ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, bii ɓarɛ mãrɛ, ri nwang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ lapa kaɓa, kɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri daa jĩng lennang ka yuu sàa kaɓa nɛɛ, “Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, n zi tɔ, nɔɔ kãa Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔng kpang, seepaa tɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a ta, nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ roo kagn ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ dita pati, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Dàá Galili kana tĩng ɓarɛ. Ri daa zi wu ka nɔngkɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ.”
A zang soro kaɓa, ri yaa nɔng yuu sàa kaa tantɛnang, nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang, nɛɛ tĩnang tãanang ning, a ri yurɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ naa ɓee ri yuu, a jee ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Palɛ biya?” Ɓudo ɓɔɔ ri zi wu naa weɓe, ri see zɔɔ, ri daa yi wu ka doo, ri báng wu kati.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ rɛɛ manzung, nɛɛ ri daa ka Galili, ri daa zi m ka nɔngkɔ.”
Zang soro ri daa tɔ, a zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ, ri daa ka gari. Ri daa kɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, vuu piti ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ, a ri sèe saka gaagaa ri a rɛɛ sɔɔja,
nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ri kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri a nɛɛ zĩi bɛ̀ɛ́ hingro yiki ruu katɔ, ri ɓɔɔ bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
Gɔmna nɛɛ naa tãa ruu keɓe tɔ, ruu naa kɔɔ wu naa ɓɔɔ vuu bii palɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ naa dang jĩng ɓɛɛ.”
A rɛɛ sɔɔja ri ta saka ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kati. Zang Yahudi ri ti ráng ruu keɓe doo naa lɛɛkɔ sasak.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kopi tu gbete naa daa ka Galili, ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
Ri daa ĩi wu, a ri báng wu. A zang ɓɔɔ ri, zi kpang nɛɛ wukɔ niizang kpang.
A Yeesɔ arɛ naa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa a m naa tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka tipi nandon.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon ruu mɛɛ, tɔɔ, ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng m kati. Nɔɔ ti palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ nung Daa mɛɛ Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa.
Nɔɔ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ n dang nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon. N yaa nɔɔ kpang. N nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe naa waa nyaa, nɛɛ mani.”
Wee naa ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa gaayu ɓɛɛ.
Gaayu ka naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Ishaya, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ. “Laa tɔɔ,
“ ‘N shong zang shonang mɛɛ,
ɓɔɔ palɛ mɔɔ gbalang ditɔ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ.’ ”
“Zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rang yee Laa ka yeti waala tɔɔ.
‘Kpanti a kaa tɔ, nɔɔ palɛ wu gbalang ta.
Nɔɔ shiiri wu katɔ ɓororo.’ ”
A Yɔhana naa nwáng nyaa palɛ zang batizima ka waala. Kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, nɔ́ɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, tɔɔ n palɛ nɔɔ batizima. Laa wu yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kati.”
A zang dɔɔli nɛɛ tipi Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔɔrɔ Laa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, a Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ka mii rang Urudung.
Yɔhana hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ shãngti vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ hòlòng ɓɛɛ. A ti mã guruji ka sãng ɓiɓɛ. Vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓi ti zɔɔrɔ nɛɛ warɛ.
Kɔɔ zang tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ ɓa m katɔ nɛɛ bannang. N daa naa ɓɔɔ n sɔ̃ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang.
N palɛ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, naa palɛ nɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ Suru Laa.”
Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ a kaa nɛɛ Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili, a Yɔhana palɛ wu batizima ka mii rang Urudung.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ mii hn, a zi lapa puuyi, Suru Laa shooro kana, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ naa koro.
A ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ lapa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ gbãng gbãng kɔ.”
A Suru Laa tantɛ wu dɔ̃nang ka waala.
Nwáng ka waala diki laa ziti, a Sheetang gãsɛ wu kaa sasak. Ka nɔng kaɓa vuu kpaasi kagn nɔngkɔ, a zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ri arɛ, ri yi wu naa ka bii.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang mã Yɔhana tɔ ka sãa, Yeesɔ naa a ka tipi Galili kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa tɔɔ,
“Diki a tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti yaa kaa naabm. Nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ ta, nɔ́ɔ shing danggn ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.”
Yeesɔ ra kana nyaa mii waapo Galili, a zi rɛɛ Siman nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru ri vang jang jaazĩi kana mii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jaazĩi yinang ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa tɔɔ “Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ dũng m. N tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa ri a ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A ri yaa jang ɓarɛ tantɛnang, ri dũng wu.
Yeesɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa ka tĩng tɔkɔlɔng, zi Yakub nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana wujɛ Zebedi, ri gbarɛ jang jaazĩi ɓarɛ ka yeti tonsi.
A ti tantɛ ri nyaa ɓaanang. Ri yaa daa ɓarɛ Zebedi ka yeti tonsi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ri shonang, a ri dũng wu.
A ri daa ka gari Kafanahu. A Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang naa arɛ, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi, a gáa zang tɔɔsung vuu tusunang kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka naa ɓɔɔ, wu tusu vuu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu ri vuu ɓi naa ɓɔɔgn. Tùsù zang ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka laa kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. A mɛɛ nyaa tɔɔ.
“Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bii ɓuru viya? Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara? Mɔɔ arɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ruu katɔ ya? N zi mɔɔ nung tɔ, mɔkɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “Voo nyaa ta! Nwáng ta mɔɔ yàa wu bii.”
A suru shi kpang tuu wu, loo wu ka tipi, a mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a nwangnɛ yaa wu bii kati.
Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, tɔɔ, “Ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ vuu tusunang kiya? Yɔɔ keɓe mangkɛ suru shi kpang, a ri ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ.”
A nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng kaa tantɛnang ka tipi Galili nandon.
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi hn, ri daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana ka gãa rɛɛ Siman Anduru.
Ka diki kaɓa Siman ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi ɓeeso roo ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii zaa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati.
A Yeesɔ arɛ yi wu naa, a wisi wu paa. Bii ɓɔɔ zaa wu, yaa wu nɔng kati. A Bituru ɓeekpeng seepaa a atɛ ri vuu shaanang kati.
Nɛɛ laarang bɛ̀ɛ́ laa hãa nyaa tɔ dii, zang atɛ wu zang kɔnang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kaa dɔɔli.
Zang gari, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ dɔɔli.
A Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ dɔɔli. A ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang dɔɔli. Yàa suru shi kpang gbalang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi wu nung tɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ yuu gãndi, yaa gãa, daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang daa gaa Laa ka nɔngkɔ.
A Siman ri see zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri kãa wu.
Ri daa ĩi wu tɔ, a ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang piti ri kãa mɔkɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Rúu daa nɔɔ rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tĩng ɓuru naabm ta, tɔ̀ɔ n daa rang yee Laa kaa jong nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a ka ruu yee Laa kɔ rannang ɓɛɛ.”
A rakɛ ka tipi Galili nandon, rang zang yee Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi, a ti nwàngsɛ̀ zang dɔɔli suru shi kpang.
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa katɔ, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu, gaa wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ, mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
A gn yɔɔ kɔng Yeesɔ dɔɔli, Yeesɔ dĩi naa lee wu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ “N kasɛ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu yaa mɔɔ nɔng ta.”
A vuu bii yaa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.
A Yeesɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa gbãng gbãng, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,

“Mɔ́ɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daayi mɔɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu vaa ka Gãa Laa, bii ɓaaɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ zang ri zi kagn nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ yaa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ.”

Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa kaɓa, daayi daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓi doo nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nwang bii ka dalɛ, wu daa gari ɓɔɔgn takpang. Nwalɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ti daa bii Yeesɔ ɓi doo nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti.
Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ naa gbãayu tɔkn ka Kafanahu, a zang tãa nyaa tɔɔ Yeesɔ a gãa tɔ.
A zang kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɔng yi nyaa kaa nɛɛ biling piti. A Yeesɔ rang ri yee Laa kati.
A zang dɛ̃ɛti ri tuu zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, ri atɛ wu.

Ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri vang yuu sãa ri puu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn, ri yaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ta ka laa naa nɛɛ soo, ka tĩng Yeesɔ.
Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Man jaa, zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang, ri nwang kagn nɔngkɔ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ, a ri ti hɛ̃ɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ,
“Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔ ruu nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya? Tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ naa Kpanti Laa. Naa wu Kpanti Laa kpang, zang ɓɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang kagn koo keɓe gbete ya?”
Yeesɔ zi ɓi tɔ ka yeti suru bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang nɛɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ veɓe kɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓu ka ruu vi, nɔngkɔ viya?
Ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ,’ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu vuu roonang ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ daayi.’ Ɓu wi kpãa kpang ka teteng yee keɓe wiya?
