N másɛ̀ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A raa jĩng kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ,
“N kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa, mɔɔ tuu vuu roonang ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ daa gãa.”

A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ seepaa tantɛnang tuu siri ɓiɓɛ, ra ka jĩng zang nandon, a daayi. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. A ri dɔɔ Kpanti Laa. Ri tɔɔ “Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, gngn kpang.”
Yeesɔ ti naa paasɛ daanang tɔkn ka nyaa rang mii waapo. A zang dɔɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri vuu kati.

Yeesɔ rakɛ kana nyaa mii waapo, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Leevi jaa Alifaya nwang tɔ ka yeti gãa saka tipi tanang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa wu nyaa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.” A Leevi seepaa dũng wu kati.

Laa ɓa tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa Leevi, daa nwangnɛ shaa vuu shaanang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng zang dɔɔli, ri dũng knti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓarɛ labeenang, ri zi Yeesɔ shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang hn, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ka ruu viya?”

Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔ̀ng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ, palɛ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri katɔ kɔ, ri daa shɛ̃ɛning. N arɛ nɛɛ, n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”

Ka diki kaɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Farisi, ri seng nyaalaa. A zang ɓɔɔgn ri arɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ “Ka ruu vi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ Farisi ri seng nyaalaa, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ “sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang, sèng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ sinyɛ ɓeevɛ doo nɛɛ ri kpang.
Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ ri kpang, tɔɔ ri naa seng nyaalaa ka diki kaɓa kɔ.
“Zang lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala ɓi jong nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Naa zang lurɛ, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ naa gɔɔ katɔ lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala kaɓa, yaa yeng kaa bang dɔɔli.

Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zàáng gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, saa naa si katɔ, wu sãa zàáng kati. Saa tɛ̃ɛ ka tipi, zàáng ti lasɛ katɔ. Zang tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi ka zàáng shɔɔ kɔ doori.”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, Yeesɔ sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ yeti jaa zee, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zee bɔ̃ɔrɔnang kati ri shaayi.
A zang Farisi hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zirɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ ri palɛ shonang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ka ruu viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ “Nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda pálɛ́ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri dɔɔli nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu gngn kpang ya?

Naa ɓɔɔ daa ka Gãa Laa ka diki ɓɔɔ Abiyata kɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a daa tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning, a shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Zang palɛ Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓi ka ruu shɔnzang kɔ jong, zang palɛ wu shɔnzang ka ruu Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang kɔ Kpanti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang piti.”
Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi tɔkn, a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Ri shu wu jĩng ka bii, nɛɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ masɛ zang kɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔ, ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, tɔɔ ri walɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri naa kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ kaɓa nyaa tɔɔ, “Arɛ mɔɔ naa shii ka tĩng zang piti ka nihn.”

A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ, nɛɛ ruu palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang? Nɛɛ ruu ta yuu zang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kɔ jong?” Ri ãa nyaa kpang.
Gnvɔ shaa Yeesɔ, a Yeesɔ shu ri jĩng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka bii, ka ruu yuu taarɛnang ɓarɛ. A raa jĩng kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dĩi naa ɓaaɓɛ ta.” A yɔɔ dĩi naa ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔkn.
A ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri zi naa weɓe, ri nwangkɛ, ri daa tɔ̀ng zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Hiridu kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ naa daa kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nyaa mii waapo. Zang dɔɔli ri dũng wu nɛɛ tipi Galili a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tipi Yahudi

nɛɛ gari Urushalima nɛɛ tipi Idumiya, nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ rang Urudung ka wu nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwangnɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ kiiri rɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔɔli keɓe, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãa ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri shang dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri pàlɛ̀ wu tonsi katɔ pati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ màasɛ́ wu ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ masɛ zang tɔ dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ka bii ɓarɛ ning, ri béng zang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii.
Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓarɛ nɛɛ zi Yeesɔ tɔ, ri ti tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ri sãlɛ nyaa nɛɛ “Mɔkɔ Jaa Laa.”
Yeesɔ wu ti mangkɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ ri tusu zang nɛɛ wukɔ Jaa Laa kpang.
A Yeesɔ naa vangnɛ daa ka kɔpɔ, a ɓaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ katɔ nyaa, a ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
A shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang kopi tu ziti kati. Nɛɛ ri nwang nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ wu shong ri, ri daa rang zang yee Laa.
Nɛɛ wu ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ mani, ka bii zang ɓɛɛ.
Nung zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ keɓe. Siman ɓɔɔ (wu naa ɓaa nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.)
A ɓɔɔ Yakub jaa Zebedi nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa ri nung ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ Buwanaji ɓɛɛ. (Dĩiri nung keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ nwang naa shala mii ɓɛɛ.)
A ɓɔɔ Anduru, nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Batolomi, nɛɛ Matiyu nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Yakub jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Tadayu, nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ,
a ɓɔɔ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ naa daa tɔ yeti gãa, a zang dɔɔli ri ti kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔkn ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ takpang.
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeezung ri tãa naa weɓe, ri daayi, nɛɛ ri daa gɔ̃ wu kaa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “shoko ta wu tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ “Bahazabu kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri ruu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Sheetang nwangsɛ sheetang ɓi biya?”
Naa zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri basɛ zɔɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ tɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete, nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ, ri naa shaarɛ ɓarɛ kaa tɔ.
Naa sheetang ti bàsɛ̀ bii ɓiɓɛ, nwàng ɓi takpang. Shaarɛ ɓi kaa tɔ kɔ nwani.
“Zang ɓɔɔ daa gãa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli, wu see vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Mã̀ zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli kaɓa ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu see vuu ɓiɓɛ kati.
“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, Laa yàá zang gbalang vuu shi kpang piti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, nɛɛ yee shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ráng ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon,
zang ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka yuu Suru Kpanti Laa, Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi kpang dòndòng. Pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Laa yaa zang gbalang kpang ɓi tɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri naa weɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a niiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri naa shii ka biling, a ri shong zang nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu nyaa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa naaɓɛ, ri ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka biling. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi n tusu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ n ɓaa ri nɛɛ naa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A raa jĩng pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Naa mɛɛ kɔ, ri nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ ɓee.”
“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, wukɔ naa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ.”

Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung vuu tusunang kaa tɔkn, ka nyaa mii waapo Galili. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ vang tonsi daa nwang kagn yuu mii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon ri ti shiiri ɓarɛ ka nyaa dang gãnggãng.
A tusu ri vuu dɔɔli nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ nɛɛ,
nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, nɔ́ɔ tãayi, “Zang jaa lannang ɓɔɔgn, nɛɛ wu dàa vang jĩng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
Vang jĩng vuu kana, a jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka gbalang, a jaaning ri ti arɛ ri naa yakɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔɔli kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri tantɛ takɛnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zũng tipi wu dɔɔli kpang ɓɛɛ.
A laa naa tuuyi, ri tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shɔng ɓarɛ daa tipi dii kpang ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka teteng kɔkɔ. A kɔkɔ bangkɛ mulu ri. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tasɛ yuu kpang.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, a ri bangkɛ, ri tasɛ yuu. Ri shing jĩng ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ laa maani.”
A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kaa bm, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɛɛ kati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa a nɔɔ kɔ naa zinang ruu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi ɓɛɛ, a vuu piti, zang tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓarɛ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
“Kaa ruu ɓɔɔ,
‘Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shu jĩng nɛɛ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu,
ri zi kpang,
ri ti ɓaa shoo, ɓaa shoo,
ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ, Laa
nɛɛ yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang, keɓe kpang ya? A nɔɔ naa zi, dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka biya?
Zang ɓɔɔ vang jĩng vuu kaɓa, rang ɓi Ruu Laa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa Ruu Laa, a sheetang arɛ naa ta Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ tantɛnang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nwang ɓarɛ naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa Ruu Laa, a ri ta tantɛnang nɛɛ yeti gbete.
Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ruu kaɓa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri mã danggn ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A jĩng dannang naa seepaa ka ruu Kpanti Laa, ri tantɛ Ruu Laa yaanang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nwang ɓarɛ naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti kɔkɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa Ruu Laa,
a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti zang kasɛ, naa mulu Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ kati, a ruu bii naa nwàng ri vuu kaa takpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa Ruu Laa, ri tarɛ, Ruu Laa nwang ri vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ri naa nwang ka naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ra jaa bmati tu kopi, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ laa maani ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kagn atɛ waa zàáng sɔɔ, wu zuu nɛɛ pɛntɛng, kɔ wu shing ka dii ɓonla ya? Shing wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn lapa kpang ya?
Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, zang naa nwangsɛ ditɔ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang zi dĩiri ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang naa zi ditɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ ning. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ɓi kaa tɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang gisi wu ɓɔɔgn tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, zang naa ta ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng ditɔ.”
A ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vang jĩng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Shɔnzang kaɓa rooyi nɔng wu gãntɛ, wu ti seepaa diki diki, zi naa ɓɔɔ jĩng vuu kaɓa takɛ, wu ti bang ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ɓi tipi palɛ vuu, vuu ti tarɛ. Gaayu nɛɛ lagbãng, wu ti naa nwangsɛ yuu, tɔɔ wu shing jĩng kati.
Jĩng vuu nɛɛ zũng tɔ, wu ya jangsi, wu kpayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki vuu yeenang a tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Rùu gã̀sɛ́ Kpanti roonang Laa ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu tusu naa ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ ɓu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kiya?
Nwang naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng piti ka teteng jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓarɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ.
Zang nɛɛ ɓaa tɔ, naa bangnɛ, vãarɛ nasãng bang, bang, jaaning ri ti naa kɔ̃lɔ saara kagn.”
Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe dɔɔli, ka naa ɓɔɔ ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Kɔɔ ri ruu kagn nɛɛ nyaa waati gbete kpang. Rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon, nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka bm, wu nwangsɛ ri dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ wu rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kati nandon.
Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Rúu ta nɔɔ waapo ta ka dang.”
Ri yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kati, a ri vang tonsi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang kagn, ri daa nɛɛ wu. Tonsi ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ.
A jasung seepaa rannang kati. Jasung ti vãlɛ mii kana yeti tonsi, tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔ.
Yeesɔ roo ɓi katɔ ka knti tonsi. Shing yuu ɓiɓɛ ka laa yuu pãnnang. A ri hingsi wu, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang ruu ɔ̃ɔ kana ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang ya?”
A Yeesɔ seepaa mangkɛ jasung, a kɔɔ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Shii kikiri, mɔɔ gɔnsɔ takpang.” A jasung shii kaa kikiri.
A hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ shing danggn gn kpang ya?”
Ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ kaa naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ zang viya? Jasung nɛɛ mii waapo ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ wiya?”
Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri ta mii waapo tɔ ka dang ɓɔɔ ka tipi zang Ganasara ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwangnɛ yeti tonsi hn, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kaa nɛɛ nɔng yuu saa ka bii Yeesɔ.
Yɔɔ kaɓa nwalɛ ɓi ka nɔng yuu saa. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu mãanang nɛɛ saka kagn gbete tɔkn kpang.
Lɔɔrɔ koo vuu ɓɔɔ zang zaayi, zang mã wu nɛɛ mani. Wu ti kakɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang ta naa nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, diki, diki. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu yitinang kagn gbete kpang.
Rakɛ ka nɔng yuu saa, ti vang ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ nɛɛ zĩi ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laagɛ̃. Diki, diki kaarɛ nyaa, wu ti gbãnkɛ bii nɛɛ tari.
Ɓɔɔ zi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nɔng beebang, yurɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.
A mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bii mɛɛ viya? Yeesɔ Jaa Kpanti Laa? N zɔɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ nung Laa, mɔɔ dang m jĩng kpang.”
Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, “Suru shi kpang, nwang ta mɔɔ yaa wu bii ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ viya?” Kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung mɛɛ nɛɛ Dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.”
A gaa Yeesɔ sasak, nɛɛ wu hing ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa kpang.
Ka diki kaɓa bɛ̀ɛ́ gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn ka doo kɔpɔ naabm gaagaa.
A suru shi kpang ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Yaa ruu ta, ruu daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya kaɓa.”
A yàa suru shi kpang gbalang, a ri nwangnɛ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya. Gãnya kɔ gaagaa nung labang ziti ɓa, ri yuku, ri naa soo nyaa rang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛrɛ, ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa gãnya, ri yuku, ri daa kɔɔ zang gari bang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo gãa ka gari tɔkɔlɔng vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang nwangkɛ nɛɛ ri naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, ri naa zi zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, hãa vuu tɔ ka bii, raa shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ tɔkn. A ri kaa vɔrɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ gãnya, ri kɔɔrɔ zang kati.
A zang kaɓa, ri gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ gaanang kati, nɛɛ wu dita, wu yaa ri tipi ɓarɛ.
Yeesɔ váng tonsi kana, a zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, gaa wu nɛɛ wu daa nɛɛ wu ning.
A Yeesɔ kasɛ kpang. Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita gãa, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaazung vuu ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ gn ɓaaɓɛ kɔng Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A daayi, daa ka yeti Dekapoli rɛɛ gari kopi, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ kati. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn.
Yeesɔ naa ta waapo tɔ ka dang tɔkn nɛɛ tonsi. Ɓɔɔ doo ka nyaa waapo, zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng.
A zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yayiru, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng Yeesɔ,
a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, vuu palɛ katɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Arɛ mɔɔ daa ĩi wu naa ɓaaɓɛ jong ka bii, tɔ̀ɔ, bii wu yaa wu nɔng.”
A Yeesɔ daa ka nɛɛ wu ning. Zang dɔɔli ri dũuru wu kati. Ri ti kpalɛ wu bii kana.
A jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn, zĩi kpaa wu daa saa kopi tu ziti.
Jaa soro kaɓa, dang jĩng tɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang bii dɔɔli, wɔsɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nandon, kɔnang ɓiɓɛ daa nɛɛ tĩng kɔ jong.
Ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa Yeesɔ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, seepaa, a ka knti Yeesɔ ka teteng zang, a lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
Kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa n lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang mɛɛ waa nyaa katɔ.”
A zĩi ɓɔɔ kpaa wu tantɛ kaa dɔnnang. A tãa ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kɔnang ɓiɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.
Yeesɔ tantɛ zinang nɛɛ, naa zang masɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, masɛ zang ɓɔɔ tɔ. A raa jĩng hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi, lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ mɛɛ wiya?”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ mɔɔ bii, a mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ doo nɛɛ mani Ɓu wi lee m naa ka bii wiya?”
Yeesɔ dũng jĩng nɛɛ wu zi kaa zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
A jaa soro ɓɔɔ lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ Yeesɔ zi tantɛnang nɛɛ Yeesɔ kãa wukɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, a nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang, bii zaa wu kana, tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ kaa nandon.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Man jaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ masɛ mɔɔ tɔ. Daa waasɛ̃, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, zang shonang ri a nɛɛ gãa Yayiru, ri naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓaaɓɛ vɔ tɔ. Mɔɔ kpãa maalang tɔ̀ɔ́ dalɛ waati kpang.”
Yeesɔ yée laa ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Kɔɔ Yayiru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nɛɛ ri shii ka nɔngkɔ. A ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ Bituru, nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana jaa naa Yakub kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri.
Ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ ka gãa Yayiru, a Yeesɔ zirɛ, zang zi zɔɔ ɓi takpang. Zang kaa kana, zang ti ɓaarɛ nyaavaa kana lapa.
Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaarɛ ka ruu viya? Jaa vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.”
A ri laarɛ wu. Yeesɔ ãatɛ zang ka biling nandon, a ɓaa nyaa ka daa jaa, nɛɛ naa jaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu, a daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ jaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
A yi naa jaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Talita kumi,” (Dĩiri yee keɓe ɓi, “Jaa, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa ta.”)
A jaa seepaa tantɛnang, gaa tɔɔsung rakɛnang kati. Sáa jaa kaɓa kopi tu ziti. Ɓɔɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn.
A Yeesɔ shàarɛ̀ ri nyaa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe kpang. A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn nɛɛ, ri a jaa vuu ɓɔɔ jaa shaa ɓɛɛ ta.
Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka gari ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri ti daa kaa nɛɛ wu ning.

Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi, Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung vuu tusunang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ti tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe zi vuu keɓe ɓi biya nɔngkɔ viya? Laa a wu zũnang vi nɔngkɔ viya? Zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ruu mã naa ka danggn katɔ.

Wee ɓu zang ɓɔɔ seere laa ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Wu Marayamu kɔ niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yose nɛɛ Yahuda nɛɛ Siman kɔ jaa niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔ nɛɛ ruu ka nihn kpang ya?” Gnvɔ shaa ri, ri bɛ̃ɛ wu kati.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang a zang nyaa shonang Laa bannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn piti, zang gari ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ zang yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ ri a wu bannang ɓi kpang shɛ̃ɛning.”
Yeesɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka nɔngkɔ kpang. Masɛ zang tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ wu shing ri naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Yeesɔ mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
A daarɛ ka gari ɓɔɔgn daa tusu zang vuu kati.
A ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, a ɓakɛ ri kaa ziti, ziti, shongko ri. A ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ri tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri daa zanti nɔng ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ri tuu labalang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Nɛɛ ri tuu vuu shaanang nɛɛ duku ka naa ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ ri ti daa nɛɛ saka ka naa ɓarɛ kpang.
Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri hãa koodoo katɔ. Nɛɛ ri ti hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ziti ka bii kpang.
A ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kagn piti, nɔ́ɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa wu a nɛɛ mani.

Nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kagn kpang, a ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ yaa nɔng kaɓa kaa tɔ, nɔ́ɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang, ɓi kaa ruu ɓarɛ.”
A ri daa rang zang yee Laa kati. Ri kɔɔ zang tɔ́ɔ, zang ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ta, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.
Ri ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang dɔɔli. A ri ti tungku zang kɔnang dɔɔli nung ka yuu. A ri masɛ ri kati.

Hiridu ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Galili tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang wisi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang batizima paa tɔ nɛɛ saa ka ruu nɔngkɔ walɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn palɛnang.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi Iliya.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ Hiridu tãa naa weɓe, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔhana ɓɔɔ n dɔng yuu ɓiɓɛ zang wisi wukɔ paa nɛɛ saa.”
Hiridu kɔ shong zang nɛɛ zang daa yi Yɔhana zang mãrɛ, zang loo wu ka sãa, ka ruu Hirodiya soro jaa diiɓɛ Filibu ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ Hiridu tɔɔ, “Daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta soro jaa daaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Hirodiya mang Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang batizima ka yeti, kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ katɔ, a walɛ gbalang kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Hiridu kaa vɔrɔ Yɔhana katɔ, ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ Hiridu yiti Yɔhana tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee Yɔhana naa ka bii kpang. Hiridu ɓaa shoo katɔ ka nyaa Yɔhana tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a yèé Yɔhana kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli.

Hirodiya naa walɛ gbalang vuu ɓɔɔ wu kongso ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ zang yi Hiridu kagn raa bii ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, kpanti Hiridu gaarɛ zang bang bang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang sɔɔja, nɛɛ zang Galili ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn dɔɔli, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang.

A jaa Hirodiya ɓɔɔ soro arɛ naa sɔ dang. Dang ɓɔɔ jaa sɔɔrɛ daa kpanti Hiridu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ka yeti dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kpanti kɔɔ jaa tɔɔ, “Gaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ, n a mɔɔ katɔ.” A tũng jaa Laa tɔ̀ɔ,
“Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa ka naa mɛɛ piti, n a mɔɔ katɔ. Naa mɔɔ gaa m nɛɛ n basɛ tipi ɓɔɔ n roo kpanti kagn ziti, n a mɔɔ dang gbete, n a mɔɔ katɔ.”
A jaa nwangnɛ daa hɛ̃ɛ niiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N daa gaa ɓu viya?” Niiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔ̀ɔ, “Daayi mɔɔ gaa yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.”
A jaa làabìi gbãayu kaa tantɛnang daa ka bii kpanti kɔɔ wu tɔ̀ɔ, “N kasɛ mɔɔ a m yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ka yeti pɛntɛng kãntang keɓe.”
Ɓɔɔ kpanti tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli a zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tũng jaa Laa tɔ ka shoo zang piti ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ jaa ɓɛɛ takpang.
A kpanti shong sɔɔja gbete ka teteng sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka wu, nɛɛ wu daa atɛ wu yuu Yɔhana. A yɔɔ daayi, daa dɔng yuu Yɔhana ka sãa.
Atɛ yuu kporontong Yɔhana ka pɛntɛng, a á jaa kati. Jaa ti tuuyi daa a niiɓɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ri tãa nyaa, ri arɛ ri naa tuu bii vɔrɔ Yɔhana, ri daa gbãa kati.
Zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kaɓa, ri gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri tusu ɓɛɛ.

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a ta ruu daa ɔ̃sɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɔngkɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri álɛ̀ ka bii ɓarɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri a kana, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti daa kana. Ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang takpang.
Ri vang tonsi, ri daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang dɔɔli zi ri, ri daa kana, a ri zi ri nung kaa tantɛnang. Ri yuku nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ piti piti, ri daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ka tĩng ɓarɛ.
Yeesɔ nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti tonsi, a zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, a gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwáng naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ jagãng kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kaa zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng.
Laa hãa nyaa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, laa ɓa tɔ, gãa ti ki nihn kpang.
Yaa zang naa ta, zang ɓu wu daa hoo vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ka gari ɓɔɔ ka nihn naabm ɓɛɛ.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a ri vuu shaanang ta, ri shaayi.” A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu daa hoo borodi nung jaka ziti, ruu naa a ri ya?”
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ yaa kaa nɛya? Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ zirɛ.” A ri daa zirɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa kaa maani nɛɛ jaazĩi ziti.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ zang ta, zang ri kusu zɔɔ, ri nwalɛ ka yuu wisi bɛbɛtɛ ɓɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
A zang kusu zɔɔ ɓɔɔ laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa ziti tu kopi, zang nwalɛ.
A Yeesɔ see borodi maani, nɛɛ jaazĩi ziti kaɓa, tuu jĩng ka lapa zãa Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta. A ti basɛ jaazĩi ziti kaɓa ka yuu zang piti.
Zang ri shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ borodi nɛɛ jaazĩi ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti saang kopi tu ziti.
Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kaɓa ri labang maani.
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang nɛɛ ri vang tonsi ta ri daa gari Bɛsɛda ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang dang ɓɛɛ ka tĩng. Nɛɛ wu jee zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ doo nyaa ka gbongkarɛ.
Jée zang nyaa tɔ, a naa seepaa daa ka kɔpɔ, nɛɛ wu daa gaa Laa.
Kaa nɛɛ laarang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ teteng mii waapo tɔ, Yeesɔ ɓi ti doo ka bm ka tipi.
A zi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri dang jĩng kana nɛɛ tonsi zaanang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung raa jĩng ka bii ɓarɛ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii nɛɛ yuu gãndi. Nɛɛ wu ɓa ri katɔ,
a ri zi wu, ra kana yuu paa mii, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ naa raanang, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi wu, a bii kaa ri vɔrɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ rang yee kaa tantɛnang nɛɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi nkɔ, nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang.”
A Yeesɔ vang kaa yeti tonsi, a jasung ɓɔɔ rarɛ vɔ̃ nyaa kati. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri mã naa ka danggn.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu nɛɛ borodi kaɓa gn kpang ɓɛɛ, a ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu ri ka yeti ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ri ta mii tɔ, ri naa a ka tipi Janesara. A ri mã tonsi ɓarɛ ka nyaa gãnggãng ka nɔngkɔ.
Ɓɔɔ ri nwang nɛɛ yeti tonsi hn, zang tantɛ Yeesɔ nung zinang.
A zang yuku, zang daarɛ ka gari ɓarɛ nandon. A zang gaa tɔɔsung zang kɔnang seerenang ka vuu roonang ɓarɛ, zang daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.

Nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kagn, ka yeti gari ɓɔɔ bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang rooro gãa waati piti, zang ãatɛ zang kɔnang ka teteng gari, ri wɔɔrɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu yáa zang kɔnang jong, ri lee naa kaa nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, kɔnang ɓarɛ yàa ri nɔng.
Zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri naa kiiri Yeesɔ nyaa ka teteng.
A ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ naa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang tĩng ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang.
(Zang Farisi nɛɛ zang Yahudi nandon, ri sɔɔ naa katɔ gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ túsú, tɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kati.

Ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ nɛɛ lumang, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri wili bii ɓarɛ ka gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ tùsù ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ tusu ri dɔɔli. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa rɛɛ waka nɛɛ ɓari nɛɛ gbanti sɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.)

A zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu kaɓa, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri pálɛ̀ vuu ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu kpang ka ruu viya? Ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ naa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu ruu kpang ka ruu viya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang kɔɔ ka yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, niizang kɔ nwani. Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ,
“ ‘Zang keɓe ri dɔɔ m ka nyaa lapa waati,
yeti ɓarɛ ɓi ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
Ri dɔɔ m ɓarɛ waati.
Ri tusu zang nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dangnɛ
kaa naa wukɔ Ruu Laa jong.’
“Nɔɔ yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɔɔ dṹng nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dang ɓɛɛ.”
A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɔɔ dũng ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dang ɓɛɛ dɔɔli.
Musa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu shing jĩng ka diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ’ nɛɛ ‘Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, zang wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka tipi tang.’
Nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ tɔɔ, ‘Zang nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔ diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ nɛɛ, ń a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛ̀ɛ́ á nɔɔ tɔ nandon. Vuu ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang,’
nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang tɔ nɛɛ zang wu shing jĩng tɔ̀ɔ́ ka daa zang nɛɛ naa zang kpang.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shing Ruu Laa nwang tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɔɔ dáa manɛ tusu ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe ti kagn dɔɔli. Nɔɔ tusu zang wu Ruu Laa kpang.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓasi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nandon nɔɔ tãayi, nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ daa ka yeti shɔnzang, ɓɔɔ raa shɔnzang wu nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa ɓi kagn kpang. Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang kɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa.
[Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.]”
A Yeesɔ naa yaa zang ka biling daa ka yeti gãa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ wu kɔɔ ri dĩiri yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ ta.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi kpang kɔ doori ya? Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ daa ka buru shɔnzang, ràa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa kpang, kpang ya?
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, daa ɓi ka ɓoro ɓiɓɛ kpang, daa ɓi ka buru ɓiɓɛ kɔ jong, wu naa nwang kaa nɛɛ dii.” (Yeesɔ kɔɔ naa weɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu zi kati nɛɛ vuu shaanang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon.)
A ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang, wukɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu naa, rɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang vuu shi kpang, rooronang nɛɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang gee ka takpang, shɔngɓɔ ɓɔɔnang, shɔnzang nyɔnang vɔrɔ, rooronang nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔgn,

kasɛnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang kpang nɛɛ gɔ̃ɔ kãanang, nɛɛ zang nwãarɛnang, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ palɛnang, nɛɛ sũnyaa kaanang, nɛɛ yee shi kpang rannang ka yuu zang, nɛɛ yuu tuunang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ naa shoko, nwáng ɓi nɛɛ yeti shɔnzang.
Vuu shi kpang keɓe, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti shɔnzang kɔ nandon. Rikɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa.”
A Yeesɔ naa seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Taya nɛɛ tipi Sidong. A daa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa, kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu zi nɛɛ wu ka nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ti naa zi ɓiri, nɛɛ wu kagn nɔngkɔ.
A jaa soro ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro, naa tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, a tantɛ anang naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.
Jaa soro keɓe ɓi zang Heleni. Zang yi wu ɓi ka tipi Fonishiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Siriya ɓɛɛ. A gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu nwángsɛ̀ wu suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii jaa ɓiɓɛ jong.
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Rúu a wujɛ kɔ vuu shaanang shɔɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang tuu vuu shaanang wujɛ zang tasɛ zaa kpang.”
A jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ nɔngkɔ niizang, zaa ɓɔɔ ka dii teeburu, ri yakɛ kɔkɔlɔ borodi ɓɔɔ shili nɛɛ naa wujɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ m naa weɓe ɓɛɛ, gbãayu ta mɔɔ daa gãa, suru shi kpang yàa jaa ɓaaɓɛ bii tɔ.”
A jaa soro gbãayu daa ĩi jaa ɓiɓɛ roo tɔ ka latãng, suru shi kpang nwang tɔ yaa wu bii tɔ.
A Yeesɔ yaa tipi Taya, nɛɛ wu daa kaa nyaa waapo Galili a sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Sidong nɛɛ tipi Dekapoli (rɛɛ gari kopi).
A zang atɛ wu zang shoo nɔɔ katɔ, a ti ráng nyaa rũntung. A ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu shing wu naa ka bii, tɔ̀ɔ, wu masɛ wu kati.
A Yeesɔ naa gɔ̃ɔ wu ka bm dang gbete, a hãlɛ saa naa ka shoo yɔɔ, a tu sisãa, a lee rĩiti yɔɔ nɛɛ mani.
A Yeesɔ tuu jĩng ka lapa a shu gn, a kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ “Efata,” (Dĩiri ruu keɓe ɓi, “Lu ta.”)
Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a shoo yɔɔ luku kati. Rĩiti ɓiɓɛ ti ɓele, a gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang tɔ̃ɔ kati.
A Yeesɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Yeesɔ nɛɛ, shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang, ri ti daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓarɛ kaa gbãng gbãng kɔ jong.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu kaɓa, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon. Pálɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ shoo nɔɔ katɔ wu tãa nɔng. A zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ti rang yee.”
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔgn, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, vuu ɓɔɔ ri shaa ɓɛɛ takpang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
“Zang keɓe gn ɓarɛ kɔng m dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ n daa diki taati, vuu shaanang ɓarɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.
Naa n jee ri nyaa nɛɛ ri dita gãa, ri shaa vuu ka nyaa kpang, doo daa kaa ri katɔ ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri álɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔng beebang ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “A ruu walɛ borodi ka niya ka jĩngti keɓe, ruu a zang keɓe naa ɓɔɔ daa ri katɔ wiya?”
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ yaa nɛya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yaa manziti.”

A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɛɛ ri nwálɛ́ ta tipi. A see borodi manziti kaɓa, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri alɛ zang kati.
A jaazĩi seseere ti yaa doogn ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ tɔkɔlɔng. A Yeesɔ ti zãa Kpanti Laa ka ruu jaazĩi kaɓa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta kɔ doori.
Zang keɓe piti, ri shaa vuu shaanang, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti, saang manziti.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ri labang dɛ̃ɛti.
A jee ri nyaa kati, a vang tonsi kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang daa ka tipi Damanuta.

A zang Farisi ri arɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri gãsɛ wu katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa.
A Yeesɔ shu gn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang koo jaa knti keɓe, nɔɔ kasɛ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu viya? N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, n tusu nɔɔ kpang.”
A yáa ri ka nɔngkɔ, vang tonsi tɔkn, ta mii waapo daa ka nyaa gãnggãng dang.
Danggn ning zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ katɔ, ri tuu borodi ka naa kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ yaa ka yeti tonsi gbete ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Ri daa kana, a Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu shaarɛ ri nyaa ɓɛɛ kati, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yisi ɓɔɔ zang Farisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Hiridu ning.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ. Ri tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ rang ruu yee keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, borodi ka naa ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ka naa ɓarɛ ɓii tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓu ka ruu vi, nɛɛ borodi ka naa manɛ kpang viya?” Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya? Nɔɔ zi dĩiri vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu nɔɔ kpang ya?
Jĩng manɛ kagn, nɔɔ zi nɔng kpang ya? Shoo manɛ kagn, nɔɔ tãa nɔng kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpaa danggn,
ka diki ɓɔɔ n á zang labang maani borodi maani kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti, saang nɛya? A ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “saang kopi tu ziti.”
A borodi manziti ɓɔɔ n á zang labang dɛ̃ɛti, nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ saang nɛya? Ri ti kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Saang manziti.”
A ti naa hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya?”
Ri naa a ka Bɛsɛda. Zang atɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ jĩng ringtang, a zang gaa wu, nɛɛ wu lee wu naa ka bii, tɔɔ wu masɛ wu kati.
A Yeesɔ yi zang jĩng ringtang ka naa, daa nɛɛ wu ka knti gari. A Yeesɔ tu sisãa ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ, a lee naa ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kana ya?”
A zang jĩng ringtang kaɓa tuu jĩng, a kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi zang ri rakɛ kana, ri nwang kaa naa laa.”
A Yeesɔ lee naa kaa tɔkn jĩng yɔɔ, jĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓele kati, a zi vuu piti kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati, nɛɛ wu dita gãa. A shaarɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, mɔɔ daa yeti gari takpang.

A Yeesɔ ti yi gbalang daanang ɓi kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Kayisariya Filipi ɓɛɛ. Ri daa kana, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔɔ, “Zang kɔɔ nɛɛ N ɓu wiya?”

A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Iliya. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nkɔ wiya?” Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi.”
A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi kpang.

Yeesɔ gaa ri tɔɔsung vuu tusunang tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ n Jaa shɔnzang n naa dang jĩng ditɔ dɔɔli. Zang bang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri naa bɛ̃ɛ m ditɔ. Zang naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ, Laa naa wisi m paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kpang, kɔɔ ri waati, naa ɓɔɔ ri zi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bituru gɔ̃ɔ wu dang gbete, a mangkɛ wu.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ raa jĩng zi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu doo ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ, a mangkɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Dita kaɓa sheetang. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ kpang, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu laa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang naa ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ, wu dũng m.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A Zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, wukɔ naa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi jong.
Naa shɔnzang wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon, a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu ɓɔ̀ɔ́ koo keɓe nwáng wu ɓu viya?
Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kɔ̃sɔ suru bii ɓiɓɛ nɔng kagn ya?

Shɔnzang piti ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ruu mɛɛ, nɛɛ tuuru wu ka tĩng zang shi kpang kɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓee. Jaa Shɔnzang naa tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa a nɛɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ a wu ɓɛɛ. Ti naa a nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ning ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang kɔ ri shiiri ɓee, ri zǐ Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri vɔrɛ.”
Diki mangbete naa ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ see rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakub, a ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ bee dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A bii Yeesɔ risi kaa náa ɓɔɔgn ka jĩng ɓarɛ.
Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ risi nwáng kaa puru shãa shãa. Zang fɔ̃ɔrɔ sɔɔnang ɓɔɔ sɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ wu puu naa weɓe kagn koo keɓe kpang.
A ri zi Iliya nɛɛ Musa, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee ruu ka nihn wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, ruu waa putali taati ka nihn, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.”
Bituru kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ takpang, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔɔli.
A sãmbong arɛ naa zuu ri kati. Ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong tɔɔ, “Wee jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãng gbãng kɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
Ɓɔɔ ri raa jĩng hn, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ takpang, ri zi kaa Yeesɔ kɔ nɛɛ ri gbete.
Ri shóorò doo naa nɛɛ kɔpɔ, Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ kpang, Laa nɛɛ wisi Jaa Shɔnzang paa tɔ ka vɔrɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang kati.”
Ri vɔ̃ nyaa kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Laa naa wisi wu paa ditɔ ka vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Iliya kɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi wu arɛ viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Iliya kɔ a shɔɔnang niizang, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shĩili vuu ka tɔkn waasɛ̃. A ti hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, a ka ruu vi zang beeyi tɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa dang jĩng ditɔ, zang ti naa bɛ̃ɛ wu viya?
N kɔɔ nɔɔ Iliya a tɔ, ri palɛ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ. Ri palɛ wu naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ.”
Ri naa a tɔ bii zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ka bii ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ti laa nyaa kana nɛɛ ri.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ hn, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, a ri yurɛ ri daa kpisi wu yuu ri jee wu nyaa kati.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rangkɛ ɓu ruu vi nɛɛ ri viya?”
Zang gbete ka yeti zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, n atɛ mɔɔ jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nɔɔ wu nyaa katɔ, rang yee takpang ɓɛɛ.

Nɔng ɓɔɔ naa mã wu kagn, loo wu ka tipi. Puru ti pú wu nɛɛ nyaa kpung, kpung. Wu ti sháa tãri kpaaka, kpaaka. Wu ti shiiri wu gbatagbata. N gaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang keɓe, ri zunung kpang.”

A Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓee, nɔɔ nɛɛ ń nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ n mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ atɛ m jaa bìí ta.”
A ri atɛ wu jaa kati. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang zi Yeesɔ hn, mã jaa, jaa watɛ ka tipi. Jaa jĩiri ka tipi, puru pu jaa nɛɛ nyaa kpung, kpung.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ daa jaa tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ kɔnang keɓe gaa wu yuu bee tɔ ya?” A kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Gaa wu yuu bee doo tɔkɔlɔng.”
“Diki ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn loo wu ka waa, diki ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn ti loo wu ka mii, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. Mɔɔ nɛɛ zunung katɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ, mɔɔ yi ruu naa kagn, mɔɔ màsɛ̀ ruu wu.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, mɔkɔ nɛɛ zunung danggn shinnang katɔ jong. Zang piti ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa wu ɓi kagn kpang.
A dáa jaa mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tantɛnang tɔɔ, “N shing danggn tɔ, yi m naa kagn. N shing danggn ka bii ɓaaɓɛ gbãng gbãng.”

A ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ gaagaa ri yuku ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, mangkɛ suru shi kpang, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kɔ nɔɔ jaa nyaa nɛɛ shoo ɓee, n kɔɔ mɔɔ nwang ta mɔɔ yaa wu bii. Mɔɔ paasɛ anang tɔ̀ɔ́ bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”

A suru shi kpang mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a mã jaa tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ, a nwangnɛ yàa jaa bii kati. Jaa roo ka tipi ɓoromang naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri kɔɔyi tɔ jaa vɔ tɔ.
A Yeesɔ yi jaa ka naa, a yì jaa naa ka bii, a jaa seepaa kati.
Yeesɔ daa tɔ ka yeti gãa ka bm, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung nwangsɛnang ɓuru kpang ka ruu viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nwáng ɓi jong waati kpang, zang nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ Laa gaanang.”
A Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, ri naa sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Galili. Yeesɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang gbete wu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ vuu ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang naa tuu Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ, zang a zang. Ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Zang nɛɛ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ, Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi dĩiri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri tɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu, ri kaa vɔrɔ.
Ri naa a tɔ ka Kafanahu, Yeesɔ naa hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wu nwang kagn tɔɔ, “Ɓaasi nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓu nɛɛ vi ka gbalang viya?”
Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ ɓu wi bang ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya ɓɛɛ?
A Yeesɔ nwang ka tipi, kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang, wukɔ wu risi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa zang wujaa ɓɔɔ palɛ zang shonang jong.”
A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka jaa tɔkɔlɔng, a shing ka teteng ɓarɛ. A naa tuu jaa kaɓa ka naa ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ta jaa ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ka nung mɛɛ, tà nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti ta m, ta ɓi nkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ta m nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ ning.”
Yɔhana kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ, a ruu zãa wu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ zãa wu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ti raa nyaa tantɛnang, wu naa rang yee shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ tɔkn kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru katɔ, wukɔ zang ɓuru.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a nɔɔ mii ɓoonang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓaa nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Kirisi ɓɛɛ, naa ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ ditɔ.

“Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere kɔ ri shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ ɓee, palɛ vuu shi kpang, jĩng ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa naa dangnɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ mã ree bang ka turu ɓiɓɛ, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti mii waapo katɔ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng katɔ, mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ naa dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ naa ziti ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti waa bang ɓɔɔ ning kpang ɓɛɛ. [
Ka nɔng kaɓa, jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa ɓɔɔ ti shaa ri zang ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.]

Doo ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ doo dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ doo ziti ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. [
Ka nɔng kaɓa jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa ɓɔɔ ti shaa ri zang ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.]

Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zɔ̃ng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti nɛɛ jĩng dang gbete gbã̀ágbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ jĩng ɓaaɓɛ ziti piti ka waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka nɔng kaɓa, jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa bìí zang ti ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
“Zang naa raa zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ waa, naa ɓɔɔ zang raa vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ tãa ɓɛɛ.
“Tãa ɓi tɔ̃ɔ. Naa lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang palɛ bɛɛ nɛɛ mani wu la tɔkn viya? Tãa ɓɔɔ shing zang, nɛɛ zang nwáng ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu nwang ka bii manɛ ning. Nɔɔ ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zɔɔ.”
A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Yahudi, a ta rang Urudung. A zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kaa tɔkn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri vuu kaa naa ɓasidi ɓɛɛ.
Zang Farisi ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri naa gãsɛ wu. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa dang nɔɔ nyaa ɓu nɛɛ viya?”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu bee zang soro labeenang soro hinnang, zang a wu tɔ̀ɔ zang yaa wu naa kati.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Musa bee nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tà vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe mãanang, ‘Laa mãa zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro.’
‘Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang varɛ yaa diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, ɓakɛ zɔɔ kaa nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ri ziti ri nwang kaa bii gbete.’ Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɔ̀ɔ́ ziti kpang, ri kaa bii gbete.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ ɓákɛ́ tɔ, shɔnzang wu basɛ takpang.”
Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu keɓe kaa tɔkn.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwangsɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, a shing ɓɔɔgn, palɛ soro ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang vuu shi kpang.
Zang soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yupaa gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ, a daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn, palɛ ɓi vuu dũndũng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn kaɓa.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ Yeesɔ wujɛ seseere nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu, tɔɔ wu ti gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ kati.

Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa wu dɔɔli, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ seseere ka nɔngkɔ ri a ka bii mɛɛ, nɔ́ɔ zãa ri anang kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Laa nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng kpang, Laa naa nwang Kpanti ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
A see ri, shing ri naa ka yuu, a gaa ri Laa kati.
Yeesɔ yi gbalang daanang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, daa kana, a jaa varɛ ɓɔɔ yurɛ naa tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, n palɛ vi tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a m suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu viya?” Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang, ɓi Kpanti Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete.

Mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ, Laa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ palɛ vuu dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ suu sèé ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang, mɔɔ mulu zang kpang. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa daaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ naaɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”
A yɔɔ kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, n gaayu jĩng shinnang ka nyaa kɔ Laa dang ɓee nandon, bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo tɔkɔlɔng.”

Yeesɔ shu wu jĩng tɔ ka bii, kasɛ wu kati. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ shing jĩng tɔ ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ niizang, yaa mɔɔ vuu gbete. Dita, mɔɔ daa mãlɛ̀ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, saka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ mãlɛ́ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng m.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ yɔɔ tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, kãngtɛ waa nyaating, a yaa Yeesɔ daa kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng pɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti kagn naa kpãa zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn daanang ɓi dɔɔli.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Wujɛ mɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ daanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti, kpãa nyaa dɔɔli.”
Daanang zang vuu naa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpãa nyaa bang. Kpãayi ɓa ɓɔɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ hòlòng ɓù nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ.
Ruu kaɓa kpãa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ dɔɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A ɓu wi naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang gbete wiya?”
Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zunung palɛnang kpang, Laa zunung ɓi katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zunung vuu piti palɛnang ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa vuu ɓuru nandon ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ diiɓɛ, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tipi ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa,

naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ ditɔ ka koo keɓe. Naa walɛ gãa nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ tipi dakn laa maani. Zang ti naa dang wu jĩng ditɔ dɔɔli, ti naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ditɔ.
Zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa waa nyaa knti. Zang kɔ ri ka knti kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa sɔɔ zang tĩng kaa jong.”

Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa kana Urushalima, Yeesɔ ti ka tĩng ɓarɛ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ doo naa ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ túsú ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũuru ri ka knti, ri kaa vɔrɔ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa kaa dang gbete tɔkn, a gaa ri tɔɔsung vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ wu kɔɔnang kati.

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi. Ruu dáa kana Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ naa a zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ. Ri naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri tuu wu ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kati.
Ri naa kpaa wu, ri ti naa tùlù wu sisãa ka bii. Ri naa nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. Kpanti Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
A Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana, wujɛ Zebedi ri a ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa mɔɔ katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓu viya?”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ wee ruu ziti ɓɛɛ, zang gbete wu naa nwang ka naa nakn ɓaaɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwang ɓi ka naa nagang ɓaaɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gàá ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ naa zunung jĩng dannang katɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ n naa dang ɓɛɛ ya? Zang naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima katɔ nɛɛ jĩng dannang naa ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ m ɓɛɛ ya?”
A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung katɔ.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ n dang ɓi katɔ, zang ti naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima ɓɔɔ zang palɛ m ɓi katɔ.
Ɓɔɔ nwannang manɛ ka naa nakn nɛɛ naa nagang mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ a zang naa kpang. Nɔng nwannang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ kopi, ri tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana dɔɔli.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang bang bang ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zirɛ nɛɛ rikɔ zang bang.
Ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang ka teteng manɛ, wukɔ wu nwáng zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ nɔɔ shonang ɓɛɛ jong.
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwáng ka tĩng, wukɔ wu nwáng jaafoo manɛ jong.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang àrɛ́ nɛɛ zang shòng wukɔ shonang kpang, àrɛ́ nɛɛ wu shong zang katɔ kɔ jong. Wu ti mã̀lɛ̀ yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu zang dɔɔli nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.”

Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, ri a ka Jeriko. Ɓɔɔ ri seepaa daanang kati nɛɛ Jeriko, Batimawu jaa Timawu ɓɔɔ jĩng ringtang ɓɛɛ, nwang ka nyaa gbalang gaa vuu.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Batimawu tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara kɔ tɛɛ gbalang, a gaa tɔɔsung nyaa mɛɛrɛnang kati tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
Zang dɔɔli ri mangkɛ wu, ri kɔɔ wu, nɛɛ wu vɔ̃ nyaa ta. A mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nyaa ɓi kaa nabm kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A Yeesɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu ɓaa wu nyaa ta. A zang ɓaa zang jĩng ringtang kaɓa nyaa kati. Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ loo danggn kpang. Seepaa ta, ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa kana.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Batimawu tãa naa weɓe, tasɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu zuu sɔɔrɔ nɛɛ mani, a ta ka lapa, a daa ka bii Yeesɔ.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n palɛ mɔɔ viya?” A zang ringtang kaɓa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, n kasɛ nɛɛ n zi nɔng tɔkn.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita, danggn ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa, masɛ mɔɔ tɔ,” A tantɛ nɔng kaa zinang tɔkn. A dũng Yeesɔ kaa knti.
Ri a tɔ ka Urushalima naabm, ri ka gari Bɛtafaji nɛɛ Bɛtani ɓɔɔ ri ka doo Kɔpɔ Zeetung ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita gari tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka tĩng manɛ ɓa. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa ka yeti gari hn, nɔɔ daa ĩi jaa seesaa zang mã ka laa, ɓɔɔ zang vang gngn kpang ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Nɔɔ kã̀lɛ́ nɔɔ a nɛɛ mani.
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ palɛ veɓe ka ruu viya?’ Nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti Yeesɔ kasɛ katɔ. Sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ nɔɔ ditɔ tantɛnang.’ ”
A ri daayi, ri daa ĩi jaa seesaa shii tɔ ka nyaa gbalang, zang mã ka nyaa gãa. A ri kãlɛ kati.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔngkɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kã̀lɛ́ jaa seesaa kiɓi ka ruu viya?”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati. Ri yaa ri, ri kãlɛ jaa seesaa, ri daa kaa nɛɛ mani.
Ri atɛ Yeesɔ jaa seesaa kati. Ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, a Yeesɔ vangnɛ, nwang kagn.
Zang dɔɔli ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka gbalang, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti wɔɔrɔ ɓarɛ nasãng laa ɓɔɔ gɔpɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɔɔ ri kakɛ nɛɛ nyaa jaa ɓɛɛ.
Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng Yeesɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ti dũng wu ka knti, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana lapa nɛɛ,
“Zang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ta.
Laa a zang ɓɔɔ a ka
nung ɓiɓɛ tĩnnang tãanang tɔ.
Kpanti ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng daa ɓuru Dawuda
naa rooyi, Laa wu shingnɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang wu ti dɔɔ
Kpanti Laa ta.”
Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima tɔ, a daa ka yeti Gãa Laa. A pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu tɔ nandon, a naa nwangnɛ daa ka gari Bɛtani nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa hãa nyaa kana ɓɛɛ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, ri a kana nɛɛ Bɛtani, a nyɔkɔ nyɔ Yeesɔ kati.

Zi laa sĩiri ɓɔɔ tu gɔpɔ gaagaa nɛɛ nɔng beebang, a daayi nɛɛ wu daa hã jaa ɓiɓɛ. Ɓɔɔ naa a tɔ doo ɓiɓɛ, a ĩi jaa sĩiri ka laa kpang, gɔpɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu diki ɓɔɔ laa sĩiri ra jaa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
A ku laa sĩiri nyaa ka bii tɔɔ, “Zang wu naa walɛ jĩng laa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn kpang.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kati.

Ri naa a tɔ ka Urushalima, a Yeesɔ naa tu ka yeti Gãa Laa. A gaa tɔɔsung hingkinang zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu ka yeti Gãa Laa kati. A ti zĩili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ saka nɛɛ nɔng nwannang zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ ning koro ɓɛɛ.
Kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tuu vuu wu sɔɔ yeti Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani kpang.

A tusu zang vuu, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ‘Gãa mɛɛ zang naa ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ, Gãa Laa gaanang zang koolaa piti kpang ya?’ Nɔɔ raayi nwang kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ ka ruu viya?”

A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tãayi, a ri gaa tɔɔsung gbalang ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kãanang kati. Ri kaa vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ piti, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
Laa naa hãa nyaa tɔ, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri nwangkɛ ka nɛɛ yeti gari.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, ri gbãayu kana, a ri zi laa sĩiri ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ku wu nyaa ka bii, vɔ tɔ nɛɛ yuu paa daa ka dĩiri ɓiɓɛ nandon.
A Bituru naa kpaa danggn, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zirɛ, laa sĩiri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ ku wu nyaa ka bii vɔ tɔ!”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa ning.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, yaa danggn naa kpang, shing danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ. Naa zang kaɓa kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe nɛɛ, ‘Ruu ta nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa watɛ ka mii waapo, Laa naa pàlɛ́ wu katɔ.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayi, nɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ tɔ, Laa a nɔɔ katɔ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ gaa Laa, nɔɔ yàá zang ɓɔɔ palɛ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang gbalang katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Daa manɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, wu yàa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kaa jong.” [
Naa nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa yàa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ doo kpang kɔ.]
A ri naa a kaa tɔkn ka Urushalima. Yeesɔ ra kana yeti Gãa Laa, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nandon nɛɛ naa kiya? Ɓu wi a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang wiya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete, nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ m tɔ, n ti kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, ɓu wi a Yɔhana naa batizima ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ zang wiya? Laa a wu yaa, kɔ shɔnzang a wu? Nɔɔ kɔɔ m ta.”
A ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri tɔɔ, “Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ Laa a wu, naa hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ, ‘A ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shing danggn ka yuu Yɔhana kpang viya?
Rúu ti kɔɔ wu kpang nɛɛ, shɔnzang a wu kpang.’ ” (Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa).
A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi kpang.” A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani doo kpang kɔ.”

A Yeesɔ rang ri yee kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn shɔlɔ laa inabi ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a mang gbãng ɓee nyaa jaa nɔng kiiri, kiiri. Ti palɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kãng jĩng laa inabi kagn, a ti waa putali ɓɔɔ zang shii kagn zang gãng jĩng ka jaa ɓɛɛ. A yàa zang nɛɛ ri gãng jĩng kagn. Seepaa daa zanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn.
Diki jĩng laa inabi hãnang naa raa bii, a yɔɔ naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang ɓiɓɛ gbete a shong wu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa, nɛɛ wu daa ta wu jĩng laa ka naa ɓarɛ.
Ri yi zang shonang yɔɔ, ri nyɔ wu, a ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati.
A yɔɔ jaa ti paasɛ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn shonang tɔkn. Ri shing wu nyaa vuu waa ka yuu, a ri pàlɛ́ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ.
A yɔɔ ti naa shong zang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn, a ri ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa shongko zang nɔngkɔ gaagaa, ri nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa waati, a ri ti nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ ka tipi.
“Zang ɓɔɔ naa wu shongnɛ, yaa kaa jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A naa shong kaa wukɔ nɛɛ knti, nɛɛ naa kasɛ, ri tãa kaa nyaa jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.

“Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa ri jaa ka naa ri zi jaa yɔɔ a kana, ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, ‘Wee jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɔɔ a ta, ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ wu nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓuru.’
A ri seepaa, ri yi jaa yɔɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ri daa tasɛ wu ka nyaa jaa biling.

“A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri tɔɔ, ‘Naa yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa arɛ, palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓiɓɛ ka naa biya?’ Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ka naa kaɓa vɔrɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu yàa zang ɓɔɔgn jaa kati.’
A Yeesɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ,
“ ‘Nɔɔ gã yee keɓe gngn kpang ya?
Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ Tari ɓɔɔ zang jaka mãanang ri bɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ naa ràa tari ɓɔɔ yiti jaka ɓɛɛ kati.
Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ veɓe. Ɓɔɔ jĩng ɓuru, ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.’ ”

Zang bang bang, zang Yahudi nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ rang nyaa vuu jeenang ɓiɓɛ ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri yaa wu, ri daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
A ri shong zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng knti kpanti Hiridu, nɛɛ ri daa yi wu ka yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.

A ri arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi tɔ mɔɔ suu sèé ɓaa kpang, ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ mung zang ɓaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tusu zang ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ruu jong, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu shu kpanti Kayisa saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀sɛ́ m ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ atɛ m dinari karɛ n zirɛ.”
A ri atɛ wu gbete. A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔ̀ɔ́ kpanti Kayisa.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kayisa, nɔɔ a wu, nɔɔ ti a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓiɓɛ.” Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
A zang Saduki ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa ɓi tɔɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu.
Ri tɔɔ, “Musa bee ruu tɔɔ, zang nɛɛ vɔrɛ, nɛɛ yaa soro ɓiɓɛ jaa kagn kpang, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu yi ɓeezung jaa.
Zang varɛ ɓɔɔgn, nàá ɓarɛ yi ri manziti. Jamari shing soro, a vɔrɛ yaa soro, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang. A ɓeezung ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, naa sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ, a ti vɔrɛ, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang.
A zang ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn zang ɓɔɔ doo knti kaɓa, ti vɔrɛ, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang.
Dɔ̃lɔ nɔngkɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ zang manziti kaɓa nandon, ri yiki jaa nɛɛ wu kpang. A jaa soro kaɓa naa vɔ kaa nɛɛ knti.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, jaa soro kaɓa naa nwang ɓu kaa soro wi ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shĩili wu katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi labeenang Laa, nɛɛ náa ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani kpang ɓɛɛ.
Laa nɛɛ wisi zang paa tɔ nɛɛ saa, zang shing soro ɓi takpang. Zang ti naa a zang wujɛ soro ɓi takpang nɛɛ zang gee ri kpang. Zang naa nwalɛ ɓi ka naa zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.

“Ka ruu zang paa wisinang nɛɛ saa, nɔɔ gã gngn ka yeti labeenang Musa kpang ya? Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang bèe ruu waa ɓɔɔ shaa jaa laa ɓɛɛ. Zang bee ka nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, Laa kɔɔ Musa tɔɔ, wukɔ Laa Ibirayi, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ishaaku, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yakubu.

Zang keɓe ri vɔlɔ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, wee Laa ɓàa yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu Laa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ zang wísí ri paa tɔ nɛɛ saa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi Làá zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ kpang, ɓi Làá zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ dòndòng.”

A shɔnzang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, arɛ naa ĩi ri, ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, a ti tãa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ zang nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ka teteng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓu wi bang wiya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ bang, wukɔ tɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta zang Isirela, Kpanti Laa ɓuru wukɔ Laa gbete.
Mɔ́ɔ kasɛ Kpanti Laa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ kaka ɓaaɓɛ nandon.’
Ɓɔɔ ɓang knti ɓiɓɛ keɓe ‘Mɔ́ɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.’ Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ weɓe kagn kpang.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu kaɓa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ, maalang. Naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi niizang kɔ. Kpanti Laa wukɔ Laa gbete, Laa ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang, wukɔ gbete.

Laa kasɛ, nɛɛ zang wu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yeti gbete, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ kaka ɓiɓɛ nandon, zang wu ti kasɛ shɔnzang doo naa ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ yuu zang kɔ. Nyaa dannang keɓe dũnnang, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔrɔ Laa vuu katɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ zũnang ning, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta Laa wu nwang Kpanti ɓaaɓɛ kaa tɔkɔlɔng.” Zang ɓɔɔ naa paasɛ wu ruu hɛ̃ɛnang ɓɔɔgn takpang.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu doo naa ka Gãa Laa, a hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri kɔɔ ɓu ka ruu vi nɛɛ Kirisi jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda viya?
Suru Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Dawuda tɔɔ,
“ ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ Kpanti mɛɛ tɔɔ,
“Nwang ka naa nakn mɛɛ,
n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng
nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ, mɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ
doo ɓaaɓɛ.” ’
Dawuda nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kpanti, ráa jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa biya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, ri ɓaa shoo kaa ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tĩnang tãanang ning.
Ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang vuu doo naa, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ ning. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rakɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ beebang, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang jeere ri nyaa ka lumang.
Ri ti kasɛ nwannang ka nɔng tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shĩili zang bang bang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn, zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
Ri mulu suvɔ, ri talɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nandon. Ri ti gaa Laa sasak nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi ri kati. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa dang ri naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti katɔ.”
Yeesɔ nwang tɔ naabm ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang looro saka kagn ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, pɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang looro saka ɓɛɛ. Zang vuu naa, ri dɔɔli, ri looro saka kana gaagaa.
A suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang arɛ naa loo saka tɔkɔlɔng.

Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, suvɔ kɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓee, vuu ɓɔɔ looyi kɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri looro saka ka nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri nwangsɛ saka ɓarɛ ka yeti vuu naa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kpang keɓe, atɛ ɓi vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu wàlɛ́ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani kɔ nwani nandon.”
Ɓɔɔ wu nwang doo naa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, zi tari kɔ jĩng lòonang kagn kpang, nɛɛ gãa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang mãarɛ ɓee.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi gãa kɔ zang mãarɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓee tɔ waa? Zang naa yaa tari ɓɔɔ pãng ka yuu zɔɔ gbete kpang. Zang naa jili ɓi ditɔ ka tipi nandon.”
Yeesɔ naa nwang tɔ ka tipi, ka Kɔpɔ Zeetung, raa jĩng ka Gãa Laa ka dang. Bituru nɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana, a ɓɔɔ Anduru ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu bɛ̀ɛ́ wu ka bm.
Ri tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ ɓɛɛ jong. Ɓu vi naa tùsú ruu nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe palɛ kagn a tɔ viya?”
A Yeesɔ gaa ri tɔɔsung ruu kɔɔnang kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwãarɛ nɔɔ”
Zang dɔɔli naa a ditɔ nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ri naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ “Rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ” Ri nwãarɛ zang dɔɔli.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ tãayi zang nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang takɛ sĩiri ka nɔng naabm, nɛɛ ruu sĩiri ɓɔɔ zang ta kpala kpala, bii wu sɔɔ nɔɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe naa palɛ ɓi ditɔ, ɓi gn diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zang tipi ɓɔɔgn ri naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔgn, wu ti naa gaa nyaa nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn. Tipi naa ruutu ditɔ ka tipi koolaa dɔɔli, nyɔkɔ ti naa nwang ditɔ. Vuu keɓe ɓi doo jĩng dannang gaayu, naa ɓɔɔ jaa gaa zang yuu kɔnang ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang naa a nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang naa nyɔ nɔɔ ditɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi. Zang naa atɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka tĩng rɛɛ gɔmna nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ka ruu mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ kɔɔ ri Ruu Laa kati.
Zang naa rǎng zang ɓɔɔ ka rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ditɔ gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, koo wu naa waa nyaa kati.

Zang nɛɛ atɛ nɔɔ tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kɔɔ zang ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi nɔkɔ rang yee kpang, ɓi Suru Laa rang nɛɛ nyaa manɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang naa a zang rɛɛ ɓeezung ditɔ nɛɛ zang wu nyɔ vɔrɔ. Daa zang, ri ti naa a zang wujɛ ɓarɛ ditɔ nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ. Wujɛ ri ti naa shii varɛ ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi ri ɓɛɛ, ri shingnɛ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ.
Zang piti, ri ti naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka ruu mɛɛ, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ mã danggn sasak wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.
“Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu baabii shíi tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ daa ɓɔɔ wu shii kagn kpang, [zang ɓɔɔ gã vuu keɓe, wu zi kati.] Zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudi ri yurɛ, ri daa ka kɔpɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu sãa wu shooro nɛɛ wu dàa ya vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka jaa wu ti gbãayu tɔ̀ɔ́, nɛɛ wu naa tuu fɔ̃ɔrɔ bii zuunang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang soro ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa ka naa ka diki kaɓa, ri naa nwáng vuu gn kɔnang.
Nɔɔ gaa Laa nɛɛ, vuu keɓe wu palɛ nɛɛ gãmbang guusi kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jĩng dannang bang kagn diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Zang zi jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka koo keɓe doo gbete kpang. Zang naa paasɛ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe zinang ti takpang.
Kpanti Laa nɛɛ sɔɔrɔ diki keɓe ka knti tɔkɔlɔng kpang, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wɔ kagn gbete gãagãa kpang. Kpanti Laa naa sɔ́ɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, Kirisi kagn nihn, kɔ ka kaaɓa, nɔ́ɔ yee laa manɛ kagn kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kirisi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa suu sèé nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shonang Laa, naa alɛ ditɔ. Ri naa tusu vuu bang bang, ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ ri nwãarɛ zang kati. Naa ri nɛɛ zunung zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nwãarɛnang katɔ, ri nɛ̀ɛ́ nwãarɛ ri katɔ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ piti ka tĩng.
“Jĩng dannang kaɓa nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, laa kɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓee, naa tɔ̀ɔ́ katɔ. Shala ti naa yakɛ nɔng takpang.
Sang ri ti naa shili nɛɛ lapa. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ka lapa ti naa rùutú katɔ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa zi Jaa Shɔnzang kati ka ɓɔɔ wu a ka yeti sãmbong, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Wu naa shong zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kati, ri kpàlɛ̀ wu zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ ka dĩiri koo piti.
“Nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii laa sĩiri. Nasãng laa sĩiri nɛɛ lɔɔ gɔpɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ shɔɔ nɛɛ lusu kana, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee, nɛɛ palɛ kina naa weɓe, nɔɔ zí katɔ nɛɛ diki Jaa Shɔnzang a naabm tɔ gbang gbang.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe naa palɛ ditɔ niizang gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo jaa knti keɓe, naa ɓa kati.
Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa shaarɛ ditɔ, ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang.
“Zang ɓɔɔ zi diki nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kagn gbete kpang. Zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Laa piti, ruu zi kpang, Kpanti Laa kɔ zi gbete.
Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi diki kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.

Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang gbãayu kagn, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu daa zanti, yáa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka naa zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Basɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ ka knti ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. A ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka nyaa gãa, nɛɛ wu gãng jĩng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Gãng jĩng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi diki ɓɔɔ yɔɔ gãa naa gbãayu kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɛɛ laarang ya, nɛɛ teteng gãmbang ya, kɔ naa ɓɔɔ kn gaayu nyaa ɓaanang ya, kɔ nɛɛ gãndi zang zang ya, nɔɔ zi kpang.
Naa yɔɔ nwang nyaa wɔɔli, wu naa ĩi nɔɔ, nɔɔ roo katɔ kpang.
Vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee, n kɔɔ zang piti. Nɔɔ shing jĩng kagn tɔ̃ɔ.”

Diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, yaa kaa ziti. A rɛɛ zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri naa yi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu pálɛ̀ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ.”

Diki ɓɔɔgn Yeesɔ shaa vuu shaanang kana ka Bɛtani, ka gãa Siman ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ vuu bii shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A jaa soro ɓɔɔgn a nɛɛ nung tũurunang ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ naadi ɓɛɛ, ka zàáng, a puuyi tungku Yeesɔ ka yuu.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa ri dɔɔli. Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang làsɛ́ nung keɓe ka ruu viya?”
Zang nɛɛ tɔɔ zang mãlɛ́ nung keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ ɓa dinari laa maani dakn taati katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nɛɛ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, saka bii kati. A ri mangkɛ jaa soro kati.
Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa jaa soro ka nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kongso wu ka ruu viya?” Pàlɛ́ m vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki diki. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ piti nɔɔ naa pàlɛ́ ri tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ditɔ, n nwáng m nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak kpang.
Palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ wu zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tũuru m ɓi kaa nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ naa tũuru vɔrɔ mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang gbãa kati kɔ nwani.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa rang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kagn koo keɓe piti, zang naa kɔɔ ruu vuu kɔ jaa soro keɓe pàlɛ̀ m ɓee ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ ning zang ɓɛɛ.
A Yahuda Isikariyoti, zang gbete ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, daa ka bii zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ.
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ri naa a wu saka. A Yahuda gaa tɔɔsung gbalang kãanang naa ɓɔɔ wu naa nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kati.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gaayu nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang shaanang, diki ɓɔɔ zang yele mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu daa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa shaa ka nyaalaa ka niya?”
A shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita yeti gari, nɔɔ daa ɓee yuu ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tuu mii ka bɛng. Nɔɔ dũng wu.
Gãa ɓɔɔ wu hãa nyaa kagn, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang gãa kaɓa nɛɛ ‘Maalang tɔɔ, yeti gãa roonang ɓɔɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kiya?’
Tusu nɔɔ ka gãa lapa ɓɔɔ bang, ɓɔɔ zang shĩili laa nwannang tɔ kagn tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Nɔɔ shĩili ruu vuu shaanang nyaalaa ka nɔngkɔ.”
A zang ziti kaɓa, ri seepaa, ri daa gari kati. A ri daa zi vuu piti kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A ri shĩili vuu shaanang nyaalaa kati.
Kaa nɛɛ laarang, Yeesɔ naa a kaa nɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Rí shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ ditɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang kana nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli. Zang ɓu gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kati nɛɛ, “Nkɔ ya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ hãa naa kana yeti gbanti gbete nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ.
Jaa Shɔnzang naa vɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Jĩng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛ̀ɛ́ yi zang kaɓa kpang kɔ gbã̀ágbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ daa wu.”
Rí shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ tuu borodi, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tá ta, nɔɔ shaayi, wee yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ kɔ.”
A ti tuu juwa, zãa Kpanti Laa, a á ri nɛɛ ri ɓoo vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, ri ɓooro ka nyaa zɔɔ nandon.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee zĩi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ naa tusu nɛɛ, nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a zang naa nwang kaa niizang ɓɛɛ kɔ. Zĩi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang naa tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu zang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, n naa ɓoo mii jĩng laa inabi tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang. N naa ɓoo kaa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓoo nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
A ri naa gaa soo, ri seepaa ri daa ka Kɔpɔ Zeetung.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ naa yuku ditɔ nandon. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang beeyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang naa nyɔ jagãng vɔrɔ ditɔ, tɔɔ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ri naa tantɛ kati.’
Laa nɛɛ naa wisi m paa tɔ, nkɔ naa daa Galili shɔɔnang.”
Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Náa ri yuku doo piti, ri yaa mɔɔ, n yaa mɔɔ m kpang.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zĩi keɓe, ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa daa doo ziti, bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ laa nyaa tɔ daa doo taati, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung ɓaa kpang.”
Bituru ti kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔkn nabm tɔɔ, “Naa zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ m doo katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ning piti, n laa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ m kpang.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
A ri daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Gesemani ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ta ka nihn, n daa gaa doo Laa.”
A daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana ning. Ɓɔɔ ri daa kana gbalang, a gaa tɔɔsung yeti lasɛnang kaa nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ning.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii soo m tɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, nɔ́ɔ gãng jĩng kagn.”
Daa tɔ ka tĩng tɔkɔlɔng, a zuu kaa nɛɛ buru ka tipi, a gaa Laa nɛɛ, gbalang nɛ̀ɛ́ kagn, làá jĩng dannang keɓe nɛɛ a yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
A gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa mɔɔ ɓaa kagn gbete kpang. Kɔsɔ m jĩng dannang keɓe katɔ. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, palɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A gbãayu naa ĩi rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana ri rooro tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Siman, mɔɔ roo katɔ ya? Mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãng jĩng naa gbete kpang ya?
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, nɔɔ ti gaa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang nɛɛ nwãarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Suru bii manɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓi katɔ, bii manɛ kɔ lakɛ ɓi kaa takpang.”
A Yeesɔ ti paarɛ tɔkn daa gaa Laa. Paasɛ dòo nyaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ.
A ti arɛ naa ĩi ri, ri rooro tɔ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, hingro kpiti ri jĩng tɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu takpang.
Yeesɔ ti naa gbãayu tɔkn daa dakn taati, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rooyi, nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔ manɛ doo naa ya? Daa tɔ kati, laa palɛ tɔ. Zang nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ, ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ seepaa ta ruu daayi. Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ a naabm tɔ.”

Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a Yahuda zang gbete ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ a kati. Yahuda nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang, bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang, bang zang Yahudi ri shong ɓɛɛ. Ri see yee bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa ning.
Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ zang kaɓa ɓi tɔ ka tĩng nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n daa kɔ̃ng wu, wukɔ Yeesɔ, nɔɔ yirɛ. Nɔɔ yiti wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ daa nɛɛ wu ning.”
Yahuda naa arɛ, tantɛ daanang ka bii Yeesɔ. A ɓaa wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, a kɔ̃ng wu kati.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Yahuda, ri yi Yeesɔ kati.
Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri nɛɛ Yeesɔ, zɔ̃ng yee bang ɓiɓɛ, wɔng shoo jaafoo kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ mani.
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu yinang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see yee bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa gaagaa, nɛɛ nɔɔ naa yi ɓu nkɔ, naa zang yi zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ ya?

N nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa kɔ diki diki, n tusu zang vuu, nɔɔ yi m kpang. Vuu kɔ zang palɛ m ɓee, ɓèe ɓi nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, ri bée ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri yuku nandon ri yaa wu.
Yɔɔ jasang ɓɔɔ kagn, lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ kɔ, ka bii shɛ̃ɛning, dũng Yeesɔ ka knti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ, nɛɛ ri yi yɔɔ jasang kaɓa jong.
A yɔɔ yàa ri fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, yɔɔ yuu bii naa.
A ri daa kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka gãa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang bang, bang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
Bituru dũng wu ka knti katara, a ri daa shɛ̃ɛ dabang gãa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani. A daa nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka gãa kaɓa ka nyaa waa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sɔɔrɔ si katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, tɔɔ ri nyɔ wu kati. A ri walɛ kpang.
Zang dɔɔli ri kɔɔ ruu see ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang.
Nɛɛ knti, zang ɓɔɔ ri seepaa, a ri kɔɔ ruu see ka yuu Yeesɔ tɔɔ,
“Ruu tãayi, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N jili Gãa Laa kɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa ɓɛɛ ditɔ, n mãa ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa kpang, ka yeti diki taati.’ ”
Ruu ɓɔɔ zang knti keɓe ri kɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ piti ti daa gbete kpang kɔ doori.
A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa seepaa, shii ka tĩng ɓarɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi, Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ɓɛɛ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ.” Nɔɔ naa zi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa zi naa ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong ditɔ.
A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔkn ɓɛɛ takpang.
Nɔɔ tãa ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti manɛ viya?” A zang piti ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ, daa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ vɔrɔ tɔ.”

A zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ ri tùlù wu sisãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kati. A ri mung wu jĩng, ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ naa, a ri ti kpaa wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka gãa, ri ta wu, ri ti nyɔ wu jong nɛɛ naa.
Ɓɔɔ Bituru doo ka dabang gãa, jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa shonang, naa arɛ.
Ɓɔɔ wu zi Bituru nwáng sɔɔrɔ ka nyaa waa, pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa doo zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ dũng Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
A Bituru laa nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.” A seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka nyaa gãa.
A jaa zang soro kaɓa naa zi wu tɔkn a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ.”
A Bituru ti laa nyaa tɔkn. Laa nɛɛ tɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ti kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ niizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zang tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.”
A Bituru gaa tɔɔsung ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ kɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.”

Ɓɔɔ Bituru hangsɛ nyaa kɔɔnang hn, kpaasakn naa paasɛ nyaa daa kaa doo ziti. A Bituru naa kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati. Bɛ̀ɛ́ Yeesɔ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa daa doo ziti, bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ tɔ daa dakn taati.” A Bituru káa kaa zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.

Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ ɓɛɛ, ri mã nyaa ka zɔɔ. Ri mã Yeesɔ, a ri daa nɛɛ wu, ri daa a wu Gɔmna Bilatu.
Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudi ya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ.”
A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa ka vuu dɔɔli.
A Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ãa nyaa kagn kpang ya? Mɔɔ tãa vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓa, kpãa Bilatu nyaa ka yeti dɔɔli.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, Gɔmna yàarɛ́ zang tipi ɓiɓɛ shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ naa katɔ.
Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baraba kagn sãa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri naa kɔɔ Bilatu tɔɔ, Bilatu wu pàlɛ́ ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ ri ka diki nyaalaa ɓɛɛ ta.
A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n yaa nɔɔ Kpanti zang Yahudi naa ya?”
