Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ, zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri atɛ wu Yeesɔ ka ruu sũnyaa ɓɛɛ.
A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri dɔ̃lɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Bilatu wu yaa ri Baraba kɔ naa jong.
Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ n palɛ vi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa nɛɛ Kpanti Yahudi viya?”
Ri goo nyaa tɔkn tɔɔ, “Yaa wu ta zang ɓa wu naa ka laa.”
Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu viya? Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓu viya?” Ri ti goo nyaa gbãng gbãng ka lapa nandon nɛɛ, “Yaa wu ta, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
Bilatu kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàlɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ, a yaa ri Baraba naa. A kɔɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ gbãa. A á ri Yeesɔ kati nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu naa ta ka laa.
A zang sɔɔja ri yi wu, ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa Gɔmna. A ri kpalɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ nimbang kaa nandon.
A ri lu wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ ta bii nwɛ̃ɛri purusũng naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ kpanti ri lu ɓɛɛ. Ri ti tí kɔkɔ naa vuu yuu kãnang kpanti, ri hãa wu ka yuu.
Ri tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ri jeere wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang Yahudi wu nwang dòndòng.”
Ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ labalang ka yuu, ri ti tùlù wu sisãa ka bii, a ri tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ri kpãa wu kati.
Ri kpaa wu tɔ, a ri zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ nwɛ̃ɛri kaɓa, ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Ri nwangsɛ wu kaa biling, ri daa ka nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ ri daa ɓa wu naa kaa laa.

Ka gbalang, ri ɓee yɔɔ tipi Kiranɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman bɛɛ nɛɛ wu a ka gari. Ri yi wu nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe kɔ dáa rɛɛ Alezanda nɛɛ Rufu.
A ri a kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Golgota ɓɛɛ, [Dĩiri nung keɓe, ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ nwang yuu zɔ̃ɔpi ɓɛɛ.]
Ri a wu sàa ɓɔɔ zang nwɛ̃ɛtɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ muru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ɓooyi, a ɓoo kpang.
A ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa. Ri shaa laa nɛɛ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ka naa ɓarɛ.
Ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa ka saka mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ gãndi ɓɛɛ.
Ri bee vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi ka yuu paa laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri beeyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang Yahudi.”
Ri ɓáa zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge naa jong laa ka kagn Yeesɔ. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka nakn Yeesɔ, a ɓɔɔ gbete ka nagang ɓiɓɛ.
[Vuu keɓe nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa bee ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ, “Wu naa vɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”]
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɛɛ gbalang, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ, ri ti waa yuu ɓarɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jili Gãa Laa, mɔɔ mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ.
Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta, mɔɔ shooro ka tipi nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ naa kagn ɓi.”

Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri ráng Yeesɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, ri ti kpaa wu jong. Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ, ri tɔɔ, “Ta yuu zang ɓɔɔgn, zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kpang.

Náa Kirisi Kpanti Isirela shooro nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓee, rùu shing danggn katɔ bii ɓiɓɛ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa ka laa ka kagn Yeesɔ, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ jong.
Laa kaa dãngdãng yuu, a nɔng tɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon, saka taati palɛ nɛɛ mani.
Saka taati naa palɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Eloyi, Eloyi lama sabatani.” Dĩiri yee keɓe ɓi, “Laa mɛɛ, Laa mɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa m ka ruu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi, ɓaa nyaa kana Iliya.”
A zang gbete yurɛ daa hãa vuu ɓoɓoro ka saa ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ, a mã ka laa, a dɔ̃̀ wu ka nyaa nɛɛ wu ɓooyi. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shii ta gbongkarɛ, ruu zirɛ, Iliya nɛɛ a ditɔ, wu witi wu ka tipi ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a vɔ kati.
A fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nɔng tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani, lɔɔsɔ kaa nɛɛ paa daa nɔng ka dii.
Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ shii ka tĩng Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, Jaa Laa kɔ niizang.”

Zang soro ɓɔɔ kagn, ri shiiri nɛɛ nɔng beebang, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka teteng zang soro kaɓa, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nàá rɛɛ Yakub ɓɔɔ wujaa nɛɛ Yose, a ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Salomi, ri kagn.
Zang soro keɓe kɔ ri dũuru Yeesɔ ka knti, a ri ti yi wu naa ka bii, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu ka Galili ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima gaagaa, kagn nɔng kɔ doori.
Nɛɛ laarang ka diki kaɓa, ka lee ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri kpalɛ bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓuru kaa Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ.
Yusufu yɔɔ Arimataya ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔɔli, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. Yusufu shing jĩng ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ, mã danggn, daa gaa vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka naa Gɔmna Bilatu.
Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ, kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli naa ɓɔɔ vɔ pati ɓɛɛ. A shong zang nɛɛ zang daa ɓàa wu nyaa ka zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa. A naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ ya?
Ɓɔɔ Bilatu naa tãa nɛɛ nyaa zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ, yàa Yusufu gbalang vɔrɔ Yeesɔ tuunang kati.

A Yusufu hoo fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ puru kati. A witi vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka tipi, kãng kaa nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a daa wɔɔ wu ka yeti saa ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka tari bang ɓɔɔ shii doo paa ɓɛɛ. A jĩiri tari, ku nyaa saa kaa nɛɛ mani.
Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nàá Yose, ri zi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ vɔrɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang naa ɓa tɔ, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nàá Yakubu, a ɓɔɔ Salomi, ri hoo nung ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa tũuru vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka bii.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ gbete ka knti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang bɛ̀ɛ́ laa nwang tɔ, rɛɛ Marayamu ri daa kana yuu sàa.
Ri rangkɛ kana naa ɓarɛ ka gbalang nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi daa jĩiri ruu tari ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sàa ɓɛɛ jong wiya?” Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tari bìí bang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ nyaa sàa hn, ri zirɛ zang jĩiri tari bìí tɔ.
Ri tu ka yeti sàa, a ri zi jasang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru nwang tɔ ka naa nakn. A ri mã naa danggn.
A yɔɔ jasang kaɓa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ mã naa ka danggn kpang.” Nɔɔ kãa Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔng kpang, zang wisi wu paa tɔ. Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ Bituru, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kɔ doori nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛ Galili shɔɔnang. Ri daa zi wu ka nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.”
Vuu keɓe kpãa rɛɛ Marayamu ka yeti dɔɔli, bii ti zaa ri katɔ. A ri nwangkɛ, ri yuku, ri daayi. Ri ãa zang nyaa ka bii gbete kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.

[Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, ka lee ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ tɔ gbete ka knti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ gãndi zang zang, a naa nwang nyaa ka bii Marayamu Magadaliya, ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ manziti ɓɛɛ, kɔ shɔɔnang.
A Marayamu daayi daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri nwálɛ́ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kati. Marayamu daa ĩi ri, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri kaa nyavɔ doo naa.
Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nɛɛ nyaa Marayamu nɛɛ Yeesɔ doo ningkãari, nɛɛ Marayamu ti zi wu jĩng tɔ ka bii, ri tɔɔ, ruu keɓe ɓi niizang kpang.
Ka knti weɓe, Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa kaa tɔkn nɛɛ bii naa ɓɔɔgn ka bìí zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri dũng knti ɓiɓɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri daa ka jaa gari.
A ri gbãayu ri daa kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeezung. A rɛɛ ɓeezung tɔɔ, ruu keɓe ɓi niizang kpang.

Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa ka bii zang kopi tu gbete ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri shaa doo vuu shaanang. A mangkɛ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn nɛɛ, wu doo ningkãari kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ, ri kɔɔ ri kpang ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita ka koo piti, nɔɔ daa rang zang piti, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tarɛ, nɛɛ shing danggn katɔ, a zang nɛɛ palɛ wu batizima, wukɔ naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tãayi, a shing danggn kpang, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ wukɔ ruu.
Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ditɔ. Ri naa nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung mɛɛ. Ri ti naa rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nyaa koo ɓɔɔgn.
Naa ri yi sɔkɔ nɛɛ naa, kɔ ri ɓoo zɔ̃pɔ ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang katɔ, palɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ri naa shing naa ɓarɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ, bii zang kɔnang, wu ti yaa ri nɔng.”
Kpanti Yeesɔ hangsɛ ri nyaa yee rannang tɔ, Laa tuu wu kaa ningkãari daa nɔng ka lapa. A daa nwáng ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa.

A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri daa kati, ri daa rang yee Laa kaa nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti. A Kpanti Yeesɔ ti palɛ shonang nɛɛ ri ning. Tusu zang nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri rangnɛ, ɓi niizang kɔ nwani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.]
N jee mɔɔ nyaa Dabang Tiyofilu. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ri bee vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka teteng ɓuru tɔ,
naa ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee Laa ɓɔɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe gaayu nɛɛ jĩng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n pɛ̃ɛrɛ, n tɔɔ naa n bèé mɔɔ vuu keɓe, gbete, gbete, tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tãa tɔ, n ti kãa dĩiri ruu keɓe tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔ́ɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ mɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kati.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ Hiridu ro kpanti ka tipi Yahudi, zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ kagn, zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Zakariya. Zakariya ɓi ka teteng zang vàá Abiya, ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ nung Abiya ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe gee jaa soro ka zɔ̃ng Haruna ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ wukɔ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓaa jaa soro bìí nɛɛ Alisabatu.
Zakariya nɛɛ Alisabatu ri zang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ nandon.
A ri yi jaa kagn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Alisabatu bɛ̀ɛ́ shìi tɔɔri ɓɛɛ. Sáa ɓarɛ bang tɔ kɔ nandon.
Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Zakariya palɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ kana Gãa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ diki shonang palɛnang zang vàá Abiya kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang Abiya ri zɔ̃́ng Zakariya, nɛɛ wu daa dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ á sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ka Gãa Laa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shaa laa naa ɓasidi, laa yi wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zakariya daa tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa ka laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ á sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka biling ri gaa Laa kana.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa nwáng nyaa ka bii Zakariya, a shii ka nakn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ á sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Zakariya zi wu, bii soo wu, a kaa vɔrɔ.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang Zakariya, Laa tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa ɓɛɛ tɔ. Soro ɓaaɓɛ Alisabatu yi mɔɔ jaa ditɔ zang varɛ, mɔ́ɔ ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana.
Mɔɔ naa tãa tĩnang ditɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ dɔɔli. Zang dɔɔli ri ti naa tãa tĩnang ditɔ jong dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi wu ɓɛɛ.
Náa nwang zang bang ka tĩng Kpanti Laa. Naa ɓoo sàa ɓi kpang. Ti naa ɓoo vuu ɓɔɔ zã katɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ zang ɓi kpang. Suru Laa naa gaayu nwannang ka bii ɓiɓɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu doo ka yeti niiɓɛ.
Wukɔ naa sɔɔrɔ zang Isirela dɔɔli ri naa dũng Kpanti Laa ɓarɛ.

Wukɔ naa sɔ̀ɔ́ Yeesɔ tĩng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa a wu naa bannang, nɛɛ suru ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Iliya ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing daa wujɛ, ri kasɛ ruu wujɛ ɓarɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa. Wu ti shing zang, zang nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ ri dũng kaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A Zakariya hɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa tɔɔ, “N zi bɛ̀ɛ́ nɛɛ vuu keɓe niizang viya? N kaa dabang, soro mɛɛ ti kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ.”
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nkɔ Jibirilu ɓɔɔ shíi ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa shong m nɛɛ n naa rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ, nɛɛ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe.

Ɓaa shoo ta mɔɔ tãayi, mɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rang yee takpang diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ a nɛɛ mani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tà yee ɓɔɔ n kɔɔyi ɓɔɔ nwáng ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka biling, ri ti gã Zakariya ɓi kana. Ri ti rɛ̃rɛ kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, knti Zakariya bee tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ nwang tɔ ka biling, kasɛ nɛɛ wu rang yee nɛɛ zang, zunung yee rannang takpang. A zang yisi ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ Zakariya zi vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa. A rang zang yee kaa nɛɛ naa. A nwang zang ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
A diki ɓɔɔ Zakariya palɛ shonang ka Gãa Laa naa waa nyaa, a naa gbãayu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ.
Diki kaɓa naa ɓa tɔ, Alisabatu, Zakariya ɓeeso naa tuu jaa kati. Alisabatu waasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shala maani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ m vuu keɓe, kɔsɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ tuu m yusɛ̃ɛ ka teteng zang tɔ kati.”
Shala ɓɔɔ Alisabatu tuu jaa, daa tɔ mangbete, Laa naa shong zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jibirilu ɓɛɛ, ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nazara ka tipi Galili.
Laa shong wu ka bii ja soo ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn gn kpang, ɓɔɔ Yusufu zɔ̃ng Dawuda gee tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓaa nung ja soo kaɓa nɛɛ Marayamu.
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka Lapa arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N jee mɔɔ nyaa, zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ka teteng zang soro ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓi nɛɛ mɔɔ ning.”
Ɓɔɔ Marayamu tãa naa weɓe, ruu kaɓa kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli. Marayamu gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ nyaa jeenang vi nɔngkɔ viya?
A zang nyaa shonang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang Marayamu, Laa tãa tĩnang ɓaaɓɛ dɔɔli.
Mɔɔ naa tuu jaa ditɔ, mɔɔ yi zang varɛ. Mɔɔ naa ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
Naa nwáng zang bang. Zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa. Kpanti Laa naa shing wu Kpanti ditɔ naa dabang ɓiɓɛ Dawuda.
Naa roo Kpanti ka yuu zang Yahudi dòndòng. Kpanti ɓɔɔ wu naa rooyi, naa waa nyaa ɓi kpang.”
A Marayamu hɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa tɔɔ, “Wee n roo varɛ gn gn kpang ɓee, vuu keɓe naa nwáng biya?”

A zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Suru Laa naa a ditɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Náa bannang Laa naa zuu mɔɔ ditɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, jaa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ mɔɔ naa yi ɓee, zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa Laa.
Zirɛ ɓaazung Alisabatu ɓɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, tuu jaa tɔ, ka wee wu kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ɓee. Alisabatu ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ shii katɔ, tuu jaa tɔ shala daa lɛ̀ɛ́ mangbete.
Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa Laa palɛnang ɓi kagn kpang.”
A Marayamu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa kɔ mãa m, vuu keɓe wu nwáng ta ka yuu mɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.” A zang nyaa shonang Laa daayi, yaa wu kati.
Ka diki kaɓa, Marayamu kpalɛ bii, a seepaa, làabìi daanang ka gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
Marayamu naa shɛ̃ɛ gari kaɓa tɔ, a naa daa ka gãa Zakariya, daa jee Alisabatu nyaa kati.
Ɓɔɔ Alisabatu tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Marayamu jee wu hn, jaa ɓɔɔ wu tuu ka yeti ruutu bii. A Suru Laa naa arɛ nwang ka yeti Alisabatu,

a Alisabatu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Ka teteng zang soro ɓɔɔ ka koolaa keɓe nandon, zang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu tĩnang tãanang ɓa ɓɔɔ wu a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ kagn kpang. A Laa ti á jaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa yirɛ tĩnang tãanang tɔ.
A ka ruu vi Laa yaa mɔɔ nàá Kpanti mɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔkɔ mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ jong viya?
Ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jee m hn, jaa ɓɔɔ ka yeti mɛɛ tantɛ bii ruutunang. Ka ruu tĩnang ɓɔɔ wu tãa ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi naa nwang ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Marayamu kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“N dɔɔ Kpanti Laa kana yeti mɛɛ.
Suru bii mɛɛ tã̀á tĩnang ka ruu
Laa ɓɔɔ ta yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn mɛɛ kɔng wu ɓɔɔ
n jaafoo ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu
lɛɛkɔ keɓe, zang koolaa keɓe
nandon nɛɛ zang koo jaa knti ri
kɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ Laa a m tĩnang
tãanang m tɔ.
Ka ruu vuu bang, bang ɓɔɔ Laa
ɓɔɔ wukɔ bang pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ
Wukɔ Laa, shi kpang ɓi kagn
bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Gn zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu bannang,
ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ka koo keɓe nandon
kɔng wu katɔ.
Pálɛ́ vuu bang bang tɔ, nɛɛ naa
bannang ɓiɓɛ. Tántɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ
zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔɔli
ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
Sɔ́ɔrɔ̀ rɛɛ kpanti bang, bang
yuu ka dii. Ti shing zang ɓɔɔ
ri sòo yuu ka dii ri nwang
zang bang.
Á zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ
kpang, vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ gaagaa. A sɔ́ɔrɔ̀
zang ying naa waati.
A ti kpaa danggn nɛɛ wu naa
yǐ jaafoo ɓiɓɛ zang Isirela
naa ka bii,
naa ɓɔɔ wu a rɛɛ daa
ɓuru nyaa ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ gn dabang ɓuru Ibirayi nɛɛ
zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ, naa kɔng wu sasak koo
naa waa nyaa nɛɛ mani.”
Marayamu nwang nɛɛ Alisabatu shala taati, a naa gbãayu daa gari ɓiɓɛ.
Diki ɓɔɔ Alisabatu yí jaa kagn naa arɛ, a yi jaa kaa zang varɛ.
A zang nyaa gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ri tãa nyaa tɔɔ Kpanti Laa pàlɛ̀ Alisabatu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, a ri dɔɔ bii kaa jong.
Alisabatu yi jaa tɔ diki daa mantaati, a zang arɛ nɛɛ zang naa yèé jaa kaa shaa. A zang nɛɛ zang ɓaa jaa nung kaa nɛɛ Zakariya ka nung diiɓɛ.
A nàá jaa kasɛ kpang. Nàá jaa tɔɔ zang ɓaa nung jaa nɛɛ Yɔhana.
Ri kɔɔ Alisabatu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana kagn kpang.”
A zang rang daa jaa yee kaa nɛɛ naa, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa jaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Zakariya kɔɔ zang nɛɛ naa tɔɔ, zang a wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. A bee kati nɛɛ, “Nung ɓiɓɛ ɓi Yɔhana.” Ɓɔɔ zang zi naa weɓe zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn.
A nyaa Zakariya puu kati, gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang, a dɔɔ Laa.
Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa gãa ɓarɛ ri zi naa weɓe, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ nandon. A zang ri rang ruu keɓe ka tipi Yahudi ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ kagn dɔɔli ɓɛɛ nandon.
Zang piti ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ri tɔɔ jaa keɓe naa nwang ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ zang kiya? Ka ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓi nɛɛ wu ning ɓɛɛ.
A Suru Laa a ka bii Zakariya daa Yɔhana, a Zakariya kɔɔ zang yee Laa kati tɔɔ,
“Ruu dɔ̀ɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ
Làá zang Isirela ta, ka ruu
ɓɔɔ arɛ yi zang ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii, a ti
ta yuu ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ti a ruu zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli
tɔ, zɔ̃̌ng zang shonang ɓiɓɛ
kpanti Dawuda. Zang keɓe kɔ naa
ta yuu ɓuru
Laa palɛ tɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ
nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang
ɓiɓɛ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa ta ruu ditɔ
nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng
nɛɛ ruu kpang, nɛɛ naa zang
ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ gn daa ɓuru
naa kɔng wu katɔ, nɛɛ wu ti naa
palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ daa ɓuru
nɛɛ wu pàlɛ́ ri ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng daa ɓuru Ibirayi ɓɛɛ,
nɛɛ wu naa ta ruu ditɔ, nɛɛ naa zang
ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu
pàlɛ́ wu shonang, ruu kaa vɔrɔ
kpang ɓɛɛ kati.
Ruu nwáng zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang
kagn yeti ɓuru kpang, ruu ti
palɛ vuu kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa
kasɛ ɓɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu doo
ningkãari ka koo keɓe nandon.”
A raa jĩng ka bii jaa rɛ̃ɛting
a kɔɔ jaa tɔɔ,
“Jaa mɛɛ, zang
naa ɓaa mɔɔ nɛɛ zang nyaa
shonang Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ,
mɔɔ naa sɔ̀ɔ́ Kpanti ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ tĩng,
mɔɔ pàlɛ́ wu gbalang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔkɔ naa tusu zang Laa, nɛɛ
Laa naa yàá ri gbalang vuu
shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn zang kɔng Laa
ɓuru dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Naa shong nyaa
nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu ɓuru
ɓɔɔ naa nwáng naa làa ɓɔɔ nwáng ɓɛɛ.
Wu yakɛ nɔng kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang
ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ,
nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng
vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ri zi nɔng kati.
Wukɔ naa tusu ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ
ruu nwang nɛɛ Laa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.”
A jaa naa bangnɛ, a zũng danggn. Nwang ka jĩngti sasak diki ɓɔɔ wu naa nwang nyaa ka zang Isirela nandon a nɔng.
Ka diki kaɓa Kayisa Agɔsitu kpanti zang tipi Rooma, shong nyaa nɛɛ zang gã zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓiɓɛ nandon.
Zang gã̀ zang gngn ka tipi Rooma kpang. Zang gãnang keɓe wukɔ ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang bɛ̀ɛ́ Kiriniyu nwang gɔmna ka tipi Siriya.
Zang ɓu daarɛ ka gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang daa gã ri kati.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yusufu seepaa nɛɛ gari Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ, a daa ka gari ɓɔɔ zang yi Dawuda kagn, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛtalami ka tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɛɛ.
Yusufu daa nɛɛ ɓeeso Marayamu ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang daa gã ri kati.
Ɓɔɔ ri doo ka Bɛtalami, diki ɓɔɔ Marayamu yi jaa kagn naa arɛ,

a yi jamari ɓiɓɛ kaa zang varɛ, leng wu nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng jaa rɛ̃ɛting nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A wɔɔ wu ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri walɛ gãa ɓɔɔ ri roo kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing zang zanti kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka tipi kaɓa naabm, zang jagãng ri kagn nɔngkɔ. Ri roo ka dalɛ, ri gãng jĩng ka vuu vaa ɓarɛ nɛɛ zĩi.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa nwang nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ, a nɔng yakɛnang Kpanti Laa naa yakɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kagn, a ri kaa vɔrɔ.
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, n atɛ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ a nɔɔ tĩnang tãanang dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ zang piti naa tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang yi nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu manɛ tɔ lɛɛkɔ ka gari ɓɔɔ zang yi Dawuda kagn ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ Kpanti Kirisi.
Wee naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa zi kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ daa zi jaa rɛ̃ɛting, zang leng ka sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, zang wɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀ɛ́ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ.”
A ri tantɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa keɓe zinang, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔgn gaagaa, ri dɔɔ Laa kana. Ri kɔ̀ɔ́yi nɛɛ,
“Zang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kpala kpala ta. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tĩnang ɓarɛ katɔ ka tipi keɓe, ri ti tãa tĩnang nwannang ta.”
Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri gbãayu tɔ ka lapa, zang jagãng naa kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu daa nɔɔ ta ka Bɛtalami, ruu daa zi vuu kɔ palɛ, a Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri làabìi, ri daayi, ri daa ĩi rɛɛ Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu nɛɛ jaa rɛ̃ɛting ɓɔɔ ri wɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀ɛ́ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ, ri kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ ri ka yuu jaa keɓe kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang jagãng kaɓa ri kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn.
A Marayamu shing ruu keɓe piti ka yeti ɓiɓɛ. A ti rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu keɓe ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang jagãng nɛɛ ri gbãa kaa yuu, ri a Laa bannang, ri dɔɔ wu, ka ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ a ri ti tãayi ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.

Zang yi Yeesɔ tɔ diki daa tɔ mantaati, a zang arɛ nɛɛ zang naa yèé Yeesɔ kaa shaa ka naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang yee wu shaa tɔ, a zang ɓaa wu nung kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Nung ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa a wu, bɛ̀ɛ́ niiɓɛ tuu wu gn ka yeti kpang ɓɛɛ.
Diki ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu ri daa dɔɔ Laa vuu naa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri sɔɔ bii ɓarɛ naa arɛ. A ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima nɛɛ ri daa a wu Laa.
Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Jamari ɓɔɔ varɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ shɔnzang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ vuu vaa yirɛ piti, zang wu a Laa katɔ.”
Rɛɛ Yusufu ri daa Urushalima, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa dɔɔ Laa ning koro kɔ koro ziti naa ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ.

Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn Urushalima, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Simiyon. Simiyon zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ Ruu Laa katɔ, a ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Bɛɛ Simiyon kaɓa gã ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang Isirela ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.
Suru Laa ti kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu zi Kirisi zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ arɛ naa ta yuu zang ka gbongkarɛ tɔɔ wu vɔrɛ.
Suru Laa dɔ̃ɔ Simiyon ka laa kaɓa daa ka yeti Gãa Laa. Rɛɛ Yusufu ri a kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
A Simiyon ta jaa kaa naa ɓiɓɛ, a zãa Laa kati tɔɔ,
“Kpanti Laa, mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ
mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ tɔ. Yeti jaafoo ɓaaɓɛ katɔ, yaa wu ta wu vɔrɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jĩng mɛɛ zi zang
ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu zang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ
Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shingnɛ, nɛɛ
zang koolaa piti ri zi wu ɓɛɛ.
Wukɔ naa nwang nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ
tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi kpang, vuu
ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti naa
shing zang, zang a zang ɓaaɓɛ
Isirela bannang.”
A diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Simiyon kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Simiyon shìng ri naa ka yuu ɓarɛ, a gaa ri Laa kati. Kɔɔ Marayamu nàá Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Laa zɔ̃ng jaa keɓe nɛɛ wu naa nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang Isirela dɔɔli naa shaarɛ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Zang dɔɔli ti naa ta yuu ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Wu ti naa nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang rang wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa shing rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti zang wu nwangsɛ bii kati. Yeti naa lasɛ mɔɔ, kɔng mɔɔ ka yeti naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ nɛɛ yere bang ɓɛɛ.”

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ kagn zang soro, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Ana. Ana jaa Fanuwel ɓɔɔ ka zɔ̃ng Ashaa ɓɛɛ. Saa ɓiɓɛ ti daa laa dɛ̃ɛti tu dɛ̃ɛti. Nwáng nɛɛ ɓeevɛ saa manziti kɔ nwani, a nwang suvɔ kati. Daarɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi diki diki, wu dɔɔ Laa. Wu ti gaa Laa, wu seng nyaalaa.
Ka laa kaɓa, Anas arɛ naa zãa Laa, a rang zang ɓɔɔ ri gã naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang Urushalima, ruu ka yuu jaa keɓe.
Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu ri hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔ ɓɛɛ palɛnang tɔ nandon, ri gbãayu ka gari ɓarɛ Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
A jaa naa bangnɛ, zũng danggn kati. Zũnang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ gaagaa. Laa tãa tĩnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ dɔɔli.
Sáa nɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daa Yeesɔ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri daarɛ ka Urushalima, ka ruu nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ saa Yeesɔ daa tɔ kopi tu ziti, ri daa Urushalima kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri dàarɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Nyaalaa waa nyaa tɔ, ri gbãayu kana gãa, a Yeesɔ nwáng ɓi kaa Urushalima ka nɔngkɔ. Diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri zi kpang.
Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa Yeesɔ kagn teteng zang ɓarɛ. A ri naa gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ kãanang kaa nɛɛ laarang ka teteng rɛɛ ɓeezung nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeesang.
Ri ĩi wu kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri gbãayu ka Urushalima tɔkn, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kãa wu ɓɛɛ.
Ri kãa wu diki taati, a ri naa ĩi wu ka Gãa Laa. Nwang tɔ ka teteng zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ, wu ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ ri ruu.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu zũnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ, diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri zi wu naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, niiɓɛ hɛ̃ɛ tɔɔ, “Jaa, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ ruu nɔngkɔ ka ruu viya? Ruu kãa mɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ daaɓɛ, gbãng gbãng.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãa m ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ n naa nwáng ka gãa Daa mɛɛ kpang ya?”
Ri zi dĩiri nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri kpang.
A seepaa daa kaa nɛɛ ri ka Nazara. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ ning. A niiɓɛ shing ruu keɓe ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nandon.
A Yeesɔ bang bii kati zũnang ɓiɓɛ ti daa kana nɛɛ tĩng. Laa ti tãa tĩnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ dɔɔli, a zang piti ri tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ.

Laa rang yee nɛɛ Yɔhana jaa Zakariya ka jĩngti, ka diki ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Pontu Bilatu kɔ gɔmna tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ. Hiridu ɓi kaa gɔmna tipi Galili, a jaa daa ɓiɓɛ Filibu ɓi gɔmna tipi Ituriya nɛɛ tipi Tirakoniti. Lisaniya ɓi gɔmna tipi Abileni. Ka diki kaɓa, rɛɛ Anas nɛɛ Kayifa rikɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, Kayisa Taberiyu wukɔ zang bang rɛɛ tipi keɓe nɛɛ tipi Rooma nandon, daa saa kopi tu maani.
Yɔhana daarɛ ka tipi ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang Urudung nandon, kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ. N palɛ nɔɔ batizima, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yàa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kati.”
Naa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa bee ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya beeyi tɔɔ,
“Zang tãa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rang
yee Laa ka yeti waala tɔɔ,
‘Nɔɔ pàlɛ́ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta,
nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ra kaa gn,
wu a ka bii zang ɓiɓɛ.
Zang wu zũuru guurang nandon, zang ti jili kɔpɔ nɛɛ jaa
gboonang ka tipi nandon. Zang ti shiiri gbalang ɓɔɔ lengke bii
katɔ ɓororo. Gbalang ɓɔɔ gɔgɔlɔ, zang ti palɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Shɔnzang piti ri naa zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang ditɔ.’ ”
A Yɔhana kɔɔ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri álɛ̀ nɛɛ wu palɛ ri batizima tɔɔ, “Sɔkɔ pudi kiɓi, ɓu wi kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yuu jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ Laa atɛ ɓɛɛ wiya?

Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ manɛ nɛɛ, ‘Rùu ɓuru wujɛ Ibirayi kpang.’ N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ Ibirayi zɔ̃ng nɛɛ tari kɔ ka tipi ɓee katɔ.
Kãntang keɓe zang ɓaa nyaa kãasãng tɔ ka dimbang laa nandon. Laa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ra jaa ɓɔɔ shi kpang, Zang dɔngnɛ, zang tasɛ ka yeti waa.”
A zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “A ruu pàlɛ ɓu kaa biya.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ziti, wu a zang ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ kagn wu basɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi ri ti arɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana wu palɛ ri batizima. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Maalang rúu palɛ ɓu kaa viya?”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ ta saka tipi wu ɓa naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.”

Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “A rúu palɛ ɓuru kaa viya?” Yɔhana ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge kpang. Nɔɔ suu sèé nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Saka ɓɔɔ zang shu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɔɔ katɔ.”
Bii shaa zang kana dɔɔli. Zang dɔɔli ri gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ, naa ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ Yɔhana kɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa naa shong ɓɛɛ ya?

A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa nandon tɔɔ, “N pàlɛ́ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ka knti mɛɛ, ɓa m bannang katɔ. N daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wukɔ naa pàlɛ́ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ waa.
Vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa hãlɛ̀ vuu nɛɛ mani kagn naa ɓiɓɛ. Naa kooro dadong ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kpalɛ jĩng vuu ɓiɓɛ ka bɔ̃nɔ. Wu yaa gãrɛ ɓiɓɛ, wu doo kaa nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yɔhana tùsù zang vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe dɔɔli. A ti rang ri yee tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
Kpanti Hiridu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana mangkɛ wu ka ruu Hirodiya soro jaa diiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Hiridu palɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Ti naa palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔgn, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang daa loo Yɔhana ka sãa.
Yɔhana palɛ zang piti batizima tɔ, a naa pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ kati. Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gàá Laa doo naa, lapa puu kati,
a Suru Laa shooro kaa naa koro ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A ri tãa yee nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung shonang ɓiɓɛ palɛnang, bɛ̀ɛ́ saa ɓiɓɛ daa bmati tu kopi. Zang kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓi nɛɛ Yeesɔ jaa Yusufu
ɓɔɔ daa ɓiɓɛ Heli ɓɛɛ.
Heli ɓi kaa jaa Matata,
Matata ɓi jaa Leevi,
Leevi ɓi kaa jaa Meliki.
Meliki ɓi jaa Janayi
a Janayi ɓi kaa jaa Yusufu.
Yusufu ɓi ti jaa Matatiya,
Matatiya ɓi jaa Emo.
A Emo ɓi kaa jaa Nahum.
Nahum ɓi ti jaa Azaliya.
Azaliya ɓi jaa Najaya.
A Najaya ɓi jaa Mahata,
Mahata ɓi jaa Matatiya.
Matatiya ɓi jaa Shimeya.
Shimeya ɓi jaa Yosek,
Yosek ɓi ti jaa Joda.
A Joda ɓi jaa Yuwana,
Yuwana ɓi jaa Resa.
Resa ɓi ti jaa Zerubabe,
a Zerubabe ɓi jaa Shalitiyel,
Shalitiyel ɓi jaa Neri,
a Neri ɓi jaa Meliki,
Meliki ɓi jaa Adi.
Adi ɓi ti jaa Kosam,
a Kosam ɓi jaa Elimadam.
Elimadam ɓi jaa Eri,
Eri ɓi jaa Jashuwa,
a Jashuwa ɓi jaa Eliyiza,
Eliyiza ɓi ti jaa Jorim,
Jorim ɓi ti jaa Matata,
Matata ɓi ti jaa Leevi,
a Leevi ɓi jaa Simiyon.
Simiyon ɓi jaa Yahuda,
a Yahuda ɓi ti jaa Yusufu.
Yusufu ɓi jaa Jonam,
a Jonam ɓi jaa Eliyakim,
Eliyakim ɓi jaa Maliya.
Maliya ɓi ti jaa Mena.
Mena ɓi jaa Matata,
Matata ɓi jaa Natang.
Natang ɓi jaa Dawuda,
a Dawuda ɓi jaa Jeesi.
Jeesi ɓi ti jaa Obida.
Obida ɓi jaa Buwaza,
Buwaza ɓi jaa Salamuna.
Salamuna ɓi jaa Naashong,
a Naashong ɓi jaa Aminada,
Aminada ɓi ti jaa Adi,
Adi ɓi ti jaa Arama.
Arama ɓi jaa Heziron,
ɓi jaa Periza,
a Periza ɓi jaa Yahuda.
Yahuda ɓi jaa Yakubu,
Yakubu ɓi jaa Ishaaku,
Ishaaku jaa Ibirayi,
a Ibirayi ɓi jaa Tera.
Tera ɓi jaa Naaho,
a Naaho ɓi jaa Saruja.
Saruja ɓi jaa Riyu,
a Riyu ɓi jaa Pelek.
Pelek ɓi ti jaa Eba.
Eba ɓi jaa Sheela,
a Sheela ɓi jaa Kaana.
Kaana ɓi ti jaa Arafasa.
Arafasa ɓi jaa Sheem,
a Sheem ɓi jaa Nuhu.
Nuhu ɓi jaa Lamek,
Lamek ɓi jaa Mɛtusela,
Mɛtusela ɓi kaa jaa Ɛnɔk.
Ɛnɔk jaa Jared,
Jared ɓi jaa Mahalale,
a Mahalale ɓi ti jaa Kaana.
Kaana ɓi jaa Enosh.
Enosh ɓi jaa Shiitu,
a Shiitu ɓi ti jaa Adamu.
Adamu ɓi kaa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Laa.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu kana nɛɛ Rang Urudung, nɛɛ Suru Laa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a Suru Laa dɔ̃ wu ka waala.
Sheetang gãsɛ wu ka waala kaɓa sasak diki laa ziti, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang. Ka diki kaɓa, shaa vuu ɓɔɔ ka nyaa kpang. A nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ wu kati.
A Sheetang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, kɔɔ tari keɓe ta, wu ri borodi.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Wu vuu shaanang kɔ shing shɔnzang nwáng ningkãari kpang.’ ”
A Sheetang tuu wu, vang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bee ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a tusu wu koolaa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ shàlok nandon.
A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N a mɔɔ naa ka yuu koolaa keɓe nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang a m tɔ ɓɛɛ. N ti a zang piti ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ tang nɛɛ gutu, mɔɔ dɔɔ m, vuu keɓe piti naa nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Shɔnzang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ wu ti bang wukɔ gbete.’ ”
A Sheetang tuu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima, a daa shing wu ka sɔ̃ngsɔ̃ng yuu Gãa Laa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, shɛ̃ɛ ta tipi nɛɛ nɔng kiɓi,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Laa kɔ̀ɔ́ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ruu ditɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ri naa ta mɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, ka gbalang.’
‘Mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ nyɔ doo ɓaaɓɛ ka tari ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ wu gãsɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang ɓɛɛ kpang.’ ”
Sheetang hangsɛ nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ mani tɔ nandon, a seepaa daayi, yaa Yeesɔ kaa gbongkarɛ.
Yeesɔ gbãayu ka Galili, naa vuu palɛnang Suru Laa nɛɛ wu ning. Nyaa ɓiɓɛ sãlɛ nɔng ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ, a zang ri dɔ̀ɔ́ wu dɔɔli.
A Yeesɔ naa a ka gari Nazara, nɔng ɓɔɔ wu bang kagn ɓɛɛ. Daa kaa naa ɓasidi ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi, ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓarɛ. A seepaa kati nɛɛ wu gã Ruu Laa.
A zang a wu labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ, a kãlɛ, puuyi, a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang beeyi nɛɛ,
“Suru Kpanti Laa kagn bii mɛɛ,
Laa zɔ̃̀ng m nɛɛ n rang zang
ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang yee tɔ̃ɔ
ɓiɓɛ. Shong m nɛɛ n kɔɔ
zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa,
nɛɛ zang yaa ri naa tɔ. Nɛɛ
n ti kɔɔ zang jĩng ringtang nɛɛ
ri zi nɔng ta. Nɛɛ n ti
yaa zang ɓɔɔ zang dang ri
jĩng ɓɛɛ, naa.
Nɛɛ n ti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ diki
ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ kagn a tɔ.”
A leng labeenang bìí kati a sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ka gãa kaɓa, a raa tɔɔsung nwang ka tipi. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, ri tɛ̃ɛ wu jĩng ka bii nandon.
A kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa kɔ nɔɔ tãayi, n gã lɛɛkɔ ɓee, nwáng tɔ niizang.”
Zang piti rang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu yee tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu bɛɛ jaa Yusufu kpang ya?”

A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ, nɔɔ naa kɔɔ m nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe ditɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang bii masɛnang, wu masɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ta.’ Nɔɔ ti naa kɔɔ m ɓɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ka Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ruu tãayi, palɛ ta ka gari kɔ zang yi mɔɔ kagn ɓee.
A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang kasɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓi jong ka gari ɓiɓɛ kpang.’

“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi. Ka diki Iliya zang nyaa shonang Laa, Laa ku lapa, á zang mii lapa kpang, saa taati nɛɛ shala mangbete, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyɔkɔ bang naa nwang ka tipi kaɓa nandon. Suvɔ kagn Isirela dɔɔli,
a Laa shong Iliya ka bii suvɔ ɓɔɔ ka gari Zarafa ɓɔɔ ka tipi Sidong ɓɛɛ.
Ka diki Ilisha zang nyaa shonang Laa, zang vuu bii kagn tipi Isirela dɔɔli, a Laa masɛ zang gbete kagn teteng ɓarɛ kpang. Laa masɛ Naama yɔɔ Siriya kɔ gbete.”
Ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi ri tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa ri dɔɔli.
Ri seepaa, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, ri shing wu ka tĩng, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nyaa kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ ri rooro gãa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri daa zĩi wu kaa guurang.
A sɔɔ teteng ɓarɛ, yi gbalang ɓiɓɛ daa ɓiri.
Yeesɔ seepaa daa ka gari Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Nwáng tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, a naa daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓarɛ, daa tusu ri vuu.
A ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu tusu ri vuu ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang vuu, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi wukɔ niizang.
Ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kagn. A mɛɛ nyaa nabm ka lapa tɔɔ,
“Ayii. Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, ruu, ɓaaɓɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ ruu ya? Mɔɔ arɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ruu katɔ ya? N zi mɔɔ tɔɔ, mɔkɔ zang shonang Laa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “Vɔ̃ nyaa ta, mɔɔ nwáng nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ.” A suru shi kpang tuu wu, loo wu ka tipi ka jĩng zang piti. A nwangnɛ, yàa wu bii kati, palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ yee kiya? Mangkɛ suru shi kpang, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwang ta nɛɛ yeti zang, a ri nwangkɛ, ri yaa zang bii.”
A nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
A Yeesɔ seepaa yaa gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, a daa ka gãa Siman, ka laa kaɓa, Siman ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi soro ɓiɓɛ roo katɔ nɛɛ bii zaa wu katɔ. A ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu masɛ wu.
A Yeesɔ daa ka bii Siman ɓeekpeng, a daa shii paa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a mangkɛ bii ɓɔɔ zaa wu kati, a bii yaa wu nɔng kati. A Siman ɓeekpeng seepaa kaa tantɛnang, kãa ri vuu shaanang.
Laa daa tɔ ka nyaa vàa, zang piti ɓɔɔ zang kɔnang ɓarɛ kagn, ri atɛ ri ka bii Yeesɔ. A Yeesɔ shĩli ri naa ka yuu nandon, a masɛ ri kati.
A suru shi kpang ti nwangkɛ kaa nɛɛ bii zang dɔɔli. Ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Jaa Laa.” A mangkɛ ri, kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ seepaa kaa nɛɛ gãndi, a daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang ri kãa Yeesɔ, ri kãa Yeesɔ, ri daa ĩi wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ. A ri gàa wu nɛɛ wu yaa tipi ɓarɛ kpang.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa shong m nɛɛ n rang yee tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔgn jong.”
A seepaa daayi daa rangkɛ zang yee Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ nandon.
Diki ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ shii ka nyaa mii waapo Janesara, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri màasɛ́ wu, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa yee Laa.
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng zi tonsi ziti ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang jaazĩi yinang ka nyaa mii waapo. Zang jaazĩi yinang kaɓa, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti tonsi, ri sɔɔ kaa jang jaazĩi ɓarɛ.

A Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti tonsi ɓɔɔ gbete. Tonsi ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ɓi ɓɔɔ Siman. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, wu dɔ̃ tonsi nɛɛ nyaa rang, wu daa nɛɛ mani ka yeti mii tɔkɔlɔng. A Yeesɔ nwang ka yeti tonsi, tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ vuu kana nɛɛ nɔngkɔ.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee rannang tɔ, a kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “Zaa tonsi ta, mɔɔ daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii bee katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ jang jaazĩi ka mii, tɔɔ nɔɔ yi jaazĩi kati.”
A Siman kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang, ruu dang jĩng tɔ nɛɛ zĩi sasak, ruu walɛ vuu kpang, n tɛ̃ɛ jang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔkɔ kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ jang jaazĩi tɔ, ri raa jaazĩi kaa gaagaa, jang ɓarɛ nɛɛ wu lɔɔsɔ kaa tɔ.

A ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti tonsi ɓɔɔ gbete, nɛɛ ri naa yi ri naa kaa jong bii. A ri arɛ ri naa see jaazĩi. Jaazĩi bìí wisi nyaa tonsi ziti kaɓa kaa nandon. Tonsi ɓarɛ yaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaa yeti mii.
Ɓɔɔ Siman Bituru zi naa weɓe, tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ Kpanti, daa ɓaa ta, mɔɔ yaa m, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n m zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Siman nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu jaazĩi ɓɔɔ ri yi ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ Siman ɓeesang, rɛɛ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana wujɛ Zebedi, ri mã naa ka danggn doo nɔngkɔ. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, kãntang keɓe mɔɔ nwang ɓaa tɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ yi jaazĩi kpang, mɔɔ nwáng ɓaa kaa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa nɛɛ ri a ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Ri nwangsɛ tonsi tɔ ka nyaa gãnggãng, a ri yaa vuu ɓarɛ piti, ri dũng Yeesɔ.
Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa yeti gari ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa wu dɔɔli kagn nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ zi Yeesɔ hn, arɛ naa tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, naa mɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ dĩi naa ɓiɓɛ lee wu, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kasɛ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.” A vuu bii yaa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.

Yeesɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daa sasak, mɔɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ zang ri zi kagn nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.”
A nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng ɓi doo nɛɛ mani. Zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa nɛɛ zang naa tãa yee ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ti màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓarɛ.
A Yeesɔ naa yaa nɔng kaɓa daa ka jĩngti, daa gaa Laa naa ɓasidi ɓɛɛ.

Diki ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu kana, a zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli ɓɔɔ alɛ nɛɛ gari piti ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili, nɛɛ Yahudi, a ɓɔɔ gari Urushalima nandon, ri nwáng kagn nɔngkɔ. A Laa a Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu màsɛ́ zang kɔnang nɛɛ mani kati.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ri tuu zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ ɓɔɔ ri ta ka laa nɛɛ ri atɛ wu ka tĩng Yeesɔ,

a ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ kaa takpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. A ri vangnɛ, ri puu nɔng ka yuu sãa lapa, ri yaa wu naa kaa nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ ri ta wu kagn, ri shing wu ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka tĩng Yeesɔ.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Masang, n yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”

A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisi ri gaa tɔɔsung ruu hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ kɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa ɓee ɓu wiya? Ɓi Laa kɔ gbete yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya?
Ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.’ Nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa ta mɔɔ rarɛ.’ Ɓu wi kpãa kpang ka teteng yee ziti keɓe wiya?

N masɛ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta mɔɔ kagn mɔɔ daa gãa.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, seepaa kaa tantɛnang ka jĩng zang, a see laa ɓɔɔ zang tà wu kagn, a daa gãa kati. Dɔɔ Laa kana gbalang.
Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri dɔɔ Laa kati. Bii kaa ri vɔrɔ, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa ɓɔɔgn lɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ.”
Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔ, a seepaa daanang kati. Daa kana, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Leevi nwang tɔ ka yeti gãa saka tipi tanang. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.”
A Leevi yaa vuu piti seepaa, dũng wu kati.
Leevi daa palɛ vuu shaanang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu Yeesɔ. Ka teteng zang kɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓa, zang saka tipi tanang kagn nɔngkɔ gaagaa. Ri shaa vuu shaanang kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.

Zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Farisi kɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kana nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang nɔɔ ti ɓooro vuu nɛɛ zang saka tipi tanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang kɔ doori viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔ̀ng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri katɔ kɔ ri daa shɛ̃ɛning.
N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kati.”
A zang kaɓa ri ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Farisi, ri seng nyaalaa ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ Laa gaanang piti, a ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang, ka ruu viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ri seng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ sinyɛ ɓeevɛ doo nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ ya? Ri sèng kpang.
Diki ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a doo naa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa seng nyaalaa kati.”

A ràng ri nyaa vuu jeenang kati tɔɔ, “Zang lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ ɓi jong, zang lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala nɛɛ mani kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang palɛ nɔngkɔ, zang làsɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kaɓa naa daa zɔɔ ɓi tɔ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala kaɓa kpang.
Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zàáng gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, sãa zàáng ɓi katɔ. Saa ti tɛ̃ɛ ka tipi. Koo bìí ti làsɛ́ katɔ.
Zang tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi doo ka zàáng ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kɔ doori.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓoo saa gbaala ɓi tɔ, kasɛ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓi takpang. Kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓi nɛɛ, ‘Ɓɔɔ gbaala kɔ tɔ̃ɔ.’ ”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ sɔ̀ɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ yeti jaa zee, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri lɔɔrɔ yuu zee, ri shaatɛ ka naa ɓarɛ, ri shaayi.
Ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛyi, ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓá nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ka ruu vi, nɔɔ palɛ shonang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ gngn kpang ya?
Naa ɓɔɔ daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, daa tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning. A shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”
A hangsɛ nyaa ruu tɔɔ, “Jaa shɔnzang kɔ kpanti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang.”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. Ka yeti gãa kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ naa nakn ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ.
Zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tɛ̃̀ɛ wu jĩng ka bii, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zirɛ naa masɛ zang katɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ya. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ɓɛɛ kati.
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Arɛ mɔɔ shii ka nihn.” A yɔɔ seepaa a ka bii Yeesɔ.

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Ń hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ karɛ, ‘Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ ruu pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang? Nɛɛ ruu masɛ zang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kɔ jong?’ ”
A Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ nandon, a kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dĩi naa ɓaaɓɛ ta.” A yɔɔ dĩi naa, a naa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa nɔng tɔkn.
Gnvɔ shaa rɛɛ Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri daa hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa daa Laa gaanang ka kɔpɔ. Yeesɔ gàa Laa nɛɛ zĩi sasak, nɔng gãntɛ nɛɛ mani.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang kopi tu ziti a tɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓarɛ kaa zang shonang ɓiɓɛ. Zang shonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ kaɓa, zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ,
Siman ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa a wu nung nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru. A ɓɔɔ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Batolomi,
nɛɛ Matiyu, nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Yakub jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ
nɛɛ Yahuda jaa Yakub, a ɓɔɔ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.

Yeesɔ shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a daa shii ka nyɛlɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli, nɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ tipi Yahudi, nɛɛ gari Urushalima, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo ɓɛɛ. Ri arɛ nɛɛ ri naa tãa yee Laa ɓɔɔ wu rangnɛ, nɛɛ wu ti màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓarɛ.
A Yeesɔ ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kaa jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang masɛnang nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, masɛ zang ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ tuu jĩng pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ:
“Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ, ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa a nɔkɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ, ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ nɔɔ katɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, Laa naa a nɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ yi nɔɔ buru ɓɛɛ ditɔ.
“Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa nyavɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ naa laarɛ ditɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ, naa zang kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, zang bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, zang dãa nɔɔ, zang kɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shi kpang, ka ruu Jaa Shɔnzang.
Zang nɛɛ palɛ nɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, nɔɔ dɔɔ bii katɔ. Nɔɔ ti tãa tĩnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shing nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn bang ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓarɛ pàlɛ́ zang nyaa shonang Laa doo nɔngkɔ ka tĩng.
Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ vuu naa manɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ walɛ tĩnang tãanang manɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ buru manɛ puu katɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ nɔɔ ditɔ.
“Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ laarɛ katɔ kãntang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti manɛ naa lasɛ ditɔ gbãng gbãng, nɔɔ ti naa kaa nyavɔ ditɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
“Jinang dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ, naa zang piti rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
“N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ruu kɔ n rang ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ ri kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ.
Nɔɔ gaa Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu manɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jĩng ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ nɔɔ ka kashoo dang gbete, nɔɔ raa wu dang gbete, wu ti nyɔrɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti ta fɔ̃ɔrɔ bang ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ hãa nɛɛ biling, mɔɔ ti zãa wu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ hãa nɛɛ tĩng kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gaa vuu ka naa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ zãa wu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tuu vuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ zang sɔɔrɔ mɔɔ kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ ri doo nɔngkɔ.
“Naa nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ ɓu vi ka bii Kpanti Laa viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang, ri kàsɛ́ ruu zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ tɔ̃ɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ vi ka naa Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ.

Naa nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ ri naa sɔɔrɔ nɔɔ vuu manɛ katɔ kɔ, nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ vi ka naa Kpanti Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kpang, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kɔ doori nyaa kɔ́pɔ́, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa ta kaa doo nɔngkɔ tɔkn.

Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔ́ɔ ti a zang vuu nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ nɛɛ zang wu naa sɔɔrɔ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kati. Nɔ́ɔ ti naa nwáng wujɛ Kpanti Laa kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn zang ɓɔɔ zãa wu kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Gn zang wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔgn zang kɔng Daa manɛ ɓɛɛ.

“Nɔ́ɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu kpang, Kpanti Laa wu ti naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu kpang kɔ doori. Nɔ́ɔ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Tɔɔ Kpanti Laa wu ti naa kɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu ti naa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ a zang vuu katɔ, Laa naa a nɔɔ ditɔ jong. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ka naa Laa, naa yi nyaa waka katɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, zang naa zĩiti, zang ĩi naa kagn. Zang wu ti tɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkn wu kãng ka tipi, tɔɔ zang wu a nɔɔ kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, waka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zang vuu nɛɛ mani, Laa naa mã nɔɔ doo nɛɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ti rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Zang jĩng ringtang, yi zang jĩng ringtang labalang ɓɔ̀ɔ ri ya? Ri dàa gɔlɔ zɔɔ ka yeti too kpang ya?
Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu, ɓa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu ɓi kpang. Nɛɛ mantɛ vuu tɔ piti, naa nwang ɓi kaa doo naa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu kɔ.
“Mɔɔ shíng jĩng ka zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaazung kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, mɔɔ yee laa ɓaa ka lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ kpang ka ruu viya?

A mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaazung ɓu kaa biya nɛɛ, ‘Manzung, n kaaɓi, n sha mɔɔ zũng laa tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ ɓi.’ A mɔɔ ti zi lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ ɓi kpang viya? Zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nwangsɛ lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ sha zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jĩng ɓaazung kati.
“Láa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ra jaa ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kpang. A laa ɓɔɔ shi kpang ti ra jaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang kɔ doori.
Zang zi laa nung ɓi ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ. Zang hãa mangɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka laa kaashiyaawo ya? Zang ti hãa jaa sĩiri katɔ ka bii kɔkɔ gbantang ya?

Shɔnzang ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Zang tɔ̃ɔ nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. A zang shi kpang ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang piti, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Ka ruu vi, nɔɔ ɓaarɛ m nɛɛ ‘Kpanti, Kpanti,’ a nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ kpang viya?
Zang piti ɓɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ, ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ n rangnɛ, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kàsɛ̀, ń tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa nwang ɓɛɛ.
Zang kaɓa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu mãa gãa, a shu too, loo doo gãa ka yuu pɛngkɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ mii rang kpayi, nyɔ ka bii gãa, palɛ gãa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mãa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

A zang ɓɔɔ tãa yee mɛɛ, a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ shu too gãa ka takpang ɓɛɛ. Loo doo gãa ɓiɓɛ ka tipi waati. Diki ɓɔɔ mii rang kpayi nyɔ ka bii gãa, gãa kaɓa tantɛ watɛnang. Watɛnang ɓiɓɛ shing baabii kagn kɛɛm.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ zang nyaa vuu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ ka shoo zang nandon, a naa seepaa daa ka Kafanahu.
Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja Rooma ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ. Kɔnang yi zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Kɔnang ɓiɓɛ bang dɔɔli, nɛɛ wu vɔrɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng.
A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa naa tãa nyaa Yeesɔ, a shong zang bang bang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ ri daa gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu naa màsɛ̀ wu zang shonang ɓiɓɛ.
A zang bang bang zang Yahudi naa a ka bii Yeesɔ. A ri bakɛ wu gbãng gbãng, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàlɛ́ wu vuu keɓe tɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ruu zang ɓuru dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ ti mãa ruu gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓuru.”
A Yeesɔ dàa kaa nɛɛ ri. Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja zirɛ Yeesɔ a kana naabm, a shong rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dabang, mɔɔ kpãa yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ka gãa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
N ti daa naa ɓɔɔ n a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Rang yee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang wu yaa zang shonang mɛɛ bii.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n m doo ka naa zang kɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn naa mɛɛ. Naa n kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ ‘Dita,’ daa katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ ‘Arɛ,’ ti a katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ zang shonang mɛɛ nɛɛ ‘palɛ vuu keɓe,’ ti palɛ katɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa yee kaɓa naa weɓe, mã naa ka danggn. A raa jĩng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu gaagaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n zi zang Isirela ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bìí mɛɛ gngn naa zang keɓe kpang.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja shong ri ka bìí Yeesɔ naa gbãayu ka gãa, ri zirɛ vuu yaa zang shonang yɔɔ sɔɔja nɔng tɔ.
Ka knti vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ naa tantɛ kaa daanang ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Naying ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri daa nɛɛ wu ning.

Yeesɔ a tɔ ka nyaa gãa gari naabm, a ɓee zang yuu ri túu vɔrɔ jaa suvɔ ɓɔɔ kagn gari ka kaɓa. Suvɔ kaɓa ti dũuru ri kana knti, nɛɛ zang gari ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ kaɓa wukɔ jaa suvɔ kaɓa gbete.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi suvɔ ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ vɔrɛ, gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng wu, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa kpang.”
A Yeesɔ arɛ naa lee naa ka laa ɓɔɔ zang tuu vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu vɔrɔ ri shii kaa kikiri. A kɔɔ vɔrɔ tɔɔ, “Jasang, n kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ seepaa ta.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ seepaa, a gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kati. A Yeesɔ yi wu a niiɓɛ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ, ri kaa vɔrɔ kaa nandon. A ri dɔɔ Laa ri tɔɔ, “Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ bang nwang nyaa lɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ ka teteng ɓuru. Laa a lɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ, nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ.”
Nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng, ka ruu vuu kɔ wu palɛ ɓee ka tipi Yahudi nandon nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ naabm nɛɛ Yahudi ɓɛɛ nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ri kɔɔ wu ruu ka yuu vuu keɓe nandon.
A Yɔhana ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti, a shong ri ka bii Yeesɔ. Yɔhana tɔɔ, ri daa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya? Kɔ, ruu gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔgn?”

A zang ɓɔɔ Yɔhana shongnɛ naa a ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima shong ruu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, tɔ́ɔ ruu hɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya kɔ ruu gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔgn?’ ”
Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ɓarɛ ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ dɔɔli. A ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang dɔɔli. A ti masɛ zang jĩng ringtang, ri zi nɔng kati.

Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ Yɔhana vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ. Zang jĩng ringtang ri zi nɔng kana. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ ri ti ra kana. Kɔnang zang vuu bii ti yaa ri nɔng tɔ. Zang shoo gbooto ri ti tãa nɔng kana. N ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ paa, a zang ti rǎng zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ruu tɔ̃ɔ Laa kana.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa danggn naa ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ Yɔhana shongnɛ ri daa tɔ, Yeesɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ruu Yɔhana kati tɔɔ. “Nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang ka waala viya? Lagaa ɓɔɔ jasung zĩiti ɓɛɛ ya?

Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri hã̀alɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti tãa tĩnang vuu naa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa, ri nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka dàbang kpanti.
A nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Zang nyaa shonang Laa ya? Nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔ a ɓa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓi kaa tɔ.
Wee zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang bee ruu ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang Laa kɔ. ‘Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, N shong zang nyaa shonang mɛɛ ditɔ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ, wu naa palɛ mɔɔ gbalang.’

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ka teteng zang piti ɓɔɔ zang soro yiki ka koo keɓe zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kagn gbete kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓa wu bannang katɔ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ piti, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, ri tãa ruu keɓe. Ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ɓɛɛ.
A zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli, ri bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana wu pàlɛ̀ ri batizima kpang.
Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “N gãsɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe ɓu nɛɛ viya?
Ri nwang naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka lumang, ri ɓaarɛ nyaa ka zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Ruu jee nɔɔ leere, nɔɔ sɔ dãng kpang. Ruu ti ɓaa nyaavaa, nɔɔ kaa nyavɔ kpang.’
Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima arɛ, shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ti ɓoo sàa kpang. Nɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ’.

A Jaa Shɔnzang arɛ, shaa vuu shaanang katɔ, ti ɓoo katɔ. Nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ zi zang nyɔkɔ keɓe, ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo saa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Yi wusang ɓi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ ɓɛɛ.’
Zũnang ɓɔɔ Laa a zang, tusu bii ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yɔɔ Farisi ɓɔɔ kagn ɓaa Yeesɔ nyaa nɛɛ wu daa shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. A Yeesɔ daa gãa yɔɔ Farisi kaɓa kati, daa nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.

Jaa soro ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kagn gari kaɓa. Ɓɔɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa zang Farisi kaɓa, seepaa, tuu nung ɓɔɔ á sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang sú nung bìí ka zàáng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɛɛ mani ka bii Yeesɔ.

A naa shii ka knti Yeesɔ ka doo ɓiɓɛ naabm, kaa kana, miiri ɓiɓɛ ti shili kana doo Yeesɔ. A ti alɛ miiri ɓɔɔ shili ka doo Yeesɔ kaa nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̃kɔ doo Yeesɔ, a tungku nung ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani kagn.

Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ɓaa Yeesɔ nyaa zi naa weɓe, kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, nɛɛ zi jaa soro kɔ lee wu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɛɛ ti zi naa nwannang jaa soro keɓe tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa soro keɓe ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Siman vuu ɓɔɔ, n tɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ kagn.” A Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu viya, maalang?”
Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn a zang ziti saka nyaa kɔ́pɔ́. Zang gbete ta saka dinari laa maani, dakn maani. Ɓɔɔ gbete ta laa ziti tu kopi.
Zang kɔ ri ta saka ka naa yɔɔ ɓa, ri walɛ saka ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔrɔ yɔɔ takpang, a yɔɔ yàa ri saka ɓɔɔ ri talɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Ka teteng zang ziti kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ naa kasɛ yɔɔ keɓe dɔɔli ɓu wiya?”
Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa wu saka dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”

A Yeesɔ raa jĩng pɛ̃ɛrɛ jaa soro, a kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi jaa soro keɓe tɔ waa? N a ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ a m mii ɓɔɔ n sɔɔ doo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Jaa soro keɓe kɔ sɔɔ m doo nɛɛ miiri ɓiɓɛ, a ti alɛ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ.
Mɔɔ ti tɔ̃kɔ kashĩi nyaa mɛɛ kpang, a ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n a ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ jaa soro keɓe yaa doo mɛɛ tɔ̃kɔnang gn kpang.
Mɔɔ ti tũuru nung ka yuu mɛɛ kpang, jaa soro keɓe tũuru m nung ka doo mɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, zang yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɔɔli tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ wu kasɛ m dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang yaa wu gbalang tɔkɔlɔng, kasɛ ruu zang ɓi tɔkɔlɔng.”
A kɔɔ jaa soro tɔɔ, “N yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri nwáng nɛɛ wu ka nɔng vuu shaanang, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu yɔɔ ki, kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ wiya?”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ jaa soro kaɓa tɔɔ, “Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ, a mɔɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Dita waasɛ̃.”

Knti bee kpang, Yeesɔ naa seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari bang bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, tɔkɔlɔng. Rang zang yee tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo ɓɛɛ. Daarɛ nɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ning.

A ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓɔɔ yiki ri ɓɛɛ. Zang soro kaɓa ɓi rɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ Zang ɓaa nɛɛ Magadaliya, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang manziti nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ Yuwana soro Kuza ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ka dabang Kpanti Hiridu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Susana, a ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔgn gaagaa, ɓɔɔ ri see vuu naa ɓarɛ, ri kãa Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Zang kpalɛ tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ gaagaa, a zang ɓɔɔ ti alɛ doo naa nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ. A Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔgn nwangnɛ nɛɛ wu daa vang jĩng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ. Vang jĩng vuu kana, a jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang, a zang naalɛ kaa nɛɛ doo. Jaaning ri ti naa arɛ ri yakɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka yuu tipi pɛngkɛ, a ri takɛ. Ri bangkɛ kana, a ri naa tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ tipi yà kpang ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kɔkɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɛɛ, a ri takɛ. Ri bangkɛ kana nɛɛ kɔkɔ ning, a kɔkɔ naa bangkɛ mulu ri.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ. Ri bangkɛ ri tasɛ yuu. Ri shing jĩng gaagaa, ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang katɔ dakn laa maani.” Ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a naa kɔɔ ri nabm tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa hɛ̃ɛ wu dĩiri yee ɓɔɔ wu rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɛɛ kati.

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, Laa a nɔkɔ naa zinang. A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn, n rang ri yee ɓi nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shu jĩng nɛɛ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu, ri zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓaa shoo nɛɛ ri tãayi, ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe. Jĩng vuu keɓe, ɓi ruu Kpanti Laa.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang nwang ɓi kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Kpanti Laa a Sheetang kpanti suru shi kpang, arɛ naa zɔ̃ng Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu tipi pɛngkɛ, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa, a ri ta nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. A ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ɓaa dĩiri tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ri yaa gbalang Laa ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ danggn ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.

Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri dũng kana, a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang naa mulu Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãayi. A Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nwang ri vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, nwang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ tãa Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri tarɛ, ri shing ka yeti ɓarɛ, ri mã danggn, a ri naa nwang kaa naa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ bangnɛ ra jaa gaagaa ɓɛɛ.

“Zang mang waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓi jong, zang zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Zang ti shing ka dii latãng kpang. Zang nɛɛ mang waa zàáng sɔɔ tɔ, zang shing ɓi ka yuu vuu lapa kɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yakɛ zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu tu ka yeti gãa nɔng kati.
“Vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ kpang, ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang ti zi kpang, Laa naa nwangsɛ ditɔ, zang zirɛ.

“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa yee Laa ɓɛɛ ning. Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wu ɓɔɔgn ditɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ wu shing danggn kagn, ka naa ɓiɓɛ ditɔ.”
A nàá Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri walɛ gbalang daanang bii ɓiɓɛ naabm kaa takpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa naaɓɛ ri shi ka biling, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nàá mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá mɛɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa, a ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Ruu Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ vang tonsi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu ta nɔɔ rang ta, ruu daa nɔɔ nyaa rang ɓɔɔ dang.” A ri seepaa daanang kati.
Ri daa kana yeti tonsi, a hingro yi Yeesɔ kati. A jasung bang naa seepaa rannang ka yuu waapo. Mii a kana yeti tonsi, tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔ,
a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa hingsi wu. Ri tɔɔ, “Dabang Dabang, ruu ɔ̃ɔ kana.” A Yeesɔ seepaa mangkɛ jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ ri gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A mii kàa kati, jasung ti voo nyaa kaa jong.

Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kaa kiya?” Ri kaa vɔrɔ, ri ti mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lɛ̀ɛ́ zang viya? Jasung nɛɛ mii, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ wiya?”
Ri ta rang tɔ, a ri naa a ka tipi Ganasara ɓɔɔ ka paa ɓɔɔ laa nwangnɛ mani, raa zɔɔ jĩng nɛɛ Galili ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti tonsi hn, a zang gbete ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang nɛɛ gari kaɓa, arɛ naa ɓee wu yuu kati. Diki ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii kpang bee tɔ. Ti roo gãa kpang. Roo ɓi ka nɔng yuu sàa.
Ɓɔɔ wu zi Yeesɔ hn, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ. Mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nabm, nɛɛ “Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bìí mɛɛ viya? Yeesɔ Jaa Kpanti Laa. N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, mɔɔ dang m jĩng kpang.”

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, nɛɛ wu nwáng ta, wu yaa yɔɔ bii ɓɛɛ. Suru shi kpang keɓe yuku wu paa ka bii dɔɔli. Zang mã wu nɛɛ soo saka nɛɛ lengtaa, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang gãng jĩng ka wu ɓɛɛ. A dɔlɔ saka nɛɛ lengtaa kaɓa katɔ, wu ti daarɛ ka jĩngti naa ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang tasɛ wu naa ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ viya?” A kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa m nɛɛ ‘Dɔɔli.’ ” Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
A suru shi kpang kaɓa, ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu dɔ̃ɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka ruu zang shi kpang, kpang.
Ka laa kaɓa, gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn doo kɔpɔ ka nɔngkɔ. A suru shi kpang ri gàa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu yaa ri, ri tu ka bii gãnya. A Yeesɔ yáa ri kati.
A suru shi kpang kaɓa ri nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii yɔɔ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya. A gãnya kɔ gaagaa ɓa, yuku ri sɔɔ gbalang nyaa rang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii nandon, a ri vɔlɔ.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã gãnya zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe, ri yuku, ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ruu keɓe ka gari kaɓa, nɛɛ gari tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa ɓɛɛ.

A zang nwangkɛ, nɛɛ ri daa zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri a tɔ, ka bii Yeesɔ, ri zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangnɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang tɔ ka tĩng Yeesɔ. Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka bii, suru bii ɓiɓɛ ti sɔɔ tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ kati.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri zi jĩng bii, ri kɔɔ zang naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ masɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
A zang tipi Ganasara nandon ri bakɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu dita, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ vang tonsi gbãayu kati.
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangnɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, gàa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, wu daa nɛɛ wu ning. Yeesɔ kasɛ kpang, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
“Gbãayu ta gari ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.” A yɔɔ daayi, daa kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ, kaa nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ka gari.
Yeesɔ naa gbãayu tɔ ka nyaa rang dang tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, a ri ta wu kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri gã wu katɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yayiru, arɛ naa tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ. Yayiru kaɓa ɓi zang bang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang.
Yayiru bakɛ Yeesɔ, ka ruu jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang soro, ɓɔɔ saa ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti vɔ kana. Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri màasɛ́ wu kati.
A jaa soro ɓɔɔ zĩi kpaa wu daa saa kopi tu ziti, zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu masɛnang kagn kpang
á nɛɛ knti, naa lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ Yeesɔ. A zĩi ɓɔɔ kpaa wu dɔng kaa tantɛnang.

A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi lee m naa ka bii wiya?” Ɓɔɔ zang piti ri laa nyaa tɔ, nɛɛ ri zi kpang, Bituru naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati tɔɔ “Dabang, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya? Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ zang kɔ ri kiiri mɔɔ nyaa ka teteng rikɔ màasɛ́ mɔɔ kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ lee m naa kagn bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi naa zang masɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a m nwang tɔ nɛɛ bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”

A jaa soro ɓɔɔ lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii, zi tɔ nɛɛ zang zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔ, a arɛ, bii zaa wu kana, a naa tang ka tĩng Yeesɔ. A kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ, wu lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ, ka shoo zang nandon nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zĩi dɔng kaa tantɛnang ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ jaa soro kaɓa tɔɔ, “Man jaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ masɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daa waasɛ̃.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa ka nyaa, zang gbete a nɛɛ gãa yɔɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓaaɓɛ vɔ tɔ, mɔɔ gboro maalang takpang.”
Yeesɔ tãa kati, a kɔɔ Yayiru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, shing ɓaa danggn kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka bii mɛɛ, suru jaa a ɓi ditɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn.”
Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ gãa Yayiru tɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu daa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa kpang, daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Yakub, nɛɛ daa jaa, nɛɛ nàá jaa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng nandon ri kaa ɓarɛ kana, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti ku naa yuu ka ruu jaa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ kaa kpang, vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.”
A ri laarɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ jaa vɔ ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ yi jaa ka naa, a ɓaa jaa nyaa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa seepaa ta.”
A suru bii jaa gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng tɔkn. A jaa seepaa kaa tantɛnang. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a wu vuu ta wu shaayi.”
Daa jaa nɛɛ nàá jaa ri mã naa ka danggn. Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ kopi tuu ziti ka nɔng gbete, a á ri naa suru shi kpang nandon nwangsɛnang nɛɛ zang kɔnang masɛnang.
A shong ri nɛɛ ri dita ri daa rang zang yee Kpanti roonang Laa nɛɛ ri ti masɛ zang kɔnang.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ tuu vuu zanti daanang ka naa kpang. Nɔ́ɔ tuu labalang nɛɛ duku nɛɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ saka ka naa kpang. Nɔ́ɔ ti hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ziti ka bii kpang.
Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn, nɔɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn wu a nɔng.

Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kaa tɔ, nɔ́ɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi tɔɔgn nɛɛ ri kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ Laa naa jee ri ruu ditɔ.”
A ri seepaa, ri daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari tɔkɔlɔng, tɔkɔlɔng nandon. Ri rangkɛ zang yee Laa, a ri ti masɛ zang kɔnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daarɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.
Ɓɔɔ Hiridu kpanti Galili tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa wisi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima paa tɔ tɔkn nɛɛ sàa.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ Iliya nwang nyaa tɔ tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa wisi zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa tɔkn.
Hiridu tɔɔ, “N dɔng yuu Yɔhana tɔ, ɓi kaa wi palɛ vuu kɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɛɛ wiya?” A kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri ĩi zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kopi tu ziti naa gbãayu kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ see rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka gbalang gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛsɛda ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ daayi, ri dũuru knti ɓiɓɛ kati. Ri naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ, a Yeesɔ jee ri nyaa, a rang ri yee Kpanti roonang Laa kati. A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang yiki ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, ri naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa zang naa ta, zang wu daarɛ ka gari ɓɔɔ bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka nihn naabm, zang ɓu wu daa kãa vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng roonang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ gãa ka nihn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔkɔ nɔ́ɔ a ri vuu shaanang.” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Borodi ɓuru yaa kaa maani nɛɛ jaazĩi ziti kɔ nwani. Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu daa hoo zang kɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓee vuu shaanang ya?”
(Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ka nɔng kaɓa daa labang maani katɔ.) A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu kaa bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kusu zang ta laa ziti tu kopi, laa ziti tu kopi, ri nwalɛ ka tipi.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kusu zang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔ zang, zang ri nwalɛ ka tipi.
A tuu borodi maani kɔ nɛɛ jaazĩi ɓa, tuu jĩng ka lapa, a zãa Laa, shalɛ, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta.
Zang shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti sàáng kopi tu ziti.
Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Yeesɔ gaa Laa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kagn nɔngkɔ. Hangsɛ nyaalaa gaanang tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ri kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ nkɔ wiya?”

Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔkɔ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ mɔkɔ Iliya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, mɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa wisi wukɔ paa nɛɛ saa.”
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ nkɔ wiya?” A Bituru kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang.

A ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Jaa shɔnzang naa dang jĩng ditɔ dɔɔli. Zang bang, bang zang Yahudi, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri ti bɛ̃ɛ wu, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ diki, diki wu dũng m.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛɛ naa walɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
Naa shɔnzang wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu keɓe nwǎng wu ɓu viya?

Zang ɓɔɔ tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ mɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ yee mɛɛ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓi doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a ka naa bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Daa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn teteng zang kɔ ka nihn ɓee ri vɔ kpang. Ri zi kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ gbongkarɛ.”
Diki mantaati ɓa tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa vang kɔpɔ daa gaa Laa. Daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Yakub kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Gaa Laa doo naa, a waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ risi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn. Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nwang kaa puru shãa shãa.
A zang ziti, Musa nɛɛ Iliya ri nwang nyaa, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ wu.
Ri nwang nyaa bii ɓarɛ kɔlɔ katɔ, a ri rang yee nɛɛ wu ka naa ɓɔɔ wu naa vɔ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
A Bituru nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu hingro kpiti ri jĩng tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri hingsi jĩng ri zi Yeesɔ ka bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ zang ziti kaɓa seepaa daanang tɔ, Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, wee ruu ka nihn, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Rúu kaaɓi ruu waa kúutu taati, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.” (A Bituru zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ keɓe ɓi kpang.)
Bituru kɔɔ ruu kaɓa doo naa nyaa, sãmbong arɛ naa zuu ri, a ri kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ sãmbong zuu ri kana ɓɛɛ.
Ri tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong tɔɔ, “Wee Jaa Mɛɛ ɓɔɔ N zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ kɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
Ri tãa yee tɔ naa weɓe, a ri naa zi Yeesɔ kaa bm. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ taati kaɓa, ri shing ruu keɓe ka yeti ɓarɛ. Ka diki kaɓa ri kɔɔ zang gbete vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ɓɛɛ kpang.
Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ taati ri shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ nɛɛ gãndi, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa naa ɓee wu yuu kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ mɛ́ɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Maalang, n gaa mɔɔ katɔ, gn jaa gbete mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.
Suru shi kpang keɓe nɛɛ mã wu tɔ, mɛɛrɛ nyaa tantɛnang. Wu ti mãrɛ, puru wu puu nɛɛ nyaa dung dung. Dang wu jĩng sasak, yaa wu naa pati kpang.
N gàa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ n tɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang keɓe ri zunung kpang.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “zang koo jaa knti keɓe, nɔɔ shi kpang. Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ n mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Atɛ m jaa ɓaaɓɛ ta.”
Ɓɔɔ jaa a kana, suru shi kpang tuu wu loo ka tipi, a mã kati. Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang, a suru shi kpang nwangnɛ, a sɔɔrɔ daa jaa, jaa ɓiɓɛ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔngkɔ piti, ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang ri mã naa doo ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ, wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ danggn wu ning nɔɔ kaa takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa tuu Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ, a zang ɓɔɔgn ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Ri zi dĩiri ruu kɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓee kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi kpang. Ri tɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu dĩiri ruu keɓe, a ri kaa vɔrɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nwáng zang bang ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tuu jaa tɔkɔlɔng shii wu nɛɛ doo ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.

A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ ta jaa keɓe, ka ruu mɛɛ ta ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta m, ta zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing gn nɛɛ wu ɓi zang bang kpang ka teteng manɛ, wukɔ zang bang manɛ.”
Yɔhana kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ, a ruu zãa wu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dũng knti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ zãa wu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓuru kpang, ɓi doo zang ɓuru kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu daa lapa yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ shing jĩng daanang kaa Urushalima.
A shong zang ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ ka tĩng. A zang shonang kaɓa ri daa hãa nyaa ka gari zang Samariya ɓɔɔ gbete. Ri nɛɛ ri shĩili wu nɔng roonang.
A zang gari kaɓa ri kasɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ wu a ka yeti gari ɓarɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ shing jĩng ɓi kaa Urushalima daanang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Yakub nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ ruu gaa Laa, wu shong waa nɛɛ lapa, wu shaa ri ya?”
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng mangkɛ ri.
A sha kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka gari ɓɔɔgn.
Ri daa kana gbalang, a zang ɓɔɔgn gbete kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N dũng knti ɓaaɓɛ n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa ɓɛɛ piti.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeng rɛɛ yaka jĩngti kagn, a saara jaaning ti kagn, a gãa ɓɔɔ Jaa shɔnzang roo ɓi kagn kpang.”
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.” A zang kaɓa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang, ya m ta, n gbãa daa mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔɔ, n naa dũng mɔɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ɓaaɓɛ. Yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang gn kpang ri gbãa zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ. Daa ɓaari mɔɔ daa kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃̀ɔ́ Kpanti roonang Laa.”
Zang ɓɔɔgn ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N dũng mɔɔ katɔ Dabang, yaa m ka gbongkarɛ n daa jee zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa mɛɛ nyaa.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ gaayu shonang Laa palɛnang a nwãa jĩng ka knti, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti kpang.”
Ka knti vuu keɓe Yeesɔ zɔ̃ngkɔ zang laa taati tu kopi a ɓakɛ ri ziti, ziti, a shongko ri ka rɛɛ gari nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ɓɔɔ wu naa daarɛ ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zee daa naa yeenang tɔ, a zang yeenang haa kaa takpang. Nɔɔ gaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang jaa ɓɛɛ ta, wu shong zang zee yeenang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
Nɔɔ dita, n shong nɔɔ naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ka teteng zaa wisi.
Nɔ́ɔ tuu duku saka tɛ̃ɛnang nɛɛ duku zanti daanang, nɛɛ koodoo ɓɔɔ, ka naa kpang. Nɔ́ɔ ti suukãng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jee zang nyaa ka gbalang kpang.
Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn piti, nɔɔ jee zang nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ nwang tɔ̃ɔ.’
Naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ kagn gãa kaɓa, naa nwang ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa zang kaɓa kagn kpang naa nwang nɔngkɔ kpang.
Nɔɔ nwang ka gãa gbete kaɓa kɔ, nɔ́ɔ shaa vuu, nɔ́ɔ ti ɓoo mii ɓoonang ɓɔɔ ri a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang shonang doo ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ dɔ̃sɔ gãa kpang.
Gari ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn piti, zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ shaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ masɛ zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari kaɓa katɔ. Nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ‘Diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti a tɔ kaa naabm.’
Gari ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kagn, zang gari kaɓa nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ sɔɔrɔ boo gãa ɓarɛ, nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ,
‘Rùu wàa nɔɔ tapuru gari manɛ ɓɔɔ ka doo ɓuru tɔ, tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ’. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, Kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, jĩng dannang zang gari kaɓa naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang gari Sɔɔdom katɔ.

“Jĩng dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ gari Korazing. Jĩng dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ gari Bɛsɛda, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shonang bang kɔ n palɛ nɔɔ ɓee n nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ ka gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong, ri nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ, ri nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ. Ri nɛɛ hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ, ri nɛɛ tɛ̃ɛ pũngku tɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kaa gn nɛɛ ri ràa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ yuu knti tɔ.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, Laa naa dang nɔɔ jĩng ɓa ɓɔɔ zang rɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong katɔ.
Zang gari Kafanahu, nɔkɔ naa ɓa rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ nandon nɛɛ bannang ya? Kpang, Laa naa tasɛ nɔɔ ka waa kɔ jong.”
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ, ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti bɛ̃ɛ m, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ laa taati tu kopi tu ziti ri gbãayu. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang suru shi kpang ri ti ɓáa shoo ka nyaa ɓuru katɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ ri ruu tɔ ka nung ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi sheetang watɛ nɛɛ lapa naa shala ɓɔɔ mang takoti ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zirɛ n a nɔɔ naa tɔ, nɔɔ ra ka yuu sɔkɔ nɛɛ gbuuri. Nɔɔ ti ɓa zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ zang kpang yuu katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kpaa nɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
Nɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ tãa tĩnang manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee nung manɛ tɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”

Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ dɔ̀ɔ Laa kati ka ruu tĩnang tãanang ɓɔɔ suru Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zãa mɔɔ tɔ Dada, Kpanti lapa nɛɛ tipi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ, mɔɔ naa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ Dada, wee naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

“Daa mɛɛ a m vuu piti tɔ ka naa. A zang ɓɔɔ zi Jaa kagn gbete kpang. Daa kɔ zi wu gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi Daa kagn gbete kpang, Jaa kɔ zi wu gbete nɛɛ shɔnzang piti ɓɔɔ Jaa kasɛ nɛɛ wu tusu wu Daa ɓɛɛ.”
A raa jĩng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwĩiri tɔɔ, “Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee, a ri zi kpang. Ri nɛɛ ri tãa vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, ri ti tãa kpang.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee ɓɛɛ dɔɔli, seepaa nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Yeesɔ. Hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, naa n palɛ ɓu bɛ̀ɛ vi, n walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, kɔɔ nɛɛ viya? Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãrɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ viya?”

Kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu kasɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang nɛɛ yeti gbete, nɛɛ suru bii zang piti, nɛɛ kaka zang piti, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang zang piti.’ Nɛɛ ‘Zang ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung doo naa ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ bii zang ɓɛɛ kɔ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Palɛ veɓe kɔ, mɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ditɔ.”
A yɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi manzung wiya?”

Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔgn seepaa nɛɛ gari Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa ka gari Jeriko. Daa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ri nɔ̀ɔ wu ka gbalang. Ri nyɔ wu ri talɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ, ri daayi, ri yaa wu ka nɔngkɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete.
Zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa sɔɔ gbalang kaɓa a naa kpaa jĩng ka wu ka tipi. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi wu naa weɓe, kusu waala daayi.
