Zang zɔ̃ng Leevi ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ka Gãa Laa ti arɛ, naa kpaa jĩng ka wu. A ti kusu waala doo nɔngkɔ, daayi, yaa wu.
“A yɔɔ Samariya ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ wu daa zanti sɔɔ gbalang kaɓa, arɛ naa kpaa jĩng ka wu ka tipi, a gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng wu.
A daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ daa sɔɔ wu nyaa vuu waa, nwãa nung kagn, a kãng kati. A tuu wu, shing wu ka dakn seesaa ɓiɓɛ a daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓɔɔ zang zanti ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, a gãng jĩng ka wu ka nɔngkɔ.

Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a sèe saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ dinari ɓɛɛ ziti, a zang gãa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Yi m zang kɔnang keɓe naa jong ka bii. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ ningsi ka yuu ɓiɓɛ piti, n nɛɛ naa gbãayu tɔ, ń naa sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ mɔɔ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli kaɓa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng zang taati kaɓa ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ wukɔ ɓeezung yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ri nyɔ wu ka gbalang kaɓa wiya?”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ Samariya ɓɔɔgn yɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.” A Yeesɔ risi nyaa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita mɔɔ daa palɛ jong naa yɔɔ Samariya kaɓa.”
Yeesɔ ri daa kana gbalang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ a naa hãa nyaa ka jaa gari. A jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Mata, ta wu zanti ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ.
Jaa nàá Mata ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Marayamu nwang ka tĩng Yeesɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
A Mata nwãa bii ɓi nɛɛ shonang palɛnang. A arɛ naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, mɔɔ yee laa ɓaa ka ɓɔɔ jaa nàá mɛɛ yàa m shonang ka bm ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Kɔɔ wu ta nɛɛ wu yi m naa ka shonang.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mata, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ, a bii ti nwãa mɔɔ ka ruu vuu dɔɔli.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani. Marayamu ya ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta kagn nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkn kpang.”

Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Yeesɔ gaa Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Hangsɛ nyaa tɔ, a zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa jong, naa ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ gaa Laa, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Daa ɓuru Laa, zang wu dɔɔ nung tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta. Zang zirɛ nɛɛ mɔkɔ Kpanti.
A ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu shaa ɓɛɛ jɔng diki diki.
Yaa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ ruu yàá zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ yaa Sheetang wu gãsɛ ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.’ ”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, daa ka bii ɓeesang nɛɛ gãmbang zĩi, nɛɛ wu a wu borodi jong taati,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓeesang ɓɔɔ a zanti shɛ̃ɛ gãa nɛɛ zĩi, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a wu kpang.
Ɓeesang ɓɔɔ ka yeti jaka kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Mɔ́ɔ kpãa m kpang, kãntang keɓe, n ku nyaa gãa tɔ. Wujɛ mɛɛ ti rooro tɔ, n zunung ɓɔɔ n seepaa n a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ takpang.’
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa seepaa a wu borodi doo ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu ɓeesang kpang, sèépaa ditɔ, á wu gaagaa naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu tĩng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yi ɓɛɛ.
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, nɔɔ gaa ta, Laa a nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ kãa ta, nɔɔ ĩi katɔ. Nɔɔ ti ɓaa nyaa ta, Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gaayi, Laa a wu katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kãayi, ti ĩi katɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa nyaa, Laa kasɛ wu nyaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi dáa kiya ka teteng manɛ, naa jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ gaa jaazĩi ka naa ɓiɓɛ, tuu sɔkɔ kɔ jong a wu ka nung jaazĩi wiya?
Kɔ naa jaa gaa angkn, wu a jaa gbuuri wiya?
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shi kpang, nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a wujɛ manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka tansi Daa manɛ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ya? Zunung ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu suru tɔ̃ɔ kpang ya?”
Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, a suru shi kpang naa nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ naa rang yee kati. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon ri mã naa ka danggn.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔɔ, nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu, kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ wu. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa shong ɓɛɛ.”

Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri nɛɛ basɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri nɛɛ gaa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ kaa tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete ri nɛɛ ti basɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri shaarɛ kaa tɔ.
Naa sheetang basɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ nwang biya? N kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu a m ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ.
Naa n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu a m, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ, ri nwangsɛ ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rikɔ naa nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ.
N nɛɛ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa Laa, Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, a tɔ ka teteng manɛ.
“Zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli nɛɛ see vuu waa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu gã gãa ɓiɓɛ, zang ɓɔɔ yi naa ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ ka vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ɓa wu kaka katɔ nɛɛ gàa nyaa nɛɛ wu, a nɛɛ ti ɓa wu kaka, sèé vuu waa ɓɔɔ zang keɓe shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, wu basɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɛɛ kaa nandon.
“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ɓang ɓi nɛɛ n kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti kpalɛ zang nɛɛ n kpang, tantɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong.
“Suru shi kpang nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ bii zang. Daayi, kãarɛ nɔng Ɔ̃sɔnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ĩi kpang, wu kɔɔ kati nɛɛ, ‘N gbãayu kaa gãa gbaala mɛɛ tɔkn.’
Nɛɛ arɛ, nɛɛ naa ĩi gãa, zang kooro katɔ, a zang ti shĩili vuu katɔ nyaa kiiri.
Gbãayu daa atɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔgn, manziti, ɓɔɔ ɓa wu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa nwang kaa gãa kaɓa. Nwannang zang kaɓa naa lasɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ɓi kaa tɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu doo naa, jaa soro gbete ka teteng zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ yi mɔɔ, a ti a mɔɔ mii danggn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa, ri shing ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.”

Zang dɔɔli ri álɛ̀ kana gń tɔkn, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang ti pàlɛ̀ ri kpang. Zang tusu ri ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Yunana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwǎng zang koo jaa knti keɓe vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓi doo naa ɓɔɔ Yunana nwàng zang gari Ninivi ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Zang soro ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Sheeba naa seepaa ditɔ, wu dɔng zang koo jaa knti keɓe ruu, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a nɛɛ koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpala kpala nɛɛ wu naa tãa zũnang kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa kpanti Sulemanu katɔ kagn nihn.

Zang gari Ninivi naa seepaa ditɔ, ri dɔng zang koo jaa knti keɓe ruu, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yunana rang ri Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yunana bannang katɔ kagn nihn.
“Zang ɓɔɔ kagn mang waa zàáng sɔ̀ɔ, wu zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Shing ɓi yuu vuu lapa kɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tu ka yeti gãa, ri zi nɔng kati.
Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ waa zàáng sɔɔ bii ɓaaɓɛ. Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ yakɛ katɔ nandon. Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, bii ɓaaɓɛ tɔ̀ɔ ɓi katɔ nandon.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, pálɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔ̀ɔ́ bii ɓaaɓɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
Bii ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yakɛ katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, naa yakɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ katɔ nandon, naa ɓɔɔ waa zàáng sɔɔ yakɛ mɔɔ nɔng ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee rannang tɔ, a yɔɔ Farisi ɓaa wu nyaa kati nɛɛ wu daa shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. A daayi, daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang ka gãa yɔɔ.
Yɔɔ Farisi mã naa ka danggn, ka ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ sɔɔ naa ka gbongkarɛ, shaa vuu shaanang kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ Farisi, nɔɔ sɔ̀ɔ́ dakn waka nɛɛ dakn gbanti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a yeti manɛ ɓi zang mulunang kɔ nɛɛ yeti lanang shɛ̃ɛning.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shoko ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ biling, wukɔ palɛ yeti doori kpang ya?
Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti waka manɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu manɛ piti nwang ditɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.

“Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ Farisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zɔ̃ng Laa vuu gbete ka teteng vuu kopi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ naa rɛɛ zitaa nɛɛ siteng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃́ɛ ka yɔkɔ naa weɓe piti. A nɔɔ yaa ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu naa ɓɔɔ rúu kasɛ Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ palɛ vuu keɓe nandon, nɔɔ yaa ɓɔɔ kpang.
“Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ Farisi. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nɔng nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, nɛɛ nɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang jee nɔɔ nyaa, zang a nɔɔ bannang kagn ka lumang ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang naa yuu saa, ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang, zang ra ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang Labeenang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, mɔɔ lasɛ ruu yeti katɔ kɔ doori nɛɛ vuu kɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”

A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zang Labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ĩi zang vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa nyaa tuunang katɔ, nɔɔ lee naa manɛ ɓi kagn naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zang naa tuunang kpang ɓɛɛ.
Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ mãarɛ yuu sàá zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ ri nyɔkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ dabang manɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa, a nɔɔ mãarɛ manɛ kaa yuu sàa ɓarɛ.
Laa rang yee ka yeti zũnang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘N shong ri zang nyaa shonang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Ri naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ, ri ti dang ɓɔɔ jĩng.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang naa dǎng zang koo jaa knti keɓe kɔ jĩng, ka ruu zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu koo keɓe mãanang, ɓɛɛ.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ gaayu ka bii Habila a nɛɛ mani ka bii Zakariya ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ka teteng nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn nɛɛ Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ zang naa dang zang koo jaa knti keɓe kɔ jĩng.

“Jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ta zang gbalang Ruu Laa zinang, a nɔɔ ti dũ̀ng gbalang kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ daanang katɔ gbalang kpang.”

Yeesɔ yaa nɔng kaɓa, a Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa nɛɛ wu nɛɛ tɔɔ gnvɔ nɛɛ shaa wu tɔ wu rang yee kaa yuu vuu dɔɔli. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu vuu ka yuu vuu gaagaa.
Ri kasɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri yi wu kaa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.

Zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔ labang gaagaa, nɔng doo naanang kagn kpang. Ri vãlɛ kaa yuu zɔɔ. A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɔɔnang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yisi zang Farisi. Yisi ɓarɛ ɓi nwãarɛnang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ kpang, ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ kpang, ɓi kagn kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔlɔ katɔ, zang naa tãa ɓi ditɔ piti. Nɔɔ nɛɛ rang zang katɔ ka yeti gãa nɛɛ nwĩiri, zang naa kɔɔ zang nimbang ditɔ nandon.
“Masang, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ gãmpãng bii kɔ shɛ̃ɛning a ri zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
N tusu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ gãmpãng bii tɔ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu tasɛ ka waa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Niizang n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
“Zang mãlɛ́ jaaning tɔkɔsisi maani, wu kɔpɔ ziti kpang ya? Laa sùu gbete kagn teteng ɓarɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ zi kpang ya? Naa doo suuyuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa gã katɔ nandon. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, nɔɔ ɓa tɔkɔsisi katɔ.
“N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta m ka jĩng zang nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ, ka tĩng zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ wu ɓi zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ niizang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa nyaa mɛɛ ka tĩng zang, n naa laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ doo katɔ kɔ ka tĩng zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
“Zang piti ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang, ka yuu Jaa Shɔnzang, Laa yaa wu gbalang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Suru Laa, Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi kpang.

“Zang nɛɛ atɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi, kɔ ka bii gɔmna, kɔ bii zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri yiti tipi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ daa kasɛ zang nyaa, nɛɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa naa tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ ka laa kaɓa ɓɛɛ.”
Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ gaagaa kaɓa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, kɔɔ manzung nɛɛ wu basɛ vuu vɔ ta nɛɛ n.”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Masang, ɓu wi shing m zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, kɔ zang ɓɔɔ basɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ wiya?”
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng, ka jĩng shinnang ka vuu naa ning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gãsɛ suru bii shɔnzang nɛɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ ri ruu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Zang vuu naa ɓɔɔ kagn, lang jaa, a walɛ vuu shaanang dɔɔli.
A rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘N palɛ biya? Nɔng ɓɔɔ n tɛ̃ɛ vuu gbaa mɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.’
A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. N jili bɔ̃nɔ mɛɛ ka tipi, n mã́arɛ̀ ɓɔɔgn bang bang. Tɔ̀ɔ, n kpalɛ vuu gbaa mɛɛ nɛɛ vuu naa mɛɛ kagn nandon.’
Tɔ̀ɔ, n kɔɔ bii mɛɛ kati nɛɛ, ‘Mɔɔ walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, nung saa gaagaa. Nwang ta mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang, mɔɔ ɓoo ɓɔɔ ɓoonang, mɔɔ tãa tĩnang kati.’
A Laa naa kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Shoko kiɓi, lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ nɛɛ zĩi keɓe, mɔɔ vɔ kaa tɔ. Vuu kɔ mɔɔ shĩ̀lí ɓɛɛ, naa raa ɓu kaa ɓɔɔ wiya?’ ”
A Yeesɔ hangsɛ yee ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàlɛ̀ yuu ɓarɛ vuu naa, a ka tĩng Laa, vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang, ri naa nwang ɓarɛ doo naa yɔɔ kɔ doori.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ nyɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa shaayi, nɛɛ ruu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, suru bii shɔnzang ɓa vuu shaanang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Bii shɔnzang ti ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi rɛɛ gãgãa karɛ. Ri lang jaa kpang, ri ti yee zee jong kpang. Gòoto vuu tɛ̃ɛnang ɓarɛ ɓi kagn nɛɛ bɔ̃nɔ kpang. Laa a ri vuu shaanang katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓaa jaaning katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu gisi yuu ɓiɓɛ diki katɔ ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ ya?
A nɔɔ nɛɛ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng naa weɓe palɛnang kpang, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu viya?
Nɔɔ zi mangwaa ɓɔɔ ri bangkɛ ɓɛɛ karɛ. Ri palɛ wu shonang kpang, ri ti see fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang. Naa doo kpanti Sulemanu nɛɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ piti, fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shirɛ, daa doo mangwaa keɓe kpang.
Laa nɛɛ gbarɛ wisi kɔ zang zi lɛɛkɔ, ɓuru zang dɔɔ kaa nɛɛ waa ɓee, a nɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ka ruu viya?
“Nɔ́ɔ nyɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaayi, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓoo ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang ka koo keɓe, ri shing jĩng ka vuu keɓe kɔ. Daa manɛ zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ veɓe katɔ.
Nɔɔ shíng danggn ka kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ kɔ jong. A nɔɔ vuu keɓe ditɔ kagn nandon.
“Wee nɔɔ rukutu ɓee, nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, Daa manɛ kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ roo kpanti nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ mãlɛ́ vuu naa manɛ ta, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ saka. Nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang, ka nɔng Laa. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shaarɛ kpang, shɔngɓɔ daa ɓɔɔ kpang, tuuru ri ti daa lasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang shing gn ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kpalɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti mang waa zàáng sɔɔ manɛ katɔ.

Naa zang shonang ɓɔɔ ri gã dabang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ daa ka nɔng kn sinyɛ shaanang ɓɛɛ. Naa dabang gbãayu, naa waa nyaa gãa naa gbete, ri puu wu tantɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔngkɔ, ka ruu diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ manɛ gbãayu ɓɛɛ.

Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang shonang ɓɔɔ dabang ɓarɛ arɛ naa ĩi ri ningkãari ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, wukɔ naa tu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ jong, wu shing ri, ri nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, wu a ri vuu shaanang ri shaayi.
Zang shonang keɓe naa tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, naa dabang ɓarɛ a doo nɛɛ teteng gãmbang, kɔ nɛɛ yuu gãndi, naa ĩi ri ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
Zi karɛ, naa zang gãa nɛ̀ɛ́ zi laa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a ɓɛɛ katɔ, nɛ̀ɛ́ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ shɔngɓɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔngkɔ doori, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang a ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn nɛɛ wu a kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, mɔɔ rang rukɔ nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe ya, kɔ mɔɔ rang zang piti?”
A kpanti kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ, a ti zũng katɔ wiya? Ɓɔɔ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ yaa wu gãa ka naa, nɛɛ wu alɛ zang vuu shaanang ka laa vuu shaanang ɓarɛ wiya?
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang shonang kaɓa kɔ. Zang gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ arɛ, nɛɛ naa ĩi wu palɛ shonang bìí kana ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang gãa ɓiɓɛ naa yàá wu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, wu gãng jĩng kagn.
A naa zang shonang kaɓa kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Diki dabang gãa mɛɛ bee tɔ, a gn kpang,’ a gaa tɔɔsung zang shonang ɓɔɔ varɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro nyɔkɔnang. Wu ti shaa vuu shaanang, wu ti ɓoo sàa, sàa si wu.

Dabang gãa zang shonang kaɓa, naa a ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shonang kaɓa shing gn anang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ naa dang wu jĩng gbãng gbãng, wu daa shing wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ a palɛ kpang, zang naa nyɔ wu ditɔ zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.

Zang shonang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ kpang, naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ zang katɔ, zang naa nyɔ wu ɓi tɔkɔlɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu vuu dɔɔli, zang naa ta ɓi doo dɔɔli kɔ, ka naa ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang ti yaa wu vuu dɔɔli, zang shing gn nɛɛ naa a zang ɓi doo dɔɔli kɔ.
“N à m waa dɔɔnang kɔ jong, ka koo keɓe. N kasɛ tɔ, waa bii nɛɛ shaa kana.
Jĩng dannang naa ɓa m yuu naa ɓɔɔ zang hãa zang ka mii batizima ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ naa n atɛ nwannang nyaa zɔɔ ka koo keɓe ya? Kpang, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, n a m zang basɛnang kɔ jong.
Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, ka yeti gãa gbete zang nɛɛ kagn maani, ri basɛ zɔɔ. Zang taati shing jĩng nɛɛ zang ziti kpang, a zang ziti ti shing jĩng nɛɛ zang taati kpang.

Daa ri naa shing jĩng nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ kpang. A wujɛ varɛ ti shing jĩng nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ kpang. Nàá wujɛ ri naa shing jĩng nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ soro kpang. A wujɛ soro ri ti naa shing jĩng nɛɛ nàá ɓarɛ kpang. Shɔnkpang ɓɔɔ soro, naa shing jĩng nɛɛ ɓeekpang ɓɔɔ soro kpang.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi sãmbong ɓɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn tɔ, nɔɔ tàntɛ́ kɔɔnang nɛɛ, ‘Mii naa a katɔ’ Mii ti naa a katɔ nɔngkɔ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi pũngku nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nɔ̀ɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ ‘Nɔng nwãanang a kaa tɔ.’ Nɔng nwãanang ti a niizang.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ pɛ̃ɛrɛ koo tɔ, nɛɛ lapa, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa nwang katɔ. A nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka diki keɓe kpang ka ruu viya?
“Nɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shɛ̃̀ɛrɛ́ yuu manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kpang, ka ruu viya?

Zang nɛɛ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa, zang nɛɛ daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang. Kãa gbalang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa ɓɛɛ ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu daa tuu mɔɔ a zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa loo mɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ, mɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee mɔɔ shunang ka gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa yaa mɔɔ naa kati.”
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn nɔng, ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ ruu zang Galili ɓɔɔ Bilatu shingnɛ, zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Galili kaɓa, ri vɔ nɔngkɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang Galili ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓi katɔ ya?
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, wu nɔngkɔ kpang, naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ kpang, nɔɔ naa vɔ̀lɔ́ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
Nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ zang kopi tu mantaati kɔ gãa beebang ɓɔɔ ka Siluwa jirɛ, nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓa, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Urushalima katɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, wu nɔngkɔ kpang, naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ kpang nɔɔ naa vɔlɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.”
A Yeesɔ ráng nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓaa laa sĩiri ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a arɛ nɛɛ wu naa hãa kaa jĩng laa sĩiri, a ĩi gbete kpang.
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka jaa, tɔ̀ɔ́, ‘Zirɛ, saa ɓɔɔ n a jaa sĩiri hãnang ka laa sĩiri keɓe, n ĩi kpang daa lɛ̀ɛ́ taati. Dɔng ta ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ta nɔng waati ɓɛɛ.’
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka jaa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, yaa ka nɔngkɔ saa gbete tɔkn ka gbongkarɛ. N gbãa doo ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, n tɛ̃ɛ vĩi vuu vaa kagn.
Sãmpo nɛɛ naa ra jaa tɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ naa ra jaa doo kpang kɔ, n naa dɔng kati.’ ”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang.
A jaa soro kagn nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ saa kopi tu mantaati ɓɛɛ. Lang wu katɔ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu wisi bii ɓiɓɛ paa kpang.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi wu, ɓaa wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ yaa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ.”
A shìng jaa soro naa ɓiɓɛ ka bii, a bii jaa soro shiiri kaa tantɛnang, a jaa soro dɔɔ Laa kati.

Gnvɔ shaa zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ masɛ zang kɔnang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ. A yɔɔ zang bang rang yee, kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Diki mangbete ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shɔɔnang kagn, nɔɔ a ka diki kaɓa kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang masɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ a ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang kpang.”
A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ gbete kãlɛ napo, kɔ seesaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vàa, daa a wu mii ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang kpang ɓu wiya?
A ka ruu vi, jaa zɔ̃ng Ibirayi zang soro kɔ sheetang mã wu, saa kopi tu mantaati, zang yaa wu naa ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang kpang viya?
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ naa weɓe, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang ɓɛɛ, nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn piti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwàng ɓu naa viya? N gãsɛ ɓú nɛɛ viya?
Nwang naa jĩng masita ɓɔɔ zang tuuyi, zang ɓaa ka jaa ɓɛɛ. Wu naa bangnɛ, jaaning ri kɔng saara ka nasãng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãsɛ kpanti roonang Laa ɓu nɛɛ viya?
Nwang naa yisi tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ zang soro tɛ̃ɛ ka zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani, ɓɔɔ ka taasa gaagaa, wu puu kati ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ rang zang yee Laa ka gari bang bang nɛɛ jaa gari ɓɔɔ zang rooro ka gbalang, ka ɓɔɔ wu daa Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
A zang gbete hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu ɓarɛ dɔɔli kpang ya?” A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ,
“Nɔɔ lakɛ yuu, nɔɔ tu yeti gãa nɛɛ nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang dɔɔli ri naa kãa gbalang tunang, ri walɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
“Zang gãa nɛɛ naa seepaa tɔ, nɛɛ ku nyaa gãa tɔ, nɔɔ naa shii ka biling, nɔɔ ɓaa nyaa, nɔɔ gàa wu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, puu ruu nyaa gãa.’ Naa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N zi nɔɔ nung m kpang.’
Nɔɔ naa kɔɔ manɛ kaa nɛɛ, ‘Ruu shaa vuu shaanang, a ruu ti ɓoo mii nɛɛ mɔkɔ. Mɔɔ ti tusu zang vuu ka gari ɓuru kɔ.’
Naa kasɛ nyaa ɓi kaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n zi nɔɔ nung m kpang. Nɔɔ dita kaaɓa nɔɔ yaa m bii, nɔɔ zang vuu shi kpang palɛnang kiɓi.’

Nɔɔ naa kaa ditɔ, ka nɔng kaɓa, nɔɔ shaa tãri kpaaka kpaaka. Nɔɔ naa zi rɛɛ Ibirayi ditɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti nɛɛ Ishaaku nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, a zang nwangsɛ nɔɔ manɛ ka biling ɓɛɛ.
Zang naa alɛ ditɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, zang shaa vuu shaanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ doo knti kãntang keɓe, rikɔ naa sɔ̀ɔ́ zang tĩng. A zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ ka tĩng, ri naa ràa zang ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ.”
Ka laa kaɓa, zang Farisi ri naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔgn, Hiridu kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ mɔɔ katɔ.”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ yaka jĩngti kaɓa nɛɛ, ‘N nwangsɛ suru shi kpang, a n ti masɛ zang lɛɛkɔ, nɛɛ ɓuru. Lagbete n naa hangsɛ nyaa shonang mɛɛ.’
N daa m kana Urushalima lɛɛkɔ, nɛɛ ɓuru nɛɛ diki. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn kpang ɓɛɛ.

“Zang Urushalima, zang Urushalima, nɔkɔ nyɔkɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, a nɔɔ ti luku zang ɓɔɔ Laa shongko nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɛɛ n kpalɛ wujɛ manɛ naa ɓɔɔ nàá kn kpalɛ jaa, zuu nasãng ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti yaa m kpang.
Laa naa ràá Gãa Laa manɛ yuu knti ditɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ walɛ jĩng mɛɛ zinang takpang. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ a ka nung kpanti ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ mani.’ ”
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa vuu shaanang ka gãa zang bang Farisi ɓɔɔ gbete, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ri tɛ̃ɛ wu jĩng ka bii selele.
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ doo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa pùrù katɔ, a ka bii Yeesɔ.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu masɛ zang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ya kɔ kasɛ kpang?”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa kpang. A Yeesɔ lee yɔɔ naa ka bii, a masɛ wu kati, a jee wu nyaa nɛɛ wu dita.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, naa seesaa ɓiɓɛ, kɔ guu napo ɓiɓɛ watɛ ka yeti too ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang tantɛ zɔ̃nnang kpang wiya?”
Ri ti kasɛ wu nyaa kpang.
Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang gáarɛ́ ri, ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng nwannang ɓɔɔ zang shili ɓɛɛ, a rang ri yee keɓe kati tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gáarɛ̀ mɔɔ kn sinyɛ shaanang, mɔɔ nwang ka nɔng nwannang tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi kpang naa zang gaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa mɔɔ katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa, mɔɔ yaa zang keɓe nɔng.’ Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka laa nwannang ɓɔɔ ka knti ɓɛɛ.

Zang nɛɛ gaarɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daayi mɔɔ nwang ka laa ɓɔɔ ka knti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ, wukɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ kati nɛɛ, ‘Masang, seepaa mɔɔ nwang ka laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.’ Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ ri, ri zi kati nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓáa zang bang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu ka dii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii, zang naa a wukɔ bannang jong.”

A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa zang nyaa vuu shaanang, mɔ́ɔ ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓaa sang nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa gãa manɛ gbete, ri ɓarɛ zang yíng ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa mɔɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, ri naa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ditɔ jong.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang vuu shaanang, gáarɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jĩng ringtang ɓɛɛ.
Laa naa a mɔɔ tĩnang tãanang ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri naa ɓàa mɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa naa shu mɔɔ ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓiɓɛ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ zang gbete ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang tãa naa weɓe, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn nwãa vuu shaanang gaagaa, a gaarɛ zang gaagaa.
Laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang kagn a tɔ, a shong zang shonang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ ta nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ a ta, zang hangsɛ vuu shaanang tɔ’.

Zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ gáarɛ́ ri, ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zɔ̃ng kɔnang gbete, gbete. Zang tĩng shɔɔnang kɔɔ zang nyaa shonang yɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘N daa zi doo nɔng jaa lannang ɓɔɔ n hoo ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ n zɔ̃ɔrɔ wu katɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ wu lasɛ kpang, n a kpang.’
A zang doo knti tɔɔ, ‘N hoo napo jaa lannang kopi, n daa gãsɛ ri doo katɔ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ n zɔ̃ɔrɔ wu katɔ, yeti ɓiɓɛ wu lasɛ kpang, n a kpang.’
Zang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘N shing soro doo nɛɛ doo, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n a kpang.’

A zang shonang yɔɔ gbãayu daa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. A gnvɔ shaa yɔɔ gãa, a kɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Dita nyaa gbalang, nɛɛ boo gãa ɓɔɔ ka gari piti, mɔɔ ɓaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang jĩng ringtang, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ ɓɛɛ.’
A zang shonang yɔɔ naa a tɔkn kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɔng ti yaa doogn.’
A yɔɔ gãa kɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘Dita gbalang jaa, mɔɔ gɔ̃kɔ m zang, mɔɔ atɛ ri ka yeti gãa, tɔ̀ɔ, gãa mɛɛ wu yi nyaa kati.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ zang gbete ɓɔɔ naa tãa vuu shaanang kagn teteng zang tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ n gaarɛ ri ɓa kpang.’ ”
Diki ɓɔɔgn zang dɔɔli ri dàarɛ́ nɛɛ wu, a raa jĩng kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,

“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ, a kasɛ ruu mɛɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓeeso, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng m kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu dang jĩng, wu naa vɔ naa ɓɔɔ n naa vɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ kasɛ tɔɔ wu mãa gãa ɓɔɔ bee ka lapa, nwáng ka gbongkarɛ wu gã saka, wu zirɛ, naa daa naa ɓɔɔ wu hangsɛ nyaa gãa mãanang nɛɛ mani tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa loo doo gãa a hangsɛ nyaa mãanang kpang, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ, kpaa wu katɔ nɛɛ,
‘Yɔɔ keɓe gàa tɔɔsung gãa mãanang, hangsɛ nyaa kpang.’

Kpanti ɓɔɔ zang sĩ̀irì tanang ɓiɓɛ labang kopi nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta sĩ̀irì nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ zang sĩ̀irì tanang ɓiɓɛ labang bmati. Nwang ka gbongkarɛ, wu zirɛ wu nɛɛ zunung ɓɔɔ wu naa ta sĩ̀irì nɛɛ kpanti kaɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ sĩ̀irì kaɓa naa ɓa wu yuu katɔ, shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, wu shong ri, ri sũuru zɔɔ nɛɛ kpanti kaɓa bɛ̀ɛ́ à gn naabm kpang.
Dũnnang mɛɛ, nwang ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa vuu ɓiɓɛ piti kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwáng zang ɓɔɔ dũng m kpang.
“Tãa ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, a lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang zunung ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, wu la tɔkn takpang.
Shi ɓi takpang tingkiring. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ ka jaa kpang, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang vang ka dòndòng kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
Diki ɓɔɔgn, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ doori, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, nɛɛ ri tãa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.

A ɓɔɔ zang Farisi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Kpanti Laa, zi rɛɛ zang keɓe, ka bii Yeesɔ hn ɓɛɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ta zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ti shaa vuu nɛɛ ri.”
A Yeesɔ rang ri yee keɓe kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ,
“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ mã mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ laa maani, a ɓɔɔ gbete ningnɛ palɛ biya? Yaa ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, wu daa kãa ɓɔɔ ning kaɓa, wu ĩiyi.
Nɛɛ ĩi tɔ, tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. Tuuyi wu lu ka zã̀ngzã̀ng wu a gãa kaa nɛɛ mani.
Nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ gãa tɔ, wu ɓaarɛ nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo nyaa gãa gbete ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang, ri tãa tĩnang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ĩi mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ.

A Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa tã̀á tĩnang doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ, a kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tĩnang tãanang kaɓa, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang tãa ka ruu zang laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ.’

“Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, naa zang soro ɓɔɔgn saka ɓiɓɛ kopi, a ɓɔɔ gbete shishi, palɛ biya? Mang waa zàáng sɔɔ, wu ya salang, wu kooro nɔng ɓɔɔ saka ɓiɓɛ shishi kagn tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu kãa waasɛ̃, wu ĩiyi.
Nɛɛ ĩi tɔ wu daa ɓaarɛ nyaa, ka rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo nyaa gãa gbete, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang, ri tãa tĩnang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ĩi saka ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri tãa tĩnang doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ a kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A Yeesɔ rang ri yee tɔkn tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ziti zang varɛ.
Diki ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ wujaa naa a ka bii daa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Dada, a m vuu ɓɔɔ naa mɔɔ vɔrɛ zang naa a m ɓɛɛ ta.’ A daa ɓarɛ tuu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, a basɛ ri.
Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, ɓɔɔ wujaa naa kpalɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nandon, a daa zanti nɛɛ mani ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpala kpala. Daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ, a ningsi vuu ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng dũndũng palɛnang.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nyɔkɔ bang naa shɛ̃ɛ ka koolaa ɓɔɔ wu daa zanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shaa takpang, a gaa tɔɔsung jĩng dannang kati.
A seepaa daa nwang nɛɛ zang koolaa kaɓa ɓɔɔ mã gãnya kagn ɓɛɛ. A yɔɔ shong wu nɛɛ wu daa gãng wu jĩng ka gãnya.
Nyɔkɔ dang wu jĩng kana, kasɛ nɛɛ wu shaa vuu ɓɔɔ gãnya ri shaa ɓɛɛ jong. A walɛ gbalang kaa takpang.
Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a shoo naa lu wu. A hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Zang shonang daa mɛɛ kagn gaagaa, ri shaa vuu shaanang ri yaa katɔ kɔ jong, n nwang ka nihn, nyɔkɔ yee m kana waati ka ruu viya?
N seepaa ditɔ, n daa ka bii daa mɛɛ n daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, Dada, n pàlɛ̀ Laa vuu shi kpang tɔ, n ti pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ jong.
N daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ jaa ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn takpang. Yiti m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yiti zang shonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ’.
Hangsɛ nyaa rɛ̃rɛnang kaɓa tɔ, a seepaa yi gbalang yuu gbãanang gãa diiɓɛ.
“Bɛɛ yaa gãa doo beebang, diiɓɛ zi wu tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, kɔng wu gn, a seepaa yurɛ daa kɔ̃ng wu ka gbalang kpenkpereng.
Jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dada, n pàlɛ̀ Laa vuu shi kpang tɔ, n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ jong. N daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ jaa ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn takpang’.

Daa ɓiɓɛ yee laa ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓaa nyaa ɓi ka jaafoo ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ atɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ shi dɔɔli pati, pati nɔɔ hãa wu, nɔ́ɔ ti atɛ jaa saa naa nɔɔ hãa wu, nɔɔ hãa koodoo ka doo ɓiɓɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti daa yi guu napo mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n sang katɔ, nɔɔ yeeyi, ruu shaayi, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu tãa tĩnang kati.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa mɛɛ keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, a naa hingsi jĩng tɔkn ɓɛɛ. Ning katɔ, a n naa ĩi wu tɔkn ɓɛɛ’. A ri gaayu dãng sɔnang kati.
“Bɛɛ jaa zang varɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang daa ka jaa. Gbãayu kana nɛɛ jaa yaa gãa kaa naabm, a tãa soo ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ nɛɛ dãng sɔnang ɓɔɔ shii vaa ɓɛɛ.
A ɓaa zang shonang gbete nyaa, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Zang palɛ ɓu viya?’
A zang shonang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Jaa naaɓɛ arɛ, a daaɓɛ yee guu napo ɓɔɔ wu sang katɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ gbãayu tɔ gãa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ’.
Ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, bɛ̃ɛ yeti gãa daanang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daa ɓiɓɛ nwangnɛ naa bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa yeti gãa.
A kasɛ diiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zirɛ, saa kɔ tɛɛrɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, n palɛ mɔɔ shonang naa jaafoo. N ɓa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ gngn kpang. A mɔɔ a m shi jaa gngn gbete nɛɛ n yeeyi ruu tãa tĩnang nɛɛ rɛɛ masang kpang.
Jaa ɓaaɓɛ keɓe ɓɔɔ lasɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ ka nɔng dũndũng arɛ, mɔɔ yee wu guu napo ɓɔɔ mɔɔ sang ɓɛɛ.’
A daa ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Man jaa, mɔɔ nwang ɓaa nɛɛ n ka tipi, vuu mɛɛ keɓe piti ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.
Daa ɓɔɔ ruu shaa vuu shaanang ruu tãa tĩnang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa naaɓɛ keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ a hingsi jĩng tɔkn. Ning katɔ, a n ĩi wu tɔkn ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang ying. Shing zang shonang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu gãng wu jĩng ka vuu naa ɓiɓɛ. A zang naa kɔɔ yɔɔ ying tɔɔ, zang shonang kaɓa lasɛ mɔɔ vuu kana.
A yɔɔ ying ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘N tãa ɓu nyaa vi ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ viya? Bee m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ shonang nɛɛ vuu naa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nwàng zang shonang mɛɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.’
A zang shonang hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Wee yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ ta shonang ɓɔɔ ka naa mɛɛ tɔ, n palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Kaka mɛɛ ti daa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ jaa lannang takpang. Yusɛ̃ɛ ti tuu m vuu gaanang katɔ.
Yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ nɛɛ hing m tɔ, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri ta m ka gãa ɓarɛ tɔ.’
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri talɛ nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ka naa yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ gbete gbete. A hɛ̃ɛ zang tĩng shɔɔnang tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ta nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ vi ka naa yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ viya?’
A zang keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘N ta nung zàáng laa maani.’ A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, nwang ta tipi pati pati, mɔɔ bee laa ziti tu kopi.’
A ti hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo knti tɔɔ, ‘mɔɔ ta ɓaa viya?’ Zang doo knti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘N ta zee poo laa maani.’ A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, bee ta laa dɛ̃ɛti.’

“A yɔɔ gãa dɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang keɓe, ka ruu zũnang ɓiɓɛ. Zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka vuu koo keɓe, ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka vuu Laa katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo naa rikɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, nɔɔ yiki wusang nɛɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ vuu naa manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ naa waa nyaa tɔ, zang naa ta nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa nwang dòndòng ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, shíng jĩng ɓi doo nɔngkɔ ka ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shi kpang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, ti palɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
Naa nɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu naa ɓɔɔ koo keɓe tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ɓu wi yàá nɔɔ vuu naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Suru Laa ka naa wiya?
Naa nɔɔ ti yee laa ka vuu zang kpang, ɓu wi a nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ wiya?
“Zang shonang ɓɔɔgn shǒng zang gãa ziti kpang. Kàsɛ́ ruu zang gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete. Wu ti shing jĩng ka ɓɔɔ gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete. Zang ɓakɛ Laa dũnnang ɓi nɛɛ vuu koo keɓe kãanang kpang.”
Zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ nandon naa weɓe, ri ɓàa wu zaa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ saka dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ túsù yuu manɛ waati ka nɔng zang nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ, Laa zi yeti manɛ ɓi tɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zirɛ, nɛɛ ɓi vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ka jĩng Laa ɓi vuu baabii.

“Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa piti, zang palɛ shonang nɛɛ wukɔ, a nɛɛ mani ka yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang gaayu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti roonang Laa kɔɔnang doo nɛɛ diki Yɔhana kɔ. Zang ɓu ti ĩi ɓi yuu, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛyi.
Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa waa nyaa ditɔ nandon tantɛnang, a vuu tɔkɔlɔng gbete ɓɔɔ naa shàarɛ́ waati ka teteng nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi ɓi kpang.
“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hing soro ɓiɓɛ, a gee ɓɔɔgn, palɛ ɓi dũndũng. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti gee zang soro ɓɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ, ti palɛ ɓi doo dũndũng kɔ.
“Zang ying ɓɔɔ kagn, hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli ta bii nwɛ̃ɛri pursung, a ti tãa ɓi tĩnang diki diki.
A zang ɓɔɔgn, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ vuu ɓɛɛ, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Liyazaru, bii ɓiɓɛ nɔɔrɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang átɛ̀ wu diki diki ka nyaa gãa zang ying kaɓa,
nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaarɛ knti ɓɛɛ wu shaayi. Zaa ti arɛ ri lɛɛtɛ nyaa nɔɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
“Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying kpang kaɓa naa vɔrɛ, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri naa tuu suru bii ɓiɓɛ ri daa shing wu ka kagn Ibirayi. A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying ti naa vɔrɛ, zang gbãa wu.
A suru ɓiɓɛ daa ka yeti waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi jɔng kpang. Dang jĩng kana, a tuu jĩng ka lapa zi Liyazaru nwang tɔ ka kagn Ibirayi nɛɛ nɔng beebang.
A ɓaa nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dada Ibirayi, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Shong Liyazaru wu hãa yuu paa saa naa ka mii wu sɔ̃sɔ m ka nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, waa tɔ̃̀ɔrɔ m shoo kana ɓɛɛ.’
“A Ibirayi kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Man jaa, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ doo ka koo mɔɔ walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, Liyazaru walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang. Kãntang keɓe Liyazaru tãa ɓi kaa tĩnang ka nihn, mɔɔ ti dang ɓaa kaa jĩng.
Naa doo nɔngkɔ kpang, rang bang kagn teteng ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ seepaa nɛɛ nihn, nɛ̀ɛ́ daa ka dang manɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ ti seepaa nɛɛ dang manɛ, a ka bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.’
A yɔɔ kasɛ Ibirayi nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dada, n zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, shong Liyazaru jong ka gãa daa mɛɛ.
Jaa nàá mɛɛ zang varɛ kagn maani, wu daa shaarɛ ri nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛ̀ɛ́ a jong ka nɔng jĩng dannang keɓe ɓɛɛ.’
“Ibirayi kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri beeyi kagn. Ri ti ɓaa shoo ka labeenang ɓarɛ.’
Yɔɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘Kpang, dada Ibirayi, naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, yupaa nɛɛ sàa, daa ka bii ɓarɛ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.’
A Ibirayi kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Naa ri ɓaa shoo ka labeenang rɛɛ Musa nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa kpang, naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ seepaa doori, ri ɓaa shoo doo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ.’ ”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang, zang palɛ vuu shi kpang a ɓi ditɔ kɔ nwani. Jĩng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Daa ɓɔɔ zang mã wu ree bang ka turu, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti mii waapo tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ shing jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe, wu palɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn.
“Ɓaazung nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, mangkɛ wu katɔ. Nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang tɔ, nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, mɔɔ ti yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang dakn manziti ka diki gbete, a naa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Yaa m gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ katɔ. N kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, mɔɔ yaa wu gbalang katɔ.’ ”
Zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yi ruu naa jong bii, rúu shing danggn ka bìí Laa gbãng gbãng.”

A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa, nɛɛ nwang naa jĩng masita, nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔ laa zulung bang keɓe katɔ nɛɛ, ‘Ru ta nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa shɔ bii ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti mii waapo.’ Ti palɛ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ lang jaa, kɔ gã mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, a nɛɛ jĩngti, kɔɔ wu katɔ nɛɛ wu tantɛ daanang, wu daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, wu shaa vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ya?
Kɔɔ wu kpang. Kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Nwaa m vuu shaanang ta, mɔɔ ti kpalɛ bii tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ shĩili m vuu shaanang ka yuu teeburu mɔɔ gã m, n shaa ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ see gbanti, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ naa shaa ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kati.’
Zãa zang shonang ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ya?

Nɔɔ manɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ nandon, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Rùu ɓuru zang shonang waati. Ruu daa naa ɓɔɔ zang zãa ruu kpang. Ruu palɛ ɓuru shonang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Yeesɔ daa kana Urushalima, a sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓalɛ ɓɔɔ basɛ tipi Samariya nɛɛ tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ́ɔ, wu hãa nyaa kaa jaa gari, zang kopi ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa ri katɔ, ri ɓee wu yuu kati. Ri shiiri nɛɛ nɔng beebang,
ri ɓaa wu nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
Yeesɔ zi ri, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, bii manɛ.” Vuu bii ɓɔɔ shaa ri, yàa ri bii kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ masɛ wu, gbãayu dɔɔ Laa kana nabm.
A naa tang ka tĩng Yeesɔ, a zãa wu. Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang tipi Samariya.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi tɔ́ɔ, “N masɛ wu shɔnzang kopi kpang ya? Zang mandɛ̃ɛti ɓarɛ kaa kiya?
Ka ruu vi, ɓi mɔkɔ zang zanti keɓe, mɔɔ gbãayu shɛ̃ɛning mɔɔ naa zãa Laa viya?”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ daayi. Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.”
Diki ɓɔɔgn zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu anang diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa, a ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jĩng ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang kɔɔ ɓi kpang nɛɛ, ‘Diki bii keɓe nɛɛ diki kaɓa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa roo Kpanti ɓi kana ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ.’ ”
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Diki a doo naa, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kasɛ kagn nɛɛ, nɔɔ zi diki gbete ka teteng diki ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ naa zi kpang.
Zang ti naa nwãarɛ nɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ, ‘Jaa Shɔnzang ka kaaɓa a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang keɓe.’ Nɔɔ daa kpang. Nɔɔ dũng knti ɓarɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, anang Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwang naa shala ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ, tɛɛ ka lapa, yakɛ dĩiri gbayi gbayi ɓɛɛ.
“Jaa Shɔnzang naa dang jĩng ditɔ dɔɔli ka gbongkarɛ. Zang koo jaa knti keɓe ri bɛ̃ɛ wu, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu keɓe ri naa palɛ kati.
Diki Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwang doo naa diki Nuhu kɔ.
Zang shaa vuu, zang ti ɓooro vuu, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro ri geere zɔɔ sasak diki ɓɔɔ Nuhu naa shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti Laana, a nɛɛ mani. A mii bang naa arɛ, ningsi ri nandon.
Zang palɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki Lootu. Zang shaa vuu, zang ɓoo vuu, zang hooro vuu, zang ti mãlɛ́ vuu. Zang ɓàarɛ́ vuu, zang ti mãarɛ gãa.
Diki ɓɔɔ Lootu naa nwangnɛ, yaa gari Sɔɔdom a nɛɛ mani. A tari ɓɔɔ waa kɔlɔ ka bìí ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa, ningsi ri nandon.
Naa nwáng doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang nwang nyaa ɓɛɛ.
“Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu sãa lapa, ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti gãa, wu shooro kpang nɛɛ wu daa tuu vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ka dalɛ, wu ti gbãayu gãa takpang.
Nɔɔ kpaa danggn soro Lootu karɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ lòó yuu ɓiɓɛ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi jong.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ zĩi, zang ziti ri roo ka latãng gbete. Laa naa tuu zang gbete, wu yaa gbete.
Zang soro ziti ri nang vuu ka ree nɛɛ zɔɔ, Laa naa tuu gbete, wu yaa gbete.” [
Zang varɛ ziti ri ka dalɛ, Laa naa tuu gbete, wu yaa gbete.]
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ka niya Kpanti?” Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu vɔ kagn, jãa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.”
A Yeesɔ rang zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tusu ri kati nɛɛ ri gaa Laa diki diki, ri yaa gn naa kpang.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɔɔ kagn gari ɓɔɔ. Kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang, ti a zang bannang ɓi jong kpang.
A Suvɔ ɓɔɔ ti doo kagn gari kaɓa kɔ. Alɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ diki diki, gaa wu nɛɛ, ‘Ta m jong nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ n kpang ɓɛɛ.’
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kaɓa, ti yee laa ɓi ka wu kpang. A yɔɔ bìí naa rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ knti tɔɔ, ‘N zi tɔ, n kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang, n ti a shɔnzang bannang m kpang.
Jaa soro keɓe gboro m tɔ nɛɛ alɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Naa n jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu kpang, naa atɛ m leenang ka bii nɛɛ alɛnang ɓiɓɛ.’ ”
A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang shi kpang kaɓa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shàlɛ́ nyaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi, ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓi kpang ya? Yi ri naa ka bii tantɛnang kpang ya?
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, tantɛ ri naa yinang ka bii katɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa arɛ, n naa ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa kagn ka koo keɓe ya?”
A ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn tɔ́ɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔgn ɓarɛ kpang, ruu keɓe kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ziti ɓɔɔgn, ri daa Laa gaanang ka Gãa Laa. Zang gbete ɓi zang Farisi, a zang gbete ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ.

Yɔɔ Farisi seepaa gaa Laa, a kɔɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Laa n zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwang m naa zang ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zang dũndũng kpang. N m ti naa zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.
N seng nyaalaa diki ziti ka teteng diki manziti. Ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ n walɛ nandon diki diki, n basɛ tìng kopi, ń a mɔɔ tìng gbete.’

“A zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi shii ɓi nɛɛ nɔng beebang, kasɛ nɛɛ wu wisi jĩng paa kpang tingkiring. A nyɔ naa ka danggn, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A gàa Laa tɔɔ, ‘Gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong Laa, n m zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.’

N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi keɓe gbãayu daa gãa ɓiɓɛ, Laa yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, wu náa yɔɔ Farisi kaɓa kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu nɛɛ wu ɓa zang piti, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu jong ka dii. Zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ka dii, zang naa a wukɔ bannang jong.”
Zang atɛ Yeesɔ wujɛ seseere kana, nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu, wu gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ ka nɔngkɔ, ri a ka bii mɛɛ. Nɔɔ hing ri kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Laa nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓiɓɛ naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng kpang, nwang zang Laa kpang.”
A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang zang Yahudi hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, naa n palɛ bɛ̀ɛ́, ń walɛ suru ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang viya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓáa m ka ruu vi nɛɛ maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ viya? Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn gbete kpang, ɓi Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ, Laa dang nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang vuu kpang, mɔɔ ta zang nyaa nɛɛ sèé kpang, a rɛɛ daaɓɛ nɛɛ naaɓɛ bannang katɔ.’ ”
A yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N gaayu nyaa dannang keɓe dũnnang bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo jasang.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yàa mɔɔ kaa vuu gbete. Mãlɛ́ vuu ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ saka. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng knti mɛɛ. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa.”
Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ying tãa naa weɓe, bii tantɛ wu vɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ bii vɔ wu naa weɓe, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Laa tanang wu nwang kpanti zang, kpãa zang ying dɔɔli.
Laa tanang wu nwang kpanti zang kpãa zang ying, ɓa ɓɔɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ hòlòng ɓu nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “A zang ɓɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wi gbete wiya?”
A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa shɔnzang katɔ, kpãa Laa palɛnang ɓi kpang.”
A Bituru kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa vuu ɓuru nandon, ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee?”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang varɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeedaa nɛɛ ɓeenaa, a ɓɔɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu Kpanti roonang Laa,
naa walɛ vuu keɓe ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ gaagaa ka koo keɓe. Wu ti naa nwang nɛɛ Laa dòndòng ka koo ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.”

Yeesɔ gɔ̃ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti dang gbete, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, ruu daa kana Urushalima, vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri bee ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, daa nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri bee ɓɛɛ.
Zang daa tuu m kaa tɔ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri kpaa m, ri palɛ m vuu yusɛ̃ɛ. Ri ti tùlù m sisãa ka bii.
Ri ti nyɔ m nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ kati. N naa seepaa nɛɛ sàa, ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi dĩiri vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ gbete kpang. Hã̀a ri kɔɔnang katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, kpang.
Ri a tɔ ka Jeriko naabm, a zang ɓɔɔ jĩng ringtang ɓɔɔ gaa vuu, nwang ka nyaa gbalang.
Tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔli ri haayi, a hɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa ɓɛɛ kati.
Zang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara tɛɛyi.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ tãa naa weɓe, sãa nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng, mangkɛ wu. Ri tɔɔ wu vɔ nyaa ta. Ti sãa nyaa ɓi kaa nabm kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
A Yeesɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu atɛ wu yɔɔ jĩng ringtang bìí ta. Zang jĩng ringtang a tɔ naabm, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
“Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ viya?” Kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang puu m jĩng jong, n zi nɔng.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ wu puu ta. Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ, masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.”
A jĩng ɓiɓɛ tantɛ puunang, a dṹng Yeesɔ ka knti, dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa kana. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ri zi veɓe, ri dɔɔ Laa kaa jong.
Yeesɔ naa a ka Jeriko, tɛɛ kana ka yeti gari.
A yɔɔ zang bang zang saka tipi tanang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Zaka kagn nɔngkɔ.
Zaka kasɛ nɛɛ wu zi Yeesɔ katɔ, walɛ gbalang kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ketere, a zang ti shang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Zaka yuu ka tĩng, daa vang ka laa zulung ɓɔɔ ka nyaa gbalang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa tɛɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ naa a tɔ ka doo laa ɓɔɔ Zaka vang kagn, a tuu jĩng ka lapa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zaka, shooro ta tipi pati. N daa roo lɛ̀ɛ́ ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.”
Zaka tantɛ kaa shɔrɔnang ka tipi, daa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka gãa, a wu laa nwannang. Tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ a ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang kaa nandon tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe daa roo lɛ̀ɛ́ ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang.”

A Zaka shii paa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, n basɛ vuu naa mɛɛ nɔng ziti, n tuu nɔng gbete n basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ shaa wu vuu kagn, n sɔɔrɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ tìng dɛ̃ɛti.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Zaka tɔɔ, “Lɛɛkɔ Laa ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa keɓe tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓaa doo jaa Ibirayi kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n Jaa Shɔnzang n arɛ nɛɛ n naa kãa zang ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n ta yuu ɓarɛ kati ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu kaɓa kana, Yeesɔ rang ri yee ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri yaa Urushalima kaa naabm ɓɛɛ. A zang keɓe ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kpanti roonang Laa nwáng nyaa katɔ tantɛnang.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang bang, daayi nɛɛ zang daa yi wu kpanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpala kpala. Nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu gbãayu gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
Ɓɔɔ wu daa gn kpang, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang shonang ɓiɓɛ kopi, a ri pã́ng gbete gbete, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ palɛ shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn nɛɛ mani ka yuu weɓe, n gbãayu nɛɛ mani.’
A zang tipi ɓiɓɛ ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri shong zang nyaa shonang ka knti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ daa yi yɔɔ kpanti nɛɛ, ‘Ruu kasɛ yɔɔ keɓe wu nwang kpanti ɓuru kpang.’
“Zang daa yi yɔɔ kpanti ɓiri, a gbãayu. Naa shong zang ka bii zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu a ri saka ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tãa naa saka ɓɔɔ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ri walɛ ka yuu ɓɔɔ wu a ri ɓɛɛ.
A zang shɔɔnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n walɛ saka tɔ pãng kopi ka yuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ’.
Dabang gãa ɓarɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, mɔɔ zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu tɔkɔlɔng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n a mɔɔ gari bang bang kopi mɔɔ yiti.’
A zang shonang dabang ɓɔɔ ɓang knti zang keɓe, naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n walɛ saka tɔ pãng maani ka yuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ.’
A ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Mɔ́ɔ yiti gari bang bang maani.’
“A zang shonang ɓɔɔ ti naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, saka ɓaaɓɛ keɓe. Bɛɛ n mung m ka sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ n shingnɛ.
N kaa vɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kpãa nyaa ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti yee vuu ɓaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ ɓaa kpang ɓɛɛ.’

“A dabang gãa ɓarɛ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ zang shonang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ, n dɔng mɔɔ ruu doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓaaɓɛ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ n kpãa nyaa katɔ, n tuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓɔɔ mɛɛ kpang, n ti yee vuu m ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nkɔ ɓaayi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ shing m saka mɛɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shĩili saka kagn kpang ka ruu viya? Wee n arɛ, n nɛɛ walɛ ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ zang gisi m ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ya?’
“A dabang gãa ɓarɛ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ ta saka ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ ta, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ, wàlɛ̀ pã́ng kopi ɓɛɛ.’
A zang ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, saka kagn naa ɓiɓɛ pã́ng kopi.’
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wukɔ vuu ɓɔɔgn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ ka naa kpang, ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ditɔ.
Ɓɔɔ zang kɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ n kpang, nɛɛ n roo kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ kpang ɓee, nɔɔ atɛ ri ta ka tĩng mɛɛ, nɔɔ nyɔ ri vɔrɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a sɔ̀ɔ ri tĩng Urushalima daanang kati.
Yaa gari Bɛtafaji nɛɛ Bɛtani, ɓɔɔ ri ka kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung, kaa naabm, a shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita jaa gari kɔ ka tĩng dang ɓa. Nɔɔ nɛɛ tu kaa yeti gari, nɔɔ daa zi jaa seesaa ɓɔɔ zang vang gngn kpang, zang mã ka nyaa gãa. Nɔɔ kãlɛ nɔɔ a nɛɛ mani.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ kã̀lɛ́ ka ruu viya?’ Nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ‘Dabang ɓuru kasɛ katɔ.’ ”
A zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shong ri, ri daayi ri daa ĩi naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
Rí kã̀lɛ́ jaa seesaa bìí doo naa, a zang ɓiɓɛ naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãlɛ jaa seesaa ka ruu viya?”
A ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang ɓuru kasɛ katɔ.”
A ri atɛ Yeesɔ jaa seesaa bìí kati. Ri luku fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn jaa seesaa, a ri shing Yeesɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Jaa seesaa daa kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ri ti wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ kana gbalang.

Yeesɔ a tɔ naabm nɛɛ Urushalima, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gbalang sòo nyaa nɛɛ Kɔpɔ Zeetung ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nandon ri gaa tɔɔsung Laa dɔ̀ɔnang. Ri tãa tĩnang, ri ti shii nyaa ka lapa gaagaa, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ri zi nɛɛ jĩng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔrɔ kana nɛɛ, “Laa wu a Kpanti ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung Kpanti Laa tĩnang tãanang. Nwannang ka nyaa zɔɔ kagn lapa. Zang wu ti dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kpala kpala ɓɛɛ ta.”
A zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang nimbang kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa ta.”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa zang keɓe ri voo nyaa doori, tari kɔ ka tipi ɓee, ri dɔɔ m ditɔ.”
Yeesɔ a tɔ, yaa Urushalima kaa naabm, naa zi gari, a wɔsɔ miiri.
Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu gbete ɓɔɔ atɛ nwannang ka nyaa zɔɔ katɔ, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ. A zang waasɛ nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ zi kaa takpang.
Diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, ri kiiri nɔɔ nyaa ka teteng a kana. Ri naa nɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ri a ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti.

Ri ningsi nɔɔ nɛɛ wujɛ manɛ ka yeti gari manɛ kɔ nɔɔ mã̀ayi nɔɔ ɓèe nyaa ka zɔɔ nandon ɓee. Ri naa yaa tari gbete wu pãng ka yuu zɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi laa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Yeesɔ naa daa ka Gãa Laa, gaa tɔɔsung zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ vuu kagn hingkinang kati.
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, ‘Gãa keɓe ɓi gãa Laa gaanang.’ A nɔɔ raayi nwang nɔɔ manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.”

Tusu zang vuu kaa nɔngkɔ diki, diki. A rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang gari, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ katɔ.
A ri walɛ gbalang kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri ɓaa shoo, ri tãa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ yee gbete wu ɓa ri kpang.

Diki ɓɔɔgn Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu, a ti kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka Gãa Laa, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu jong, wi a mɔɔ naa, a mɔɔ palɛ vuu kɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ wiya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, n kaaɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete.
Nɔɔ kɔɔ m jong, “Batizima ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, ɓu wi a wu naa wiya, Laa ya, kɔ shɔnzang?”
A ri laa zɔɔ nyaa ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ batizima Yɔhana, Laa a wu naa. Hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ, ‘a ka ruu vi nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yɔhana kpang viya?’
Ruu nɛɛ ti kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Shɔnzang a wu naa.’ Zang kɔ nihn ɓee, nandon ri luku ruu katɔ nɛɛ tari ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ a Yɔhana naa batizima palɛnang kpang.
A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ a m naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani kpang.”
A kɔɔ zang ruu keɓe nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn láng jaa, a ɓaa laa inabi kagn, a yàa zang ɓɔɔ langkɛ jaa, a daa zanti ka tipi ɓɔɔgn, daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee wu.

Ka ɓɔɔ làá jaa inabi hãnang arɛ, shong zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang shonang wu daa ta wu jaa inabi ka naa ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa, ri nyɔ zang shonang keɓe zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati.
Shong zang shonang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa, ri nyɔ zang shonang keɓe ri palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati doo nɔngkɔ.
A shong zang shonang ɓɔɔ tɔkn kaa dakn taati. Ri shìng zang shonang bìí nyaa vuu waa ka bii. Ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti jaa.
“A zang jaa tɔɔ, ‘N palɛ kaa biya? N shong kaa jaa gbete ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ kasɛ, ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.’
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yàa ri jaa, ri zi jaa ɓiɓɛ bii hn, ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ daa ɓiɓɛ kɔ a kana ɓa. Nɔɔ arɛ ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔɔ jaa keɓe naa nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓuru.
A ɓɔɔ jaa naa a ka yeti jaa, ri yi wu, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti jaa, a ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ka yeti manɛ, zang jaa keɓe nɛɛ a tɔ, naa palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa keɓe viya?
Naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa keɓe nandon, wu yaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn jaa bii.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu keɓe, ri tɔɔ, “Laa wu zã́a vuu keɓe nwannang nɔngkɔ katɔ.”
A pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa keɓe kɔɔrɔ ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ tɔɔ,
“ ‘Tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa
ri bɛ̃ɛyi wukɔ naa raa tari
ɓɔɔ yiti gãa ɓɛɛ kati.’
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ watɛ ka yuu tari keɓe kakɛ katɔ. Tari kɔ nɛɛ watɛ ka yuu shɔnzang, nang wu dɔ̃ɔ gbete yerek.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ kaa tɔ tantɛnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri yi wu kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ. Ri shongko zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ bii naa ri zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang tɔ, ri yi wu, ri a gɔmna ɓɔɔ zang Rooma shing ɓɛɛ.
A zang keɓe ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Maalang, ruu zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu piti tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓaa kpang. Mɔɔ túsù Ruu Laa ɓaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Kɔɔ ruu jong, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu shu kpanti Kayisa saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓii tɔ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ,
“Nɔɔ atɛ m dinari karɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri atɛ tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, zang shing waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wi kagn wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Kpanti Kayisa.”
A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a Kayisa vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Kayisa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti a Laa vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri yi wu nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ri nyaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. A ri vɔ̃ nyaa kati. Ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang Saduki ri kasɛ ɓarɛ kpang nɛɛ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, zang yupaa tɔkn kpang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang. Musa bee rùu ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ vɔrɛ naa yi jaa kagn kpang, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ, wu yi wu jaa.
Wujɛ varɛ ɓɔɔ kagn jaa nàá zɔɔ, ri manziti. Ɓɔɔ bang gaayu gee soro a vɔrɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ yi jaa gn kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ɓang wu sɔɔrɔ soro keɓe, a ti vɔrɛ yi jaa doo kpang kɔ.
Ɓɔɔ ɓang zang keɓe ti sɔɔrɔ soro keɓe tɔkn. Ri palɛ nɔngkɔ, ri manziti nandon, a ri ti vɔlɔ ri yi jaa kpang kɔ nandon.
Kaa nɛɛ knti, jaa soro bìí naa vɔ jong.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ, jaa soro keɓe naa nwang ɓɔɔ wiya ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing soro keɓe katɔ, ri manziti nandon ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang koo keɓe ri gee soro, zang ti a ri wujɛ soro ri shĩili.
A rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa zirɛ nɛɛ ri daa naa ɓɔɔ wu wisi ri paa katɔ, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ, ri gee soro ɓarɛ jong kpang. Zang ti a wujɛ soro jong, zang gee ri kpang.
Ri ti vɔ ɓarɛ takpang dòndòng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwáng ɓarɛ kaa naa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ kaa wujɛ Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang wisi ri paa tɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu zang paa wisinang nɛɛ sàa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, Musa kɔ̀ɔ tɔ, ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bèe ruu waa ɓɔɔ shaa jaa laa bɛbɛtɛ ɓɛɛ. Musa ɓàa Laa nɛɛ, ‘Làá Ibirayi, Làá Ishaaku, nɛɛ Làá Yakubu.’ Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang keɓe ri doo ningkãari.
Laa ɓi Làá zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi Làá zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti nwang ningkãari ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng, ri tɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ rang nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ maalang.”
Zang Saduki ɓasi, ri hɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ takpang.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ ka ruu vi, nɛɛ Kirisi jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda viya?
Dawuda nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura tɔɔ,
“ ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ kpanti mɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Nwang ka nakn mɛɛ,
n raa zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ
mɔ́ɔ náa ri nɛɛ doo.” ’
Dawuda nɛɛ ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kpanti, a palɛ ka biya, naa nwang jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda tɔkn wiya?”
A Yeesɔ raa nyaa ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tãa ɓɛɛ.

Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Ri kasɛ rakɛnang nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, a ri ti kasɛ nyaa jeenang ka lumang. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang a ri nɔng nwannang bang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu, zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
Ri mulu suvɔ, ri talɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nandon. Ri ti kasɛ Laa gaanang sasak nɛɛ zang zi ri kati. Laa naa dang ri jĩng ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti.”
Yeesɔ tuu jĩng, a zi zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn, ri looro saka ɓɔɔ ri a Laa ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ saka ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
A ti zi suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa kpang, loo saka tɔkɔlɔng ɓiɓɛ jong.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu ɓɔɔ suvɔ kaɓa loo ɓɛɛ, ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang piti katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang keɓe ri nwangsɛ saka ɓarɛ ka yeti vuu naa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ, ri a Laa. Suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kpang keɓe, atɛ ɓi vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu walɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani kɔ nwani nandon.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri rang yee ka yuu Gãa Laa, naa ɓɔɔ zang gbarɛ nɛɛ tari tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa nɛɛ zang gbarɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Gãa Laa kɔ nɔɔ zi, nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang gbarɛ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓee, diki a ditɔ ɓɔɔ zang naa jili Gãa keɓe, zang yaa tari gbete ɓɔɔ pã́ng ka yuu zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, zang naa palɛ vuu keɓe gn vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ɓu vi naa tusu ruu nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ kagn a tɔ viya?”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jĩng waasɛ̃ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwãarɛ nɔɔ. Zang dɔɔli a ditɔ nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ri naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ. A ri ti kɔɔ nɛɛ diki a naabm tɔ. Nɔɔ dũ̀ng ri kpang.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ tãayi zang nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang takɛ sĩiri, nɛɛ zang ti palɛ nyaa, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe kɔ ri gaayu shɔɔnang. Nɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa a tɔ naabm kpang.”
Ti kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Zang koolaa ɓɔɔgn ri naa ta sĩiri nɛɛ zang koolaa ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn ri ti naa ta sĩiri.
Tipi naa ruutu ka nɔng piti piti. Nyɔkɔ nɛɛ kɔnang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ nɔng piti piti. Vuu vɔrɔ kaanang nɛɛ vuu baabii naa nwang bii ka lapa.

Ɓɔɔ diki keɓe à gn kpang, zang yi nɔɔ zang ti dang nɔɔ jĩng. Zang a nɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu, ri loo nɔɔ ka sãa. Zang daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka bii kpanti, nɛɛ bii gɔmna, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ráng yee mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ walɛ manɛ kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ tɔ́ɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a nɔɔ yee nɛɛ zũnang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Naa doo rɛɛ daa manɛ nɛɛ nàá manɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaa sang ri naa nyɔ yuu manɛ ditɔ. A zang ti nyɔkɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ ka teteng manɛ.
Zang piti ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, ka ruu mɛɛ.
A vuu ɓɔɔ lee suuyuu manɛ gbete naa bii kpang.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn tɔ kagn nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ katɔ.
“Nɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ zang sĩiri tanang nɛɛ kiiri gari Urushalima nyaa tɔ ka teteng, nɔɔ zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ zang jili wu kagn a tɔ naabm.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi, ri yurɛ, ri waa ka yuu kɔpɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gari Urushalima ri nwangnɛ ri yaa nɔng. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ka dalɛ ri hãa nyaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka yeti gari kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki kaɓa ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang zang jĩng ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang kaa nɔngkɔ niizang.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang soro ɓɔɔ ri tuu jaa ka yeti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri jaa ka naa, ri nwang vuu gn kɔnang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang koo keɓe ri naa dang jĩng dɔɔli, a yeti ti naa lasɛ Laa nɛɛ ri dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.

Zang nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ nɛɛ yere bang. Zang ti yiki ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sĩiri, zang daa nɛɛ ri, ka koo piti piti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri naa jili gari Urushalima. Ri nwang nɔngkɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ Laa ka ri, waa nyaa nɛɛ mani.
“Nɔɔ naa zi vuu ka làa, nɛɛ shala nɛɛ sàng ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Zang koolaa ka bm bm ri naa kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mii waapo kaarɛ nyaa a ti see varɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Shɔnzang ri naa kaa vɔrɔ dɔɔli, nung vɔrɔ gbete, ka ruu jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, zang naa zĩiti ri katɔ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi Jaa Shɔnzang kati, ka ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ lapa ka yeti sãmbong ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang, a ɓɔɔ bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Vuu keɓe nɛɛ gaayu palɛnang tɔ, nɔɔ tuu jĩng ka lapa, nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu manɛ kagn, a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe, nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ laa sĩiri nɛɛ laa nimbang nandon.
Ri nɛɛ gaayu gɔpɔ shɔɔ lusunang tɔ, nɔɔ zi katɔ nɛɛ nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
Dòo nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu keɓe nɛɛ gaayu palɛnang nɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kati, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti kagn a naabm tɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe palɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo jaa knti keɓe ri vɔlɔ kati nandon.
Lapa nɛɛ tipi naa shaarɛ ditɔ, a ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang dòndòng.

“Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ nɛɛ kpiti nɛɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang. Rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki kaɓa nɛɛ arɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ shing danggn kpang, naa ɓɔɔ saka ta yɔpɔ ɓɛɛ.
Diki kaɓa naa a ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo keɓe nandon.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ kaka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa shii ka tĩng mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ.”
Nɛɛ nɔng laagɛ̃, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɔng zĩi nɛɛ a tɔ, wu yaa yeti gari, wu daa kaa kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung ɓɛɛ, wu daa roo ka nɔngkɔ.
Nɔng nɛɛ ti gãntɛ tɔ, zang ti kpalɛ zɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa, nɛɛ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ diki nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ pasika a naabm tɔ.
Rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ nɛɛ nwĩiri ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ.
A Sheetang naa nwãarɛ Yahuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Isikariyoti, ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yahuda daa tɔ̀ng zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, a ri mã zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ ri a wu saka.
A kasɛ ri nyaa, a kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang ka nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ.
Diki nyaalaa pasika ɓɔɔ zang shaa borodi ɓɔɔ yisi kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ zang yele mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ naa arɛ.
Yeesɔ shɔng rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ daayi, nɔɔ daa shĩili ruu vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa shaa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu daa shĩili ka niya?”
Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ hãa nyaa tɔ, ka yeti gari, nɔɔ daa ɓee yuu nɛɛ zang varɛ, tuu mii ka bɛng. Nɔng dũng wu, nɔɔ hãa nyaa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu hãa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ dabang gãa kaɓa nɛɛ, ‘Maalang, tɔɔ jaka ɓɔɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ kagn, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ kiya?’
Tusu nɔɔ naa ka jaka ka gãa lapa, shĩili vuu tɔ ka nɔng piti. Nɔɔ shĩili vuu shaanang bìí ka nɔngkɔ.”
A ri daayi, ri daa ĩi naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ, a ri shĩili vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ làá vuu shaanang nyaalaa bìí naa raa bii, Yeesɔ daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa nwang kaa jong.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii shaa m tɔ gbãng gbãng nɛɛ diki keɓe wu arɛ. N shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa keɓe nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete tɔɔ zang naa dang m jĩng kati.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa keɓe ɓɔɔ takpang. N naa shaa ka ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ zang naa shaa kaa ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
A tuu juwa, zãa Laa, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ ta juwa keɓe ta, nɔɔ ɓooro nɛɛ zɔɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, n ɓoo mii inabi ɓɔɔ takpang, diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti kagn nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa ɓooyi.”
A tuu borodi zãa Laa, a sharɛ, a á ri, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n a zang, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe diki diki nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa nɛɛ mani.”
Ɓɔɔ ri hangsɛ vuu shaanang, a tuu juwa ɓɔɔ mii inabi kagn naa ɓaasi ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Juwa keɓe, ɓi nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zĩi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n naa tɛ̃ɛyi kɔ naa hansɛ nyaa shɔɔ keɓe.
“Nɔɔ zi karɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ kagn nɛɛ n, ka nɔng kɔ ruu shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
Jaa Shɔnzang vɔ ɓi katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ naa nwang ɓɛɛ, a jĩng dannang ɓi kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A ri gaayu zɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ɓu wi naa palɛ vuu keɓe wiya?
A ri ti gaayu nyaa laanang nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri roo kpanti ka yuu zang ɓarɛ nandon. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ bang ka teteng manɛ, wukɔ wu nwáng naa zang wujaa ɓɔɔ shong nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi, zang a wu vuu shaanang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ a wu vuu shaanang, wi bang wiya? Wu zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi, zang a wu vuu shaanang kɔ bang kpang ya? Wee n ka teteng manɛ ɓee, nkɔ shong nɔɔ jong.
“Nɔɔ yáa m ka ɓɔɔ n dang jĩng kpang.
Naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m naa, nɛɛ n nwang kpanti, n a nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ doori.

Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang, nɔɔ ti ɓoo nɛɛ n ka nɔng vuu shaanang mɛɛ ka ɓɔɔ n naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. N ti shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti, nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang zɔ̃ng Isirela ɓɔɔ kopi tu ziti ruu.
“Siman, ɓaa shoo, zang a Sheetang naa tɔ, nɛɛ wu gãsɛ nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, wu yaa zang shi kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang hãlɛ zee ɓɛɛ.

Siman, n gàa mɔɔ Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ yaa danggn shinnang ka n ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii mɛɛ tɔkn, mɔ́ɔ yi rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mantɛ vuu nɛɛ ri ka bìí mɛɛ ɓɛɛ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn waasɛ̃.”
Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang, n kasɛ tɔ, n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka sãa, ruu vɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Bituru, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ nɛɛ zĩi keɓe, mɔɔ laa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung kpang dakn taati ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, kn wu ɓaa nyaa.”
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ n shong nɔɔ, nɔɔ tuu duku saka nɛɛ duku ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti tɛ̃ɛ vuu kagn ka naa kpang, nɔɔ ti hãa koodoo kpang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔgn nɔɔ walɛ kpang ya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Kpang.”

A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ duku saka ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tuu ka naa ning, nɛɛ duku ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ vuu kagn piti. A zang ɓɔɔ yere bang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn kpang, wu mãlɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ bii zuunang ɓiɓɛ, wu hooyi.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘A zang ɓakɛ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa dannang ɓɛɛ.’ Nwang ditɔ niizang ka yuu mɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ nwáng kana niizang ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zirɛ Dabang, yere bang kɔ ziti ka naa ɓuru ɓee.” A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa tɔ nɔngkɔ.” Ruu rang nɔɔ yee keɓe tɔkn kpang.
A nwang nɛɛ yeti gari daa ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung naa ɓɔɔ wu daarɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri dũng wu ka knti.
A ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ nɔng bìí, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gaa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A yaa ri daa kaa nɔng ɓɔɔgn, naabm, tang nɛɛ gutu ka nɔngkɔ, a gaa Laa kati nɛɛ,
“Daa mɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, kɔsɔ m jĩng dannang keɓe jong. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a mã wu danggn kati.
Rɛ̃rɛnang jĩng dannang keɓe, shing wu, gaa Laa kaa gbãng gbãng nɛɛ gn ɓiɓɛ gbete. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yannang sɔ̃lɔ nɛɛ nyaating ɓiɓɛ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zĩi sɔ̃lɔ.
“Yupaa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu gaa Laa ɓɛɛ, a ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ĩi ri, hingro yiki ri tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ roo ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ yupaa, nɔɔ gàa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.’ ”

Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ rang yee doo ka nyaa, zang dɔɔli nwang nyaa. Zang gbete ka teteng rɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti, ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahuda ɓɛɛ, wukɔ sɔɔ ri tĩng. A ka bii Yeesɔ naabm nɛɛ wu kɔ̃ng wu katɔ.
Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Yahuda, mɔɔ a zang Jaa Shɔnzang nɛɛ kɔ̃ngnang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̃ng m ɓɛɛ ya?”
A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nimbang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang keɓe ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Dabang ruu ku ri ta nɛɛ yere bang ya?”
Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ku jaafoo kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ yere bang, wɔng wu shoo nakn ka tipi.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu keɓe takpang.” A lee shoo yɔɔ nɛɛ naa, a màsɛ́ yɔɔ shoo.

A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang zang Yahudi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ kɔ nɔngkɔ nɛɛ yere bang, a ɓɔɔ labasaa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ n zang ɓɔɔ shing zang nɛɛ ri haa nyaa ya?”
N nwáng nɛɛ nɔɔ diki diki ka yeti Gãa Laa, nɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ yi m kpang. Lɛɛkɔ làá manɛ kɔ arɛ, nɛɛ làá zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng tĩiri ɓɛɛ.
Zang yi wu, zang daa nɛɛ wu, zang atɛ wu ka gãa kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Bituru dũng ri ka knti katara.
Zang dɔɔ waa ka dàbang, a ri nwang ka nyaa waa ka nɔngkɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ. Bituru naa sɔ̃ jong ka teteng ɓarɛ.
Jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ka gãa kaɓa, zi wu ka nyaa waa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu sɔ̃ ɓɛɛ. Jaa bii pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe bɛ̀ɛ́ doo nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ doori.”
A Bituru laa nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, n zi zang keɓe m kpang.”
Ɓɔɔ zang nwang naa gbete hn, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ zi wu, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ.” Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jèe, n wu zang ɓarɛ kpang.”
Ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ zang wu nwangnɛ knti wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔgn yi tĩng tɔɔ, “N suu sèé kpang, yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ wu ning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yɔɔ keɓe doo zang tipi Galili kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Bituru kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Jèe, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ keɓe m kpang.” Bɛ̀ɛ́ rang yee doo naa nyaa, kn ɓaa nyaa.
A Kpanti Yeesɔ raa jĩng pɛ̃ɛrɛ Bituru. A Bituru kpaa danggn yee Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kn ɓaa nyaa lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ nɛɛ zĩi, mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ dakn taati.”
A nwang ka biling, kaa zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka wu, ri kpaa wu, ri ti nyɔkɔ wu.
Ri mã wu jĩng nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ta, wi nyɔ mɔɔ wiya?”
Ri ràngkɛ̀ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli, ri ti dãlɛ wu.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a rɛɛ zang bang Yahudi nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a zang atɛ Yeesɔ kati.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu.” A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ kpang.
Naa n ti hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu, nɔɔ kasɛ m nyaa kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ keɓe, Jaa Shɔnzang nwang ɓi kaa nakn Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ mɔkɔ Jaa Laa ya?” A kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Nn, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu kàsɛ̀, ruu tãa vi tɔkn ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ viya? Ruu tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓuru.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ yuu, ri yupaa nandon, ri atɛ Yeesɔ ka bii Gɔmna Bilatu.
Ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ wu ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ruu ĩi zang keɓe nwãarɛ zang ɓuru, nɛɛ zang wu shù Kayisa kpanti tipi Rooma saka tipi kpang. Nɛɛ wukɔ ti Kirisi, nɛɛ wu doo kpanti kɔ.”
A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudi ya?” A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A Bilatu kɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng ri ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ, “N zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
A ri yì wu tĩng ka bii nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ zang nɛɛ zang ri haa nyaa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang ɓɛɛ ka tipi Yahudi. Gaayu ka tipi Galili sasak, a nɔng ka nihn.”
Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãa naa weɓe, hɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ zang tipi Galili ya?
A ɓɔɔ wu tãayi nɛɛ, Yeesɔ zang tipi Galili ɓɔɔ Hiridu roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ, a dɔ̃ wu ka bìí kpanti Hiridu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ka Urushalima ka diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Hiridu zi Yeesɔ hn, tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tãa nyaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ. A kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zi Yeesɔ katɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu ruu sasak, a Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kpang.
Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, ri shi paa ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ kaa gbãng gbãng.
A kpanti Hiridu nɛɛ zang sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, a ri kpaa wu. A ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ kpanti ri hãlɛ ɓɛɛ ka bii. A kpanti Hiridu sɔɔrɔ wu ka bii kpanti Bilatu.
Hiridu nɛɛ Bilatu ri gaayu wusang yinang ka diki keɓe. Bɛɛ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.
Bilatu ɓaa nyaa tɔkn ka zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang bang zang kɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ atɛ m yɔɔ keɓe, nɔɔ tɔɔ palɛ zang, nɛɛ zang haa nyaa. Ɓɔɔ n hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu ka tĩng manɛ, n ĩi wu nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ gbete kpang.
Kpanti Hiridu ti ĩi wu nɛɛ mani kpang jong. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gbãa ruu yuu nɛɛ wu tɔkn. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kagn kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, n yaa wu naa.”
[Diki nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ a tɔ, Bilatu yàarɛ́ zang Yahudi zang gbete naa ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa ɓɛɛ.]
Ri goo nyaa ka lapa dɔ̃ɔ, gbete nɛɛ, “Nyɔ yɔɔ keɓe vɔrɔ, mɔɔ yàa ruu Baraba naa.”
(Zang loo Baraba ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ haa nyaa ka gari, a zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.)
Bilatu kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa Yeesɔ naa katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rang yee tɔkn nɛɛ zang, a gaa ri.
A ri goo nyaa tɔkn nabm nɛɛ, “Ɓaa wu naa ka laa, ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn, daa kaa nyaa taati nɛɛ, “Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ viya? N ĩi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. N nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, n yaa wu naa.”
A ri yi tĩng kana, ri haa nyaa nabm nɛɛ, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa. Nyaa ɓɔɔ ri hàa ɓɛɛ naa sha tĩng.
A Bilatu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang pàlɛ̀ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ ta.
A yaa ri zang ɓɔɔ zang loo ka sãa ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang haa nyaa ka gari, a zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, naa. A á ri Yeesɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ ri daa kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, ri kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman, yɔɔ gari Kiranɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kaa gari. Ri yi wu, ri shing wu, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ, wu dũng Yeesɔ ka knti.
Ka teteng zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ ka knti, zang soro kagn ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri ti ɓaarɛ nyaavaa.
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang soro gari Urushalima, nɔ́ɔ kaa nyavɔ, ka ruu mɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ kaa ka ruu yuu manɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ manɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri shii katɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri tuu jaa gngn kpang, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa mãa míi ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wee diki ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔ̀ɔ́ kɔpɔ kagn nɛɛ, ‘Ji jong ka yuu ɓuru.’ Zang ti kɔ̀ɔ́ jaa kɔpɔ nɛɛ ‘Waasɛ ruu jong’ ɓɛɛ.
Zang nɛɛ palɛ m vuu keɓe ɓɔɔ n nwang naa laa bɛbɛtɛ, zang naa palɛ nɔɔ ɓi kaa biya, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang naa laa waatɛnang ɓɛɛ?”
Zang kagn ziti, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, zang yi ri jong nɛɛ zang daa nyɔ ri vɔrɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
A ɓɔɔ ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zɔ̃pi ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa, ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka nakn, a ɓɔɔ gbete ka nagang ɓiɓɛ.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ, yaa ri gbalang vuu keɓe katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ kpang ɓee.” Ri sháa laa ka naa ɓɔɔ ri basɛ rɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ri shii nɛɛ dalɛ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kpaa wu tɔɔ, “Ta yuu zang, wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ lɛ̀ɛ́ ta jong, wukɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, Jaa Laa ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang sɔɔja ri kpaa wu, ri arɛ ri a wu mii inabi ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ri tɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kpanti zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ.”
Zang bee vuu, zang ɓaa ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn, ka yupaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Wee kɔ Kpanti zang Yahudi.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ziti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ gbete rang wu yee shi kpang tɔɔ, “Wu mɔkɔ Kirisi kpang ya? Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔɔ ta ruu jong.”
Ɓɔɔ gbete mangkɛ ɓeesang tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang ya? Mɔɔ zi kpang mɔɔ vɔ vɔrɔ gbete nɛɛ wu kpang ya?
Vɔrɔ ɓuru ɓi ti waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu vɔ ɓuru ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.”
A raa nyaa kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo Kpanti, danggn mɛɛ wu ning mɔɔ kpang.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Niizang n kɔɔ mɔɔ, lɛɛkɔ mɔɔ nwang nɛɛ n ka Paradayisi, nɔng ɓɔɔ tĩnang waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ laa kaa dalɛ yuu, nɔng tɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon sasak, saka taati ɓɔɔ laarang palɛ nɛɛ mani.
A fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa Gãa Laa basɛ ziti, gaayu nɛɛ paa daa lɔɔsɔ dii.
Yeesɔ kaa nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ, n a mɔɔ Suru bii mɛɛ tɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ.” Kɔɔ naa weɓe, a vɔrɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ Yeesɔ zi naa weɓe, dɔɔ Laa tɔɔ, “Niizang yɔɔ keɓe, palɛ vuu shi kpang, kagn kpang.”
