Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ yuu ka nɔng, nɛɛ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu pálɛ́ hn, ri gbãayu ka gãa ɓarɛ nɛɛ yeti lasɛnang. Ri waa naa ka danggn.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ nung tɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ nung tɔ kɔ doori, ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nɛɛ Galili ɓɛɛ, ri shii nɛɛ dalɛ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yusufu, yɔɔ gari zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Arimataya ɓɛɛ. Kagn teteng zang bang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ri jɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. A ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Kasɛ nyaa ɓi kagn ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri mã zɔɔ nyaa, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Gã ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
Daa ka bii Bilatu, a gaa wu nɛɛ, wu a wu vɔrɔ Yeesɔ.
A witi vɔrɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ lapa, leng wu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Daa wɔɔ wu ka sàa ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka yeti tari, ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ gngn doo gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ kaa diki ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ bii ka ruu Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ nɛɛ tipi Galili ri daa nɛɛ Yusufu, ri daa zi saa bìí kati nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ vɔrɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ri gbãayu ka gãa, ri daa palɛ nung, ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ nung ɓɔɔ zang tũuru vɔrɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ. Ri ɔ̃sɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ gbete, ka knti Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang. Nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, rɛɛ zang soro keɓe ri daa ka yuu sàa, ri tuu nung ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ka naa ning.
Ri daa ĩiyi, zang dɔ̃ tari tɔ nɛɛ nyaa sàa.
Ri tu ka yeti sàa, a ri ĩi vɔrɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ̀ɔ nɔng kpang.
Ri shi ka nɔngkɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ takpang. Ri rɛ̃rɛ doo naa, a ri zi zang varɛ ziti, ri shii tɔ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru kalang kalang kɔlɔ katɔ, ka kagn ɓarɛ naabm.
Zang soro keɓe ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔɔli, a ri ɓaa yuu ka dii. A zang varɛ bìí ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi nɔɔ kãa zang ɓɔɔ Suru kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ viya?
Tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔng kpang, yupaa tɔ. Nɔɔ kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ doo ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Zang naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang Jaa Shɔnzang, ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa. A lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati, zang wisi wu paa kati.’ ”
A ri kpaa danggn yee ɓiɓɛ kati.
Ɓɔɔ ri gbãayu nɛɛ nɔng yusàa, ri kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi ti gbete nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri dung wu ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ri vuu keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Yuwana nɛɛ Marayamu nàá Yakub, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro nimbang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓarɛ kpang, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro keɓe, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ nyaa waati. Ri shing danggn ka ruu bìí kpang.
A Bituru yupaa ɓiri, yurɛ daa ka nɔng yuu saa. Tangsɛ, a lengse jĩng ka yeti sàa. Zi fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng vɔrɔ nɔng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Gbãayu daa gãa, mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi keɓe.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu diki diki, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ri daa ka jaa gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Imawu ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ yuu paa nɛɛ Urushalima mɔɔ daa kagn mɛli manziti.
Ri rang yee nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri rang yee doo naa ka nyaa, ri ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ, a Yeesɔ naa ĩi ri. Ri ɓakɛ doo kaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, ri daayi.
A ri zi wu nung takpang, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang zúu ri jĩng katɔ.
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rangkɛ yee vi nɛɛ zɔɔ ka gbalang viya?” Ri shiiyi, ri zaa katɔ.
A zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kiliyopaa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ ɓaa zang zanti gbete ka Urushalima, ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ka nɔng, diki bee gn kpang ɓɛɛ ya?”

A hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ “Ɓu vi palɛ viya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, zang nyaa shonang Laa. Ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu bang bang, nɛɛ wu ti rang zang piti yee, wu kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang piti a wu bannang katɔ.
A ɓɔɔ ti, naa ɓɔɔ, rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓuru ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kɔ ɓɛɛ, ri a wu zang, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, a zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
Bɛɛ ruu shing danggn ɓuru nɛɛ, wukɔ naa ta yuu zang Isirela. Ti wee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, lɛɛkɔ keɓe diki daa kaa taati ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kagn, ka teteng ɓuru, ri kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ãa nyaa mɔɔ tãa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri daa ka yuu sàa lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng.
A ri ĩi vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka yeti saa kpang. Ri gbãayu, ri kɔɔ ruu tɔɔ, ri zili zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, Yeesɔ doo ningkãari.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru, ri daa ka yuu sàa, ri daa ĩi doo naa ɓɔɔ zang soro ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ doori. A ri zi Yeesɔ doo kpang kɔ.”
Yeesɔ rang ri yee tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zũng kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓoro manɛ valɛ bii dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ kpang nandon ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ Kirisi dang jĩng vuu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a wu bannang ɓiɓɛ kpang ya?”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka labeenang Laa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. Gaayu nɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beere ɓɛɛ, a à nɔng ka yuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa nandon ri beere ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri a naabm tɔ nɛɛ jaa gari ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri dàá ɓɛɛ, a Yeesɔ palɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu sha nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
A ri bakɛ wu nɛɛ, “Nwang nɛɛ ruu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaa nɔng laarang, laa ti hãa nyaa kana ɓɛɛ.” A daayi nɛɛ wu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ ri.
Nwangnɛ nɛɛ wu shaa kaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri. Tuu borodi a gaa Laa, sharɛ a á ri.
Á ri zi wu nung kati, a ningnɛ ri zi wu takpang.
Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓasi ka gbalang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ ruu, a ti nwangsɛ ruu dĩiri ruu vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tãa tĩnang ka yeti ɓuru dɔɔli.”
Ri yuu paa tantɛnang ri gbãayu ka Urushalima, a ri ĩi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu gbete. Ri kpalɛ yuu ka nɔng gbete, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ yupaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa niizang, nwang nyaa tɔ ka bii Siman.”
A zang ziti keɓe kɔɔ ri naa vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa Imawu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu ri yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ wu shaa borodi ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe doo naa, Yeesɔ nwang nyaa, naa shii ka teteng ɓarɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi jong.”
Ri kaa vɔrɔ, ri tɔɔ naa ri zi ɓarɛ raanang.
A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ viya? A nɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ nyaa ka yeti manɛ nɔngkɔ viya?
Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ doo mɛɛ, nɛɛ naa mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ. Nɔɔ lee m nɛɛ naa, nɔɔ zirɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaka nɛɛ yɔpɔ ɓi kagn bii raanang, naa wee ka bii mɛɛ ɓee, kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a tusu ri naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ.

Ɓɔɔ vuu bìí kpãa ri doo ka yeti, ka ruu tĩnang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ. A ri ti kasɛ gn kpang kɔ sasak, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu bìí nwang naa nɔngkɔ niizang kpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Vuu shaanang kagn nɔng manɛ ka nihn ya?”
Ri a wu jaa jaazĩi ɓɔɔ zang nwãa katɔ ɓɛɛ,
a tarɛ shaa ka tĩng ɓarɛ ka nɔngkɔ.

A rang yee nɛɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee yee mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n ràng nɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yuu mɛɛ ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa, nɛɛ labeenang rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, a ɓɔɔ labeenang kpanti Dawuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zabura ɓɛɛ, nwang ditɔ niizang nandon.”
A á ri naa, tɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kati.
A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ɓɛɛ, Kirisi dang jĩng, wu ti vɔrɛ, diki nɛɛ daa tɔ taati, wu yupaa nɛɛ sàa.
Zang kɔɔ zang koo piti Ruu Laa, nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɛɛ zang yaa vuu shi kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ. Zang naa gaayu nɛɛ Urushalima.
Nɔ́ɔ kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ nandon.
N shong nɔɔ nyaa, vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ nwang ka gari Urushalima ka gbongkarɛ, Suru Laa wu a ka yuu manɛ.”
A nwang nɛɛ yeti gari nɛɛ ri, naabm nɛɛ Bɛtani. A see naa ka lapa, gaa Laa nɛɛ, Laa wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ jong.
A ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ gàá ri Laa doo naa, zang tuu wu zang daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa.
Ri bang wu, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. A ri gbãayu ri daa gari Urushalima,
ri dàarɛ́ yeti Gãa Laa diki diki, ri zãa Laa.
Zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Ruu, nwáng dòo ka tĩng bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Ruu keɓe nwáng ɓi nɛɛ Laa. Ruu keɓe ɓi wukɔ Laa.
Nwáng ɓi nɛɛ Laa ka tĩng doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa mãa koo gn kpang.
Laa mãarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti nɛɛ wukɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ Laa mãa nɛɛ wu kpang, kagn kpang.
Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓi ka bii Ruu keɓe kɔ. Suru bii keɓe wukɔ yakɛ shɔnzang nɔng.
Nɔng yakɛnang keɓe, yakɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, a nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ningsi wu kaa takpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn Laa shong wu, zang ɓáa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana.
Arɛ nɛɛ wu naa kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri tãayi, ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ.
Wu Yɔhana kɔ nɔng yakɛnang keɓe kpang, a ɓiri nɛɛ wu naa kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓi ruu ka yuu nɔng yakɛnang keɓe.
Wee kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yàkɛ́ nɔng ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ kɔ, ɓɔɔ a ka koo naa yàkɛ́ nɔng, tɔ̀ɔ, shɔnzang nandon ri zi vuu kaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti koo kɔ nwani, wukɔ ti mãa koo keɓe, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ri zi wu kaa takpang.
Á ka bii zang laa gãa ɓiɓɛ, a zang ɓiɓɛ ti ta wu kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu nandon, a ri ti shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ri naa nɛɛ, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa wujɛ Laa.
Zang keɓe Laa yi ri. Zang yi ri naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang yi jaa ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ti yi ri nɛɛ bii shɔnzang kpang. Ɓi ti ka gbalang ɓɔɔ zang varɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi wukɔ Daa ɓarɛ.

A Ruu keɓe naa túu bii shɔnzang, a nwang kaa nɛɛ ruu nɔng gbete. Atɛ ruu tĩnang tãanang dɔɔli nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. A ruu ti zi bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru, ɓi bannang ɓɔɔ Daa a jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Yɔhana kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Yɔhana mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Wee zang ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ kagn, wukɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓi ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a wu gaagaa, rùu ti wàlɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ kana ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ.
Naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa a nɛɛ bii Musa, tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang Laa, nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, a ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa tɔ kagn gbete kpang. Ɓi jaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu doo naa Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ nwang ka ɓuru Laa kɔ, tusu naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwang ɓɛɛ.
Zang bang bang zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Leevi, ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa ɓu wiya?”
Yɔhana laa nyaa kpang. Kɔɔ ri ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, wàasɛ̀ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi nkɔ Kirisi (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) kpang.”

Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “A mɔɔ ɓu kaa wiya?” “Mɔkɔ Iliya ya?” Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Wu nkɔ Iliya kpang.” Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn nɛɛ, “A mɔkɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya?” A ti kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Ɓi nkɔ kpang.”
A ri díkí wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ta jong, mɔkɔ wiya? Tɔɔ ruu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ, ruu daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ruu ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang ɓu nɛɛ mɔkɔ ɓu wiya?”
A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ rang yee Laa ka waala, ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta, nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo.’ ”
Zang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Farisi shong ri ɓɛɛ,
ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “A ka ruu vi mɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang batizima viya? Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi kpang. Mɔkɔ ti Iliya kpang, a mɔɔ ti zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a kpang ɓɛɛ?”
A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N pàlɛ́ zang batizima m nɛɛ mii, zang ɓɔɔ shii kagn teteng manɛ kãntang keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi wu nung manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wukɔ a ka knti mɛɛ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
Zang pálɛ́ vuu keɓe piti ka Bɛtani ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung katɔ ka dang ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pálɛ̀ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a Yɔhana zi Yeesɔ a kana bìí ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa kaɓa, ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ, Laa yàá zang koo keɓe gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Wee zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ n tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ kagn, wukɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓi ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ kɔ.’
Bɛ̀ɛ́ n zi wu nung m doo kpang kɔ doori. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n arɛ n pàlɛ́ zang batizima nɛɛ mii, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu nwangsɛ zang Isirela wu kati nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi.”
Yɔhana kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔɔ, “N zi Suru Laa a nɛɛ lapa naa koro, a naa nwàng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.

N nɛɛ ti zi m kpang nɛɛ wukɔ kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ shɔng m nɛɛ n naa pàlɛ̀ zang batizima nɛɛ mii, wukɔ kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zirɛ Suru Laa arɛ naa nwàng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang keɓe kɔ naa pàlɛ́ zang batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa.’
N ti naa zi nɔngkɔ nɛɛ jĩng mɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe Jaa Laa, bìí kɔ.”
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yɔhana shii tɔ ka nɔngkɔ tɔkn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti,
a zi Yeesɔ rakɛ. A Yɔhana kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa kaɓa.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ naa weɓe, ri yaa wu ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa Yeesɔ.
A Yeesɔ raa jĩng zi ri, ri dũng wu kana. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãa viya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Rabii, dĩiri nung keɓe, ɓi maalang. Nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng kagn kiya?”
A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ arɛ, nɔɔ zirɛ.” (Bɛ̀ɛ́ saka dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ laarang yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng). Ri dũng wu, ri daa zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu nwang kagn kati. Ri nwang kaa nɛɛ wu ka nɔngkɔ, laa hãa nyaa nɛɛ mani.
Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, a ri dũng Yeesɔ kaɓa. Zang ɓaa ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ Anduru jaa naa Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
Dàa tantɛ jaa niiɓɛ Siman kɔ ĩinang shɔɔnang, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu ĩi Masiya, zang ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa nɛɛ naa ta yuu zang tɔ.” Wukɔ “Kirisi”.
A gɔ̃ Siman daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ. Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ Siman a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Siman jaa Yɔhana waa? Zang ɓáa mɔɔ kaa nɛɛ Kefa” (Dĩiri nung keɓe daa gbete nɛɛ Bituru ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ɓi “Tari ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ”).
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa ka Galili. A ĩi Filibu a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “A ta nɛɛ n ning.”
Filibu ɓi doo zang Bɛsɛda kɔ, gari rɛɛ Anduru nɛɛ Bituru.

Filibu ti naa ĩi Natanalu, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu ĩi zang ɓɔɔ Musa bee vuu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa, a zang nyaa shonang Laa ri ti bee jong tɔ. Zang keɓe, wukɔ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, jaa Yusufu.”
Natanalu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nwáng nyaa ka gari Nazara ɓu kagn ya?” Filibu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ “Arɛ mɔɔ daa zirɛ.”
Yeesɔ zi Natanalu a kana bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ niizang kaɓa, vuu ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
Natanalu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ pálɛ̀ bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ zi m nɔngkɔ viya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi mɔɔ dòo ka doo laa sĩiri bɛ̀ɛ́ Filibu daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa gn kpang.”
Natanalu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, mɔkɔ Jaa Laa. Mɔkɔ Kpanti zang Isirela.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɛɛ n zi mɔɔ dòo ka doo laa sĩiri ɓɛɛ ya? Mɔɔ naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe ditɔ.”
A kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nɔɔ naa zi lapa puu ditɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri naa a ka bii mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, ri ti gbãayu ka lapa tɔkn.”
Diki naa gãntɛ tɔ ziti, zang gee soro ka gari Kaana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Nàá Yeesɔ daa nɔng kaɓa kaa jong.
Zang ti gaarɛ Yeesɔ jong nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Mii inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓoo ɓɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, a nàá Yeesɔ a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mii inabi ɓarɛ waa nyaa tɔ nandon.”
A kasɛ niiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Maanaa, mɔɔ a kaa bii mɛɛ kaa ruu viya? Yáa m ka nɔngkɔ, laa mɛɛ a ɓi gn kpang.”
Nàá Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, ri yi zang naa ka shonang ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ piti nɔɔ pálɛ́.”
Bɛ̀ɛ́ zang shɔ ɓawa tari kagn nɔngkɔ mangbete. Ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ mii ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ bii nɛɛ mani, naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi dang nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓawa gbete naa zang tɛ̃ɛ mii kagn, bɛng taati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shonang keɓe nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ wisi rɛɛ ɓawa keɓe nyaa ta nɛɛ mii.” Ri wisi mii ka nyaa ɓawa lɛɛri.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zã mii keɓe ta tɔkɔlɔng, nɔɔ daa a zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ.” A ri zã mii, ri daa nɛɛ mani.

Ɓɔɔ zang bang kn sinyɛ ta mii, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ raa mii inabi tɔ ɓɛɛ, a tãayi. Yɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ mii inabi keɓe a nɔng kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shonang ɓɔɔ ri zã mii, ri zi ɓarɛ tɔ. A ɓaa nyaa ka sinyɛ ɓeevɛ dang gbete,

a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang a zang zanti ɓi mii inabi ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ shɔɔnang, zang nɛɛ ɓoo tɔ, zang naa gɔɔ nyaa kaa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ la kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ yaa mii inabi tɔ̃ɔ gbongkarɛ mɔɔ naa a zang ɓaa kaa nɛɛ doo knti ka ruu viya?”

Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gaayu palɛnang ɓɛɛ kɔ, ka gari Kaana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang bannang ɓiɓɛ kaa nɔngkɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng.
Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ daa ka gari Kafanahu nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
Làá nyaalaa pasika ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, yáa kaa tɔkɔlɔng, a Yeesɔ daa kaa Urushalima.
Daa ka dàbang Gãa Laa, ĩi zang ri mãlɛ́ napo, nɛɛ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, a ɓɔɔ ning koro. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ zang saka ri ti nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka teeburu ɓarɛ.
A zaa soo, pálɛ́ gbãa nɛɛ mani, a hing zang nandon, nɛɛ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, nɛɛ napo ning, ɓɔɔ ka dàbang Gãa Laa ka biling. A ti zĩili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ zang saka, a vang saka ɓarɛ.
A Yeesɔ rang zang ɓɔɔ ri mãlɛ́ ning koro yee nabm tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see veɓe ta, nɔɔ yaa nɔng. Nɔɔ risi Gãa Daa mɛɛ nwang naa lumang ka ruu viya?”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ, ri kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Sũnyaa ɓɔɔ n kaa ka ruu Gãa ɓaaɓɛ, kɔng m ka ɓoro naa waa.”
Zang bang bang, zang Yahudi ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zi kagn nɛɛ zang a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang tɔ ɓu viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ jili Gãa Laa keɓe ta, n wisi paa tɔkn n hangsɛ nyaa ka diki taati.”
Zang bang bang, zang Yahudi ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang mãa gãa keɓe saa laa ziti tu mangbete, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ wisi paa ɓaa diki taati kɔ nwani ya?”
A ɓeekpang, ruu Gãa ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ ɓi bii ɓiɓɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ̀ɔ ri vuu keɓe tɔ kagn. A ri shing danggn kaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ ning.

Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Yeesɔ doo ka Urushalima, ka diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, zang dɔɔli ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zili vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ ti á ri yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zi naa shɔnzang ɓi tɔ nandon,
daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ wu ruu shɔnzang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yɔɔ zang Farisi ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Nikodimu. Nikodimu ɓi ka teteng, zang bang bang zang Yahudi.

Yɔɔ keɓe, diki ɓɔɔ kagn daa ka bìí Yeesɔ nɛɛ zĩi. Kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa maalang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa wu zang ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ wu kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ mɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ gbete kpang.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa zang yi mɔɔ tɔkn kpang, mɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti kpang.”
Nikodimu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang yi zang biya tɔkn, zang nɛɛ bang tɔ viya? Zang tú tɔkn ka yeti nàá zang, tɔ̀ɔ, nàá zang wu yi zang tɔkn daa kaa dakn ziti ya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa zang yi zang nɛɛ mii, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bii Suru Laa kpang, zang keɓe daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti ɓi kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang yirɛ, ɓi shɔnzang, zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa yirɛ, ɓi ti zang suru.
Mɔ́ɔ mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ n tɔɔ, zang wu yi nɔɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ kpang.
Jasung rarɛ daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ wu rãa ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang piti ɓɔɔ Suru Laa yi wu, nwàng ɓi doo nɔngkɔ.”
Nikodimu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Vuu keɓe nwáng lɛ̀ɛ́ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔngkɔ viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang Isirela vuu kɔ nwani, mɔɔ zi vuu keɓe doo kpang nɛɛ mani ya?
N kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, rùu ráng yee ɓuru, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
N kɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, mɔɔ shing danggn kagn kpang, a naa n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, mɔɔ shing danggn ɓi kaa biya?
Zang ɓɔɔ vang gngn daa ka lapa kpang, ɓi nkɔ Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ n shooro nɛɛ lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
Naa ɓɔɔ Musa wisi sɔkɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ zang kãngtɛ ka yuu laa paa ka waala, zang naa wisi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang paa doo nɔngkɔ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, wu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kati.
Laa kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shong nyaa nɛɛ Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ wu shaarɛ kpang, wu wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kɔ jong.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɔng Jaa ɓiɓɛ ka koo nɛɛ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kpang, nɛɛ wu naa ta ɓi yuu zang koo kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa, zang jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ɓi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa kpang, zang dɔng wu ruu ɓi tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Jaa gbete Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.

Laa dɔ̌ng zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ruu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɔng nɔng yakɛnang ka koo, a zang ri kasɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔ jong, ɓa nɔng yakɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri pálɛ̀ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, kasɛ ruu nɔng yakɛnang ɓi kpang. À nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ, á ɓi katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀, ɓi Laa yi wu naa kagn.
Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka tipi Yahudi. Ri daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ri pàlɛ́ zang batizima.
Yɔhana ti pàlɛ́ zang batizima ɓi jong ka gari Ayinɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Salima naabm ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ mii kagn nɔng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ri daarɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ a ti palɛ ri batizima.
(Bɛɛ zang loo Yɔhana gn ka sãa kpang.)
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔ̀ɔ, ri gáa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang nɛɛ yɔɔ Yahudi ɓɔɔgn ka ruu bii sɔɔnang naa ɓɔɔ dáa ɓarɛ tùsù ri ɓɛɛ.
A ri daa ka bii Yɔhana ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɓeleng mɔɔ nɛɛ wu ka rang Urudung dang, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ rúu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, pàlɛ́ zang batizima kana. Zang ri daarɛ kana bii ɓiɓɛ nandon.”
A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ a zang vuu kpang, zang walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
Ɓeleng n kɔɔ m nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ti tãa tɔ, N tɔɔ, ‘Ɓi nkɔ Kirisi kpang, Laa shong m ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.’
Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓi wukɔ zang sinyɛ. Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, ɓaa shoo, tãa tĩnang dɔɔli nɛɛ tãa yee sinyɛ ɓeevɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. N tãa tĩnang m doo nɔngkɔ. Tĩnang mɛɛ ti daa ɓi tɔ kiiri.”
Bannang ɓiɓɛ daa ɓi ditɔ nɛɛ tĩng, n ti gbãayu m kaa nɛɛ knti kɔ jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa wukɔ ɓa zang piti, zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang koo yi wu, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ koo. Ti ráng yee ɓi naa zang koo keɓe. Zang ɓɔɔ a ɓi nɛɛ lapa wukɔ ɓa zang ɓi piti.
Zang keɓe rang yee ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ, a ti tãa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, kagn gbete kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta rúu ɓiɓɛ, tusu zang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi niizang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa shongnɛ, rang ɓi doo yee Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a wu Suru ɓiɓɛ, di nyaa kpang.
Daa kasɛ Jaa katɔ, a yaa vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa, wàlɛ̀ Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓi kpang. Jĩng dannang kagn yuu ɓiɓɛ ning.
Yeesɔ zirɛ nɛɛ zang Farisi ri tãa nyaa tɔ, nɛɛ wu walɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔ dɔɔli, nɛɛ wu ti pàlɛ́ zang batizima kana dɔɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
(Wu wukɔ ti pàlɛ́ zang batizima nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri palɛ.)
Tãa tɔ nɔngkɔ, a Yeesɔ yaa tipi Yahudi gbãayu tɔkn daa Galili.
Gbalang ɓɔɔ wu tɛɛ nɛɛ mani sɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ tipi Samariya kɔ gbete.
A naa a kaa gari Sayika ka tipi Samariya. Gari bìí naabm nɛɛ tipi, jaa lannang, ɓɔɔ Yakubu a jaa ɓiɓɛ Yusufu ɓɛɛ.
Toomii ɓɔɔ Yakubu ɓeeyi kagn nɔngkɔ. Yeesɔ lee tɔ, ka ruu doo ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ, a naa nwang ka nyaa toomii bìí, bɛ̀ɛ́ laa kaa dalɛ yuu.
A jaa soro tipi Samariya arɛ nɛɛ wu naa wɔ mii. Yeesɔ gaa wu nɛɛ, “A m mii jong n ɓooyi.”
(Bɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ɓarɛ tɔ ka gari nɛɛ ri daa hoo vuu shaanang.)
Jaa soro Samariya kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa zang Yahudi, n m zang Samariya. Mɔɔ gaa mii ka naa mɛɛ ka ruu viya?” (Zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang Samariya ri pálɛ́ vuu jong nɔng gbete nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.)
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang tɔ. A mɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi zang ɓɔɔ gaa mii ka naa ɓaaɓɛ tɔ. Mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ gàa wu tɔ, wu nɛ̀ɛ́ á mɔɔ mii ɓɔɔ a zang Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ.”
Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ wɔ mii nɛɛ mani kpang, toomii ti bee katɔ. A mɔɔ walɛ mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ka niya?
Toomii keɓe ɓi dabang ɓuru Yakubu a ruu. Ti ɓóo mii kagn, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu vaa ɓiɓɛ piti, a naa vɔrɛ. Mɔɔ ɓá dabang ɓuru Yakubu ɓaa ɓu kaa tɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii toomii keɓe sutu mãa wu ditɔ tɔkn.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii ɓɔɔ n a wu, sutu mãa wu takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mii ɓɔɔ n a wu, nwàng kaa naa sɔlɔng mii ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Sɔlɔng mii ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ mii ɓɔɔ á wu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A jaa soro kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, a m mii keɓe karɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, sutu wu mãa m takpang, ń ti alɛ nihn takpang, nɛɛ n wɔ mii kpang.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Daayi mɔɔ daa ɓaa ɓaavɛ nyaa, nɔɔ arɛ.”
Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Varɛ mɛɛ kagn kpang.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ varɛ ɓaaɓɛ kagn kpang, niizang kɔ nwani.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ gee varɛ daa maani ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng nɛɛ wu kãntang keɓe, wu varɛ ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ m kãntang keɓe, ɓi niizang kɔ nwani.”
Jaa soro kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Maalang, n zirɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa shonang Laa.
Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng ɓɛɛ, ri báng Laa ka yuu kɔpɔ keɓe. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudi nɔɔ ti kɔ̀ɔ́ manɛ nɛɛ nɔng Laa bannang ɓi ka Urushalima.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ “Jaa soro, n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, diki a kana, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang Daa ka nihn kpang, nɔɔ, ti bang wu ka Urushalima kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Samariya, nɔɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang wu manɛ kpang. Ɓɔɔ ruu zang Yahudi ruu zi Laa ɓɔɔ ruu bang wu ɓuru tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yuu tanang nwáng ɓi nɛɛ teteng zang Yahudi kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Diki a dòo naa, kãntang keɓe diki bìí a tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri naa bang Laa kaa waasɛ̃, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ri ɓɛɛ. Daa kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ, nɛɛ ri bang wu.
Laa ɓi Suru, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang wu, ri báng wu nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ a ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ti báng wu nɛɛ yeti gbete.”
Jaa soro kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “N zi tɔ, Masiya ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi a ditɔ. Nɛɛ a tɔ, naa kɔɔ ruu vuu ditɔ nandon.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati nɛɛ, “Wee n rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓee, nkɔ Kirisi bìí.”

Lɔɔ nyaa gn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gbãayu. Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu rang yee nɛɛ jaa soro bìí, ri mã naa ka danggn, a zang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ jaa soro kaa takpang nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ viya?” Kɔ, wu ti hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ jaa soro keɓe ka ruu viya,” kpang.
A jaa soro yaa bɛng mii ɓiɓɛ, gbãayu daa ka yeti gari, daa kɔɔ zang nɛɛ,
“Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n pálɛ́ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ nandon. Naa ɓu bɛ̀ɛ́ Kirisi kɔ ya?”
A zang ri nwang nɛɛ yeti gari, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ.
Ka knti jaa soro, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri yì wu tĩng ka bii nɛɛ, “Shaa vuu shaanang ta, maalang.”
Kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ kagn, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn atɛ wu vuu shaanang tɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu shaanang mɛɛ ɓi palɛnang vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ń ti hangsɛ shonang ɓɔɔ wu a m ɓɛɛ.
Nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ kagn nɛɛ, ‘Shala yaa doo dɛ̃ɛti tɔɔ zang yee zee.’ N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ túu jĩng karɛ nɔɔ zi jaa. Zee zũng jĩng tɔ, daa naa yeenang tɔ.

Zang jaa lannang wàlɛ́ ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Kpalɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kana, tɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jĩng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa yeeyi ri tãa tĩnang kaa nyaa zɔɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ ɓáa jĩng vuu, a zang ɓɔɔ wu naa yee ɓi kaa tɔ,’ niizang kɔ nwani.
N shong nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ daa yee vuu ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu nɔkɔ lang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔgn ri langnɛ, nɔɔ wàlɛ́ vuu shaanang manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ shonang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang Samariya dɔɔli ka gari kaɓa, ri shing danggn ka bìí Yeesɔ ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ jaa soro kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n pálɛ́ ka tĩng nandon” ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang tipi Samariya ri naa a ka bìí Yeesɔ, ri gàa wu nɛɛ wu nwáng nɛɛ ri. A nwáng kaa nɛɛ ri diki ziti.
Zang dɔɔli tɔkn ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
A ri kɔɔ jaa soro tɔɔ, “Rùu shing danggn wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu kpang. Ruu tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓuru, a ruu ti zi tɔ niizang, nɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe kɔ naa ta yuu zang koo.”
Diki ziti ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ yupaa nɛɛ wu daa kaa tipi Galili.
(Bɛɛ ti kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, “Zang a zang nyaa shonang Laa bannang ɓi jong ka tipi ɓiɓɛ kpang.”)
Ɓɔɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ tipi Galili, zang Galili ri ta wu waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri daa nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ ka Urushalima, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ́ ka diki nyaalaa nandon ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ daa tɔkn ka Kaana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ, nɔng ɓɔɔ wu risi mii, mii raa mii inabi ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ kpanti shonang kagn ka Kafanahu, ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ vuu palɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ yaa tipi Yahudi tɔ, a tɔ ka tipi Galili, yupaa daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, daa bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa màsɛ̀ wu jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ jong.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, zang ti ãa nyaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang zi ɓɛɛ gn kpang, nɔɔ shing danggn kpang.”
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ kpanti shonang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Maalang, arɛ ruu daayi, jaa mɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ vɔrɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dita, jaa ɓaaɓɛ nwáng ningkãari, vɔ kpang.” Yɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a yi gbalang daa ɓiri.
Dàá gãa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ wu shonang, ri kpisi wu yuu ka gbalang, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Bii jaa ɓaaɓɛ valɛ tɔ.”
A hɛ̃ɛ ri laa ɓɔɔ bii jaa valɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ bii ɓɔɔ zaa jaa nɛɛ yaa wu nɔng ka ɓɔɔrɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ laa nɛɛ kpɛ̃ɛ doo tɔkɔlɔng waati.
Daa jaa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ ka laa kaɓa kɔ nɛɛ, “Dita, jaa ɓaaɓɛ nwáng ningkãari, vɔ kpang.” Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yɔɔ nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon ri shing danggn kati.
Ɓu dòo ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu nɛɛ, tipi Yahudi a ka tipi Galili, pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe ziti.
Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, ka knti vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ daa Urushalima, ka diki kaɓa, zang Yahudi ri shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓarɛ.
Ka Urushalima, ka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ nyaa gãa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, too mii kagn nɔngkɔ naabm, zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛsɛda, nɛɛ nyaa Yahudi. Zang waa putali maani ka nyaa too mii bìí.
Zang kɔnang dɔɔli ri rooro ka nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ zang jĩng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. [Ri gã mii ɓɔɔ zang nyàá ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lee ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa daa ka too mii, nyàá mii ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nyàa mii tɔ, zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ yeti mii shɔɔnang, naa doo kɔnang viya yi wu, yaa wu nɔng katɔ.]
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka nyaa mii ka nɔngkɔ ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, daa saa bmati tu kopi tu mantaati ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ zi wu roo ka nɔngkɔ, a ti zi tɔ, nɛɛ yɔɔ bìí roo tɔ nɔngkɔ diki ɓiɓɛ bee katɔ. Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ wu yaa mɔɔ nɔng ya?”

Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, zang ɓɔɔ tuu m, wu hãa m ka mii, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ nyàa mii tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. N nɛɛ tɔɔ n daa yeti mii, zang ɓɔɔ wu ti ɓa m, wu daa yeti mii shɔɔnang.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa ta, mɔɔ tuu siri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ roo kagn ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ rarɛ.”
Kɔnang yaa yɔɔ nɔng tantɛnang, a tuu siri, a gaayu rannang kati. Yeesɔ pálɛ́ vuu keɓe ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, mɔɔ ta nyaa dannang ɓuru tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Yɔɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ masɛ m kɔ, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, Tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔɔ rarɛ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ rarɛ wiya?”
A ɓeekpang yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu zi zang ɓɔɔ masɛ wu nung kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tantɛ daanang ka teteng zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ̀ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ ĩi wu ka yeti Gãa Laa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ yàa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A yɔɔ yaa nɔng, daayi daa kɔɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudi nɛɛ ɓi Yeesɔ masɛ wu.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri gaayu gbalang kãanang ɓɔɔ ri kpãa wu ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ palɛ shonang ɓi doo naa, n ti palɛ shonang jong.”

Ka ruu rúu kɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, zang Yahudi ri kãa gbalang kaa gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ta nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ka yuu Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ti ɓaa Laa nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Gãsɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa teetee nɛɛ Laa.

Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, Jaa zunung ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, pálɛ̀ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zi Daa ɓiɓɛ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ Daa pálɛ̀ piti Jaa pálɛ̀ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Daa kasɛ ruu Jaa katɔ, a tí tusu Jaa vuu ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa wu palɛ katɔ. Ti naa tusu Jaa vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zirɛ, nɔɔ mã naa kaa danggn.
Naa ɓɔɔ Daa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, wu a ri suru bii, Jaa ti a zang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, suru bii doo nɔngkɔ.
Daa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi kpang, yaa ruu jɛ̃ɛnang piti ɓi kaa naa Jaa nandon.
Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri á Jaa bannang kati, naa ɓɔɔ ri á Daa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ á Jaa bannang kpang, á Daa ɓɔɔ shong wu bannang doo kpang kɔ.

“N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ shong m, wàlɛ́ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ. Laa ti naa dɔng wu ruu ɓi takpang. Ɓa yuu vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ suru tɔ, wɔ ɓi tɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, diki a kana, diki bìí ti a tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ri tãa yee Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, a ri ti dũngnɛ, ri nwáng ningkãari tɔkn.
Naa ɓɔɔ Daa kɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, á Jaa naa doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ, wu nwáng zang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
Ti á Jaa naa tɔ nɛɛ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka ruu ɓɔɔ wukɔ Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔ́ɔ mã naa ka danggn ka ruu vuu keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a kana, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ nandon ri tãa yee mɛɛ nɛɛ yeti saa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ri nwangkɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, zang wisi ri paa ri walɛ suru bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zang wisi ri paa, tɔ̀ɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ.

“N palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ jong nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang. N jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu m naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ m ɓɛɛ. N ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang m ka ɓɔɔ n jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n pálɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Naa n kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ, zang ta ruu mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓi niizang kɔ nwani kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ kagn. N zi tɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi niizang.
Nɔɔ shong zang ka bii Yɔhana, Yɔhana kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
N shing gn wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ kati.
“Yɔhana nwáng naa waa zàáng sɔɔ ɓɔɔ shaayi, a yakɛ nɔng ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa tĩnang nwannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu yakɛ ɓɛɛ, diki bee kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔɔli kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ, tusu zang vuu ka yuu mɛɛ, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ katɔ. Shonang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m nɛɛ n palɛ kɔ, n palɛ ɓee. Wukɔ tusu zang, tɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Daa kɔ shong m.
A Daa ɓɔɔ shong m ti kɔɔ ruu jong ka yuu mɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa yee Daa gngn kpang, nɔɔ ti zi waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ gngn kpang.
Ruu ɓiɓɛ ti kagn yeti manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ ĩi jĩng ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã labeenang waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ́ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Labeenang Laa keɓe, kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ kɔ.
A nɔɔ ti kasɛ anang ka bii mɛɛ, n a nɔɔ suru bii kpang.
“N shing gn m ka dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dɔ̀ɔ́ m ɓɛɛ kpang.
N zi zɔ̃ng manɛ m tɔ. Nɔɔ kasɛ Laa nɛɛ yeti manɛ kpang.
N a m nɛɛ nung Daa mɛɛ, a nɔɔ ta m kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ à anang yuu ɓiɓɛ nɔɔ ta wu katɔ.
Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ zɔɔ ka naa manɛ. Nɔɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Laa gbete gãagãa, wu dɔɔ nɔɔ kpang. A nɔɔ palɛ biya nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ viya?
“Nɔ́ɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, naa nkɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ Daa ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ. Kpang, zang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ Daa ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓi kagn. Musa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ, wukɔ kɔ̀ɔ́rɔ Daa.
Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn katɔ ka bii Musa niizang, nɔɔ nɛɛ shíng danggn tɔ ka bii mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Musa bèe vuu ka yuu mɛɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wee nɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu bee kpang ɓee, nɔɔ shing danggn biya ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓee viya?”
Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ ta waapo Galili, ɓɔɔ zang ti ɓaa dòo nɛɛ waapo Tiberiya kɔ ɓɛɛ, ka dang.
Zang dɔɔli ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ vang kɔpɔ daa nwáng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔngkɔ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ nyaalaa Pasika ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ a naabm tɔ.
Yeesɔ tuu jĩng ka lapa, a zi zang dɔɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ Filibu tɔɔ, “Rùu hoo borodi ka niya, ruu a zang keɓe ri shaayi wiya?”
Hɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Filibu ɓi katɔ waati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa pàlɛ̀ ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Filibu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa ruu hoo borodi doo nung dinari laa kopi, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang sha zang ɓu tɔkɔlɔng kpang.”
Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Anduru jaa naa Siman Bituru, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
“Jaa kagn nihn, nɛɛ borodi ka naa maani, nɛɛ jaazĩi seseere ziti. Vuu keɓe pàlɛ́ zang kɔ gaagaa ɓee ɓu viya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ka tipi.” (Wisi kagn nɔng bìí dɔɔli.) A zang ri nwalɛ kaa tipi. Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, daa labang maani katɔ.
A Yeesɔ see borodi ka naa a zãa Laa kati, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Pálɛ́ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ jaazĩi. Zang ɓu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Zang ri shaa tɔ, ri puu tɔ, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bìí ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ ri yàarɛ̀ ta, nɔɔ yaa ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ kpang.”
A ri kpalɛ kaa nandon vuu ɓɔɔ ri yàarɛ̀ ka borodi maani ɓɔɔ ri shaa ɓɛɛ, zang kpalɛ, yi nyaa saang kopi tu ziti.
Ɓɔɔ zang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Niizang, wee zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ka koo ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zirɛ nɛɛ zang a kaa tɔ, ri yi wu kpanti nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, yaa nɔng daa ka yuu kɔpɔ tɔkn ka bm.
Laa hãa nyaa tɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri shooro ri daa nyaa waapo dii.
Ri vang tonsi, ri daa kana nɛɛ ri ta kaa waapo, ri dàa Kafanahu. Nɔng tɔ̀ɔ́ tɔ, Yeesɔ à bii ɓarɛ gn kpang.
Bɛɛ mii rãa kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ jasung bang ra ɓɛɛ.
Ri yaa nyaa rang tɔ, ri daa tɔ, mɛli taati kɔ dɛ̃ɛti, a ri zi Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii, a kana bii tonsi naabm. Ri káa vɔrɔ.
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, ɓi nkɔ”
Ri kasɛ kati nɛɛ wu vang ta yeti tonsi. Vang tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a tonsi tantɛ nyaa rang dang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ shɛ̃ɛnang kati.

Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ yaa ri ka nyaa rang dang ri zirɛ nɛɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ tonsi nɛɛ gbete kɔ nwani. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri nɛɛ vang tonsi nɛɛ wu kpang, ri nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ ka bm.
A tonsi ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ Tiberiya ri naa shiiri ka nyaa rang, naabm nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔli ri shaa borodi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zãa Laa a ri ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang ri zi naa weɓe, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔng kpang. A zang bìí ri vang rɛɛ tonsi ɓɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ, ri daa ka Kafanahu nɛɛ ri daa kãa Yeesɔ.
Ri ta waapo tɔ, a ri daa ĩi Yeesɔ ka nyaa waapo dang. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Maalang, mɔɔ a nihn gn viya?”

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nɔɔ kãa m ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ kãa m manɛ ka ruu borodi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa ka buru gaagaa ɓɛɛ.

Nɔ́ɔ dang jĩng nɛɛ nɔɔ kãa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ dang jĩng ka nɔng vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang dòndòng, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa tusu nɛɛ wu a wu naa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu palɛ vi tɔ̀ɔ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ruu palɛ viya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn ka zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn tɔɔ, “A mɔɔ pálɛ́ ɓu vi ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ruu mã naa ka danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing danggn kaa bii ɓaaɓɛ viya?
Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Maanaa ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri ka waala ɓɛɛ. Zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa nɛɛ, ‘A ri borodi nɛɛ lapa, ri shaayi.’ ”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, wu Musa a nɔɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Daa mɛɛ álɛ́ nɔɔ borodi ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ lapa.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, borodi Laa, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa á zang koo keɓe suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
Ri gàa wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, alɛ ruu kaa borodi keɓe kɔ diki diki.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bìí mɛɛ, nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu takpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bìí mɛɛ, sutu mãa wu takpang.
Naa ɓaasi n kɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɔɔ zi m tɔ nɔɔ ti shing danggn gn ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ Laa a m, a kaa bii mɛɛ nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ, n hing wu kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a nɛɛ lapa, nɛɛ n naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ shong m, kasɛ nɛɛ n ning zang gbete ka teteng zang kɔ wu a m ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɛɛ n naa wisi ri paa katɔ kɔ jong, ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jĩng ka bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa, nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bìí mɛɛ, wu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. N ti naa wisi wu paa, n a wu suru bii ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
A zang Yahudi ri gaayu yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.”
A ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi Yeesɔ jaa Yusufu kpang ya? Ruu zi rɛɛ diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ tɔ kpang ya? A palɛ kaa biya kɔɔ lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ, wu a nɛɛ lapa viya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yáa yee kɔ nɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓi ta.”
A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shong m dɔ̃ zang, zang a ka bii mɛɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung anang ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. N ti naa wisi wu paa ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri beeyi nɛɛ, ‘Ri nandon Laa kɔ naa tusu ri vuu.’ Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ tusu, nɛɛ ti mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a katɔ ka bii mɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zi Daa tɔ kagn kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kɔ zi Daa ɓi shɛ̃ɛning.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.
Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ dabang manɛ, ri shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ maanaa ka ɓɔɔ ri dòo ka waala, ri vɔlɔ doo nɛɛ mani.
Borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa keɓe, naa zang ɓɔɔ shaayi, vɔ takpang.
Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii, ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi keɓe, nwáng ningkãari dòndòng. Ɓi bii mɛɛ kɔ borodi keɓe, ɓɔɔ n naa mãlɛ́, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo ri walɛ suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
Zang Yahudi bìí ri làa zɔɔ nyaa ka naa ɓarɛ gbãng gbãng ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe a ruu yɔpɔ bii ɓiɓɛ biya, ruu shaayi viya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang kpang, a nɔɔ ti ɓoo zĩi mɛɛ kpang, suru bii ɓi kagn bìí manɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ sháà yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ ti ɓoo zĩi mɛɛ, walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ. N ti naa wisi wu paa ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, ɓi vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Zĩi mɛɛ, ɓi ti vuu ɓoonang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ ti ɓoo zĩi mɛɛ, nwang ɓi nɛɛ n, n ti nwáng ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓɔɔ shíng zang, zang nwang ningkãari ɓɔɔ wukɔ shong m, shing m n nwàng ningkãari. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, n shing wu doo nɔngkɔ, wu nwang ningkãari.
Weɓe kɔ, borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Ɓi naa maanaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi keɓe, vɔ takpang dòndòng.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ka Kafanahu ɓɛɛ.
Zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Vuu kɔ wu tusu ɓee, kpãa nyaa dɔɔli, ɓu wi ɓaa shoo tãayi wiya?”
Yeesɔ tantɛ zinang nɛɛ ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ kɔ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Ruu keɓe lasɛ nɔɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ kaa tɔ ya?
A naa nɔɔ zi m, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, n gbãayu kana ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n kagn, nɔɔ palɛ biya?
Ɓi Suru Laa a zang suru bii ɓiri, bii shɔnzang zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang ɓi kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi ka yuu Suru ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ, ri shing danggn gn kpang kɔ sasak.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ dòo ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.
A gisi ruu keɓe tɔkn tɔɔ, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, naa Daa dɔ̃ zang, zang a ka bii mɛɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung anang nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ diki kaɓa daa nɛɛ mani, zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri yaa wu, ri rakɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ wu kpang.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa m kaa tɔ jong ya?”
Siman Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ruu daa kaa bii wiya? Mɔkɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu shing danggn tɔ, a ruu ti zi tɔ nɛɛ mɔkɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Wu nkɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ wee nɔɔ kopi tu ziti ɓee kpang ya? Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ ɓi suru shi kpang.”
Rang ruu keɓe ɓi ka yuu Yahuda, jaa Siman Isikariyoti. Yahuda ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, wukɔ ti naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ.
Ka knti rɛɛ vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ rakɛ ka tipi Galili, a kasɛ nɛɛ wu rakɛ ka tipi Yahudi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka nɔng bìí, kãa wu nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Diki nyaalaa zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ zang waarɛ putali, zang nwang kagn, a naabm tɔ.
A rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Yaa nihn ta, mɔɔ daa tipi Yahudi, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi wu nung, waasɛ bii katɔ wu palɛ vuu kpang. Wee mɔkɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ɓee, tusu yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo piti ri zi mɔɔ nung.”
Rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ bìí nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Làá mɛɛ a gn kpang gbongkarɛ. Ɓɔɔ manɛ, laa piti daa nɔɔ manɛ katɔ.
Zang koo keɓe ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ manɛ kpang. Ri bɛ̃ɛ ɓarɛ nkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ daa nɔng nyaalaa manɛ ta. N daa nɔng nyaalaa keɓe m kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ n daayi a gn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a nwáng ɓi kaa Galili ka nɔngkɔ.
Rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri daa nɔng nyaalaa tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa dũng ri kaa nɛɛ knti. Daayi naa ɓɔɔ zang piti ri zi wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Daa nɛɛ nwĩiri.
Zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kãa wu kana ka nɔng nyaalaa. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ kana nɛɛ, “Ɓu kiya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nwĩiri ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe yɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe nwãarɛ zang katɔ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ rang yee kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tãa ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang kaa vɔrɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ.
Diki nyaalaa daa tɔ dɛ̃ɛti, a Yeesɔ naa daa kaa Gãa Laa, a gàa zang yuu vuu tusunang kaa nɔngkɔ.
Zang Yahudi ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe pálɛ̀ biya zi vuu nɔngkɔ, ti mantɛ vuu gngn kpang viya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ kpang, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n túsù nɛɛ a nɛɛ bii Laa, zang keɓe nɛ̀ɛ́ zi katɔ. N nɛɛ ti kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ, nɛ̀ɛ́ ti zi katɔ kpang ya?
Zang ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓɔɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ, kã̀á ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ bannang. Zang ɓɔɔ kã̀á zang ɓɔɔ shong wu bannang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Nwáarɛ̀ zang ɓi kpang.
Wu Musa kɔ a nɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang bìí kagn teteng manɛ gbete kpang? Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ̀ zɔɔ, ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ ning. Wi kãa gbalang nɛɛ wu nyɔ mɔɔ vɔrɔ wiya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn gbete kɔ nwani, nɔɔ mã naa tɔ ka danggn.
Musa kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yee wujɛ manɛ shaa katɔ, wu ti Musa kpang, ɓi dabang manɛ ɓɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ri gaayu. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yee jaa shaa ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang.
Naa zang yee jaa shaa katɔ ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ lasɛ yeti nɛɛ n ka ruu ɓɔɔ n masɛ shɔnzang ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ka ruu viya?
Nɔ́ɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zì nɛɛ jĩng waati kpang, nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang Urushalima ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang kãayi nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang ya?
A wee rang yee ka dalɛ waati ɓee. Zang ti ãa wu nyaa tɔɔ bii kpang. Zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kasɛ tɔ kati, nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi ya?
Ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe a nɛɛ mani tɔ. Kirisi nɛɛ a tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zí nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani ɓi kpang.”
Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu kana ka Gãa Laa, a mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zi m tɔ, a nɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani tɔ. N a m anang yuu mɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓi niizang kɔ nwani. Nɔɔ zi wu kpang.
N zi wu m tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n à nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Wukɔ ti shong m ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãa gbalang nɛɛ ri yi wu katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ laa ɓiɓɛ yaa doogn ɓɛɛ.
Zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Naa Kirisi arɛ, naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓa ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe ɓu katɔ ya?”

Zang Farisi ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ zang ri rangkɛ yee keɓe nɛɛ nwĩiri ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa nɛɛ ri daa yi wu.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki bee tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔɔli kpang, tɔ̀ɔ ń gbãayu, n daa bii zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ naa kãa m, nɔɔ ĩi m kpang. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa kagn nɔɔ daa manɛ kpang.”
Zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kɔɔrɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Naa daa kaa niya a ruu ĩi wu kpang wiya? Daa kaa rɛɛ gari zang Heleni ɓɔɔ zang ɓuru ri nwalɛ kagn wu tusu zang Heleni vuu ya?
Kɔɔ ka ruu vi nɛɛ ruu naa kãa wu, ruu ĩi wu kpang, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ ruu dàa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang viya?”
Diki ɓɔɔ nyaalaa waa nyaa kagn kɔ, ɓa diki ɓɔɔ tɛɛrɛ tɔ nandon. Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ shii paa, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ sutu nɛɛ mãa wu, wu a ka bii mɛɛ, n a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓooyi.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Rang mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru, ri zɛ̃ɛ ditɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ.’ ”

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ɓi ka yuu Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka laa kaɓa, bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa a ri Suru bii gn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa gn nɛɛ sàa, zang a wu bannang kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàlɛ́ zɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa wu, kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa bìí kɔ niizang.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wukɔ Kirisi bìí.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Kirisi naa a nɛɛ Galili ya?
Labeenang Laa kɔ̀ɔyi tɔɔ, Kirisi naa nwang ɓi nɛɛ teteng zɔ̃ng kpanti Dawuda, nɛɛ zang ti naa yi Kirisi ka Bɛtalami, gari ɓɔɔ Dawuda nwáng kagn ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàlɛ́ zɔɔ ri basɛ zɔɔ kaa ruu Yeesɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ri yi wu katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii gbete kpang.
Ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ri gbãayu, rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ Farisi ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ átɛ̀ wu kpang ka ruu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa, ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ràng yee gngn naa yɔɔ keɓe kpang.”
Rɛɛ Farisi ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nwãarɛ nɔɔ tɔ jong ya?
Nɔɔ zi zang bang bang zang Yahudi tɔ nɛɛ zang Farisi ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbete ya?
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàlɛ́ zɔɔ kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ ɓarɛ kpang kɔ ri shing danggn shɛ̃ɛning. Ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ nwani.”
Nikodimu zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ daa bii Yeesɔ tɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ zang nimbang tɔɔ,
“Nyaa dannang ɓuru kɔ̀ɔ katɔ nɛɛ ruu dɔng zang ruu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ta, bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu tãa ruu gn nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ doo zang Galili kɔ waa? Kãa yeti Labeenang Laa karɛ, mɔɔ ĩi kagn zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa naa nwáng nyaa nɛɛ Galili kpang.”
A zang ɓu yi gbalang, daa gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
A Yeesɔ vang ɓi ka yuu Kɔpɔ Zeetung.
Nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, gbãayu tɔkn ka Gãa Laa, a zang dɔɔli ri kpálɛ̀ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Nwang ka tipi a gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang Labeenang Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisi, ri atɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ĩi ka nɔng dũndũng palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ri daa nɛɛ jaa soro, ri daa shing wu, nɛɛ wu shii ka teteng zang ka tĩng Yeesɔ.
A ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang, jaa soro keɓe, zang ĩi wu bɛ̀ɛ́ palɛ dũndũng.
Ka yeti Labeenang ɓuru, Musa dang ruu nyaa tɔɔ ruu luku zang soro ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nɛɛ tari, wu vɔrɛ. Mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓaa kaa nɛɛ viya?”
Ri lang ɓarɛ saka nɛɛ ruu kɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ ɓee, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri walɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. A Yeesɔ ɓaa yuu ka dii, bee vuu ka tipi nɛɛ saa naa.
Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu doo naa sasak, a wisi bii paa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang gngn kpang, wukɔ wu gaayu, wu lu jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ tari.”
A ɓaa yuu tɔkn dii, bee vuu ka tipi nɛɛ saa naa.
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri daarɛ nandon gbete gbete. Rɛɛ zang bang kɔ ri gaayu daarɛnang shɔɔnang. Zang yaa kaa Yeesɔ ka bm nɛɛ jaa soro bìí ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu shii ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ wisi bii paa, a hɛ̃ɛ jaa soro nɛɛ, “Ri kaa kiya, jaa soro? Zang yaa ka gn gbete ɓɔɔ dɔng mɔɔ ruu kpang ya?”
Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang wu gbete kpang, Maalang.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N ti dɔng mɔɔ ruu kpang kɔ doori. Dita, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang takpang.”
A Yeesɔ rang zang Farisi yee tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nkɔ yakɛ koo, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũ̀ng m ra ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔɔ katɔ kpang. Walɛ ɓi nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.”
A zang Farisi ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓi niizang kpang.”

Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa n kɔɔ ruu doo ka yuu mɛɛ, ruu mɛɛ ɓi niizang kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani tɔ, n ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani manɛ kpang, nɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu manɛ naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang jɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. N jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu m kpang.
Naa n nɛɛ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu doo katɔ, ruu jɛ̃ɛnang mɛɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ niizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu m ka bm kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shong m, ɓi nɛɛ n ning.
Ka yeti Labeenang nyaa dannang manɛ, zang beeyi nɛɛ naa zang ziti ri kɔɔ nyaa gbete, ruu ɓarɛ ɓi niizang kɔ nwani.
N kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ, a Daa ɓɔɔ shong m, ti kɔɔ ruu jong ka yuu mɛɛ.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓu kiya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi m kpang, nɔɔ ti zi Daa mɛɛ doo kpang kɔ. Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ zi m tɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi Daa mɛɛ tɔ kɔ doori.”
Kɔɔ ruu keɓe, bɛ̀ɛ́ tusu zang vuu ka yeti Gãa Laa, naabm nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang á Laa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ yi wu kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓiɓɛ à gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “N daa kaa tɔ, nɔɔ naa kãa m, nɔɔ vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ ning. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn, nɔɔ daa manɛ kpang.”
A rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ nɛɛ, “Wee kɔɔyi nɛɛ ruu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa kpang ɓɛɛ, nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa vɔrɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ manɛ zang koo keɓe, n a m nɛɛ lapa. Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, n rɛ̃rɛ m nɔngkɔ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ ning. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn nɛɛ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ, nkɔ wukɔ kpang, nɔɔ naa vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ.”
Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ ɓu wiya?” Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ka tĩng nɛɛ nkɔ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu manɛ kagn dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ n dɔng nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shong m suu sèé ɓi kpang, n ti kɔɔ zang koo keɓe m vuu ɓɔɔ n tãa ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Ri zi ɓarɛ kpang nɛɛ Yeesɔ rang ri yee ɓi ka yuu Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ wisi m, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ ka yuu laa, nɔ́ɔ naa zi kati nɛɛ nkɔ wukɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kati nɛɛ n palɛ vuu gbete nɛɛ kaka yuu mɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ Daa kpɛ̃ɛrɛ m nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓi nɛɛ n, yaa m ka bm kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ diki, diki ɓɛɛ.”
Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu kɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓee, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu kɔ n tusu nɔɔ ɓee gbãng gbãng, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ.
Nɔɔ naa zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang katɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ niizang keɓe, ti yaa nɔɔ naa katɔ.”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Ruu ɓuru zɔ̃ng Ibirayi, ruu nwàng jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ, ɓuru gngn kpang. Mɔɔ kɔɔ biya nɛɛ zang yaa ruu naa katɔ viya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, ɓi kaa jaafoo vuu shi kpang.
Jaafoo nwáng ɓi ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu kagn dòndòng kpang, ɓi jaa kɔ nwang shɛ̃ɛning.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa nɛɛ yaa nɔɔ naa tɔ, zang yaa nɔɔ tɔ dòndòng.
N zi tɔ nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi. A ka ruu vi nɔɔ kãa gbalang nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ta ruu mɛɛ ka yeti manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka nɔng Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ palɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka nyaa daa manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa ɓuru ɓi Ibirayi.” Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ wujɛ Ibirayi, nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ kãa gbalang nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ, ɓɔɔ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ n tãa ka nyaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ibirayi pálɛ̀ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ɓi kpang.
Nɔɔ pálɛ̀ manɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa manɛ pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ.” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓi wukɔ Daa ɓuru gbete. Zang yi ruu ɓuru jaa nɔng zaakn kpang.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa Laa kɔ nɛɛ daa manɛ niizang, nɔɔ nɛɛ kàsɛ́ ruu mɛɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwangnɛ bii Laa kɔ, n a ka nihn ɓɛɛ. N a m̌ anang yuu mɛɛ kpang, wukɔ shong m.
Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ka ruu viya? Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ dũ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ daa manɛ sheetang, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ manɛ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Daa manɛ nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang vɔrɔ ɓi doo ka tĩng. Ruu ɓiɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, niizang ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Náa suu sèé, palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓi zang sèé, a sèé ti nwàng ɓi nɛɛ bìí ɓiɓɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
“N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ m ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shíng danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
Zang gbete kagn teteng manɛ, ɓɔɔ túsù vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ ya? N nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ́ vuu ɓɔɔ niizang, a nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang ka ruu viya?
Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang Laa, ɓaa shoo ɓi ka Ruu Laa. Nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ shoo ɓaanang ka ruu mɛɛ kpang.”
Zang Yahudi ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔyi nɛɛ mɔɔ zang tipi Samariya, suru shi kpang ti kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ, niizang kɔ nwani kɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang ɓi ka bii mɛɛ kpang. N á m Daa mɛɛ bannang, nɔɔ a m bannang manɛ kpang.
N ti kã̀á wu yuu mɛɛ bannang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kãa m ɓɛɛ ɓi kagn, wukɔ ti naa jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓiri.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu mɛɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ vɔ kpang dòndòng.”

Ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi tɔ kati, suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ. Ibirayi vɔ tɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa piti, mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓáa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, vɔ kpang ya?
Mɔɔ ɓa dabang ɓuru Ibirayi ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓu kaa tɔ ya? Rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, ri ti vɔlɔ jong. Mɔɔ ɓaa ɓu ka wiya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa n á yuu mɛɛ bannang, bannang keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ waati ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ a m bannang ɓi Daa mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ wukɔ Làá manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi wu gngn kpang, n zi wu m tɔ. Naa n kɔɔyi nɛɛ n zi wu kpang, n nwáng kaa zang sèé naa nɔkɔ. N zi wu m tɔ, n ti ta nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Daa manɛ Ibirayi tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu zi diki ɓɔɔ n a kagn ɓɛɛ. Ti zirɛ a tãa tĩnang dɔɔli.”
Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Saa ɓaaɓɛ daa laa ziti tu kopi gn kpang, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ zi Ibirayi tɔ ya?”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, ɓɔɔ zang yi Ibirayi bɛ̀ɛ́ n m kaa gn kɔ nwani.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yakɛ tari nɛɛ ri luku wu kaa tɔ. Waasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, nwang nɛɛ nwĩiri yaa Gãa Laa.
Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang yi wu jĩng ringtang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, ɓu wi palɛ vuu shi kpang, a zang yi yɔɔ keɓe jĩng ringtang wiya? Yɔɔ kɔ̀ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ya, kɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wu yɔɔ kɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang, wu ti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang yi wu jĩng ringtang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi naa vuu palɛnang Laa, ka ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ka bii yɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Rúu palɛ shonang zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ doo nɔng laagɛ̃. Nɔng zĩi a kana ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shonang tɔ̀ɔ́ gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wee n doo ka koo ɓee, nkɔ yakɛ koo.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a tu sisãa ka tipi, a tɔɔlɔ tapɔng nɛɛ mani, a bɔɔlɔ yɔɔ jĩng ringtang ka jĩng.
A kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dita, mɔɔ daa sɔɔ jĩng ka too mii ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siluwa ɓɛɛ.” (Dĩiri nung keɓe ɓi, “Zang shongnɛ”.) A yɔɔ daayi, daa sɔɔ jĩng, a gbãayu, jĩng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kana.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri roo nyaa gãa nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ gn gàarɛ́ vuu ɓɛɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓu bɛ̀ɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ nwalɛ, gàarɛ́ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi wukɔ kpang, zang nwáng wu katɔ.” A yɔɔ bii kɔɔ kaa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi nkɔ.”
Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “A palɛ kaa biya mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔ viya?”

Kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ tapɔng, bɔɔlɔ m ka jĩng. A kɔɔ m nɛɛ n daa ka too mii ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siluwa ɓɛɛ, n daa sɔɔ jĩng. A n daa kati, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n sɔɔ jĩng hn, jĩng mɛɛ zi nɔng káa tɔkn.”
Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ bìí ɓu kiya?” Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N zi kpang.”
Ri daa nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ jĩng ringtang, ka nɔng zang Farisi.
Diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ tapɔng kagn a màsɛ̀ yɔɔ jĩng nɛɛ mani, ɓi ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang.
Zang Farisi ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn naa ɓɔɔ jĩng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, Yɔɔ bɔɔlɔ m tapɔng ka jĩng, n sɔɔ jĩng mɛɛ, a n zi nɔng kati.

Ka teteng zang Farisi bìí, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ka yuu Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ, nɛɛ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, naa rɛɛ wee wu pálɛ̀ ɓee kpang.” A ri basɛ zɔɔ kaa nɔ́ngkɔ̀.
A zang Farisi ri hɛ̃ɛ yɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Wee másɛ́ jĩng ɓaaɓɛ tɔ ɓee, mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vi, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ viya?” Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ bìí ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa.”
Rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri kasɛ gn kpang kɔ sasak. Ri kasɛ gn kpang nɛɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ yɔɔ bìí jĩng ringtang, a zang màsɛ̀ wu jĩng kpang. Ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi wu ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.
A ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Wee jaa manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ yi wu jĩng ringtang kɔ ya? A palɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi yɔɔ, ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi tɔ ɓi jaa ɓuru kɔ, ruu ti zi tɔ ruu yi wu jĩng ringtang.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, zi nɔng kãntang keɓe, naa wi ti màsɛ̀ wu jĩng wiya, ruu zi ɓuru kpang. Bang tɔ, daa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu ta, kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ.”

Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi yɔɔ ri kasɛ nyaa nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang Yahudi bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wu kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, ri zãa wu gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang daanang katɔ.
Ka ruu weɓe kɔ, rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yí yɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Bang tɔ, daa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu ta.”
Ri ɓaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ jĩng ringtang nyaa tɔkn, daa kaa doo ziti, a ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, yɔɔ kaɓa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”

Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ másɛ́, kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa ti zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ya, n zi kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ɓi gbete. N zi m ɓɔɔ ɓeleng, bɛ̀ɛ́ n jĩng ringtang, kãntang keɓe n zi nɔng kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ viya? Puu mɔɔ jĩng biya?”
Yɔɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, doo ɓasi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo kagn kpang. Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa kaa tɔkn ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ jong ya?”
Ri dãlɛ wu, a ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓi mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii yɔɔ kaɓa shɛ̃ɛning. Ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Musa ɓɛɛ.
“Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ Laa rang yee nɛɛ Musa. Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a ɓi nɛɛ mani kpang.”
Yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ kaɓa masɛ jĩng mɛɛ. Nɔɔ kɔɔ biya nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani kpang viya?
Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ Laa ɓaa shoo ɓi jong ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓáa shoo ɓi ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang wu, ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓu dòo ɓɔɔ koo gaayu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tãa gngn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ másɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ zang yi wu jĩng ringtang kpang.
Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ a nɛɛ nɔng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zunung vuu keɓe palɛnang kpang.”
Ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ zang yi mɔkɔ ka yeti vuu shi kpang kirik, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu rukɔ vuu ya?” Ri hing wu ka biling.
Yeesɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang hing yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wu másɛ̀ tɔ. Yeesɔ kãa wu, naa ĩi wu, a hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Jaa Shɔnzang ya?”
Yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa Shɔnzang bìí ɓu wiya? Kɔɔ m ta, n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi wu tɔ, wukɔ ti rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
A yɔɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, n shing danggn tɔ.” A bang Yeesɔ kati.
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N à ka koo keɓe nɛɛ n naa basɛ teteng zang. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jĩng ringtang ri zi nɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nɔng katɔ jĩng ɓarɛ wu zuuyi.”
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Farisi ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri tãa naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Wee jĩng ɓuru zuu ɓu kaa tɔ jong ya?”

Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa jĩng manɛ nɛɛ zuu katɔ, zang nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nɔng manɛ katɔ, vuu shi kpang manɛ nwáng tɔ ka bii manɛ ka nɔngkɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tù yeti vaa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nɛɛ nyaa vàa kpang, nɛɛ sɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔgn ɓi shɔngɓɔ, a ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ sɔɔ nyaa vàa, ɓi wukɔ jagãng mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ niizang.
Zang ɓɔɔ gã nyaa vàa, puu wu katɔ. Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓiɓɛ ri tãa yee ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Ɓaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ nung ɓarɛ gbete gbete, wu nwangsɛ ri ka biling.
Nɛɛ nwangsɛ ri tɔ, wu sɔɔ tĩng a mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi yee ɓiɓɛ nung tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ri dũ̀ng zang zanti kpang. Ri yuu zang bìí katɔ kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi yee ɓiɓɛ nung kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ rang rɛɛ zang Farisi yee keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, a ri zi dĩiri nyaa vuu jeenang bìí kaa takpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, nkɔ nyaa vàa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri á ka tĩng mɛɛ nandon, ri ɓarɛ shɔngɓɔ, a ri ti zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ. Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ri ti ɓáa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ kpang.
Nkɔ nyaa vàa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tù nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, zang ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Ti hãa nyaa, wu nwangnɛ, wu ti walɛ nɔng shaanang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Shɔngɓɔ ri a ɓarɛ nɔng vuu ɓɔɔnang, ri ti nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ, a ri lasɛ vuu. N a m nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ suru bii. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang ningkãari, nɔɔ ti walɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
“Nkɔ jagãng ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Jagãng ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ mãlɛ́ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓiɓɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ wu ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang shu wu katɔ, wu shaa zang mɛ̀ɛrɛ́. Naa zi zaa wisi arɛ, yuu katɔ wu yaa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́. Zaa wisi yiki mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, wu ti tantɛ ɓɔɔ yaa ɓɛɛ.
Zang keɓe yuu ka ruu ɓɔɔgn mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ kɔng wu kpang, a mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ wu ti ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
“Nkɔ jagãng ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Daa zi m nung tɔ, n zi Daa nung tɔ jong. N zi mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nung doo nɔngkɔ, ri ti zi m nung tɔ jong. N ti mãlɛ́ yuu mɛɛ, zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ.
Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ti kagn, ɓɔɔ ri ka vaa keɓe kpang ɓɛɛ. N atɛ ri ditɔ jong. Ri naa tã̀á yee mɛɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa vàa gbete, jagãng ɓarɛ ti gbete.
“Daa kasɛ ruu mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, n mãlɛ́ yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa wisi m paa tɔkn.
Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ kagn gbete kpang. Nkɔ kàsɛ́ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ, nkɔ ti kàsɛ́ n nwang ningkãari tɔkn. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
Zang Yahudi ri basɛ zɔɔ tɔkn ka ruu, ruu kɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓee.
Zang dɔɔli ka teteng ɓarɛ ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Ɓi shoko. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ka ruu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ràng yee naa weɓe kpang. Suru shi kpang palɛ biya wu masɛ zang jĩng ringtang viya?”
Bɛ̀ɛ́ kaa laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ zang a Gãa Laa tɔkn ɓɛɛ, ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ. Ka làa keɓe pũngku kpaa kana,
a Yeesɔ rakɛ ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nwalɛ gn, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ka nung kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ yaa ruu ɓu kaa naa weɓe kɔ sasak, ruu zi mɔɔ nung kpang ya? Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, kɔɔ ruu faarik, mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ ruu kpang.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ n palɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m ɓee, wukɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ.
Nɔɔ kasɛ danggn shinang ka bìí mɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ mɛɛ ri tãa yee mɛɛ ɓarɛ katɔ. N zi ri nung tɔ, a ri dũng m katɔ.
N a ri suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri vɔ ɓarɛ takpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta ri ka naa mɛɛ nɛɛ kaka kpang.
Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ a m ri, ɓa zang katɔ nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ta ri nɛɛ naa Daa mɛɛ, nɛɛ kaka kagn gbete kpang.
Ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ Daa ruu gbete.”
A zang Yahudi ri daa yakɛ tari tɔkn, nɛɛ ri luku wu nɛɛ mani.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N pálɛ́ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ Daa a m naa nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ luku m, ɓu ka ruu wi ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete wiya?”

Zang Yahudi ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu luku mɔɔ wu ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu luku mɔɔ, ka ruu ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shɔnzang waati, mɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang manɛ nɛɛ Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa Laa.’
Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓi niizang dòndòng. Laa nɛɛ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ri nɛɛ yee ɓiɓɛ tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ ri nwang naa Laa,
a zang ɓɔɔ Daa zɔ̃ngnɛ, a shong wu ka koo ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ kɔɔ ka ruu vi nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔyi nɛɛ n Jaa Laa viya?
Nɔ́ɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang, n nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

N nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ kɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn doo ka bii mɛɛ kpang, nɔ́ɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kaa gn dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ Daa kagn bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ n ti kagn bii Daa.”
Ri tɔɔ ri yi wu kaa tɔ tɔkn, a nwangnɛ nwĩiri daayi.
A Yeesɔ ta rang Urudung tɔkn, daa ka nɔng ɓeleng ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pàlɛ́ zang batizima kagn ɓɛɛ, daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ.
Zang dɔɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yɔhana pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓi kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe nandon ɓi niizang kɔ nwani.”
Zang dɔɔli ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn roo gãa ka Bɛtani, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Liyazaru. Vuu pálɛ́ wu katɔ. Bɛtani ɓi gari rɛɛ Marayamu nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Mata ɓɛɛ.
Marayamu keɓe, kɔ tũuru Yeesɔ nung ɓɔɔ pũ̀ngkù tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka doo, a àlɛ̀ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. Liyazaru ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ keɓe, jaa niiɓɛ kɔ.
Rɛɛ ɓeenaa soro ziti keɓe, ri shòng Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, vuu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa ruu keɓe, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kɔnang keɓe nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe pálɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang bannang Laa, wu ti tusu zang bannang Jaa Laa kaa jong.”
Yeesɔ kasɛ ruu Mata katɔ nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro, a ɓɔɔ Liyazaru.
Ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa nɛɛ vuu palɛ Liyazaru katɔ, nwang doo nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu kagn ɓɛɛ, diki ziti tɔkn.
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ruu daa nɔɔ tipi Yahudi tɔkn.”
A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang wee dòó naa ɓee, zang Yahudi nɛɛ ri luku mɔɔ nɛɛ tari mɔɔ vɔrɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ gbãayu ka nɔngkɔ tɔkn ya?”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ nwáng tɔ, palɛ saka kopi tu ziti tɔɔ wu hãa nyaa kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ laagɛ̃, kpaa doo ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ koo, yakɛ nɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa rakɛ nɛɛ nɔng zĩi, kpaa doo katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ wu nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, a gisi ɓɔɔ kagn tɔɔ, “Hingro yi wusang ɓuru Liyazaru tɔ. N daa ditɔ, n daa hingsi wu.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, hingro nɛɛ yi wu katɔ, hingsi jĩng ditɔ.”
A ɓeekpang Yeesɔ gãsɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ Liyazaru vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ naa Liyazaru roo ɓi hingro siri.
A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kaa faarik, tɔɔ, “Liyazaru vɔ tɔ.
Wee bɛ̀ɛ́ n nɛɛ wu kpang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn kati. Ruu dita bii ɓiɓɛ.”
A Tooma, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ jaa bãnang ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu mantɛ vuu nɛɛ ri ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ruu dita, ruu daa vɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ wu.”
Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, bɛ̀ɛ́ Liyazaru roo sàá tɔ, daa diki dɛ̃ɛti.
Gari Bɛtani nɛɛ Urushalima daa mɛli ziti kpang,
zang tipi Yahudi dɔɔli ri a tɔ, nɛɛ ri jee Marayamu nɛɛ Mata nyavɔ jaa nàá ɓarɛ.
Mata tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ a kana, a nwangnɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kpisi wu yuu. Marayamu nwang ɓi kaa yeti gãa.
Mata kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kpanti, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ ka nihn, jaa nàá mɛɛ nɛɛ vɔ kpang.
N ti zi tɔ, naa mɔɔ gàa dòo viya ka naa Laa kãntang, a mɔɔ katɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa nàá ɓaaɓɛ yupaa ditɔ.”
Mata kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ, naa yupaa ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, nkɔ ti a zang suru bii. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, náa vɔ doori, nwáng ningkãari ditɔ tɔkn.
Zang ɓɔɔ doo ningkãari, nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, vɔ kpang dòndòng, mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ kagn nɔngkɔ ya?”
Mata kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, Kpanti, N shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, mɔkɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ naa a ka koo ɓɛɛ.”
Mata kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, a gbãayu daa yeti gãa, daa ɓaa jaa niiɓɛ Marayamu nyaa dang gbete, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang a tɔ, hɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓaaɓɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ Marayamu tãa naa weɓe, yupaa pati nwang ka biling, daa ka bii Yeesɔ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ yeti gari gn kpang. Bɛ̀ɛ́ dòo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Mata kpisi wu yuu ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri nɛɛ Marayamu ka yeti gãa, ri mã wu danggn, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ wu seepaa pati nwáng ka biling, ri dũng wu ka knti. Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa dàa kaa ɓi nyavɔ ka yuu saa.
Marayamu naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn tɔ. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi wu hn, daa tang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ ka nihn, jaa nàá mɛɛ nɛɛ vɔ kpang.”
Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kaayi, a zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu ri kaa jong ɓɛɛ. Vuu bìí kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli, a gn ti kɔng wu dɔɔli.
A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ gbãa wu ka niya?” Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Arɛ mɔ́ɔ dàa zirɛ, Kpanti.”
Yeesɔ kaayi nɛɛ miiri ka jĩng.
Zang Yahudi ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ másɛ̀ jĩng zang ɓɔɔ jĩng ringtang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu zãa Liyazaru vɔnang kpang ya?”
Gn kɔng Yeesɔ tɔkn, a daa ka yuu sàa. Sàa bii ɓi yeng puru ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa nɛɛ tari ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dɔ̃ tari, nɔɔ yaa nɔng.” A Mata jaa nàá Liyazaru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee diki ɓiɓɛ daa tɔ dɛ̃ɛti ka saa ɓee, pũng tɔ, pũngku kaa tɔ.”
Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, naa mɔɔ shing danggn mɔɔ zi bannang Laa katɔ kpang ya?”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri dɔ̃ tari ri yaa nɔng. A Yeesɔ tuu jĩng ka lapa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, n zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tãa m tɔ ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ, mɔɔ tãarɛ m katɔ diki diki. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ka ruu zang kɔ ri shiiri ka nihn ɓee, tɔ̀ɔ, ri shing danggn kati nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m.”
Kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a ɓaa nyaa kaa nabm nɛɛ, “Liyazaru, nwáng ta, mɔɔ a ka biling.”
Liyazaru nwangnɛ, doo naa ɓɔɔ zang dang wu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Zang ti mã wu jĩng katɔ nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ. Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãlɛ wu ta, nɔɔ yaa wu, wu daayi.”
A zang Yahudi dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri arɛ nɛɛ ri jee Marayamu nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, a ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓarɛ ka bii zang Farisi ri daa kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.

A rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisi, ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang doo ruu kɔ, ɓɔɔ nimbang, a ri hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu pálɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓu kaa viya? Yɔɔ keɓe pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ka naa dɔɔli.
Naa ruu yaa yɔɔ keɓe, zang ri shing danggn katɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nandon. Zang tipi Rooma ri a katɔ ri jili Gãa Laa ɓuru, ri ti see zang tipi ɓuru nandon.”
Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kayifa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ka sáa kaɓa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu manɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gbete vɔ ka nung zang dɔɔli wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang tipi ɓuru nɛɛ vɔ nandon ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”

Kayifa zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ vuu keɓe kpang. Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shing wu nɛɛ wu kɔɔyi. Kayifa kɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ka sáa kaɓa, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ naa vɔ ka ruu zang Yahudi.
Wu ti ka ruu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Vɔrɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu kpalɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ zang tantɛ ri ka koolaa kaa jong nɔng gbete.
Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri gaayu gbalang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kãanang nɛɛ diki keɓe kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ rakɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ waati ka dalɛ ka tipi Yahudi kpang. Yupaa daa ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Ifuremu ɓɔɔ naabm nɛɛ waala ɓɛɛ. Daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ a naabm kana. Zang yùkú paa kana nɛɛ jaa gari, zang daarɛ ka gari Urushalima nɛɛ zang daa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang palɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ Laa wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri pálɛ̀ vuu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, diki nyaalaa wu a kati.
Ri kãa nɔng Yeesɔ ka ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ, ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zìrɛ naa yɔɔ keɓe a nɔng nyaalaa keɓe ɓu katɔ ya?”
Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisi, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn tɔ, wu naa kɔɔ ri, ri daa yi wu.
Diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, yaa kaa mangbete, a Yeesɔ daa ka Bɛtani. Daa ka gãa Liyazaru, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wu wisi paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
Zang nwãa wu vuu shaanang laarang. Mata kɔ basɛ ri vuu shaanang. Liyazaru ti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.

A Marayamu tuu nung ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ ti a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ dĩiri laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ naadi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛɛ. Túu nung, a tungku ka doo Yeesɔ, ti alɛ doo bìí nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. Sɛ̃ɛ nung ta yeti gãa kaa gbayi gbayi.
Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahuda Isikariyoti, ɓɔɔ wukɔ naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, lasɛ yeti ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Marayamu palɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang nɛɛ mãlɛ́ nung keɓe zang basɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kaa naa ɓarɛ kpang saka bìí kpang ka ruu viya? Nung keɓe naa zang hoo dinari laa maani dakn taati katɔ.”
Kɔɔ ruu keɓe, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ gn zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, kɔng wu katɔ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu shɔngɓɔ ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ yiti duku ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ saka ɓarɛ kagn, lee ɓɔɔ ti ɓɔɔrɔ saka kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yaa jaa soro ka nɔngkɔ. Shing nung keɓe ka ruu diki ɓɔɔ zang naa gbãa m ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ri ɓarɛ kagn teteng manɛ diki diki. N naa nwáng m tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang.”
Zang Yahudi dɔɔli ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka Bɛtani a ri daayi. Ri dàa ka ruu Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɛɛ ri daa zi ɓɔɔ kaa Liyazaru ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri mangnɛ, nɛɛ ri nyɔ Liyazaru vɔrɔ jong.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudi dɔɔli, ri yaa ri kana, ri shing danggn kaa bii Yeesɔ ka ruu Liyazaru kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri a nɔng nyaalaa shaanang, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ a kana Urushalima.

Ri sãkɛ nasãng laa nung manja, a ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa kpisi wu yuu. Ri mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ nyaa kana lapa nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔ̀ɔ Laa ta. Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ tĩnang tãanang ta. Laa wu a kpanti zang Isirela tĩnang tãanang.”
Yeesɔ walɛ jaa seesaa váng kagn, naa ɓɔɔ zang bée ka yeti labeenang Laa tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang bee tɔɔ, “Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, zang gari Siyona, kpanti manɛ a kana, váng ka dakn seesaa.”

Bɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee keɓe gn kpang. Ri naa zi kaa nɛɛ knti ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa tɔ, Laa ti a wu bannang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ zang bee vuu keɓe katɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a zang ti pàlɛ̀ wu vuu bìí tɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ɓaa Liyazaru nyaa nɛɛ saa, a wisi wu paa nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu vɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang vuu bìí.
Zang dɔɔli ri daa kpisi wu yuu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn keɓe ɓɛɛ.
A zang Farisi ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Rùu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔgn kpang tingkiring. Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang koo nandon ri daa tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
Zang Heleni kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri daa Laa bannang ka Urushalima, ka ɓɔɔ zang daa nyaalaa shaanang ɓɛɛ.
Ri daa ka bii Filibu, Filibu ɓi yɔɔ gari Bɛsɛda ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, ruu kasɛ Yeesɔ zinang.”
Filibu daa kɔɔ Anduru, a ri daa kaa nyaa zɔɔ, ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ.
Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ zang a Jaa Shɔnzang bannang kagn a tɔ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani, naa zang ɓaa jĩng zee ka tipi kpang, nwang ɓi ka nɔngkɔ, jĩng zee gbete. Zang nɛɛ ɓaa tɔ, wu tarɛ, wu shing jĩng kaa gaagaa.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ suru bìí ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli, shàarɛ́ ɓi katɔ kɔ̀ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu suru bii ɓiɓɛ ka koo keɓe kpang, shing ɓi katɔ ka ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shòng m shonang, wu dũng, m ka knti. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n kagn zang shonang mɛɛ nwáng doo ka nɔngkɔ. Daa mɛɛ ti naa a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ m shonang bannang katɔ.”
A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Jĩng dannang keɓe kpãa m tɔ yeti dɔɔli. N kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? N kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ, ‘Daa mɛɛ mɔ́ɔ yaa diki keɓe wu a ka yuu mɛɛ kpang ya?’ Kpang, n a ka ruu jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ diki keɓe kɔ.
Daa mɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a mɔɔ bannang ɓɛɛ ta.” A zang tãa yee kaa nɛɛ lapa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N tusu zang bannang mɛɛ tɔ, n ti paasɛ ditɔ tɔkn.”
