Musa nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ Masara. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔɔli ka Masara, ɓɔɔ ka waapo Maliya, a ɓɔɔ ti ka jĩngti, saa laa ziti.
“Musa kɔ, kɔɔ zang Isirela tɔɔ, ‘Laa naa zɔ̃̌ng nɔɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng m ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shonang keɓe, naa a ɓi doo nɛɛ teteng zang manɛ kɔ.’

Musa keɓe kɔ nwang nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka jĩngti, a ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ rang wu yee ka kɔpɔ Sinayi ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru. Wukɔ ti tà ruu rúu Laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, a á ruu.
“A rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ri bɛ̃ɛ wu, ka yeti ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ gbãayu ɓarɛ ka Masara.
A ri kɔɔ Haruna tɔɔ, ‘Mãa ruu rɛɛ vaka ta, ɓɔɔ sɔ̀ɔ́ ruu tĩng ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ Musa ɓɔɔ nwángsɛ̀ ruu nɛɛ Masara ɓuru takpang.’
Ka diki keɓe kɔ, ri mãa vaka naa napo. Ri dɔ̀ɔ wu vuu, a ri nwãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri tãa tĩnang, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
A Laa raa ri yuu knti. A yaa ri nɛɛ ri bang rɛɛ sang ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri bee ka yeti labeenang ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ,
“ ‘Zang Isirela, nɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ
nkɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yele ka
jĩngti saa laa ziti ɓɛɛ ya?
Nɔɔ tuu manɛ putali vaka manɛ
ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Moleki ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ
rakɛ nɛɛ mani, a ɓɔɔ sang vaka
manɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Ramfa ɓɛɛ.
Ri ɓarɛ vaka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ nɛɛ
nɔɔ bang ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n yáa nɔɔ, zang
ri sèe nɔɔ, ri daa ɓa tipi Babila nɛɛ mani.’
“Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri rakɛ nɛɛ putali ka jĩngti. Putali ɓɔɔ tusu ri nɛɛ Laa kagn ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang palɛ putali keɓe naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ Musa, a ti tusu wu ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ knti, rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ta putali keɓe, ka naa rɛɛ daa ɓarɛ, ri tuu kaa naa, ka ɓɔɔ Jashuwa sɔɔ ri tĩng ɓɛɛ. Ri naa ta tipi keɓe, ka naa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka nɔng, a Laa hingki zang, yaa rɛɛ dabang ɓuru nɔng ɓɛɛ. Putali keɓe, nwang ka nɔngkɔ sasak a nɔng ka yuu Dawuda.
Laa kasɛ ruu Dawuda dɔɔli, a Dawuda gaa Laa nɛɛ Laa wu yaa wu, wu mãa Làá dabang ɓuru Yakubu, gãa nwannang.
Ɓi kaa Sulemanu naa mãa Gãa bìí kati.
“Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti, nwàng ki gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa ɓi kpang naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
“Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Lapa nwang ɓi naa laa nwannang mɛɛ,
a tipi ɓi kaa nɔng doo tɛ̃ɛnang mɛɛ.
Nɔɔ mãa m zɔ̃ng gãa kiya?
Nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ n ɔ̃sɔ kagn kiya?
Wu nkɔ palɛ vuu piti keɓe nɛɛ naa
vuu palɛnang mɛɛ kpang ya?’
“Nɔɔ taarɛ yuu dɔɔli. Yeti manɛ nɛɛ shoo manɛ nɔɔ dòo katɔ. Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ pálɛ̀ dòó vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dáa manɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa kagn gbete ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dáa manɛ dang wu jĩng kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu anang zang tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ka tĩng, rɛɛ daa manɛ ti nyɔ̀kɔ̀ ri vɔrɔ. Wee nɔɔ ti nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ.
Nɔkɔ tà nyaa dannang Laa, ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa a ruu ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ dũ̀ng kaa takpang.”
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Istifanu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, gnvɔ shaa ri, ri shaa tãri.
Suru Laa a ka bii Istifanu, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tuu jĩng ka lapa, a zi bannang Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ shii ka kagn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, n zirɛ lapa puuyi, a Jaa Shɔnzang shii ka nakn Laa.”
Ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a ri huuru shoo ɓarɛ nɛɛ saa naa. A ri ká ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, a ri luku wu nɛɛ tari. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe jĩng ka bii ri tɛ̃̀ɛ, jasang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ka nɔng, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Shaawulu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ wu gãng jĩng kagn.
Ri luku Istifanu kana, a gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ, ta suru mɛɛ ta.”
A tang nɛɛ gutu, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔɔ yiti vuu shi kpang kɔ ri palɛ ɓee ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ kpang.” Kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ a vɔ kati.
Shaawulu kasɛ nyaa kagn ka ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Istifanu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka diki kaɓa zang gaayu ɓɔɔ zang dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jĩng ka Urushalima. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, zang tantɛ ri ka tipi Yahudi nɛɛ tipi Samariya nandon. Ɓi rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ kɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ shɛ̃ɛning.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri gbãa Istifanu, ri kaa wu nyavɔ gbãng gbãng.
Shaawulu kãa ɓi gbalang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Dàarɛ́ ka gãa gãa, yiki zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro, wu daa looro ri ka sãa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɔɔ ri tantɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri rangkɛ Ruu Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Filibu daa ka gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Samariya, daa kɔɔ zang ruu Kirisi ka nɔngkɔ.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, a ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Suru shi kpang, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa ka lapa ka ɓɔɔ ri nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii zang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ vɔ katɔ, zang ti masɛ ri jong.
Zang tãa tĩnang ka gari kaɓa dɔɔli.
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari kaɓa, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman. Bɛ̀ɛ́ hɛ̃ɛ paa. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔɔli, a kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ wu ɓi zang bang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari nandon, zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, ‘Naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ bang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki bee tɔ, ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ ri mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ paa hɛ̃ɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang Laa ɓɔɔ Filibu kɔɔ ri, a ɓɔɔ kaa nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang palɛ ri batizima, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro nandon.

Siman nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing danggn jong ka knti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu batizima tɔ, ràkɛ́ kaa nɛɛ Filibu diki diki. Siman mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu zìlí Filibu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang shonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang Samariya ri ta Ruu Laa tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri dɔ̃ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ka bii ɓarɛ.
Ri daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, a ri gaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ kati.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ Suru Laa a gn ka bii zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang palɛ ri batizima ɓarɛ doo nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri shĩili naa kaa yuu ɓarɛ, a Suru Laa a kaa bii ɓarɛ.
Siman zirɛ Laa a zang Suru ɓiɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ ri shĩili naa ka yuu zang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, á Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana saka,
a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a m naa vuu palɛnang keɓe jong, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ shing naa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ Suru Laa wu a jong ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ shaarɛ nɛɛ saka ɓaaɓɛ ning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ hoo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn ka shonang keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ ta, ka ruu vuu shi kpang keɓe, mɔɔ gaa Laa wu yaa mɔɔ gbalang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang naa weɓe ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zirɛ sũnyaa kagn yeti ɓaaɓɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, vuu shi kpang ti ɓa mɔɔ yuu tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Siman kɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gaa m Laa jong, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔyi wu palɛ m kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ gbete kpang.”
Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, a ri ti rang zang Ruu Laa tɔ, ri gbãayu ri daa Urushalima kati. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa ka rɛɛ gari Samariya ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ.
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ Filibu tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka dii mɔɔ sɔɔ gbalang gbaala ɓɔɔ yupaa nɛɛ Urushalima daa ka Gaza ɓɛɛ.”

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Filibu kpalɛ bii a daayi. Daa kana, a kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ tipi Habasha ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, gbãayu dàá kaa tipi ɓiɓɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe zang bang kɔ nwani. Wukɔ yiti saka Kandakatu, jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka tipi Habasha ɓɛɛ. Dàa Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa bang Laa.
A gbãayu kana, vang ka yuu kɛkɛ ɓɔɔ gbantang gɔ̃ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yeti kɛkɛ, gã labeenang ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ.
A Suru Laa kɔɔ Filibu tɔɔ, “Daa ka nɔng kɛkɛ kaɓa naabm, mɔɔ ra ka kagn ɓiɓɛ.”
A Filibu yurɛ daa ka bii kɛkɛ daa tãayi yɔɔ gã labeenang Ishaya zang nyaa shonang Laa. A Filibu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ gã ɓɛɛ ɓu tɔ ya?”
Yɔɔ zang bang keɓe kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛ́ɛ kɔɔ m dĩiri ɓiɓɛ kpang, n zi biya?” A kɔɔ Filibu nɛɛ wu vang ta, wu naa nwang nɛɛ wu ka yeti kɛkɛ,
Nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa gãrɛ keɓe,
Nwáng naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ zang daa nɛɛ
mani ka nɔng yeenang ɓɛɛ,
a puu nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang. Nwang naa jamɛ̀ɛrɛ́
ɓɔɔ zang kpang shãngti ɓiɓɛ, kaa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang pálɛ́ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ a zang
ɓɔɔ ti jɛ̃̀ɛ́ wu ruu tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang ruu
ka yuu zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ diki ɓiɓɛ
ka koo keɓe waa nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ kaɓa, hɛ̃ɛ Filibu tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m jong, zang nyaa shonang Laa rang ruu ka yuu wiya? Ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ya, kɔ ka yuu zang ɓɔɔgn?”
A Filibu puu nyaa, gaayu nɛɛ ruu zang nyaa shonang Laa keɓe ɓɔɔ yɔɔ gã ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ yɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kati ka yuu Yeesɔ.
Ri daa kana ka gbalang, a ri naa a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ keɓe kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mii keɓe, palɛ m batizima ta.”
[Filibu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, n palɛ mɔɔ batizima katɔ.”
Yɔɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N shing danggn tɔ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi wukɔ Jaa Laa.”]
A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ raa nyaa gbantang nɛɛ kɛkɛ wu shiiyi. Filibu nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, ri shooro kaa nɛɛ yeti kɛkɛ, ri daa ka yeti mii, a Filibu palɛ wu batizima kati.
Ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti mii, a Suru Laa tuu Filibu daa nɛɛ wu. Yɔɔ zang bang keɓe, zi Filibu takpang, a yi gbalang daanang ɓiɓɛ, tã̀a tĩnang dɔɔli.
Filibu daa nwang nyaa ka gari Azotu. A riki rɛɛ gari nandon, kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, a nɛɛ mani ka Kayisariya.
Bɛɛ gnvɔ yeti Shaawulu kà gň kpang, ka ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔkɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Dàa ka bii kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ,

a gaa wu nɛɛ wu bee wu labeenang ɓɔɔ wu daa a zang ka rɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓɔɔ ka gari Damasiku ɓɛɛ. Wu nɛɛ daa ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Gbalang keɓe kagn nɔng, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro, wu yiki ri, wu mãlɛ naa ɓarɛ, wu a nɛɛ ri ka gari Urushalima.
Daa kana gbalang, a naabm tɔ nɛɛ Damasiku, a nɔng yakɛ nɛɛ lapa, kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng.
Watɛ ka tipi, a tãa yee kɔ̀ɔ́ wu nɛɛ, “Shaawulu, Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jĩng nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya?”
A Shaawulu hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ ɓu wiya, Kpanti?”
A yee keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang wu jĩng ɓɛɛ.”
“Yupaa ta mɔɔ daa ka yeti gari, zang daa kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu, ri shiiyi, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ takpang. Ri tãa yee tɔ, a ri zi zang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ gbete kpang.
Shaawulu naa yupaa nɛɛ tipi, ɓɔɔ puu jĩng, a zi nɔng takpang. Zang yi wu kaa naa, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka Damasiku.
Diki ɓiɓɛ taati zi nɔng kpang. Shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ti ɓoo mii kpang.
Ka gari Damasiku, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kagn, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya. Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu bɛ̀ɛ́ rɔ̃kɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Hananiya.”
A kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Wee n ɓee, Kpanti.”

A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka gãa Yahuda ɓɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, ‘Gbalang ɓɔɔ shiiri katɔ’ ɓɛɛ, mɔ́ɔ daa hɛ̃ɛ nɔng yɔɔ gari Taasu, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Shaawulu ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, gaa Laa kana.
Ɓɔɔ wu gaa Laa doo naa, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya kaɓa ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang. Hananiya arɛ naa shing wu naa ka yuu, a jĩng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn.”
A Hananiya kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang dɔɔli ri kɔɔ m ruu tɔ ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
Wee à ka Damasiku ɓee, ɓi rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a wu naa nɛɛ wu naa yiki zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.”
A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita ka ruu ɓɔɔ n zɔ̃́ng wu tɔ, nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ m shonang ɓɛɛ. Wu daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang Isirela, ruu mɛɛ kati ɓɛɛ.
Ń ti tusu wu naa ɓɔɔ wu naa dang jĩng dɔɔli, ka ruu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”

A Hananiya daayi, daa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa, shing naa ka yuu Shaawulu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Manzung Shaawulu, Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nwáng nyaa ka mɔɔ ka gbalang, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ka nihn ɓɛɛ, wukɔ shong m. Shong m nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Suru Laa wu a kaa bii ɓaaɓɛ”.
Nyaa kɔɔ doo naa ɓee, vuu naa koko bii jaazĩi nwang nɛɛ jĩng Shaawulu, a zi nɔng kaa tɔkn. A yupaa, zang palɛ wu batizima kati.
A naa shaa vuu shaanang, a kaka ɓiɓɛ sɔɔ kati. Shaawulu nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, ka Damasiku diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
A yupaa tantɛnang daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu rang zang ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ kati. Kɔɔ zang nɛɛ “Yeesɔ ɓi Jaa Laa.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ nyɔ̀kɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa nung Yeesɔ vɔrɔ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Ti a ka nihn ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu yiki ri, wu daa nɛɛ ri ka Urushalima, wu daa a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang ya?”

Shaawulu ti rang zang yee Laa kaa gbãng gbãng. Ruu ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, wu ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ làá nyaa kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka Damasiku ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu takpang.
Diki naa bee tɔ, a rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ naa ri nyɔ Shaawulu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang naa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri mangnɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri gã nyaa gãa gari nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi piti nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Shaawulu ri mã soo ka sàáng ri shing wu kagn nɛɛ zĩi, ri yaa wu naa nɛɛ hangka ɓɔɔ zang yaa ka bii gbang tapɔng, ɓɔɔ zang mã̀ayi zang kiiri gari nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Shaawulu daa Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nandon, ri tɔɔ, wu ɓi gn zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa niizang kpang.

A Baranaba atɛ wu ka bii rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ. Naa kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ Shaawulu zi Kpanti Yeesɔ ka gbalang, a Kpanti rang wu yee ɓɛɛ. A ti kɔɔ ri náa ɓɔɔ rang zang ruu ka yuu nung Yeesɔ ka Damasiku, kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Shaawulu nwang kaa nɛɛ ri, rakɛ ka Urushalima nandon. Kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ruu ka yuu nung Kpanti Yeesɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
Ti rang yee, a ri làa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ráng ɓarɛ nyaa Heleni ɓɛɛ. A zang Yahudi keɓe, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ naa ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ ri tãa nyaa, ri tuu Shaawulu ri daa nɛɛ wu ka gari Kayisariya. Ri daa shing wu nɛɛ wu dita ka gari Taasu.

Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi, nɛɛ tipi Galili, nɛɛ tipi Samariya nandon, ri tãa tĩnang nwannang ɓarɛ kati. Suru Laa yi ri naa kagn, a mã ri danggn. Ri shang kaa jong ka ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ ri a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ.
Bituru rakɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, a diki ɓɔɔgn daayi nɛɛ wu daa leng rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Liida ɓɛɛ.
Daa ĩi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn nɔng, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Aniya ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zunung ɓɔɔ wu yupaa nɛɛ latãng ɓiɓɛ kpang saa daa mantaati.
Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Aniya Yeesɔ Kirisi masɛ mɔɔ tɔ. Yupaa mɔɔ palɛ latãng ɓaaɓɛ waasɛ̃.” A Aniya tantɛ paa yunang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri roo gãa ka Liida nɛɛ tipi Sharong ri zi wu katɔ nandon. Ri ti raa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kaa nandon.

Jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn dũng Laa, ka gari Joopa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Tabita (Tabita nɛɛ nyaa Heleni ɓi Dorika, nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa mákà ɓɛɛ). Jaa soro keɓe pálɛ̀ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ diki diki, ti yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, naa ka bii.
Ka laa kaɓa, vuu palɛ wu, a vɔrɛ. Zang sɔ̀ɔ vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a zang daa shing wu ka yeti gãa lapa

Joopa nɛɛ Liida ri bee kpang. Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Joopa ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Bituru ka Liida, ri shong zang varɛ ziti ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, a ka bii ɓuru tantɛnang.”

A Bituru kpalɛ bii a daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ɓɛɛ. Daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ, a zang vang nɛɛ wu ka gãa lapa. Rɛɛ suvɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ nandon ri kaa nyavɔ. Ri ti tusu wu rɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Dorika haarɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
Bituru nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ yeti gãa nandon, a tang ka tipi, gaa Laa, a raa jĩng ka vɔrɔ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Tabita, yupaa ta.” A Tabita puu jĩng, ɓɔɔ zi Bituru, yupaa nwang doopaa.
Bituru yì wu naa ka bii, a shii kaa nɛɛ doo. Bituru, ɓaa nyaa kaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ suvɔ a á ri Tabita kaa ningkãari.
Ruu keɓe baa gari Joopa nandon, a zang dɔɔli ri shing danggn kaa bii Laa.
Bituru nwáng ka Joopa ka gãa Siman, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ, diki ɓiɓɛ bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
Zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ kagn Kayisariya, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Koneliyu. Wukɔ zang bang vàá sɔɔja Rooma ɓɔɔ laa maani dakn mangbete, ɓɔɔ ɓi rɛɛ zang Italiya kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kagn ɓɛɛ.
Koneliyu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Bang Laa nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ piti. Yi rɛɛ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa ka bii, ti gaa Laa diki diki.
Diki ɓɔɔ kagn bɛ̀ɛ́ laa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, nung saka taati, Koneliyu rɔ̃kɔ. Ka rɔ̃kɔnang keɓe, zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbàrɛ gbàrɛ arɛ a ɓaa wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Koneliyu.”
Koneliyu ã̀tɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ jĩng ka bii. Bii kaa wu vɔrɔ, a kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu viya Kpanti.”
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa tãa gaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa wu tɔ. Ti zi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn ɓaaɓɛ ning Laa kpang.
Shong rɛɛ zang varɛ ka Joopa ri daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
Nwàng zanti ka gãa Siman yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ. Roo gãa ka nyaa waapo naabm.”

Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu daa tɔ, Koneliyu ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang varɛ ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ yɔɔ sɔɔja gbete ka teteng rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gã wu ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe dũng doo Laa kɔ.
Kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ nandon, a shong ri kaa Joopa.
Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe, ri yi gbalang tɔ, ri a tɔ naabm nɛɛ Joopa. Bituru vang ɓi kaa gãa lapa bɛ̀ɛ́ laa kaa dalɛ yuu nɛɛ wu gaa Laa.
Nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu tɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shaa ɓɛɛ. Zang nwàá wu vuu shaanang doo kana, a rɔ̃kɔ kati.
Zirɛ lapa puuyi, vuu a kana nɛɛ lapa naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ bang ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ.
Ka yeti fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe, rɛɛ yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ takɛ doo dɛ̃ɛti kagn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru, nɛɛ rɛɛ jaaning ɓɔɔ ri tãarɛ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
A tãa yee kɔɔ wu tɔɔ. “Bituru, yupaa ta, mɔɔ nyɔrɛ, mɔɔ shaayi.”
Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpang Kpanti, n shaa vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang zang Yahudi zãa ruu shaanang katɔ, gngn kpang.”
A tãa yee tɔkn daa kaa doo ziti nɛɛ, “vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ tɔ́ɔ̀ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang, kpang.”
Zang palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ dakn taati, a zang gɔ̃ vuu bìí, zang daa nɛɛ mani ka lapa.
Bituru rɛ̃rɛ dɔɔ kana ka yuu dĩiri rɔ̃kɔnang kɔ wu rɔ̃kɔ ɓee, a zang ɓɔɔ Koneliyu shong ri, hɛ̃ɛ nɔng gãa Siman tɔ, ri ĩi tɔ, a ri shii kaa nyaa gãa.
Ri ɓaa nyaa, a ri hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, “Zang zanti kagn gãa keɓe ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Siman, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Bituru ya?”
Bituru rɛ̃rɛ doo kana ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi ɓɛɛ, a Suru Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Siman, zang varɛ taati ri kãa nɔng ɓaaɓɛ.
Kpalɛ bii, mɔɔ shooro. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ gn ziti ka yuu daanang kpang. Mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nkɔ shong ri ɓɛɛ.”
A Bituru shooro nɛɛ gãa lapa daa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kãa wu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ à ka ruu viya?”

Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Koneliyu kɔ shong ruu. Koneliyu zang tɔ̃ɔ, bang Laa, a zang Yahudi nandon, ri a wu bannang dɔɔli. Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbete, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Bituru ɓaa ri nyaa daa kaa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa. Ri roo kaa nɔngkɔ.
Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ, a Bituru kpalɛ bii daa kaa nɛɛ ri. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Joopa, ri daa kaa jong nɛɛ wu.
Nɔng gãntɛ kaa tɔkn, a ri shɛ̃ɛ Kayisariya kati. Ri daa ĩi Koneliyu nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ wu ɓaarɛ ri nyaa ri gã wu tɔ.
Bituru hãa nyaa kana ka yeti gãa, a Koneliyu kpisi wu yuu. Tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, a bang wu.
Bituru wisi wu paa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Shii doo paa n m doo shɔnzang naa mɔkɔ.”
Ri ráng yee kana nɛɛ zɔɔ ri daa yeti gãa, a ɓɔɔ Bituru daa ka yeti gãa daa ĩi zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ gaagaa.

A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ, nyaa dannang zang Yahudi zãa ruu nwannang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɛɛ ri ti daa zanti ka gãa ɓarɛ kpang. Laa tusu m, wàasɛ̀ m kpang, tɔ́ɔ, n ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri zang shi kpang, kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang shong nyaa, n laa nyaa kpang, n tantɛ anang. Ń hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shong nyaa ka ruu viya?”
Koneliyu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Diki daa lɛɛkɔ dɛ̃ɛti bɛ̀ɛ́ n ka yeti gãa mɛɛ, n gàá Laa bɛ̀ɛ́ laa naa weɓe kɔ saka taati. A zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kɔlɔ katɔ nwang nyaa a shii ka tĩng mɛɛ,
a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Koneliyu, Laa tãa gaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa wu tɔ, danggn vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang ti ning wu kpang.
Shong nyaa ka Joopa zang daa ɓàa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ. Nwàng zanti ka gãa Siman, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ. Gãa Siman ka nyaa waapo naabm.’
A n tantɛ nyaa kaa shonang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti pálɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ arɛ ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon ka tĩng Laa ɓee, kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ ta.”
A Bituru gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kati tɔɔ, “Niizang, n zi tɔ kati nɛɛ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓi kpang.
Ka zɔ̃ng zang kɔ ka koo nandon, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kaa vɔrɔ Laa, nɛɛ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, Laa ta wu ɓi katɔ.
Laa shòng zang Isirela nyaa nɛɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ. Zang kɔɔ ri Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang piti ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ tãa ruu kɔ baa tipi Yahudi ɓee tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang gaayu nɛɛ tipi Galili, kaa knti ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ruu keɓe ɓi ruu Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara. Ɓɔɔ Laa a wu Suru ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ keɓe daarɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, pàlɛ́ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ́ ka tipi Yahudi nɛɛ gari Urushalima ruu zi nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru. A ri ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
A Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ka ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ. A nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ zang zi wu.
Wu zang piti ri zi wu kpang, ɓi rukɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu katɔ kɔ zi wu shɛ̃ɛning. Rùu shaa vuu shaanang, a ruu ɓoo vuu nɛɛ wu ka knti ɓɔɔ wu seepaa tɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
A á ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Rùu kɔ̀ɔ́ zang nɛɛ Laa zɔ̃ng wukɔ nɛɛ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃̀ɛ́ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nwang doo ningkãari ruu.
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, Laa yaa zang keɓe gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ katɔ nandon, ka ruu nung ɓiɓɛ.”
Bituru rang yee doo kana nyaa, a Suru Laa a ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓiɓɛ nandon.
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ gari Joopa, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Suru ɓiɓɛ jong ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãayi zang ri rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn, ri dɔɔ Laa, ka ruu bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A Bituru rang yee tɔɔ,
“Zang keɓe, Laa a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ a ruu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zãyi rùu palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ mii kpang kagn ya?”
A kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu nwáng nɛɛ ri diki wu bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
Rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi nandon, ri tãayi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri ta Ruu Laa tɔ jong.
Ɓɔɔ Bituru daa ka Urushalima zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ zang yee zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang shaa ka gbongkarɛ, ri rangkɛ wu.
Ri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ daa zanti ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri, ka ruu viya?”
A Bituru kɔɔ ri ruu bìí kaa nandon nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ gaayu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ:
“Bɛɛ n gàá Laa ka gari Joopa, a n rɔ̃kɔ. N zi vuu a nɛɛ lapa naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ bang ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ. Vuu bii naa shi ka tĩng mɛɛ naabm.
A n pɛ̃ɛrɛ waasɛ̃, n zi rɛɛ yɔpɔ soro nɛɛ yɔpɔ kpaasi, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ jaaning.
A n tãa yee kɔ̀ɔ́ m nɛɛ, ‘Bituru, yupaa, mɔɔ nyɔrɛ mɔɔ shaayi.’
N kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Kpang, Kpanti vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang daa nyaa mɛɛ gngn kpang.’
A yee bìí kasɛ nyaa tɔkn nɛɛ lapa daa kaa doo ziti tɔɔ, ‘Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang, kpang.’
Zang palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ dakn taati, a zang gɔ̃ vuu bìí zang daa nɛɛ mani ka lapa.
Knti bee kpang zang taati, ri tantɛ nyaa nwannang ka gãa ɓɔɔ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang shong ri ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ Kayisariya.
Suru Laa kɔɔ m tɔɔ n daa nɛɛ ri, ń rɛ̃rɛ gn ziti kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa mangbete zang Joopa keɓe, ri daa nɛɛ n ka Kayisariya, a ruu daa ka yeti gãa Koneliyu nandon.
A Koneliyu kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Shong zang ɓɔɔ, wu daa ka Joopa, zang daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
Naa kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa ɓaaɓɛ nandon.’
Ɓɔɔ n gaayu yee rannang hn, Suru Laa a ka bii ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ gaayu a ka bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
A n kpàa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Yɔhana palɛ nɔɔ batizima ɓi nɛɛ mii, zang naa palɛ nɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ Suru Laa’ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ka bìí Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ jong. N m kaa wi, n zãa Laa wiya?”

Ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu keɓe, ri rangkɛ rɛɛ Bituru takpang, ri dɔɔ kaa Laa, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, Laa a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang gbalang tɔ jong nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri vɔ kaa takpang.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri tántɛ́, ka ruu jĩng ɓɔɔ zang dang zang ka knti ɓɔɔ Istifanu vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daarɛ beebang ka tipi Fonishiya nɛɛ tipi Kuburu, nɛɛ gari Antakiya. Ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ Ruu Laa kpang, ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang Yahudi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
A zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓarɛ zang Kuburu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kiranɛ, ri daa ka Antakiya ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa jong, ka yuu Kpanti Yeesɔ.
Laa yi ri naa kagn, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔɔli ri shing danggn, a ri nwang kaa zang Laa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Urushalima, ri tãa ruu keɓe, a ri shong Baranaba kaa Antakiya.
Ɓɔɔ daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, a zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa á ri tĩnang tãanang tɔ, tãa tĩnang jong. A mã ri danggn nɛɛ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nandon.
Baranaba ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, Suru Laa kagn bii ɓiɓɛ, ti shing danggn ka bìí Laa dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔɔli ri a ka bii Laa.
A Baranaba daa ka gari Taasu nɛɛ wu daa kãa nɔng Shaawulu.
Daa ĩi wu, a atɛ wu ka Antakiya. Ri ziti ri nwalɛ nɛɛ zang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, a ri ti tusu zang dɔɔli vuu, saa gbete. Zang gaayu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓaanang ka Antakiya kɔ nɛɛ Kirista.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri yupaa nɛɛ Urushalima, ri daa ka Antakiya.
Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Agabu, Laa a wu naa vuu palɛnang, a yupaa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, nyɔkɔ bang a kana ka koo nandon. (Nyɔkɔ keɓe náa á ka saa ɓɔɔ Kaladiyu nwang Kpanti ɓɛɛ).
Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ rí kpalɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓu walɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri yi rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ doori ka tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ naa ka bii.
Ri kpalɛ kati nɔngkɔ, a ri shòng rɛɛ zang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa saka bìí kaa nɛɛ naa rɛɛ Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu.
Ka diki kaɓa kɔ, kpanti Hiridu gaayu ɓɔɔ wu dang zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jĩng.
Shingnɛ zang dɔng yuu Yakub jaa nàá Yɔhana nɛɛ yere bang a Yakub vɔrɛ.
Zirɛ vuu kɔ wu pálɛ́ ɓee zang Yahudi ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, a yi Bituru kaa jong. Palɛ vuu keɓe ka diki nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Yi Bituru tɔ, a loo wu ka sãa, a wu zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɛɛ ka naa, nɛɛ ri gãng jĩng ka wu. Basɛ zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã wu nɔng dɛ̃ɛti. Nɔng ɓu sɔɔja kagn dɛ̃ɛti. Hiridu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ɓa tɔ, wu naa jɛ̃ɛ Bituru ruu kati, ka jĩng zang piti.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ya Bituru ka sãa ka nɔngkɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri ti gàá Laa ɓi kana gbãng gbãng ka ruu Bituru.

Nɛɛ zĩi ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔng nɛ́ɛ gãntɛ tɔ, Hiridu nwángsɛ̀ Bituru kaa jĩng zang piti ɓɛɛ, Bituru roo katɔ ka teteng zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri gã wu ɓɛɛ. Zang mã wu nɛɛ saka ziti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɔɔ ri kagn ziti, ka nyaa gãa sãa nɛɛ biling.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nwang nyaa ka yeti sãa. Shiiyi, a yeti sãa yakɛ kaa gbayi gbayi. Zang nyaa shonang Laa bìí zĩiti Bituru ka nyaa zãngzãng a hingsi wu. Kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa pati.” Soo saka ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ naa Bituru nɛɛ mani tantɛ tɛ̃ɛnang ka tipi.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta nɛɛ koodoo.” Bituru hãayi. A ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓaaɓɛ ta ka bii mɔɔ arɛ ruu daayi.”
Bituru dũng wu, ri nwangnɛ mani ka biling. Bituru zi ɓiri mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa palɛ ɓee, ɓi niizang kpang. Kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓi naa nɛɛ wu rɔ̃kɔ katɔ.

Ri ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, ri ti naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tɔkn. Ri naa a ka nyaa gãa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓa kaa wukɔ, zang daa ka yeti gari ɓɛɛ. Nyaa gãa bii puu nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, a ri nwang ka biling. Ri yi gbalang sasak, ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gbalang bang keɓe waa nyaa ɓɛɛ, a zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, tantɛ wu kaa yaanang.

A Bituru zi vuu ɓɔɔ pálɛ́ wu kati, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ kati nɛɛ vuu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani. Laa shong zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ náa tà m nɛɛ naa Hiridu, a ti ta m nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi nandon, ri shing gn nɛɛ naa palɛ m ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ wu zi naa weɓe, daa ka gãa Marayamu nàá Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng, ri gàá Laa.
Bituru ɓaa nyaa ka nyaa gãa biling, a jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Rooda arɛ naa kasɛ wu nyaa.
Jaa zang soro keɓe naa tãa yee Bituru, a tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yurɛ gbãayu ka yeti gãa, puu nyaa gãa kpang. Dàa kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, Bituru shii ka nyaa gãa.
Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Shoko ta mɔɔ katɔ.” Jaa bìí yi tĩng nɛɛ wukɔ niizang. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”
Bituru ti shii ɓi ka nyaa gãa ka nɔngkɔ ɓaa nyaa. Ri naa puu nyaa gãa kaa nɛɛ knti. Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu ri mã naa ka danggn.
Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ naa, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa. A kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ sãa kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ Yakub nɛɛ rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ nimbang ruu keɓe.” A yaa ri, daa ɓi kaa nɔng ɓɔɔgn.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, rɛɛ sɔɔja ri haa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ dɔɔli nɛɛ Bituru daa ka niya?

Hiridu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang kãa Bituru ta. Zang kãa wu, zang ĩi wu kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Hiridu jɛ̃ɛ zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gã Bituru ruu, a shingnɛ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ. Ka knti vuu keɓe, Hiridu yupaa nɛɛ tipi Yahudi daa ka Kayisariya daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ.

Diki bee tɔ ɓɔɔ yeti Hiridu lasɛ dɔɔli nɛɛ zang Taya nɛɛ zang Sidong ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri see zɔɔ dɔɔli, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri gaayu ri rang yee nɛɛ Balastu, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang rɛɛ jaa doo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A ri raa bii kaa nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ri gaa kpanti kati nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ ri ka nyaa zɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri wàlɛ́ vuu shaanang ɓarɛ ka tipi kpanti kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Hiridu shìng zang keɓe diki. Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ wu shing ri naa arɛ, Hiridu hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpanti ɓiɓɛ, a nwang ka yuu laa kpanti, a rang ri yee.
Ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi shɔnzang rang yee kpang, ɓi vuu gãnti rang yee.”
Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa tantɛ wu waanang nɛɛ kɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a Laa bannang kpang ɓɛɛ. Jaagn ri shaa wu, a vɔrɛ.
Ruu Laa ti bàa nɔng ɓi kana daa kana nɛɛ tĩng.
Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ri daa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ka Urushalima tɔ, a ri gbãayu. Ri atɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ ka naa ning.

Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Antakiya ɓɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa kagn nɛɛ rɛɛ maalang. Zang keɓe ɓi rɛɛ Baranaba, nɛɛ Simiyon ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ “Zang vĩiri” ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ Lukiyu yɔɔ Kiranɛ, a ɓɔɔ Manaya ɓɔɔ báng ka yeti gãa gbete nɛɛ Hiridu ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ Shaawulu.
Diki ɓɔɔgn ri bang Laa, a ri seng nyaalaa a Suru Laa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zɔ̃ng m Shaawulu nɛɛ Baranaba ka ruu shonang, ɓɔɔ n ɓàa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
Ri seng nyaalaa tɔ, ri ti gaa Laa, a ri shĩili rɛɛ Shaawulu nɛɛ Baranaba naa kaa yuu, a zang lɔɔ ri nyaa kati nɛɛ ri dita.
Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shɔng ri, ri daa ka gari Selusiya. Ri vang laana nɛɛ Selusiya ri daa ka Kuburu.
Ri a tɔ ka Salami, a ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang. Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku nɛɛ ri ning, yì ri naa ka shonang.
Ri riki tipi Kuburu tɔ nandon, ri a nɛɛ mani ka gari Paafo. Ka Paafo ri kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ Yahudi ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ paa zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa Yashuwa. Suu sèé nɛɛ wu zang nyaa shonang Laa.
Jaa Yashuwa ɓi ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sajiya Bulu, gɔmna Kuburu ka knti ɓɛɛ. Gɔmna keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zi vuu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A gɔmna ɓaa Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu nyaa nɛɛ wu tãa Ruu Laa.
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ paa keɓe zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Elayima nɛɛ nyaa Heleni, kasɛ nɛɛ wu zãa ri Ruu Laa kɔɔnang katɔ. Kasɛ kpang nɛɛ gɔmna wu shing danggn ka bìí Laa kpang.
A Shaawulu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, Suru Laa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Shu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛpaa keɓe jĩng ka bii,

a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Jaa suru shi kpang kiɓi. Mɔkɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi zang nwãarɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Mɔɔ kãa gbalang diki diki nɛɛ mɔɔ risi Ruu Laa wu nwang kaa naa sèé.
Náa vuu palɛnang Laa lee mɔɔ ditɔ kãntang keɓe. Jĩng ɓaaɓɛ zuu katɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kpang diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.”
A pũngku nɛɛ nɔng tɔɔnang ri zúu Elayima jĩng kati. Rakɛ, tã̀lɛ́ naa, kãa zang ɓɔɔ yí wu naa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ gɔmna zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ Elayima, shing danggn kaa bii Laa, ti mã naa ka danggn, ka vuu ɓɔɔ Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ri tusu ka yuu Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
Bulu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ri vang tonsi nɛɛ Paafo, ri a ka Paaga ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pamfiliya ɓɛɛ. A Yɔhana yaa ri, gbãayu daa Urushalima.
Ri sha ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ Paaga ri daa ka Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ. Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang, ri daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, a ri nwáng ka tipi.

Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang hangsɛ labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ rɛɛ labeenang zang nyaa shonang Laa gãnang tɔ, zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri shong nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛ́ɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang kagn, ɓɔɔ mã ri danggn, nɔɔ kɔɔ ta.”
A Bulu yupaa kati, wii naa, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Isirela nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ káa vɔrɔ Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo.

Làá rɛɛ zang Isirela keɓe, zɔ̃́ng rɛɛ dabang ɓuru. A shing ri, ri shang dɔɔli, a ri ti nwang zang bang ka ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa zang zanti ka tipi Masara ɓɛɛ. A ti nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ.
Laa ti mã danggn nɛɛ ri nung saa laa ziti ka jĩngti.
A ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang doo laa manziti ka tipi Kaana, a basɛ rɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ tipi rɛɛ zang keɓe.
Ri nwang kagn saa laa maani dakn dɛ̃ɛti a tu laa ziti tu kopi.
“Nɛɛ knti, Laa yiki ri zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ sasak a nɛɛ mani ka yuu Samayila zang nyaa shonang Laa.
A zang Isirela ri naa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ ri kasɛ kaa kpanti, a Laa yi ri Sɔɔlì jaa Kiishi yɔɔ doo laa Biliyaminu. Sɔɔlì roo kpanti zang Isirela saa laa ziti.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ Sɔɔlì, a yi Dawuda kpanti. Laa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Dawuda tɔɔ, ‘N walɛ Dawuda jaa Jeesi tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wukɔ naa palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.’
“Laa atɛ zang Isirela, zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃ng yɔɔ keɓe kɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Yeesɔ a gn kpang, Yɔhana kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa ka tipi Isirela tɔɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, zang palɛ ri batizima.

Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Yɔhana hangsɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa tɔ, hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ nkɔ wiya? Wu nkɔ zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ a doo naa ka knti mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.’
“Rɛɛ manzung zɔ̃ng Ibirayi, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ, zang shong rùu kɔ nyaa nɛɛ ruu, ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓuru keɓe.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Urushalima nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ɓarɛ ri zi Yeesɔ nung kpang. Ri ti zi rúu rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang gã ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang diki diki kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa keɓe ri kɔɔ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri dɔng wu ruu ɓɛɛ.
Ri ĩi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. Ri kɔɔ Bilatu nɛɛ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ doo nɛɛ mani.
Ka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang beeyi nɛɛ zang naa palɛ wu tɔ nandon, ri witi vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yuu laa, ri gbãa wu ka saa.
Laa naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa.
Nwálɛ́ nyaa diki dɔɔli ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu nɛɛ Galili, ri a ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe.
“Ruu atɛ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru,
nwang tɔ niizang ka teteng ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zɔ̃ng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura ziti ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“ ‘Mɔkɔ jaa mɛɛ,
lɛɛkɔ n nwang Daa ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.’
Ka ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa nɛɛ wu pũng takpang ɓɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
‘N pàlɛ́ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nwang ditɔ niizang, ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ Dawuda ɓɛɛ katɔ.’
Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kagn tɔɔ,
‘Mɔɔ yáa zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ wu pũngnɛ kpang.’
“Dawuda ka diki ɓiɓɛ pàlɛ́ zang ɓiɓɛ shonang naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Vɔrɛ, a zang gbãa wu ka sàá rɛɛ dabang ɓiɓɛ, a vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ pũngnɛ.
Zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa pũ̀ng ɓi kpang.
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zirɛ, zang kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang yàá nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ katɔ ka ruu yɔɔ keɓe kɔ̀.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ keɓe, nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa. Nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka yeti vuu piti ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nyaa dannang Musa risi nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃ vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ri kɔɔyi, nɛɛ pálɛ̀ nɔɔ. Ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“ ‘Nɔɔ zirɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpaa zang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti vɔlɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ka diki manɛ keɓe,
ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ doori
nɔɔ shing danggn kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Ri nwáng kana nɛɛ yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, zang gaa ri nɛɛ ri paasɛ ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔkn ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ.

Zang ri daarɛ tɔ, a zang Yahudi dɔɔli nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa doo gbalang zang Yahudi kɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ, ri dũng Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba. A ri rang rɛɛ zang keɓe yee, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ri keɓe kpang.
Ɓɔɔ Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang naa raa bii mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang gari bìí kpalɛ nandon nɛɛ ri tãa Ruu Laa
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ dɔɔli ri kaa sũnyaa gbãng gbãng. Ri laa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ri ti dãlɛ wu.
A Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri rang yee, ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang, tɔɔ,
“Ruu nɛɛ rang nɔkɔ Ruu Laa shɔɔnang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛyi,
nɔɔ tusu yuu manɛ naa nɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ
nɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpàng kpang, ruu
raa jĩng kaa bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ rùu tɔɔ,
‘N shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ nwang vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ,
tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shing zang, Laa ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa piti.’ ”

Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. Ri a Ruu Laa bannang, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa shingnɛ, nɛɛ ri walɛ Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ, ri shing danggn ka bìí Laa.
Ruu Laa ti bàa tipi kaɓa nandon.

Rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri dɔ̃lɔ rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang gari kaɓa. Ri shing zang nɛɛ zang ri dang rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba jĩng. Ri hing ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa.
Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo ɓarɛ, nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang Yahudi nɛɛ ruu ɓarɛ hãa ɓi tɔɔ kagn nɛɛ ri kpang ɓɛɛ. A ri daa kaa Ikoniya.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, Suru Laa ti a ka bìí ɓarɛ.
Ka Ikoniya Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri daa yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Ri rang yee Laa, a zang dɔɔli, rɛɛ Yahudi nɛɛ zang Heleni ri shing danggn.
Rɛɛ Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ danggn shinnang katɔ, ri dɔ̃lɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, a ri lasɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri nwang ka nihn diki ɓarɛ bee katɔ. Ri rang yee Laa ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang a Laa tusu zang nɛɛ yee tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ niizang kɔ nwani, ka ɓɔɔ yaa rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.
Zang gari ri basɛ zɔɔ tìng ziti. Tìng gbete ri ta nyaa zang Yahudi, a ɓɔɔ gbete ri ta ɓarɛ kaa nyaa rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang nɛɛ Yahudi, ri mã zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ɓarɛ, nɛɛ ri dang rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ jĩng, nɛɛ ri ti luku ri nɛɛ tari.
Zang shonang Yeesɔ ri tãa nyaa, a ri yurɛ, ri daa ka gari Lisitira nɛɛ Daabe ɓɔɔ ka tipi Likoniya ɓɛɛ. Ri ti daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kiiri ri nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Laa kaa nɔngkɔ.
Ka Lisitira yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang yi wu kàa katɔ. Ra ɓi gngn kpang.
Ɓaa shoo, tã̀á Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A Bulu shù wu jĩng ka bii, a zi danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu tɔ.
A Bulu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ shii doo paa.” A yɔɔ yupaa kpãari, a gaayu ranang kati.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ́, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu pálɛ́, ri goo nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ nyaa zang Likoniya ri tɔɔ, “Vuu gãnti ri tuu bii shɔnzang ri a ka bii ɓuru.”
Ri ɓaa Baranaba nɛɛ Zafasa, a ri ɓaa Bulu ɓi kaa nɛɛ Hami, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ ráng ri yee ɓɛɛ.

Zang bang vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zafasa ɓɔɔ jàá vaa ɓiɓɛ ka nyaa gãa gari ɓɛɛ. Atɛ guu napo nɛɛ rɛɛ mangwaa vuu ɓɔɔ ri mã katɔ rikiki ɓɛɛ, ka nyaa jaa vaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri dɔ̀ɔ́ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri pálɛ̀, ri lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ. Ri yurɛ ri daa ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ. Ri mɛɛ nyaa ri tɔɔ,

“Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ka ruu viya? Rùu ɓuru doo shɔnzang kɔ naa nɔkɔ. Ruu arɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu naa kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Ruu tɔɔ nɔɔ yaa gbalang vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang keɓe. Nɔɔ a ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ waapo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nandon ɓɛɛ.
Ka koo ɓɔɔ tɛɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, Laa yaa zang koo nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa bìí, ti tusu doo nɛɛ mani diki diki, nɛɛ wu kagn ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Á nɔɔ mii lapa, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓàarɛ́ wu ra jaa kaa làá ɓarɛ. Á nɔɔ vuu shaanang, wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ tãa tĩnang.”
Dòo nɛɛ ruu kɔ rɛɛ zang shonang ri kɔɔrɔ ri ɓee, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri huu shoo nɛɛ ri nɛ̀ɛ́ dɔɔ ri ɓarɛ doo vuu kɔ sasak.

Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ti a nɛɛ Ikoniya. Ri dɔ̃lɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ nyaa, a zang ri ta nyaa ɓarɛ, a ri luku Bulu nɛɛ tari. Ri gɔ̃ wu ka tipi ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, ri tɔɔ naa vɔ ɓi tɔ.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng, yupaa a daa yeti gari. Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a daa ka gari Daabe nɛɛ Baranaba.
Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka Daabe, a zang dɔɔli ri shing danggn ka bii Laa. A ri gbãayu ri sɔɔ Lisitira nɛɛ Ikoniya, ri naa a ka Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ.
Ri mã zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ danggn, ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri yáa danggn kɔ ri shing ɓee kpang. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Rùu dàng jĩng dɔɔli ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ kati.”
Ri nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri sɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa tĩng tɔ, ri seng nyaalaa, ri ti gaa ri Laa. Ri ti gaa Laa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu yiti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu keɓe waasɛ̃.
Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri tɛɛ tipi Pisidiya tɔ, ri a ka tipi Pamfiliya.
Ri kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa ka gari Paaga, a ri tɛɛyi ri daa ka Ataliya.
Ri váng tonsi nɛɛ nihn, ri gbãayu ka Antakiya, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gáayú zang gaa ri Laa kagn, nɛɛ wu yiti ri ka ruu shonang kɔ ri pálɛ́ tɔ ɓee ɓɛɛ.

Ri shɛ̃ɛ Antakiya tɔ, ri kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, a ri kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Laa puu zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang gbalang tɔ jong nɛɛ ri shing danggn ka bìí ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
A ri nwang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kaɓa ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓarɛ bee katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔgn, ri a nɛɛ tipi Yahudi ka Antakiya, a ri tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ yee shaa naa ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang, Laa ta yuu manɛ kpang.”

Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri làa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe gbãng gbãng ka ruu ruu keɓe. A zang naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Antakiya ɓɔɔ, ri daa Urushalima. Ri daa hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ka ruu ruu keɓe.

A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri shing ri zanti kati. Ri sɔɔ tipi Fonishiya nɛɛ Samariya, ri kɔɔrɔ zang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa kati ɓɛɛ. Ruu keɓe shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli.
Ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ri ta ri waasɛ̃. A Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn a ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.

A zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka vaa zang Farisi ɓɛɛ, ri yupaa ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri yée shaa katɔ. Zang ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ.”
A zang shonang Yeesɔ, ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka ruu rúu keɓe.

Ri làa zɔɔ nyaa tɔ gbãng gbãng, a Bituru yupaa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zi tɔ diki bee tɔ ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng m ka teteng manɛ, nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri tãayi, ri ti shing danggn ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang zang tɔ nandon, tusu nɛɛ ri daa wu yeti tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.
Basɛ teteng ɓarɛ nɛɛ ruu kpang. Yàa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ gãsɛ Laa ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shing vuu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ rɛɛ daa ɓuru ruu zunung tuunang kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Rùu shing danggn tɔ, a Laa yi ruu naa kagn nɛɛ bìí Kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ta yuu ɓuru kati naa ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri nwang kaa kikiri, ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ Baranaba nɛɛ Bulu ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn, ri pálɛ̀ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ri hangsɛ yee ranang tɔ, a Yakub rang yee kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo karɛ rɛɛ manzung.
Wee Siman kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu doo naa ɓee, naa ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, a zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
Rúu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔyi daa gbete nɛɛ weɓe. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“ ‘Nɛɛ knti, n gbãayu ditɔ n naa mãa nɔng nwannang
Dawuda ɓɔɔ jì ɓɛɛ.
N mãa nɔng ɓɔɔ jili ɓɛɛ.
N wisi paa ka nɔng,
tɔ̀ɔ, zang nimbang ri kãa Laa kati,
nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang,
ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung mɛɛ ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ tùsù zang vuu keɓe doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, wukɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe.’
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, rúu kpãa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri a ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Rúu bèe ri laa kɔ jong, rúu kɔɔ ri nɛɛ rí shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, ri rooro nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu soro ɓarɛ kpang, kpang. Ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri ti shaa zĩi kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki bée tɔ ɓɔɔ zang gã nyaa dannang Musa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang diki diki ɓɛɛ. Zang ti kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ka gari gari nandon.”

A zang shonang Yeesɔ ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, nyaa ɓarɛ a gbete, nɛɛ ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri shong ri ka Antakiya nɛɛ ri dàa nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba. A ri zɔ̃ng zang varɛ ziti ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri á ri bannang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Yahuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Basaba ɓɛɛ, ri nɛɛ Siila.
A zang shong ri nɛɛ labeenang keɓe tɔɔ,

“Rukɔ zang shonang Yeesɔ, ruu nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ɓɔɔ ruu manzung manɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu shong nyaa nɛɛ zang jèe ruu rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Isirela kpang, a ri zi Laa ɓarɛ tɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Antakiya nɛɛ tipi Siriya nɛɛ Silisiya ɓɛɛ.
Ruu tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn ri daa nɛɛ teteng ɓuru, ri daa kpãa nɔɔ, ri lasɛ nɔɔ yeti nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Rùu ti kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ nɔɔ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ, a nyaa ɓuru daa gbete, nɛɛ ruu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang, ruu shong ri ka bii manɛ. Ri daa nɛɛ rɛɛ wusang ɓuru Baranaba nɛɛ Bulu,
ɓɔɔ ri loo yuu ɓarɛ tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi shonang ɓɛɛ.
Rùu shong nɔɔ Yahuda nɛɛ Siila nɛɛ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ gbete nɛɛ vuu kɔ ruu bèe nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nyaa ɓuru daa gbete nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ ruu gisi nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Nɔ́ɔ shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, nɔɔ shaa zĩi kpang. Nɔɔ ti shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ rooro nɛɛ soro ɓɔɔ wu soro manɛ kpang, kpang. Naa nɔɔ pálɛ̀ rɛɛ vuu keɓe kpang, nɔɔ tãa tĩnang katɔ.”
A zang shing ri zanti kati. Ri daa Antakiya kati, ri daa kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri a ri labeenang bìí.
Ɓɔɔ zang ri gã labeenang bìí, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu bìí mã ri danggn ɓɛɛ.
Yahuda nɛɛ Siila ɓɔɔ ri doo zang nyaa shonang Laa kɔɔ doori, ri rang zang yee sasak. Yee ɓarɛ mã zang danggn kati.
Ri nwang ka Antakiya tɔkɔlɔng, a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri shing ri zanti nɛɛ ri daa waasɛ̃. A ri gbãayu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ri ɓɛɛ.
[A Siila kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang ɓi doo ka nɔngkɔ.]
Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa Antakiya ka nɔngkɔ. Ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, a ri ti kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a Bulu kɔɔ Baranaba nɛɛ, “Ruu gbãayu ta ruu leng rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Laa kagn ɓɛɛ. Rúu zi naa ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓɛɛ.”
Baranaba kasɛ nɛɛ ri daa nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ ning.
Bulu zi naa ɓɔɔ ri dàá nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gbãayu ka Pamfiliya, yaa ri daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng shonang kpang kpàng.
Ri hàa nyaa, a ri basɛ zɔɔ. Baranaba ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Maraku ri vang laana ri daa ka Kuburu.
A Bulu tuu ɓi kaa Siila. Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ri gàa ri Laa tɔ nɛɛ Laa wu gãng jĩng ka ri, a ri yi gbalang ri daayi.
Bulu daa ka Siriya nɛɛ Silisiya ri mã zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa danggn.
Bulu daa ka Daabe, a naa daa ka Lisitira nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Timoti kagn ɓɛɛ. Niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ doori, ɓi zang Yahudi a diiɓɛ ɓi kaa zang Heleni.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka Lisitira nɛɛ Ikoniya ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Timoti.
Bulu kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa nɛɛ Timoti, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yèe wu shaa kati. Yèe wu shaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi kaɓa nandon, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ dáa Timoti zang Heleni ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̀ɛrɛ̀ rɛɛ gari, ri kɔɔrɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima ri dang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa keɓe waasɛ̃.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu naa ka bii, a ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng, a ri ti shang kaa diki diki.
Suru Laa zãa ri Ruu Laa kɔɔnang ka tipi Asiya ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɛ̀ɛrɛ̀ tipi Fijiya nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Galatiya.
Ri a tɔ, ka nyaa tipi Misiya, ri tɔɔ ri daa ka tipi Bitiniya, a Suru Laa zãa ri daanang.
A ri sɔɔ yeti tipi Misiya ri tɛɛyi ri daa ka gari Torowasa.
Nɛɛ zĩi Bulu rɔ̃kɔ. Zi yɔɔ tipi Makidoniya shiiyi gaa wu nɛɛ, “Tárɛ mɔɔ a ka tipi Makidoniya mɔɔ naa yi ruu naa ka bii.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Bulu rɔ̃kɔ naa weɓe, ruu kpalɛ bii daanang Makidoniya. Ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang kaɓa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ.
A ruu vang Laana nɛɛ Torowasa ruu sha dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu daa ka Samutaraki. Nɔng naa gãntɛ, ruu daa Niyapoli.
Ruu yupaa nɛɛ nihn, ruu daa kaa Filipi ɓɔɔ wukɔ gari bang ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ. Gari keɓe, ɓi gari zang Rooma. Ruu nwang ka gari keɓe, diki bee ruu katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ruu nwang ka nyaa gari biling, ruu daa ka nyaa rang. Ruu tɔɔ naa ruu wàlɛ́ nɔng Laa gaanang katɔ ka nɔng. Ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ruu ràng rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ́, yee Laa.

Ka teteng zang soro ɓɔɔ ri tã̀á ruu keɓe, jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn gbete, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Lidiya. Jaa soro keɓe, zang gari Tayatira, màlɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nwɛ̃ɛri ɓɛɛ. Ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ bang Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa puu wu jĩng nɛɛ, wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ti shing danggn kati.

Zang palɛ wu batizima tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, a gaa ruu nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ n zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, nɔɔ a ta ka gãa mɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ka nɔng.” Yi ruu tĩng ka bii, a ruu kasɛ kati.

Diki ɓɔɔgn, ruu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gaa Laa kagn ɓɛɛ, a jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ ɓi jaafoo, kpisi ruu yuu. Jaafoo keɓe suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shing wu hɛ̃ɛ zang paa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓiɓɛ, ri walɛ vuu nɛɛ wu dɔɔli, ka ruu paa ɓɔɔ wu hɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
Dũng ruu nɛɛ Bulu ka knti mɛɛrɛ nyaa, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe, ri zang shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Pálɛ̀ naa weɓe diki diki, a yeti Bulu naa lasɛ, a raa jĩng kɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “N dang mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, nwangnɛ mɔɔ yaa wu bii.” A suru shi kpang tantɛ nwannang.

Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang jaafoo ri zirɛ nɛɛ zang lasɛ ri gbalang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ saka nɛɛ mani tɔ, ri yiki rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila, ri gɔ̃ ri, ri daa nɛɛ ri ka tĩng rɛɛ zang bang. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃̀ɛ́ zang ruu kagn ka lumang ɓɛɛ.
Zang atɛ ri tɔ, ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃̀ɛ́ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, a ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudi. Ri kpãa zang gari ɓuru.
“Ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ruu, nɛɛ ruu dũng gbalang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ, ruu zang Rooma ruu tarɛ, ruu dũngnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ nyaa jong ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ka yuu Bulu nɛɛ Siila ɓɛɛ. A rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii Bulu nɛɛ Siila ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu nyɔkɔ ri ta nɛɛ gbãa.
Zang nyɔkɔ ri tɔ zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, a zang loo ri ka sãa. Zang kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa nɛɛ wu ku ri gbãng gbãng.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa tãa naa weɓe, daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti sãa ɓɔɔ tĩng. Mã ri doo ka bìí laa waa bang.
Nɛɛ gãmbang zĩi Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri gàá Laa, ri ti gàá wu soo. Zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri dòo ka sãa kɔ, ɓɔɔ nimbang, ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa ri.
A tipi tantɛ ruutunang, a zĩiti gãa daa nɔng ka doo ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang loo ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Nyaa gãa ri tantɛ pulunang, a soo saka ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang looro ri ka sãa nɛɛ mani tɛ̃ɛ nandon, yaa ri naa.
Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa hingsi jĩng. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi nyaa gãa sãa bm, kɔɔ ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ ka sãa ri yuku tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zɔ̃ng yere bang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa vɔrɔ.
A Bulu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Mɔ́ɔ lasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang, ruu doo ka nɔng nandon.”
Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ zang atɛ waa. A daa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila kagn ɓɛɛ. Tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng ɓarɛ, bii zàá wu kpɔkpɔk.
A sɔɔ ri tĩng nwangsɛ ri ka biling, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ maalang, n pálɛ̀ vi n ta yuu mɛɛ viya?”
Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Shing danggn ka bìí Kpanti Yeesɔ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ nandon.”
A ri kɔɔ wu Ruu Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ piti.
Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa sèe ri dòo nɛɛ zĩi kɔ tantɛnang daa sɔɔ ri nɔɔrɔ. A ri palɛ wu batizima nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon.
A see Bulu nɛɛ Siila daa nɛɛ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Daa a ri vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri shaayi. Wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon, ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn tɔ, ka bìí Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃̀ɛ́ zang ruu, ri shong rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gã ri ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa nɛɛ, “Yaa rɛɛ zang kaɓa naa ta ri daayi.”
Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa daa kɔɔ Bulu kati nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ zang bang ri shong nyaa ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ Siila, nɛɛ n yaa nɔɔ naa ta. Nɔɔ yupaa ta, nɔɔ daa waasɛ̃.”

A Bulu kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ruu zang Rooma a zang nyɔ ruu nɛɛ gbãa ka jĩng zang piti. Ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, zang ti loo ruu ka sãa. Zang nɛɛ zang yaa ruu naa kaa nɛɛ nwĩiri ya? Ruu daa kpang. Zang bang Rooma bìí ri a ka nihn nɛɛ doo ɓarɛ ri yaa ruu naa.”
Zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri, ri daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang Rooma ruu keɓe. Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri doo zang Rooma kɔ, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ.
Ri daayi ri daa gaa Bulu nɛɛ Siila nɛɛ ri yàa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ri ɓɛɛ ta. A ri nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ yeti sãa. Ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri dita ri yaa gari.
Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri nwangnɛ yeti sãa ri daa ka gãa Lidiya. Ri ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng, a ri rang zang ruu ɓɔɔ mã ri danggn ɓɛɛ, a ri daa kati.
Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri sɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ gari Amfipoli nɛɛ Apoloniya, ri a ka Tesalonika, nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi kagn ɓɛɛ.
Bulu daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang naa ɓasidi wu daarɛ ɓɛɛ. Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang taati, ɓɔɔ Bulu rang yee nɛɛ rɛɛ zang, nwangsɛ ri dĩiri Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Kirisi dàng jĩng gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa yupaa nɛɛ saa. Bulu kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, wukɔ Kirisi.”
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ta ruu keɓe, a ri ɓang ka bii rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila. Rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Heleni ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ɓɛɛ, ri ɓang jong ka bii ɓarɛ.

Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang, ri kaa sũnyaa, a ri gaarɛ zang shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ kɛɛm kɛɛm ɓɛɛ. Ri gaayu nyaa haanang ka gari, ri daa ka gãa yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaasong, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kãa rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila nɛɛ ri nwàngsɛ́ ri zang ka biling ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ ri ĩi Bulu nɛɛ Siila kpang, ri gɔ̃ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaasong nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daa nɛɛ ri ka tĩng rɛɛ zang bang gari. Ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe ri kpãa zang tɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti. Wee ri a tɔ ka gari ɓuru ɓɛɛ,
a Jaasong yítì ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Ri ta rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Kayisa kpanti tipi ɓuru dang ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ.”
Rúu kɔ ri kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓee, kpãa rɛɛ zang gari nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ka yeti dɔɔli.
A rɛɛ zang bang, ri shing Jaasong nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang yiki ri, nɛɛ ri shu saka, ɓɔɔ zang yaa ri naa ɓɛɛ, a zang yáa ri, ri daa kati.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng tɔ̀ɔ hn, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri tantɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila shinnang nɛɛ ri dita gari Beriya. Ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, ri daa ka nɔng zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudi.
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka nihn, ri ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ Tesalonika kpang. Ri ɓaa shoo gbãng gbãng ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri gã Ruu Laa diki diki nɛɛ ri zirɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔyi nɛ́ɛ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Zang Yahudi dɔɔli, ri shing danggn nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro Heleni dɔɔli ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ zang Heleni dɔɔli zang varɛ, ri shing danggn jong.
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka Tesalonika ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ jong ka Beriya, a ri daayi ri daa zàrɛ̀ zang nɛɛ zang ri haa nyaa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri tantɛ Bulu dɔ̃nang nɛɛ wu daa ka nyaa waapo. A zang yaa Siila nɛɛ Timoti ɓarɛ kaa Beriya ka nɔngkɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa shing Bulu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka Ataniya. Ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri gbãayu kaa tɔ, Bulu shong ri nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Siila nɛɛ Timoti nɛɛ ri naa ĩi wu pati.
Ka ɓɔɔ Bulu gã Siila nɛɛ Timoti ka Ataniya ɓɛɛ zirɛ gari bìí vuu gãnti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a vuu bìí kpãa wu ka yeti dɔɔli.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, laa zɔɔ nyaa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang nɛɛ rɛɛ Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ti rang yee jong nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ka gari ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Epikuru nɛɛ Sitoki ri túsú ɓɛɛ, ri ti a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ nɛɛ “Yɔɔ kɔ yìkí nyaa katɔ ɓee, naa kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu viya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ́ rúu ka yuu vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ ruu zi gngn kpang ɓɛɛ.” Ri kɔɔ ruu keɓe waati kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu yupaa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
A ri ɓaa nyaa ka Bulu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ Ariyopagu ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu kasɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ rùu, rúu ka yuu vuu kɔ mɔɔ túsù ɓee.
Vuu kɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ruu ɓee ruu tãa ɓɔɔ gngn kpang tingkiring, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu tãa dĩiri ɓiɓɛ.”
(Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gari Ataniya nɛɛ zang zanti ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng laa yee ri nyaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu shɔɔ, ri ti rangkɛ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.)
Bulu shii paa ka teteng rɛɛ Ariyopagu a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N zi tɔ nɔɔ zang Ataniya nɔɔ zang vuu gãnti kɔ nwani.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ n tɛɛ ka yeti gari manɛ n pɛ̃́ɛrɛ̀ rɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang vuu gãnti manɛ kagn, n zi nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ vuu gãnti manɛ vuu kagn, ɓɔɔ gbete zang bee vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Laa ɓɔɔ ruu zi wu nung kpang ɓɛɛ.’ Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang wu, nɔɔ ti zi wu nung kpang keɓe, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa koo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti koo nandon, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti lapa nɛɛ tipi, nwang ɓi jong ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang mãa ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ti shing jĩng ɓi ka bii shɔnzang nɛɛ ri palɛ wu shonang ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ a zang piti suru bii nɛɛ ɔ̃kɔnang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ piti ɓɛɛ.

Mã̀a zang kɔ ri ka koo ka bm bm ɓee, nɛɛ bii zang gbete. A shing ri nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ka dalɛ koo keɓe piti, piti. Wukɔ kà ri diki ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo keɓe, a ti shĩ̀lì nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ kagn ɓɛɛ doo ka tĩng.
Palɛ nɔngkɔ waati kpang, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri kãa nɔng ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa ri ti ĩ́i wu ka ɓɔɔ ri tãlɛ naa, ri kãa wu ɓɛɛ. Laa bee katɔ nɛɛ nɔng zang gbete ka teteng ɓuru kpang.
“Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Ruu nwangnɛ, ruu rarɛ, ruu nwang shɔnzang, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.’ Ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang soo gáanang manɛ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Ruu doo wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ’ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu wujɛ Laa, rúu tɔ̀ɔ́ kpang nɛɛ ruu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ Laa nwang naa vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ azurufa a ɓɔɔ tari, ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ nɛɛ zũnang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Rɛɛ sáa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, Laa gã̀ ɓi takpang. Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, Laa dang zang nyaa ka niya nandon, nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃́ng diki tɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu gn dang gbete kpang. Jɛ̃̀ɛ́ zang ruu nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwàng niizang ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi zang keɓe paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu paa yunang nɛɛ saa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpaa wu, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu tãa ruu ka yuu vuu keɓe tɔkn.”
A Bulu nwangnɛ, yaa ri kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ri ɓang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ wu. Zang keɓe ɓi rɛɛ Diyonisiyu ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang Ariyopagu ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Damari nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ knti, Bulu yaa Ataniya daa ka gari Koranti.

Bulu ĩi yɔɔ Yahudi ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari Koranti zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Akpiila nɛɛ ɓeeso Pirisila. Akpiila ɓi zang gari Pontu. Wee nɛ́ɛ a doo naa nɛɛ Italiya ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti Kaladiyu dang nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudi nandon, ri yaa Rooma ta ɓɛɛ. Bulu daayi nɛɛ wu daa leng ri.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓi putali wàanang naa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ, nwang kaa nɛɛ ri, palɛ shonang kaa nɛɛ ri.
Bulu ri làá zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang Heleni ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang diki diki. Kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Timoti nɛɛ Siila ri a nɛɛ Makidoniya, Bulu raa jĩng ɓi kaa Ruu Laa kɔɔrɔnang dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Kɔɔrɔ zang Yahudi nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi.

Ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, a ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ nɛɛ ri, a waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ shaarɛ, ɓi nɔkɔ kãa nɛɛ yuu manɛ. Ruu mɛɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ, n daarɛ m kaa bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yaa ri daa nwang ka gãa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Tatiyu Jusitu ɓɔɔ bang kaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang naabm.

Kiripu ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ piti. Zang Koranti ɓɔɔ ri ti ɓaa shoo ka Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Bulu rang ɓɛɛ, ri shing danggn, a zang palɛ ri batizima.
Diki ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn nɛɛ zĩi, Bulu rɔ̃kɔ, Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Kɔɔrɔ zang ɓaa ruu, mɔɔ yaa kpang.
N nɛɛ mɔɔ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mɛɛ kagn gari keɓe dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bulu nwang ka nɔngkɔ saa gbete, nɛɛ shala mangbete, tusu zang Ruu Laa.
Ka ɓɔɔ zang Rooma naa yi Gaaliyo gɔmna tipi Akaya, zang Yahudi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a ri yi Bulu ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nɛɛ zang ri bang Laa, wu naa ɓɔɔ zang dang ruu nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang.”

Bɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ wu kasɛ nyaa kaa tɔ, a Gaaliyo kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Yahudi, naa ruu keɓe zang nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ zang vuu shi kpang kɔ́ naa kãa ruu ɓɔɔ bang dɔɔli, nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
Wee nɔɔ laa zɔɔ nyaa manɛ ka ruu rúu, nɛɛ rɛɛ nung, nɛɛ nyaa dannang manɛ ɓee, nɔɔ palɛ manɛ ka naa manɛ. N kasɛ kpang n jɛ̃ɛ ruu ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kpang.”
A hing ri nɛɛ yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ri yi Sɔtanɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa ka tĩng gãa ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ka nɔngkɔ. Vuu bii ti kpãa Gaaliyo ɓi kpang tingkiring.

Bulu nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Koranti tɔkn diki bee wu katɔ, a naa yaa ri. Naa vang laana nɛɛ rɛɛ Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila, ri daa tipi Siriya. Ka gari Sensheriya, Bulu yele suuyuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ a Laa nyaa nɛɛ wu yélè suuyuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri naa a ka Afisa, Bulu yaa rɛɛ Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila daa ɓi kaa gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri daa laa zɔɔ nyaa ɓi nɛɛ zang Yahudi.
Zang bìí ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ ri diki wu bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a kasɛ kaa takpang.
Ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ wu daa kaa tɔ, kɔɔ ri katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, n gbãayu ditɔ ka bii manɛ.” A vang laana kaa nɛɛ Afisa.
Ɓɔɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ tipi Kayisariya, daa jee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nyaa ka Urushalima. A tɛɛyi daa ka Antakiya.
Nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng a yaa nɔng kaɓa, daa ka rɛɛ tipi Galati nɛɛ tipi Fijiya, dàa mã rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa danggn.
Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ Yahudi ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Apolo, zang yi wu ka gari Alezandiriya, a à kaa Afisa. Zunung yee rannang dɔɔli, a ti zi labeenang Laa gbãng gbãng.
Zang tusu wu gbalang Laa tɔ gbãng gbãng. Suru Laa shing wu kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu, a ti tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ka yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete. A zi ɓi kaa doo batizima Yɔhana kɔɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Gaayu yee rannang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Rɛɛ Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri ɓaa wu nyaa, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓarɛ. Ri daa tusu wu gbalang Laa kaa waasɛ̃.

Apolo kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu daa ka Akaya, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri mã wu danggn, a ri bee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ labeenang nɛɛ ri ta wu waasɛ̃. Ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, yi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn, a ri shing danggn ka bii Laa, naa ka bii dɔɔli.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zunung yee rannang dɔɔli, ɓá rɛɛ zang Yahudi yuu nɛɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka jĩng zang piti ɓɛɛ. Tùsú zang ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Apolo doo ka Koranti, Bulu riki tipi kaɓa, a sòo nyaa daa ka Afisa. Ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng,
a hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, Suru ɓiɓɛ a katɔ ka bii manɛ ya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpang, ruu tãa ruu Suru Laa gngn kpang.”
Bulu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng batizima kiya?” Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zɔ̃ng ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Yɔhana.”
Bulu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Batizima Yɔhana ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri shing danggn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, a zang pàlɛ̀ ri batizima kaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ.
Bulu shĩili ri naa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu, a Suru Laa a kaa bii ɓarɛ. A ri gaayu yee rannang kaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa.
Zang bìí ri zang varɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kopi tu ziti.
Bulu daa ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning. Nwang nɛɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ shala taati. Làá nyaa nɛɛ zang, kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔ́ ri ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri taarɛ yuu, ri shing danggn kpang. Ri kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu gbalang keɓe, ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bulu yaa ri, sèe kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang tusu zang labeenang kagn ɓɔɔ zang ɓáa nɛɛ nung Tirana ɓɛɛ. Laa nyaa nɛɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ, ka yuu Ruu Laa diki diki.
Pálɛ́ nɔngkɔ, saa ziti ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Asiya ri tãa Ruu Laa, zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ nandon.
Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ zang zi gngn kpang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa Bulu.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang talɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu àlɛ́ jĩng nɛɛ mani nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu hã̀lɛ́ ka bii, zang daa nɛɛ mani ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ, a kɔnang ɓarɛ yaa ri bii. Rɛɛ suru shi kpang ri ti nwangnɛ ri yaa zang bii.

A zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ri daarɛ gari gari ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nwángsɛ̀ suru shi kpang kaa jong nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dang mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Yɔɔ Yahudi ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siiba, ɓi zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kagn manziti ri pálɛ̀ vuu keɓe doo nɔngkɔ.
A suru shi kpang kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi Yeesɔ nung ɓi tɔ, n ti zi Bulu nung tɔ. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa rɛɛ wiya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ zaayi, yi ri, a ɓa kaka ɓarɛ nandon. Nyɔ ri zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ. A ri yurɛ ri nwangnɛ yeti gãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Ti shìng ri nyaa vuu waa nɛɛ bii piti piti.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Afisa, rɛɛ zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri tãa vuu keɓe katɔ nandon. Zang ri ti kaa vɔrɔ nandon, a zang dɔɔ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ kati.
Zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri álɛ́, ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ ka shoo zang piti.
Zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ paa ri sèerè labeenang ɓarɛ nandon, ri dɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɛɛ waa ka jĩng zang nandon. Zang gãrɛ nɛɛ naa zang mãlɛ́ rɛɛ labeenang keɓe daa nung Azurufa labang dakn laa ziti tu kopi.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Ruu Laa daa nɛɛ tĩng, a ti baa nɔng nandon.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, Bulu kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu sɔɔ nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya nɛɛ tipi Akaya wu daa kaa Urushalima. A ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N nɛɛ daa tɔ Urushalima, n daa katɔ, n daa zi Rooma.”
Shong zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu naa ka shonang ri ziti, Timoti nɛɛ Erasitu ka tĩng ka Makidoniya, a nwang kaa Asiya tɔkn tɔkɔlɔng.
Ka diki kaɓa, zang hàa nyaa dɔɔli ka Afisa ka ruu gbalang keɓe.

Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn sãa vuu nɛɛ azurufa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Dimitiriyu. Ri sãa gãa vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Aritimi ɓɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng tɔkɔlɔng hn nɛɛ azurufa. Shonang keɓe shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang nɛɛ wu, ri walɛ saka dɔɔli.
Dimitiriyu ɓáarɛ́ ri nyaa, a ti ɓaa nyaa jong ka zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ doo zɔ̃ng shonang keɓe kɔ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Jèe, nɔɔ zi tɔ ruu wàlɛ́ vuu naa ɓuru ka shonang keɓe kɔ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ jĩng manɛ, nɔɔ ti tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu palɛ tɔ. Kɔɔyi nɛɛ vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ shɔnzang pálɛ̀ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring. Zang dɔɔli ri ta ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka Afisa keɓe nɛɛ tipi Asiya nandon.

Naa ruu nɛɛ palɛ waasɛ̃ kpang zang ɓáa shonang ɓuru keɓe kaa nung shi kpang. Wu ti nɔngkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nàá jaa gãa ɓuru, Aritimi ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔɔli keɓe, gãa ɓiɓɛ zang risi ɓi tɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang ti làsɛ́ bannang ɓɔɔ zang a wu kaa tɔ. Vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang bang wu katɔ, ka tipi Asiya nɛɛ koo nandon ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, ri gaayu nyaa gɔɔnang, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Aritimi vuu gãnti zang Afisa wukɔ bang.”

Nɔng shoo tãanang ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ ka gari kpang. Zang gari ri yuku ri daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ka gari ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ gbete. Zang ti gɔ̃ɔ Gaayu nɛɛ Arisitaku zang Makidoniya ɓɔɔ ri ra doo nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, zang daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng bìí.
Bulu kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu kaɓa jong, a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri zãa wu daanang.
Zang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri wusang Bulu, ri shong nyaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu a ka nɔng kɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓee kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri zi naa zɔɔ takpang, zang ri goo nyaa nɛɛ hn, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ hn, zang dɔɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀, a zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zang Yahudi ri dɔ̃ Alezanda nɛɛ wu daa shii ka tĩng zang, wu rang yee nɛɛ zang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang kpalɛ yuu ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. A Alezanda tuu naa ka lapa nɛɛ tɔɔ zang vɔ̃ nyaa kati, tɔ̀ɔ, wu rang zang yee kati.
Ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ nɛɛ wu zang Yahudi, ri goo nyaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka lapa sasak dàa áwà ziti katɔ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Aritimi vuu gãnti zang Afisa wukɔ bang.”

Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ bèé zang laa ka gari ɓɛɛ, naa palɛ tɔ zang vɔ̃ nyaa tɔ, a rang ri yee tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang gari Afisa ɓɛɛ, ɓu wi zi kpang nɛɛ gari Afisa kɔ gãng jĩng ka gãa vuu gãnti Aritimi, a ɓɔɔ ti tari ɓɔɔ watɛ nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ, kpang wiya?
Zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa vuu keɓe kagn kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ vɔ̃ nyaa, nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu hakaka kpang.
Nɔɔ átɛ̀ rɛɛ zang keɓe ka nihn, ri ɓɔ̀ɔ wu vuu ka gãa vuu gãnti kpang, ri ti dãa nàá jaa gãa ɓuru katɔ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Dimitiriyu nɛɛ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, ri nɛɛ mang zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka yeti, ri daa ɓaa nyaavaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn.
Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kpãa nɔɔ kagn ka bm, ruu ti ɓaa nyaa ka zang gari ri kpalɛ, zang wu tãa ruu manɛ.

Naa ruu palɛ waasɛ̃ kpang, zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu rúu nɛɛ ruu shingnɛ zang hàá nyaa ka ruu vuu kɔ nɔɔ palɛ lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ ɓee. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ ruu haa nyaa keɓe kagn kpang. Naa zang hɛ̃ɛ ruu, nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zang kagn waasɛ̃, ka ruu vuu keɓe kpang.”
Kɔɔ ruu tɔ naa weɓe, a jee ri nyaa nɛɛ zang sãtɛ ta.
Nyaa ɓɔɔ zang haa ɓɛɛ naa kaa tɔ, a Bulu shong nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ ri arɛ. Mã ri danggn, a jee ri nyaa nɛɛ wu daa kaa tɔ. A yaa ri, daa kaa tipi Makidoniya.
Riki tipi keɓe, mã ri danggn tɔ gbãng gbãng, a yaa ri daa kaa gari Heleni.

Nwang ka Heleni shala taati. Bɛ̀ɛ́ kpalɛ bii kana nɛɛ wu vang laana wu daa kaa tipi Siriya a zirɛ zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ tɔ, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya wu gbãayu.
Soopata jaa Firifu, yɔɔ gari Beriya daa nɛɛ wu, a ɓɔɔ zang gari Tesalonika rɛɛ Arisitaku nɛɛ Sakundu, nɛɛ Gaayu yɔɔ gari Daabe, nɛɛ Timoti a ɓɔɔ kaa rɛɛ Tikiku nɛɛ Torofimu zang tipi Asiya.
Ri daa ɓarɛ ka tĩng, ri daa gã ruu ka Torowasa.
Ruu vang laana ka Filipi bɛ̀ɛ́ zang shaa nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang tɔ. Ruu naa ĩi ri ka Torowasa, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri roo tɔ ka nɔng, diki ɓarɛ daa maani. Ruu nwáng ka nihn diki manziti.

Ka Diki Ɔ̃sɔnang nɛɛ laarang, ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ ruu tɔɔ ruu shaa borodi, a Bulu rang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ yee, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔɔ nɔng nɛɛ gãntɛ tɔ, wu daa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Rang ri yee sasak gãmbang zĩi a nɛɛ mani.
Waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn dɔɔli ka yeti gãa lapa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.

A yɔɔ jasang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Afitiko nwang ka nyaa hangka ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka bii binting ɓɛɛ. A hingro kpãa wu ka ɓɔɔ Bulu dɔ̃ɔ ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi doo nɛɛ tĩng ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ hingro naa yi wu dɔ̃ɔ gbete, a watɛ kaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wukɔ duusu ka lapa daa kaa dakn taati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu wu, vɔ tɔ.
A Bulu shooro ka tipi daa watɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a kɔ̃ng wu. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang, ɓi doo ningkãari.”
Bulu gbãayu ka lapa a shá borodi shaayi. Rang zang yee nɔng gãntɛ nɛɛ mani a yupaa daa ɓi kati.
Á zang yɔɔ jasang keɓe, ri daa gãa kaa nɛɛ wu ningkãari. Ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli.
Ruu daa ɓuru kaa tĩng ruu vang laana ruu daa ka gari Aso, ruu tɔɔ ruu daa tuu Bulu ka nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu daa ɓi nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓee zɔɔ ka Aso, naa vang laana kati, a ruu daa kaa Mitileni.
Rùu yupaa nɛɛ laana, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ, ruu a tɔ ka Kiyosi. Ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ tɔkn, ruu a tɔ ka Sama. A ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔkn, ruu a tɔ ka Miletu.
Bulu kɔɔ ɓi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu tɛɛ ɓi nɛɛ laana wu daa ka Afisa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu kasɛ wu suukãng ka Asiya kpang ɓɛɛ. Làábii nɛɛ wu kasɛ wu shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima ka diki nyaalaa Pentiku.
Bulu shong nyaa nɛɛ Miletu nɛɛ zang daa ɓàa wu nyaa ka rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Afisa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔ, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n a ka tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ.
N palɛ shonang Kpanti Laa nɛɛ miiri ka jĩng mɛɛ, n lakɛ jĩng kpang. Ka yeti jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ n dangnɛ ka ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ n wàasɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kpang tɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka ɓɔɔ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ka jĩng zang piti, a n ti dṹng nɔɔ ɓɔɔ ka gãa gãa, n tùsú nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
N shaarɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang nyaa nandon, n tɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, ri a ka bii Laa. Ri shing danggn kaa bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ n daa kaa tɔ Urushalima. Suru Laa dɔ̃ɔ m nɛɛ n daayi, n ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang daa palɛ m ka nɔng kaɓa kpàng.
Suru Laa shaarɛ m nyaa ka gari ɓɔɔ n daa kagn piti, nɛɛ zang daa mã m ka sãa, zang ti dang m jĩng.

N ti tɔɔ m kpang nɛɛ suru bii mɛɛ daa naa vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ kpang. Ǹ kasɛ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shong m ɓɛɛ, n ti hangsɛ shonang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ a m nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Shonang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang rúu, ka yuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ́ zang ɓɛɛ.
“Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ n rakɛ ka teteng manɛ, n kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti roonang Laa ɓɛɛ, n zi tɔ, nɔɔ zi m takpang dòndòng.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe, kɔ́pɔ́ zĩi zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ́ kagn yuu mɛɛ kpang lɛɛkɔ (zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa gbalang keɓe, ruu mɛɛ hãa ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang).
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon, n zárɛ̀ doo kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa, a ri nɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ nwang jagãng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu hoo ri nɛɛ zĩi Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ, n nɛɛ daa tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa zaa wisi ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ri naa a ditɔ ka teteng manɛ. Gn manɛ kɔng ri kpang.
Ka teteng manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa risi ruu niizang ditɔ, wu nwang kaa naa sèé, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri gɔ̃ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri dũng kaa rikɔ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, danggn wu ning nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ka saa taati, n yaa ɓɔɔ n mangkɛ zang ɓu kpang. N mangkɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ piti, nɛɛ miiri ka jĩng mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
“N yaa nɔɔ tɔ, ka naa Laa nɛɛ yee ɓiɓɛ. Yee ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ bangnɛ wu ti a nɔɔ tĩnang tãanang ɓɔɔ wu shing zang ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ saka, kɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ, wu nɛ̀ɛ́ raa ɓɔɔ mɛɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ, n palɛ shonang nɛɛ naa mɛɛ keɓe, ń wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

N tusu nɔɔ ka vuu piti nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ shonang gbãng gbãng naa weɓe, nɔ́ɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ takpang naa ka bii. Danggn yee ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ tã̀a tĩnang, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a zang vuu, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang kɔ a mɔɔ jong katɔ.’ ”
Ɓɔɔ Bulu hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe, tang ka tipi, a gaa Laa nɛɛ ri nandon.
Ri káarɛ̀ kaa tɔ nandon ka ɓɔɔ ri jee wu nyaa daanang, a ri kɔ̃ng wu ɓɛɛ.
Yee ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri zi wu takpang dòndòng ɓɛɛ, kpãa ri ka yeti dɔɔli. Ri daa shing wu kaa nɔng laana.
Ruu jee ri nyaa, a ruu basɛ zɔɔ, ruu vang laana ruu daayi. Ruu sha dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu a ka gari Kosi. Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a ruu daa ka gari Rodesa, a ruu naa yupaa ruu daa gari Patara.
Ruu walɛ laana ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri tarɛ ri daa ka Fonishiya, a ruu vang kagn.
Ruu a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu zi gari Kuburu kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu yaa wu kaa ka nagang. Ruu daa ɓuru kaa tipi Siriya, ruu naa shooro ka gari Taya ka ruu ɓɔɔ laana wìtí zang vuu ka nihn kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ kagn ka nɔng, a ruu nwang nɛɛ ri diki manziti. Suru Laa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Bulu nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima kpang.

Ɓɔɔ diki paa yunang ɓuru a ɓiri, ruu yupaa ruu yi gbalang daanang ɓuru. Ri seepaa nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ soro ɓarɛ nandon, ri naa shing ruu. Ruu nwang tɔ nɛɛ ri, ruu yaa yeti gari tɔ, a ruu tang nɛɛ gutu ka nyaa waapo, ruu gaa Laa. Ruu jee zɔɔ nyaa, a ruu basɛ zɔɔ kati.
Ruu vang laana, a ri gbãayu, ri daa gãa ɓarɛ kati.
Ɓɔɔ ruu yi gbalang daanang nɛɛ gari Taya, ruu naa a ka gari Talamaya. Ruu jee zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɛɛ. Ruu roo ka nɔng ɓarɛ diki gbete.
Nɔng naa gãntɛ ruu yupaa ruu daa Kayisariya. Ruu daa ka yeti gãa Filibu ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ, ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ. Filibu kagn teteng zang manziti ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ zang soro dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ zang gee ri gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓaarɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa.
Ruu nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ diki ɓuru bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Agabu ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ tipi Yahudi.

Ɓɔɔ wu a ka bii ɓuru, tuu guruji ɓɔɔ Bulu mã sãng nɛɛ mani, mã doo nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Suru Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima, ri daa mã zang guruji keɓe doo naa weɓe kɔ, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ ruu tãa naa weɓe, ruu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ruu gàa Bulu nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima takpang.

A kasɛ ruu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ palɛ ɓu vi, nɔɔ káarɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ lɔɔrɔ m sisĩng viya? N daa Urushalima keɓe m katɔ. Ri nɛɛ kasɛ ri mã m katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu nung Kpanti Yeesɔ, n kasɛ m tɔ.”
Ta yee ɓuru kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa wu. Ruu kɔɔ ɓuru kati nɛɛ, “Laa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Ruu nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ diki bee ruu tɔkɔlɔng, a ruu kpalɛ vuu ɓuru, ruu yi gbalang Urushalima daanang kati.

Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Kayisariya, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing ruu, ri atɛ ruu ka gãa yɔɔ gari Kuburu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Manasong ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ruu nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Yɔɔ keɓe, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu Laa dũnnang doo pati ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ruu shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri ta ruu waasɛ̃.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ Bulu daa nɛɛ ruu ka bii Yakub, zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng nandon.
Bulu jee ri nyaa, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe gbete gbete nandon.

Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri dɔɔ Laa. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Manzung ɓuru, mɔɔ zi tɔ waa, zang labang dɔɔli ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa ka teteng zang Yahudi, ri ti pĩiri jĩng nɛɛ nyaa dannang Laa dũnnang kpang.

Ri ti tãa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ takpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ ri yee wujɛ ɓarɛ shaa kpang, nɛɛ ri dũ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu kpang.
Ruu palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Ri tã̀á nyaa katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ a tɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ keɓe. Zang varɛ ri kagn ka nihn dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ri tũng vuu ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ.

Daa nɛɛ ri, mɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang pálɛ̀, tɔɔ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔkn ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ. Mɔkɔ mɔɔ shu vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shu ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang kpɛ̃ɛ ri yuu kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kati nandon, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ri ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓi niizang kpang. Nɛɛ mɔɔ dũng ɓaa doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa Laa kãntang ɓɛɛ, nyaa ɓuru daa gbete, a ruu bee ri laa tɔ nɛɛ ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, ri shaa zĩi kpang, ri ti shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ kpang, ri ti rooro nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ soro ɓarɛ kpang, kpang.”
