A Bulu daa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe. Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang pálɛ̀, tɔ̀ɔ, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ. A daa kaa yeti Gãa Laa nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang diki ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa vuu vaa kagn ka ruu zang ɓu ɓɛɛ.
Diki manziti bìí yaa ka tɔkɔlɔng waa nyaa kaa tɔ, a zang Yahudi tipi Asiya, ri zi Bulu ka yeti Gãa Laa. Ri zàrɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, a ri yi wu.

Ri gòo nyaa nɛɛ “Zang Isirela nɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii. Wee yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tusu vuu nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, nɛɛ zang ri kasɛ ruu zang ɓuru kpang, nɛɛ zang ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ kpang, kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu Gãa Laa keɓe. Palɛ wu ti vuu keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, átɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ka yeti Gãa Laa keɓe. Shing tɔ nihn nwang nɔng shi kpang tɔ ka jĩng Laa.”
Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri zi Torofimu yɔɔ tipi Afisa nɛɛ Bulu ka gari ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa átɛ́ yɔɔ tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa.
Gari nandon, nɔng shoo tãanang ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang. Zang ri yuku nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri arɛ, ri yi Bulu ri gɔ̃ wu, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti Gãa Laa. A zang tantɛ nyaa gãa kulunang.
Ri nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu kaa vɔrɔ, a nyaa daa ka shoo zang bang sɔɔja Rooma nɛɛ zang haa nyaa kana ka gari Urushalima nandon.
Zang bang sɔɔja tantɛ rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja seenang nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ, a daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ri zi zang bang sɔɔja nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri yaa Bulu nyɔnang.
Zang bang sɔɔja bìí daa ka bii Bulu naabm a yi wu. Kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang ri mã wu nɛɛ soo saka ziti. A hɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓu wiya, á palɛ zang viya?”

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri goo nyaa ka lapa, zang ɓu kɔɔ náabm̀, zang ɓu kɔɔ náabm̀. Ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ ri hàa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, zang bang sɔɔja tãa dĩiri ruu bìí kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang dita nɛɛ Bulu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Bulu a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nàalɛ́ doo kagn zang vangnɛ zang daa ka yeti nɔng gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɛɛ, sɔɔja ri tuu wu katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri sèé gnvɔ kana dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri a kana knti ɓarɛ ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ta.”

Yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ ri shɛ̃ɛ kaa nɛɛ Bulu ka nɔng gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja, a Bulu hɛ̃ɛ zang bang sɔɔja tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kàsɛ́ tɔ, n rang mɔɔ yee ya?” A zang bang sɔɔja kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “A ɓeekpang mɔɔ zunung nyaa Heleni ɓaa katɔ ya?”
“Wu mɔkɔ yɔɔ tipi Masara ɓɔɔ sɔɔ zang tĩng zang haa nyaa ka nihn, a mɔɔ see zang ɓɔɔ ri haa nyaa labang dɛ̃ɛti mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri ka jĩngti kpang ya?”
A Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N m zang Yahudi, zang yi m ka gari Taasu ka tipi Silisiya. Zang zi gari ɓuru tɔ dɔɔli. Yàa m gbalang jong n ràng zang kɔ ri kpalɛ ɓee yee.”
Zang bang sɔɔja yàa wu gbalang, a shii ka yupaa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang vang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A wii zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ naa. Ri vɔ̃ nyaa tɔ, a Bulu rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa zang Yahudi tɔɔ:
“Rɛɛ manzung, nɛɛ rɛɛ daa mɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ka ruu kɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓee.”
Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa Yahudi, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̃ɔ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ:

“N zang Yahudi. Zang yi m ka gari Taasu ka tipi Silisiya, n bang kaa Urushalima ka nihn. N bee laa ka bii Gamaliyel, zang tusu m nyaa dannang rɛɛ dabang ɓuru gbãng gbãng. N ti kasɛ nɛɛ n pàlɛ́ Laa shonang gbãng gbãng naa wee nɔɔ palɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓee.
N dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng gbalang keɓe jĩng, n nyɔ̀kɔ̀ ri ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ. N yiki zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro n mã ri, n looro ri ka sãa.

Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ katɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ ri ɓɛɛ. N ta labeenang ka naa ɓarɛ kɔ nɛɛ n daa a rɛɛ manzung ɓuru zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Damasiku ɓɛɛ. Ǹ daa ka nɔng kaɓa, nɛɛ n daa yiki rɛɛ zang keɓe, ń mã ri nɛɛ saka, n atɛ ri ka Urushalima, tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa dang ri jĩng.
“N daa kana, n a tɔ ka Damasiku naabm, bɛ̀ɛ́ laa kaa dãngdãng yuu. Nɔng yakɛ nɛɛ lapa kiiri m nyaa ka teteng tantɛnang.
N watɛ ka tipi, a n tãa yee ɓaa m nyaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ, ‘Shaawulu, Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jĩng vi nɔngkɔ viya?’
A n hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, ‘Ɓu mɔkɔ wiya Kpanti.’ Kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang m jĩng ɓɛɛ.’
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ri zi nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ, a ri tãa yee zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ n kaa takpang.
N hɛ̃ɛyi n tɔɔ, ‘A ń palɛ ɓu kaa viya Kpanti.’ A Kpanti kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka yeti gari Damasiku, zang daa kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ka nɔngkɔ.’
Jĩng mɛɛ zi nɔng takpang, ka ruu nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ keɓe, a zang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ n, ri yi m kaa naa ri daa nɛɛ n ka Damasiku.
“Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari Damasiku zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya. Dṹng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng, zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ka gari kaɓa, ri rang ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ.
A ka bii mɛɛ, a naa shii ka kagn mɛɛ, a kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Manzung Shaawulu, jĩng ɓaaɓɛ wu zi nɔng ta tɔkn.’ N tantɛ nɔng zinang, a n zi wu kati.
Kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Làá rɛɛ dabang ɓuru zɔ̃ng mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ ti tãa ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ naa nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa kɔɔ zang piti ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka yuu vuu kɔ mɔɔ zirɛ a mɔɔ ti tãa ɓee.
Mɔɔ gã ɓu kaa vi kãntang viya? Yupaa zang palɛ mɔɔ batizima, zang kɔsɔ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓàa nung ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’
“N gbãayu n daa Urushalima. N gàá Laa ka yeti Gãa Laa, a n rɔ̃kɔ.
N zi Kpanti Laa rang yee kana, a kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Shing doo gn, mɔɔ nwangnɛ mɔɔ yaa Urushalima, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tà ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa kɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu mɛɛ kpang.’
N kɔɔ wu n tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ n daarɛ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang n yiki zang, a n ti nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ.
Ka ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Istifanu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ vɔrɔ, n ka nɔng. Nyaa mɛɛ kagn, nkɔ ti gãng jĩng ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.’
A Kpanti kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Dita, N shong mɔɔ ka nɔng beebang, ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.’ ”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri ɓàa Bulu shoo sasak, ɓɔɔ naa kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nwang ningkãari kpàng.”
Ri gòó nyaa kana, ri ti wiiri fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kana lapa, a ri ti vang zũng tapuru ka lapa.

Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja Rooma kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri dita nɛɛ Bulu ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang Yahudi, ri haa nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang mã wu, zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ wu kaa tɔ, a Bulu hɛ̃ɛ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ shii ka nɔng naabm tɔɔ, “Nyaa daanang kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang Rooma, nɔɔ ti dɔng wu ruu ka takpang ɓɛɛ ya?”
Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja tãa naa weɓe, daa ka bii zang bang ɓarɛ, daa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓu viya? Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang Rooma.”
A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja daa ka bii Bulu daa hɛ̃ɛ wu, tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m jong, mɔɔ zang Rooma ya?”
Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn.”
A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N hoo nwannang zang Rooma mɛɛ m nɛɛ saka dɔɔli.” Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang yi m nɛɛ mani.”

Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri tɔɔ ri nyɔ Bulu, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe ri gɔ̃ɔ bii nɛɛ knti tantɛnang. Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaa vɔrɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu naa zirɛ nɛɛ Bulu ɓi zang Rooma ɓɛɛ, a wu ti mã wu nɛɛ soo saka ɓɛɛ.

Zang bang sɔɔja keɓe, kasɛ nɛɛ wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri haa Bulu nyaa kagn bii, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri nwáng ka tipi. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang kãlɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang mã Bulu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, zang atɛ wu nɛɛ wu shii ka tĩng ɓarɛ nandon.
Bulu shù zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu jĩng ka bii, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n palɛ shonang ka tĩng Laa nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ kalang kalang, a nɛɛ mani lɛɛkɔ keɓe.”
A Hananiya, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shii nɛɛ Bulu naabm nɛɛ wu nyɔ Bulu naa ka kashoo kpãng.

Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Laa nyɔ mɔɔ ditɔ jong, wukɔ mɔɔ nwang naa bii binting ɓɔɔ zang nwãa kponsi puru kagn ɓi. Mɔɔ nwang ka nɔng keɓe nɛɛ mɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ m ruu, naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓée kpang mɔɔ ta nyaa dannang ɓaa katɔ, mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang nyɔ m.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shii nɛɛ Bulu naabm ri kɔɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ dãa zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi wu kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ ya?”

A Bulu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n zi kpang nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Mɔ́ɔ rang ruu shi kpang, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ kpang.’ ”

Bulu zirɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe vaa ɓarɛ ziti. Nyaa dang gbete zang Saduki, nyaa dang gbete ɓi kaa rɛɛ Farisi. A mɛɛ nyaa ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n zang Farisi, n ti jaa rɛɛ Farisi. Zang nɛɛ zang jɛ̃ɛ m ruu ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ zang naa seepaa ditɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ vuu keɓe hn, rɛɛ zang Farisi nɛɛ zang Saduki ri gaayu nyaa haanang nɛɛ zɔɔ, a ri basɛ zɔɔ kati.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Saduki ri kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang naa yupaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ sàa kpang, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nɛɛ rɛɛ suru, ri ɓarɛ ti kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang Farisi ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu taati keɓe kagn nandon.

Ri haa nyaa kana nabm, a zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa dannang Laa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka vàá zang Farisi kɔ doori ɓɛɛ, ri shii paa, ri laa nyaa ka yuu ruu keɓe nabm, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓuru kpang. A nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, kɔ́ suru nɛɛ rang wu yee, nɔɔ zi tɔ ya?”

Ri haa nyaa kaa nɛɛ gnvɔ ning, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ lɔɔsɔ Bulu. Kɔɔ rɛɛ zang sɔɔja nɛɛ ri dita ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri ta Bulu nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ zĩi kpanti Yeesɔ naa shii ka kagn Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mã danggn kagn. Mɔ̀ɔ kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ka yuu mɛɛ ka Urushalima keɓe, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ditɔ nɔngkɔ tɔkn ka Rooma.”
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ zang Yahudi ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ, a ri tũng zɔɔ vuu nɛɛ naa ri nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri ti ɓoo mii kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ keɓe ri ɓa laa ziti katɔ.

A ri daa ka bìí rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu tũng zɔɔ vuu tɔ gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, nyaa ɓuru lèe vuu shaanang kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shong nyaa ta ka bii zang bang sɔɔja Rooma kãntang nɛɛ wu atɛ nɔɔ Bulu. Nɔɔ palɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Ruu kpalɛ bii tɔ, ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓuru kaa gbalang bɛ̀ɛ́ a nihn gn kpang.”
Jaa ɓɔɔ jaa nàá Bulu ɓɔɔ soro yi ɓɛɛ, tãa ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri waa Bulu ka gbalang ɓɛɛ, a daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ, daa kɔɔ Bulu.
A Bulu ɓaa nyaa ka yɔɔ sɔɔja gbete, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Daa nɛɛ jasang keɓe ka bii zang bang manɛ, daa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn.”

A yɔɔ sɔɔja daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka bii zang bang sɔɔja a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ka sãa zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, ɓa m nyaa kɔɔ m tɔɔ ń atɛ jasang keɓe ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ jasang keɓe nɛɛ wu kɔɔ mɔɔ kagn.”
A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja yi jasang bìí kaa naa, daa nɛɛ wu dang gbete, a hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ nwĩiri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ruu viya?”

A jasang bìí kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Yahudi ri mã zɔɔ nyaa tɔ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ mɔɔ, ɓuru mɔɔ atɛ Bulu ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri palɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃.

Mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ɓaa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kagn ri ɓa laa ziti katɔ, ri waa ka gbalang ri gã́ wu. Ri tũng zɔɔ vuu nɛɛ, ri nɛɛ nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri ti ɓoo mii kpang. Ri kpalɛ bii tɔ, ri gã ɓarɛ kaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang bang sɔɔja shaarɛ yɔɔ jasang nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ruu bìí tɔ kpang.” A kɔɔ yɔɔ nɛɛ wu dita.

A zang bang sɔɔja ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja ziti, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ sèe sɔɔja laa maani dakn ziti, a ɓɔɔ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri vang gbantang laa taati tu kopi, nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri yiti shalang ɓɛɛ laa maani dakn ziti. Ri kpalɛ bii, ri daa ka Kayisariya. Mɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔɔ yupaa daanang ka saka mandɛ̃ɛti nɛɛ zĩi keɓe.
“Mɔ́ɔ walɛ Bulu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu vang ɓɛɛ jong. Mɔɔ yiti wu tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ daa a Gɔmna Filiku wu.”
A bèe Gɔmna Filiku laa, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ:
Nkɔ Kaladiyu Lisiya, n bee mɔɔ zang bang Gɔmna Filiku labeenang keɓe. N jee mɔɔ nyaa.
Zang Yahudi ri yí yɔɔ keɓe, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu kaa vɔrɔ. N tãa nyaa nɛɛ wu zang Rooma, a n daa nɛɛ sɔɔja mɛɛ, n daa ta wu nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ.
N kasɛ nɛɛ n tãa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n daa nɛɛ wu ka bii zang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
N zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kɔ́ zang loo wu ka sãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓi ka gbalang nyaa dannang ɓarɛ.
N tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̃ wu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔrɔ kaa mɔkɔ.
Rɛɛ sɔɔja ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri tuu Bulu nɛɛ zĩi, ri daa nɛɛ wu sasak, ri daa ka gari Antipatiri.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ra nɛɛ doo, ri gbãayu. Ri yaa kaa rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ vang ka gbantang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ri daa nɛɛ wu.
Ri daa nɛɛ wu ka Kayisariya, ri daa a Gɔmna labeenang bìí, a ri a wu Bulu kaa naa.
Gɔmna gã labeenang bìí, a hɛ̃ɛ Bulu nɛɛ wu zang tipi kiya? Zang kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu yɔɔ tipi Silisiya.
A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ri nɛɛ a tɔ, tɔɔ n tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang daa nɛɛ Bulu ka gãa kpanti Hiridu, zang gã wu katɔ.

Diki ɓa tɔ maani, a Hananiya kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, daa ka Kayisariya nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang bang bang zang Yahudi nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ daa rang ri yee ɓɛɛ, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Tatulu. Ri daa ka bii Gɔmna Filiku, ri kɔɔ wu ruu ɓarɛ ka yuu Bulu.
Zang ɓaa Bulu nyaa, a Tatulu gaayu ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu Bulu tɔɔ:
“Zang bang Filiku, diki bee tɔ ruu tãa tĩnang nwannang nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔkɔ ti pálɛ̀, a zang atɛ rɛɛ vuu shɔɔ ka ruu tipi keɓe.
Zang tipi keɓe ri ta vuu keɓe tɔ ka nɔng piti piti. Ruu kɔɔrɔ ruu vuu keɓe diki diki, a ruu ti zã̀a mɔɔ tɔ gbãng gbãng.
N suu mɔɔ kãng takpang. N gàá mɔɔ, palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, mɔ́ɔ tãa ruu tɔkɔlɔng kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee.
Ruu zirɛ yɔɔ keɓe, kpãa zang dɔɔli, shing zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka koo piti nɛɛ ri haa nyaa. Wukɔ ti zang bang rɛɛ vàá zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang Nazara ɓɛɛ.
Kasɛ nɛɛ wu risi Gãa Laa wu nwang kaa nɔng shi kpang, a ruu yi wu. [Bɛɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu dɔng wu ruu naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ.]
A zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Lisiya ɓɛɛ, naa ta wu ka naa ɓuru nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning.
“A Lisiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa, ri a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Naa mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu, kɔɔ mɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu kɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, niizang kɔ nwani.”
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ri kasɛ nyaa jong kagn, nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu kɔɔ ɓee nɔngkɔ niizang.
Gɔmna tusu Bulu naa nɛɛ wu rang yee ta. A Bulu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ saa ɓaaɓɛ bée tɔ, mɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka tipi keɓe. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tĩnang tãanang.
Naa mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang, zang kɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ diki daa kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ n daa Laa bannang ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
Ri ĩi m gngn n laa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa kpang. N ti shing zang gngn ri laa nyaa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, kɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari kpang.
Naa mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ ri tusu mɔɔ vuu gbete ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ vuu kɔ ri ɓàá m nyaavaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee niizang kɔ nwani, ri tusu mɔɔ kpang.

N kàsɛ́ nyaa katɔ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, n bang Làá rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ka gbalang kɔ ri ɓaa nɛɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ. N ti shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ labeenang rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa.
N ti shing danggn m doo nɔngkɔ, ka bii Laa, naa ɓɔɔ zang keɓe ri shing ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ zang shi kpang, Laa naa wisi ri paa katɔ nɛɛ sàa.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɛɛ diki diki n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa nɛɛ tĩng shɔnzang piti.
“Saa mɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng n daa Urushalima kpang. Wee n nɛɛ daayi, n tɔɔ n daa a rɛɛ zang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ, ń ti dɔɔ Laa vuu vaa.
N palɛ vuu keɓe kɔ, a ri naa ĩi m ka yeti Gãa Laa, bɛ̀ɛ́ n hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa tɔkn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Bɛɛ zang kpalɛ ka bii mɛɛ kpang. Zang ti haa nyaa kpang.
Bɛɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ tipi Asiya ri ka nɔng. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ri a ta jong, ri ɓaa m nyaavaa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri nɛɛ zirɛ n nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ ti nɔngkɔ kpang, zang keɓe ri kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ zang daa nɛɛ n ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi ruu gbete ɓɔɔ n mɛ́ɛ nyaa ka teteng ɓarɛ n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓàa m nyaavaa ka bii manɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ nɛɛ, zang naa yupaa ditɔ nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.’ ”
Filiku zi ruu Gbalang keɓe tɔ gbãng gbãng ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bang sɔɔja Lisiya nɛɛ a tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa dɔng nɔɔ ruu manɛ.” A di nyaa ruu ɓarɛ tãanang kaa nɔngkɔ.
A kɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ Bulu ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu shing zang, zang gã Bulu waasɛ̃, zang yaa wu katɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ti yáa rɛɛ ɓeesang ri pàlɛ̀ wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng Filiku a nɛɛ ɓeeso Durusila ɓɔɔ ɓi zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ. A shong nyaa nɛɛ zang atɛ Bulu, a ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu, ka ruu danggn shinnang ka bii Kirisi Yeesɔ.

Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang yiti yuu zang waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Filiku kaa vɔrɔ, a kɔɔ Bulu tɔɔ, “Dita gbongkarɛ, n nɛɛ walɛ diki tɔ, n ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ditɔ tɔkn.”
Shing danggn ɓi tɔɔ naa Bulu a wu saka, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓáarɛ̀ wu nyaa rangkɛ yee nɛɛ wu.
Saa naa ɓa tɔ ziti, a Borokiya Fesitu naa nwang kpanti ka nɔng Filiku. Filiku kasɛ nɛɛ zang Yahudi ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yaa Bulu ka sãa ka nɔngkɔ.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ diki Fesitu daa taati tɔ ka tipi kaɓa, yupaa nɛɛ Kayisariya daa ka Urushalima.
Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi, ri atɛ ruu Bulu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri gaa Fesitu nɛɛ,
wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ jong, wu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang atɛ Bulu ka Urushalima. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kaa gbalang ɓɛɛ.
Fesitu kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang mã Bulu ka sãa ka Kayisariya, n ti daa kaa doo nɔngkɔ.
Zang bang bang manɛ ɓɔɔ ri dṹng m, ri daa nɛɛ n ka Kayisariya ri daa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.”
Fesitu nwang nɛɛ ri diki daa mantaati kɔ́ kopi katɔ, a daa Kayisariya kati. Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a nwang ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang atɛ wu Bulu.

Zang atɛ Bulu tɔ, a zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng. A ri gaa tɔɔsung ruu shi kpang dɔɔli kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ tĩng nyaa tãanang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kagn gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tùsú zang nɛɛ ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ kpang.
Bulu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ta nyaa dannang zang Yahudi kpang, wu ti ɓɔɔ lasɛ Gãa Laa kpang, n pàlɛ̀ wu kpanti Rooma vuu shi kpang, kpang.”
Fesitu kasɛ nɛɛ zang Yahudi ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu nɔngkɔ, hɛ̃ɛ Bulu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ katɔ mɔɔ daa Urushalima, zang daa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka tĩng mɛɛ ɓɛɛ ya?”
Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N shii ka tĩng rɛɛ zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang Kayisa kɔ, wee ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ jɛ̃ɛ m ruu kagn kɔ nwani. Mɔɔ zi tɔ n pàlɛ̀ rɛɛ zang Yahudi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.

Naa n ta nyaa dannang, kɔ́ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ tɔ, n tɔ́ɔ kpàng nɛɛ n yuu vɔrɔ kpang. Nyaavaa kɔ ri ɓaa m nɛɛ niizang kpang, n zi zang ɓɔɔ a ri n kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ zang daa nɛɛ ruu mɛɛ ka tĩng Kayisa.”
Fesitu rang yee tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ, a naa kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ Kayisa wu daa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu, mɔɔ daa kaa bii Kayisa kɔ.”
Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a kpanti Agiripa nɛɛ Banike ri a ka Kayisariya nɛɛ ri naa jee Fesitu nyaa, ɓɔɔ wu à ka tipi kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
Diki ɓarɛ bee tɔ ka Kayisariya tɔkɔlɔng, a Fesitu kɔɔ kpanti ruu Bulu kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn Filiku yaa wu ka sãa.
Ɓɔɔ n daa ka Urushalima, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ri kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ri tɔɔ n nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.

A n kɔɔ ri nɛɛ zang Rooma ri palɛ ɓarɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ri a zang, zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nyaavaa wu waati nɔngkɔ kpang. Ri átɛ̀ ri ɓarɛ gbongkarɛ nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang yàa wu gbalang wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nyaavaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
“A ri naa arɛ ka nihn ka nyaa zɔɔ. N suukãng kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ, n nwang ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, a n tɔɔ zang atɛ yɔɔ bìí.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa ri shii paa, ri kɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ n shing danggn, n tɔɔ naa ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang,
ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓarɛ ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ ri laa nɛɛ wu ka gbalang Laa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ti ka yuu yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ, a Bulu kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ɓi doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
N zi naa ɓɔɔ n kãa dĩiri ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n hɛ̃ɛ Bulu n tɔɔ wu kasɛ tɔ wu daa ka Urushalima, zang daa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ka nɔngkɔ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
Bulu gaa m nɛɛ zang mã wu ka sãa, Kayisa wu daa tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ. A n kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang mã wu ka sãa ka nɔngkɔ. N naa dɔ̃ wu ditɔ ka bii Kayisa.”
Agiripa kɔɔ Fesitu tɔɔ, “N kasɛ n tãa yɔɔ bii nɛɛ shoo mɛɛ.”
Fesitu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓuru mɔɔ tãa wu ditɔ.”

Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a Agiripa nɛɛ Banike ri a nɛɛ zang ka knti ɓarɛ zingkãng zingkãng. Rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja, nɛɛ zang bang bang gari ri daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu kagn ɓɛɛ. A Fesitu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri atɛ Bulu ta.

Fesitu kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti Agiripa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ ruu ka nihn nandon, nɔɔ zi yɔɔ keɓe ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi nandon ɓàa wu nyaavaa ka bii mɛɛ ka nihn nɛɛ Urushalima. Ri goo nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang yaa yɔɔ keɓe ningkãari kpàng.
“N zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu ti palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ m kpang. Wee wukɔ ti gaa m nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang dɔ̃sɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka bii Agɔsitu ɓee, n ti kasɛ tɔ n dɔ̃ wu ka bii ɓiɓɛ.

N ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɔɔ naa n bee Kayisa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n atɛ wu ka tĩng manɛ. N atɛ wu ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ gbɛ̃̀tì gbɛ̃̀tì, kpanti Agiripa. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kãa dĩiri ruu bìí tɔ, tɔɔ n walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n bee ɓɛɛ kati.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zì naa ɓɔɔ n dɔ̃̌ zang, zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, n zì vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ n bee zang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, kpang ɓɛɛ.”
A Agiripa kɔɔ Bulu kati tɔɔ, “Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang tɔ, rang yee ɓaaɓɛ ta.”
Bulu wii naa ɓiɓɛ ka lapa, a gaayu ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔɔnang tɔɔ,
“Kpanti Agiripa, n zirɛ nyaating mɛɛ pu dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n walɛ gbalang n kɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri kɔɔrɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ka tĩng ɓaaɓɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ti nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ zi gbalang zang Yahudi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tusu tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa mɔɔ mɔ́ɔ mã danggn, mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu mɛɛ waasɛ̃.
“Naa ɓɔɔ n nwangnɛ tĩng shɔɔnang bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo jasang ka teteng zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ti ka Urushalima, a à nɛɛ mani ka lɛɛkɔ keɓe, zang Yahudi, ri zi tɔ nandon.

Naa ri tɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nwani, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang n m zang Farisi, vàá zang ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ vaa zang piti ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓuru ka jĩng ɓɔɔ ri shing ka gbalang Laa dũnnang ɓuru gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
Wee n shii ɓee, zang jɛ̃ɛ m ruu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.

Nyaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓuru kopi tu ziti, ri shing danggn nɛɛ Laa a ri, ka ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi piti ɓɛɛ. Kpanti, ka ruu danggn kɔ n shing ɓee kɔ, zang Yahudi ri kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudi, ka ruu vi danggn shinnang nɛɛ Laa wisi zang paa katɔ nɛɛ saa kpãa nɔɔ nɔngkɔ viya?
“N rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ m doo nɔngkɔ, n tɔɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zunung katɔ nandon, n zãa zang nung Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓaanang.
N palɛ nɔngkɔ ka Urushalima. Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri yaa m gbalang, a n mãlɛ zang Laa ka sãa dɔɔli. Ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ, n kàsɛ̀ nyaa kagn.

N shingnɛ zang dang ri jĩng ka rɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang diki diki. N pálɛ̀ ri nɔngkɔ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri kɔɔ vuu shi kpang ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kati. Yeti mɛɛ lasɛ nɛɛ ri gbãng gbãng, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dàarɛ́ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔgn, n daa dang ri jĩng ka nɔngkɔ.
“N palɛ naa weɓe kɔ, a diki ɓɔɔ kagn zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ri yàa m gbalang, a ri a m nyaa shonang ɓarɛ nɛɛ n daa ka Damasiku.
Kpanti, n daa kana ka gbalang bɛ̀ɛ́ laa kaa dãngdãng yuu, a vuu yakɛ nɔng nɛɛ lapa. Nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ laa yakɛ katɔ. Yakɛ nɔng kiiri ruu nyaa ka teteng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.

“Ruu watɛ ka tipi nandon, a n tãa yee kɔɔ m nɛɛ nyaa Yahudi tɔɔ, ‘Shaawulu, Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jĩng ka ruu viya? Wee mɔɔ ta doo nɛɛ knti ɓee, kɔng ɓi doo mɔkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ napo nɛɛ ta laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓiɓɛ kpaa wu nɛɛ mani tɔ, kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.’
A n hɛ̃ɛyi n tɔɔ, ‘Ɓu mɔkɔ wiya, Kpanti.’ A Kpanti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang wu jĩng ɓɛɛ.
Yupaa mɔɔ shii doo paa. N nwang nyaa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ. N tɔɔ n zɔ̃́ng mɔɔ, mɔ́ɔ palɛ m shonang. Mɔɔ ti kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zirɛ lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n naa tusu mɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.
N ta mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ naa rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ n shong mɔɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.

Mɔ́ɔ pùu ri jĩng, ri yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ sheetang roo kpanti kagn, ri a ka bii Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii mɛɛ, Laa wu kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati. Wu ti a ri nɔng nwannang jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ngkɔ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.’
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kpanti Agiripa, n ta nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ n zi nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang n kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa ka Damasiku, a n ti daa kɔɔ ka Urushalima, a n ti riki tipi Yahudi nandon. N ti kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang jong n tɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri a ka bii Laa. Ri ti pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ zang Yahudi ri yi m ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n ka yeti Gãa Laa.
Làá kɔ yi m naa ka bii sasak, a nɛɛ mani ka lɛɛkɔ kɔ n kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ piti ɓee. N kɔɔ m doo vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa nɛɛ Musa ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ naa palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ Kirisi naa dang jĩng ditɔ, wukɔ ti naa yupaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ saa, wu kɔɔ rɛɛ zang Isirela nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ruu nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu kana naa weɓe, Fesitu shaa wu nɛɛ varɛ nɛɛ, “Bulu, mɔɔ shoko, láa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ bèe dɔɔli risi mɔɔ yuu kaa tɔ”.
A Bulu kasɛ Fesitu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang bang, yuu mɛɛ risi ka takpang, ruu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee ɓi niizang kɔ nwani.

Kpanti Agiripa n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu keɓe nyaa mɛɛ zaa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi vuu keɓe tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. N ti zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa shoo ɓaaɓɛ kagn gbete ka yeti ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang wáa katɔ zang palɛ vuu keɓe kpang ɓɛɛ.
Kpanti Agiripa mɔɔ shing danggn katɔ, ka bii rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ya? N zi tɔ mɔɔ shing katɔ.”
Agiripa kɔɔ Bulu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ka jĩng ɓaaɓɛ nwannang kɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ mɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓee, daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ risi m n nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Kirisi ɓɛɛ tɔ ya?”

Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa nwannang ɓuru bee katɔ kɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n gaa Laa m, n tɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ zang kɔ ri ɓaa shoo, ri tãa m lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ keɓe, ri nwang naa ɓɔɔ n nwang ɓɛɛ nandon. Wu naa ɓɔɔ zang mã m nɛɛ soo saka keɓe kpang.”
A kpanti, nɛɛ Gɔmna, nɛɛ Banike, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ri seepaa.
Ri daa tɔ, a ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, kɔ zang mã wu ka sãa ɓɛɛ kpang.”
A Agiripa kɔɔ Fesitu tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang daa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ka tĩng Kayisa kpang, ruu nɛɛ yaa wu naa katɔ.”

Zang naa kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ ruu daa tipi Italiya nɛɛ laana, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang a Yuliya zang bang sɔɔja Rooma, rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa ɓɛɛ. Yuliya ɓi ka teteng rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ “Sɔɔja Kayisa Agɔsitu ɓɛɛ.”

Ruu vang laana ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ gari Adaramitiya ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ. A ruu yupaa daanang kati Arisitaku yɔɔ gari Tesalonika ɓɔɔ ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ daa nɛɛ ruu ning.
Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, ruu shɛ̃ɛ gari Sidong. Yuliya palɛ Bulu tɔ̃ɔ. Yaa wu nɛɛ wu daa jee rɛɛ ɓeesang nyaa nɛɛ tɔɔ, ri a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu yaa gari Sidong. Jasung a nɛɛ bii ɓuru kɔ jong, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bã nɛɛ tipi Kuburu dang gbete ɓɔɔ jasung kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu tɛɛ ka yuu waapo naabm nɛɛ tipi Silisiya nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tipi Pamfiliya, a ruu a kaa gari Mira ɓɔɔ ka tipi Lisiya ɓɛɛ.
Yuliya yɔɔ sɔɔja ĩi laana gari Alezandiriya ka nihn ɓɔɔ daa ka tipi Italiya ɓɛɛ, a tɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn.

Laana daa lɛɛm lɛɛm a diki bee ruu kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung kpãa ruu nyaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A ruu naa a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Kinida naabm. Jasung zãa ruu daanang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bã tipi Karita dang gbete ɓɔɔ jasung kagn kpang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Salamone naabm ɓɛɛ.
Ruu dang jĩng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu sɔɔ nyaa gãnggãng naabm ɓɛɛ, a ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Nɔng nyaa waapo ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani.” Nɔng keɓe ɓi nɛɛ Lasiya naabm.
Ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ruu tɔɔ ruu daa nɛɛ laana, nwang naa ɓɔɔ ruu mãlɛ yuu ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ. A laa ɓɔɔ zang daa zanti kagn ti ɓa tɔ. A Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe tɔɔ,

“Rɛɛ masang, n zi tɔ daanang ɓuru keɓe vuu ɓɔɔ daa palɛ ruu katɔ ka gbalang, ruu ti vang vuu dɔɔli. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓuru nɛɛ laana keɓe kɔ lasɛ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu loo rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ katɔ ka teteng ɓuru.”
Yɔɔ sɔɔja raa shoo ɓi ka vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ kpang. Ɓaa shoo ɓi ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ laana ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Nɔng ɓɔɔ laana ri shiiri kagn kaɓa, ka laa pũngku shi kpang, a zang dɔɔli ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri yáa nɔng bii katɔ. Ri daa ka gari Fonisi ri daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ. Ka laa pũngku, Fonisi ɓi doo nɔng ɓɔɔ laana ri shiiri kagn ka tipi Karita ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka nɔng keɓe kɔ zang yi gbalang daanang nɔng ɓɔɔ ka paa nɔng ɓɔɔ laa nwang nyaa kagn nɛɛ nɔng ka dii nɔng ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn.

Jasung gaayu rãanang nɛɛ dii lɛɛm lɛɛm, a rɛɛ zang laana zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ri wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri zɔ̃ng laa ɓɔɔ ri mã laana kagn ɓɛɛ, a ri sɔɔ nɛɛ laana nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng waapo gari Karita naabm gbãng gbãng.
Knti ɓarɛ bee kpang, a jasung bang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yurokilido gaayu ranang nɛɛ Karita.

Jasung bìí naa waa laana ɓɔɔ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri raa laana jĩng ri daa nɛɛ bii jasung bìí takpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa laana bìí kaa gbã̀ágbãa, a jasung dɔ̃rɛ daa kaa nɛɛ mani.
Dàa sɔɔ nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ gari Kawuda ɓɔɔ waapo kiiri nyaa teteng ɓɛɛ naabm, ruu dang jĩng ka gbongkarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu ta jaa tonsi ɓuru nɛɛ naa jasung.

Ri gɔ̃ jaa tonsi ri a tɔ nɛɛ mani ka yeti laana a ri kãngtɛ soo ka tɔɔsung laana. Ri kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ jasung daa nɛɛ ri ka seseele ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Sariti ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo tipi Libiya naabm ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãlɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ri mã ka lapa nɛɛ jasung wu gɔ̃ ri nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Jasung dɔ̃ ri kaa waati.
Jasung bang ɓɔɔ ra ɓɛɛ shii kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ ri gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti laana vannang ka mii.
Ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati, ri vang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shonang nɛɛ mani nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ ka mii.
Diki bee tɔ, ruu zi làa kɔ rɛɛ sang kpang. Jasung ti ra ɓi doo naa gbãng gbãng. Ruu rɛ̃rɛ ɓuru takpang, nɛɛ ruu nwáng ditɔ ningkãari tɔkn kpang.

Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng ri shaa vuu shaanang ka nyaa kpang, a Bulu shii ka tĩng ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ masang naa nɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yupaa nɛɛ gari Karita kpang. Vuu kɔ ruu làsɛ́ a ruu looro ɓee, ruu nɛɛ palɛ kpang.
Kãntang keɓe n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn kagn, zang ɓɔɔ lòó yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn ka teteng manɛ gbete kpang. Nɔɔ lòó laana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zĩi, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ n zang ɓiɓɛ, a n ti bang wu ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Bulu, mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ daa shii ditɔ ka tĩng Kayisa. Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ti ta yuu rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti laana nandon ri vɔ kpang.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ masang, nɔɔ mã danggn kagn. N shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, vuu kɔ zang kɔɔ m ɓee, naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ”.
Jasung dɔ̃ ruu, daa nɛɛ ruu ka nyaa gãnggãng, nɔng ɓɔɔ waapo kiiri ka teteng ɓɛɛ, doo nɛɛ mani.
Ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓuru daa kaa kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti, jasung dɔ̃ ruu ka yuu waapo Adariya. Nɛɛ gãmbang zĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa ruu a tɔ ka tipi naabm.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri gãsɛ naa ɓɔɔ mii bee ka tipi dii ɓɛɛ. Ri zirɛ nɛɛ, mii bee ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang naa doo laa maani tu bmati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ruu daa ka tĩng tɔkɔlɔng ri gãsɛ tɔkn, ɓi kaa laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi.
Ri kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ laana ɓuru daa kpaa rɛɛ tari, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yàarɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ yi tonsi tɔ̀ɔ laana wu shii ɓɛɛ naa dɛ̃ɛti ka yeti mii. Ri yaarɛ naa nɛɛ knti laana kɔ jong. Ri wàa nɔng gãntɛnang katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri kãa gbalang nɛɛ ri yuu kaa tɔ, ri yaa laana, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yaa jaa tonsi naa ka mii. Ri pálɛ́ kaa naa ri yaarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yi laana tɔɔ wu shiiyi ɓɛɛ naa, nɛɛ tĩng ɓiɓɛ.
A Bulu kɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana keɓe ri nɛɛ nwàng ka yeti laana kpang, nɔɔ wɔ kpang.”
A sɔɔja ri dɔ́lɔ́ soo ɓɔɔ zang yi jaa tonsi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, a jaa tonsi daa ka mii.
Kaa nɛɛ yuu gãndi Bulu bakɛ ri nandon, nɛɛ ri shaa vuu shaanang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãng jĩng nɛɛ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ daa lee kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti nɔɔ ti shaa vuu ka nyaa kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang kpang nɔɔ nwàng ningkãari kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kagn teteng manɛ gbete kpang.”
Kɔɔ tɔ nɔngkɔ, a tuu borodi, zãa Laa ka tĩng ɓarɛ nandon. A shalɛ borodi, a gaayu shaanang kati.
Ri mã danggn a zang ɓu shaa kaa jong.
Ɓɔɔ ruu ka yeti laana nandon, ruu laa maani dakn ziti, tu laa taati tu kopi, tu mangbete.
Ri nandon ri shaa vuu shaanang tɔ, daa ri tɔ, a ri vãlɛ jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ alakama ɓɔɔ ka yeti laana ɓɛɛ ka mii, nɛɛ tɔɔ laana wu kpiti kaa takpang.

Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ, a ri zi tipi kaɓa nung kaa takpang. Ri zi naa waapo ɓɔɔ daa ka biling seseele kagn ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ zunung katɔ, ri raa laana jĩng wu daa shii ka yuu seseele kaɓa kɔ.

Ri dɔ́lɔ́ vuu ɓɔɔ yi laana, tɔ̀ɔ, laana wu shii ɓɛɛ, a ri yaarɛ naa. Vuu bii ri ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka mii. Ri ti kãlɛ rɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zaa laana nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri tuu sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang mã ka tĩng laana ka lapa nɛɛ jasung wu gɔ̃ laana kati. Ri raa jĩng ri daa kaa nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng bìí.
Laana vang ka yuu seseele a shiiyi. Ting laana bii tìi ka seseele, daa takpang. Jasung ɓɔɔ rãa ɓɛɛ, ti sãlɛ knti laana ɓi kana.
Sɔɔja ri tɔ̀ng zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti laana ɓɛɛ vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ zaarɛ ka mii, ri waa zaa mii, ri daa nyaa gãnggãng, ri yuku ɓɛɛ.

Zang bang sɔɔja kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu Bulu, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zãa ri nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang bìí vɔrɔ kpang. Kɔɔ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zunung zaa mii waanang tɔ, rikɔ ri gaayu shɔɔnang, ri zaa ka mii, ri waa zaa mii, ri daa nyaa gãnggãng.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti ri yiki naa ɓarɛ kaa laa yeenang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri yiki laa ɓɔɔ sãkɛ nɛɛ bii laana ri nwáng nyaa gãnggãng ɓarɛ kati ka knti ɓarɛ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nyaa gãnggãng nandon, vuu ɓɔɔ lee ruu naa bii kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ruu wɔ tɔ, a zang naa kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ zang ɓaa nɔng bìí nɛɛ Malita.
Zang nɔng bìí ri palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli. Mii a kana, a sɔɔrɔ ti si katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tee ruu waa. A ri ti jee ruu nyaa waasɛ̃.
Bulu kpalɛ sãnsãng laa a mãrɛ nɛɛ wu loo kaa waa. A sɔkɔ tãa waa, nwangnɛ yeti sãnsãng laa. A kengtɛ ka naa Bulu.
Ɓɔɔ zang gari Malita ri zi sɔkɔ ka naa Bulu, ri kɔɔrɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ kaɓa zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Wɔ tɔ nɛɛ waapo, shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang dṹng wu doo naa, vɔ ditɔ nɛɛ mani.”
Bulu wii naa, a sɔkɔ watɛ ka waa palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
Ri gã ɓarɛ kaa ɓɔɔ wu puuyi wu watɛ ka tipi tantɛnang wu vɔrɛ ɓɛɛ. Knti naa beeyi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ wu kpang, ri risi nyaa tɔɔ, yɔɔ keɓe ɓi vuu gãnti.
Ka nɔng kɛɓɛ, gãa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Babiliya, kpanti tipi Malita kagn nɔng naabm. Ta ruu waasɛ̃, ti a ruu vuu shaanang, a ruu nwang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ diki taati.
Daa Babiliya roo ka latãng bii nwãa wu, a yeti ti tɔ̃̀ɔrɔ wu katɔ. Bulu daa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wu roo ɓɛɛ, gaa wu Laa, a shìng wu naa ka bii, a vuu yaa wu nɔng.
Ɓɔɔ Bulu palɛ naa weɓe, zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari ri a nandon, a Bulu masɛ ri.
Ri alɛ rùu vuu dɔɔli. Ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu vang laana ruu tɔɔ ruu daa kaa tɔɔ, ri tɛ̃ɛ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ naa ruu kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ nandon.
Shala ɓa tɔ taati, a ruu naa vang laana ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ tipi Alezandiriya ɓɔɔ zang bee waa nyaating jaa bãnang varɛ ziti ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laana keɓe nwáng ka gari Malita nɛɛ guusi.
Ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ gari Sirakusa, a ruu roo ka nɔngkɔ diki taati.
Laana ɓuru naa yupaa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, a ka gari Rejiyu. Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ a jasung gaayu ranang nɛɛ dii. Ruu roo diki ziti, a ruu shɛ̃ɛ gari Putiyoli.
Ruu ĩi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng. Ri gaa ruu nɛɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ ri, diki manziti. A ruu naa seepaa kaa nɛɛ nihn ruu shɛ̃ɛ Rooma kati.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ ruu a tɔ, ri a sasak ri a ka Lumang Apiyu nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nɔng vuu shaanang taati ɓɛɛ, ri naa kpisi ruu ka nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ Bulu zi ri, zãa Laa, a mã danggn kati.
Ɓɔɔ ruu shɛ̃ɛ Rooma, zang yáa Bulu nɛɛ wu nwang ɓi ka bm nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã wu ɓɛɛ.

Diki ɓuru daa tɔ taati, a Bulu kpalɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ka gari ɓɛɛ. Ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n pálɛ̀ rɛɛ zang ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang. N ti shii bàng nɛɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru tusu ruu kpang. Zang mã m ka sãa ka Urushalima, a zang tuu m zang a zang Rooma.
Zang Rooma ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ m ruu, a ri nɛɛ ri yaa m naa kaa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ kpàng ɓɛɛ.
Zang Yahudi ri kasɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tɔɔ zang naa jɛ̃ɛ m ruu ka tĩng Kayisa. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n ti kɔɔ zang ka yuu zang mɛɛ kagn kpang.
N ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ n tɔɔ n rang yee nɛɛ nɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mã m nɛɛ saka keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.”

Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zang shong ruu nyaa gn nɛɛ labeenang nɛɛ tipi Yahudi ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ ri ti a kagn nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, nɛɛ ruu naa weɓe kpang. Ri ti kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang.
Ruu kasɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi tɔ zang ráng ruu nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ka ruu gbalang keɓe.”

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kà zɔɔ diki nɛɛ Bulu. Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ ri ka zɔɔ naa arɛ zang dɔɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Bulu nwàng kagn ɓɛɛ. Bulu nwangsɛ ri dĩiri ruu a ti kɔɔ ri ruu ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa nɛɛ gãndi sasak nɔng tɔɔ nɛɛ mani. Kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rang ri yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang Musa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta ɓarɛ kaa takpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri daayi, nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang. Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, a ri tantɛ, tɔɔ, “Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ,
“Suru Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
‘Daayi mɔɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe nɛɛ,
Nɔɔ ɓáa shoo, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, nɔɔ
zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ kpang.
Nɔɔ shu jĩng, nɔɔ shu jĩng,
Nɔɔ zi vuu kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti rɛɛ zang keɓe kpãa
nyaa ruu tanang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Ri nɔɔ shoo ɓarɛ tɔ,
ri ti mung jĩng ɓarɛ tɔ.
Jĩng ɓarɛ nɛɛ zi nɔng,
shoo ɓarɛ nɛɛ ti tãa ruu,
ri nɛɛ zi vuu nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ.
Ri nɛɛ gbãayu ka bii mɛɛ,
n nɛɛ masɛ ri.’ ”
A Bulu hangsɛ nyaa ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang, Laa shong nyaa tɔ nɛɛ mani ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti naa tãa ditɔ.”
[Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu keɓe naa weɓe, zang Yahudi ri daayi, ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka gbalang nɛɛ gnvɔ ning.]
Bulu nwang ka bm ka nɔngkɔ saa ziti, ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu shu saka katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ta zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ wu nyaa jeenang waasɛ̃.
Kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa. Ti tusu zang vuu ka yuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zãa wu ruu keɓe kɔɔnang kpang.
Labeenang keɓe, a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ n jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A n ti zang shonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zɔ̃ng m, a shing m nɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, Laa á nyaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ dòo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ka tĩng, nɛɛ bii rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ, a zang ti bee ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ.
Ruu keɓe, ɓi ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka bii shɔnzang, wu ɓi zɔ̃ng Dawuda.
Ka nwannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, Laa túsù nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
Laa a ruu gbalang nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a ruu nwàng zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, rúu gɔ̃ zang koolaa nandon ri shing danggn, ri ti dũng nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Rooma, nɔɔ jong kagn. Nɔɔ doo ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ri, nɛɛ ri nwang zang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bèé nɔɔ nandon laa keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka gari Rooma, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ, a zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ naa nwang zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ri yi nɔɔ naa ka bii, a ri ti shing yeti manɛ ri valɛ katɔ.
N gaayu, n zãa Laa mɛɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang koo nandon, ri rang ruu ka yuu danggn shinang manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ́ wu shonang, nɛɛ suru mɛɛ ka ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, zi tɔ nɛɛ n gaa wu ka ruu manɛ, n yaa diki kpang.
N gaayi, diki diki nɛɛ wu nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, wu yàa m gbalang jong, n daa leng jĩng ka nɔɔ diki wu bee takpang.
N kasɛ nɔɔ zinang katɔ gbãng gbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu mã nɔɔ danggn kati.
N tɔɔ, n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu mã nɔɔ zɔɔ danggn, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.

Manzung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe. N mang diki diki nɛɛ n daa leng nɔɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ zãa m kagn. N kasɛ n shing zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ, ri dũng Laa naa ɓɔɔ n wàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka teteng zang nimbang, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.
N m zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang piti shonang ɓɛɛ, zang Heleni nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Heleni kpang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bèe laa katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bèe laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, bii shaa m, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n naa rang nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa gari Rooma, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa jong.

Yusɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔɔnang tuu m kpang. Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Zang Yahudi kɔ shɔɔnang, wu tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ tusu zang naa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ, zang wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ danggn shinnang, wu waa nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, wukɔ walɛ suru bii.”
Gnvɔ Laa tusu bii tɔ nɛɛ lapa, ka yuu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ka yuu Laa kpang, nɛɛ yeti shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa dang ri jĩng ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa zang zi ka yuu Laa, ri zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tusu ri tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa mãa koo gn kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwannang ɓiɓɛ, ri zi tɔ gbayi gbayi. Zang ri zili vuu keɓe katɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri jãa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi Laa tɔ, a ri a wu bannang kaa takpang, nɛɛ wukɔ Laa kpang. Ri ti zã̀a wu kpang. A rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ sɔ̀ɔ gbalang kpang. A yeti ɓarɛ tɔɔyi, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
Ri tɔɔ ri zũng katɔ, a ɓeekpang, ri ɓarɛ shoko.
Ka ɓɔɔ ri nɛ̀ɛ́ bang Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dòndòng, ri bang ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ, nwàng naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, nɛɛ jaaning, nɛɛ yɔpɔ jĩngti, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri shoko nɔngkɔ, Laa yaa ri, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri pálɛ̀ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ.
Ri kɔ̃sɔ ruu niizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Laa nɛɛ sèé. Ri bang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mã̀ayi, a ri pálɛ̀ wu shonang, ri yaa Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu dòndòng ka nɔngkɔ. Nɔ́ngkɔ̀.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa yaa ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ɓarɛ ri yaa roonang nɛɛ zang varɛ, ri rooro kaa nɛɛ zang soro kɔ doori. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang pálɛ̀ gngn nɔngkɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Zang varɛ ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ri yaa roonang tɔ nɛɛ zang soro ri rooro kaa doo nɛɛ zang varɛ kɔ. Zang varɛ ri palɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dang ri jĩng naa ɓɔɔ dàá ri ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri yítì vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ zang zi ka yuu Laa ka yeti ɓarɛ kpang. Laa yaa ri tɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, tɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.

Yeti ɓarɛ ɓi gnvɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, ri kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɛɛ. Ri pàlɛ́ zɔɔ shi kpang. Ri kaa sũnyaa dɔɔli, ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, ri gaarɛ nyaa. A ri nwãarɛ zɔɔ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang ka yuu zang diki diki, ri rang zang.

Ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ, ri kasɛ Laa kpang, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔɔli, ri ti kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ. Ri nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri yi ri ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ri shoko, ri pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri kasɛ ruu zang kpang, gn zang ti kɔng ri kpang.

Ri zi tɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri huu shoo wu ka nɔng palɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ri tãa tĩnang zang ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ.

Masang, mɔɔ kɔɔ zang katɔ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ya? Naa mɔɔ doo zang kiya, daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ naa mɔɔ dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, a mɔɔ palɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, mɔɔ dɔng ɓaa yuu ɓaaɓɛ ruu.
Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ruu, palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ.
A mɔkɔ masang, mɔɔ palɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔng zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ ya? Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaa nɛɛ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu kpang ya?
Mɔɔ rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ waasɛ̃ ka yuu Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, palɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli, a dang mɔɔ jĩng tantɛnang kpang, a ti mã danggn nɛɛ mɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ ya? Laa pàlɛ́ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kati.

Wee nɔɔ kpãa nyaa nɔngkɔ, a nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ kpang, nɔɔ kpàlɛ́ yuu manɛ ɓi gnvɔ Laa. Nɔɔ shingnɛ, jĩng ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang nɔɔ, wu bangnɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɛɛ, naa nwangsɛ bii kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang ɓu doo ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi tĩng, ri palɛ ɓarɛ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ sasak, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a ri bannang, wu dɔ̀ɔ ri, ri ti nwáng ningkãari dòndòng. Laa naa a ri suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ yuu ɓarɛ dɔɔli, ri kasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang. Ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Gnvɔ naa shàá Laa nɛɛ ri, wu dang ri jĩng.
Zang nandon ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri naa dang jĩng dɔɔli. Zang gaayu nɛɛ zang Yahudi kɔ shɔɔnang, wu tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ bannang, wu ti dɔɔ ri, wu ti shing ri, ri nwáng ka nyaa zɔɔ. Gaayu nɛɛ zang Yahudi kɔ shɔɔnang, wu naa tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa dannang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri shaarɛ doo nɛɛ mani. Ka wee zang jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ka doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ kpang ɓee. Zang jɛ̃ɛ ɓi zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ruu ka doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang raa zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ting Laa, wu ka rúu Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ zang tãa ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, Laa ɓáa ri nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ ɓarɛ kpang. A ri nɛɛ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, rikɔ nwàng kaa nyaa dannang nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ. A ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kaa takpang.

Vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ kɔ túsù nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti ɓarɛ. Yeti ɓarɛ ti tusu doo nɔngkɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lee ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, lee ɓɔɔ wu ti kɔ̀ɔ ri nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka diki keɓe, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓu ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓu waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Jɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ka Ruu Laa kɔ n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ɓee.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ zang Yahudi. Mɔɔ nɛɛ di yuu ɓaa kaa bii nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ bii nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang Laa.
Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, a nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, ti tusu mɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, mɔɔ zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nyaa zaa mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ yi zang jĩng ringtang labalang kpang. Mɔɔ nwang naa waa ɓɔɔ yakɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ nɔng ɓɛɛ.

Mɔkɔ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang naa wujɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ zi ɓaa tɔ nɛɛ, mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ zi vuu tɔ piti, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi ɓi ti niizang tingkiring.
Kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ jong, mɔɔ nɛɛ tusu zang ɓɔɔ vuu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔ́ɔ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang, mɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang ri roo nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu vaka kpang, mɔɔ daa ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu ka jaka vaka kpang.
Mɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ bii nɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ manɛ kagn. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɔɔ shingnɛ zang sèng Laa kpang.
Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu nung Laa ka ruu manɛ kɔ zang Yahudi.”
Nɔɔ nɛɛ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, shaa yeenang manɛ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ yee shaa kpang gbã̀ágbãa.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ yèe shaa kpang, dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, Laa rìsí wu, wu nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ yee shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa ɓarɛ kpang, ri naa ɓa nɔɔ ditɔ zang Yahudi, ri nɛɛ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔkɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a zang ti yee nɔɔ shaa katɔ, a nɔɔ tá nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓu wi zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ niizang wiya? Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang yee wu shaa katɔ, a ti ta bii naa zang Yahudi ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ niizang ɓi, zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔ̃sɔ wu ɓoro tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang yée shaa ɓɛɛ. Wu nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ kɔ̃sɔ wu kpang. Zang keɓe ɓi Laa dɔɔ wu, wu shɔnzang ri dɔɔ wu kpang.
A zang Yahudi, ri ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Shaa yeenang nwǎng zang ɓu viya?
Nwǎng zang vuu katɔ dɔɔli. Laa a zang Yahudi kɔ Ruu ɓiɓɛ ka naa, nɛɛ ri yiti.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shing danggn kpang, ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ takpang ya?
Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Naa zang piti ri suu sèé, Laa palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee, zang piti ri zi katɔ
nɛɛ yee ɓaaɓɛ niizang.
Naa zang ɓàá mɔɔ nyaavaa, mɔkɔ mɔɔ shaayi.”

Naa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, shingnɛ, zang wu zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ dang ruu jĩng tɔ, pálɛ̀ shi kpang ya? (N rang yee m naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri rangkɛ ɓɛɛ.)
Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Naa Laa palɛ vuu gn dang gbete, palɛ biya wu jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu viya?

Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, naa sèé ɓɔɔ n suuyi, shingnɛ, zang a Laa bannang a ti shingnɛ zang zi vuu niizang ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ kaa gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vi Laa dang m jĩng naa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang viya?

A ka ruu vi ruu pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang tɔ̀ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ wu nwang ka nɛɛ mani kpang viya? Zang ɓɔɔgn ri rang ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔngkɔ. Zang naa dang ri jĩng ditɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu zang Yahudi ruu ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓu kaa tɔ ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ka tĩng nɛɛ zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang nandon, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang katɔ.
Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ kagn gbete ka jĩng Laa kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang,
zang ɓɔɔ ti kãa nɔng Laa kagn gbete kpang.
Zang piti ri ràa Laa yuu knti tɔ,
ri nandon, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kagn teteng ɓarɛ
gbete kpang tingkiring.
Nyaa ɓarɛ ɓi sàa ɓɔɔ nyaa bm ɓɛɛ
Yee ɓɔɔ ri rangnɛ, ɓi zang nwãarɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning
Ruu ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ nwàng nɛɛ
nyaa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃pɔ nwáng nɛɛ nyaa sɔkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nyaa ɓarɛ ɓi nyaa rĩiti kɔ
shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ la katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ri wiiri kpang, ri shìng zang
nyaa vuu waa ka bii, a ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ.
Nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daa piti ri lasɛ nɔng,
ri yáa zang nɛɛ yeti lasɛnang.
Ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri shing zang, zang
ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ri kaa vɔrɔ Laa ka vuu ɓɔɔ
ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang tingkiring.”

Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ nyaa dannang keɓe ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu zãa shɔnzang nandon nyaa jãanang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu shingnɛ Laa wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo nandon ruu kati.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi jong ka tĩng Laa ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ pùú zang ɓi jĩng, zang zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Kãntang keɓe, Laa nwangsɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu shing zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ tɔ. Ruu gbalang keɓe, hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔ ruu ka yuu gbalang keɓe.

Laa shíng zang, zang nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ zang shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ɓi ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang piti ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ri daa naa ɓɔɔ ri walɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɛɛ takpang.
A ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ zang waati, Laa yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ a shing ri tɔ, ri nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.

Laa a zang wu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa yàá shɔnzang nandon gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa palɛ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Ka tĩng, Laa mã danggn, a yee laa ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Kãntang keɓe, yée laa kaa tɔ, ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Ka gbalang keɓe, Laa tusu zang nɛɛ wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ wu ti shing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.

Ruu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓuru ka yuu viya? Vuu kpang. Ka ruu vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu di nyaa ruu tɔ nɛɛ, shɔnzang raa zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ kɔ gbete, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓi Laa zang Yahudi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya? Ɓi doo Làá zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang kɔ doori kpang ya? Ɓi doo Laa ɓarɛ kɔ.

Laa ɓi gbete kak. Shing zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa katɔ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa kpang, ri nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ doo ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ruu kɔsɔ nyaa dannang Laa kaa tɔ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. Ruu shɔ nyaa dannang Laa ɓi kaa nɛɛ tɔɔsung kɔ jong.
Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa vi ka yuu Ibirayi dabang rɛɛ dabang ɓuru viya?
Naa Laa nɛɛ shingnɛ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn. A nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔrɔ ruu keɓe kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka tĩng Laa kpang.
Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang nɛɛ zang shu wu katɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang a wu, wu waati kpang, ɓi ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.

A zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, nɛɛ shing danggn ɓi ka bii Laa, ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ. Zang keɓe, danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ risi wu, wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa.
Dawuda ti kɔɔ ruu doo nɔngkɔ, ka yuu tĩnang zang piti ɓɔɔ Laa ta wu, nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ka ruu shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa
yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ Laa kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang
ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ
Laa kpáarɛ̀ danggn vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”

Tĩnang kɔ Dawuda ràng ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya? Kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee kpang jong. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, labeenang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, Laa ta wu, nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ”.
Vuu keɓe nwang gn vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ka knti ɓɔɔ Ibirayi yee shaa tɔ ɓɛɛ ya? Kɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ yee shaa gn kpang ya? Vuu keɓe nwang nɔngkɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ yee shaa gn kpang.

Zang yèe Ibirayi shaa ɓi kaa nɛɛ knti. Shaa kɔ zang yee wu ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa kasɛ wu katɔ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa. Laa ti ta wu nɛɛ, wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa tá wu bɛ̀ɛ́ zang yee wu shaa gn kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Ibirayi kɔ nwang kaa dabang zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa. A Laa ti ta ri tɔ, nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, naa zang yee ri shaa ti katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ibirayi ti doo dabang zang ɓɔɔ zang yee ri shaa katɔ kɔ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yee ri shaa katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ, ri shing danggn ka bii Laa naa ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru Ibirayi nwangnɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang yee wu shaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Laa a Ibirayi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ nyaa, nɛɛ koo keɓe naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ. Laa a nyaa keɓe wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, a Laa ta wu kati nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, rikɔ tà vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ɓɛɛ, danggn shinnang ɓi kaa waati. A nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ, shaarɛ ɓi kaa waati.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ ta nyaa Laa, Laa dang zang jĩng katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɔng ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kagn kpang, zang tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang ta nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dangnɛ tɔ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu di yuu ɓi ka danggn ɓɔɔ zang shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a nyaa keɓe wu ka ruu zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn naa ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ. Ibirayi ɓi kaa dabang ɓuru nandon.

Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N shing mɔɔ tɔ, mɔ́ɔ nwang dabang zang koolaa dɔɔli.” Wukɔ daa ɓuru ka tĩng Laa ɓɔɔ wu shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, zang nwang ningkãari, a ti mãarɛ vuu shɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓi doo ka laa ɓɔɔ vuu bìí nwàng naa mɔɔ yaa gn naa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nwáng dabang zang koolaa, naa ɓɔɔ Laa a wu nyaa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ naa shang dɔɔli.”

Ibirayi yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa naa kpang, nɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng ning, naa doo ɓɔɔ sáa ɓiɓɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng wu daa laa maani ɓɛɛ. Zi tɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ wɔng tɔ, a ɓeeso Saratu daa naa jaa yinang takpang.
Ibirayi yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang, a ti yaa gn naa ka ruu, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa, a wu kaka, a dɔɔ Laa kati.
Zi ɓi tɔ gbãng gbãng ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ katɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, “Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ”.
Ruu kɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang tà wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓee,” zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ka ruu Ibirayi ka bm kpang.
Zang bee kaa ruu ɓuru jong. Ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta rùu nɛɛ rùu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ rùu shing danggn ka bii Laa, ɓɔɔ wisi Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
Laa a Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru. A Laa ti wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tĩng Laa.
Wee ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tĩng Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu nwàng kaa nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ka ruu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Laa pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̀ rùu kagn ɓee, nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu tãa tĩnang ka wee ruu shing jĩng ka tĩng, nɛɛ Laa naa a ruu bannang ɓiɓɛ jong ɓee.
A ruu ti, tãa tĩnang ka jĩng dannang ɓuru ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu zi tɔ jĩng dannang shing ruu, ruu mã danggn ɓɛɛ.
Danggn mãnang shingnɛ zang wu nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ. Nwannang tɔ̃ɔ wu shing ruu, ruu yaa gn naa kaa takpang.
Ruu nɛɛ yaa gn naa kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shìng ruu zɔ̃ng zang kasɛnang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.
Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka laa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ ɓɛɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu lakɛ naa gn ka bii kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ́ wu vɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, ka tĩng Laa kagn kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ náa kasɛ katɔ wu vɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ,
Laa tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓuru dɔɔli ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu doo zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang, Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu zĩi ɓiɓɛ, ruu nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tĩng Laa. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa pàlɛ́ ruu ɓa weɓe katɔ, ta ruu ditɔ nɛɛ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang zang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu shing jĩng gn nɛɛ Laa kpang, Laa shingnɛ ruu nwáng nɛɛ wu ka nyaa zɔɔ ka ruu Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu nwang tɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓee, Jaa ɓiɓɛ ta yuu ɓuru katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwàng ɓi ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
Wu wee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ, ruu tãa tĩnang nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ shing ruu tɔ kãntang ruu kaa wusang Laa ɓee.
Naa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang a ka koo, nɛɛ bii zang gbete, a vuu shi kpang atɛ vɔrɔ. Kãntang keɓe zang piti ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vɔrɔ nwáng vuu zang piti tɔ.
Ɓɔɔ Laa átɛ́ nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ gn kpang, bɛ̀ɛ́ vuu shi kpang kagn koo. A Laa bee vuu ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu vuu shi kpang, kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ dang nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Vɔrɔ ti nyɔ zang doo nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ yuu Adamu, à nɛɛ mani ka yuu Musa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang naa ɓɔɔ Adamu palɛ ka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri vɔ doo nɛɛ mani. Adamu nwang ɓi naa Kirisi ɓɔɔ naa a nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati, ɓi naa vuu shi kpang, kpang. Niizang, zang dɔɔli ri vɔlɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ Adamu gbete palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang waati ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ka bii zang dɔɔli katɔ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati, ɓi náabm̀ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang gbete kaɓa palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang gbete keɓe shingnɛ Laa dàng zang jĩng. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati keɓe, shing tɔ, Laa ta ruu tɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.

Vɔrɔ roo kpanti, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Adamu gbete palɛ. A zang gãsɛ vuu keɓe kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli, a shing ri waati, ri nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ. Ri nwáng ningkãari, ri roo kpanti nɛɛ bii zang gbete keɓe, Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Bɛɛ zang nɛɛ dang zang piti jĩng katɔ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang gbete palɛ ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbete palɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa shingnɛ zang piti ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ti a ri suru bii.

Naa ɓɔɔ zang gbete ta nyaa dannang Laa, a shingnɛ zang dɔɔli ri raa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Doo nɔngkɔ, zang gbete dũng nyaa Laa, a naa shingnɛ zang dɔɔli ri nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa.
Laa átɛ̀ nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ, vuu shi kpang palɛnang wu shangnɛ. A ka nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang shang dɔɔli, Laa palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka nɔngkɔ gbãng gbãng.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang roo kpanti nɛɛ bii vɔrɔ, tɔ̃ɔ Laa ti roo kpanti doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ bii nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu walɛ suru ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Rùu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Rúu yi tĩng ta nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu gisi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ ruu ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ ya?
Kpang, ruu palɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ ruu yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓuru tɔ, ruu palɛ takpang.
Nɔɔ zi kpang ya? Ka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ruu batizima, zang ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ruu vɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu vɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ ruu batizima, nwàng naa ruu vɔ katɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, a zang gbã̀a ruu nɛɛ wu. Tɔɔ, zang naa wisi ruu paa kaa jong naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ wisi wu paa nɛɛ bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang nwannang kaa naa ɓɔɔgn.
Naa zang ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ wu ka zɔ̃ng vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, zang ti ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ wu doo nɔngkɔ, ka paa ɓɔɔ zang wisi wu ɓɛɛ.

Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓáa nwannang ɓɔɔ ɓeleng ruu nwang ka tĩng ɓi tɔ ka laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang wu shaarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ ruu nwang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, wɔ ɓi tɔ, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi takpang.
Ruu nɛɛ vɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, ruu zi tɔ ruu naa nwáng ningkãari jong nɛɛ wu.
Ruu zi tɔ, vɔrɔ palɛ Kirisi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi takpang. Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, a zang wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari, vɔ ɓi takpang.
Ka ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, vɔ doo gbete kak, ka ruu vuu shi kpang. A kãntang keɓe, nwàng kaa ningkãari ka Ruu Laa.
Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwàng naa vɔrɔ, nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ nwàng ningkãari ka Ruu Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang wu ɓaa saara ka bii manɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ vuu ɓɔɔ bii kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Nɔ́ɔ ti yaa bii manɛ dang gbete wu ràa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔ̀ɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ a Laa, bii manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ zang wisi ri paa nɛɛ sàa ri nwàng kaa ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ risi bii manɛ dang gbete katɔ kɔ jong wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ yaa vuu shi kpang, wu roo kpanti ka nwannang manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ jaafoo nyaa dannang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ́ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
A nɛɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, rúu pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓi nyaa dannang Laa roo kpanti ka yuu ɓuru kpang, ɓi tɔ̃ɔ Laa rooyi ɓɛɛ ya? Kpang tingkiring.

Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang jaafoo ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ jaafòó zang gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ ɓaa shoo doo ka nyaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwǎng zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, naa nɔɔ ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ manɛ jaafòó vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ naa ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu nɔɔ, a nɔɔ tarɛ nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon.
Zang tà nɔɔ nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang manɛ, a nɔɔ ràa jaafòó vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang.

N rang nɔɔ yee, n gãsɛ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi diki diki ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii shɔnzang manɛ lakɛ naa ka bii, ka vuu zinang kpang ɓɛɛ. Bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ á dũndũng, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, yuu manɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete naa jaafoo, kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ á yuu manɛ doo nɔngkɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang kaa zang Laa niizang.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ doo naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, ruu manɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang kpang.
Nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ ɓu vi ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ́, ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe yusɛ̃ɛ ɓarɛ tuu nɔɔ kaa tɔ ɓee viya? Vuu kaɓa nwàng nɔɔ vɔrɔ.

A kãntang keɓe zang ta nɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu shi kpang palɛnang, nɔɔ kaa jaafoo Laa. Vuu keɓe shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, zang vɔ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu waati, ɓi suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓákɛ́ bii tɔ, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ kãntang keɓe tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa kɔ Laa dang ɓee, kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang doo ningkãari kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, soro ɓɔɔ zang gee tɔ, ri basɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ɓeevɛ kpang, ɓeevɛ nɛɛ doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Ɓeevɛ nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, wɔ tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ wu nɛɛ ɓeevɛ ɓɛɛ.

Naa yaa ɓeevɛ, daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn, bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓeevɛ doo ningkãari, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ dũndũng ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓeevɛ nɛɛ vɔrɛ, zang yaa wu gbalang tɔ, wu daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn. Pálɛ̀ wu vuu dũndũng kpang, nɛɛ gee zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ.

Manzung, nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, risi nɔɔ manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Kirisi ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shòng Laa shonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati.

Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu nwàng doo nwannang naa shɔnzang waati ɓɛɛ, bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, sèé paa kaa gbãng gbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ nwang ruu ɓuru vɔrɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

Kãntang keɓe, Laa ta ruu tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nwalɛ ɓuru kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang roo kpanti tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, ruu pàlɛ́ Laa shonang kaa tɔ, ka gbalang ɓɔɔgn, ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka gbalang gbaala, ka ɓɔɔ ruu dũng nyaa dannang Laa, ɓɔɔ zang bée nɛɛ naa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ vuu shi kpang ya? Kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔ tùsù m vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ. N nɛ̀ɛ́ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang shing jĩng ka vuu zang kpang, naa Laa nɛɛ dang nyaa nɛɛ, “Zang wu shing jĩng ka vuu zang kpang,” kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi vuu shi kpang walɛ gbalang nɛɛ bii nyaa dannang Laa, a shing m, n shĩ̀lí jĩng ka vuu zang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Naa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ kpang, vuu shi kpang nɛɛ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang kpang.
Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ gn kpang, bɛ̀ɛ́ n m ningkãari. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ hn, n kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kaa gbãng gbãng.
N nwang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ wu a zang suru, nyɔ m kaa vɔrɔ kɔ jong.
Vuu shi kpang walɛ gbalang nɛɛ bii nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a nwãarɛ m, a ti nyɔ m vɔrɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shi kpang ɓi kagn ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa dannang Laa ɓu kɔɔ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ti pàlɛ́ zang tɔ̃ɔ.

Wee nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe kɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓi vuu shi kpang, tuu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a nyɔ m vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani, tɔɔ wu tusu bii ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa dannang Laa kɔ shingnɛ vuu shi kpang tusu nɛɛ wu kaa shi kpang tingkiring.
Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi vuu suru, a n m kaa shɔnzang. N raa m kaa naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang palɛnang.
N zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ m kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
Naa n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang kɔ jong, n zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓi nkɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti mɛɛ kɔ shing m.
N zi tɔ ka bii shɔnzang mɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa n kasɛ doo katɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n pálɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ, a n zunung palɛnang kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
N pálɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang. N palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
Naa n pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang, zang zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ ɓi nkɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ keɓe nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang. Ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti mɛɛ kɔ jong, palɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka bii mɛɛ keɓe. Naa n kasɛ n tɔɔ n palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, n palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang kɔ gbete.
Ka yeti mɛɛ, n tãa tĩnang nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
A n ti zirɛ, nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ kagn yeti mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ waa zɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Nwang m kaa naa nyaa dannang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ, mã m ka sãa.
N m zang ɓɔɔ tãa tĩnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Wi ta m jong nɛɛ naa bii mɛɛ kɔ raa m vɔrɔ ɓee wiya?
N zãa Laa tɔ, ta m tɔ nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n pàlɛ́ nyaa dannang Laa shonang nɛɛ yeti mɛɛ, n pàlɛ́ nyaa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang dangnɛ shonang ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii shɔnzang mɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang tɔ gbete nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, Laa dɔng ri ruu ɓarɛ takpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Suru Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu suru bii nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ta m tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa zunung palɛnang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii shɔnzang lakɛ naa bii kpang, Laa palɛ tɔ. Laa ningsi vuu shi kpang ka bii shɔnzang, ka ɓɔɔ wu shong nyaa nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ arɛ, tuu bii naa bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Laa pálɛ́ vuu keɓe nɛɛ tɔɔ, ruu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ kpang. Ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang wu palɛ, ruu palɛ kaa nyaa kiiri.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ɓarɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwang ɓɛɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng naa ɓɔɔ Suru kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwangnɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

Naa zang rɛ̃rɛ shi kpang, naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nwǎng zang ɓi vɔrɔ. Naa zang rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ, Laa shingnɛ zang walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, a yeti zang ti valɛ katɔ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang shing rɛ̃rɛnang zang, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ bii zang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, zang risi yuu zang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Niizang, zunung dũnnang ɓi kpang tingkiring.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ, ri shingnɛ Laa wu tã̀a tĩnang kpang.
Nɔɔ nwàng manɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ naa ɓɔɔ bii manɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, naa Suru Laa nɛɛ nwang kagn niizang ka yeti manɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Kirisi nɛɛ kagn ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi zang Kirisi kpang.
Naa Kirisi nwàng kagn yeti manɛ, naa bii manɛ vɔ doo katɔ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, Suru Laa a nɔɔ suru bii ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ta nɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa, suru ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwàng ka yeti manɛ, Laa keɓe ɓɔɔ wisi Kirisi paa nɛɛ saa, a nɔɔ suru bii ditɔ. A nɔɔ suru bii nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ manzung, zang mã ruu nyaa kagn nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Naa ruu nwang naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ, ruu vɔ katɔ. A naa Suru Laa yi ruu naa kagn, ruu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu nwáng ditɔ ningkãari.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu ri, rikɔ wujɛ Laa.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a nɔɔ Suru ɓɔɔ risi nɔɔ naa jaafoo waati kpang, shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ tɔkn kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa keɓe shing nɔɔ nɔ́ɔ nwang manɛ wujɛ Laa kɔ jong. Wukɔ ti yi nɔɔ naa ka bii, nɔɔ ɓaa Laa kaa nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Daa ɓuru.”
Suru Laa ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ suru bii ɓuru ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu wujɛ Laa.

Wee ruu wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓee, ruu naa wàlɛ́ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shìng zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ruu ti naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shìng Kirisi ditɔ nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nɛɛ dàng jĩng tɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi dang ɓɛɛ, Laa ti naa a ruu bannang jong naa ɓɔɔ wu a Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ, jĩng kɔ ruu dang kãntang ɓee, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɛɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Laa naa a ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.
Niizang, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mã́arɛ̀ ɓɛɛ nandon, ri gã diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwàngsɛ́ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ bii ɓɛɛ.
Kãntang keɓe, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ, zi naa ɓɔɔ vuu nwang kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓarɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔ shing ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ.
Nɛɛ wu ta yuu vuu kɔ wu mãarɛ ɓee ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri pũng kaa takpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu ti a ri bannang ɓɔɔ wu alɛ̀ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ nandon ri tãa kɔnang, ri ti ju doo kana, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.

Wu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ kɔ tãa kɔnang gbete kpang. Rùu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu a ruu nwang ka yeti ɓuru ɓee, ruu ju doo nɔngkɔ ka yeti ɓuru, ka wee ruu gã diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa kɔ̀ɔ́yi nɛɛ ruu kaa wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓuru wu wɔ kaa nandon.
Zang tà yuu ɓuru ka ruu gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ kɔ. A ruu nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ gn shinnang kpang. Zang shing gn ɓi jong ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Naa ruu shing gn ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi gn kpang, ruu mã danggn, ruu gã vuu bìí.

Suru Laa, a doo nɔngkɔ, wu yi ruu naa ka bii, wee ruu lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓee. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zunung ɓɔɔ ruu gàá Laa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa kɔ bàkɛ́ Ruu Laa nɛɛ junang ɓɔɔ nyaa zunung kɔɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Laa ɓɔɔ zi yeti shɔnzang tɔ nandon, zi vuu ɓɔɔ Suru rɛ̃rɛ tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru bakɛ Laa ka ruu zang Laa, ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ yeti Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, ka yeti vuu piti, Laa palɛ shonang ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu keɓe wu nwàng ri tɔ̃ɔ kati. Rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa ri nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàlɛ́ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ɓarɛ tɔ, kusu ri ɓarɛ dang gbete nɛɛ ri nwang naa Jaa ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ wu nwang kaa jamari rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
A Laa tá (shɛ̃ɛrɛ) rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu ɓàa ri nyaa dang gbete. Zang kɔ wu ɓaa ri nyaa ɓee, risi ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ. A á zang kɔ wu risi ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓee, bannang kati.
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vi tɔkn viya? Laa nɛɛ ɓàng nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ, wi shii bàng nɛɛ ruu, wu ɓa ruu kaka wiya?
Laa zãa Jaa ɓiɓɛ jĩng dannang kpang, a zang wu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓuru nandon. Naa a ruu vuu piti ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ waati nɛɛ wu ning kpang ya?
Ɓu wi kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ wiya? Laa kɔ kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
Ɓu wi dɔ̌ng ri ruu wiya? Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa. Nwang ka nakn Laa. Wukɔ ti bàkɛ́ Laa ka ruu ɓuru.

Ɓu wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ ruu nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Kirisi kàsɛ̀ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ wiya? Vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ a ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ ya? Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ ya? Naa doo jĩng dannang yupaa ya? Naa nyɔkɔ nwangnɛ ya? Naa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu hãa ka bii kpang ya? Naa zang shìng ruu doo baabii ya? Naa zang nyɔkɔ ruu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
Zang bee nɔngkɔ ka yeti Labeenang Laa nɛɛ,
“Zang kɔɔ ruu diki diki nɛɛ zang
nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.
Zang palɛ ruu naa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ
zang daa yee ri kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ”.
Wu nɔngkɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ basɛ ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang. Ka vuu kɔ palɛ ruu ɓee nandon zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu ɓuru katɔ keɓe, yiki ruu naa kagn, ruu ɓa vuu keɓe yuu gbãng gbãng.

N zi m tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ basɛ ruu kagn nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, naa ruu doo ningkãari, naa doo zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kãntang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.
Naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka tipi dii. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mã́arɛ̀ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ ruu, nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang.
Vuu kɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓee, niizang kɔ nwani. N suu sèé kpang, kaa ruu ɓɔɔ, n m zang Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa roo kpanti kagn, ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ niizang, n suu sèé kpang.
Niizang, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ dɔɔli, vuu ɓɔɔ ti kɔng m ka yeti ka ruu rɛɛ manzung zang Isirela di nyaa kpang.
Naa nɛ̀ɛ́ yi ri naa ka bii katɔ, n nɛ̀ɛ́ gàa Laa wu kù m nyaa. Ń nwàng tɔ̀ɔ́ zang Kirisi kpang, ka ruu rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng ɓuru gbete ɓɛɛ.
Rikɔ zang Isirela, Laa shing ri, ri ràa wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri bannang ɓiɓɛ. Laa mã nyaa nɛɛ ri, a ri nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dangnɛ ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ zunung Laa bannang ka gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. A Laa ti a rikɔ nyaa.
Ri ɓarɛ zɔ̃ng rɛɛ dabang ɓɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Kirisi ka bii shɔnzang ɓiɓɛ, nwangnɛ doo laa ɓarɛ kɔ. Zang wu dɔɔ Laa ta dòndòng, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti ka yuu vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ.
N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang nyaa kagn kpàng, kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu zang Isirela nandon kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nɛɛ ri zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.
Zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓi ti wujɛ Laa kɔ nandon kpang. Laa kɔɔ Ibirayi nɛɛ, “Zang naa gã zɔ̃ng Ishaaku kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ri zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ”.
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, wu wujɛ Ibirayi nandon wujɛ Laa kpang. Ɓi wujɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa, a zang yì Ibirayi ri, rikɔ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ka ɓɔɔ wu a Ibirayi nyaa keɓe tɔɔ, “Ka laa ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ, n gbãayu ditɔ, Saratu naa yi jaa zang varɛ”.
A wu ti weɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ɓɔɔ Rebeka túu jaa, yì dabang ɓuru Ishaaku wujɛ ziti.

Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang yi ri gn kpang, ri ti pálɛ́ vuu tɔ̃ɔ gn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃nnang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng jaa gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔ nàá ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bang kɔ naa pàlɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ wujaa shonang.” Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng zang ɓi ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa zang ɓɛɛ, wu ka ruu, vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “N kasɛ m Yakubu n bɛ̃ɛ Isuwa katɔ”.
Rùu kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ Laa palɛ vuu gn dang gbete ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ Musa tɔɔ, “Gn kɔng m ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ gn ɓarɛ kɔng m katɔ ɓɛɛ. N pálɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ m ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ n pàlɛ́ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ”.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ kɔ shingnɛ, Laa wu zɔ̃́ng wu kpang, ɓi gn zang ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ, kɔ shingnɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ Firawuna ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N yi mɔɔ kpanti, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ń ti shingnɛ zang koo nandon ri tãa ruu mɛɛ kati.”
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, gn kɔng Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ, ri táarɛ́ yuu.
Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ hɛ̃ɛ m katɔ nɛɛ, “Laa nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓi nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, kɔ̀ɔ́ ka ruu vi nɛɛ, ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ viya? Wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ palɛnang wiya?”
Masang, mɔkɔ wi mɔɔ kasɛ Laa nyaa wiya? Ɓari hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ mãa wu katɔ nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi mɔɔ mãa m nɔngkɔ viya ya?”

Zang ɓɔɔ mãarɛ ɓari palɛ tapɔng katɔ naa ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka tapɔng gbete keɓe, mãa ɓari katɔ nɛɛ mani ziti. Ɓɔɔ gbete wu shing ka ruu vuu shaanang nɔng mung nwannang. Ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwãarɛ vuu shaanang diki waati kagn.

Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa pálɛ̀ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu tusu gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ wu ti nwangsɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mã danggn gbãng gbãng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɛɛ wu jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri daa naa ɓɔɔ wu ningsi ri kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ wu tusu bannang ɓiɓɛ. Bannang ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ ruu, ɓɔɔgn ɓuru kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ wu kpàlɛ̀ ri bii doo ka tĩng nɛɛ ri ta bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
