Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi rukɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ka teteng zang Yahudi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, zɔ̃ngkɔ jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yeti Labeenang ɓɔɔ Yushaawu bee nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri zang mɛɛ kpang,
n ɓaa ri kaa nɛɛ ‘Zang mɛɛ,’
Zang tipi ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n kasɛ ri kpang,
n ɓaa ri kaa nɛɛ ‘Zang ɓɔɔ
n kasɛ ri dɔɔli ɓɛɛ’.
Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
‘Nɔɔ wu zang mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ,’
Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ti naa ɓàa ri doo
ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ ri wujɛ ɓiɓɛ”.
Ishaya kɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang Isirela tɔɔ, “Naa zang Isirela ri shang doo naa seseele ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo, zang ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu ɓarɛ ri dɔɔli kpang.”
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu ditɔ nandon, pĩiri jĩng kpang ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Ishaya kɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Naa Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti bannang katɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ yàa ruu zɔ̃ng ɓuru kagn kpang, ruu nɛɛ raa tɔ naa gari Sɔɔdom, ruu nɛɛ nwang kaa naa gari Gomora.”

Ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu kɔɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri tɔɔ ri risi yuu ɓarɛ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa kpang. A Laa risi ri tɔ, ri nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
A zang Isirela ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ, ri tɔɔ ri kãa ɓarɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ, a ri wàlɛ̀ kaa takpang.
Ri walɛ kpang ka ruu viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing gn ɓarɛ ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, wu ka danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa kpang. Ri kpaa doo ka tari ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang kpaa doo ɓɛɛ.
Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ,
“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ǹ shing tari ka Siyona,
ɓɔɔ zang kpaa doo kagn ɓɛɛ.
Tari bang ɓɔɔ shíng zang, zang watɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii
ɓiɓɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu kpang.”
Rɛɛ manzung, n kasɛ ka yeti mɛɛ gbãng gbãng, a n ti gaa Laa ka yuu zang mɛɛ zang Yahudi, nɛɛ Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ jong.
N kɔɔ ruu katɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ri kasɛ katɔ gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ri pàlɛ́ Laa shonang. A ri zi gbalang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ Laa shonang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ tɔ̃ɔ kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi gbalang ɓɔɔ risi zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. A ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ kaa nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ. Ri tà gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa shìng zang, nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ mani ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi shing tɔ naa vuu palɛnang nyaa dannang Laa di nyaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa, Laa risi wu kaa tɔ wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ.
Musa bée naa ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ shingnɛ zang nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa tɔ́ɔ, “Naa mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwang ningkãari, palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ”.

A ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ Laa risi zang ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ, Musa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔ́ɔ hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang nɛɛ, Ɓu wi vangnɛ daa ka lapa wiya?” (Wu daa atɛ Kirisi ka tipi.)
Mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang nɛɛ, ɓu wi daa ka koo ɓɔɔ ka tipi dii wiya? (Wu daa nwangsɛ Kirisi nɛɛ saa.)
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ keɓe, “Ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi nɛɛ mɔɔ naabm, ka yeti nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, ti kagn ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ.” Ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Naa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti,” a mɔɔ ti shing danggn nɛɛ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa. Laa ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ shing danggn nɛɛ yeti, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu risi zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang, Laa wu ti, ta yuu zang kati.
Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔ̀ɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu kpang.”

Ruu keɓe muku zang piti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ɓi gbete ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓi wukɔ Kpanti zang piti, shing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu, ri walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli.
Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gàa Laa nɛɛ nung Laa, Laa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ.”

A zang nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang, zang palɛ biya zang gaa wu, wu ta yuu zang viya? A zang shing danggn biya ka bii zang ɓɔɔ zang tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ gngn kpang viya? Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ katɔ kpang, zang palɛ biya zang tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang shing danggn kati viya?
A zang ɓɔɔ yuu paa biya wu daa kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa, zang nɛɛ shong wu katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ viya? Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri à Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔɔnang, doo ɓarɛ shili dɔɔli.”
A kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ zang piti ri dũ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya kɔɔ ka yeti Labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kpang.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nɛɛ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ tɔ, zang shing danggn kati. Zang tã̀á ruu keɓe, ka ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ruu Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
N hɛ̃ɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, Ri tã̀a Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kpang niizang ya? Ri tã̀a katɔ. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Ri kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka dalɛ koo nandon.
Ruu ɓarɛ daa ka dĩiri ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
Ń ti hɛ̃ɛ tɔkn ɓɛɛ, zang Isirela ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ bìí kɔɔ kpang niizang ya? Musa kɔ kasɛ nyaa ruu keɓe shɔɔnang tɔɔ,
“N shing nɔɔ zang Isirela nɔɔ kaa
sũnyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ.
N shing nɔɔ, gnvɔ wu shàa nɔɔ nɛɛ
zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ”.
Ishaya kaa vɔrɔ kpang, kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa m kpang
rikɔ ĩi m kaa jong.
N ti nwáng nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ
bɛ̀ɛ́ ri hɛ̃ɛ nɔng mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ”.
Ɓɔɔ wu a ka yuu zang Isirela, Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“N dĩ̀i zang ɓɔɔ ri taarɛ yuu
dɔɔli, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ,
naa, laa hãa nyaa nɛɛ mani.”
N hɛ̃ɛyi ɓɛɛ, Laa bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ya? Kpang. N nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n zang Isirela, zɔ̃ng Ibirayi. N m nɛɛ doo laa Biliyaminu.
Laa bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃́ng ri bɛ̀ɛ́ zang gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang, kpàng. Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Iliya gaa Laa ka yuu zang Isirela kpang ya? Iliya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,

“Kpanti Laa, zang ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ nandon. Zang ri ti jili nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ vuu kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ɓi kaa nkɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓaaɓɛ gbete ɓɔɔ n yaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ri ti kãa m, nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ”.
Laa kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ viya? Laa tɔɔ, “N shɛ̃̀ɛrɛ̀ yuu mɛɛ zang doo kagn labang manziti ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baal gn kpang ɓɛɛ”.
Kãntang keɓe doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ri katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri yaa doogn tɔkɔlɔng.
Zɔ̃ngkɔ ri ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa Laa nɛɛ zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, gn zang nɛɛ kɔng Laa ɓi katɔ niizang kpang.
Ruu keɓe, kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Zang Isirela ri ĩi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ rikɔ ri ĩiyi. Zang nimbang ri huuru shoo ɓarɛ katɔ, ri tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa ɓayi ɓarɛ takpang.
Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ yirɛ, a nɔng ka lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ, Laa shing tɔ yeti ɓarɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Laa a ri jĩng ɓɔɔ zi nɔng kpang, nɛɛ shoo ɓɔɔ tãa nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ”.
A Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔ,
“Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ri shaayi wu
nwang ri naa saka ɓɔɔ zang langnɛ
nɛɛ wu yi ri ɓɛɛ. Ri watɛ ta,
zang wu dang ri jĩng. Jĩng ɓarɛ
wu zúurú, tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi nɔng kaa takpang.
Jĩng ɓɔɔ ri dangnɛ, wu shing ri, ri lang
gũntang dòndòng.”

Ń hɛ̃ɛ kati ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri kpaa doo, ri wàtɛ̀ gbinggbing ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, Laa ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu shing zang Yahudi, ri kaa sũnyaa kaa nɛɛ ri.

Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri palɛ kɔ shingnɛ Laa a zang koo vuu tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli. A ka ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ning ɓɛɛ, Laa shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ri tãa tĩnang dɔɔli. Laa nɛɛ ta yuu zang Yahudi tɔ jong nandon, tĩnang naa shang kaa dɔɔli kɔ jong kpang ya?
N rang yee kaa nɛɛ nɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa shong m nɛɛ n pálɛ́ shonang ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̀ɔ́ bii ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ wu a m nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Naa n shíng zang zɔ̃̌ng mɛɛ katɔ, ri kaa sũnyaa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ Laa bɛ̃ɛ ri, Laa raa zang koo ri yi wusang nɛɛ wu. A Laa nɛɛ ta ri tɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ, naa nwang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri walɛ suru bii tɔ kpang ya?
Naa borodi ɓɔɔ zang gaayu zang sharɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka jĩng Laa, borodi ɓɔɔ nimbang keɓe, ɓi kaa doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Naa zang a Laa dĩiri laa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, rɛɛ nasãng laa ɓi doo ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.

Zang dɔlɔ nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ, a zang atɛ nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka waala zang naa tiisi ka nɔng ɓarɛ. A nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang naa laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta ka waala ɓɛɛ, kãntang keɓe nɔɔ wàlɛ́ manɛ kaa vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ risi nasãng ɓɔɔ zang dɔlɔ ri katɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, kpang. Nɔ́ɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang, nɔɔ manɛ nasãng waati. Wu nɔkɔ yiti dĩiri kpang, ɓi dĩiri laa kɔ yiti nɔɔ.
Nɔɔ kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Zang dɔlɔ nasãng nɛɛ tɔɔ zang yaa m nɔng n tèng nɔng ɓarɛ”.

Nɔngkɔ niizang. Zang dɔlɔ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ tèng nɔng ɓarɛ ɓi kaa ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tèng nɔng ɓarɛ tɔ kpang, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kɔ jong.
Laa nɛɛ yaa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu nɛɛ naa yaa nɔɔ katɔ ya?

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ ning, a pàlɛ́ ɓi kaa nɔkɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yaa tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, zang dɔlɔ nɔɔ ditɔ jong.
Zang Yahudi ri nɛɛ shing danggn tɔ tɔkn zang sɔɔrɔ ri tɔkn ka nɔng ɓarɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔrɔ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, nɔɔ nwàng manɛ naa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta ka waala, zang tiisi nɔɔ ka bii laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe zang palɛ gngn kpang. Zang Yahudi ri nwàng naa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa tɔɔ, wu tiisi nasãng kɔ zang dɔlɔ ɓee ka laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔlɔ ri kagn, kpãa wu kpang tingkiring.

Rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudi kpang, n kasɛ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ dĩiri vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri taarɛ yuu dɔɔli. Ri nwáng nɔngkɔ sasak Laa wu ta yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudi kpang nandon.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu zang Isirela nandon keɓe. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ tá yuu zang naa nwang
nyaa nɛɛ gari Siyona. Tɔɔ wu shingnɛ
zɔ̃ng Yakubu ri yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang kati.
Wee vuu ɓɔɔ n a nyaa nɛɛ n palɛ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ kɔ,
ka ɓɔɔ n naa yàá ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ”.

Zang Yahudi ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa tãanang kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng ri ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri doo zang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu rɛɛ dabang dabang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa nɛɛ zɔ̃́ng zang tɔ, bɛ̃ɛ ri ɓi takpang, nɛɛ ti a zang vuu tɔ, tà ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ tɔkn kpang.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ ka tĩng nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang, kãntang keɓe gn manɛ kɔng Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudi ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang Yahudi doo nɔngkɔ, kãntang keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo ɓarɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ ka nyaa Laa kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng Laa kaa jong, naa ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa risi zang piti naa zang ɓɔɔ wu mã ri ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng wu kati.
Laa pàlɛ́ zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli, ti zũng dɔɔli, a zi vuu piti. Zang ɓɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa shii ka yuu vuu kpang, ruu ti zi gbalang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa rɛ̃rɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ wu ruu kagn kpang.
Wi á wu vuu tɔ gn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀
zang kaɓa kati wiya?”
Vuu piti a nɛɛ bii Laa. Mãa vuu piti ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a vuu piti ti gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng. Rúu dɔɔ nɔɔ Laa dòndòng. Nɔngkɔ.

Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ gbãng gbãng. Nɔɔ a Laa yuu manɛ, naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ a wu yuu manɛ tɔ naa vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ kaa doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ kaa gbãng gbãng nɔɔ pàlɛ́ wu shonang ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tĩnang manɛ ɓɛɛ. Wee gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔɔ báng wu ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Nɔ́ɔ yi tĩng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang koo keɓe kasɛ palɛnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa Laa wu kɔ̃sɔ nɔɔ yeti manɛ, wu a nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ shɔɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kati. Vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ti shing wu tãa tĩnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nandon. Zang ɓu wu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ wu ɓa zang piti katɔ kpang. Wu rɛ̃rɛ teetee kɔ jong, wu gãsɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
Bii ɓi gbete, a takɛ vuu kagn kaa zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Vuu ɓu palɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ náabm̀.
Ruu doo nɔngkɔ. Ruu dɔɔli, a ruu nwang kaa naa bii gbete kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ bii gbete nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu yi zɔɔ naa ka bii.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu palɛ shonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ka gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa a ruu naa nɛɛ ruu kɔɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔyi ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ tɔɔ, ruu palɛ zɔɔ shonang, ruu palɛ shonang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu zang vuu, ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã zang danggn, ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu mã zang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu basɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, wu bàsɛ̀ nɛɛ yeti gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ nɛɛ zang bang, wu palɛ shonang nɛɛ kaka ɓiɓɛ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, wu mã nyaa tĩng katɔ kpang.
Mɔ́ɔ kasɛ ruu zang nɛɛ sèé kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shi kpang, bɛ̃ɛ katɔ, mɔ́ɔ yiti ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbãng gbãng ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ.
Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ gbãng gbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa gbete ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ zarɛ bii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a zɔɔ bannang kpang.
Nɔɔ pálɛ́ shonang nɛɛ kaka, nɔɔ si rang kpang. Nɔɔ pàlɛ́ Laa shonang nɛɛ yeti gbete.
Gn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka vuu ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ, wu shing nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang. Zang nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jĩng, nɔɔ mã danggn. Nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki.
Basɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ta zang zanti katɔ ka yeti gãa ɓaaɓɛ.
Gàa Laa, wu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jĩng tɔ̃ɔ. Gàa wu, wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gàa wu, wu ku ri nyaa ka bii kpang.
Nɔɔ tãa tĩnang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kaa nyavɔ nɔɔ ka nɛɛ ri.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓakɛ̀ yuu manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang bang kpang. Nɔɔ rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ zũng manɛ katɔ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ shi kpang, nɔɔ wàa pãng doo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kpang. Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn nɔ́ɔ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang piti ri zirɛ nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zang piti.
Manzung, nɔɔ wàa pãng kpang, nɔɔ yàa Laa kɔ jong, wu wàa nɔɔ pãng. Laa kɔɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nkɔ waa pãng, n shing ri, ri dang jĩng jong.”

Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nyɔkɔ nɛɛ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang, a wu ɓaa vuu shaanang kɔ jong. Sutu nɛɛ mãa wu, a wu mii wu ɓooyi. Mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu dɔɔli, kɔng wu naa ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀ɛ wu sheleng waa ka yuu ɓɛɛ”.
Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang wu ɓa kaka manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓa kaka vuu shi kpang katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang.
Zang ɓu wu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Laa kɔ gbete a zang naa bannang nwannang ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔ ri nwáng zang bang ɓee, ɓi Laa shingnɛ ri nwàngnɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shii bàng nɛɛ zang bang, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ, shingnɛ, zang wu dɔng wu ruu.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang bang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ. Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang bang kpang ya? Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, zang bang dɔ̀ɔ́ mɔɔ ditɔ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang ɓi jaafoo Laa ɓɛɛ. Pálɛ̀ shonang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu yi mɔɔ naa kaa bii. Mɔɔ nɛɛ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, mɔɔ ka vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang a wu bannang ka dalɛ waati kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zang shonang Laa, jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka nung ɓɔɔ Laa nɛ̀ɛ́ jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Wu dàng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang jĩng.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ zang bang. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ, Laa dang mɔɔ jĩng ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi tɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ pálɛ̀ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wee doo vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ shu saka tipi ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang ri ɓarɛ zang shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri a yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ shonang keɓe ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ dṹng nɔɔ, nɔɔ shu ri ta. Nɔɔ shù zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi, saka tipi. Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mãlɛ́ ɓɛɛ, saka ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ daa naa sennang katɔ, nɔɔ seng wu. Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ daa naa bannang katɔ, bannang.

Zang ɓɔɔ wu dũ̀ng nɔɔ nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wu dũng nɔɔ nyaa kɔ́pɔ́ ruu zang kasɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang katɔ, dṹng vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ.

Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu zang kpang.” Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɛɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ yaa ɓɛɛ piti, ri kɔɔ ɓi doo vuu gbete kɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang katɔ, pàlɛ̀ wu vuu shi kpang, kpàng. Naa mɔɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang, mɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ nandon.

Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi diki keɓe tɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hìngsí jĩng nɛɛ hingro a tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓuru kagn, a naabm tɔ, ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ diki ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu danggn shinnang ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn tɔ.
Nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ kana, nɔng laagɛ̃ a kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ ta. Ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Rúu gaayu nwannang waasɛ̃, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaarɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓooro saa ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, nɔɔ ti pálɛ̀ shi kpang, kpang, nɔɔ hàa nyaa kpang, nɔɔ ti kaa sũnyaa kpang.
Nɔɔ yaa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu ta rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ràa shoo tɔ̀ɔ́ vuu ɓɔɔ bii manɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ, nɔɔ ta wu katɔ ka teteng manɛ. Nɔ́ɔ laa nyaa kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang ɓiɓɛ yàá wu gbalang katɔ wu shaa vuu piti, a zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

Zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu piti keɓe, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu ɓa zang ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ keɓe katɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ, wu ti dɔng zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu piti ruu kpang, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓi gbete kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tá wu ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Mɔɔ dɔng zang shonang zang ɓɔɔ ruu kpang. Ɓi dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ kɔɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ zang shonang ɓiɓɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ ti palɛ shi kpang wukɔ kɔɔyi. Shii ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa yi wu naa katɔ ka bii wu shiiyi ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, diki keɓe ɓa diki ɓɔɔ nimbang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ diki piti ɓi gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing gn nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ nimbang katɔ, kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ wu a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu piti, shaa ka Ruu Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zãa Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ vuu piti shaanang, bɛ̃ɛ ka Ruu Laa, a ti zã̀a wu katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓuru, nwàng nwannang yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ti vɔ vɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Ruu nɛɛ nwangnɛ, ruu nwàng ɓuru nwannang Laa. A ruu nɛɛ ti vɔrɛ, ruu vɔ ɓuru ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ, zang a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ. Naa ruu nwàng doo ningkãari, a naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, ruu ɓuru zang Laa.
Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, Kirisi vɔrɛ, a Laa wisi wu paa ningkãari tɔkn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwàng kaa Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
A mɔɔ dɔng ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu ka ruu viya? A mɔɔ zí ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka ruu viya? Rùu nandon, ruu naa shii ditɔ ka tĩng Laa, wu dɔng rùu, rúu.
Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
“ ‘Niizang n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa wee n nwàng ningkãari dòndòng ɓee.’
‘Zang piti ri naa tang m ditɔ
nɛɛ gutu. Zang piti ri kɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ nkɔ Laa.’ ”
Zang naa shing zang ɓu ditɔ, wu kɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔng zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. Nɔ́ɔ shing ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, wu kpaa doo kpang, wu ti palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
N ɓɔɔ n shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ bii Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, n zi m tɔ nɛɛ, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ɓi shi kpang, ɓi kagn kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ vuu keɓe shi kpang, ɓi ti shi kpang ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ.

Naa mɔɔ lasɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ yeti, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shaa ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang. Mɔɔ yaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shaayi, wu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Mɔɔ shingnɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓàa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, zang a wu nung shi kpang, kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, wukɔ vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang kpang. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ wu, a zang ti tãa tĩnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shingnɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ Kirisi shonang naa weɓe, shingnɛ, Laa tãa tĩnang, wu ti shingnɛ, shɔnzang wu kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki diki, rúu shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti yì zɔɔ naa kagn, ruu shing danggn gbãng gbãng.
Mɔɔ lasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, ka ruu vuu shaanang kpang. Vuu shaanang piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ. A naa nɔɔ shaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ, wu pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.
Naa mɔɔ yaa yɔpɔ shaanang, nɛɛ sàa ɓoonang, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, ɓɔɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, wu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔ̀ɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu vuu keɓe ɓi ka teteng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ Laa. Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ zi tɔ, ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Naa nɛɛ zì kpang, nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu shaa ɓee, naa wu pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ya, naa wu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ya ɓɛɛ. Naa shaayi, Laa dɔng wu ruu katɔ, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ zang shingnɛ, nɛɛ vuu bìí tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, zang keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi tɔ.
Ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ɓuru tɔ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ, ruu yi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn jong gbãng gbãng. Rúu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shing ruu, rukɔ tãa tĩnang ka bm gbete kpang.
Zang ɓu wu pàlɛ̀ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ, wu ti shing wu, wu zũng danggn.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa tĩnang ka bm kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, “Dãanang ɓɔɔ zang dãa nɔɔ, zang dãa Nkɔ”.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa piti, zang beeyi nɛɛ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu, wu mã ruu danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing gn kati.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn, nɔɔ ti yi tĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn palɛnang ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ nɔ́ɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Nɔ́ɔ pálɛ́ shonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ goo nyaa kaa gbete, nɔ́ɔ dɔɔ Làá kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ ta zɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ tĩnang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri dɔɔ Laa kati. Naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi ta nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ, Kirisi nwàng zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang Yahudi shonang, tɔɔ, wu tusu nɛɛ Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Tɔɔ, wu shingnɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru wu nwang kaa niizang.
Nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ri dɔ̀ɔ Laa jong ka ruu gn ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ ka teteng zang
ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang,
N gaa soo, n dɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mani.”
Zang ti bee tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang,
nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ
Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãa tĩnang.”
Tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ta.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo piti ri dɔɔ Laa ta.”
Ishaya ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“Zɔ̃ng Jeesi gbete a ditɔ,
zang naa nwangsɛ wu, wu nwang kpanti
zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ, a ri naa
shing gn ɓarɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ”.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ shing gn ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ nɔɔ tãa tĩnang gbãng gbãng ka yeti manɛ, yeti manɛ wu ti valɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ shing gn kaa gbãng gbãng.
Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ n zi tɔ, nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ dɔɔli. Nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ tɔ nandon. Nɔɔ zunung naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zɔɔ vuu tɔ.
Ka labeenang kɔ n bèé nɔɔ ɓee, n waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ, n kpaa nɔɔ danggn ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. N waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ.

N nwàng zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ n palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang shonang. N kɔɔ ri Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri nwang kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa, ɓɔɔ shing Laa wu tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ Suru Laa risi nwang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n ɓakɛ bii nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi n làkɛ́ jĩng katɔ ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ́ Laa ɓɛɛ.

N rang yee, n waasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Kirisi shing m n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ ka nyaa Laa ɓɛɛ. N shing ri nɛɛ rúu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ri, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa palɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka rakɛnang ɓɔɔ n gaayu nɛɛ Urushalima, n riki nɔng nandon, n daa nɛɛ mani ka Ilirikum ɓɛɛ, n hangsɛ zang Ruu Laa kɔɔnang tɔ nandon ka yuu Kirisi.

Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ka yeti mɛɛ gbete ɓɛɛ, ɓi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tãa ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛ̀ɛ́ nwang naa ɓɔɔ n mãa gãa m ka yuu doo gãa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn loo ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ri ruu ɓiɓɛ gn kpang, ri naa
zi wu ditɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa gn kpang, ri
naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ ditɔ”.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zãa m anang bii manɛ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Kãntang keɓe n hangsɛ shonang mɛɛ tɔ ka rɛɛ tipi keɓe. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ n kasɛ n tɔɔ n daa ka bii manɛ ka rɛɛ saa kɔ tɛɛ ɓee.
N shing gn anang tɔ kati kãntang. N nɛɛ yupaa tipi Asabaniya daanang tɔ, n naa leng nɔɔ ka gbalang. N nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki nɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, nɔ́ɔ yi m naa kagn, n daa Asabaniya.
A kãntang keɓe, n daa doo ka gari Urushalima, n daa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Makidoniya nɛɛ Akaya ri zɔ̃ng nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ naa ka bii.

Rikɔ zɔ̃ng nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ. Niizang, daa ɓɔɔ ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa katɔ ka bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ri walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a zang Yahudi ka ruu suru ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ jong. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ri bàsɛ́ vuu naa ɓarɛ tɔ jong nɛɛ zang Yahudi.
N nɛɛ hangsɛ shonang keɓe tɔ. N nɛɛ a ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ri tɔ nandon. N yupaa daanang Asabaniya kati, n leng nɔɔ kaa gbalang.
N zi tɔ nɛɛ n nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii manɛ, n shingnɛ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbãng gbãng.
Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ruu ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ n. Nɔɔ gaa m Laa jong gbãng gbãng
Nɔɔ gaayi nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka bii Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi, ri pálɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima ri tãa tĩnang vuu ɓɔɔ n átɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tĩnang kaa ɓɔɔ n á ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tĩnang jĩng ɓɔɔ n naa leng ka nɔɔ, n ɔ̃sɔ kati.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ ruu nwàng ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon. Nɔngkɔ.
N kasɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ Fibi, jaa soro ɓɔɔ shing danggn dòo naa ɓɔɔ ruu shing kɔ, ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ. Fibi keɓe, palɛ zang Laa shonang ka gari Sensheriya.
Nɔ́ɔ ta wu naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ zang Laa ri ta zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ka naa manɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ dɔɔli a ti pàlɛ̀ m jong ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ jèe m Pirisila nɛɛ ɓeevɛ Akpiila nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ruu pálɛ̀ Yeesɔ Kirisi shonang nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.

Ri á zang yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ, zang nyɔ rikɔ jong vɔrɔ, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m ɓɛɛ. N zãa ri tɔ gbãng gbãng. Wu nkɔ zã̀á ri ka bm kpang, zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri zi Laa kpang, a ri dũng kaa Laa nandon, ri zã̀á ri jong.
Nɔɔ jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ̀ yuu ka gãa ɓarɛ nyaa jong.
Nɔ́ɔ jèe m masang Abinɛtu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa. Wukɔ zang tĩng shɔɔnang ka tipi Asiya ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ jèe Marayamu ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang tɔ gbãng gbãng ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ, nyaa.

Nɔ́ɔ jee Adaranika nɛɛ Yuniya, ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Yahudi naa nkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang mã ri nɛɛ n ka sãa ɓɛɛ nyaa. Zang zi ri nung tɔ gbãng gbãng ka teteng rɛɛ zang shonang Kirisi. Rikɔ gaayu Laa dũnnang shɔɔnang, a n naa dũngnɛ.
Nɔɔ jèe m masang Ampiliyalu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu gbãng gbãng nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu zang Kpanti Kirisi naa nkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ jèe m Urubanu zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shonang Kirisi nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ nyaa. Nɔɔ ti jèe m masang Isitaki ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe m Abali ɓɔɔ zang ri zi tɔ nɛɛ palɛ Kirisi shonang nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ nyaa. Nɔ́ɔ ti jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Aristobulu ɓɛɛ nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe m Hirodiyɔn nyaa. Hirodiyɔn ɓi doo zang Yahudi kɔ naa nkɔ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Narikisa ɓɛɛ nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Tarafina nɛɛ Tarafusa nyaa. Ri pàlɛ́ Laa doo shonang kɔ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti jèe masang Barasisa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa. Ɓi jaa soro ɓɔɔ pálɛ́ shonang Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ jèe m Rufu nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti nɛɛ shonang Kpanti Yeesɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ ti jèe m ɓéenàa ɓɔɔ nwang kaa doo nàá mɛɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ, nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Asekiritu, nɛɛ Filigon nɛɛ Hami nɛɛ Patoroba nɛɛ Hama nɛɛ rɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Filologu nɛɛ Juliya, a ɓɔɔ Neru nɛɛ ɓéenàa, a Olimpa nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nyaa.
Nɔɔ jèe zɔɔ nyaa, nɔɔ kɔ̃ng zɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Kirisi kɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri jée nɔɔ nyaa.

Manzung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri basɛ teteng zang, a ri ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, ri yaa gbalang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri tusu nɔɔ vuu náa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ zang tusu nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa gbalang ɓarɛ katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ naa weɓe ri pàlɛ́ ɓarɛ Kpanti ɓuru Kirisi shonang kpang, ri kãa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ buru ɓarɛ. Ri nwãarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɛlɛɓɛlɛ, nɛɛ nyaa tĩnang ɓarɛ.
Zang piti ri tãa nyaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yiti Ruu Laa gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tãa tĩnang manɛ. N kasɛ nɔɔ zũng katɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu manɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
Laa ɓɔɔ shing ruu, ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ naa lasɛ naa vuu palɛnang Sheetang ditɔ, wu shingnɛ nɔ́ɔ náa Sheetang kaa nɛɛ doo. N gaayi Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Timoti zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shonang nɛɛ wu jée nɔɔ nyaa. Lukiyu, nɛɛ Jaasong a ɓɔɔ Susibatara ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Yahudi kɔ, ri jée nɔɔ nyaa jong.
Nkɔ Tatiyu ɓɔɔ n bèe labeenang keɓe, n jée nɔɔ nyaa jong n m zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Kirisi kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Gaayu, zang ɓɔɔ n nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, jée nɔɔ nyaa jong. Erasitu ɓɔɔ zang gari ri shing saka ka naa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ manzung ɓuru Kpaatu ɓɔɔ dũng doo Kirisi kɔ, ri jée nɔɔ nyaa.
Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon. Nɔngkɔ.
Ruu dɔɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ nɔɔ shing danggn gbãng gbãng, ka doo Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Bɛ̀ɛ́ zang waasɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe katɔ, ka sáa dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɛɛ, a zang nwangsɛ tɔ kati.

A kãntang keɓe labeenang ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri beere shing tɔ, ruu niizang nwangsɛ bii tɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ nwàng ɓi ningkãari dòndòng, ti kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ zang koo piti ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang keɓe. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri ɓaa shoo kaa nyaa Laa, ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ.
Ruu dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ zũng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ dòndòng, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ.
Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ m katɔ, a zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ, n nwang zang nyaa shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ruu nɛɛ manzung ɓuru Sɔtanɛ.

Ruu bèé zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka Koranti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ arɛ nɔ́ɔ nwang naa zang piti ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ dalɛ koo piti ɓɔɔ ri ɓaarɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
Ruu gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri a nɔɔ tĩnang tãanang, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
N zãa Laa diki diki, ka ruu manɛ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ bang ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ waasɛ̃, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ka gbalang náabm̀ náabm̀. Shing nɔɔ, a nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang, a nɔɔ ti zunung yee ɓiɓɛ rannang ɓɛɛ.
Rúu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka tĩng, ka yuu Kirisi ɓaa saara tɔ ka yeti manɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yàa nɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ́ kagn ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang kpang. Ka wee nɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwàngsɛ́ ruu yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn ɓee.
Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, yiti nɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbãayu, Laa wu naa dɔng nɔɔ ruu kaa takpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
Laa pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi katɔ diki diki. Wukɔ ɓàa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ naa ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, n gaa nɔɔ ka ruu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, nyaa manɛ wu daa gbete, ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ti kusu zɔɔ kpang. Rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ wu daa gbete, nɔ́ɔ ti palɛ vuu gbete.
Rɛɛ manzung, n kɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Kuluwi ri kɔɔ m nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri haa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka teteng manɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ keɓe, nɔɔ kúsù yuu manɛ ka vaa vaa. Zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bulu,” zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “N dũng m Apolo,” zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bituru”. A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Kirisi.”
N kaaɓi n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, Kirisi kusu bii katɔ ya? Nɔɔ kɔɔ m jong, zang ɓáa nkɔ Bulu naa ka laa ka ruu manɛ ya? Zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ nung mɛɛ ya?
N zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ batizima ka vaa manɛ gbete kpang ɓɛɛ. N pàlɛ̀ m rɛɛ Kiripu nɛɛ Gaayu kɔ batizima shɛ̃ɛning.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kagn nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
(N kpaa danggn tɔ. N pàlɛ̀ ɓɔɔ Sitifana nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ batizima. Zang ɓɔɔ n palɛ ri batizima takpang, ɓi rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning.)

Yeesɔ Kirisi shong m nɛɛ, n naa pàlɛ̀ zang wu batizima kpang. Shong m nɛɛ n naa kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa. N nyɔ zang wu nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang, n ti kɔɔ zang ruu nɛɛ zũnang yuu mɛɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kati nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang kagn ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka yuu laa ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri shàarɛ́ kana, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka yuu laa ɓi vuu shoko waati. Ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓuru kana, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu palɛnang Laa kagn ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N bɛ̃ɛ zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng dɔɔli nɛɛ kaaɓa. N ti kɔsɔ zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ nɛɛ kaaɓa.”

Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ka koo keɓe, zũnang ɓarɛ kaa waati, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang nyaa dannang zang Yahudi zũnang ɓarɛ ti waati, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti làá zang nyaa ka koo keɓe zũnang ɓarɛ doo waati kɔ. Laa tusu ruu tɔ nɛɛ zũnang zang koo keɓe, ɓi naa ɓɔɔ shoko waati.
Laa ɓɔɔ zũng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang koo ri zi wu nung nɛɛ zũnang ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong, nɛɛ ruu kɔ ruu rangnɛ, a zang risi naa nyaa shoko ɓee.
Zang Yahudi ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kaa gn nɛɛ ruu keɓe niizang. Zang Heleni ri ti kasɛ ɓarɛ zũnang.
A ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang ɓuru ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Ruu keɓe làsɛ́ rɛɛ zang Yahudi yeti katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ ɓi ruu shoko.

Zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ nɛɛ ri nwáng zang ɓiɓɛ, zang Yahudi nɛɛ zang Heleni piti, ri zi ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓuru ka bìí Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ, a wukɔ ti tusu ri naa ɓɔɔ zũnang Laa nwang ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng ka jĩng shɔnzang naa Laa palɛ vuu shoko ɓɛɛ, vuu shoko keɓe ɓa zũnang shɔnzang katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zirɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa lakɛ naa ɓi bii kpang, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔɔli palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.

Manzung, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ karɛ ka yeti manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang koo ri zi ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ ri zũng katɔ, kagn dɔɔli kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kagn, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang ti a ri bannang katɔ, kagn dɔɔli kpang kɔ doori.

Zang ɓɔɔ zang koo ri zi ri naa ri shoko, Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ rikɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri zũng katɔ ɓɛɛ kati. Ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, ka koo keɓe kɔ jong, nɛɛ tɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃ɛ katɔ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ zang kɔsɔ nɛɛ kaaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang risi naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu sɔɔrɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, yuu nɛɛ mani ka dii.
Laa palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu lakɛ jĩng kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka ting ɓiɓɛ kpang.

Nɔɔ ɓákɛ̀ zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka Ruu Laa kɔ gbete. Ti doo Laa kɔ shingnɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi a ruu zũnang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Ti ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ, Laa zí ruu naa zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. A ti tá yuu ɓuru tɔ ka vuu shi kpang nandon, risi ruu, ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ n á ka nɔng manɛ tĩng shɔɔnang, n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ katɔ ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. N a wu nɛɛ nyaa naa tãa, a ɓɔɔ zinang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ kpang.
N kɔɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n tɔɔ, wee n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓee, n rɛ̃rɛ ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu ka laa a vɔ ɓɛɛ.
N a naa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. N kaa vɔrɔ, bii zàa m kagn.
Ka ɓɔɔ n rang nɔɔ yee Laa kaɓa, n ɓakɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ zũnang shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe kpang. Ɓi Suru Laa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa kɔ tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ, vuu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, dĩiri danggn shinnang manɛ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓi vuu zũnang shɔnzang kpang, ɓi naa vuu palɛnang Laa shingnɛ.

Ruu zi tɔ nɔngkɔ, a ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng danggn tɔ, ruu zũnang Laa doo nɛɛ mani. A zɔ̃̌ng zũnang kaɓa ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ɓɔɔ koo jaa knti keɓe kpang. À ɓi ti nɛɛ bìí zang ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ ri shàarɛ́ ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zũnang kɔ ruu rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, ɓi zũnang Laa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa waasɛ katɔ, shɔnzang ri zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa pálɛ́ vuu keɓe doo ka tĩng bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mãa koo keɓe gn kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu naa nwang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng bannang ɓiɓɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ kagn gbete, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe ɓɔɔ zi zũnang keɓe kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa ri nɛɛ zi katɔ, ri nɛɛ ɓáa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang bannang piti, naa ka laa kpang.
Vuu keɓe nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ:
“Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri zi gngn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ti
tãa gngn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ti rɛ̃rɛ gngn
ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, Laa shĩili rɛɛ vuu keɓe kɔ,
ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Laa nwangsɛ rukɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ naa Suru ɓiɓɛ. Suru Laa zi yeti vuu tɔ nandon dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ti zili rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi suru zang kaɓa kɔ zi shɛ̃ɛning. Laa doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang Laa kpang, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ kɔ zi gbete.
Suru ɓɔɔ Laa shìng ruu ka yeti ɓuru, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ, ɓi ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kpang. Suru keɓe kɔ shing ruu, ruu zi vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa á ruu waati ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang keɓe, ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ wu nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tùsù ruu nɛɛ zũnang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Suru Laa tùsù ruu vuu keɓe. Ruu nwangsɛ ɓuru dĩiri vuu Suru Laa, ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kagn ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa nɛɛ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, ta vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ zang ɓi kpang. Zang kaɓa zi vuu keɓe kpang, vuu bìí nwang wu ɓi naa vuu shoko, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Suru Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning shing zang, zang zi vuu kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ zi dĩiri vuu keɓe ɓi katɔ nandon, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi kaa takpang.
Nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang Kpanti Laa kagn ya?
Zang ɓɔɔgn tusu wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ya?”
Ɓɔɔ ɓuru Suru Laa ɓi kagn bii ɓuru, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru ɓi gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kirisi.

Niizang rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, n rang nɔɔ yee naa zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kagn yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. N rang nɔɔ yee naa shɔnzang waati kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nwáng doo naa wujɛ rɛ̃ɛting waati ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
N á nɔɔ míi, wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ daa naa shaanang gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Bìí kãntang keɓe nɔɔ ti daa naa shaanang gn kpang kɔ sasak.

Nɔɔ nwang doo naa zang koo keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa doo sũnyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ haa doo nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa nɔɔ pálɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ doo naa zang koo keɓe kɔ kpang ya? Nɔɔ palɛ wu naa ɓɔɔ zang piti palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
Naa zang gbete kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bulu,” a zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Apolo”. Wee nɔɔ pálɛ̀ nɔngkɔ ɓee, nɔɔ doo naa zang koo keɓe kɔ.
Zang ɓaa wi nɛɛ Apolo wiya? Zang ɓaa wi nɛɛ Bulu wiya? Ruu ɓuru zang shonang Laa kɔ shɛn. Nɔɔ zi Kirisi nɛɛ naa ɓuru.
Rùu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ ri lang jaa ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ ɓaa jĩng vuu, a Apolo ɓaarɛ mii kagn. Ɓi Laa kɔ ka bm gbete shingnɛ jĩng vuu tarɛ, a bangnɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓáa jĩng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàarɛ́ mii kagn, ri ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ, jĩng vuu tarɛ, a bangnɛ, wukɔ ɓa ri nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jĩng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓaarɛ mii kagn, ri ɓarɛ gbete, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa zɔɔ kpang. Laa naa á zang ɓu vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Wee ruu ziti ɓee, ruu kpalɛ yuu ɓuru nɛɛ Laa ruu palɛ shonang. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa jaa ɓɔɔ Laa lang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ manɛ naa gãa ɓɔɔ Laa mãa ɓɛɛ.

Laa pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng, yáa m nɛɛ nkɔ n gaayu shonang kaɓa. N loo doo gãa kaɓa waasɛ̃, naa zang ɓɔɔ zunung gãa mãanang katɔ ɓɛɛ. N loo doo gãa tɔ a zang ɓɔɔ mãa ɓi ka gãa. Zang ɓu wu palɛ waasɛ̃ naa ɓɔɔ wu mãa gãa bìí ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ lòó doo gãa ɓɔɔgn takpang. Doo gãa ɓɔɔ Laa looyi, ɓi wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu zinariya, zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu azurufa, zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu ɓarɛ tari ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ri mãa gãa nɛɛ mani ka yuu doo gãa kɔ zang loo ɓee. A zang ɓɔɔ ri see ɓarɛ laa, nɛɛ wisi, a ɓɔɔ furu vuu, ri mãa gãa nɛɛ mani, ka yuu doo gãa keɓe.

Diki ɓɔɔ shonang zang naa tusu bii kagn a ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbãayu ka koo keɓe, Laa naa gãsɛ shonang zang ɓu nɛɛ waa, waa kɔ naa túsù kati waasɛ̃ naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng shonang zang ɓu nwàng ɓɛɛ.
Naa gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ka yuu doo gãa kaɓa nɛɛ shii katakata ka yeti waa, waa nɛɛ shaa kpang, Laa a zang kaɓa vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa gãa zang kaɓa waa shaayi zang kaɓa wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang kpang. Laa ta yuu zang kaɓa katɔ naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang wɔ nɛɛ yeti waa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ nɔkɔ Gãa Laa, a Suru Laa nwàng ka yeti manɛ kpang ya?
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ lasɛ Gãa Laa keɓe, Laa naa nyɔ zang kaɓa vɔrɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng Gãa keɓe nɛɛ wu nwang ɓɔɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Gãa keɓe ɓi nɔkɔ.
Nɔ́ɔ nwãarɛ yuu manɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zũng dɔɔli ka yeti vuu koo keɓe, wu risi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa shoko, tɔ̀ɔ, wu zũng kati.
N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zili ka koo keɓe nɛɛ ɓi zũnang, ka jĩng Laa ɓi vuu shoko. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa niizang kɔ nwani. Zang beeyi nɛɛ,
“Laa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng dɔɔli
ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang zũnang ɓɛɛ.”
Zang ti bèe ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ,
“Laa zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang zang ɓɔɔ
ri zũng katɔ ɓi waati.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu di yuu ka bii shɔnzang kpang. Vuu piti ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ.

Naa doo wiya? Naa doo Bulu, naa Apolo naa Bituru, ri ɓarɛ zang shonang manɛ. Koo nandon, nɛɛ suru bii, nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ nandon. Naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zili kãntang keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ a doo ka knti, ri ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ nandon.
Nɔɔ manɛ kaa ɓɔɔ Kirisi, a Kirisi ɓi kaa ɓɔɔ Laa.
N kasɛ zang piti ri zirɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu dũng wu ɓɛɛ, Laa a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ ka naa, nɛɛ ruu gãng jĩng kagn.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ka bìí zang ɓɔɔ gãng zang jĩng ka vuu ɓɛɛ, wu gãng jĩng ka vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete.

Naa nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ n palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓi wukɔ kpãa m kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ n palɛ vuu shi kpang. Naa ri dɔɔ m doo katɔ, ɓi wukɔ kpãa m kpang. Naa doo nkɔ nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n dɔ̀ng yuu mɛɛ ruu kpang.
Niizang, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ jĩng kpantɛ m, n palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ti nkɔ dɔ̌ng yuu mɛɛ ruu nɛɛ zang yaa m tɔ kpang. Ɓi Laa dɔ̌ng m ruu ɓiri.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔng zang ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa gbongkarɛ diki ɓiɓɛ wu arɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ gbãayu kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa nwangsɛ dĩiri vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ̃ katɔ kãntang keɓe ditɔ. Ti naa nwangsɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ zang ɓu rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ditɔ. Ka diki kaɓa kɔ, Laa naa dɔ̀ɔ zang ɓu nɛɛ dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ daa teetee nɛɛ zang ɓu ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ manzung, ka vuu kɔ n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ɓee, n tuu Apolo a ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ n gã̀sɛ́ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ mani, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zi kati. N ti kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.” Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ti zì zang ɓɔɔ naa vĩi kpang.

Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ɓu wiya? Vuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ wu Laa kɔ a mɔɔ kpang kagn ya? Laa kɔ nɛɛ a mɔɔ vuu piti, a mɔɔ rangkɛ yee vi bang bang ka yuu vuu kaɓa naa kaka ɓaaɓɛ a mɔɔ viya?

Nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ manɛ tɔ nandon. Nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang ying. Nɔɔ nwáng kpanti tɔ, a rùu ɓuru gn kpanti kpang. Naa nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpanti niizang, wukɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̃ɔ, ruu nɛɛ roo kpanti kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ.

N zirɛ, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ Laa zɔ̃ng ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ rukɔ ruu waa nyaa knti. Rùu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ zang dɔng ri ruu nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu shìi ka dalɛ ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ka koo nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri tɛ̃ɛ ruu jĩng kaa bii.

Ruu nwang kaa naa zang shoko, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Rùu lakɛ naa ɓuru bii kpang. Kaka ɓi kagn bii manɛ. Zang seng nɔɔ manɛ katɔ, ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ri vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
Wee ruu rang yee ka nyaa ɓee, nyɔkɔ nyɔ ruu katɔ, sutu mã ruu, ruu hã̀lɛ̀ ɓuru sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii, zang dang ruu jĩng, a gãa ɓɔɔ ruu nwáng kagn ti kpang.
Ruu palɛ shonang nɛɛ naa ɓuru gbãng gbãng. Zang nɛɛ dãlɛ ruu, ruu gaa ri Laa nɛɛ, Laa wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ. Zang dang ruu jĩng a ruu mã danggn.

Zang ri nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru, ruu kàsɛ́ ri nyaa ɓuru tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ri risi ruu naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang vang ka dòndòng ka koo ɓɛɛ. Naa doo kãntang keɓe, ri zí ruu naa zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka tipi, zang naalɛ ri nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
N bèé nɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu nɔɔ m vuu kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tùsù nɔɔ vuu, ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi doo labang kopi, dáa manɛ ɓɔɔ yi nɔɔ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani. Ɓi nkɔ nwàng naa daa manɛ ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nkɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ n shong Timoti nɛɛ wu a ka bìí manɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa kpaa nɔɔ danggn nwannang mɛɛ ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi, naa ɓɔɔ n tùsù zang ka nɔng piti, a ɓɔɔ ti ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ piti, nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Timoti ɓi jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nɛɛ wu gbete ka bìí Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ti palɛ shonang Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri lakɛ jĩng, ri kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ n nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa leng nɔɔ kpang ya?

Laa nɛɛ kasɛ nyaa tɔ, diki bee kpang, n a ditɔ ka nɔng manɛ. N naa zi kati nɛɛ jĩng mɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ jĩng keɓe, ri nɛɛ ri zunung palɛnang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti roonang Laa ɓi yee ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang, ɓi vuu naa vuu palɛnang Laa.
Nɔɔ kasɛ wiya? Ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ gbãa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ yeti ɓɔɔ valɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang kasɛnang, ka bii manɛ ya?
Zang ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ri palɛ dũndũng. Naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri pálɛ̀ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang keɓe kpàng. N tãayi nɛɛ zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, rooro nɛɛ soro ɓeedaa.
Zang ri nɛɛ pálɛ̀ naa weɓe ka teteng manɛ, nɔɔ palɛ biya nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ viya? Nɔɔ káa katɔ kɔ jong, ka ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ. Nɔɔ hing zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang keɓe katɔ, wu yaa teteng manɛ.

Wee n ka nɔng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee, n rɛ̃rɛ ruu manɛ katɔ. N dɔ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ruu tɔ, nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, n nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete, yeti mɛɛ dàá gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ. Naa vuu palɛnang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ti kagn teteng manɛ ning.
Nɔɔ yàa Sheetang zang keɓe, wu lasɛ yɔpɔ bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, suru bii ɓiɓɛ wu wɔ kati, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ naa gbãayu ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ naa wee nɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓee kpang. Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ yisi tɔkɔlɔng tàntɛ́ yeti borodi bàanang wu shing borodi wu puuyi kpang ya?

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe nɔɔ yaa teteng manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ bàá ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, ruu ɓuru kaa kalang kalang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nwang naa jamɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, ka laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa pasika ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yáa nɔɔ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ta nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu shi kpang kaɓa, wu baa kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ teteng ɓuru kpang. Ruu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ruu ti dũng gbalang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete. Kaa naa weɓe kɔ, ruu nwang naa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang tingkiring ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi ri sháa ka nyaalaa pasika ɓɛɛ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu shaa nyaalaa kaɓa jong tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ n bee nɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng ɓɛɛ kpang.

N kɔɔ wu nɛɛ nɔɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ri ti palɛ dũndũng, a ri ti shing jĩng ka vuu zang, ri ɓɔɔrɔ vuu, ɓɔɔ ri ti bang vaka, ri ɓarɛ nɛɛ ruu ka koo keɓe diki diki. Ruu palɛ biya ruu nwàng nɛɛ ri kpang viya?

N kɔɔ nɔɔ m nɛɛ, nɔɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu dũng Laa a palɛ dũndũng, shing jĩng ka vuu zang, ti bang doo vaka, dãlɛ zang, ti ɓoo saa, a ti ɓɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ti shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe kpang tingkiring.
Zang a m naa nɛɛ n jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ruu kpang. Rùu màngkɛ́ ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ri nɛ̀ɛ́ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang.
Ɓi Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng wu kpang ruu. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, “Nɔɔ hing zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang katɔ, wu yaa teteng manɛ.”

Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ vuu shi kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓáa nyaavaa ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, kpang ya? Wu nɛ̀ɛ́ daa nɛɛ zang kaɓa ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ jong kpang ya?
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ ri naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kpang ya? Naa nɔkɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu, a nɔɔ dɔ̀ng zɔɔ ruu, ka ruu vuu tɔkɔlɔng tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàlɛ́ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ rukɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ruu kpang ya? Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, a ruu dɔ̀ng zang ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu pàlɛ́ zɔɔ ka koo keɓe kpang ka ruu viya?
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ pálɛ̀ zɔɔ vuu, nɔɔ daa ɓaa zɔɔ nyaavaa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ sèng ri kpang gbãagbãa, ri dɔng nɔɔ ruu.
Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu nɔɔ kpang ya? Zang kagn teteng manɛ gbete ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ ɓɔɔ naa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu kpang ya?
Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa daa ɓàá ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ nyaavaa, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, wu daa jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.

Niizang, naa nɔɔ ɓàarɛ́ zɔɔ nyaavaa, ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Naa zang palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang, mɔɔ mã danggn wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ɓa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa ɓaa zang nyaavaa katɔ. Naa zang mulu mɔɔ, a mɔɔ yaa ka nɔngkɔ gbã̀ágbãa, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ nɛɛ yáa zang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang jong, nɔkɔ pàlɛ́ zɔɔ shi kpang ka naa manɛ. Nɔɔ ti mulu zɔɔ, wee nɔɔ jaa nàá zɔɔ ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta yeti shi kpang, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang. Nɔ́ɔ nwãarɛ yuu manɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka, zang ɓɔɔ ri rooro nɛɛ soro zang, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri rooro doo nɛɛ zang varɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓɔ̀ɔ́ shɔngɓɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng ka vuu zang, zang ɓɔɔ sàa si ri, zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mulu zang, nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang keɓe, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang.

Ɓeleng, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ, ri nwang nwannang shi kpang keɓe kɔ. A Laa naa kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang manɛ, nɔɔ kaa kalang kalang. A shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓiɓɛ. Laa zí nɔɔ manɛ kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ a bìí ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ruu bang wu ɓɛɛ.

A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Zang zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.” Niizang zang zãa mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang. Wu vuu piti tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, zang zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, a n kasɛ kaa takpang, vuu ɓɔɔ wu yi m gbãng gbãng n raa kaa naa jaafoo vuu bìí kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Laa mãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ zang shaa ka buru. Ti mãa buru ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang shaa ɓɛɛ.” Nɔngkɔ niizang. Lee ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi buru ditɔ, nɛɛ vuu shaanang ning. Laa mãa bii nɛɛ zang palɛ wu dũndũng nɛɛ mani kpang. Laa mãa bii nɛɛ zang wu dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ mani. Ti kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ a bii vuu ɓɔɔ bii kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ saa. Laa naa wisi ruu paa ditɔ jong nɛɛ saa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ.
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ bii manɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang ya? Naa n tuu bii Yeesɔ Kirisi dang gbete n ɓakɛ nɛɛ bii zang soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wàázaa tɔ̃ɔ ya? Nɔ́ɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring.

Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wàázaa ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa shɔnzang gbete kpang ya? Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “zang ziti keɓe ri nwáng kaa shɔnzang gbete.”
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, suru ɓiɓɛ nwang kaa gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ yáa dũndũng palɛnang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ nandon, zang palɛ wu ka bii kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ dũndũng, pàlɛ́ ɓi bii ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang.
Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ bìí manɛ nwàng ɓi naa Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa nwang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Laa shing Suru ɓiɓɛ ka yeti manɛ. Bii manɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Laa.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, hoo nɔɔ nɛɛ zĩi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a Laa bannang nɛɛ bii manɛ.
N tɔɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bèe m labeenang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu gee soro kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
A ka ruu ɓɔɔ dũndũng shang dɔɔli, zang varɛ ɓu wu gee soro ɓiɓɛ, zang soro ɓu wu ti gee varɛ ɓiɓɛ.
Zang varɛ wu pàlɛ̀ ɓeeso vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang varɛ pàlɛ́ soro ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang soro wu ti pàlɛ̀ ɓeevɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ soro pàlɛ́ ɓeevɛ ɓɛɛ.
Bii zang soro ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓeevɛ. Bii zang varɛ ɓi ti doo ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓeeso.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔ́ɔ zãa zɔɔ bii manɛ kpang. Naa nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, nɔɔ kà zɔɔ diki nɛɛ nɔɔ gaa Laa, tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ zãa zɔɔ bii. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka zɔɔ nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nɔɔ ɓang bii nɛɛ zɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang nɛɛ walɛ gbalang wu gãsɛ nɔɔ, wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, n dang nɔɔ wu nyaa nɛɛ, zang ɓu wu gee soro kpang. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ m katɔ nɛɛ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, nɔɔ gee soro.
Ka jĩng mɛɛ, naa zang ri gee soro kpang, naa wee n gee kpang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. A Laa palɛ zang kaa bm bm. A zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu palɛ vuu hn, a ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu palɛ vuu ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro gn kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gee varɛ gn kpang, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ suvɔ, n rang yee keɓe nɛɛ rikɔ. Ri nwang nwannang yuu ɓarɛ, ri gee zɔɔ kpang naa wee n nwang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ ri zunung yuu ɓarɛ yitinang kpang, ri gee zɔɔ. Naa zang gee zɔɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ɓɔɔ sɛ̃ɛrɛ bii ɓannang nɛɛ soro nɛ̀ɛ́ shaa mɔɔ naa waa ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee varɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang soro wu seepaa gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wu nkɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ.
Naa zang soro nɛɛ seepaa doo nɛɛ mani, wu nwang nɔngkɔ, wu gee varɛ takpang. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, wu gbãayu ka gãa ɓeevɛ ka nɔng. Zang varɛ wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ kpang tingkiring.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu keɓe. Ruu keɓe nkɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ, wu nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi gee soro ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Kirisi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Jaa soro bìí, nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ wu katɔ, zang keɓe wu hing soro bìí kpang.
A naa zang soro ɓɔɔ gee zang varɛ ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang. Zang varɛ keɓe nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ wu katɔ, wu seepaa kpang.

N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang Laa zɔ̃́ng wu ka ruu soro ɓiɓɛ. Laa ti zɔ̃ng jaa soro ɓɔɔ dũng wu kpang ka ruu varɛ ɓiɓɛ. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, wujɛ ɓarɛ ri nwang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ Laa kpang. Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe Laa tà wujɛ ɓarɛ, ri kaa zang ɓiɓɛ.

Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu gee ɓɛɛ katɔ, wu yaa wu. Ri nɛɛ yaa zɔɔ tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ka teteng ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang varɛ, nɛɛ ti zang soro, tá nyaa dannang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kpang Laa tá yuu varɛ manɛ katɔ, ka ruu manɛ kpang ya? Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ varɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ nɔɔ zi kpang Laa ta yuu soro manɛ katɔ ka ruu manɛ kpang ya?

Zang ɓu wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu nwang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu wu ti nwang naa ɓɔɔ wu nwáng ka tĩng a Laa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ka teteng zang Laa nandon nɛɛ zang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ zang yee wu shaa tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu gɔ̃ koo bii ka yuu shaa ka nɔng, wu nwang kaa naa bɛ̀ɛ́ wu yee shaa ka takpang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti kagn ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ yee shaa gn kpang, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang yee wu shaa kpang.
Naa zang yee shaa katɔ, naa zang yee shaa doo kpang, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe nandon, zang ri dũng rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓu wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka tĩng, a Laa naa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Naa Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ jaafoo, mɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kpãa mɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ jaafoo ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa jaafoo nwannang katɔ, mɔ́ɔ ti yaayi.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa mɔɔ jaafoo ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kãntang keɓe, mɔɔ ɓaa tɔ̀ɔ́ jaafoo kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓákɛ́ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jaafoo kpang, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa, nwáng jaafoo Kirisi tɔ.
Laa ningsi vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a hoo nɔɔ nɛɛ mani. Nɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ́ jaafòó shɔnzang kpang, nɔɔ manɛ kaa jaafòó Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n tɔɔ, zang ɓu wu yaa naa ɓɔɔ wu nwángnɛ́ ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang, wu ɓakɛ yuu ɓi nɛɛ Laa sasak.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi Laa a m nyaa dannang ka yuu ruu keɓe kpang. N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ m ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n nwang zang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang shing gn ka wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ, naa zang nwang waati zang gee soro kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a ka naa ɓɔɔ zang dang jĩng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee soro tɔ, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee soro gn kpang, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu gee soro kpang.

Naa n kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ piti, naa zang ɓɔɔ gee soro palɛ wu vuu shi kpang, kpang. Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro tɔ, ri naa dang jĩng dɔɔli, ka koo keɓe. N kasɛ nɛɛ jĩng dannang kaɓa wu à ka yuu manɛ kpang.
Manzung, mɔ́ɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee. Diki ɓɔɔ Laa ka ruu ɓɛɛ, bee takpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro tɔ, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ soro ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri nwáng naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang, ri nwáng naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ shonang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ri shing danggn nandon ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, koo keɓe naa wee wu kãntang ɓee, waa nyaa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
N kasɛ kpang, vuu keɓe ri kpãa nɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ gee soro gn kpang, rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka ruu vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ gbete. Kasɛ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ wu tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ gee soro tɔ, rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu koo keɓe. Kasɛ nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ wu tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ vãarɛ kaa tɔ nɔng ziti. Zang soro ri doo nɔngkɔ. Zang soro ɓɔɔ varɛ ɓiɓɛ tɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang, nɛɛ wujɛ soro ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ri tuu yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ bii ɓarɛ nandon ri a wu. A zang soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee varɛ tɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu koo keɓe. Kasɛ nɛɛ ɓeevɛ wu tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ.

N kɔɔrɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ n nɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ gbalang kpang. N kasɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàlɛ́ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi shonang nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shu vuu tɔ ka yuu jaa soro ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ zirɛ sɛ̃ɛrɛ roonang nɛɛ jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ mãa wu kana dɔɔli, kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ wu nɛ̀ɛ́ tuu soro ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ, wu tuu soro ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Palɛ wu vuu shi kpang, kpang.

Naa zang zɔ̃̀ng nɛɛ yeti zang, zang shing zang wu nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning kpang, nɛɛ zang gee jaa soro ɓɔɔ wu shu vuu tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kaɓa kpang, rɛ̃rɛnang keɓe nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ. Ti zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ gee jaa soro bìí kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gee jaa soro ɓɔɔ wu shu vuu tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, pálɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ geenang kɔ pálɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ ɓa zang ɓɔɔ gee katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang soro ɓɔɔ gee varɛ tɔ, Laa ɓakɛ wu ɓi tɔ nɛɛ varɛ ɓiɓɛ dòndòng. A naa varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔrɛ, wàlɛ́ gbalang katɔ wu gee varɛ ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ bii tĩng wu nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu gee doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa katɔ kɔ.
Ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ, naa jaa soro kaɓa gee varɛ ɓɔɔ kpang, tãa tĩnang ɓa ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ gee varɛ ɓɔɔgn katɔ. N zi tɔ, Suru Laa kɔ tusu m vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee.

N kaaɓi, n rang yee ka yuu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang bang vaka nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang tɔ. Niizang, ruu nandon ruu zi vuu tɔ. A zɔ̃ng vuu zinang kaɓa shing zang, zang wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ɓi zɔɔ kasɛnang kɔ yi zang naa ka bii dɔɔli.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zi vuu tɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu nɛ̀ɛ́ zi ɓɛɛ gn kpang.
A zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ Laa, Laa zi wukɔ nɛɛ wu zang ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang bang vaka nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, suru ɓi kagn bii vaka kpang. Ruu ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓi gbete kɔ nwani.
Naa vuu doo kagn ka lapa, nɛɛ tipi gaagaa ɓɔɔ zang bang ri naa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ zang ri risi ri naa kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, Laa ɓi gbete. Wukɔ Daa, wukɔ mãa vuu piti, wukɔ ti mãa ruu nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a wu bannang. Kpanti ti gbete kɔ nwani, wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Laa mãa vuu piti nɛɛ bìí ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Rùu ti nwang ningkãari ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.

A kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ zang piti ri zi tɔ nɛɛ vaka ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ bii ĩi ri tɔ nɛɛ vaka. Kãntang ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu shaanang kaɓa ɓi ɓɔɔ vaka. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ri shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang kaɓa ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu shaanang kaɓa shing ri, ri nwang zang shi kpang.

Ruu zi tɔ, naa ruu shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, naa ruu shaa doo kpang, vuu shaanang kaɓa, shing ruu, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa kpang. Naa ruu shaa kpang, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Naa ruu shaayi naa risi ruu, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
Nɔɔ zi manɛ tɔ nɛɛ, Laa yaa ruu gbalang tɔ, ruu shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang ɓu nandon. Nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃ nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ shing zang ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang ɓarɛ zũng gn kpang ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang.

Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang kaɓa shing ri, ri nwáng zang shi kpang, ri zì mɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zì ɓaa tɔ, mɔɔ nwang ka gãa vaka mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang nwãa ka ruu vaka bannang. Shing wu katɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang vaka jong.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, mɔɔ shing zang kaɓa yaa gbalang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ jong ning gbalang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ya?

Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ ɓaazung manɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ri, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ shing ri, ri nwang zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ jong.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa n zirɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n shaayi shing manzung katɔ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang, n shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa takpang dòndòng. N nɛ̀ɛ́ shing manzung wu ning gbalang.

N zi m tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zãa m katɔ kagn kpang. N m zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. N ti zi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ jĩng mɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ n atɛ ri nɛɛ ri naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ doo kpang nɛɛ n zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang. Nɔɔ zi manɛ tɔ nɛɛ n m zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi ka nɔkɔ nɛɛ n zang shonang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Naa zang ri rang ruu shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ, n kɔɔ ri m nɛɛ,
Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang a ruu vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?

Vuu ɓɔɔ zãyi naa ruu gee zang soro ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ kagn ya? Jaa soro bìí wu ti daarɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu daarɛ nɛɛ ruu, naa ɓɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ nimbang nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ ɓi nkɔ nɛɛ Baranaba ruu palɛ shonang nɛɛ naa ɓuru tɔ̀ɔ ruu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu shaa ɓɛɛ ya?
Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ kagn ta sĩiri, wu ti kãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ya? Zang ɓɔɔ kagn lang jaa shaa vuu ɓɔɔ wu lang ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Jagãng napo ri ɓoo mii napo kpang ya?
N kɔ̀ɔ́ ruu keɓe, wu naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rang yee waati kpang. Labeenang nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ.
Zang bèe nɔngkɔ, ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ shonang nɛɛ napo ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ mã wu nyaa ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang.” Laa kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu napo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya?
Kpang, Laa kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ lang jaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ waa zee, ri shíng jĩng katɔ nɛɛ zang a ri ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ jong ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang vang jĩng vuu ka jaa, ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ Laa tɔ. Ti nwǎng nɔɔ vuu Suru Laa kana ka yeti manɛ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a ruu vuu naa manɛ ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kpang ya?
Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn nɛɛ, nɔɔ a ri vuu naa manɛ katɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ ruu vuu, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ katɔ kpang ya?
Ruu zi tɔ nɔngkɔ, a ruu tɔɔ gngn nɛɛ, ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ a ruu vuu naa manɛ kpang. Ruu kasɛ tɔ ruu dang jĩng kɔ jong, ka ɓɔɔ ruu, nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ̀ɔ́ gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang ka yeti Gãa Laa, ri walɛ vuu shaanang ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang ri alɛ ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti palɛ shonang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn, ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ri dɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ri ɓarɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, zang ri a ri vuu nwannang koo keɓe katɔ, ka ruu shonang ɓarɛ.
Naa doo nɔngkɔ piti, n tɔɔ gngn nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wu a m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Wee n bée laa keɓe, n bee wu nɛɛ nɔɔ a m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. N vɔ katɔ gbã̀ágbãa, ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ n dɔɔ bii kagn ɓɛɛ.
Naa n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa doori, vuu ɓɔɔ naa n tuu yuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Jĩng dannang kagn yuu mɛɛ, n nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kaɓa kpàng ɓɛɛ.

Naa nkɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n nɛɛ shing jĩng katɔ nɛɛ zang a m vuu ɓɔɔ. Á ɓi nkɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n palɛ shonang keɓe kpang, ɓi Laa yaa m shonang keɓe ka naa, a dang m nyaa nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ wu.
N walɛ ɓu viya? Wee n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa waati ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ n walɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa zang wu nɛɛ zang a m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
N m jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang. N m ti ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Naa n doo jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang n risi yuu mɛɛ tɔ naa jaafòó zang piti, tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ zang dɔɔli ri naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi.

N nɛɛ nwàng nɛɛ zang Yahudi n palɛ vuu naa zang Yahudi, tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri, ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. Naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Laa a Musa yi m doo kpang, naa n nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang keɓe yi ri katɔ, n pálɛ̀ bii naa zang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang yi wu doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n gɔ̃ ri jong ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Naa n nɛ̀ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng nyaa dannang Musa kpang, n palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri jong ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n dũ̀ng nyaa dannang Laa kpang, kpang. N dũng m nyaa dannang Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Naa n nwàng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn gbãng gbãng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, n risi yuu mɛɛ naa ri. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri, ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. Naa zang nwang doo naa viya, n kasɛ tɔ n risi yuu mɛɛ naa ri. Tɔ̀ɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zunung katɔ nandon, n gɔ̃ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ teteng ɓarɛ ri a ka bii Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
N palɛ vuu keɓe piti ka ruu, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, n naa walɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a ka bii zang ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kaa jong.
Naa zang gɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ ri yurɛ, zang dɔɔli ri yuku, a zang a ɓi kaa zang gbete, ɓɔɔ à tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ vuu. Nɔɔ yuku nabm, tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu a nɔɔ vuu.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu yurɛ, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ doo yunang waasɛ̃. Wu zãa yuu ɓiɓɛ vuu dɔɔli. Ri pálɛ̀ nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ri vuu ɓɔɔ naa lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ ɓuru nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang dòndòng ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n yuu m kaara, tɔ̀ɔ, n daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang di nyaa yunang kagn ɓɛɛ. N nwang m naa zang ɓɔɔ gaa nyaa, wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
N kasɛ tɔ n dang jĩng ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, tɔ̀ɔ, n yiti yuu mɛɛ kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, Laa nɛ̀ɛ́ naa bɛ̃ɛ m.

Manzung, n kasɛ danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Musa ɓɛɛ kpang. Sãmbong ɓɔɔ kagn sɔ̀ɔ ri tĩng. A ri ti ra ka tipi waati, ri ta waapo ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Waapo ɓɔɔ mii ɓiɓɛ nwɛ̃ɛri ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ ri ra ka dii sãmbong, a ri ti rarɛ ri ta waapo, zang palɛ ri batizima. Batizima kaɓa, tusu kati nɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Musa kɔ nandon.
Ri nandon ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ri nandon ri ɓooro mii ɓɔɔ Laa a ri ɓɛɛ. Mii ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo ɓɛɛ, nwang nɛɛ yeti tari ɓɔɔ daarɛ nɛɛ ri ka ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ka jĩngti ɓɛɛ. Tari kaɓa wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Ri nandon ri zi tĩnang ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ, ri tãa ɓɛɛ katɔ, a ri dɔɔli ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ Laa yeti doo nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri vɔlɔ ka jĩngti. Vɔrɔ ɓarɛ tantɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti.
Vuu kɔ ri palɛ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓee, nwàng ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ɓɔɔ shaarɛ ruu nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing jĩng kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ vuu shi kpang palɛnang naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri palɛ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɔ́ɔ bang vaka naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri bang ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe ri nwang ka tipi, ri shaa vuu shaanang a ri ɓoo saa. A ri seepaa ri sɔ dang.”
Ruu pálɛ̀ nɔɔ dũndũng naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang kaɓa ri palɛ dũndũng, a Laa nyɔ shɔnzang labang dakn bmati tu taati vɔrɔ ka laa gbete.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, ri gãsɛ Laa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing sɔkɔ, sɔkɔ yiki ri. Ruu gãsɛ Laa ɓuru jong naa rikɔ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee, a zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ wukɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ, arɛ naa nyɔ̀kɔ̀ ri vɔrɔ. Ruu gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Vuu kɔ palɛ ri doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓa, nwàng ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ shaarɛ zang nyaa nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ kaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Zang bèe vuu keɓe ka yeti labeenang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang shaarɛ ruu nyaa nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rùu nwàng ɓuru kaa làa ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ nɛɛ wu shii ɓi katɔ nɛɛ kaka gbatagbata, wu palɛ waasɛ̃, wu nɛɛ watɛ ka ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ wu ɓɛɛ.

Vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani, ɓɔɔ ɓi náabm̀ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ zang nandon nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ, ɓi katɔ. Yaa vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka manɛ katɔ, wu a ka bii manɛ kpang. Naa vuu gãsɛnang a ka bii manɛ, a nɔɔ kaka katɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ taarɛ yuu, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ wɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ yaa vaka ta dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ yàa nɔɔ shoo kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ta ka yeti manɛ naa vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee tɔ̃ɔ ya?

Ka laa ɓɔɔ ruu nandon ruu shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu kpaa danggn Kpanti Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ruu zã̀a Laa ka yuu juwa. Naa ruu ɓooyi ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ka zĩi ɓiɓɛ. Ruu nɛɛ sha borodi tɔ, ruu shaayi ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Kirisi nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ.
Ɓɔɔ ruu shaa borodi kaɓa, ruu dɔɔli, a borodi ɓɔɔ ruu shaayi, ɓi kaa gbete. Wukɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu ɓuru gbete nɛɛ zɔɔ.
Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nwannang zang Isirela karɛ. Ka nɔng ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔrɔ wu yɔpɔ kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu nɛɛ viya? N kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓu nɛɛ vaka vuu ɓɔɔ ya? A vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ ya?

Kpang, n kɔ̀ɔ́ wu nɔngkɔ kpang. N kɔɔ m tɔɔ, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ri a vaka ri a ɓarɛ suru shi kpang. Ri dɔɔ ɓarɛ Laa kpang. N kasɛ kpang nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ suru shi kpang, kpang.
Nɔ́ɔ ɓòo vuu ka juwa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɔɔ ti daa ɓóo ɓɔɔ ka juwa suru shi kpang, kpang. Nɔɔ sháa vuu shaanang Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɔɔ ti daa sháa ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔkn kpang.
Rúu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Kpanti Laa kaa sũnyaa nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓa wu kaka katɔ ya?

Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete kpang. Niizang, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete kpang, a wu kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ vuu piti yǐ zang naa ka bii kpang. Niizang, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, a vuu kaa gn ɓɔɔ ri shíng zang, zang ri shíi nɛɛ kaka ka vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓu wu pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔgn naa kaa bii ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ kpang.
Shaa yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ́ ka lumang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ piti ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ”.

Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi kpang, ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, a mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ. Shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kpang nɛɛ naa mɔɔ shaayi, tɔ̃ɔ ya, kɔ shi kpang, kpang ya.
Zang ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ naa kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ, “Vuu shaanang keɓe zang báng vaka nɛɛ mani.” Mɔɔ shaa kpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ kaɓa, nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔyi nɛɛ nɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang tɔ.

Mɔɔ yáa vuu shaanang kaɓa ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang zang kaɓa, wu ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N yáa vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ka ruu viya?
Naa n zã̀a Laa ka yuu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ m ka ruu viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n zãa Laa kagn ɓɛɛ ya?”
N kàsɛ́ zang keɓe nyaa nɛɛ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Naa mɔɔ shaa doo vuu, naa mɔɔ ɓoo doo vuu, palɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a Laa bannang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Palɛ waasɛ̃, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti kpang, naa zang keɓe ri doo zang Yahudi, naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.

Naa ɓɔɔ n kãa m gbalang n shing zang ri tãa tĩnang ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. N shing jĩng m ka vuu ɓɔɔ yi nkɔ naa ka bii shɛ̃ɛning kpang. N shing jĩng m ka vuu ɓɔɔ, yi zang dɔɔli naa ka bii ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
Nɔɔ palɛ vuu doo naa ɓɔɔ n pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
N dɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ danggn ruu mɛɛ nandon, ning nɔɔ kpang ka vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ n tùsù nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A n kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe katɔ. Kirisi wukɔ zang bang ka yuu zang varɛ, a zang bang zang soro ɓi kaa varɛ ɓiɓɛ. A zang bang Kirisi ɓi kaa Laa.
Zang varɛ nɛɛ gaa Laa, naa nɛɛ kɔɔ doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ, wu hãa vuu waayu ka yuu kpang. Naa hãayi sèng Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ kpang.

Ɓɔɔ zang soro naa gaa Laa, naa nɛɛ kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu, wu zúu yuu katɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zuu yuu kpang, sèng ɓeevɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ɓi gbete nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛ wu yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro nɛɛ tɔɔ wu zùu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, wu yele suuyuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpiikpi. Ruu zi tɔ, naa zang yele suuyuu zang soro naa zang ti kpɛ̃yi, ɓi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu zuu yuu katɔ.
Ruu ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ, zang varɛ wu zùu yuu ɓi kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa mãa ɓi zang varɛ naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ti zi bannang Laa ɓi ka bii zang varɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. A zang zi bannang zang varɛ ɓi ka bii ɓeeso.
Zang mãa zang varɛ wu nɛɛ bii zang soro kpang. Zang mãa ɓi zang soro kɔ jong nɛɛ bii zang varɛ.
Laa ti mãa zang soro ka ruu zang varɛ, wu zang varɛ ka ruu zang soro kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang soro wu zuu yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kaa gn nɛɛ ɓeevɛ kɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri lasɛ yeti kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ wu kpang.
Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, ka wee ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓee, zang soro di bii kaa bii zang varɛ. A zang varɛ ti di bii kaa bii zang soro.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng kaka zang varɛ a mãa zang soro nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, kaa zang soro yi zang varɛ kati. A vuu piti à ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Laa.
Nɔɔ zi ɓu biya ka yeti manɛ viya? Naa zang soro shii paa ka Gãa Laa, gaa Laa, zuu yuu ka takpang tɔ̃ɔ ya?
Ka gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ vuu ɓɛɛ, naa suuyuu zang varɛ bée dɔɔli palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ kpang ya?
Ɓɔɔ zang soro suuyuu beebang ɓi vuu jasang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a wu suuyuu beebang tɔɔ, wu zuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe, wu zirɛ nɛɛ ruu nandon nɛɛ zang Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm nandon, ruu palɛ ɓuru nɔngkɔ.
Ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, n dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ bang Laa, nɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang dɔɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang keɓe. Zang ri kɔɔ m nɛɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ ka vaa ka bm bm, nɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang. N zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu keɓe niizang.
Nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔngkɔ kpang, zang zi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wee nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, naa nɔɔ kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang, nɔɔ kpaa manɛ danggn Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang.

N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang kana, zang ɓu shaa ɓi vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri ɓarɛ katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo saa ɓarɛ tɔ, ri puu tɔ, saa yee ri kana.

Ayii! Gãa manɛ kagn ɓɔɔ naa nɔɔ shaa vuu, nɔɔ ti ɓoo vuu ɓoonang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ seng zang Laa kpang ka ruu viya? A nɔɔ ti palɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang vuu yusɛ̃ɛ wiya? N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɔɔ shing ɓu ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ n dɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ katɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe ya? Kpang. N dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
Laa tùsù m vuu kɔ n tusu nɔɔ ɓee doo ka tĩng. Tùsù m tɔɔ nɛɛ zĩi, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ yuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ɓɛɛ. Tuu borodi ka naa,
zãa Laa tɔ, a shalɛ. A kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wee bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n a zang ka ruu manɛ kɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa gn.”

Zang shaa borodi tɔ, a Kpanti Yeesɔ ti tuu juwa ɓɔɔ mii inabi kagn doo nɔngkɔ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Wee juwa ɓɔɔ naa tusu zang nɛɛ Laa mã nyaa shɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɛɛ zĩi mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ pálɛ́ nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓoo ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa gn.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu lɛɛkɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu a nɛɛ mani, lee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaa borodi naa weɓe, a nɔɔ ɓoo mii inabi naa weɓe. Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ manɛ zang nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ vɔ ka ruu zang nandon.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi Yeesɔ keɓe nɛɛ ti ɓoo mii inabi ɓiɓɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nwang naa ɓɔɔ palɛ bii Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ zĩi ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu bengke yeti ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ waasɛ̃ tɔɔ wu shaa borodi Kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ti ɓoo mii inabi ɓiɓɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi dĩiri bii kpanti Yeesɔ keɓe kpang, nɛɛ shaa borodi nɛɛ ti ɓoo mii inabi zang keɓe gɔ̃ jĩng dannang Laa a nɛɛ mani ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, zang dɔɔli ka teteng manɛ vuu palɛ ri katɔ. Nɔɔ ti lakɛ naa ka bii kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ ti vɔlɔ.
Naa ruu bengke yeti ɓuru waasɛ̃ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shaayi, Laa naa dɔ̀ng rùu ruu kpang.
Kpanti Yeesɔ dɔng rùu ruu, a ti gɔ̃ ruu shoo waati kpang, tusu ruu gbalang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔng zang koo ruu kagn wu ɓakɛ ruu kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ ri kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe. Ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ nɔɔ gã zɔɔ katɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nɛɛ nyɔ wu dɔɔli, wu shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu arɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shingnɛ Laa wu dɔng nɔɔ ruu nɛɛ zɔɔ kpalɛnang manɛ kpang. N nɛɛ naa a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, n naa kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, ruu rɛ̃rɛ nɔɔ kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a zang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe katɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ ɓeleng bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ shing danggn gn ka bii Kpanti Laa kpang, zang tusu nɔɔ gbalang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ bang vaka ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu, zang kaɓa ràng yee shi kpang ka yuu Yeesɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zunung kɔɔnang katɔ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti ɓuru.” Kpang, naa Suru Laa kɔ a wu naa kɔɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
