Vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a zang naa nɛɛ zang ri palɛ, ɓi kagn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. A Suru Laa ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani.
Shonang ɓɔɔ zang ti pàlɛ́ Yeesɔ kagn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, a Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ wu shonang keɓe, ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ shonang kagn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, a Laa ɓɔɔ a zang naa vuu palɛnang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu keɓe nandon, ɓi kaa gbete.
Suru Laa tusu zang bii ɓiɓɛ ka bm bm, tɔ̀ɔ, zang kaɓa wu yi zang Laa nandon naa kaa jong ka bii.
Suru Laa a zang gbete naa, wu rang yee nɛɛ zũnang. Suru gbete keɓe, wu ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ.
Suru Laa a zang ɓɔɔ naa, ri shing danggn ka bii kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa ri masɛ zang kɔɔnang.

Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu ɓi naa, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri ɓarɛ naa, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Suru Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa, ri rang nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri ɓarɛ naa, ri kɔɔ zang dĩiri nyaa kaɓa.
Ka vuu kɔɔ zang palɛ nandon ɓee, ɓi doo Suru gbete keɓe kɔ, a zang naa, zang ri palɛ nɔngkɔ. Wu a zang ɓu naa vuu palɛnang kaɓa náabm̀, naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ, a raa bii shɔnzang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. A bii shɔnzang ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa bii gbete. Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang doo nɔngkɔ.

Ruu doo nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓuru, ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudi, a zang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ zang Yahudi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ jaafoo a zang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ jaafoo kpang. Ruu nandon, ruu raa tɔ naa zang gbete, ka làa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ruu batizima ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ka diki kaɓa, Laa a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ gbete kaɓa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a ruu ɓi Suru gbete kaɓa kɔ nandon nɛɛ wu nwang ka yeti ɓuru.
Vuu dɔɔli ɓakɛ, a raa bii shɔnzang kati. Bii shɔnzang wu vuu gbete kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang.
Naa doo shɔnzang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N m naa kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n m ka bii kpang.” Ruu keɓe kɔ shing wu nwang tɔ̀ɔ́ bii kpang, kpang.
Naa shoo kɔɔ jong nɛɛ, “N m jĩng kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n m ka bii kpang.” Nwáng kaa wukɔ wu yáa bii ya?
Naa bii shɔnzang nɛ̀ɛ́ jĩng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ tãa nɔng nɛɛ viya? Naa bii shɔnzang nɛɛ shoo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ gũng sɛ̃ɛ vuu nɛɛ viya?
A Laa mã̀a bii ɓuru kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔngkɔ kpang, Laa mã̀a bii shɔnzang nɛɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng, naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Naa bii ɓuru nɛɛ vuu gbete kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ɓi bii kpang.
Niizang, vuu kagn bii ɓuru dɔɔli, a bii ɓi kaa gbete ganggang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gbalang ɓɔɔ jĩng kɔɔ naa nɛɛ, “N palɛ vi nɛɛ mɔɔ viya?” Kagn kpang. Yuu ti kɔɔ doo nɛɛ “N palɛ vi nɛɛ nɔɔ viya?” kpang.
Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ nɛɛ ri lakɛ kpang, naa ri kpang ruu nwàng ningkãari kpàng,
Vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu risi naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ruu gãng jĩng ka rikɔ gbãng gbãng. Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi ka bii ɓuru nɛɛ shi kpang, ruu gãng jĩng ka rikɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
A vuu ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu ri kpang, ruu yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ. Laa shĩili bii shɔnzang nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu a wu bannang kpang bannang kati.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang basɛ bii katɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe nandon ri yi zɔɔ naa ɓarɛ ka bii teetee.
Naa vuu gbete ka bii ɓuru dang jĩng, bii nimbang keɓe ri dang jĩng kaa nyaa zɔɔ.
Ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɔkɔ manɛ kaa bii Kirisi ɓɔɔ ɓi gbete ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ, ka bii keɓe kɔ.

Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ zang ɓu wu nwangnɛ, shonang ɓiɓɛ kagn. Gaayu zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. A naa zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓang knti zang tĩng. A zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri màsɛ̀ zang kɔnang, ri ɓang knti. Zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri yi zang naa ka bii. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ zang bang ɓɔɔ ri yiti zang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang nɛɛ náa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ri ɓɛɛ.

Zang piti ri zang shonang Kirisi kɔ nandon kpang, zang piti ri wu zang nyaa shonang Laa kpang, wu zang piti ri tusu zang Ruu Laa kpang. Laa a zang piti naa nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kpang.
Wu zang piti, ri màsɛ́ zang kɔnang kpang, wu ti zang piti, ri kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang, wu zang piti nwangsɛ zang dĩiri ruu kaɓa kpang.
Ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ shing manɛ jĩng nɛɛ Suru Laa naa a nɔɔ naa ditɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri ɓa weɓe shinang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa veɓe nandon keɓe, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ka gbalang kɔ n túsú nɔɔ ɓee.

Naa n zunung yee rannang doo katɔ nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ka koo, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ. A n kasɛ zang kaa takpang, n nwang naa gbongshɛng ɓɔɔ kaa nyaa ɓɛɛ. N ti nwang naa gbongbolong ɓɔɔ ri goo nyaa ɓɛɛ.

Naa Laa a m naa vuu palɛnang, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu m ɓɛɛ. Naa n ti zi vuu piti. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ katɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ n ti zi tɔ jong. Naa Laa a m dòo zɔ̃ng danggn shinnang ɓɔɔ naa n zunung katɔ, n kɔɔ kɔpɔ wu dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn. Naa n kasɛ zang kpang, n m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
Naa n tuu doo vuu naa mɛɛ nandon, n bàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A n ti kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang tuu m zang dɔɔ m ka waa. Naa n kasɛ zang kpang, vuu keɓe ri nwang m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
Naa mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, mɔɔ mã danggn dɔɔli. Mɔɔ ti pàlɛ́ zang tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ kaa sũnyaa kpang. Mɔɔ ràng yee bang bang ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Mɔɔ ti tuu yuu ɓaa kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ zang katɔ nwáng ɓi nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zang. Kàsɛ̀ ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Lasɛ yeti ɓi pati kpang. Yiti vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ ka yeti kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, naa zang palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tãa tĩnang katɔ. Naa zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, tãa tĩnang kpang.
Zang kasɛnang yaa vuu nyaa ka gbalang kpang, shing danggn ɓi sasak, yaa gn naa ka vuu kpang, mã danggn ka vuu piti.

Zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, di nyaa zang kasɛnang ɓi kpang. Diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang ri naa yaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri kɔɔrɔnang. Diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang ri naa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ruu tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ kpang, kpang. Vuu zinang ti naa waa nyaa kaa tɔ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ nyaa kiiri kpang.
Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa shing vuu piti, wu nwang nyaa kiiri, ka diki kaɓa kɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu nyaa kiiri kpang keɓe, ri waa nyaa kati.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo wujɛ, n rangkɛ yee naa wujɛ. N ti rɛ̃rɛ naa wujɛ. N zili vuu m nɛɛ jĩng wujɛ. A ɓɔɔ n bangnɛ, n yaa vuu wujɛ ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon.

Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zili kãntang keɓe, ruu zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu pɛ̃ɛrɛ ka vĩilaa ɓɔɔ wu kalang kalang kpang ɓɛɛ. Diki a ditɔ ɓɔɔ ruu zi ri tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ jĩng ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ n zi kãntang keɓe, wu gň nyaa kiiri kpang. Ka diki kaɓa, n naa zi kaa nyaa kiiri naa ɓɔɔ Laa zì m tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
Vuu kagn taati ɓɔɔ ri waa nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe rikɔ danggn shinnang, nɛɛ gn ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang kasɛnang, ka teteng vuu taati keɓe, zang kasɛnang kɔ ɓa ri.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shing jĩng ka zang kasɛnang gbãng gbãng. A nɔɔ ti shing jĩng nɛɛ yeti gbete, Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ shonang nɛɛ mani ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing jĩng, wu a nɔɔ naa, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ gbãng gbãng.

Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu naa, a rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, rang yee ɓi nɛɛ Laa, wu nɛɛ shɔnzang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kpàng ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔrɔ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa wàasɛ̀ zang katɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu, rang yee ɓi nɛɛ shɔnzang. Ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, yi zang naa katɔ ka bii. Ruu bìí mã zang danggn katɔ, wu shingnɛ yeti ɓarɛ wu valɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang yi ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii. A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, yi ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ naa ka bii.

N kasɛ nɛɛ Suru Laa wu a zang ɓu naa wu kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, n kàsɛ̀ wukɔ gbãng gbãng. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ nwàngsɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa dĩiri ruu bii kpang ɓɛɛ.

Manzung, ka diki ɓɔɔ n naa a ka nɔng manɛ, naa n ràng nɔɔ yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, yee mɛɛ yi nɔɔ naa biya ka bii viya? Naa n arɛ, n tusu vuu ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa tusu m kpang, n ti shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ zi vuu tɔkn gaagaa kpang, naa n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kpang, a n ti tusu Ruu Laa kpang, ruu mɛɛ yì nɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
N gãsɛ nɔɔ vuu, doo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ soo nɛɛ mani naa leere, nɛɛ vũngta ɓɔɔ suru ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ri nwángsɛ̀ soo wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang tã̀á soo ɓɔɔ zang gaa ɓɛɛ biya?
Naa zang jèe gbòó sĩiri waasɛ̃ kpang, zang tãa biya zang kpalɛ bii sĩiri tanang kaa viya?
Nɔɔ manɛ doo nɔngkɔ, zang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ biya nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang tãa kpang ɓɛɛ. Rúu manɛ tɛɛ ɓi naa jasung waati.
Nyaa ɓɔɔ zang koo ri rangkɛ dɔɔli. Nyaa keɓe nandon nwang ka doo ruu.
N nɛɛ tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang rang m kpang, n nwang kaa naa zang zanti ka bii zang ɓɔɔ rang m yee bii ɓɛɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ rang m yee kɛɓɛ ti nwang kaa naa zang zanti kɔ doori ka nɔng mɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, wee nɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ zang ɓee. Nɔɔ shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa naa nɛɛ mani ka bii kɔ gbãng gbãng. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shii kaa nɛɛ kaka kɔ sasak.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, wu gaayi Suru Laa wu a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu nwàngsɛ́ zang dĩiri ruu bìí nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang gàa Laa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ gaa Laa ɓiri. A yeti ɓiɓɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi kaa takpang.
A n palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ keɓe. N gaa Laa nɛɛ Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ, n ti gàa Laa jong nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ. N gáa soo nɛɛ Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ, n ti gáa soo jong nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ.
Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, naa mɔɔ zãa Laa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ tãa nyaa kaɓa kpang, tã̀á ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zãa Laa kaa biya wu naa kasɛ nyaa kaa jong nɛɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ “Nɔngkɔ” viya?
Naa mɔɔ zãa Laa doo tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, Laa gaanang ɓaaɓɛ yi zang ɓɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
N zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru ɓiɓɛ a m naa tɔ, n ráng yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, n ɓa nɔɔ katɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
Naa doo nɔngkɔ piti, naa zang kpalɛ ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ naa n kɔɔ ruu maani nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ri tãa katɔ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ naa n kɔɔ ruu labang kopi nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ri tãa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ naa wujɛ kpang. Nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng shi kpang palɛnang, nɔɔ risi yuu manɛ naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng rɛ̃rɛnang, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kaa rɛ̃rɛnang zang bang.

Zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, N naa shɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn, ri naa kɔ̀ɔ́ zang mɛɛ keɓe ruu mɛɛ. N rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nung kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa n rang yee doo nɔngkɔ piti, ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa m kpang.”

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa Suru Laa a zang naa, zang rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, ri zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ɓi Laa rang yee. Wu ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang. Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu zang, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon, zang ɓu nɛɛ gaayu yee rannang tɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓarɛ kpang, ri naa à ka nɔng, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ shoko takɛ nɔɔ manɛ tɔ kɔ nandon.

A naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi kpang, à ka nɔng. A tãa ruu ɓarɛ kaɓa nandon, ruu kaɓa tusu wu nɛɛ wu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kaɓa, ri dɔng wu ruu katɔ.
Ruu kaɓa nwàngsɛ́ wu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu kaɓa shing wu, wu tang ka tĩng Laa, wu bang Laa. Wu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Laa kagn nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ niizang.

Manzung, nɔɔ nɛɛ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu biya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ bang Laa, zang gbete wu tusu soo ɓɔɔ zang gaa ɓɛɛ. Zang gbete wu tùsù zang Ruu Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ wu tùsù zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wu ti kɔɔ zang ɓi dĩiri ruu keɓe. Zang ri palɛ vuu piti naa ɓɔɔ yi zang naa ka bii, zang ri zi Ruu Laa kaa gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kagn nɔng, ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Zang ri ɓa taati kpang, ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri rang yee. Ri ti rang gbete gbete. Zang ɓu nɛɛ rang tɔ, wu yaa zɔɔ nɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ zang kaa dĩiri ruu bìí, tɔ zang piti ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ɓɛɛ kati.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn nɔng, ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa dĩiri ruu ɓɔɔ zang rang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang kaɓa zinang kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri rang nyaa kaɓa, ri vɔ̃ nyaa katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ráng nyaa bìí nɛɛ Laa ka yeti ɓarɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri, ri nɛɛ ka nɔng ri ziti kɔ taati ri rang yee. Zang ɓɔɔ nimbang ri rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ ɓarɛ kaa tɔ waasɛ̃ ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa Laa tusu zang ɓɔɔ, vuu shɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu. Zang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, ɓɔɔ rang yee ka nyaa kaɓa wu vɔ̃ nyaa ka gbongkarɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu, wu yaa zang ɓɔɔ nɔng, tɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi wu nwàng zang vuu kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu ɓarɛ wu mã zang piti danggn kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ Laa a ri Suru ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ri, ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri yiti Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a ri kaɓa katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tã̀a tĩnang nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu haa kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, Laa tãa tĩnang wukɔ jong.
Ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kagn nandon.
Zang soro ri vɔ̃ nyaa katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɔɔ bang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri rang yee ɓarɛ kpang. Ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ katɔ kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ri nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ zang, ri yaa gbongkarɛ. Ri nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ gãa tɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ varɛ ɓarɛ. Naa zang soro rang yee ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka Gãa Laa, ɓi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ, Ruu Laa nwang nyaa nɛɛ bii manɛ kɔ ya? Nɔkɔ tãa ruu bìí gbete ya?

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ suru Laa ti a wu naa tɔ. Wu zi katɔ nɛɛ ruu kɔ n bèé nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ dang nyaa nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu keɓe.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà ruu keɓe nɔngkɔ kpang, zang ri ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang jong.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, manzung, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Laa tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zãa zang yee rannang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, kpang.
Nɔɔ palɛ vuu kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, n kaaɓi n kpaa nɔɔ danggn Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓeleng n kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tĩng ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ nɔɔ ta ruu bìí tɔ, a nɔɔ shii tɔ kagn nɛɛ kaka manɛ gbãng gbãng.
Laa ti tá yuu manɛ kana ka ruu ruu kaɓa, nɔɔ nɛɛ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn kagn tɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.

N kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe tɔ ka tĩng, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ m ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ɓa vuu piti katɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bée ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ wu naa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, zang gbãa wu, Laa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓiɓɛ daa taati ka sàa ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bée ka labeenang Laa ka tĩng nɛɛ naa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa tɔ, tusu Bituru yuu ɓiɓɛ. A naa tusu zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, yuu ɓiɓɛ jong.
Ka laa ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri ɓa laa maani dakn maani katɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ, a ri zi wu jong. Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, a ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓarɛ doo ningkãari.
Diki ɓɔɔ kagn tusu Yakub yuu ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ knti, naa tùsù zang shonang ɓiɓɛ nandon yuu ɓiɓɛ jong.
Nkɔ m kaa zang ɓɔɔ wu gɔɔ nyaa yuu ɓiɓɛ tusunang ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n nwang m naa jaa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ daa naa yinang gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka teteng zang shonang Yeesɔ nandon, nkɔ waa nyaa knti tingkiring. N daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa m nɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ting, n dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jĩng ɓɛɛ.

A gn mɛɛ naa kɔng Laa. Ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang, palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ, a shing m n raa zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi m kãntang keɓe. Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ m, wu waati kpang. Nwáng vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ shonang nɛɛ kaka mɛɛ, n ɓa zang shonang ɓɔɔ nimbang nandon ɓɛɛ. N palɛ vuu keɓe wu nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ palɛ.
Naa doo nkɔ kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, naa ti nkɔ kpang, naa rikɔ kɔɔyi pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu nandon ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ruu tɔ̃ɔ gbete keɓe kɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi, a nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ jong.

Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔ, ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓee, kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa wísí Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa. Laa nɛɛ wísí Yeesɔ Kirisi paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, a palɛ biya, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ zang naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang viya?
Naa zang nɛɛ naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa doo nɛɛ sàa kpang kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ rúu kɔ rùu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi waati ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Laa nɛɛ wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ruu kɔɔ rúu tɔ nɛɛ sèé ka yuu Laa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang tɔ nɛɛ, ɓi Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ. A ɓeekpang niizang, Laa wisi zang paa katɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ niizang, Laa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa doo nɛɛ sàa kpang kɔ.
Laa nɛɛ wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa gn nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn manɛ waati ɓɛɛ. Laa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓi gn kpang.
Ti nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi a ri vɔlɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa ruu shing jĩng ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu yi ruu naa ka bii ka ruu vuu koo keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ruu nwáng vuu gn kɔnang ɓa zang piti.
Niizang, Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ, Laa wisi wukɔ paa shɔɔnang, a ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ paa ditɔ jong nɛɛ sàa.
Ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, vɔrɔ a ka koo nɛɛ bii zang gbete, ti doo zang gbete kɔ shingnɛ, Laa wisi ruu paa nɛɛ sàa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ̀lɔ́ kãntang keɓe ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɛɛ bii Adamu, Laa ti naa a zang piti suru bii doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Vuu keɓe piti ri palɛ ka laa ɓarɛ. Kirisi kɔ yupaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ sàa. Ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa gbã́ayu ka koo keɓe, Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Kirisi paa ditɔ nandon.

Tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn wu a kati. Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa ɓa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe yuu, nɛɛ vuu piti ka lapa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. Wu naa ningsi naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ. Wu tuu kpanti ka yuu vuu piti, wu a Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ kati.
Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, ɓi Kirisi kɔ kpanti, diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa ɓa yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang nandon, wu a nɛɛ mani. Laa wu ti shing ri, Yeesɔ wu naalɛ ri nɛɛ doo.
Vɔrɔ kɔ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang, ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi wukɔ doo knti.

Nwáng kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, Laa “Shing Jaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, wu naa vuu piti nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ.” Ɓɔɔ zang bee naa weɓe ruu zi tɔ vuu piti naa ɓaa shoo ɓi kaa nyaa Yeesɔ kɔ. Nwàng wu naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii ka tĩng Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ shing vuu kaɓa ri sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓarɛ ka dii ka tĩng Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.

Laa nɛɛ shing vuu piti tɔ, nɛɛ ri sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓarɛ ka dii ka tĩng Yeesɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ, wu sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa dii ka tĩng Laa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing wu ka tĩng nɛɛ wu náa vuu piti nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu roo kpanti kaa yuu vuu piti, a vuu piti ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ kaa nɔng ɓiɓɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ kagn zang palɛ ri batizima, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɛɛ niizang kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri yupaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ sàa kpang, ka ruu vi zang kaɓa ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri palɛ batizima ka nung zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ viya?
A rukɔ, naa Laa naa wisi zang paa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ sàa kpang, ka ruu vi, ruu mãlɛ́ yuu ɓuru ka naa vɔrɔ diki diki viya?
Manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n nwàng m naa ɓɔɔ n vɔlɔ diki diki ɓɛɛ. N suu sèé kpang, naa n nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ́yi nɛɛ n tãa tĩnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n doo ka Afisa zang dɔɔli ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu mɛɛ. Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ n gaa nyaa nɛɛ zing ɓɔɔ ri shaa varɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa nɛɛ wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, n dàng jĩng nɔngkɔ ka ruu viya? Vuu keɓe nwǎng m ɓu viya? Naa zang nɛɛ naa yupaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ sàa kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, “Ruu shaa nɔɔ vuu shaanang, ruu tãa nɔɔ tĩnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓuru ruu vɔlɔ kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Nɔ́ɔ yaa zang ri nwãarɛ nɔɔ kpang. “Naa mɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shi kpang, mɔɔ naa palɛ doo shi kpang naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
Nɔɔ yaa vuu shoko manɛ ta, a nɔɔ ti yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ katɔ, nɛɛ “Zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ri naa yupaa biya? Bii ɓarɛ naa nwang ɓi kaa biya?”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ naa weɓe, ri ɓarɛ shoko. Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ka tipi vɔ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tarɛ kpang ya?
Jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa ka tipi, ɓi jĩng vuu waati. Mɔɔ ɓaa wu vuu bìí dɔ̃ɔ gbete kpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jĩng zaakn kpang, mɔɔ ɓaa jĩng vuu ɓɔɔgn.
Laa a zɔ̃ng vuu ɓu bii ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Shing zɔ̃ng jĩng vuu ɓu wu tá bii naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ ta ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ningkãari ka koo keɓe ri ɓarɛ ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Zɔ̃ng ɓu bii ɓarɛ náabm̀. Bii shɔnzang ɓi náabm̀, bii rɛɛ yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓi ti náabm̀. Bii rɛɛ jaaning ɓi náabm̀, a ɓɔɔ jaazĩi ti náabm̀.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa bii ɓarɛ kagn. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe, bii ɓarɛ ti doogn kɔ. Shinang vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa náabm̀. Shinang vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi ɓi ti náabm̀.
Laa ɓɔɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓɛɛ, yakɛ nɔng náabm̀, a shala ti yakɛ nɔng náabm̀. Shinang rɛɛ sang ɓi ti náabm̀. Sang ɓu jong nɛɛ shinang ɓiɓɛ náabm̀ náabm̀.

Bii zang ɓɔɔ yupaa nɛɛ sàa nwáng ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Bii shɔnzang nwàng ɓi doo naa jĩng vuu kɔ. Ɓɔɔ zang gbã́a bii, pũng ɓi katɔ. Laa nɛɛ naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, bii ɓiɓɛ raa ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ pũ̀ng takpang, ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ zang gbãayi, shi ka jĩng zang kpang, ti lakɛ naa ka bii kpang. Zang nɛɛ wisi wu kaa paa, bii raa kaa vuu ɓɔɔ shi dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Ti lakɛ naa kaa gn bii ning.
Ɓɔɔ zang gbãayi ɓi bii shɔnzang, ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi wu paa ɓi ka bii suru. Bii shɔnzang kagn, bii ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ suru ɓi doo kagn kɔ.

Ka yeti labeenang Laa, zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Laa mãa Adamu, ɓɔɔ wukɔ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nwang ningkãari shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.” A Adamu ɓɔɔ a doo knti ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ɓi kaa suru ɓɔɔ arɛ, nɛɛ wu a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́, Suru Laa kɔ a shɔɔnang kpang, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ bii yɔpɔ kagn, nɛɛ kaka kɔ a shɔɔnang, tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ Suru Laa wu naa a kati.
Laa mãa Adamu ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ɓi nɛɛ tapuru ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Adamu ɓɔɔ ɓang wu, a ɓi nɛɛ lapa.
Zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ɓarɛ ka koo keɓe, ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ Laa mãa wu nɛɛ tapuru ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ ka lapa, ri naa nwáng ɓarɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, ruu nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ Laa mãa wu nɛɛ tapuru ɓɛɛ. Lee ɓɔɔ ruu naa nwáng ditɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ yɔpɔ nɛɛ kaka, a ɓɔɔ zĩi, daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓi kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ pṹng katɔ, nwang vuu ɓɔɔ pũ̀ng kpang ɓi kpang.
Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, n kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu vɔlɔ wu katɔ nandon kpang. Zang naa kɔ̃sɔ ruu bii ɓi katɔ kɔ jong nandon tantɛnang,

naa ɓɔɔ zang ka jĩng ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ zang naa jee vuukãng ɓɔɔ zang di nyaa vuu piti kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ jee tɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri yuku paa tɔkn. Laa a ri kaa bii ɓɔɔ naa pũng takpang ɓɛɛ. Ka làá kaɓa, Laa naa kɔ̃sɔ ruu bii katɔ nandon.
Bii ɓuru kɔ pũng katɔ, ti vɔ katɔ ɓee, naa raa kaa vuu ɓɔɔ naa pũng takpang, ti vɔ takpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka laa ɓɔɔ bii ɓɔɔ pũng katɔ, ti vɔ katɔ kɔ̃sɔ bii, nwang kaa ɓɔɔ pũng takpang, ti vɔ takpang. Naa nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bée ka yeti labeenang Laa doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Laa ɓa vɔrɔ yuu tɔ, ti ningsi naa vuu palɛnang vɔrɔ tɔ.”
“Vɔrɔ ɓa suru bii yuu takpang dòndòng. Náa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang vuu nɛɛ mani ti takpang.”
Vɔrɔ nyɔ zang ɓi ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ti walɛ kaka ɓi ka nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zã̀a Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, ruu ɓa vɔrɔ yuu tɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang piti ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓa ri yuu nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, manzung, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka, vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing nɔɔ nɔ́ɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ palɛ shonang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàlɛ́ Kpanti Kirisi naa nwǎng nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ pálɛ́ doo naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galati nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Ka diki Laadi, zang ɓu wu zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. Wu shingnɛ ka ruu shonang Laa palɛnang. Nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak tɔ̀ɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ n naa arɛ n leng nɔɔ, nɔɔ naa kpálɛ̀ saka ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
N nɛɛ naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng manɛ tɔ, n naa bee labeenang n a zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ɓɛɛ, n naa shong ri, ri daa nɛɛ labeenang kaɓa. Ri túu saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɛɛ, ri daa nɛɛ mani ka Urushalima.
Naa dàá ɓɔɔ n dàá Urushalima jong, tɔ̀ɔ, ri ti daa nɛɛ n.
N mangnɛ nɛɛ n dàá ka tipi Makidoniya, tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔng manɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n tɔ̀ɔ, n sɔ́ɔ tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ.

N shing jĩng nɛɛ n naa nwáng nɛɛ nɔɔ diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng. Ǹ naa nwáng nɛɛ nɔɔ pũngku wu waa nyaa nɛɛ mani. N nɛɛ tɔɔ n daa kaa tɔ, nɔ́ɔ a m vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi m naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ ti daa shing m kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ n kasɛ daanang ɓɛɛ piti.
N kasɛ kpang nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n laabìí daanang kpang. N shing jĩng nɛɛ n naa nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki wu bee m katɔ tɔkɔlɔng naa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
N naa nwang ka Afisa ka nihn diki nyaalaa Pentiku wu a nɛɛ mani.
Laa puu m gbalang tɔ nɛɛ n palɛ shonang bang ɓɔɔ nwang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang dɔɔli ri shing jĩng kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ n kpang.
Timoti nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, pàlɛ́ Kpanti Kirisi doo shonang kɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ wu pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu naa vĩi kpang. Nɔɔ yi wu naa kɔ jong ka bii, nɔ́ɔ a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu daa zanti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu yi gbalang zanti ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ katɔ kpang. Wu ti gbãayu wu naa ĩi m ka nihn. Ruu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn ruu gã wu katɔ.

Ka ruu jaa nàá ɓuru Apolo, n gàarɛ́ wu gbãng gbãng nɛɛ wu dũng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu naa leng jĩng ka nɔɔ. A pɛ̃ɛrɛ ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu a kãntang gn kpang. Nɛɛ walɛ gbalang tɔ, a ditɔ ka nɔng manɛ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Nɔ́ɔ yaa gn naa kpang, nɔɔ lakɛ yuu kagn.
Ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, nɔɔ pálɛ́ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Sitifana nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ rikɔ tá Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang ka tipi Akaya. Ri ti a yuu ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ shonang ri yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa naa ka bii.
N gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe bannang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti seng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang nɛɛ ri katɔ.
N tãa tĩnang tɔ dɔɔli ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sitifana nɛɛ Fɔtunati nɛɛ Akayiku ri a ka bii mɛɛ ka nihn ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n zi ri, nwang kaa naa n zili nɔkɔ.
Ri mã m danggn tɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri mã nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ seng ri tɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Asiya nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. Akpiila nɛɛ Pirisila, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa ɓarɛ, ri ti jee nɔɔ nyaa jong tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ ri gbete ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. Nɔ́ɔ ti jée zɔɔ nyaa jong nɔɔ kɔ̃ng zɔɔ katɔ ka ruu nung Laa.
Nkɔ Bulu, n bee nyaa kɔ n jee nɔɔ ɓee nɛɛ naa mɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, Laa wu shingnɛ wu shaarɛ dòndòng. Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ta.
Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
N kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ m katɔ, a n nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ manzung ɓuru Timoti, ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu bèé zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Koranti, nɛɛ zang Laa nandon ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Akaya nandon ɓɛɛ.
N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ri a nɔɔ tĩnang tãanang, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
Ruu zãa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa wukɔ ti Làá Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Dáa ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng wu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ Laa ɓɔɔ mã zang danggn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
Mã́ ruu danggn ka ɓɔɔ ruu dang jĩng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zunung naa ɓɔɔ ruu mã zang ɓɔɔ ri dang jĩng ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng danggn kaa jong ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng danggn ɓɔɔ Laa mã ruu ɓɛɛ.
Kirisi dang jĩng tɔ, a ruu ti dang jĩng tɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. A naa ɓɔɔ Laa mã Kirisi danggn, Laa ti mã ruu danggn doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Naa ruu dàng jĩng, jĩng dannang ɓuru keɓe, wukɔ mã nɔɔ danggn, wu ti ta yuu manɛ. Laa nɛɛ mã ruu danggn tɔ, mã nɔɔ danggn tɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn kaa jong ka zɔ̃ng jĩng dannang kɔ ruu dang ɓee.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii manɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ naa wee nɔɔ dang jĩng tɔ naa ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓee, Laa mã nɔɔ danggn kana naa ɓɔɔ wu mã ruu ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ danggn jĩng ɓɔɔ ruu dang ka tipi Asiya wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Jĩng dannang kaɓa, bang dɔɔli, bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu yaa gn naa tɔ nɛɛ ruu nwàng tɔ̀ɔ́ ningkãari kpang.
Ruu tɔɔ ɓuru naa zang dɔng rùu, ruu tɔ, zang nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ. A ɓeekpang vuu keɓe palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu ruu nɛɛ rúu di yuu ka bii ɓuru kpang, ruu di yuu ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
Ta yuu ɓuru ka jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ bang dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ kaɓa, naa ta yuu ɓuru ditɔ. Ruu shing gn ɓuru tɔ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, naa ta yuu ɓuru ɓi kaa nɔngkɔ sasak.

Nɔɔ nɛɛ yi ruu naa katɔ ka bii, nɔ́ɔ gàa Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta gaanang ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔli ri gaa wu ka yuu ɓuru kati. Wu shingnɛ, ruu tãa tĩnang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang dɔɔli ri mɛɛ nyaa kaa lapa, ri zãa wu kati ka ruu ɓuru.

Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu tuu yuu ɓuru kagn gbete, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ rùu palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, rùu palɛ niizang nɛɛ yeti gbete, naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ wu ka doo zũnang yuu ɓuru kpang, ruu palɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ́ ruu ɓɛɛ.
Ruu bèé nɔɔ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãrɛ, nɔɔ zi katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N shing gn nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi ditɔ nandon kpãngkpãng.
Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kãntang keɓe gn nandon kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ a kagn, nɔ́ɔ naa tuu yuu ka ruu ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa tuu ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ nɔngkɔ kɔ, n mang ka yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ n gaayu n leng nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang kaa dakn ziti.
Bɛɛ n mangnɛ nɛɛ, n leng nɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ n daa Makidoniya ɓɛɛ, n nɛɛ ti gbãayu kaa tɔ, n ti sɔɔ nɔng manɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ yi m naa kaa bii, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n daa Yahudi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ n mangnɛ, n tɔɔ, n a ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ daa gn gbete kpang ya? Nɔɔ zi manɛ ɓu nɛɛ n mang vuu ka yeti mɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang koo ri palɛ ɓɛɛ ya? Tɔ̀ɔ, n kasɛ nyaa kaa nɛɛ “Nn” a ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ, “Kpang” ka làa gbete ya?
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa suu sèé ɓi kpang. Doo nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ, ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, “Nn” zang ti kɔ̃sɔ nyaa nɛɛ, “Kpang” ka làa gbete kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ Siila nɛɛ Timoti, a ɓɔɔ nkɔ, ruu kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ “Nn” a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ “Kpang, kpang.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ diki diki, ta nyaa ziti ɓi jong kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a zang nandon, Laa palɛ katɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, “Wu nwang nɔngkɔ,” nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ruu a Laa ɓuru bannang.
Ɓi Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing ruu, ruu zi gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ruu wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu, a kusu ruu dang gbete.
Shing vuu ka bii ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kaa gn nɛɛ rùu ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ. A á ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka yeti, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zi kaa gn nɛɛ naa á ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ nandon.
Laa kɔ kɔ̀ɔ rúu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu mɛɛ, N à Koranti takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n kpãa nɔɔ takpang ɓɛɛ.

Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, rukɔ rúu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu zi tɔ, nɔɔ shii tɔ gbãng gbãng, ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ shonang ɓuru nɛɛ nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang kati kɔ jong.
N mang m tɔ ka yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ, n leng jĩng tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, n lasɛ nɔɔ yeti tɔkn kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nɛɛ lasɛ nɔɔ yeti tɔ, wi yaa kati ɓɔɔ shing m yeti mɛɛ wu valɛ wiya? Yaa ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ n lasɛ ri yeti keɓe kɔ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa. N kasɛ kpang n a ka bii manɛ, yeti wu lasɛ m nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ shing m, n tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi tɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n nɛɛ tãa tĩnang tɔ, nɔɔ piti nɔɔ tãa tĩnang tɔ jong.

Ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa, vuu kpãa m ka yeti dɔɔli, a yeti mɛɛ ti lasɛ katɔ gbãng gbãng. N kaa nɛɛ miiri. N kasɛ kpang, n lasɛ nɔɔ yeti kpang. N kasɛ katɔ kɔ jong, nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ gbãng gbãng nandon ɓɛɛ.
A naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, lasɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ka teteng manɛ, lasɛ ɓi nkɔ yeti kpang. Lasɛ ɓi nɔkɔ nandon yeti. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n kpãa zang kaɓa nyaa dɔɔli kpang.
Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ka teteng manɛ ri sɔɔyi, ri dàng yɔɔ kaɓa jĩng, daa tɔ.
Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ yaa wu gbalang ta, nɔɔ mã wu danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, rɛ̃rɛnang dɔɔli wu ɓa kaka ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ wu katɔ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
N bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, n zirɛ naa nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ, ka vuu piti ɓɛɛ.

Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, n yaa wu tɔ jong. Naa vuu ɓɔɔ kagn niizang, ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ yaa zang gbalang ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n yaa zang gbalang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka tĩng Yeesɔ Kirisi ka ruu manɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, wu zãa Sheetang gbalang ɓɔɔ wu vang ruu ka yuu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ n a ka Torowasa, n tɔɔ, n naa kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi. N zirɛ, Kpanti Laa puu m gbalang shonang tɔ ka nɔng.
A ka ruu ɓɔɔ n ĩi manzung Titu ka nɔng kpang, vuu bìí kpãa m ka yeti dɔɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n yaa rɛɛ zang gari kaɓa, a n daa ka gari Makidoniya.

Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sɔ̀ɔ́ ruu tĩng diki diki, a ruu ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A ti shingnɛ, zang tãlɛ yee ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti nɛɛ bìí ɓuru, naa ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ á sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, tálɛ̀ nɔng ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ɓuru kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ Kirisi dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rukɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓarɛ kana, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shàarɛ́ ɓarɛ kana Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri shàarɛ́ katɔ, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓarɛ kana, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Ɓu wi zunung shonang keɓe palɛnang wiya?

Ruu ɓuru naa zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ, Ruu Laa nwàng ri ɓarɛ kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu palɛ shonang ɓuru nɛɛ yeti gbete. Ruu kɔɔ Ruu Laa ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu gbalang ɓɛɛ. Naa zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa naa zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi.

Nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu dɔɔ yuu ɓuru tɔkn ɓɛɛ ya? Ruu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu kasɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa niizang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu bee nɔɔ labeenang keɓe kpang, ruu ti kasɛ nɛɛ naa manɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔkɔ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Labeenang keɓe, zang bèe ka yeti manɛ tɔɔ, zang piti ri zi kati, ri ti gãrɛ.

Nɔɔ tusu tɔ nɛɛ, nɔkɔ labeenang keɓe ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ beeyi ɓɛɛ, a shong nyaa kaa nɛɛ mani nɛɛ bii ɓuru. Bee labeenang keɓe nɛɛ mii vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Bee ɓi nɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Bee wu ka rɛɛ tari pɛkɛtɛ ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Beere ɓi ka yeti shɔnzang.
Ruu kɔɔrɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ, ruu yaa gn naa ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka bii ɓuru, ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu zunung shonang keɓe palɛnang katɔ kpang. Kaka ɓuru a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa.

Wukɔ a ruu kaka, ruu palɛ wu shonang naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang shɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu nyaa dannang shɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ Suru Laa. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ zang bee katɔ, nyɔ zang ɓi vɔrɔ, a Suru Laa a zang ɓi suru bii.

Zang bee nyaa dannang kaɓa ɓi ka tari, a bannang Laa tusu bii katɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a zang nyaa dannang kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Waa nyaating Musa yakɛ ka ruu bannang keɓe. Naa dòo wee yakɛnang waa nyaating Musa shaarɛ katɔ ɓee, yakɛnang bìí kɔlɔ dɔɔli, daa ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri shing jĩng ka waa nyaating Musa kpang.

Bannang Laa nɛɛ tusu bii, ka ɓɔɔ Laa a zang nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ naa weɓe. A bannang ɓɔɔ tusu bii ka ɓɔɔ zang nwangsɛ nyaa dannang shɔɔ keɓe, ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kaɓa bannang katɔ kpang ya?
Naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ a nɛɛ bannang ning. A bannang nyaa dannang shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang naa nwáng ɓi kaa biya?
Niizang, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓeleng bannang ɓiɓɛ kagn, nwang tɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bannang ɓɔɔ kãntang ɓa wu tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa vuu ɓɔɔ tɛɛ katɔ nɛɛ a nɛɛ bannang ning, bannang vuu ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dòndòng keɓe ɓa ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ tɛɛ katɔ kaɓa katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing gn naa weɓe, ruu rang yee, nyaa zàa ruu kpang.
Ruu ɓuru naa Musa ɓɔɔ zùu vuu ka yuu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Isirela ri nɛɛ zi yakɛnang bannang Laa, ɓɔɔ shaarɛ kana ka waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Niizang, yeti ɓarɛ kpãa nyaa vuu zinang katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ yirɛ, a nɛɛ mani lɛɛkɔ, zang zùu yeti ɓarɛ doo nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Musa zúu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ gã labeenang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ gbaala kagn, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang nɛɛ raa zang ɓɔɔ dũng kaa Laa tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi wu puu zang sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zuu zang jĩng kaɓa kati.
Naa dòo lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ keɓe, zang nɛɛ gã ri nyaa dannang Musa, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe zùu yeti ɓarɛ doo katɔ.
Zang nɛɛ raa jĩng ka bìí Kpanti Laa, Kirisi wu puu zang sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe kati.
Kpanti Laa keɓe, ɓi wukɔ Suru. Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Kpanti Laa nɛɛ kagn bii ɓiɓɛ, zang keɓe wɔ ɓi tɔ.

Ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa nɔngkɔ, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe zùu jĩng ɓuru kpang, ruu zi bannang Kpanti Laa katɔ. Bannang keɓe, ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi suru ɓɛɛ, rìsí ruu kana, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang naa wukɔ. Ti gìsí ruu bannang ɓɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ kana, ka yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ.
Gn ɓuru kɔng Laa, a á ruu shonang keɓe nɛɛ ruu palɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn naa kpang.

Rùu dɔ̃ vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ tɔ piti nɛɛ kaa. Ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ sèé kpang. Ruu ti risi Ruu Laa tɔ̀ɔ́ wu raa sèé kpang. Ruu kɔɔ rúu ɓɔɔ niizang ka dalɛ, ka tĩng Laa. Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓu wu zi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang tɔ̃ɔ.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rúu kɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ɓee, kpãa ri nyaa zinang katɔ. Zang keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri shaarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

Ri shing danggn kpang ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sheetang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo keɓe, zãa yeti ɓarɛ vuu zinang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zãa ri zinang nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ ka bii ɓarɛ katɔ. Nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu bannang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wu doo Laa kɔ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti, a ruu ɓuru kaa zang shonang manɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ.
Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔng yakɛ ta ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ,” ɓi doo wukɔ shing nɔng yakɛnang ɓiɓɛ, yakɛ yeti ɓuru. A shingnɛ ruu zi bannang Laa ka waa nyaating Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ bang keɓe, rùu ɓɔɔ ruu nwang ɓuru naa ɓari tapɔng. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang bang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa, wu ɓɔɔ ɓuru kpang.
Zang dǎng ruu jĩng diki diki, a ruu yaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ ka takpang. Lee ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru vãarɛ katɔ, a ruu yaa gn naa kaa takpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ruu kpang, ri dɔɔli, a Laa yaa ruu kpang. Lee ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ruu, ruu roo ka tipi, a ruu vɔ kaa takpang.
Diki diki ruu mãlɛ́ yuu ɓuru katɔ ka naa vɔrɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi vɔ ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu nwang ningkãari ɓee, zang zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi doo ningkãari kɔ.
Ka nwannang ɓuru nandon, ruu mãlɛ́ yuu ɓuru ka naa vɔrɔ ka ruu Yeesɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ keɓe, nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi doo ningkãari.
Nwàng ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu màlɛ̀ yuu ɓuru tɔ ka naa vɔrɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ suru bii tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wee Suru ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang shing danggn a zang bee vuu keɓe nɛɛ, “N shing danggn tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rang yee.” Wukɔ ti kagn yeti ɓuru. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rang yee jong.
Ruu zi tɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ wisi Kpanti Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa naa wisi ruu paa ditɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu wisi Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, wu daa nɛɛ ruu ka ting Yeesɔ.
Vuu keɓe nandon, zang palɛ ka ruu manɛ kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ zang dɔɔli tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, nɛɛ ta yuu ɓarɛ tɔ, ri a Laa bannang kati, ri ti zãa wu.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Naa wee bii biling ɓuru pũng katɔ ɓee, bii suru ɓuru ri ɓi shɔɔ diki diki.
Jĩng dannang kɔ ruu dang ɓee, bee kpang. Daa doo vuu ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ kpang. Jĩng dannang keɓe, atɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bang katɔ, ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dòndòng. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɛɛ mani ɓi kagn kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing jĩng ɓuru ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zì nɛɛ jĩng ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu shing jĩng ɓuru ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jĩng kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zì nɛɛ jĩng, nwang ɓi sasak kpang, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jĩng kpang kɔ nwang dòndòng.
Ruu zi tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kɔ nwàng naa putali nɛɛ tantɛ tɔ, Laa naa a ruu bii ditɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ruu naa nwang kagn. Bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu keɓe nwang ɓi dòndòng.
Kãntang keɓe, wee ruu nwàng nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓee, ruu tãa tĩnang kpang, ruu zaa katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ Laa wu hãa ruu bii ɓuru kaɓa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
Ruu kasɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ bii shɔɔ ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwàng kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii kagn kpang, kpang.

Ka wee ruu nwang doo ka bii ɓuru kɔ nwàng naa putali ɓee, ruu zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu dang jĩng, a ruu zaa katɔ. Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu kasɛ bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe takpang kpang. Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang hãa ruu bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wu tá nɔng, wu ningsi vɔrɔ kati.
Laa kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpàlɛ̀ ruu bii ka ruu bii kɔ̃sɔnang keɓe, a á ruu suru ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kaa gn nɛɛ wu a ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki diki ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ wee ruu nwang doo ka bìí shɔnzang ɓuru ɓee, ruu nwang gn nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ nɔng gbete kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓuru ɓi vuu danggn shinnang, wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jĩng kpang.
Ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Ruu kasɛ katɔ kɔ jong, ruu yaa bii kɔ wukɔ gãa ɓuru ɓee, ruu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ.
Ruu kasɛ, naa ruu doo ka bii keɓe, naa ruu doo ka lapa, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu naa shii ditɔ ka tĩng Yeesɔ Kirisi, wu jɛ̃ɛ rùu rúu. Wu jɛ̃ɛ ruu rúu, wu ti pàlɛ̀ zang ɓu vuu naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ pàlɛ́ ruu vuu ka doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓu palɛ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang kaa vɔrɔ Laa tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bàkɛ́ zang piti. Laa zi ruu nung tɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, n ti shing gn nɛɛ, ka yeti manɛ, nɔɔ zi ruu nung tɔ gbãng gbãng.

Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, ruu bée nɔɔ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓuru tɔkn kpang. Ruu tɔɔ ruu a nɔɔ manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ka bii zang, wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang kati.
Naa shoko nɛɛ ta ruu katɔ, ɓi ka ruu Ruu Laa. Ruu nɛɛ shoko kpang, ɓi ka ruu manɛ.
Ɓi kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Kirisi kasɛ ruu nɛɛ mani kɔ yiti ruu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, zang gbete vɔ tɔ ka ruu zang piti. Nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri nandon ri vɔ jong nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
Vɔ ka ruu zang piti, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ri nwàng tɔ̀ɔ́, nwannang yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa nwannang zang ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, a zang wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari ka ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Rúu dɔ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ ruu, tɔ̀ɔ́ ka doo nwannang shɔnzang kpang. Niizang, ɓeleng ruu dɔ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ruu ka gbalang kaɓa kɔ, a kãntang keɓe, ruu palɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ nɔngkɔ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓi kaa zang shɔɔ. Gbalang nwannang gbaala ɓiɓɛ ɓa ɓi tɔ. Nwannang ka gbalang shɔɔ gaayu tɔ.
Ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ risi ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang, ruu nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ kɔ, palɛ vuu keɓe nɛ bii Kirisi. A á ruu shonang nɛɛ ruu risi zang ɓɔɔ ta wu, ri nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ keɓe, Laa kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu rìsí zang koo piti, ri nwang rɛɛ wusang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, yiti ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. A ti a ruu shonang keɓe tɔ nɛɛ, ruu kɔɔ zang, nɛɛ wu kasɛ wu rìsí zang piti, ri nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.

Ruu nwàng ɓuru kaa naa zang nyaa shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ bàkɛ́ zang nɛɛ bii ɓuru. Ruu gaa nɔɔ ka nung ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ gaa nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yáa Laa wu risi nɔɔ nɔ́ɔ nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.

Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi gngn kpang, a ka ruu ɓuru, Laa risi wu naa zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, yuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ, ruu nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa.
Ka shonang kɔ ruu pálɛ̀ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓee, ruu gàa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwàng naa pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ka dalɛ waati kpang.
Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“N tãa yee manɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ n
nɛ̀ɛ́ palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
N ti yì nɔɔ naa ka bii
ka diki ɓɔɔ laa ɓɔɔ n ta yuu manɛ kagn a ɓɛɛ.”
Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta,
kãntang keɓe,
ɓi kaa laa ɓɔɔ Laa yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Wee ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu manɛ kagn kɔ.
Ruu kasɛ kpang nɛɛ ruu shing zang wu palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kasɛ kpang ruu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gbalang kpang.
Ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ nandon, ruu tusu yuu ɓuru katɔ kɔ jong, nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang shonang Laa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ruu mã́ ka jĩng dannang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang kpãa ruu, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu ɓɛɛ.
Zang nyɔ ruu tɔ nɛɛ gbãa, zang mã ruu ka sãa, a zang ti kãarɛ ruu. Zang mã ruu nyaa ka shonang sasak, ruu ti roo hingro ka jĩng kpang, a nyɔkɔ ti nyɔ ruu.
Ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓuru, nɛɛ danggn mãnang, nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, ruu tusu yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang shonang Laa. Nɛɛ bii Suru Laa, a ɓɔɔ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zang nɛɛ mani niizang ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yee niizang ɓɔɔ ruu rang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa. Nwannang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa kɔ nwang kaa naa vuu waa ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu ta sĩiri nɛɛ mani, a ruu ti gãng bii nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Lee ɓɔɔ zang a ruu bannang, lee ɓɔɔ zang ti pálɛ́ ruu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, zang dãa ruu ɓɔɔ katɔ. Lee ɓɔɔ zang ti dɔ̀ɔ ruu, zang risi ruu naa zang sèé, a ruu ti ráng ɓuru ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang zi ruu nung kpang, a ɓeekpang zang zi ruu nung ɓuru tɔ gbayi gbayi, zang rìsí ruu naa vɔrɔ, a ruu ɓuru ti ningkãari. Zang dang ruu jĩng, a zang nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ kaa takpang.

Zang làsɛ́ ruu yeti katɔ, a ruu tãa kaa tĩnang diki diki, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ka naa ɓuru kpang, a ɓi rukɔ shing zang ri wàlɛ́ vuu naa. Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ka naa ɓuru kpang, a ɓeekpang vuu piti ɓi ka naa ɓuru.
Zang Koranti, ruu rang nɔɔ yee ɓɔɔ niizang, ruu waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru kpang.
Ɓi rukɔ waasɛ naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi nɔkɔ zãa yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu kpang.
Kãntang keɓe, n rang nɔɔ yee kaa naa nɔɔ wujɛ mɛɛ. Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu kàsɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tùsù ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ.

Nɔ́ɔ kpálɛ̀ yuu tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, naa nɔɔ doo gbete nɛɛ ri kpang. Ɓu vi ɓakɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ ti ɓakɛ nɔng yakɛnang ɓi kagn nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nyaa Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Sheetang daa gbete ɓi jong kpang. Vuu kagn gbete ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri palɛ biya nyaa ɓarɛ wu daa gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓuru gãa Laa, Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“N palɛ nɔng nwannang mɛɛ ka nɔng
zang mɛɛ, n nwang ka teteng ɓarɛ. N
nwang Laa ɓɔɔ ri bang ɓɛɛ, ri nwang
ɓarɛ kaa zang mɛɛ.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Nwang ta, nɔ́ɔ yaa teteng ɓarɛ,
nɔɔ kusu yuu manɛ dang gbete.
Nɔ́ɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, kpang,
tɔ̀ɔ, n ta nɔɔ kati,
nɔ́ɔ nwang zang mɛɛ.
N nwang Daa manɛ,
tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ nwang manɛ kaa wujɛ mɛɛ
ɓɔɔ soro nɛɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti bannang katɔ
kɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe.”

Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, Laa a nyaa keɓe nandon ka ruu ɓuru kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu yaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, bii nɛɛ yeti ɓuru nwang shi kpang ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ruu a Laa bannang, ruu a wu yuu ɓuru, ruu nwáng kaa zang ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Nɔɔ tùsú ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ruu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ kagn vuu shi kpang, kpang. Ruu shing zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ruu ti mulu zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
N kɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n dɔng nɔɔ ruu kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓaasi n kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, naa ruu doo ningkãari, ruu ɓuru nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete.
N yaa gn naa ka yuu manɛ kpang. N tuu yuu mɛɛ ka ruu manɛ dɔɔli. Ka jĩng ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓɛɛ nandon, n yaa gn naa gn kpang. Yeti mɛɛ ɓi tĩnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Ka knti ɓɔɔ ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ Makidoniya tɔ, ruu ɔ̃sɔ kpang tingkiring. Jĩng dannang ɓi nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti, zang ri haa nyaa nɛɛ ruu, ruu ti kaa vɔrɔ ka yeti ɓuru.
A Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mã zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gn naa tɔ danggn ɓɛɛ, mã ruu danggn nɛɛ anang Titu.

Wu anang ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning shingnɛ yeti ɓuru valɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ti kaa ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã wu danggn, ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ m zinang katɔ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ, a yeti ti lasɛ nɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ lasɛ m yeti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ kati, nɔɔ ta m nyaa kaa tɔ. Kãntang keɓe n tãa kaa tĩnang gbãng gbãng.

Labeenang ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ yeti katɔ, a n tɔ̀ɔ, kaa takpang nɛɛ n nɛ̀ɛ́ bee nɔɔ labeenang bìí kpang, kpang. N zi tɔ labeenang bii lasɛ nɔɔ yeti katɔ, diki bée kaa takpang, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ kaa jong tɔkɔlɔng.

A kãntang keɓe, n tãa tĩnang tɔ kati, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ n lasɛ nɔɔ yeti ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi kaa ruu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ, shing nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeti ɓɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ ɓi Laa shingnɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ vuu kɔ ruu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, shing zang, zang gbãayu ka bìí Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu zang kati. Zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ yeti kagn ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. A yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi shɔnzang shingnɛ waati, shingnɛ zang vɔ vɔrɔ suru.

Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ yeti lasɛnang keɓe ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani, pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ làabìi, nɔɔ zɔ̃ng yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Yeti manɛ lasɛ tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. Shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ m zinang katɔ gbãng gbãng, a nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ ta m nyaa, nɔɔ dang zang ɓɔɔ palɛ m vuu shi kpang jĩng. Ka vuu kɔ palɛ ɓee nandon, nɔɔ tusu yuu manɛ nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang.

Ka ɓɔɔ n bée labeenang kaɓa, ruu mɛɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Ruu mɛɛ ti hãa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N bèe m nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu nɔɔ kaa gbàrɛ́ gbàrɛ́ ka tĩng Laa nɛɛ nɔɔ á yuu manɛ tɔ niizang, nɛɛ nɔɔ pàlɛ́ ruu shonang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu mã danggn kati. Ruu mã danggn katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu tãa tĩnang tɔkn gbãng gbãng ka ruu tĩnang ɓɔɔ Titu tãa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ shing wu, wu yaa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ.

N kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ wu, ruu bang bang katɔ ka yuu manɛ, a nɔɔ ti shingnɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m kpang. Ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ruu niizang diki diki, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ Titu ka yuu manɛ, nɔɔ shing tɔ nwang tɔ niizang.

Titu kpaa danggn naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta wu, nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ, nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kasɛnang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani dàá kaa nɛɛ tĩng kɔ sasak.
N tãa tĩnang tɔ kati kãntang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn kaa tɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ.

Naa wee manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka Makidoniya ri dang jĩng tɔ gbãng gbãng ɓee, ri tãa tĩnang doo nɛɛ mani diki diki. Naa wee vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang tingkiring ɓee, ri a zang vuu doo nɛɛ mani nɛɛ yeti gbete.
N kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ, ri a vuu ɓɔɔ ri zunung anang katɔ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ a ɓɛɛ katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ mã ri nyaa kagn kpang.
Ri gàa ruu, ri ti bàkɛ̀ ruu nɛɛ ruu yaa ri jong ri yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi naa jong ka bii.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ́ ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn katɔ. Ri gaayu ri a Kpanti Yeesɔ yuu ɓarɛ, a ri ti naa a ruu yuu ɓarɛ kaa jong naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Bɛɛ Titu gaayu tɔ, kpálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ waati nɛɛ yeti gbete, a ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu yaa kpang, wu hangsɛ shonang bìí katɔ.

Ka vuu piti, nɔɔ ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang tɔ. Nɔkɔ ka ting, ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ shonang palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɔkɔ nɔ́ɔ sɔɔ tĩng ka shonang keɓe, ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
N dang nɔɔ wu nyaa kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ n gãsɛ zang kasɛnang manɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n zirɛ nɛɛ niizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ ruu ɓɛɛ tɔ. Yeesɔ ɓi jaa ying ka vuu suru, a risi yuu ɓiɓɛ nwang zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ kpang ka ruu manɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang wujɛ ying kati.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ keɓe, nɔɔ hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu sáa ɓɔɔ ta. Wu nɔkɔ gaayu vuu keɓe palɛnang shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɔkɔ gaayu kasɛnang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ katɔ.
Nɔɔ palɛ shonang bìí ta, nɔ́ɔ hangsɛ. Nɔɔ làábii hangsɛnang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu palɛnang. Nɔɔ palɛ shonang bìí nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ kãntang ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ a zang vuu, Laa tãa tĩnang vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ á dɔɔli naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ mɔɔ a vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kpang, kpang.
N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n yaa zang ɓɔɔ, n shing vuu ɓɔɔ kpiti katɔ ka yuu manɛ kpang.

Wee vuu dòo kagn ka naa manɛ dɔɔli kãntang ɓee, naa nɔɔ yí zang ɓɔ̀ɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ ɓarɛ kagn kpang naa ka bii, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Lee ɓɔ̀ɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ manɛ kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kagn dɔɔli, ri ti yi nɔɔ naa jong ka bii. Ka gbalang naa weɓe kɔ, nɔɔ palɛ zɔɔ vuu teetee.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ kpálɛ̀ vuu shaanang dɔɔli,
wu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu teetee ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ ɓi tɔkɔlɔng,
wu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Titu wu kasɛ ruu manɛ gbãng gbãng naa ɓɔɔ shing m n kasɛ ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ n tɔ́ɔ, n shong wu ka bii manɛ, bɛ̃ɛ kpang, kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ wu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu daa katɔ ka bii manɛ.
Ruu dɔ̃ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ zang zi wu nung tɔ piti, ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ wu.

Wu nɔngkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri zɔ̃ng wu tɔ, nɛɛ wu rakɛ nɛɛ ruu, ka ɓɔɔ ruu daa nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang kpalɛ ɓee. Vuu kɔ ruu bàsɛ́ ɓee, tɔ̀ɔ, wu a Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi bannang, wu ti tusu nɛɛ ruu kasɛ katɔ ruu yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ naa ka bii.
Ruu pálɛ́ waasɛ̃, ruu kasɛ kpang, ruu shing zang ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka naa ɓɔɔ ruu básɛ́ vuu kɔ zang alɛ ruu waati ɓee kpang.
Ruu mang ɓuru ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka jĩng Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ka jĩng shɔnzang jong.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shong manzung ɓuru nɛɛ ri. Ruu gãsɛ wu tɔ dɔɔli, ruu zirɛ, kasɛ katɔ wu yì zang naa ka bii. A wee shing gn tɔ ka bii manɛ gbãng gbãng ɓee, kasɛ kaa tɔ gbãng gbãng wu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii.
Titu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ, palɛ shonang ɓi nɛɛ n, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu keɓe, ri daa ɓarɛ ka nung zang ɓarɛ, shonang ɓarɛ shingnɛ, zang a Kirisi bannang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang keɓe nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ ri katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ri, ri tã̀á nyaa ditɔ, ri zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ yee bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu rangkɛ ka yuu manɛ, ɓi niizang kɔ nwani.
Dàa naa ɓɔɔ n bèé nɔɔ labeenang tɔ̀ɔ́ sasak, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi ɓɛɛ kpang.

N zi tɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ri naa katɔ ka bii, a ruu ti rangkɛ ruu tɔ bang bang ka yuu manɛ ka tipi Makidoniya. N kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Akaya ri kpalɛ bii tɔ dòo sáa ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ ri yi zang kaɓa naa ka bii.” Kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii zàrɛ̀ zang nimbang tɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ.

Kãntang keɓe, n shong nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ manzung ɓuru keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ ruu bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu rang ka yuu manɛ wu nwàng kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ naa ruu wɔng nyaa waati kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n arɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ kpalɛ bii manɛ tɔ piti nɛɛ vuu manɛ, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.

Naa zang Makidoniya ri a nɛɛ n ka bii manɛ, ri ĩiyi nɔɔ kpalɛ bii gn nɛɛ vuu manɛ kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu dɔɔli. Ruu yaa yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ tuu nɔɔ ɓi ka nɔngkɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ ri ruu ka yuu manɛ, nyaa zaa m kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti, n tɔ̀ɔ, naa n dɔ̃ rɛɛ manzung ɓuru keɓe ka tĩng ka bii manɛ, ri daa kpalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ a zang ɓɛɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. N a m kaa knti. Ɓɔɔ n arɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ kpalɛ vuu tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kaa naa nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ nɔ́ɔ a zang, zang mã nɔɔ nyaa katɔ kpang.
Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jĩng vuu tɔkɔlɔng, ti yee ɓi doo tɔkɔlɔng kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jĩng vuu dɔɔli, ti naa yee ɓi doo dɔɔli kɔ.
Zang ɓu a vuu naa ɓɔɔ wu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, wu naa zang mã wu nyaa kagn kpang. Wu ti tãa tĩnang katɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ tãa tĩnang ka ɓɔɔ wu a vuu ɓɛɛ.

A Laa ti zunung ɓɔɔ wu a nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kaa nandon. Nɔ́ɔ ti walɛ vuu dɔɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ palɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa nɛɛ mani ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng.
Naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
“Zang ɓɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa
ɓarɛ kpang vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete.
Danggn tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ, ning
Zang kpang gbinggbing.”

Laa kɔ a zang jĩng vuu, zang ɓàayi, wu ti a wu vuu shaanang, wu shaayi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa naa a nɔɔ jĩng vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓaanang ɓɛɛ ditɔ nandon, wu ti shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ takɛ wu bangkɛ. Ka naa weɓe, Laa shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a zang nɛɛ yeti gbete, nɔ́ɔ a zang kaa dɔɔli.
Ti shingnɛ, nɔɔ nwang zang ying, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ alɛ zang vuu kaa diki diki. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang dɔɔli ri zãa Laa kaa ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ ri, nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu kɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓee, a wu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ti shing jong zang dɔɔli ri zãa Laa.

Shonang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓee, wukɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa niizang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ, ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu keɓe kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti dɔ̀ɔ Laa ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ basɛ vuu manɛ, nɔɔ á ri nɛɛ yeti gbete, a nɔɔ ti á ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ jong ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ ri gaa Laa ka ruu manɛ, ri kasɛ katɔ gbãng gbãng ri zi nɔɔ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ bang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu zãa Laa ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu gãsɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Nkɔ Bulu nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ, n ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu hakaka kpang, n ti tuu yuu mɛɛ kpang, naa Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Zang kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ naa n dòo nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete, n kaa doo vɔrɔ, a n nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, n kaa vɔrɔ takpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔ́ɔ shing m nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, n nɛɛ a tɔ, n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ gnvɔ kpang. N zi tɔ, n zunung ɓɔɔ naa n pàlɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓuru naa zang koo ɓɛɛ, vuu katɔ nɛɛ gnvɔ.
Ruu nwang ka koo kɔ niizang, a ruu gàa nyaa ɓuru kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang koo ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu waa ɓɔɔ ruu tá sĩiri nɛɛ mani, ɓi zɔ̃ng vuu waa ɓɔɔ zang koo keɓe ri ta sĩiri nɛɛ mani kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi vuu waa ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri ta sĩiri nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ningsi nyaa laanang nɛɛ yuu tuunang, ɓɔɔ zãa zang nɛɛ zang ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔsɔ nɛɛ kaaɓa. Ruu shing ri, ri rɛ̃rɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ tusu yuu manɛ tɔ nɛɛ, nɔɔ dũng kaa nyaa ɓuru, tɔɔ ruu kpalɛ bii ɓɔɔ ruu dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓuru kpang jĩng kati.

Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ manɛ bii biling vuu kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ tuu yuu nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ya? Wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang kaɓa wu rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru dòo zang Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ naa wukɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa n rangkɛ dòo yee bang bang ka yuu naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi a ruu ka yuu manɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a ruu naa nɛɛ ruu ningsi nɔɔ katɔ kpang, nɛɛ ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii kɔ jong, nɔ́ɔ bangnɛ ɓɛɛ.
N kasɛ kpang, wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ n shing nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ labeenang kɔ n bee nɔɔ ɓee kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ labeenang Bulu kpiti katɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ bang dɔɔli. A nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii ɓuru, wu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ruu ɓiɓɛ ti kpãa zang takpang.”
Zɔ̃ng zang keɓe, ri zi katɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ruu bee ka yeti labeenang ɓuru, bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu ka nɔng naabm kpang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu naa palɛ, rùu nɛɛ kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ, ɓi gbete.

Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, ruu kusu yuu ɓuru nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ti gãsɛ yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ri kpang. Ri shing vuu ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ yuu ɓarɛ kagn nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri ti jɛ̃̀ɛ́ yuu ɓarɛ ruu ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ shoko waati.
Ɓɔɔ ɓuru, yee bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓuru ɓa nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang. Di nyaa ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shonang ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu di nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓakɛ kaa nɛɛ shonang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ka teteng manɛ ning.
Wee nɔɔ ka teteng nɔng ɓɔɔ shonang ɓuru di nyaa ɓee, rukɔ a ka bii manɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ shɔɔnang. Ruu ɓa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang di ruu nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rangkɛ yee bang bang, ruu ɓa nyaa ɓalɛ ɓuru, ruu daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn ri pálɛ̀ shonang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu shing ɓuru gn kɔ jong nɛɛ, danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ tĩng. Ruu tí zunung ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shonang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu pálɛ́ tɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ bannang katɔ. Shonang ɓuru wu baa ka teteng manɛ, tɔɔ ruu ta nyaa ɓalɛ ɓuru kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.

Nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɔngkɔ, ruu zunung katɔ ruu daa nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang ɓa Koranti ka knti ɓɛɛ, ruu daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka nɔngkɔ. Zang dɔ̀ɔ ruu ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ɓɔɔgn palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓi zang kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
A zang bèe ɓi ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu rangkɛ ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ta ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti dɔ̀ɔ́ wu, Laa ta ɓi wukɔ.
N zɔ̃ɔrɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ vuu shoko kɔ n palɛ ɓee. N zi tɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ.

N kaa sũnyaa ka yuu manɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kaayi ɓɛɛ. N a nyaa tɔ nɛɛ, n a nɔɔ Kirisi wu gee nɔɔ. A n kasɛ nɛɛ nɔ́ɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gee nɔɔ kagn, n tuu nɔɔ naa jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn kpang, ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. N a nɔɔ varɛ manɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete ɓɛɛ kati.
N kaa vɔrɔ, zang naa shingnɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ shi kpang, nɔɔ yaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a Kirisi yeti manɛ ɓɔɔ kankalang dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ pàlɛ́ wu shonang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ nwãarɛ Hawawu nɛɛ zũnang sèé ɓɛɛ.

N kàá nɔɔ vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zirɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii manɛ, nɔɔ tantɛ wu tanang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tantɛ danggn shinnang ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, naa dòo náabm̀ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti tá suru ɓɔɔgn naa doo Suru Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta nɛɛ bii ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ ti ta Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn ka yuu Laa, naa doo náabm̀ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ, n m dòo naa zang kɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ nɛɛ rikɔ zang shonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ bang bang, nɛɛ ri ɓa m katɔ ɓa kɔ.
N zi tɔ, n zunung yee rannang kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ, n zi labeenang Laa kpang, kpang. Ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ gbàrɛ́ gbàrɛ́, diki diki ka gbalang náabm̀ náabm̀.
Wee n tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔ́ɔ shu m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ɓɔɔ n rang nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓee. Wee n tuu yuu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, n risi nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang bang kati ɓee. N palɛ vuu shi kpang ya?
Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n palɛ shonang ka teteng manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn rikɔ shu m. Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ n ta ri vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, tɔ̀ɔ, n yi nɔɔ naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ n dòo nɛɛ nɔɔ, kɔ́pɔ̀ nɛɛ ka naa mɛɛ kpang, n kpãa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ wu yi m naa ka bii kpang. Manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya, rikɔ a m vuu piti ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ. N ĩ̀i nɔɔ ka yuu, nɛɛ nɔkɔ nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii kpang. N ĩi kãntang keɓe kpang, n ti ĩ̀i nɔɔ kpang dòndòng.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu niizang Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ka yeti mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka tipi Akaya kpang, ɓɔɔ shíng m n vɔ̃ nyaa, n kɔ̀ɔ ruu bang bang kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee takpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ɓu ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ ya? Laa zi tɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
N yaa vuu kɔ n palɛ ɓee kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, n zãa zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri zang shonang Yeesɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yi ri naa kagn, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ shonang doo naa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kaɓa ri ɓarɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ niizang kpang ɓɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang shonang ɓɔɔ sèé. Ri suu sèé ka yuu shonang ɓarɛ, ri risi yuu ɓarɛ naa zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Niizang, wee wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn kpang. Naa doo Sheetang risi yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, naa zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ yakɛ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ri risi yuu ɓarɛ naa zang shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɛɛ knti, Laa naa dang ri jĩng teetee nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
N pàasɛ́ ruu keɓe tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n shoko kpang. Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ doo katɔ piti, nɔɔ ta m naa shoko gbã̀ágbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa walɛ gbalang tɔkɔlɔng n rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ.
Vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee, wu vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ a m naa katɔ n kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka yuu ruu bang bang kɔ n rangkɛ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓee, n rang yee m naa shoko.
Wee zang dɔɔli ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu vuu koo ɓee, palɛ ditɔ jong nɔngkɔ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zũng tɔ dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shoko ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ tãa tĩnang ɓarɛ ya?
Nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ risi nɔɔ naa jaafoo ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shaa nɔɔ katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri risi nɔɔ naa shoko ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri risi nɔɔ naa vĩi, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dãlɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kaa vɔrɔ dɔɔli, a ruu palɛ nɔɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe kpang.
N rang yee kaa naa zang shoko. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang katɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ, n ràngkɛ̀ m dòo nɔngkɔ.
Ri zang Yahudi ya? N m dòo nɔngkɔ. Ri zang Isirela ya? N m dòo nɔngkɔ. Ri zang zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ya? N m dòo nɔngkɔ.

Ri zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shonang ya? N palɛ Yeesɔ shonang, n ɓa ri katɔ. N rang yee naa zang shoko. N palɛ shonang tɔ gbãng gbãng, n ɓa ri katɔ. Zang mã m ka sãa doo dɔɔli ɓa ri katɔ, zang nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa dɔɔli, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ katɔ. A zang yàarɛ́ m nung vɔrɔ gbete diki diki.
Zang Yahudi ri nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa, naa bmati tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti, doo maani.

Zang Rooma ri nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa doo taati. Zang ti luku m nɛɛ tari doo gbete. Laana ɔ̃ɔ tɔ nɛɛ ruu doo taati. Diki ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ laana ɔ̃ɔyi, ruu yi naa laa ka mii, mii tuu ruu daa nɛɛ ruu, nɔng laagɛ̃ gbete nɛɛ nɔng zĩi gbete.

Ka rakɛnang mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n daarɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n dang jĩng tɔ ka mii ɓɔɔ kpaa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ. N dang jĩng tɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kɔ doori ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ. N dang jĩng ka gari bang, ɓɔɔ ka jĩngti, ɓɔɔ ka mii waapo, a ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé nɛɛ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ.

N lee tɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n palɛ shonang gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ. Diki mɛɛ dɔɔli n roo hingro kpang. Lee ɓɔɔ n shaa vuu kpang, n ti ɓoo mii kpang. Diki mɛɛ dɔɔli vuu shaanang daa nyaa mɛɛ kpang. Sɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ti si m, a fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ n hãa ka bii kpang.
Ruu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ takpang. Diki diki n rɛ̃rɛ m ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng piti ɓɛɛ.
Ɓu wi shing gn gbãng gbãng ka vuu Suru Laa kpang, a bii mɛɛ vɔ kpang wiya? Ɓu wi shing zang ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, a yeti lasɛ m dɔɔli kpang wiya?
Naa n tɔɔ, n rangkɛ yee bang bang, n rangkɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ka vuu Suru Laa ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Laa, wukɔ ti Daa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu dòndòng ɓɛɛ, zi tɔ, n suu sèé kpang.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n ka Damasiku, Gɔmna ɓɔɔ kpanti Areta yi ɓɛɛ, shing zang nɛɛ, zang gã nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ mani ka yeti gari ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ zang ri yi m.
A zang shooro m kaa nɛɛ yeti sàáng nɛɛ hangka ɓɔɔ zang yaa ka bìí gbang tapɔng ɓɔɔ zang kìirì gari nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, a n wɔ kaa nɔngkɔ nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ.
Yee rangkɛnang bang bang nwang zang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, n ti rangkɛ katɔ nɔngkɔ. Kãntang keɓe, n rang ruu kaa yuu naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ nwang nyaa ka n, a nwàngsɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Sáa ɓa tɔ kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kagn, n zi wu nung katɔ, Laa tuu wu daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓɔɔ bee katɔ kpala kpala ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa túu wu ka bii keɓe dàá lapa nɛɛ wu ya, naa ti ka bii shɔnzang kpang ya? N zi kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔ zi gbete.

N pàasɛ́ ruu keɓe tɔkn, n zi tɔ yɔɔ kaɓa, zang tuu wu zang daa nɛɛ wu ka gãa Laa ka lapa, naa bɛ̀ɛ́ ningkãari ya, naa vɔ katɔ ya? N zi kpang, ɓi Laa kɔ gbete zirɛ. A yɔɔ keɓe tãalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa shɔnzang zunung kɔɔnang kpang, a zang ti kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee ka yuu vuu bìí kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rang yee bang bang ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe kɔ. N rang yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ kpang, n rangkɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang nɛɛ n lakɛ naa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

Naa n kasɛ nɛɛ n rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ, n palɛ vuu shoko kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ m ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. A n kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n ɓa naa wee n ɓee katɔ kpang. N kasɛ zang rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ n palɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tãayi n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zãa m yuu tuunang ka lapa dɔɔli, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n zili ɓɛɛ. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing nɔng ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ, kɔng m naa zang ɓaa m nɛɛ kɔkɔ. Kɔnang keɓe, nwang naa zang nyaa shonang Sheetang ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̃ wu nɛɛ, wu naa dang m jĩng, wu zãa m yuu tuunang ɓɛɛ.
N gàa Laa tɔ, daa doo taati ka yuu kɔnang keɓe, n tɔɔ wu masɛ m jong.

A kasɛ m nyaa tɔɔ, “Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ́ mɔɔ wukɔ yi mɔɔ naa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ palɛ shonang gbãng gbãng ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.” N tãa kaa tĩnang gbãng gbãng, n tuu yuu mɛɛ ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ n lakɛ náa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa naa vuu palɛnang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ yiti m ɓɛɛ kati.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tãa tĩnang ka ɓɔɔ n lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, nɛɛ dãanang ɓɔɔ zang dãa m, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa m ka yeti, nɛɛ jĩng ɓɔɔ zang dang m, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãarɛ m ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaka nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ ka bii mɛɛ kpang, n tãa kaka ka laa kaɓa kɔ jong.
N palɛ vuu tɔ naa shoko. Nɔkɔ shing m n palɛ nɔngkɔ. Nɔkɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu mɛɛ. Naa n doo vuu ɓɔɔ kpang piti, zang shonang Yeesɔ manɛ ɓɔɔ bang bang kaɓa, ri ɓa m kpang.
Laa palɛ vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ n mã danggn, n palɛ shonang mɛɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu kaɓa kɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n zang shonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ niizang.
N pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓu vi, a n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ manɛ kpang viya? Ɓi ka ɓɔɔ n kpãa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ a m vuu kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N gaa nɔɔ nɔ́ɔ kɔsɔ m vuu shi kpang kɔ n palɛ ɓee katɔ.

Daa kaa doo taati ɓɔɔ n kpalɛ bii anang, n naa leng nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N naa kpã̀a nɔɔ nyaa kpang. N kasɛ m nɔkɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, wu vuu manɛ kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri yi jaa kɔ ri kpàlɛ́ wujɛ vuu jong, wu jaa kɔ kpalɛ ri kpang.
N tãa tĩnang katɔ, n ningsi vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa mɛɛ, nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ piti, ka ruu manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Nɔɔ kàsɛ́ m tɔkɔlɔng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ ya?
Nɔɔ kàsɛ́ katɔ, nɛɛ n kpãa nɔɔ nyaa dɔɔli ka ruu vuu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ zũnang, n zúu nɔɔ jĩng nɛɛ sèé,
n shaa nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ bii zang nyaa shonang ɓɔɔ n shongko ri ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ ya?
N gàa Titu nɛɛ wu daayi, a n shong manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ wu. Titu shaa nɔɔ katɔ ya? Ruu nɛɛ Titu ruu palɛ vuu ɓuru yeti gbete, a gbalang ɓuru ti gbete kpang ya?

Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ ɓu nɛɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu ta yuu ɓuru ka tĩng manɛ ya? Manzung ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu ráng nɔɔ yee ka tĩng Laa, wee ruu ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓee. A vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu palɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii.

N kaa vɔrɔ naa n daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng manɛ, n daa ĩi nɔɔ náabm̀, wu naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ n ĩi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti naa zirɛ n náabm̀, wu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. N kaa vɔrɔ n daa ĩi nɔɔ, nɔɔ haarɛ nyaa, nɔɔ kaa sũnyaa, gnvɔ ka yeti manɛ dɔɔli. Nɔɔ ti kasɛ yuu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ dãlɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ rangkɛ zang, nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ dɔɔli. A nɔɔ ti vɔ̃ɔtɔ nɔng.

N kaa vɔrɔ naa n paasɛ anang tɔkn ka bii manɛ, Laa naa shingnɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu m ka ruu manɛ. N naa káa ka ruu zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, a ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti vuu sãnsãnrãng, nɛɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Anang mɛɛ ka bii manɛ ɓɔɔ n naa leng jĩng ka nɔɔ, daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe doo taati. Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Zang nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zang ziti kɔ taati ri kasɛ nyaa kagn gbongkarɛ nɛɛ nɔngkɔ”.

N kasɛ, n tɔ̀ɔ́, n shàarɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ting ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang nimbang nandon, nyaa. N shàarɛ̀ nɔɔ nyaa tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n leng jĩng ka nɔɔ dòo doo ziti kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. N shàarɛ́ nɔɔ nyaa tɔkn ka wee n tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee. Naa n a tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ naa wɔ ka naa mɛɛ gbete kpang.

Naa nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ rang yee nɛɛ bii mɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ palɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, kpang, tusu naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ka teteng manɛ.

Ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa, bɛ̀ɛ́ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, a nwàng ningkãari kãntang keɓe nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa. Ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ruu lakɛ naa doo ka bii kpang kɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu naa palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu naa ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ Kirisi, ruu walɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa kati, ruu palɛ nɔɔ shonang nɛɛ mani.

Nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ karɛ nɔɔ zirɛ, naa nɔɔ nwang doo nwannang danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ ya? Nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ ta. Nɔɔ zi tɔ niizang Kirisi nwang ka yeti manɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi kpang, bɛ̀ɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ mani ɓa kaka manɛ tɔ.
N shing gn nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi ditɔ nɛɛ zang gãsɛ ruu tɔ ruu daa naa zang shonang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ.

Ruu gaa Laa nɛɛ nɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ ruu ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu tɔ kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Naa dòo ka wee zang zí ruu naa vuu gãsɛnang ɓa ruu yuu tɔ ɓee.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ yi Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa naa kaa bii, wu daa nɛɛ tĩng ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ruu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓuru kpang.
Ruu tãa ɓuru tĩnang, ruu nɛɛ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, a kaka manɛ ɓi kagn ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa ɓuru Laa, nɔ́ɔ nwang nyaa kiiri, ka vuu piti.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bèé nɔɔ laa keɓe ka wee n gn nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete kpang ɓee. Tɔ̀ɔ, n nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, n palɛ nɔɔ vuu kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ gnvɔ, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa a m naa nɛɛ n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii nɔɔ bangkɛ, nɛɛ n ningsi nɔɔ katɔ kpang.

Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n di nyaa labeenang keɓe nɛɛ, “Laa wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ.” Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ nwang nyaa kiiri ɓɛɛ, nɔ́ɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nyaa manɛ wu daa zɔɔ gbete, a nɔ́ɔ ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu zang katɔ, a ti shingnɛ zang ri nwáng ka nyaa zɔɔ, naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ.
Nɔɔ jee zɔɔ nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa.
Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ zang nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nwannang ɓɔɔ zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa, wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon.

Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ zang ɓàa m nyaa nɛɛ n nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa keɓe wu shɔnzang ɓaayi kpang, wu ti shɔnzang shingnɛ kpang, ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ka nihn nandon, ruu jee nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ka tipi Galati nyaa.
N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.

Yeesɔ a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ti ta ruu nɛɛ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ a ti palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwang nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa ɓuru Laa kasɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang wu a Laa bannang ta gbing gbing. Nɔngkɔ.
N mã naa tɔ ka danggn ka ruu manɛ. Knti bee gn vi, nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ dũng kaa ruu ɓɔɔgn viya?
Niizang, ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn ɓi kagn kpang. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ri kpantɛ nɔɔ jĩng, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kirisi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
A naa nɛɛ doo rukɔ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ kɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn, wu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kpang, zang dɔng wu ruu, zang tasɛ wu ka waa bang.
Ruu kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ ka tĩng, ruu ti paasɛ kɔɔnang tɔkn nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naabm nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ɓɛɛ, zang wu dɔng wu ruu, zang tasɛ wu ka waa bang.

Ruu keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ n kãayi nɛɛ nyaating mɛɛ wu puu ka bii shɔnzang ya? Kpang, n kasɛ nyaating mɛɛ wu puu ka bii Laa. N kasɛ nɛɛ tɔ zang piti ri zi m nung ya? Naa n nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ, n nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Kirisi shonang kpang.
N kaaɓi n kɔɔ nɔɔ rɛɛ manzung mɛɛ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, wu shɔnzang nwangsɛ kpang.
N ti ta nɛɛ bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kpang. Wu ti shɔnzang tusu m kpang. Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nwàngsɛ̀ m.

Zang kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n nwáng ka tĩng bɛ̀ɛ́ n dũng doo gbalang zang Yahudi nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ tɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng gbalang Kirisi jĩng, gn ɓarɛ kɔng m kpang ɓɛɛ tɔ. N pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ n zũnung katɔ nandon, n tɔɔ n ningsi ri dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Nkɔ ka tĩng rɛɛ sangvaa mɛɛ nandon, ka ruu gbalang zang Yahudi dũnnang. N shing jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri tusu ɓɛɛ palɛnang gbãng gbãng.
A Laa palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ, zɔ̃ng m bɛ̀ɛ́ zang yi m gn kpang, a ɓaa m nyaa nɛɛ n naa palɛ wu shonang. A ɓɔɔ wu naa kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ,
nɛɛ wu nwangsɛ m Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ n kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Jaa keɓe. N daa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang.
N ti daa ka Urushalima ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ doo ka tĩng ɓɛɛ kpang. N daa m katɔ kɔ jong ka tipi Arabiya, a n gbãayu ka Damasiku.
Sáa naa ɓa tɔ taati, a n daa ka Urushalima, n tɔɔ n daa zi Bituru nung kaa waasɛ̃, a n nwang nɛɛ wu diki kopi tu maani.
N zi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang shonang Yeesɔ kpang. N zi Yakub jaa nàá Kpanti ɓuru kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu kɔ nwani ka tĩng Laa, vuu kɔ n bee nɔɔ ɓee, niizang, n suu sèé kpang.
Nɛɛ knti, n naa daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ka tipi Siriya nɛɛ tipi Silisiya.
Ka diki kaɓa, bɛ̀ɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ka tipi Yahudi ri zi m gn nɛɛ jĩng ɓarɛ kpang.
Ri tãa ɓarɛ ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ ɓeleng ɓɔɔ dang ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Kirisi jĩng, kãntang keɓe, kɔɔ zang ruu kaa yuu danggn shinnang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɛɛ wu ningsi katɔ ɓɛɛ”
A ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu mɛɛ.
Sáa naa ɓa tɔ kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti, n daa Urushalima tɔkn nɛɛ Baranaba. Ruu daa nɛɛ Titu ning.

N daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ m nɛɛ n daayi ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, n ɓaa rɛɛ zang bang nyaa dang gbete. Ruu nwáng nɛɛ ri, a n kɔɔ ri rúu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɛɛ shonang ɓɔɔ n pálɛ́ ka tĩng, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n palɛ kãntang, wu shaarɛ waati kpang.
Titu ɓɔɔ n daa nɛɛ wu, naa wee wu zang Heleni ɓee, zang yi wu nɛɛ kaka nɛɛ wu yée shaa kpang.

Ruu keɓe gaayu ka ɓɔɔ zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang nɛɛ ri dũng dòo Kirisi kɔ, ri kasɛ ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ, zang yèe wu shaa. Zang keɓe ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ ka teteng ɓuru nɛɛ ri zili naa ɓuru, ri ti kãa gbalang naa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓuru ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ɓee. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri risi ruu naa jaafoo.
Rùu yàa ri bii naa kpang nɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng ning, tɔɔ ruu yìtì nɔɔ ruu niizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kirisi kati.

A zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang bang ɓɛɛ (ruu mɛɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ ɓeleng ri nwang ka tĩng ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa palɛ vuu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang). Rɛɛ zang bang kaɓa ri kɔ̀ɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn shɔɔ kpang.
Ri zi ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ, Laa a m shonang tɔ nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ shing Bituru, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang Yahudi Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa shing Bituru nɛɛ wu nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ ka teteng zang Yahudi, Laa shing m doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ n nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang.

Ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe, Yakub nɛɛ Bituru a ɓɔɔ Yɔhana ri zirɛ nɛɛ Laa a m shonang keɓe tɔ, ri yi naa mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Baranaba ri jee ruu nyaa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ shonang gbete nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ruu mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ, ri palɛ shonang ka teteng zang Yahudi, ruu palɛ ɓuru ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ri kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, danggn wu ning ruu zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka teteng zang kaɓa kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Vuu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n shing danggn palɛnang ɓee kɔ.
