Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ dɔɔ ruu kpang, a ruu ti kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀ɔ ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.
Wee ruu zang shonang Kirisi ɓee, ruu nɛ̀ɛ́ hɛ̃ɛlɛ nɔng vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ ka naa manɛ. A ruu palɛ nɔɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ hakaka kpang, ruu yiti nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nàá jaa gãng jĩng ka wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kpalɛ bii tɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ wu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu ti vɔ ka ruu manɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ gbãng gbãng.

Rɛɛ manzung, n tɔɔ n kpàá nɔɔ danggn. Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shonang dɔɔli tɔ. Ruu pálɛ́ shonang nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, ruu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ ruu kpãa nɔɔ kaa takpang, ka ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ.

Nɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ Laa, nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka nwannang ɓuru, ruu mang shi kpang ka yeti ɓuru kpang, ruu nwàng tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ruu pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kagn kpang.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ ruu palɛ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ naa ɓɔɔ dáa palɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã nɔɔ danggn, ruu yi tĩng, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ shing Laa, Laa tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ ɓáa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ naa nwang jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ wu nwang kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi bannang ɓiɓɛ.

A vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu zãa Laa diki diki ɓɛɛ kagn. Ruu atɛ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa shong nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãayi, a nɔɔ tarɛ. Wu naa nyaa shonang shɔnzang kpang, naa nyaa shonang Laa. Ti nyaa shonang Laa kɔ niizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Ruu Laa ti kɔ̃̀sɔ́ yeti manɛ kana ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, vuu kɔ pálɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓee, pálɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ yuu ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Zang tipi manɛ dãng nɔɔ jĩng doo nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudi dang ri jĩng jong ɓɛɛ.
Zang Yahudi ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa nɛɛ kpanti Yeesɔ vɔrɔ, a ri ti hing ruu ɓɛɛ. Laa tãa tĩnang ɓarɛ kpang tingkiring. Ri ti shing jĩng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.

Ri ti kãa naa ɓɔɔ ri zãa ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ruu, ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu kɔ̀ ri palɛ ɓee, kɔ shingnɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ, ɓèe nyaa kaa kiiri. A kãntang yeti Laa lasɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri, jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu kaa tɔ.

Rɛɛ manzung, zang shing ruu nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning ruu basɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki tɔkɔlɔng. Ruu yaa nɔɔ nɛɛ bii waati, a ruu yaa rɛ̃rɛnang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu manɛ kpang. Niizang, ruu kasɛ katɔ ka yeti ɓuru gbãng gbãng, a ruu kãa gbalang ruu naa zì nɔɔ tɔkn.
Ruu kasɛ yuu gbãanang ka bii manɛ. N nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n kãa gbalang tɔ ɓa doo gbete katɔ, a Sheetang zãa ruu gbalang daanang katɔ.

Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu naa leng nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi a tɔkn, nɔkɔ shing ruu, rùu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓuru, ruu ti tãa tĩnang ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Niizang ruu lakɛ jĩng nɛɛ nɔkɔ, nɔkɔ shing ruu, rùu tãa tĩnang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ nɛɛ ruu zunung danggn mãanang takpang, ruu mang ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ zang yaa ruu ka bm ka Ataniya.

A ruu shong manzung ɓuru Timoti, ɓɔɔ palɛ Laa shonang nɛɛ ruu ka gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ. Ruu tɔɔ wu naa shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ shii gbãng gbãng, wu ti mã nɔɔ danggn, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Kirisi ka ruu jĩng ɓɔɔ zang dang nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa kɔ mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang dang ruu jĩng.
Ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ka tĩng nɛɛ ruu naa dang jĩng ditɔ. A naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu dang jĩng tɔ nɔngkɔ teetee.

Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu shong Timoti ɓɛɛ kɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ n tí ɓɛɛ takpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shong wu, nɛɛ wu daa zi ruu naa ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang manɛ nwang ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi kpang naa Sheetang gãsɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ shing tɔ shonang ɓuru nandon shaarɛ tɔ waati ya?

Wee Timoti gbãayu tɔ ka bii ɓuru, ti atɛ ruu nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ shing danggn doo ka bii Yeesɔ, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu katɔ. A ti kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ tɔ̃ɔ diki diki ka yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi ruu doo naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ zinang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ruu ka yuu manɛ, mã̀ ruu danggn tɔ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu nɛɛ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓɛɛ. Ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ mã ruu danggn.
Wee nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka yuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ tɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓee, ruu tãa tĩnang nwannang ningkãari kaa tɔ.
Nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa Laa nɛɛ mani ka ruu manɛ kpang. Ruu zãa wu ka ruu tĩnang ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu, ruu tãa tĩnang ka ruu manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu gaa wu ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ ruu gaa wu nɛɛ yeti ɓuru nandon, nɛɛ wu yàa ruu gbalang jong ruu zi nɔɔ nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru, tɔɔ ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ yaa nɔɔ doogn ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ daa ɓuru nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ri shĩili ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu a ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Kpanti ɓuru wu shingnɛ zɔɔ kasɛnang manɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang piti, wu daa nɛɛ ting kɔ sasak. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa kasɛ zang kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Laa wu shingnɛ nɔɔ shii gbãng gbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, ka tĩng Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru ɓɛɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ naa a nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, n gisi nɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, nɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Laa wu tãa tĩnang manɛ tɔ ka bii ɓuru, a nɔɔ ti nwang kana nɔngkɔ kãntang. A ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nɔngkɔ sasak.
Nɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ a ruu ɓɛɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ɓɛɛ.
Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ nɔɔ ti yaa dũndũng palɛnang dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Zang varɛ ɓu wu yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃, ka gbalang tɔ̃ɔ naa ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ shɔnzang piti ri kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wu ka gbalang dũndũng palɛnang kpang, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.

Wu roo nɛɛ soro ɓeezung kpang tingkiring. Naa rooyi, pàlɛ́ ɓeezung vuu shi kpang, ti shaa wu katɔ. Ruu kɔ̀ɔ ruu keɓe tɔ ka tĩng, a ruu shaarɛ nɔɔ nyaa gbãng gbãng nɛɛ Kpanti Laa naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu keɓe jĩng katɔ.
Laa ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu naa nwang ka yeti dũndũng palɛnang kpang, nɛɛ ruu nwang ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ vuu kɔ ruu tusu ɓee, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi shɔnzang kpang, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu bee labeenang ka yuu ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, Laa tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
A nɔɔ ti tusu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ka Makidoniya ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak.
Nɔɔ mang ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang manɛ kikiri, nɔɔ haarɛ nyaa kpang, nɔɔ haa nyaa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ pálɛ̀ shonang nɛɛ naa manɛ naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ.
Ka naa weɓe kɔ, nɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn kpang, ri seng nɔɔ. Nɔ̀ɔ ti shing jĩng tɔ̀ɔ́ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ lasɛ yeti kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ sasak naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, ri lasɛ yeti ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ruu shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, a yuu paa tɔkn, a ruu ti shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, Laa naa sɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ditɔ jong nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Vuu kɔ ruu tusu nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa gbãayu, ɓɔɔ ruu doo ningkãari ka diki kaɓa, rukɔ daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ shɔɔnang, ruu yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Laa naa mɛɛ nyaa nabm, a zang bang rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa rang yee, a zang ri tãa yee vuukãng ɓɔɔ Laa jee ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ wu naa shooro kaa nɛɛ lapa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ a ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ, rikɔ yupaa ningkãari shɔɔnang.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu doo ningkãari ka diki kaɓa, Laa naa sèé ruu, daa kaa nɛɛ ruu ka yeti sãmbong, wu daa lapa nɛɛ ruu. Ruu daa kpisi kpanti Yeesɔ yuu ka lapa. Ruu nwáng kaa nɛɛ Kpanti sasak.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn nɛɛ ruu keɓe.
Daa naa ɓɔɔ n bee nɔɔ labeenang ka yuu diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa gbãa yuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ waasɛ̃ nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa a kagn, naa nwang naa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ, a nɛɛ zĩi bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ shing gn kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka laa ɓɔɔ zang ri gaayu kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ, “Ruu nwang tɔ nyaa zɔɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ shing ruu, rùu kaa vɔrɔ kpang.” A jĩng dannang wu a kaa yuu ɓarɛ tantɛnang naa ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng zang soro ɓɛɛ. Zang gbete wɔ̀ kpang.
Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kpang, tɔ̀ɔ diki keɓe wu arɛ nɔɔ mã naa ka danggn naa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a nɛɛ zĩi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shing gn kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ nandon, nɔɔ manɛ zang nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zang nɔng laagɛ̃. Ruu nandon, ruu nwang ɓuru naa zang nɔng zĩi nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu gãng nɔɔ jĩng, rúu nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu nwang nɔɔ ningkãari, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃.
Ka nwannang shɔnzang, shɔnzang ri rooro ɓi nɛɛ zĩi, zang ɓɔɔ ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ kpang, ri ɓoo saa nɛɛ zĩi saa si ri.

A ruu ɓuru zang nɔng laagɛ̃, rúu yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃. Danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zɔɔ, wu nwàng ruu naa kãati. Gn ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ nɛɛ Laa naa ta yuu ɓuru ditɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, wu nwang ruu naa wàálaa ka yuu ɓuru.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu nɛɛ wu dɔng rùu ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu dang jĩng ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓuru nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Yeesɔ vɔ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa nɔng gbete nɛɛ wu, naa ruu doo ningkãari, kɔ́ ruu vɔlɔ katɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn, nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa ka bii. Nɔɔ shing danggn kaa gbãng gbãng naa wee nɔɔ palɛ ɓee.

Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ seng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang ka teteng manɛ waasɛ̃. Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ sɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ tĩng, a ri ti tusu nɔɔ vuu, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ seng ri katɔ dɔɔli, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ katɔ, ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ waasɛ̃.

Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ waati nyaa katɔ, nɔɔ mã zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gn naa danggn pati nɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang naa ka bii, a nɔɔ ti mã danggn nɛɛ zang piti.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ wu waa pãng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu doo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kpang. Nɔɔ shing jĩng kɔ jong diki diki nɛɛ nɔɔ pàlɛ́ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ ti pàlɛ̀ zang piti tɔ̃ɔ jong.
Nɔɔ tãa tĩnang diki diki, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zang Laa ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ gaa Laa, nɔ́ɔ suu diki kpang.
Naa doo viya pálɛ̀ mɔɔ, zãa Laa katɔ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwangnɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Nɔ́ɔ nɔɔ Suru Laa gbalang shonang ɓiɓɛ palɛnang kpang.
Nɔ́ɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ gãsɛ ruu piti ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu manɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang tingkiring.

Laa ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Wu shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi a kagn ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓɔɔ ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, shing ruu katɔ ruu nwang nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ gàarɛ́ rùu Laa jong.
Nɔɔ jee zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nandon, nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
N ɓakɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ Laa, nɔɔ gã labeenang keɓe ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nandon.
Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, a ɓɔɔ kaa Siila nɛɛ Timoti. Ruu bee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Tesalonika ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri zang Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.

Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa Laa diki diki ka ruu manɛ tɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa wu tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ daa kana nɛɛ tĩng dɔɔli, a naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ ri kasɛ zɔɔ ti daa nɛɛ tĩng kɔ sasak.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rangkɛ ruu bang bang ka yuu manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu lengke zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu kpang. Ruu rangkɛ ruu ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn, a nɔɔ shing danggn sasak ka yeti jĩng kɔ nɔɔ dang nandon ɓee ɓɛɛ.
Vuu keɓe nandon tusu nɛɛ Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi gn dang gbete kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ naa daa naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwang Kpanti manɛ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang jĩng ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Laa naa palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ditɔ. Naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jĩng ditɔ.

Naa shing nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang jĩng kãntang, nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔ, a ruu ti ɔ̃sɔ jong. Naa palɛ vuu keɓe ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ bang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ, wu dang zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Laa katɔ jĩng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ri naa dang jĩng ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ningsi ri dòndòng ɓɛɛ. Laa naa ku ri ka biling, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru kagn kpang. Ri zi bannang ɓiɓɛ kpang dòndòng.

Ka diki ɓɔɔ wu arɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nandon ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri dɔ̀ɔ wu ri a wu bannang kati. Nɔɔ naa nwang jong ka teteng ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shíng danggn tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu gaa nɔɔ Laa diki diki ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ruu kɔɔ Laa ɓuru nɛɛ wu shingnɛ nɔ́ɔ daa naa nwannang kɔ wu ɓàa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ɓee katɔ. Wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Wu ti yi nɔɔ naa ka bii nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɔ́ɔ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka naa weɓe kɔ, zang a Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ bannang ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɛɛ bii manɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti palɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓuru, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu yuu gbãanang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang naa kpalɛ ruu, ruu ĩi wu ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa nɔɔ,

sisĩng wu tantɛ nɔɔ lɔɔnang kpang. Vuu bìí wu ti kpãa nɔɔ ka yeti ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru gbãayu kagn a tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa doo zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ kagn kɔɔyi, naa ti zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Laa shonang ɓɛɛ kɔ kɔɔyi, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ, ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ a nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.

Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu nwãarɛ nɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang dɔɔli ri nɛɛ raa Laa yuu knti tɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang nɛɛ nwang nyaa tɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi wu ɓi ka waa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, Diki Kpanti ɓuru wu a kati.

Naa risi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ vaka, kɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bang katɔ piti, naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Wu shing yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu ɓa ri katɔ nandon. Ti naa daa ka yeti Gãa Laa wu nwang ka nɔngkɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ kaa Laa.
Danggn ning nɔɔ katɔ ya? Ɓɔɔ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ nandon.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ti zãa vuu keɓe palɛnang kãntang keɓe kagn, a nɔɔ ti zi vuu keɓe tɔ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang keɓe naa nwang nyaa ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa zi tɔ nɛɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Kãntang keɓe, vuu ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang palɛ vuu shi kpang palɛ shoonang kana nɛɛ nwĩiri ka yeti shɔnzang dɔɔli. Zang ɓɔɔ maka wu, ti maka wu katɔ sasak. Zang nɛɛ naa kɔsɔ vuu bìí tɔ, tɔɔ wu naa nwangsɛ bii kati.
Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu nwangsɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang kati. Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ a tɔ naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, wu ti ningsi wu nɛɛ ɔ̃kɔnang nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang keɓe, naa a nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Sheetang wu pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ sèé ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.

Naa nwãarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa shaarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Ri shaarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang a ri ti tarɛ, tɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓarɛ kati kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shingnɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tingkiring tɔɔ ri shing danggn kaa sèé.

Laa palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang, ri tãa ɓarɛ tĩnang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ kati nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.

Rɛɛ manzung, ruu zã́a Laa katɔ ka diki kiya piti, ka ruu manɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng nɔɔ nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ kɔ shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang Laa, a ɓɔɔ kaa ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ naa tãa tĩnang jong ka ruu bannang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka, nɔɔ yiti rɛɛ ruu niizang ɓɔɔ ruu tusu, ka ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ, a ruu ti bee nɔɔ ka yeti labeenang tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, waasɛ̃.
Ruu gaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu ka tĩng, ɓɔɔ ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ mã ruu danggn a shingnɛ ruu shing gn gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
Wu mã nɔɔ danggn gbãng gbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, diki diki nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, n hangsɛ ruu kaa nɛɛ ruu keɓe. Nɔɔ gàá Ruu Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ wu bàa nɔng piti piti, wu daa nɛɛ tĩng kɔ sasak. Zang ri a ruu bii bannang, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a ruu bii bannang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔ́ɔ gaa Laa jong wu ta ruu nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu zang piti shing danggn tɔ ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
A Laa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, mã mɔɔ danggn katɔ, wu shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee mɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
Laa mã́ ruu danggn ka bii manɛ kɔ. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ ti palɛ katɔ sasak.
Ruu gaa Kpanti wu sɔɔ nɔɔ tĩng, nɔ́ɔ zí kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng. Laa wu ti shíng nɔɔ nɔ́ɔ mã danggn, nɔ́ɔ gã anang Kirisi.
Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu dang nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓákɛ̀ yuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nwang nwannang rang ɓɛɛ kpang. A ri dũng nyaa ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ waasɛ̃ nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓuru tɔ. Ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu si rang kpang.
Diki diki naa zang yi ruu naa ka bii, ruu shu ri katɔ. Ruu palɛ shonang gbãng gbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ wu shu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu palɛ vuu keɓe, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii kpang, kpang. Ruu palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ shonang palɛnang kpang, nɔɔ a wu vuu shaanang kpang.”
Ruu kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu tãayi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri nwang nwannang rang. Ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri hã̀lɛ́ nyaa ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu dang rɛɛ zang keɓe nyaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu shaarɛ ri nyaa, nɛɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri pálɛ́ shonang, ri walɛ vuu shaanang ɓarɛ nɛɛ mani.
A ɓɔɔ manɛ manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ lee tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ dũng ruu kɔ ruu shong nɔɔ ka yeti labeenang keɓe kpàng. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi zang keɓe waasɛ̃ nɔ́ɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu wu.
A nɔɔ palɛ wu kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ naa zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ wu kpang, kpang. Nɔɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa katɔ kɔ jong naa ɓaazung.
Ruu gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing yeti ɓuru wu valɛ ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ diki diki, naa ka gbalang kiya piti. Kpanti ɓuru wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon.
N bee vuu keɓe nɛɛ naa mɛɛ. Nkɔ Bulu, n jee nɔɔ nyaa. Wee naa ɓɔɔ n bee nung mɛɛ, n nɛɛ hangsɛ labeenang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
N gaa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ nandon tɔ̃ɔ.
Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, rikɔ zɔ̃ng m.

N bèé mɔkɔ Timoti ɓɔɔ ka gbalang Laa dũnnang, mɔɔ ɓaa kaa jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi Kpanti ɓuru, gn ɓaaɓɛ wu kɔng ri jong, ri ti pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
Ka ɓɔɔ n yupaa Makidoniya daanang, n kɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ n tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang ka Afisa ka nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn ka nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tusu vuu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang, shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ ri yaa ta.

Mɔ́ɔ kɔ̀ɔ ri nɛɛ ri suukãng waati ka nɔng ruu gbãagbãa kɔɔrɔnang, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ri gã zɔ̃ng rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu keɓe shing ɓi nyaa laanang waati. Shingnɛ ruu zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu walɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ tusu vuu keɓe shɛ̃ɛning.

N kɔɔ mɔɔ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ nɛɛ zɔɔ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ niizang keɓe ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang keɓe tɔ, ri ràa jĩng ɓarɛ kaa nyaa laanang naa shoko.
Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tusu zang nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa takpang. A ri rang yee kaa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ri zi vuu bii tɔ gbãng gbãng.
Ruu zi tɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, zang nɛɛ palɛ shonang nɛɛ mani waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.

Zang dang nyaa wu ka ruu zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri takɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang kpang ɓɛɛ. A bɔɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn ka bii Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri seng Laa kpang, ri ti seng vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ daa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nàá ɓarɛ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri rooro nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓɔɔrɔ zang ri mãlɛ́ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suuru sèé ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ruu niizang ka yuu ruu kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ vuu ka doo vuu tusunang ɓɔɔ niizang kpang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ niizang keɓe, ɓi ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu katɔ, a m nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ɓɛɛ.
N zãa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ a m kaka, n palɛ shonang mɛɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ. N ti zãa wu tɔ ka ɓɔɔ zirɛ n daa naa tɔ, zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n shòng wu ɓɛɛ.

Ka tĩng, n rang yee shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, n dang zang ɓiɓɛ jĩng, a n ti palɛ ri nɛɛ ɓangge, a zɔ̃ng m doo nɛɛ mani. A gn mɛɛ kɔng Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Bɛ̀ɛ́ n ti shing danggn gn kpang ɓɛɛ,

a kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. A tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ shingnɛ, n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a n ti kàsɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru piti, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti ri shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Yeesɔ Kirisi a ka koo nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ ɓa zang piti vuu shi kpang palɛnang.

Ka ruu ruu keɓe kɔ, gn mɛɛ kɔng Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi wu túsú naa ɓɔɔ wu mã danggn nɛɛ n gbãng gbãng, wu tà yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ nkɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang n ɓa zang piti ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ ri naa shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi kati, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kati.
Rùu nandon ruu dɔ̀ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti dòndòng ɓɛɛ ta. Laa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi jong kpang, zang ti zi wu ɓi jong nɛɛ jĩng kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete ɓɛɛ. Ruu a wu bannang ta dòndòng. Nɔngkɔ.
Jaa mɛɛ Timoti, ruu kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee, ɓi kaa doo ruu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔ tɔ kagn ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ dũng nyaa keɓe, mɔɔ ta sĩiri bii ditɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
Mɔɔ ti yiti danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ, wu ti nwang tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri yáa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri kpang ɓɛɛ.
Himinaya nɛɛ Alezanda ri ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ. N yàa Sheetang naa tɔ wu dang ri jĩng. Tɔ̀ɔ, shoo wu lu ri kati, ri yaa ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang kaa yuu Laa.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ shɔɔnang keɓe. Gaa Laa mɔɔ ti bakɛ wu ka ruu zang piti. Mɔɔ ti zãa Laa ka ruu ɓarɛ nandon.
Mɔɔ ti gàa Laa ka ruu rɛɛ kpanti, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang ɓɛɛ nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, rùu ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa rúu nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ kikiri nɛɛ zang piti. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a Laa bannang kati ruu ti seng zang jong.
Zɔ̃̌ng Laa gaanang keɓe, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru kasɛ zɔ̃ng gaanang keɓe kɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang piti, nɛɛ ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang.
Laa ɓi gbete kɔ nwani, a zang ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ ka teteng Laa nɛɛ zang piti ɓi doo gbete kɔ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Wukɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu shɔnzang nandon. A yuu ɓiɓɛ teetee ka laa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang piti kagn ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing m, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n ti tùsù ri danggn shinang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kɔ nwani. N suu wu sèé kpang.
N kasɛ zang varɛ, ri nɛɛ gaa Laa ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu zang gaa Laa ɓɛɛ, ri tuu naa ɓarɛ ka lapa. Yeti ɓarɛ wu lasɛ katɔ kpang, ri ti pálɛ̀ naa ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.

N kasɛ zang soro ri hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu yusɛ̃ɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ. Ri gbárɛ̀ bii wu nɛɛ yuu ɓɔɔ ri ti ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ kpang. Wu ti nɛɛ laa shoo, nɛɛ vuu turu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ kpang. Wu ti nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ri gbárɛ́ bii nɛɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri palɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu nɛɛ nwĩiri. Wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
N kasɛ kpang, zang soro ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang varɛ vuu kpang. Zang soro wu ti nwàng zang bang ka yuu zang varɛ kpang. Wu nwang ɓi nɛɛ nwĩiri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpálɛ̀ zɔɔ zang bang Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa mãa Adamu kɔ shɔɔnang, a naa mãa Hawawu ɓɛɛ.
A zang ti nwãarɛ wu Adamu kpang. Zang nwãarɛ ɓi Hawawu, a ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ.
A zang soro naa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa jaa ɓɔɔ wu yi ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Yeesɔ kpang, nɛɛ ti kasɛ ruu zang katɔ, nɛɛ ti palɛ shi kpang, kpang, nɛɛ ti yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, kasɛ ɓi shonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ.

Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, wu gee soro gbete kɔ nwani. Wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ pati kpang, zang ɓɔɔ yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ti zunung naa ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang vuu katɔ.
Wu zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo sàa kpang, wu zang ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli kpang, gàa nyaa kpang, ti haa nyaa kpang. Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu saka dɔɔli kpang.
Wu yiti zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃, wu shing wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ri ti seng wu katɔ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti zang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang, palɛ biya, wu yiti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa viya?
Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa diki bee gn kpang, kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛ̀ɛ́ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli, zang nɛ̀ɛ́ dɔng wu ruu naa ɓɔɔ zang dɔng Sheetang ɓɛɛ.
Wu ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ri seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ nwáng vuu dãanang ka nɔng zang, nɛ̀ɛ́ ti watɛ ka yeti jàng ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛtang làng ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shonang ka Gãa Laa, ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ ta nyaa ziti kpang. Ri ti ɓoo saa kpang, ri ti zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng ka saka kãanang kpang.
Ri ti yiti ruu niizang keɓe ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dũng wu ri shingnɛ, ri yaa gn naa kpang.
Zang gã̀sɛ̀ ri ka gbongkarɛ. Ri nɛɛ shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ri kagn keɓe tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ri naa shonang palɛnang kati.
Zang soro ɓarɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ràng zang kpang. Ri nwàng wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ pati kpang. Ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shonang ka Gãa Laa, zang ɓu wu gee soro gbete. Ri yiti wujɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shonang ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang ɓarɛ waasɛ̃, zang a ri bannang katɔ. Ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri rang ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi katɔ, nyaa zàa ri kpang.
Ka wee n bee mɔɔ labeenang keɓe ɓee, n shing gn daanang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kãntang.

Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ suu m kã̀ng anang, labeenang keɓe, wu kɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang ri nwang ka yeti Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Gãa Laa keɓe, ɓi wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi ningkãari dòndòng ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, kaa rikɔ doo gãa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yiti ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu niizang ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ ka yuu gbalang ɓiɓɛ kɔ ruu dũng ɓee, bang dɔɔli. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Yeesɔ tuu bii shɔnzang a nɔng
ka koo. Suru Laa tusu nɛɛ
wu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka
bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa
shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa,
ri zi wu nɛɛ jĩng ɓarɛ.
Zang ri kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka koo
piti. A zang dɔɔli ka koo ri
shing danggn tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
Zang tuu wu tɔ, zang daa nɛɛ wu
ka lapa, ka tĩng Laa.

Suru kɔɔ tɔ faarik nɛɛ, diki a ditɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa yaa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Ri naa dũng vuu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
Ɓi zang sèé ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang, nɛɛ vuu palɛnang kɔ ri tusu zang zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe. Zang keɓe ri rɛ̃̀rɛ́ ɓarɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ Sheetang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nɛɛ, soro geenang shi kpang. Nɛɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ kagn, ri ti shaa kpang. Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang tɔ, ri tarɛ ri ti zãa wu kati ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãa piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, nɔ́ɔ bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ ta vuu piti, nɔɔ zãa wu.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu shaanang piti, ɓi Ruu Laa shingnɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, a ɓɔɔ kaa Laa ɓɔɔ ruu gàa ka nɔng shaanang ɓɛɛ.

Naa mɔɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu keɓe diki diki, mɔɔ nwang zang shonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Mɔɔ ti alɛ ɓaa suru bii ɓaaɓɛ ruu niizang ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu danggn shinnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tùsù mɔɔ, a mɔɔ yiti gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
Yaa gbalang ruu gbãagbãa ɓɔɔ daa naa kɔɔrɔnang kpang kaɓa katɔ. Mɔɔ kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa niizang.

Pĩirinang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shing bii ɓaaɓɛ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ vuu Suru Laa, nwang mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka gbalang naa bm bm. Nwǎng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka nwannang ɓuru kãntang keɓe, ti naa nwàng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tarɛ ri shing danggn gn tɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu palɛ shonang, a ruu ti takɛ bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu zang piti ɓɛɛ. Tá yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ kɔ gbãng gbãng.
Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe, mɔɔ ti tusu ri vuu keɓe diki diki.

Mɔ́ɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu risi mɔɔ naa vĩi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ doo jasang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nwang ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ́ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ka yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, ka danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ.
A yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kpalɛ zang yuu, mɔɔ gã ri labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Laa, mɔɔ ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa vuu. N a nɛɛ mani.
Palɛ shonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa kpang. Ɓɔɔ wu a mɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang ri rang yee, a zang bang Gãa Laa ri shìng mɔɔ naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ.
Palɛ vuu keɓe, mɔɔ shing yuu ɓaaɓɛ kagn gbãng gbãng, tɔɔ zang piti ri zi naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa nɛɛ tĩng kati.
Gãng jĩng ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ti gãng jĩng, ka vuu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tusu ɓɛɛ. Palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe diki diki. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ mangkɛ zang bang kpang. Rang wu yee naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Palɛ rɛɛ jasang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ jaa nàá ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ wujaa ɓɛɛ.
Palɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri bang tɔ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ nàá ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti palɛ rɛɛ wujɛ soro naa ɓaa naa. Mɔɔ seng ri katɔ.
Seng rɛɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yǐ ri naa ka bii kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.

Suvɔ ɓɔɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wujɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kagn, wujɛ keɓe ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ ri gaayu shonang Laa palɛnang, ka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri shonang ɓɛɛ. Ka gbalang keɓe, ri wàá rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri, nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ pãng, vuu ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe Laa kasɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
Suvɔ ɓɔɔ ɓi ka bm, zang ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka wu kpang shing gn ɓi kaa bii Laa. Gaa Laa nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, nɛɛ Laa wu yi wu naa ka bii.
A suvɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jĩng ka tĩnang tãanang, naa nwang doo ningkãari, suru ɓiɓɛ vɔ ɓi tɔ.
Kɔɔ ri vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓiɓɛ kpang, nɛɛ gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ gbãng gbãng kpang. Zang keɓe bɛ̃ɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa tɔ. Palɛ vuu shi kpang, ti ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang katɔ nɛɛ yeti hakaka tánang.
Suvɔ ɓɔɔ sáa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓa laa taati gn kpang nɛɛ ti gee varɛ dòo dóo gbete kɔ nwani kpang, mɔɔ bèe nung ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ bée nung rɛɛ suvɔ kpang.

Nɛɛ ti suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang zi wu tɔ nɛɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti gãng jĩng ka wujɛ ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tá zang zanti katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti pálɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ vuu, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dang jĩng naa ka bii ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti shing yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ bee nung ɓiɓɛ.

Mɔɔ bèe nung suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang ka labeenang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ beere nung rɛɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jĩng ka ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa bii ɓarɛ seepaa, ri kàsɛ́ nɛɛ ri gee ɓarɛ kaa varɛ. Ri naa yáa nyaa ɓɔɔ ri a Yeesɔ Kirisi kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa dɔng ri ruu kaa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri a Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa ti nɔngkɔ kpang, ri si kaa rang, ri kɔng kaa bii ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ka gãa gãa ɓɛɛ. Bɛ̀ɛ́ ri gaa kaa yuu zang rannang, ri ti ràngkɛ́ yee kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓarɛ hãa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
N kasɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang, ri gee varɛ, ri yi jaa. Ri gãng jĩng ka gãa ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu yàa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ruu kpang gbalang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri yaa gbalang Laa tɔ, ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa sheetang ɓɛɛ.

Naa jaa soro ɓɔɔ dũng Laa, a zang ɓiɓɛ kagn ri suvɔ, wu gãng jĩng ka ri. Wu tɔ̀ɔ́ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jĩng ka ri kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jĩng ɓarɛ kaa suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ.

Zang bang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ, zang shu ri saka tìng ziti. Zang ɓɔɔ shonang ɓarɛ ɓi Ruu Laa kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ vuu tusunang, zang wu shu rikɔ nɔngkɔ gbãng gbãng.
Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ mã nyaa vuu vaa ka làa ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́
mɔɔ shonang ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang.”
A zang ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ shu zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ̀
mɔɔ shonang, saka ɓiɓɛ katɔ.”
Naa zang tɔɔ zang bang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri naa kɔɔ mɔɔ, ri nɛɛ ɓa ziti katɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, mangkɛ ri ka jĩng zang piti. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nimbang ri kaa vɔrɔ kati.

N gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ nung Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ mɔɔ, mɔɔ dũ̀ng nyaa kɔ n dang mɔɔ ɓee. Ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ nandon, mɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang katɔ kpang, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu gn dang gbete kpang.
Mɔɔ làabìi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing naa ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri palɛ shonang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ yi naa ɓaaɓɛ ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn ri palɛ kpang. Nwang ɓaa nwannang tɔ̃ɔ.
Mɔɔ ɓoo mii tɔ̀ɔ́ waati kpang, lu sàa (mii Inabi) kagn tɔkɔlɔng ka ruu yeti ɓɔɔ kpãa mɔɔ, nɛɛ kɔnang diki diki ɓɛɛ.
Vuu shi kpang zang ɓɔɔ tusu bii tantɛnang, bɛ̀ɛ́ zang kɔɔ gn kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Vuu shi kpang zang ɓɔɔ tusu bii pati kpang, tusu bii ɓi nɛɛ knti.
Vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi doo nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ kpãa zinang kpang. Ɓɔɔ zang zi kãntang kpang, waasɛ bii dòndòng kpang.
Mɔɔ nɛɛ jaafoo, mɔɔ zì dabang gãa ɓaaɓɛ, naa zang ɓɔɔ dàa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a wu bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee shi kpang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yuu Laa nɛɛ yuu vuu kɔ ruu tusu zang ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jaafoo ɓɛɛ, dabang gãa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũng Laa, nɔɔ risi ri naa vĩi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔ̀ɔ pàlɛ̀ ri shonang gbãng gbãng kɔ jong. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dabang gãa manɛ ri ɓarɛ doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ ri manɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tusu zang vuu keɓe, mɔɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ nɔngkɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu vuu ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ daa gbete nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu tusu ka yuu gbalang Laa kɔ ruu dũng ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zang keɓe ɓi jĩng lakɛnang yee wu, zi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang. Kasɛ ɓi ruu nyaa laanang ka yuu ruu, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang haa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Shíng zang ri káa sũnyaa, ri bàsɛ́ zɔɔ, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ, ri dãa zɔɔ, ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ,
a ri hãa nyaa diki diki. Zang keɓe, yeti ɓarɛ zunung rɛ̃rɛnang tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓarɛ kpang.
Zang keɓe, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ gbalang Laa ɓi gbalang ɓɔɔ zang walɛ saka kagn ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa, a vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ daa wu katɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kɛɓɛ shing yeti ɓiɓɛ valɛ katɔ.
Ruu à nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ka koo keɓe kpang. Ruu ti tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu yaa koo keɓe kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu shaanang nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓuru nɛɛ kagn, ri dàa ruu katɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓarɛ vuu naa, sheetang gãsɛ ri katɔ. Wu shing ri, ri palɛ vuu shoko nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ ri katɔ, ɓɔɔ ri kàsɛ̀ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ ri shing zang, zang wu shaarɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
Kasɛnang saka wukɔ dĩiri vuu shi kpang nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ri làabìi walɛnang, ri yaa gbalang danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa tɔ. A ri atɛ yuu ɓarɛ yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ng dɔɔli tɔ.

A ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ Timoti, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa zang Laa ɓɛɛ, yaa vuu keɓe ɓaa nandon. Kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ diki diki, zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa niizang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ mã danggn dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ĩi yuu kagn ka gbalang danggn kɔ ruu shing ɓee. Yiti suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ walɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng. Wee suru bii ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka shoo zang dɔɔli nɛɛ mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Ka tĩng Laa ɓɔɔ a vuu piti suru bii ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka tĩng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ ka tĩng kpanti Pontu Bilatu ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ,
dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang mɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ mɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang nyaa kagn wu a nɛɛ mani.
Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwang nyaa ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa shing ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu, wukɔ roo kpanti gbete. Wukɔ Kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti nandon. Wukɔ dabang gãa rɛɛ dabang gãa.

Wukɔ vɔ ɓi kpang gbete. Nwàng ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ ɓi katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung daanang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zi wu gngn kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi wu kagn kpang. Zang wu báng wu diki diki, naa vuu palɛnang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ dòndòng, Nɔngkɔ.

Kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang ying ka koo keɓe ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ri shing gn ka vuu naa ɓɔɔ nwang dòndòng kpang, ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kpang. Ri shing gn ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu vuu piti, ka diki kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu tãa tĩnang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang zang ying nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri mung naa kpang, ri a zang vuu, ri basɛ vuu ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ́ ɓarɛ kagn kpang.
Naa ri palɛ naa weɓe, ri kpàlɛ́ yuu ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri lòó ɓarɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ naa yi ri naa ka bii ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ kati.
Timoti, gãng jĩng ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka yee sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ kpang. Mɔɔ ti laa nyaa ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang suu sèé nɛɛ wukɔ “zũnang” ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yáa danggn kɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓee tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa, wu pálɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.

Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ n nwang zang shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ, n kɔɔ zang ruu, ka yuu suru bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa a ruu ɓɛɛ. Suru bii keɓe, ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
N bee mɔkɔ Timoti jaa mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, gn ɓaaɓɛ wu kɔng ri katɔ, ri palɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
N zãa Laa ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ́ wu shonang nɛɛ yeti gbete tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang mɛɛ ri pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ. N zãa wu ka ɓɔɔ, n gaa wu nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zĩi n ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ kagn diki diki ɓɛɛ.
N nɛɛ kpaa danggn miiri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ tɔ, n kasɛ n zi jĩng ɓaaɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tĩnang kaa gbãng gbãng.
Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gbãng gbãng, ning m kpang, naa ɓɔɔ nabang ɓaaɓɛ Looyi nɛɛ naaɓɛ Yunis, ri shing ɓɛɛ. N ti zi zɔ̃ng danggn shinnang keɓe kagn yeti ɓaaɓɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kpàá mɔɔ danggn, mɔɔ palɛ shonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ n shìng mɔɔ naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu, ɓi ɓɔɔ shing ruu, ruu tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa keɓe, shing ruu, rùu shii ɓuru nɛɛ kaka kɔ jong, ruu kasɛ ruu zang, ruu ti yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang. Yusɛ̃ɛ wu ti tuu mɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa ka ruu Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang. Dang jĩng jong ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, naa ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ kaka ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Wukɔ ɓàa ruu nyaa, a tà yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ ruu nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mãa koo gn kpang.

A kãntang keɓe naa nwàngsɛ̀ rùu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ kaa nɛɛ anang Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa kaka vɔrɔ, a nwangsɛ ruu suru bii nɛɛ nwannang ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ, ka gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
Laa zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n nwang zang shonang Yeesɔ, n tusu zang vuu, a n ti kɔ̀ɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.

N dang jĩng ka ruu rɛɛ vuu keɓe kɔ. A n yaa gn naa m gn kpang tingkiring, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi zang ɓɔɔ n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A n ti zi m tɔ nɛɛ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu yìtí m vuu ɓɔɔ wu a m ka naa tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani.
Yiti rúu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ n tusu mɔɔ ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng. Mɔɔ ti yaa danggn shinnang nɛɛ zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang.
Gãng jĩng ka ruu niizang ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ. Yiti nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru Laa, ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti ɓuru ruu nandon ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, rɛɛ Figelu nɛɛ Hamɔgini nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka tipi Asiya nandon, ri yaa m tɔ.
Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ Onɛsiforu nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lée ka ɓɔɔ wu yi m naa ka bii diki diki kpang ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa tuu wu kpang.
Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ wu a gari Rooma hn, tantɛ m kãanang, naa ĩi m kati.
Kpanti Yeesɔ wu palɛ wu tɔ̃ɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti zì vuu ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ m ka Afisa ɓɛɛ tɔ gbayi gbayi.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa mɛɛ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ mɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka. Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Túsú vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tãayi, n túsú ka jĩng zang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ tusu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ri gn katɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓɔɔ kaa jong ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ sɔɔja tɔ̃ɔ mã danggn jĩng dannang ɓɛɛ, mã danggn dòo nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ dang jĩng ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sĩiri, ta sĩiri tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang bang ɓiɓɛ wu tãa tĩnang ɓiɓɛ kati. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔja kpang ri pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri yuu jajayu nɛɛ dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ kpang, walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ lang jaa, ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang gbãng gbãng, zang wu a wukɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang walɛ ka jaa, shɔɔnang.
Rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a mɔɔ gbalang ditɔ mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ nandon.
Danggn Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang wisi paa nɛɛ saa, wu ning mɔɔ kpang. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wu jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ n túsú ka yeti Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ n kɔ́ɔrɔ̀ zang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n dang jĩng, a zang ti mã m nɛɛ saka, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ǹ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang mã Ruu Laa bìí, ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ katɔ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n mã danggn vuu piti ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kaa jong. Yuu tanang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ti atɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani. Zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
Ruu nɛɛ vɔ tɔ nɛɛ wu,
Ruu ti naa nwang ditɔ ningkãari nɛɛ wu.
Ruu nɛɛ mã danggn sasak,
ruu naa roo kpanti nɛɛ wu.
Naa ruu bɛ̃ɛ wu,
ti naa bɛ̃ɛ ruu jong.
Naa ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ zang
shing gn ka bii ɓuru kpang,
Yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔ ɓi kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sùu yuu ɓiɓɛ
sèé ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.

Kpaa rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ danggn vuu keɓe, mɔɔ ti shaarɛ ri nyaa gbãng gbãng ka tĩng Laa, nɛɛ ri gaa nyaa ka yuu ruu kpang. Nwàng zang vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, lasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.

Pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zunung katɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. Zang shonang ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ tuu wu kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nwàngsɛ́ zang dĩiri Ruu Laa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ɓaa ka yee sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, shing zang, zang yaa gbalang Laa kaa beebang.
Zɔ̃ng yee keɓe nwang ɓi naa nɔɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri túsù zɔ̃ng yee keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ Himinaya nɛɛ Filetu.
Ri yaa gbalang ɓɔɔ niizang tɔ, ri kpantɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ jĩng, ri kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ, Laa wisi zang paa ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ saa kpang.
A doo gãa ɓɔɔ Laa loo ɓɛɛ, shii ɓi katɔ katakata, zang zĩiti kpang. Zang bee vuu keɓe ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ,
“Laa zi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ tɔ”.
A “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
wu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa, wu yaa
gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ
wu palɛ katɔ.”

Ka yeti gãa bang, juwa kagn ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ nɛɛ azurufa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Zang pálɛ̀ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa, a zang mãa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tapɔng. Zang shing ɓɔɔ ɓi ka ruu vuu shaanang ka nɔng mung, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shonang ɓi nɛɛ mani diki diki.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ rɛɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe kpang nandon, nwang ɓi naa juwa Zinariya ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang kagn ka lee mung ɓɛɛ. Juwa keɓe, shi zang ɓiɓɛ ka jĩng dɔɔli. Zang ɓiɓɛ palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ piti nɛɛ mani katɔ.

Yaa vuu ɓɔɔ bii jasang kasɛ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa. Mɔ́ɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔ́ɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ ri. Palɛ vuu keɓe nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
Ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ ruu shoko kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ nyaa laanang kpang. Mɔɔ zi tɔ ri shingnɛ zang ri haa nyaa.
Zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ Laa shonang wu hàa nyaa ɓi kpang. Wu nwáng ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang piti tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti nwáng zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, mã danggn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wu kɔsɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ gnvɔ ning kpang. Naa Laa nɛɛ kasɛ, ri naa walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri árɛ̀, ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Shoo naa lu ri ditɔ, ri wɔ nɛɛ naa suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ lang saka yi ri kagn, a shing ri, nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Danggn wu ning mɔɔ kpang. Diki ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa kagn naa nwang diki jĩng dannang.

Ka diki keɓe, zang ri naa kàsɛ́ yuu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ri naa kɔng jĩng nɛɛ vuu ɓarɛ, ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ, ri naa tuu bii dɔɔli, ri naa dãlɛ zang, ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiki ri kpang, ri naa zã̀a zang kpàng, ri ti naa dũng Laa kpang, ri pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ri naa pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang, gn zang ti naa kɔng ri kpang, ri naa rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang, ri naa yiti yuu ɓarɛ kpang, a gnvɔ ti ka yeti ɓarɛ dɔɔli. Ri naa kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓarɛ kpang.
Ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gn ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Ri naa rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ ka gbongkarɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri pálɛ́ vuu kpang, ri naa lakɛ jĩng dɔɔli. Ri naa kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang kagn ɓa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ Laa katɔ.
Ri naa palɛ bii mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ nɛɛ ri dṹng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, a nwannang ɓarɛ tusu ɓi nɛɛ ri dũng Laa kpang tingkiring. Ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri naa dàarɛ́ zang ka gãa. Ri ɓá kaka zang soro ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ yeti kɔ̃sɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ ri palɛ ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang soro keɓe, diki diki ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri vuu, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang kaa takpang doo nɛɛ mani.
Naa ɓɔɔ Jani ri nɛɛ Jambari ri bɛ̃ɛ nyaa Musa ɓɛɛ, zang keɓe ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang doo nɔngkɔ. Zang keɓe, yeti ɓarɛ zunung rɛ̃rɛnang kpang. Danggn shinnang ɓarɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ niizang kpang.
Ri dàa tĩng beebang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri zi shoko ɓarɛ ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ pálɛ́ rɛɛ Jani nɛɛ Jambari ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, mɔ̀ɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ɓɛɛ tɔ, mɔɔ zi nwannang mɛɛ tɔ, a mɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ n shing jĩng mɛɛ kagn tɔ. Mɔɔ zi danggn ɓɔɔ n shing ka bii Laa tɔ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ n mã nɛɛ zang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ a ɓɔɔ danggn ɓɔɔ n mã ka jĩng dannang ɓɛɛ.

Mɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ zang dang m jĩng ɓɛɛ nɛɛ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ m ka Antakiya, nɛɛ Ikoniya, nɛɛ Lisitira tɔ, jĩng ɓɔɔ zang dang m, a n mã danggn ɓɛɛ. Laa ta yuu mɛɛ ka vuu keɓe nandon.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa gbãng gbãng ka ɓɔɔ wu ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang dang wu jĩng katɔ.
A zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, ri tuu waa nyaating zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, ri shaarɛ katɔ, shaarɛnang ɓarɛ daa nɛɛ tĩng kɔ jong. Ri nwãarɛ zang, zang ti nwãarɛ ri.
Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, dũng ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ a mɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ kagn gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti zi zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ tɔ.
Mɔɔ ti zi tɔ, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ mɔɔ doo wujaa, mɔɔ zi labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ zũngnɛ tɔ.
Tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.

Yee ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Laa nandon, Laa nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ. Zang tusu zang vuu nɛɛ yee keɓe kɔ, zang ti mangkɛ zang nɛɛ mani, zang gbarɛ zang nɛɛ mani, a zang ti tusu zang nwannang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ mani,
tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ Laa shonang, wu walɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng piti nɛɛ mani.

N gàa mɔɔ nɛɛ nung Laa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwang nyaa ditɔ, naa roo kpanti, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu keɓe.
Kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, yi tĩng ɓaa ka kɔɔrɔnang, naa nɛɛ làá kɔɔnang, naa nɛɛ ti laa kɔɔnang kpang piti. Mangkɛ zang, mɔɔ ti mã̀ zang danggn. Mɔɔ mã danggn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ.

Diki naa a ditɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa shoo ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang tusu kpang. Ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu vuu, nɛɛ ri tùsù ri vuu ɓɔɔ bii sháa ri, rì kasɛ tãanang ɓɛɛ.
Ri ɓaa shoo, ka ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, ɓɔɔ ka yuu gbalang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri ɓàarɛ́ shoo ɓarɛ ka ruu gbãagbãa.

Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, yiti yuu ɓaaɓɛ waasɛ̃ diki diki, mɔɔ nɛɛ dang jĩng, mã danggn, palɛ ɓaa shonang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ. Pálɛ́ shonang ɓaaɓɛ nandon naa zang shonang Laa.
Ɓɔ̀ɔ́ mɛɛ, làá mɛɛ a ɓi tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang lu m, naa ɓɔɔ zang lu laa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓoo katɔ ɓɛɛ. Diki a tɔ ɓɔɔ n yaa koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
N yuu m tɔ waasɛ̃ n yurɛ n daa hangsɛ nyaa. N yaa danggn ɓɔɔ n shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.

Kãntang keɓe, Laa shing vuu ɓɔɔ wu a m ɓɛɛ tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, naa a m vuu keɓe ka diki ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. A nkɔ ka bm kpang, a zang piti ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu, ri gãng jĩng diki ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu kagn ɓɛɛ.
Kãa gbalang mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ pati,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Dema kasɛ ruu vuu koo keɓe, yaa m tɔ, daa tɔ ka gari Tesalonika. Karasika daa ka Galati, a Titu daa ɓi kaa Dalamatiya.
Ɓi kaa Luka kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ n, kãa nɔng Maraku, mɔɔ a nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yi m naa katɔ ka shonang mɛɛ keɓe.
N shong Tikiku ɓi ka Afisa

Mɔɔ nɛɛ a kaa tɔ, mɔɔ atɛ m fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ n hãa nɛɛ biling, ɓɔɔ n yaa ka nɔng Kaapu ka gari Torowasa ɓɛɛ ka naa ning. Mɔɔ ti atɛ rɛɛ labeenang kiɓi ka naa jong. Labeenang ɓɔɔ n shing danggn gbãng gbãng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo vuu ɓɛɛ.
Alezanda yɔɔ ɓɔɔ sã vuu ɓɛɛ palɛ m vuu shi kpang dɔɔli. Laa naa palɛ wu vuu ditɔ jong ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
Gãng jĩng ka wu gbãng gbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, zang ɓaa m nyaavaa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tà m nyaa kagn kpang. Zang ri yaa m nandon. N gaa Laa wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
A Yeesɔ Kirisi yáa m kaa takpang, a m kaka, a n zunung ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudi kpang, ri tãa kati. A Laa tá m nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ta m ditɔ, ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri palɛ m nandon. Wu daa nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Zang ri a wu bannang ta dòndòng. Nɔngkɔ.
Mɔɔ jèe m Akpiila nɛɛ ɓeeso Pirisila nyaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Onɛsiforu nandon.
Erasitu nwàng ɓi ka Koranti, a n yaa Torofimu ka gari Miletu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu pálɛ́ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Kãa gbalang mɔɔ arɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ pũngku kpaa gn kpang. Yubulu, nɛɛ Pudin, nɛɛ Linu, nɛɛ Kalawudiya, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Manzung ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ ka nihn, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa jong.
Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu shingnɛ, mɔɔ tãa tĩnang, Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.

Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu, zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ Laa shonang, n ti zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Laa zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n nwang zang shonang ɓiɓɛ, a shong m nɛɛ n yi zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ri katɔ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn gbãng gbãng. N ti shing ri, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shing gn ka suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ suu sèé kpang a zang nyaa bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mãa koo gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ diki a tɔ teetee Laa nwangsɛ rùu ruu suru bii keɓe, ka yeti yee ɓiɓɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, a m ruu keɓe, a kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang.

N bèé mɔkɔ Titu, ɓɔɔ ka gbalang danggn kɔ ruu shing nandon ɓee, mɔɔ ɓaa kaa jaa mɛɛ niizang ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, ri pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ, mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
N yaa mɔɔ ka tipi Karita n tɔɔ, mɔɔ hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, ruu yaa nyaa ka gbalang ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. A mɔɔ ti zɔ̃ngkɔ zang bang ka Gãa Laa ka gari gari, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Soro ɓiɓɛ gbete kɔ nwani. Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nandon, ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa. Ri wu wujɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang, a ri ti tá shoo pɛɛrɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang Gãa Laa gãng jĩng ɓi ka shonang Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu yuu kpang, wu ti ta yeti gbãngko kpang. Wu zang ɓɔɔ sàa si wu kpang, wu zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa kpang. Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng ka saka kãanang ɓɛɛ kpang, a wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔɔli kpang.

Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu sãnsãnrãng kpang ɓɛɛ, palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ diki diki, ti palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.

Wu ti yiti ruu niizang ɓɔɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ gbãng gbãng. Wu palɛ nɔngkɔ, wu mã̀ zang ɓɔɔ danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ. Wu ti tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ rúu bìí katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang dɔɔli nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gbalang zang Yahudi dũnnang ri dũng kaa Laa, ri ta ruu niizang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri nwãarɛ zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ yee shoko ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zãa ri ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ri kpantɛ danggn ɓɔɔ zang gaa gaa ri shing ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa tusunang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing jĩng ɓarɛ ka saka kãanang ɓɛɛ.
Zang nyaa shonang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ kagn, doo zang Karita kɔ, kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Zang Karita ɓarɛ zang sèé, ri nwang naa yɔpɔ kpaasi, ri ɓarɛ zang ráng ɓɔɔ shaa vuu dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.”
Ruu kɔ yɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ɓee, niizang kɔ nwani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mangkɛ ri nabm, tɔ̀ɔ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ.
Ri yaa ruu gbãagbãa zang Yahudi ta, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa katɔ, ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ.

Ka jĩng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, vuu piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon. A zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang palɛnang lasɛ ri tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ lasɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ri kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri zi Laa tɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tusu kaa nɛɛ ri zi Laa nung kpang. Ri ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃ɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang kpang, ri daa naa vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓarɛ kpang tingkiring.
Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ daa doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ.

Kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, ri nwàng wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ pati kpang, ri nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ waasɛ̃. Ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ gbãng gbãng ɓɛɛ, ri kasɛ zang gbãng gbãng, a ri ti mã danggn gbãng gbãng.

Kɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ri nwáng nwannang naa zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri nɛ̀ɛ́ nwàng ɓɛɛ. Ri rang zang kpang, ri nwàng jaafoo sàa kpang, ri tusu naa ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri nɛ̀ɛ́ nwang ɓɛɛ,
tɔ̀ɔ, ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang naa ɓɔɔ ri kàsɛ́ varɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ kati.

Ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ waasɛ̃, ri pálɛ̀ dũndũng kpang, ri nwang zang soro ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang gãa ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa varɛ ɓarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri rang yee shi kpang kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu Ruu Laa kpang.
Kɔɔ jasang doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ katɔ.
Ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ piti, tusu yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete, mɔɔ ti pĩiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang ɓɛɛ kpang.
Tusu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang, kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang kati, ri wàlɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔ́ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kaa takpang.
Kɔɔ jaafoo ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa dabang gãa ɓarɛ. Ri shingnɛ, dabang gãa ɓarɛ, ri tãa tĩnang ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ ri ɓɛɛ nandon. Ri laa nyaa nɛɛ ri kpang.

Ri ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu dabang gãa ɓarɛ kpang. Ri tusu diki diki nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, wu shingnɛ, zang ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ kaa yuu vuu kɔ ruu tusu ka yuu Laa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa túsú tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu zang piti nɛɛ mani tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ keɓe, kɔ tusu ruu, ruu yaa nwannang ta naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu vuu koo ɓɛɛ. Ruu nwangnɛ, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru katɔ, ruu nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu dũng Laa ka nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe.
Ka wee ruu nwangnɛ, ruu gã diki tĩnang tãanang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn nɛɛ naa a ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ bannang Laa ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti ta yuu ɓuru naa nwangsɛ bii ɓɛɛ.
Yeesɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ wu ta ruu nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang nandon. Wu shing ruu, ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ bm gbete. Wu shing rùu rúu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ, nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tusu zang vuu keɓe. Pálɛ́ shonang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔ́ɔ mã̀ zang ɓaaɓɛ danggn. Mɔɔ ti mangkɛ ri. Mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu risi mɔɔ naa vĩi kpang.
Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ kpanti, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang tipi. Ri ti kpalɛ bii diki diki, ri pálɛ́ shonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zang, ri yi wusang nɛɛ zang piti. Ri pálɛ̀ hakaka kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓeleng ruu nɛɛ yuu ɓuru bɛ̀ɛ́ ruu palɛ vuu shoko, ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang, zang nwãarɛ ruu. Ruu nwang ɓuru jaafoo, vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Ruu sùúkãng ka nɔng vuu shi kpang palɛnang nɛɛ sũnyaa kaanang. Zang piti bɛ̃ɛ ruu katɔ, a ruu ti bɛ̃ɛ zang piti.
A ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, tusu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ zang piti ɓɛɛ.

Ta yuu ɓuru kati. Wu ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ yuu ɓuru ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Tà yuu ɓuru, ɓi ka ruu gn ɓuru ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ng wu ɓɛɛ. Tà yuu ɓuru ka bii ɓɔɔ Suru Laa sɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Bii sɔɔnang ɓɔɔ risi ruu naa zang yi ruu kaa shɔɔ, a á ruu suru bii shɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Laa a ruu suru ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
Tɔ̀ɔ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tĩng Laa, a ruu wàlɛ́ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ɓiɓɛ kati.
Ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, niizang kɔ nwani.
N kasɛ mɔɔ yi tĩng ɓaa ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri dũng vuu keɓe, ri pálɛ́ shonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Shonang keɓe, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ti yi zang piti naa katɔ ka bii.

Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ɓáà ka nyaa shoko ɓɔɔ zang làáyi, nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri gã̀kɛ́ ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ haarɛ nyaa nɛɛ zang kpang, nɔɔ ti basɛ zɔɔ ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ yì nɔɔ naa ɓi ka bii kpang, ti nwang nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu basɛ teteng zang, shàarɛ̀ wu nyaa doo ziti kɔ nwani. Ka knti weɓe, ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa tɔ̀ɔ́ kagn nɛɛ wu kpang.
Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zɔ̃ng zang keɓe, yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ti yi tĩng ɓi kaa nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, dɔng wu ruu tɔ, nɛɛ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
N nɛ́ɛ shong Aratima kpang, n shong Tikiku ditɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Nɛɛ a tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ pati mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ ka gari Nikopoli. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tɔɔ, laa pũngku keɓe n nwang lɛ̀ɛ́ ka nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yi Apolo nɛɛ Zeena yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi nyaa dannang dɔɔli naa ka bii ri yupaa zanti ɓarɛ daanang. Mɔɔ yi ri naa kagn ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nandon.
Zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ shonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa jong ka bii. Ri nwàng nwannang waati kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Mɔɔ jèe ruu wusang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ nyaa. Laa wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n pàlɛ́ Yeesɔ Kirisi shonang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ Timoti ɓɔɔ nwang kaa naa jaa nàá ɓuru ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing nɛɛ wu gbete ɓɛɛ.
Ruu bee Filimon wusang shonang ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ mɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Ruu bee mɔɔ labeenang keɓe, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kpálɛ̀ yuu ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ kaa maanaa ɓuru Afiya nɛɛ Akipu ɓɔɔ pàlɛ́ Laa doo shonang kɔ naa rukɔ ɓɛɛ.
N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ, nɔɔ tãa tĩnang, nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.
Filimon, n zãa Laa mɛɛ diki diki ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ, n nɛɛ ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ n gaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tãa nyaa danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɛɛ.
N gaa Laa nɛɛ mɔɔ yi tĩng ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa wu ti tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka yeti tɔ̃ɔ piti, ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
Masang, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, shing m̌ tɔ, n tãa tĩnang, ti mã m danggn tɔ gbãng gbãng. Mɔ̀ɔ ti shing tɔ yeti zang Laa valɛ tɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ka wee mɔɔ nwàng kaa naa jaa nàá mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓee, n kɔɔ mɔɔ katɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa mɔɔ katɔ kɔ jong. N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ n m zang nyaa shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, a zang ti mã m ka sãa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu Onesimu ɓɔɔ nwang kaa naa jaa mɛɛ, ka wee zang mã m ka sãa ɓee.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓeleng nwáng naa vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, kãntang keɓe raa zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ.
Wee n dɔ̃ mɔɔ wu ɓee, nwang naa ɓɔɔ n dɔ̃ mɔɔ suru bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ n kasɛ n tɔɔ wu nwang nɛɛ n ka nihn, wu pàlɛ̀ m shonang ka nung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ. Ka wee n nwang ka sãa ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ɓee.

A n kasɛ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ nyaa kagn kpàng, kpang. N kasɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàlɛ́ m, wu nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ nwang naa zang shing mɔɔ nɛɛ gbãng gbãng ning, mɔɔ pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ yáa zɔɔ ka gbongkarɛ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ kɔ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kaa tɔkn dòndòng.

Kãntang keɓe ɓi tɔ̀ɔ́ jaafoo waati kpang, ɓa jaafoo ɓi kaa tɔ. Ɓi kaa manzung ɓuru ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka bii mɛɛ. Nwǎng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ditɔ jong gbãng gbãng, wu naa jaafoo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, naa ɓaazung ka gbalang Kpanti ɓuru.
Mɔɔ nɛ́ɛ zi m nɛɛ, n ɓaa sang ka ruu Kirisi, ta Onesimu naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ tà m ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ dũng wu nyaa kɔ́pɔ́, nkɔ naa shurɛ.
Vuu keɓe n bèe nɛɛ naa mɛɛ. Nkɔ Bulu n shurɛ. Danggn wu ning mɔɔ kpang, n dũng mɔɔ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa Laa, mɔɔ palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ keɓe jong, ka ruu kpanti ɓuru. Shing m yeti mɛɛ wu valɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ manzung ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
N zi tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Mɔɔ ti palɛ ɓa katɔ.
Shĩli m yeti gãa katɔ gbete, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing gn mɔ̀ɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa kàsɛ́ nɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa wu katɔ. Wu a nɔɔ n tɔkn.
Epafara, masang ɓɔɔ zang mã m nɛɛ wu ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, jee mɔɔ nyaa.
Maraku, nɛɛ Arisitaku, nɛɛ Dema, nɛɛ Luka zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shonang nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa jong.
N gaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, wu pálɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
Ka tĩng, Laa rang yee nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru nɛɛ nyaa rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ doo dɔɔli, a ka gbalang naabm naabm.
A ka doo knti keɓe, Laa rang ruu yee ɓi kaa nɛɛ nyaa Jaa ɓiɓɛ. Jaa keɓe, Laa zɔ̃ng wu, nɛɛ vuu piti, wu naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, a Laa mã́a koo nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Jaa keɓe, nɔng yakɛnang bannang Laa kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Rùu ti zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwàng ɓɛɛ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Wukɔ ti yiti koo nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ruu ɓiɓɛ. Ka knti ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ, daa nwàng ka nɔng nwannang ɓiɓɛ ka lapa, ka nakn Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, bannang Jaa Laa ɓa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kati, naa ɓɔɔ nung ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, ti ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ̀ɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ gbete gngn kpang nɛɛ,
“Mɔkɔ Jaa mɛɛ
lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ n tusu tɔ nɛɛ n Daa ɓaaɓɛ”.
Ti kɔ̀ɔ kpang tɔkn nɛɛ
“N nwang daa ɓiɓɛ
a wu nwang ɓi kaa Jaa mɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ tɔkn, ka ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ jamari ɓiɓɛ ka koo, kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka
lapa nandon ri bang wu ta.”
Ka ɓɔɔ Laa rang yee ka yuu rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
“Rìsí rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa
katɔ, ri nwang jasung, a ti rìsí zang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́
wu shonang ri nwang nyɛlɛ waa.”
Ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ, Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“Mɔkɔ Laa, kpanti roonang ɓaaɓɛ
ɓi ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ teetee,
wukɔ nwang laa naa yitinang,
ɓɔɔ mɔɔ roo kpanti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ kasɛ ɓaa nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tĩng Laa,
mɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ shi kpang ɓaa katɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nkɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ n Làá ɓaaɓɛ,
n shing mɔɔ ka yuu rɛɛ sangvaa
ɓaaɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ n nwàa mɔɔ nung, ɓɔɔ
shing mɔɔ mɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ.”
A ti kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Kpanti, mɔkɔ loo doo koo keɓe ka tĩng,
a mɔkɔ ti mãa lapa nɛɛ naa ɓaaɓɛ.
Ri làsɛ́ katɔ nandon, a mɔɔ nwàng ɓaa dòndòng.
Ri kàá katɔ naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ diki ɓiɓɛ bee tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ leng ri katɔ naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ, zang kɔ̃̀sɔ́ ri katɔ naa
ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̃sɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
A mɔɔ nwang ɓaa nɔ́ngkɔ̀ diki diki, a saa ɓaaɓɛ ti waa nyaa ɓi kpang.”
Laa kɔɔ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa gbete gngn kpang nɛɛ,
“Nwang ka nakn mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.
Ń risi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng
nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang, ri nwang laa
ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa doo kagn ɓɛɛ,” kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ Laa shonang ɓɛɛ waati. Laa shong ri, nɛɛ ri yi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu naa ta yuu ɓarɛ naa ka bii.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shing nɔɔ jĩng gbãng gbãng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu tãarɛ ɓɛɛ, vuu keɓe nɛɛ wɔ̀ ruu nɛɛ naa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Naa rúu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kɔɔyi, nwang tɔ nɔngkɔ niizang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà kpang, nɛɛ ti dũ̀ng kpang, zang dang wu jĩng katɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.

A naa ruu shing jĩng gbãng gbãng ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu zang, ɓɔɔ bang katɔ naa weɓe kpang, ruu wɔ biya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ gaayu ruu keɓe kɔɔnang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, rikɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu keɓe niizang kɔ nwani.
Laa ti tusu jong nɛɛ ruu keɓe niizang naa ɓɔɔ ri tusu ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. A ti basɛ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ a zang ka naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa shing wu zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri roo kpanti ka koo ɓɔɔ wu naa mãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Koo kɔ ruu rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee.
A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ, ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ,
“Shɔnzang ɓu viya? A mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ wiya?
A jaa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãng jĩng ka wu ɓɛɛ, ɓu viya?
Mɔɔ shing wu, zang nyaa shonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri ɓa wu, a diki bee kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔɔli kpang. A mɔɔ a wu bannang nɛɛ dɔ̀ɔnang,
a mɔɔ shing vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ.”
Ka wee Laa shing vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓee, Laa yaa vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, kpang. A kãntang keɓe, ruu zi gň mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.

A ruu zirɛ, Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang shíng wu zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri ɓá wu, a diki bee kaa takpang ɓee, zang a wu bannang nɛɛ dɔɔnang ka ruu jĩng ɓɔɔ wu dangnɛ a vɔrɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe piti ɓi ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, shingnɛ Yeesɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ nwang ɓɛɛ ka nung zang piti.

Daa naa katɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ vuu piti nwang ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a wukɔ ti mã̀a vuu piti ɓɛɛ, wu shing Yeesɔ wu nwang nyaa kiiri nɛɛ jĩng ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu atɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ri wàlɛ̀ bannang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ sɔɔ ri tĩng, zang daa ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shing ri, ri nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ piti, Daa ɓarɛ gbete. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu Yeesɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɛɛ kpang.
Kɔɔ Laa tɔɔ,
“N kɔɔ rɛɛ manzung ruu bannang ɓaaɓɛ.
N gáa soo, n dɔ̀ɔ mɔ̀ɔ ka tĩng zang dɔɔli
ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri bang mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
A ti kɔ̀ɔ tɔkn nɛɛ,
“N shing gn ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.”
A kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Wee n ɓee, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a m ri ɓɛɛ.”
Wee wujɛ bìí ri ta bii shɔnzang ɓee, a tuu bii jong nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu vɔrɛ, wu ningsi sheetang kati. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wukɔ naa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
A Yeesɔ yaa zang naa, zang ɓɔɔ ɓu doo ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ ɓɛɛ, ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jaafoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ, vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Niizang, Yeesɔ yi wu rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ, “Yi ɓi rɛɛ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi naa ka bii.”

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu nwang naa rɛɛ ɓeezung kɔ gbãng gbãng ka vuu piti, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kati. Ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng wu katɔ, a ti zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka shonang ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ Laa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, vuu keɓe wu shingnɛ, Laa wu kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati.
A wee Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ dang jĩng tɔ, a zang ti gãsɛ wu tɔ ɓee, zunung ɓɔɔ wu yi zang ɓɔɔ zang gã̀sɛ́ ri kãntang naa katɔ ka bii.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ doo zang Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓáa nɔɔ nyaa tɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang shonang nɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ danggn kɔ ruu shing ɓee.
Yeesɔ nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng wu ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Musa nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka shonang ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ zang Laa nandon ɓɛɛ.
A zang zirɛ, Yeesɔ dàa ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang ɓa ɓɔɔ Musa katɔ, tɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ, bannang ɓɔɔ zang a zang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓa ɓɔɔ gãa ɓɔɔ wu mãayi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Niizang, gãa piti zang ɓɔɔ mãayi kagn, a ɓi kaa Laa kɔ mãa vuu piti.

Musa nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka gãa Laa nandon ka shonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ruu kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa naa kɔɔ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. A wu ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shonang waati.

A Yeesɔ nwáng zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka Gãa Laa nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi Jaa ɓɛɛ. Rukɔ Gãa keɓe, ruu nɛɛ yiti danggn ɓɔɔ ruu mãrɛ gbãng gbãng, nɛɛ gn ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ kɔ, ruu dɔɔ bii nɛɛ mani ɓee ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ,
“Naa nɔɔ tãa yee Laa lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ,
nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ shoo ɓaanang kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang pálɛ́ ka
ɓɔɔ ri lasɛ Laa yeti ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ wu ka jĩngti ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ri gãsɛ m, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ n pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ, saa laa ziti ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang kaɓa. A n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Zang keɓe ri ɓaa shoo ka yee mɛɛ kpang diki diki. A ri dũng nyaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ kpang.’
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa m, a n tũng vuu, n tɔɔ,
‘Ri àrɛ́, ri ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ n kagn kpang dòndòng.’ ”
Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, nɛɛ tá yeti ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang kagn, a ti shing danggn ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ, yeti ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu ràa Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari yuu knti ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn katɔ kɔ jong diki diki, tɔɔ vuu shi kpang wu shing zang ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka teteng manɛ wu taarɛ yuu kpang, ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ doo ningkãari kɔ, zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Lɛɛkɔ” ɓee.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ vuu ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ruu nɛɛ yaa gn ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu, ruu shingnɛ kpang, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ,
“Naa nɔɔ tãa yee ɓiɓɛ lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ
nɔɔ taarɛ yuu manɛ kpang
naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka ɓɔɔ ri lasɛ Laa yeti ɓɛɛ”.
Ɓu rɛɛ wi, ri tãa yee Laa, a ri lasɛ wu yeti wiya? Ɓi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Musa nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ Masara kɔ nandon.
A gnvɔ shàa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ wi, saa laa ziti wiya? Ɓi doo zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri vɔlɔ ka jĩngti ɓɛɛ.
Laa tũng rɛɛ wi vuu nɛɛ ri a nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang ɓiɓɛ kpang wiya? Ɓi doo zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu zirɛ nɛɛ ri daa ɔ̃sɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wee nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ ka yuu daanang ka nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang ɓiɓɛ doo kagn ɓee, ruu palɛ waasɛ̃ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru nɛ̀ɛ́ dàa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang kaɓa kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kɔɔ ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa tɔ jong, naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A rúu ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nwàng ri vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Rùu ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ, rùu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kagn ruu ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ wu. Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“A n tũng vuu ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ gnvɔ shàa m ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
‘Ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang mɛɛ kpang dòndòng.’ ”
A kɔɔ ruu keɓe, bɛ̀ɛ́ hangsɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, doo ka ɓɔɔ wu mã̀a koo ɓɛɛ.
Zang kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ kagn, ka yeti labeenang Laa ka yuu diki manziti nɛɛ,
“A ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa manziti, Laa ɔ̃sɔ ka shonang
ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ nandon.”
Zang kɔ̀ɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang mɛɛ kpang dòndòng.”
A zang yàa kaa zang ɓɔɔ gbalang, nɛɛ ri daa ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ tãa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang, ri daa ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing diki ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ɓɔɔ ɓaayi nɛɛ, “Lɛɛkɔ”. Saa naa ɓa tɔ dɔɔli, Laa naa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu diki keɓe nɛɛ nyaa Dawuda. Ruu ɓɔɔ ruu bee nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
“Naa nɔɔ tãa yee ɓiɓɛ lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ, nɔ́ɔ bɛ̃ɛ shoo ɓaanang kpang.”
Naa Jashuwa nɛ̀ɛ́ daa katɔ, a zang nɛɛ ti daa ka nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa katɔ, Laa nɛɛ rang yee nɛɛ knti ka yuu diki ɓɔɔgn kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Laa ri ɔ̃sɔ ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa manziti ɓɔɔ Laa ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa tɔ, ɔ̃sɔ ɓi tɔ jong ka shonang ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa ɔ̃sɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu hangsɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu daa nɔɔ nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang kaɓa. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru wu ta nyaa Laa naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, a ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ruu Laa palɛ shonang katɔ. Wɔng nyaa ɓa yere bang ɓɔɔ nyaa ziti katɔ. Basɛ suru bii katɔ nɛɛ suru. Wu ti basɛ rɛɛ gboko nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛting kaka. Ti dɔng ruu katɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mang ka yeti ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãayi kagn gbete, ɓɔɔ wayi, Laa zi wu kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu piti ɓi ka dalɛ, zang larɛ ri ɓi katɔ ka jĩng Laa ɓɔɔ ruu naa shii ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Wee kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ɓuru kagn, ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔɔli ɓee. Kpanti keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ daa tɔ ka lapa ɓee. Rúu yiti nɔɔ danggn, ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ, rùu kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ keɓe gbãng gbãng.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ɓuru, gn ɓuru kɔng wu katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. Kpanti ɓuru keɓe ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ wu katɔ ka gbalang náabm̀ náabm̀, naa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. A palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kaa takpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rúu a ka bii Laa, ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ waati ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng wu, wu ti palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii, ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɛɛ wu yi ruu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
Zang zɔ̃́ng kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓu, ka teteng rɛɛ shɔnzang. Ri shing wu nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ Laa shonang ka nung ɓarɛ, wu ti dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati.
Zunung ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang, a ri ning gbalang kati ɓɛɛ, hakaka kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, dɔ̀ɔrɔ́ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang zang dɔɔli.
Shɔnzang a yuu ɓiɓɛ, bannang nwannang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang. Laa ɓáa wu nyaa katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa Haruna nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Kirisi doo nɔngkɔ, wu wukɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ bannang nwannang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ Jaa mɛɛ, lɛ̀ɛ́kɔ n tusu tɔ, nɛɛ n Daa ɓaaɓɛ”
A ti kɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa dòndòng,
naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nwáng ɓɛɛ.”

Ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwáng ka koo keɓe, rangkɛ yee nɛɛ Laa a gaarɛ wu, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ miiri ka jĩng. Gaa Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu vɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. A Laa tãa wu ka ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ti a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Naa wee wu Jaa ɓee, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng nyaa Laa doo nɛɛ mani ka jĩng ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ hangsɛ shonang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nwàng zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang nandon, ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, yuu ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zang tarɛ, wu nwang kaa ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
A Laa shing Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nwáng ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ka yuu vuu keɓe kagn dɔɔli, a kpãa ruu nyaa kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zi kati ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ valɛ bii vuu mantɛnang dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.

Niizang, kãntang keɓe nɔkɔ nɛɛ tusu zang vuu kati, a nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu paasɛ nɔɔ ruu niizang ɓɔɔ kpãa kpang, ɓɔɔ ka Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ tusunang tɔkn. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang wu a nɔɔ míi, wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓi míi, zang keɓe ɓi doo jaa rɛ̃ɛting. Zang keɓe zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ teteng vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kpàng.
Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng bii tɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓarɛ tɔ diki diki, naa ɓɔɔ ri bàsɛ́ teteng vuu tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓa nɔɔ vuu tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɔɔ zang tusu ruu ka yuu Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ruu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ kaa vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zũng danggn kati. Ruu gàa nɔɔ yuu tusunang tɔkn nɛɛ, zang ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, zang yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɔɔ raa zang vɔrɔ, zang ri shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɛɛ vuu tusunang, ka yuu batizima, nɛɛ naa shinnang ka yuu zang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang, ka ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Rùu zi rɛɛ vuu keɓe ɓi tɔ, rúu ɓa ri, ruu daa kaa tĩng. Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ kagn ri zi gbalang Laa tɔ, Laa ti a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang nɛɛ lapa tɔ, a ri ti walɛ Suru Laa tɔ jong,
ri ti tãa tɔ̃ɔ Ruu Laa tɔ, a ri ti zi naa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang koo ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ nwang ɓɛɛ tɔ.

Naa ri yaa gbalang Laa doo nɛɛ mani, naa zang tɔɔ zang sɔ́ɔrɔ̀ ri tɔkn, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, zang zunung takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwang naa ri ɓaa Jaa Laa naa kaa laa tɔkn, a ri shingnɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu, ka jĩng zang piti ɓɛɛ.
Tipi ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii lapa, ɓɔɔ a ka yuu ɓiɓɛ diki diki, a pàlɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, Laa pàlɛ́ tipi keɓe tɔ̃ɔ.

A tipi keɓe naa ɓi kɔkɔ nɛɛ wisi kɔ takɛ kagn shɛ̃ɛning, vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ mani kpang. Zang ku tipi keɓe nyaa katɔ, a zang naa dɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ waa. Laa palɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu alɛ ri rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ri nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓiɓɛ katɔ.
Masang ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, naa ruu ràng yee doo nɔngkɔ, ruu zi tɔ, ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ shìi manɛ ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Laa ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu gn dang gbete kpang, danggn ning wu shonang manɛ kpang. Nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ wu katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yí zang ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii, a nɔɔ ti yi ri doo naa ɓɛɛ.
Rùu kasɛ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ wu shing yuu kagn, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing gn kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
Ruu kasɛ, nɔɔ si rang kpang, nɔɔ màsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shingnɛ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ri mã ɓɛɛ, rikɔ naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Ka ɓɔɔ Laa a Ibirayi nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Laa katɔ kagn kpang, Laa tũng vuu nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Niizang, n shing mɔɔ mɔ́ɔ tãa tĩnang, n a mɔɔ zɔ̃ng dɔɔli.”
A ka knti ɓɔɔ Ibirayi mã danggn, gã tɔ, Laa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu a wu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Shɔnzang ri tũng vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu tũnnang kɔ shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang niizang. Wu shingnɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ zang làá ɓɛɛ wu di nyaa.
Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a keɓe ri zirɛ, nɛɛ wu kɔ̃sɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tũng vuu tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu kati nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa, wu naa palɛ katɔ.

Vuu keɓe ziti, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tũng, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ kpang, a Laa ti suu sèé ka yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu ɓɔɔ rùu yurɛ, ruu walɛ nɔng waanang, zang mã ruu danggn gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ruu yiti gn vuu ɓɔɔ zang shing ruu ka tĩng keɓe gbatagbata.

Gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing keɓe kɔ yiti ruu gbatagbata, vuu ɓɔɔ lee ruu naa ka bii kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu dàa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kagn. Ruu ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa gãa Nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang, nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
