Lootu zang tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa, nwang ka teteng zang shi kpang. Zìlí zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Ti tã̀lɛ́ ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri palɛ, lasɛ wu yeti dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ruu Nuhu nɛɛ Lootu tusu ruu nɛɛ Laa zi gbalang ɓɔɔ wu naa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ, nɛɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ gãsɛ ri ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ, ti tusu nɛɛ Laa zi gbalang ɓɔɔ wu naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang jĩng tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn, wu a nɛɛ mani.

Jĩng dannang keɓe naa a ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ka naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri ti bɛ̃ɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sèé keɓe, ri kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔɔli.
Ri ti kaa vɔrɔ ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka tĩng Laa ka lapa, ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri dãlɛ ri ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ jong.
Dòo zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ri ɓa rɛɛ maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sèé keɓe kaka katɔ nɛɛ bannang, ri dãlɛ ri nɔngkɔ ka tĩng Laa kpang.

Zang keɓe ri rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu naa shoko. Ri palɛ vuu teetee naa yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɛɛ, ri nɛɛ bang tɔ, zang yirɛ zang yee ɓɛɛ. Niizang, ri shàarɛ́ dòo nɔngkɔ, naa yɔpɔ jĩngti, zang tãa nung ɓarɛ takpang.

Laa naa dang ri jĩng jong ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri dang zang jĩng ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa ɓarɛ tĩnang naa doo nɛɛ laagɛ̃ piti. Nwannang ɓarɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, ri shaa vuu shaanang a ɓeekpang ri nwãarɛ nɔɔ manɛ waati. Ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kpang, diki diki jĩng ɓarɛ ɓi ka zang soro ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ, wàázaa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ ri. Ri lee vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓarɛ kpang. Naa ri zi zang ɓɔɔ shii ka gbalang Laa nɛɛ kaka kpang, ri nwãarɛ ri, ri shing ri, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang. Ri shing jĩng ɓarɛ ka vuu zang kɔ diki, diki. Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, Laa dɔng ri ruu ɓarɛ tɔ.
Ri yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa gbalang Balamu jaa Beeyɔ kɔ jong. Ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, Balamu kasɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ tɔɔ zang a wu saka.

A zang mangkɛ wu ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, seesaa ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓi jong kpang, rang wu yee naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rang ɓɛɛ. Seesaa bìí zãa zang nyaa shonang Laa keɓe, vuu shoko ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sèé keɓe, ri nwang ɓarɛ naa too mii ɓɔɔ ɔ̃ɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang naa sãmbong mii ɓɔɔ jasung tantɛ, atɛ mii kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa yaa ri nɔng ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ.

Ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ɓɔɔ waati ka yuu ɓarɛ. Ri ti kasɛ ri nwãarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri yaa vàá zang ɓɔɔ ri zi gbalang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sèé keɓe, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri shing zang, zang ri palɛ zɔ̃ng dũndũng piti nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tĩnang palɛnang doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ri kɔɔrɔ zang kaɓa nɛɛ ri naa yaa ri naa ditɔ, a ɓeekpang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee keɓe, ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa vuu ɓɔɔ yiti zang, zang zunung yaanang kpang, zang nwang ɓi kaa jaafoo vuu bìí.

Naa zang ri zi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru, a wukɔ ti ta yuu ɓuru, a ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang ri nwang zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ naa ràa jĩng tɔkn, ri gaayu rɛɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe palɛnang nɛɛ knti, nwannang ɓarɛ naa lasɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kaa tɔ.
Ri nɛ̀ɛ́ zi gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang gbã̀ágbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ, ri naa yaa nyaa dannang Laa tɔkn ri dũng takpang ɓɛɛ.

Vuu kɔ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe ri palɛ ɓee, daa teetee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ zang ɓuru ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ, “Zaa gbã̀ayu daa sháa jennang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ gãnya ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ wu bii katɔ, gbãayu ɓi tɔ, daa gbãa bii ɓi kana ɔ̃ti tɔkn.”

Masang, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n bèé nɔɔ labeenang daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe doo ziti. Ka yeti labeenang ziti keɓe, n kpàa nɔɔ danggn rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu keɓe.

N kasɛ nɛɛ danggn ruu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ri kɔɔ ka tĩng doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Danggn nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru kɔɔ zang shonang, ɓɔɔ wu shongko ri ka bii manɛ, nɛɛ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu ti ning nɔɔ kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi shɔɔnang keɓe. N kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa kaa tɔ, zang ɓɔɔgn ri nwangkɛ nyaa, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, ri naa kpaa nɔɔ katɔ.

Ri naa kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ zang nɛɛ wu gbãayu katɔ niizang, a wu kaa kiya? Dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ta Ruu Laa, ri vɔlɔ tɔ, vuu piti ɓi doo naa ɓeleng. Ɓu dòo ɓɔɔ koo gaayu katɔ dòo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ bii gn kpang.”
Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ naa weɓe kaɓa, ri kasɛ kpang, nɛɛ ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ Laa rang yee waati, a lapa nɛɛ tipi nwangsɛ bii kpang. Nwangsɛ tipi nɛɛ yeti mii, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, palɛ tipi ɓi kaa nɛɛ mii.
Laa ningsi koo ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang doo nɛɛ mii kɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ mii bang kpayi shaa koo nandon ɓɛɛ.

A yee ɓɔɔ Laa rangnɛ kɔ shingnɛ, lapa nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, wu nwangnɛ, wu gã diki ɓɔɔ waa naa lasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nandon ɓɛɛ. Yaa vuu piti ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔng zang piti ruu, wu ti ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, a ri dũng wu kpang ɓɛɛ.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ gbete keɓe kpang. Ka jĩng Laa, diki gbete ɓi naa saa labang gbete. A saa labang gbete, ɓi naa diki gbete. Ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ ri ɓarɛ gbete.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa sùu zang kãng dɔɔli, pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang, Laa mã ɓi danggn kɔ jong nɛɛ nɔɔ. Laa yaa zang ɓi gbalang nɛɛ, wu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu shaarɛ kpang, kasɛ nɛɛ zang piti ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Naa dòo nɔngkɔ piti, diki nɛɛ a tɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi naa gbãayu naa shɔngɓɔ ka diki kaɓa, zang ri naa tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, a lapa wu ning kati. Waa wu shaa vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ koo kati nandon. Tipi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ piti naa ning katɔ nandon.
Wee nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, vuu piti naa yaalɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, nɔɔ nwang nwannang manɛ waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ a Laa yuu manɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ dũng wu ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ shing jĩng manɛ ka diki Laa, nɔ́ɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ diki kaɓa naa a pati ɓɛɛ. Diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ waa shaa lapa kagn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ning kati ɓɛɛ. A waa wu ti yaalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nandon ɓɛɛ.
Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ wu naa mãa lapa shɔɔ nɛɛ koo shɔɔ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu piti naa nwang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gã ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ka wee nɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ a tɔkn ɓee, nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ, nɔ́ɔ nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Nɔɔ nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ wu.
Nɔɔ zirɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi suukãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ walɛ gbalang Laa wu ta yuu manɛ kati ɓɛɛ.
Manzung ɓuru Bulu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, bee nɔɔ labeenang dòo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ nɔɔ doo naa weɓe kɔ.

Ka yeti rɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ wu beere nandon, kɔɔrɔ zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe kɔ. Ka rɛɛ labeenang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ruu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ kpãa nyaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng kpang, ɓɔɔ ri yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kagn gbãng gbãng kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri risi ruu keɓe naa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ ri risi ruu nimbang ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Wee ri palɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, ri shíng ɓarɛ nɛɛ Laa wu naa ningsi ri katɔ.

Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ manɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe manɛ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ gãng jĩng waasɛ̃. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa Laa kpang, ri nɛ̀ɛ́ shing nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓee. Rí nɛɛ ti wàlɛ́ gbalang ri shing nɔɔ, nɔ́ɔ yaa nɔng tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nɔɔ shii kagn ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ dũng manɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ jong, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kaa yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ. Zinang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi wu, wu ti daa ka tĩng. Zang ri a wukɔ bannang dòndòng. Nɔngkɔ.

Ruu bèé nɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ nwang ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ, a ruu ti zi wu nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru. Ruu pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a ruu ti lee wu nɛɛ naa ɓuru.
Ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ wu yuu, ruu zi wu, a ruu ti kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jĩng ɓuru. Ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nwáng nɛɛ Daa ka tĩng, a Daa naa nwàngsɛ̀ ruu wu kati.
Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ, ruu ti tãayi, ruu kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ wukɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ nwang kaa jong nɛɛ ruu ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu nwàng ɓuru ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
Ruu bèé nɔɔ ruu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, tĩnang tãanang ɓuru wu ɓee nyaa kati.
Yee ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ wukɔ. Laa kɔ nɔng yakɛnang, Ruu ɓiɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
Naa ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu nwàng nɛɛ wu ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ruu ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii kpang, ruu suu sèé, ruu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ruu nɛɛ nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ naa wukɔ, ruu nwang katɔ nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zĩi Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ sɔɔ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru katɔ nandon.
Naa ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, vuu shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓuru kpang, ruu nwãarɛ yuu ɓuru. Rúu niizang kagn yeti ɓuru kpang.

Ruu nɛɛ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ nɛɛ, ruu pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang tɔ, Laa ta nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓi kpang, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kpang, yàá ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓee katɔ. Wu ti sɔɔ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru nandon.
Naa ruu laa nyaa nɛɛ, ruu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓuru gngn kpang, ruu ɓaa kaa Laa kɔ sèé jong. Rúu ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti ɓuru kpang.

Wujɛ mɛɛ, n bèé nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ pàlɛ́ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, wu zirɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ rang ruu yee nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa kagn. Wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Laa yàa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru ka ruu vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ. Vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ka ruu vuu shi kpang zang koo piti.
Naa ruu ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ruu zi wu tɔ.
Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zi wu tɔ,” a ti shing jĩng ka nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi zang sèé. Ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, kasɛ Laa katɔ niizang. Wee naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zi kagn nɛɛ wu zang Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu zang Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang dòo naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwáng ɓɛɛ kɔ.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔ n bèé nɔɔ ɓee, wu ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Ɓi dòo ɓɔɔ gbaala ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu Ruu Laa tãanang ɓɛɛ.

Nyaa dannang kɔ n bèé nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi kaa shɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nwannang Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ tùsù ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓi niizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔng tɔɔnang koo keɓe ɓa kana, kaa nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ niizang yakɛ nɔng.
Zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu ka nɔng yakɛnang, a kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi dòo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung katɔ, nwàng ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpàng, nwàng ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ra ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ wu jĩng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wujɛ mɛɛ, n bèé nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ tɔ, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi.

N bèé nɔɔ ruu keɓe ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dáa wujɛ (nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn dòo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ) ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nwáng dòo ka tĩng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nwáng nɛɛ Laa, bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Jasang, n bèé nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wujɛ mɛɛ, n bèé nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Daa ɓuru Laa tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Daa wujɛ, n bèé nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nwáng ka tĩng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nwáng nɛɛ Laa, bɛ̀ɛ́ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Jasang, n bèé nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yee Laa nwàng ka yeti manɛ kɔ, a nɔɔ ti ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ.
Nɔɔ kasɛ koolaa keɓe kpang. Nɔɔ ti kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu koolaa keɓe piti, kasɛ Daa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.

Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon naa rɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang ti kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ jĩng gbakɛnang ɓɔɔ zang gbakɛ ka ruu vuu naa zang ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nandon ɓi ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru Laa kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe.
Diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa, waa nyaa ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti Laa kasɛ, wukɔ nwang ɓi gbinggbing.

Wujɛ mɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa a naabm tɔ. Nɔɔ tãayi nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang a ditɔ, kãntang keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang, ri nwangsɛ yuu tɔ dɔɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa gn keɓe kɔ.

Ri nwáng nɛɛ teteng ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀ɛ́ ri ɓarɛ zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ niizang kpang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Naa ri nɛɛ zang ɓuru, ri nɛɛ nwàng dòo nɛɛ ruu. Daanang ɓarɛ kɔ tusu zang nɛɛ, zang ɓuru kagn teteng ɓarɛ gbete kpang.
Kirisi a nɔɔ Suru Laa manɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang manɛ tɔ nandon.
N bèé nɔɔ wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N bèé nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ, ruu sèé hãa naa ɓi kagn nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang kpang.
Ɓu wi, zang sèé wiya? Zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ, kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, wukɔ ti laa nyaa Jaa Laa, nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ Laa nandon.
Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa, Daa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Jaa, Daa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ doori.
Nɔɔ yaa yee Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu yee Laa tanang wu nwang ka yeti manɛ. Ruu Laa keɓe nɛɛ nwang tɔ ka yeti manɛ, nɔɔ nwang ditɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ Laa.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa a ruu, wukɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
N bèé nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri kongso nɛɛ ri nwãarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ bii manɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ kagn yeti manɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀ɔ́ zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ nɛɛ, wu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa keɓe tusu, ɓi ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ, ɓi ɓɔɔ sèé kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Kirisi ka nyaa zɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Wujɛ seseere, nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nyaa tɔ, ruu naa kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ ti naa tuu ruu ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu ɓɛɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ zi katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Daa kasɛ ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ ruu ɓuru dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa ruu nɛɛ Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ. Ruu ti wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ niizang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ri zi ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi Laa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu kaa wujɛ Laa. Naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa nwangnɛ, ruu zi gn kpang. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa Yeesɔ nwang nyaa, ruu naa nwang kaa naa wukɔ doori. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu naa zi wu ka naa ɓɔɔ wu nwang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shing gn nɛɛ wu naa nwang naa Kirisi, a ti shing gn nɛɛ vuu keɓe naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ, wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwàng ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓanang, zang ɓaa wukɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ arɛ nɛɛ wu naa kɔ̃̀sɔ́ zang vuu shi kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ nwàng nɛɛ Kirisi a ti dũng ruu ɓiɓɛ, huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, zi wu nung kpang, ti zi wu gn nɛɛ jĩng kpang.
Wujɛ mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wu nwãarɛ nɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang sasak, ɓi jaa Sheetang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang ɓi doo ka tĩng ɓɛɛ. Jaa Laa arɛ nɛɛ wu naa jili vuu ɓɔɔ Sheetang pálɛ́ kɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jaa Laa piti, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi sasak kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓɔɔ Laa tarɛ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓi jong kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi kaa jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ɓi zang Laa kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi doo zang Laa kpang kɔ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ ri wujɛ Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri wujɛ sheetang kagn kɔ.
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka tĩng shɔɔnang kɔ, nɛɛ ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.
Rúu nwàng naa Kayinu kpang. Kayinu zang Sheetang ɓɔɔ nyɔ jaa niiɓɛ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyɔ jaa niiɓɛ vɔrɔ ɓu ka ruu viya? Nyɔ wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang, a ɓɔɔ ɓeezung ɓi kaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
Manzung, zang ɓɔɔ koo keɓe nɛɛ kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, nɔɔ mã naa ka danggn kpang.
Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ ruu ɓuru tɔ̀ɔ́ ka naa vɔrɔ kpang. Ruu ɓuru kaa zang ningkãari, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi dòo ka naa vɔrɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓi kagn bii zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
Yeesɔ Kirisi tusu ruu, rúu zang kasɛnang ka ɓɔɔ wu mãlɛ́ bii ɓiɓɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu mãlɛ́ bii ɓuru ta jong ka ruu manzung ɓuru.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔɔli, zi ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dang jĩng, a raa wu yuu knti, ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a shɔnzang, kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ ya?
Wujɛ mɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ zang, wu nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang. Zang kasɛnang ɓuru wu nwang ɓɔɔ niizang, ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ ning.
Ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ, ruu ɓuru kaa zang Laa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Rùu kaa vɔrɔ shiinang ka tĩng Laa kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang, Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru katɔ, zi vuu piti ɓi tɔ.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, naa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru tusu ruu nɛɛ, ruu pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, kpàng, rùu kaa vɔrɔ ka tĩng Laa kpang.
Laa a ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa ka naa ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa dang nyaa tɔ nɛɛ ruu shing danggn ka bii Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɛɛ ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu dang ruu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ wukɔ nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa. Laa ti nwàng nɛɛ wu. Ruu zirɛ nɛɛ Laa nwàng nɛɛ ruu, ka suru bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.

Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shing gn ka zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Suru Laa kagn bii ɓarɛ kpang. Nɔɔ gãsɛ ri katɔ, nɔɔ zi suru ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shonang Laa, ri nwangsɛ bii tɔ ka koolaa dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Wee naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi suru Laa ɓɛɛ. Suru ɓɔɔ kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Kirisi a ka koolaa keɓe, tuu bii shɔnzang ɓɛɛ, suru kaɓa kɔ Suru Laa.
Suru ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ tuu bii shɔnzang kpang, ɓi Suru Laa kpang. Suru keɓe a ɓi nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ a ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang kaɓa a tɔ ka koo kãntang keɓe.
Wujɛ mɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa. Nɔɔ ɓa ri yuu manɛ tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti manɛ, ɓa suru Sheetang ɓɔɔ ka yeti zang ɓɔɔ ka koolaa keɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ri ɓarɛ zang koo keɓe, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri rang yee naa zang koolaa keɓe. Zang koo keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo katɔ ka nyaa ɓarɛ.
Ruu ɓuru zang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa katɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ɓi katɔ nyaa ɓuru. Zang ɓɔɔ zang Laa kpang, ti ɓaa shoo ɓi ka nyaa ɓuru kpang. Ruu zi suru ɓɔɔ niizang, nɛɛ suru ɓɔɔ sèé nung naa weɓe kɔ.
Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ruu zɔɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kasɛnang a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang, ɓi zang Laa kɔ, ti zi Laa ɓi katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang kpang, zi Laa ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, palɛ ɓi ka ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Laa tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓuru ka Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shong ka koolaa ɓɛɛ. Laa shong wu nɛɛ tɔɔ ruu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ.

Zang kasɛnang nwàng ɓi hn. Wu rukɔ gaayu Laa kasɛnang kpang, Laa kɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru jong, a shong Jaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang kaa naa vuu vàa ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru kati ɓɛɛ.
Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, Laa nɛɛ kasɛ ruu ɓuru naa weɓe, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ruu zɔɔ ta jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa gngn nɛɛ jĩng kpang. Ruu nɛɛ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ, Laa kagn yeti ɓuru. Ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa ti kagn yeti ɓuru niizang.
Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ruu, wukɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ, ruu nwang nɛɛ Laa, a Laa ti ka yeti ɓuru.
Ruu zi ka wukɔ a ruu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ Daa shong Jaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu naa ta yuu zang koo keɓe.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi Jaa Laa, Laa nwang kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ, a ti nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa.

Ruu zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu tɔ ka yeti ɓuru, a ruu ti shing gn ka ruu zang kasɛnang ɓiɓɛ keɓe katɔ. Kasɛ ruu zang ɓi katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang katɔ sasak, nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa, a Laa ti nwàng ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ.

Ruu nɛɛ nwàng naa weɓe, rúu zang kasɛnang Laa kagn yeti ɓuru niizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu naa kaa vɔrɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo keɓe ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe nwàng naa nwannang Kirisi.

Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ zang katɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ niizang nwangsɛ vɔrɔ kaanang ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi tɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Laa naa dang wu jĩng ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ rúu zang kasɛnang Laa kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ, kaa vɔrɔ ɓi kpang.
Ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu kasɛ Ruu Laa katɔ, a kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi zang sèé. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung ɓɔɔ wu zi katɔ kpang, kàsɛ́ Laa ɓɔɔ wu zi nɛɛ jĩng kpang, ɓi kaa biya?
Kirisi dang ruu nyaa tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ Ruu Laa, wu ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung jong.
Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ wukɔ Kirisi ɓi jaa Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ Daa jaa, kàsɛ́ jaa ɓi dòo katɔ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kasɛ Laa katɔ, a ruu nɛɛ ti dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ, ruu kasɛ wujɛ Laa katɔ.
Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ Ruu Laa katɔ niizang, dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpãa dũnnang ɓi kpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zang Laa, Laa a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ka koo keɓe tɔ ɓɛɛ. Danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa wukɔ á ruu naa, ruu ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
Ɓu wi ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ka koo keɓe yuu wiya? Zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ Yeesɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ziti ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi zang ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi ka diki ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu batizima nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ zĩi ɓiɓɛ tɛ̃ɛ ka laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Wu batizima kɔ tusu ruu gbete kpang. Zĩi ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ tusu ɓɔɔ ri. Suru Laa ti tusu ruu nɛɛ nɔngkɔ niizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa, tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu taati tùsú ruu rúu keɓe.
Suru Laa, nɛɛ batizima ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu, nɛɛ zĩi ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Vuu taati keɓe, nyaa ɓarɛ ti daa gbete.
Ruu nɛɛ ta vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ niizang, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓa ɓɔɔ zang katɔ. Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Jaa Laa, zi katɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu keɓe ɓi niizang. Zang ɓɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ kpang, ɓaa Laa sèé tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ keɓe kɔ. Laa a ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang keɓe, ruu wálɛ̀ ka bii Jaa ɓiɓɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ta Jaa Laa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta Jaa Laa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ, n bée nɔɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi kati, nɛɛ nɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang manɛ tɔ.
Ruu shing danggn ka Laa gaanang ɓɔɔ ruu gaayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ruu gàa vuu ka gbalang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, a ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ruu nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ, Laa tãa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa wu katɔ, ruu zi katɔ nɛɛ ruu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gàa wu ɓɛɛ tɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ doori, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang, wu gàa ɓeezung keɓe Laa, wu a wu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kagn, n kɔɔ nɛɛ zang wu gàa Laa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɔɔ daa bii kpang, zang ɓaa wukɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang.
Ruu zì tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa yirɛ, huu shoo ɓi nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Laa yiti wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Sheetang pálɛ̀ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
Ruu zi tɔ, ruu ɓuru wujɛ Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ri ɓarɛ ka naa Sheetang.

Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, Jaa Laa arɛ tùsù ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu zi Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Laa keɓe kɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi keɓe wukɔ Laa niizang, wukɔ ti suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Wujɛ mɛɛ, nɔɔ bang vaka kpang. Nɔɔ ti dàa nɔng ɓiɓɛ kpang.

Jaa soro ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃̀ng katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ zang bang, nkɔ bèé nɔɔ labeenang keɓe. Wu nkɔ kasɛ ruu manɛ gbete kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi ruu niizang katɔ, ri kasɛ nɔɔ dòo katɔ kɔ.
Ka ruu ruu niizang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ti nwàng kaa nɛɛ ruu gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
Daa Kpanti Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi jaa Daa, rí pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ jong. Gn ɓuru wu kɔng ri katɔ, ri ti a ruu nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ ruu dũng ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ niizang, a ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ n zi wujɛ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔgn, ri dũng ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru dang ruu nyaa, n tãa tĩnang dɔɔli.
N gàá mɔɔ katɔ jaa soro, n bèé mɔɔ wu nyaa shɔɔ kpang, ɓi doo ɓɔɔ gbaala ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu Ruu Laa tanang ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.
Naa ruu dũ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ sasak, zang zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ruu kasɛ Laa katɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu tãa tĩng shɔɔnang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwãarɛ zang, ri baa koolaa tɔ dɔɔli. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ a ka koo keɓe, tuu ɓi bii shɔnzang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang naa weɓe, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ zang ɓɛɛ, wukɔ ti zang ɓɔɔ shing jĩng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
Nɔɔ gãng jĩng kagn, nɔɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ loo vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ́ shonang ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa wu naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing nɔɔ katɔ nyaa kiiri.
Zang ɓɔɔ dũ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ Kirisi tusu kpang, palɛ ɓi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu, Laa kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Jaa piti.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ alɛ ka bii manɛ, a à nɛɛ vuu kpɛ̃ɛrɛnang keɓe kɔ kpang, nɔ́ɔ ta wu ka gãa manɛ kpang. Nɔ́ɔ ti jee wu nyaa kpang tingkiring.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jeere wu nyaa, kasɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa palɛ ɓi doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ka gn dɔɔli, a n bèe nɔɔ kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ n naa leng nɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa mɛɛ, jĩng ɓuru wu zi zɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ tĩnang tàanang ɓuru wu nwang kaa nyaa kiriri.
Wujɛ jaa nàáɓɛ ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ri katɔ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa.
Masang Gaayu, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ niizang ɓɛɛ, nkɔ zang bang, n bèé mɔɔ labeenang keɓe.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa Laa nɛɛ, mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃. Bii ɓaaɓɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi tɔ, mɔɔ nwang ɓaa tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
N tãa tĩnang dɔɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, ri naa kɔɔ m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yiti Ruu Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, a mɔɔ ti palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ Ruu Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
Tĩnang ɓɔɔ n tã̀á kagn ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔɔ m nɛɛ, wujɛ mɛɛ dũng ruu ɓɔɔ niizang, kagn kpang.
Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, vuu kɔ mɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ri nung katɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ri nung kpang, mɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.

Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yì ri naa ka bii kaɓa, ri arɛ, ri naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Pálɛ́ nɔngkɔ, a ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri yiti naa zanti ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
Ri nwang zanti ka ruu shonang Yeesɔ palɛnang. Ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu zang Laa, ruu yi nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shonang tɔ̃ɔ naa weɓe, naa ka bii ning. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa gbete nɛɛ ri ka shonang ruu ɓɔɔ niizang palɛnang.
N bèe nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa labeenang ɓɔɔ kagn, a Diyotirifi ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wukɔ bang, kasɛ nɛɛ wu ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa nwangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔrɔ́ ka yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ sèé ɓɔɔ suuru ka yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ti palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ kagn tɔkn. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa arɛ, tà ri kpang. Ti zãa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ zang kaɓa tanang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Wu ti nwángsɛ́ zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti kaɓa nɛɛ teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.

Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, mɔ́ɔ màsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Màsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri pálɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, wukɔ zang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ pálɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, zi Laa nung ɓi gn kpang.
Zang piti ri kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Dimitiriyu. Vuu ɓɔɔ Dimitiriyu pálɛ̀, wukɔ tusu zang nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ niizang. Ruu ti kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Mɔɔ ti zi tɔ, nɛɛ n suu sèé kpang.
Vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ n bèé mɔɔ dɔɔli, n bèe mɔɔ takpang,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ anang katɔ bii manɛ pati ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu naa kɔ̀ɔ zɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa.
Laa wu a nɔɔ nwannang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ. Rɛɛ masang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka nihn, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Jèe m rɛɛ masang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ mɔɔ nyaa jong gbete gbete.
Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Yahuza, zang shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ ti jaa nàá Yakub ɓɛɛ.
N bèé zang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa, kasɛ ri katɔ, a Yeesɔ Kirisi ti gãng jĩng ka ri ɓɛɛ.
N gaa Laa, gn manɛ wu kɔng wu, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ, wu ti kasɛ ruu manɛ, gbãng gbãng.

Masang, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔɔli ɓɛɛ, bɛ̀ɛ́ n wàá doo diki ɓɔɔ n bèé nɔɔ labeenang ka ruu yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ta ɓɛɛ. A vuu ɓɔɔ shing m kãntang keɓe n bèé nɔɔ labeenang, n kasɛ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shii nɛɛ bang, ka ruu danggn shinnang kɔ Laa a zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓee.

Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ kagn ri hãa tɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ nwĩiri, ruu zi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa ɓuru pàlɛ́ zang, nwang ri ɓarɛ kaa naa zang yaa ri gbalang dũndũng palɛnang, a ri bɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete, Kpanti nɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓi tɔ ka yuu ruu kɔ zang dɔ̀ng ri ɓee.

Ruu kɔ n tɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ́ nɔɔ ɓee, nɔɔ zi tɔ. N tɔɔ n kpaa nɔɔ m danggn kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu zang Isirela nɛɛ tipi Masara ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ knti naa ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.

Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri nwáng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa a ri naa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, ri yáa nɔng nwannang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang mã ri doo nɛɛ soo saka ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ kɔngkɔng ka tipi dii, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa shing ri, gã diki bang kaɓa ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔ̌ng ri ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.

Danggn gari Sɔɔdom nɛɛ Gomora nɛɛ rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ri naabm ɓɛɛ, wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Ri pálɛ́ dũndũng ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng. Laa dang ri jĩng, ningsi ri nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang dòndòng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ zang piti ri zi kaa gn.
Zang kɔ n rang yee ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓee, doo nɔngkɔ. Ri rɔ̃kɔ rɔ̃kɔnang ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri pàlɛ́ bii ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang. Ri tá nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a ri ti dãlɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
Naa dòo Maakel ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri laa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ Sheetang ka yuu vɔrɔ Musa, dãa Sheetang kpang. Kɔɔ wu katɔ waati nɛɛ “Laa wu dang mɔɔ jĩng.”

A zang keɓe ri dãlɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri zi dĩiri ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ri zi katɔ, a ri zi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ ka rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ri tãa ɓarɛ nɛɛ bii naa ɓɔɔ yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓi kpang tãa ɓɛɛ. Ti vuu keɓe kɔ ningsi ri.

Jĩng dannang kagn yuu ɓarɛ. Ri sɔ̀ɔ gbalang Kayinu. Ka ruu saka ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ri pálɛ́ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Balamu pálɛ́ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ri taarɛ yuu naa Koora, a zang ti ningsi ri naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa vuu rĩiti, ka teteng manɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri lasɛ nɔɔ nɔng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ri kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri gãng jĩng ɓarɛ ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ri ɓarɛ naa sãmbong ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang, jasung rãayi ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ naa laa ɓɔɔ ra jaa kpang, naa doo nɛɛ guusi ɓɛɛ. Ri nwàng naa laa ɓɔɔ zang ru katɔ nɛɛ dĩiri, a vɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.

Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa mii waapo ɓɔɔ rãa dɔɔli, a vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tusu bii ɓi kaa naa puru ɓɔɔ pu ka yuu mii waapo ɓɛɛ. Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa sang ɓɔɔ jĩli ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Laa shìng ri nɔng tɔ dòndòng, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ.
Ɛnɔk, zɔ̃ng Adamu ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti ɓɛɛ, kɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Kpanti Laa naa a ditɔ nɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ labang gaagaa.

Wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang nandon ruu, wu dɔ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ ruu, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ka gbalang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũ̀ng Laa kpang keɓe ri kɔɔrɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ.”

Zang keɓe ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ yee diki diki, a ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔ, wu palɛ vuu. Ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ, ri nyɔ zang nɛɛ nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ vuu.
Rɛɛ masang, danggn vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tĩng, wu ning nɔɔ kpang.
Ri kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, “Diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn nɛɛ a tɔ, zang ri naa nwang nyaa, ri naa kpaa nɔɔ, ri naa dũng ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zi Laa kpang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
Wee zang ɓɔɔ ri shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tãa nɛɛ bii ɓɛɛ, a Suru Laa ɓi kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii ɓarɛ kpang.
Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ daa manɛ nɛɛ tĩng kɔ jong ka danggn kɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓee. Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ gaa Laa.
Nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ ka kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, wu a ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ nɛɛ vãarɛ ditɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ.
Nɔɔ zɔ̃ng ri nɛɛ yeti waa, nɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ. Gn zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang ning. Naa dòo fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ katɔ.
Zang wu a Laa bannang. Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti nɔɔ, nɔɔ yaa gbalang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu atɛ nɔɔ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, shi kpang kagn ka bii manɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti tãa tĩnang ɓɛɛ.

Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti, wukɔ ti gbete, wukɔ tá yuu ɓuru nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Bannang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ dòo ka sáa ɓɔɔ tɛɛrɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ kãntang keɓe, ti nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ gbinggbing. Nɔngkɔ.

Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangsɛ zang, ɓɔɔ Laa á wu nɛɛ wu tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ́ Laa shonang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ diki bee takpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ shong zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka bii zang shonang ɓiɓɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tusu wu rɛɛ vuu keɓe.
Yɔhana ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu zili ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ bée vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangsɛ wu ɓɛɛ.

Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã ruu kɔ Laa nwángsɛ̀ ɓee. Tĩnang tãanang ɓi ti ɓɔɔ zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri tã̀a ruu keɓe, a ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee kagn ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, làa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, nkɔ Yɔhana n bèé nɔɔ zang Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa manziti ɓɔɔ ka tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ. Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari kãntang keɓe, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ɓi ningkãari, ka ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mãa koo gn kpang, ɓɔɔ ti naa gbãayu ditɔ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ suru Laa manziti ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yuu laa kpanti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.

Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang diki diki ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wukɔ paa shɔɔnang nɛɛ sàa, a wukɔ ti nwang kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu katɔ, a vɔ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zĩi ɓiɓɛ wu ta ruu kaa nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
A shing ruu, rúu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔrɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ ɓi kpanti ɓuru, a Laa ti Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Bannang nɛɛ kpanti roonang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ dòndòng. Nɔngkɔ.

Nɔɔ zirɛ, náa a ka yeti sãmbong, zang piti ri naa zi wu jĩng ka bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shu wu nɛɛ shalang, ri ti naa zi wu jong. Zang tipi koolaa keɓe nandon, ri naa káa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Vuu keɓe naa nwáng ditɔ nɔngkɔ niizang. Nɔngkɔ.

Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nkɔ ka tĩng shɔɔnang, nkɔ ti waa nyaa knti.” N nwàng ningkãari kãntang keɓe, n ti nwang ningkãari bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mãa koo gn kpang, n ti naa a ditɔ ka koo tɔkn. Nkɔ kpanti ka yuu vuu piti.

Nkɔ Yɔhana manzung manɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã danggn nɛɛ zɔɔ ka jĩng ɓɔɔ ruu dangnɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Zang shing m ka tipi ɓɔɔ mii kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Patimu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ zang Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ ɓi niizang ɓɛɛ.
Ka nɔng kaɓa, ka lee Laadi, Suru Laa a ka bii mɛɛ, a n nwang kaa naa n rɔ̃kɔ katɔ. N tãa yee zang mɛɛ nyaa ka knti mɛɛ nabm naa gboo.

Kɔ̀ɔ́ m nɛɛ, “Tuu labeenang mɔɔ bée vuu kɔ mɔɔ zili ɓee, mɔ́ɔ shòng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Gãa Laa manziti kaɓa. Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Afisa nɛɛ gari Simina nɛɛ gari Pagamu, nɛɛ gari Tayatira nɛɛ gari Sadisu, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gari Filadifiya a ɓɔɔ gari Lawodikiya ɓɛɛ.”
A n raa jĩng, n tɔɔ, n zi zang ɓɔɔ rang m yee ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n raa jĩng, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang shĩili waa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ manziti.
Ka teteng rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shĩili waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn kaɓa, n zi zang shiiyi, “nwàng kaa jaa nwang shɔnzang”. Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ beebang, à wu ka jĩng doo, a mã vuu ɓɔɔ zang ti nɛɛ zinariya ka danggn.
Suuyuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ puru shãa shãa naa ruutu, puru shãa shãa naa zũng mii takong ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ sino ɓɛɛ. Jĩng ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng naa nyɛlɛ waa.
Doo ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ naa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ tagula, ɓɔɔ zang mɔlɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ waa ɓɛɛ, a yee ɓiɓɛ naa mii zɛ̃ɛ ka rang kɔpɔ.
Yiti sang manziti ka nakn ɓiɓɛ. Yere bang ɓɔɔ nyaa ziti nwáng nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Waa nyaa tĩng ɓiɓɛ, yakɛ naa laa yakɛ nɔng, bɛ̀ɛ́ kaa dãngdãng yuu.
Ɓɔɔ n zi wu, n watɛ ka tĩng ɓiɓɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A arɛ shing nakn ɓiɓɛ ka bii mɛɛ, a kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, Nkɔ zang tĩng shɔɔnang, nkɔ ti gɔɔ zang nyaa.
Nkɔ ti zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Bɛ̀ɛ́ n vɔ katɔ, a kãntang keɓe, n kaa ningkãari dòndòng. Saka ɓɔɔ zang puu nyaa gãa zang ɓɔɔ daa nɔng vɔrɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ koo rɛɛ suru, ka naa mɛɛ kɔ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, bée vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zili ɓɛɛ ta, vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ kãntang keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.

Zirɛ, rɛɛ sang manziti kɔ n yiti ka naa ɓee, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang shĩili waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ri nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. N kaaɓi n nwangsɛ mɔɔ dĩiri rɛɛ vuu keɓe. Rɛɛ sang manziti keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri gãng jĩng, ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa manziti kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang shĩili waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn kaɓa, ɓi kaa rɛɛ Gãa Laa bìí, nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ.”
A zang ɓɔɔ n zi wu kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Afisa ruu keɓe. Mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ:
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiti sang manziti ka nakn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ rakɛ ka teteng rɛɛ vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya zang shĩili waa zàáng sɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.

N zi shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ̀ ɓɛɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ shonang nɛɛ kaka manɛ, a nɔɔ ti mã danggn ɓɛɛ. N ti zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri nwàng ka teteng manɛ kpang tɔ. Nɔɔ ti gãsɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ naa ri zang shonang Yeesɔ tɔ, a nɔɔ ti ĩiyi, ri suu ɓarɛ sèé waati.
N zi tɔ nɔɔ mã danggn tɔ, nɔɔ dang jĩng tɔ dɔɔli, ka ruu nung mɛɛ, a nɔɔ ti yaa gn naa kpang.
A vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ̀ keɓe, nɔɔ kasɛ m tɔ̀ɔ́ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ m tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ka tĩng ɓɛɛ ta, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ́ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ palɛnang tɔkn. Naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ keɓe kpang, n a ditɔ ka bii manɛ. N naa tuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shĩili waa zàáng sɔɔ manɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, n daa nɛɛ mani.
A vuu kagn gbete ɓɔɔ n dɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang Nikola ri palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ n bɛ̃ɛ dòo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu kɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓee. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, n naa yaa wukɔ, wu shaa jĩng laa ɓɔɔ ra ka laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ ta ka yeti jaa ɓɔɔ Laa shĩili ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Simina ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ ka tĩng shɔɔnang wukɔ ti waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, a yupaa tɔkn ningkãari ɓɛɛ.

N zi jĩng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang ɓɛɛ tɔ. N ti zi tɔ, nɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang. A niizang nɔɔ wu vuu ka naa kpang, kpang, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ ying. N ti zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ naa ri zang Yahudi, ri rangkɛ ruu shi kpang ka yuu manɛ tɔ. Ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sheetang ɓɛɛ.

Nɔ́ɔ kaa vɔrɔ jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng nɔɔ dǎng kaa tɔ kaɓa kpang. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, Sheetang naa gãsɛ nɔɔ ditɔ, naa shingnɛ zang wu mã zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ka sãa. Zang naa dang nɔɔ jĩng diki kopi kɔ nwani. Nɔ́ɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kpang, naa zang nyɔ nɔɔ doo vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, nɔ́ɔ walɛ bannang kati.

Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shii gbãng gbãng nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang naa vɔ tɔkn, daa kaa doo ziti, naa palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.”
A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Pagamu ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yere bang ɓiɓɛ kagn nyaa ɓiɓɛ ziti, wɔng katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.

N zi nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwàng gn ɓɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Sheetang roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yaa kɔɔnang kpang nɛɛ nkɔ kpanti manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kpang doo nɛɛ mani, ka laa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Antiba, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng m nɛɛ yeti gbete vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka teteng manɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Sheetang nwang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔ ka shoo zang piti nɛɛ wu dũng ɓi nkɔ ɓɛɛ.

A vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kaa gn, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Balamu tusu zang ɓɛɛ. Balamu ɓɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ Balak naa ɓɔɔ wu shing zang Isirela, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ ri shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka, nɛɛ ri palɛ dũndũng.
Nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Nikola ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti ta. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, n a ditɔ ka bii manɛ, n ta sĩiri nɛɛ ri nɛɛ yere bang ɓɔɔ nwáng nɛɛ nyaa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi, wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, n á wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ maanaa ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. N ti á wu tari ɓɔɔ kagn puru nɛɛ nung shɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yuu tari bìí. Zang ɓɔɔ zi nung bìí kpang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ tarɛ kɔ zi shɛ̃ɛning.”
A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Tayatira ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ:
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ jĩng ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng naa nyɛlɛ waa ɓɛɛ, doo ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ naa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ tagula ɓɔɔ zang mɔlɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ waa ɓɛɛ.

N zi shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa ka bii tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti mã danggn ɓɛɛ. N ti zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kãntang, ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pálɛ́ ka tĩng ɓɛɛ katɔ.

A vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kaa gn gbete ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yaa jaa soro kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jezebel, nwàng ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. A kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang mɛɛ, nwãarɛ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ ri ti shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka ɓɛɛ.
N yaa wu gbalang wu kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ, a bɛ̃ɛ yeti kɔ̃sɔnang, wu yaa dũndũng palɛnang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shing wu ditɔ, wu roo kɔnang, wu roo ka latãng wu dang jĩng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ wu, ri roo kɔnang jong. N shingnɛ ri dang jĩng gbãng gbãng, naa ri kɔ̃̀sɔ̀ yeti, ri yaa zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.

N naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu vɔrɔ nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng piti, ri zi kati nɛɛ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang zang tɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ piti ɓɛɛ. N a zang ɓu vuu ka doo shonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.

Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa ka Tayatira ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Jezebel kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɛɛ manɛ kpang, nɔɔ ti zi rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ri ɓaa nɛɛ vuu Sheetang ɓɔɔ hãa bii dɔɔli ɓɛɛ manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ kpang.
Nɔɔ yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ gbãng gbãng, n gbãayu nɛɛ mani.
Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang, nɛɛ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n tãa tĩnang, diki ɓɔɔ n a kagn wu a nɛɛ mani. N naa a wu naa, wu roo kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
Naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m naa ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa tuu labalang kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka ɓɛɛ, wu roo kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ tipi kaɓa. Wu naa sãlɛ ri pũusi pũusi naa ɓɔɔ zang sãlɛ ɓari tapɔng ɓɛɛ.
N ti naa a zang ɓɔɔ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, sang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng nɛɛ yuu gãndi ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa ruu kɔ Suru kɔɔrɔ rɛɛ zang Laa ɓee.”
Zang kaɓa kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Sadisu ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiti rɛɛ Suru Laa manziti nɛɛ sang manziti ka naa ɓɛɛ. N zi shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Zang zi nɔɔ naa nɔɔ ningkãari, a ɓeekpang nɔɔ vɔlɔ manɛ katɔ.
Nɔɔ yupaa, nɔɔ tá bii kagn, nɔɔ yì suru bii ɓɔɔ yaa doogn tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ naa kagn, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ vɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ dɔ̃ɔ gbete kpang. N zirɛ shonang manɛ daa gň teetee ka tĩng Laa mɛɛ kpang.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãayi, a nɔɔ ti tarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yiti katɔ, nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ. Naa nɔɔ yupaa kpang, n a ditɔ naa shɔngɓɔ, a nɔɔ zi laa ɓɔɔ n a kagn yuu manɛ kpang.
A zang ɓɔɔ kaa gn teteng manɛ, ka Sadisu ka nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̀ɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang kaɓa ri naa hã̀lɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru ri rakɛ nɛɛ n, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓarɛ daa naa tɔ ɓɛɛ.

Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, zang naa hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, n àlɛ̀ nung ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N naa kɔ̀ɔ́ ka tĩng Daa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Filadifiya ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ:

Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ wu ɓi niizang ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ yiti shɔng saka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ Dawuda yiti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ puu nyaa gãa tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zunung kunang kagn kpang, nɛɛ ti ku tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zunung puunang kagn kpang.

N zi shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ zirɛ, n puu nɔɔ nyaa gãa tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung kunang kpang ɓɛɛ. N zi tɔ kaka manɛ kagn dɔɔli kpang, a nɔɔ dũng nyaa mɛɛ doo nɛɛ mani, nɔɔ ti laa nyaa kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nung mɛɛ kpang, kpang.
Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sheetang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri suu sèé nɛɛ ri zang Yahudi ɓa, n naa shing zang sèé kaɓa, ri arɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng manɛ. Ri zi kati nɛɛ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
Nɔɔ dũng ruu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ mã danggn ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n naa shingnɛ, nɔ́ɔ wɔ ka jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ a kaa tɔ ka koo piti ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
N gbãayu katɔ pati. Nɔɔ yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ waasɛ̃, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nwãarɛ nɔɔ, wu ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, naa nwáng naa lajàa ɓɔɔ zang di sãa Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri yaa Gãa Laa takpang. N bee nung Laa mɛɛ, ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ nung nɔng nwannang Laa mɛɛ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Urushalima ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ shooro nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ nɔng Laa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. N ti bee nung mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ jong ka bìí ɓarɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.”
A zang kaɓa kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Lawodikiya ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ:

Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ, Wu nwang ta nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ́ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ niizang diki diki, ɓɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa ti mã́arɛ̀ vuu piti nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
N zi shonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ nwãa katɔ kpang, nɔɔ ti valɛ katɔ kpang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti nwãa katɔ, kɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ valɛ katɔ.
Wee nɔɔ nwãa lulupu waati ɓee, n vang nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ yeti nyaa mɛɛ.

Wee nɔɔ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ ying, nɛɛ vuu naa manɛ kagn, rang vuu ɓɔɔ kpaa nɔɔ kpang ɓee. A nɔɔ zi kpang vuu ɓi ka naa manɛ kpang, zang vuu gn kɔnang. Nɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɔɔ ri bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ jĩng zuu ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ arɛ nɔ́ɔ hoo zɔ̃ng zinariya ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ nɛɛ waa nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓiɓɛ wu turɛ wu nwang kaa tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ nwang kaa zang ying ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti arɛ nɔɔ hooro fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru nɔ́ɔ hãayi, tɔ̀ɔ, bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ manɛ wu shing kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ hoo gãnang ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀ɛ́ nɔɔ ka jĩng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ́ɔ zi nɔng kati.
Zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ri katɔ, n mangkɛ rikɔ, n ti gɔ̃ ri shoo. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ta bii ta kagn, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ dũng m kaa nɛɛ yeti gbete.
Nɔɔ zirɛ, n shii ka nyaa gãa, n waa nyaa gãa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa yee mɛɛ, nɛɛ puu nyaa gãa, n shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ. Ruu shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shii gbãng gbãng, nɛɛ ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang, n kasɛ tɔ, wu naa nwang nɛɛ n, ka laa kpanti roonang mɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ n ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang ka tĩng, n naa nwàng nɛɛ Daa mɛɛ ka laa kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.”

Ka knti rɛɛ vuu keɓe, n shing jĩng, a n zirɛ nyaa gãa puu ka lapa. A n tãa yee naa gboo, ɓɔɔ ɓaasi rang m yee ɓɛɛ, ɓaa m nyaa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “A ka lapa ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ kaa nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.”
Nyaa kɔ dòó naa ɓee, Suru Laa a ka bii mɛɛ. Ka lapa ka nɔng kaɓa, n zi láa nwannang kpanti, a zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu láa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, kɔlɔ katɔ naa rɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ Jasifa nɛɛ kaneliya ɓɛɛ. Sɔkɔ mii ti lurɛ kiiri laa nwannang kpanti ka teteng. Sɔkɔ bìí ta bii naa tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Emɛra ɓɛɛ.

Láa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti, ri kiiri laa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ gbete keɓe nyaa ka teteng. Zang bang, ri bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti ri nwalɛ ka yuu rɛɛ laa kaɓa, zang ɓu hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru wu ti kãng lapoo kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ ka yuu.

Ka nɔng laa kpanti kaɓa, shala mangkɛ a ti mɛ̀ɛrɛ́. A n ti zi waa zàáng sɔɔ manziti yàkɛ̀ nɔng gbayi gbayi ka tĩng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa. Rɛɛ waa zàáng sɔɔ manziti kaɓa rikɔ rɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ manziti ɓɛɛ.

Ka tĩng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, n ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng naa mii waapo kɔlɔ katɔ puru naa vĩilaa. Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ri shiiri ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, ri kiiri laa nyaa ka teteng, ka nakn ziti, ka nagang ziti. Ri takɛ jĩng dɔɔli nɛɛ bii piti piti, ɓɔɔ ka tĩng, ɓɔɔ ka knti.
Vuu ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang nwang zing, a ɓɔɔ ɓang wu nwang guu napo, a ɓɔɔ ɓang weɓe, waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ, nwang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang, a ɓɔɔ gɔ̀ɔ nyaa nwang ɓi kaa gangong ɓɔɔ tãa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii kagn keɓe, vuu ɓu ta nasãng mangbete, bii ɓarɛ ɓi jĩng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka dakn nɛɛ yeti piti. Ri yaa soo gáanang kpang, nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, ri gaa soo nɛɛ,
“Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti
ka yuu vuu piti ɓɛɛ,
shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang
Mɔkɔ nwáng ɓaa ningkãari dòo
ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, mɔɔ ti ɓaa
ningkãari kãntang keɓe, mɔkɔ ti naa
gbãayu tɔkn ka koo keɓe.”
Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn keɓe, ri nɛɛ dɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ nwáng ɓi ningkãari dòndòng, ri nɛɛ ti a wu bannang, ri nɛɛ zã̀a wu tɔ naa weɓe,

rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ri tang zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka laa kpanti ɓɔɔ nwáng ɓi ningkãari dòndòng kaɓa nɛɛ gutu, ri bang wu. Ri ti tu lapoo ɓɔɔ ri kãng ka yuu, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ri shing ka tipi ka tĩng zang kaɓa, ri ti gàá wu soo nɛɛ,
“Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ,
mɔkɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang bang mɔɔ, zang dɔɔ mɔɔ, a
naa vuu palɛnang piti ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.
Mɔkɔ mã́arɛ̀ vuu piti ka tĩng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ, a mɔkɔ ti
kasɛ nɛɛ ri nwalɛ naa weɓe, a mɔɔ mã́arɛ̀ ri kati.”
A n zi labeenang ɓɔɔ kagn, ka nakn zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zang bèe vuu ka yeti nɛɛ biling piti a zang leng kati. Zang ɓang nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ lang nɔng manziti.
A n zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa gbete ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wi daa naa ɓɔɔ wu tãlɛ lang keɓe, wu kãlɛ labeenang keɓe wiya?”
A zang ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀ɔ́gn kpang, ka lapa nɛɛ koo, nɛɛ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu puu labeenang kaɓa, wu gã vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ n kaa gbãng gbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu puu labeenang kaɓa, wu gã vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee gn kpang ɓɛɛ.

A zang bang gbete ka teteng rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kaa kpang, zirɛ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Zing, nwangnɛ teteng zang Yahuda ɓɔɔ ti zang bang zɔ̃ng Dawuda, ɓa yuu vuu piti tɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ wu tãlɛ lang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang labeenang kaɓa nɛɛ mani nɔng manziti kaɓa tɔ, wu puuyi.”

A n zi Jaa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ shii ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti naabm, a rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, nɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng. Jaa mɛɛrɛ bìí mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang yée katɔ ka tĩng. Ta jee manziti, a jĩng ɓiɓɛ ti manziti. Rɛɛ jĩng manziti keɓe, ɓi rikɔ Suru Laa manziti ɓɔɔ zang shing ka dalɛ koo piti piti ɓɛɛ.
Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ kaɓa daayi daa ta labeenang kaɓa nɛɛ nakn zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ.

A ɓɔɔ daa ta labeenang kaɓa tɔ, rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ kaɓa. Zang kaɓa nandon, zang ɓu yiti vũngta ka naa, nɛɛ pii ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ka yeti pii ka nyaa gaagaa. Vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, ɓi Laa gaanang rɛɛ zang Laa.
Ri gaa soo shɔɔ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“Mɔɔ daa naa tɔ, mɔɔ ta labeenang kaɓa,
mɔɔ ti tãlɛ lang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyɔ mɔɔ vɔrɔ ka tĩng,
a mɔɔ ta Laa yuu zang dɔɔli nɛɛ zĩi ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ keɓe,
ri nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti ka koo keɓe,
nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ka koo piti, ri nwangnɛ tipi piti,
a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tipi rɛɛ kpanti ka bm bm.
Mɔɔ risi ri nɛɛ ri nwáng zang ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ,
a ri ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa
ɓɔɔ ri palɛ Laa ɓuru shonang ɓɛɛ.
Rikɔ roo kpanti ka koo keɓe.”

A n shing jĩng n zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri labang labang gaagaa daa ɓɔɔ zang gã ri kpang. A n ti tãa yee ɓarɛ. Ri shiiri, ri kiiri laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nyaa ka teteng.
Ri gaa soo ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm nɛɛ,
“Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ,
daa naa ɓɔɔ zang a wu naa vuu palɛnang tɔ,
nɛɛ vuu naa, nɛɛ zũnang, nɛɛ kaka,
nɛɛ bannang, nɛɛ dɔɔnang a ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ɔrɔnang.”
A n tãa yee rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ningkãari, ka lapa nɛɛ koo keɓe, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ka yeti mii ɓɛɛ, ri gaa soo nandon, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“Ruu dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka laa nwannang kpanti ta,
a ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́.
Ruu a ri bannang, ruu ti zãa ri.
Zang wu zɔ̃ɔrɔ ri,
naa vuu palɛnang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ gbinggbing.”

A rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, ri kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Wu nwang nɔngkɔ.” Rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ri tang jong ka tĩng zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ri bang ri.
A n zirɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa, tã́a lang ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, a n tãayi vuu gbete ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, kɔɔyi, yee ɓiɓɛ naa shala mɛɛyi nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”

N shing jĩng tɔkn a n zi gbantang puru a kana. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn gbantang kaɓa yiti taka ka naa, a zang kãng wu lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ka yuu. Árɛ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shaarɛ zang ka nyaa sĩiri diki diki ɓɛɛ, a daayi nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu daa shaa zang tɔkn ka nɔng sĩiri.
A ɓɔɔ wu tãa lang ɓɔɔ ɓang doo ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, n tãayi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓang doo ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”
A gbantang ɓɔ̀ɔ́ gn nwɛ̃ɛri nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, zang a wu naa wu shingnɛ zang koo ri nwàng tɔ̀ɔ́ ka nyaa zɔɔ kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri nyɔkɔ zɔɔ vɔrɔ kati. A zang a wu yere bang ka naa.

A Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa taati. A n ti tãa yee vuu gbete ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa daa kaa taati, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.” N shing jĩng tɔkn, n zi gbantang vĩiri nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, yiti vuu ɓɔɔ zang ma vuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.

N tãa yee mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nwangnɛ teteng rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang túu saka shonang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka diki gbete zang hoo zee waka gbete. Zang ti tuu saka shonang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka diki gbete zang hoo nyɔngkɔ waka taati. Nɔ́ɔ lasɛ nung kpang, nɔ́ɔ ti lasɛ mii inabi kpang.”
A tãa lang ɓɔɔ tɔkn daa kaa dɛ̃ɛti, á n tãa yee vuu ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ka teteng rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”

N shing jĩng tɔkn, a n zi gbantang bii shànkalàng. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ vɔrɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, dũng wu ka knti naabm. A zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri roo kpanti ka koo dang gbete, naa zang basɛ koo keɓe nɔng dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng kaɓa vɔrɔ nɛɛ yere bang, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔkɔ bang. Ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔnang, nɛɛ ri shing ɓɔɔ, yɔpɔ kpaasi ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe, ri nyɔkɔ zang.

Ɓɔɔ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa maani ɓɛɛ, n zili suru bii zang ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa, a ri ti kɔɔ ruu niizang ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. N zi suru bii ɓarɛ ka dii nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ.

A ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ, shi kpang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Mɔkɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ niizang ɓɛɛ, ruu nwáng diki nɛya ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ dɔng zang koo ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ rùu ruu, mɔɔ waa ruu pãng wiya?”

A zang a zang ɓu ka teteng ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru. A zang kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri gã ka gbongkarɛ tɔkɔlɔng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓee nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri dũng dòo Laa kɔ ɓɔɔ zang koo naa nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ditɔ jong, naa ɓɔɔ ɓeleng zang nyɔkɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
A ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa mangbete, n zirɛ tipi ruutu gbãng gbãng, a làa risi kaa vĩiri kɔngkɔng naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ vĩiri ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓɛɛ, a shala raa kaa nwɛ̃ɛri naa zĩi.
Sang ri shili nɛɛ lapa ka tipi naa ɓɔɔ jasung pũngku rãayi, kpàng gbãngko sĩiri ɓɔɔ ra doo knti ka tipi ɓɛɛ.
Lapa leng naa ɓɔɔ zang leng siri ɓɛɛ, a yaa nɔng, rɛɛ kɔpɔ nandon, nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ mii kiiri nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri ti yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri kagn ɓɛɛ.

A zang piti, rɛɛ kpanti nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang, nɛɛ rɛɛ, zang bang sɔɔja, rɛɛ zang ying, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nandon rɛɛ jaafoo nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa gãa, ri yuu nandon, ri daa waa ka yeng puru, a ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ tari bang ka kɔpɔ.

Ri ɓaa rɛɛ kɔpɔ nyaa nɛɛ tari bang nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ watɛ ta ka yuu ɓuru, nɔɔ waasɛ ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, wu zi ruu kaa takpang, Ruu ti wɔrɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa wu dang ruu jĩng kaa takpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ɓarɛ tusu bii kagn, a tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu shii ka tĩng ɓarɛ wiya?”

A knti weɓe, n zi rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri kaa lapa ɓɛɛ dɛ̃ɛti, ri shiiri ka nyaa kãngkãng koo. Ri nɔɔ jasung ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu ra nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri rà kaa takpang ka tipi, nɛɛ yuu rɛɛ waapo, a ɓɔɔ ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.

A n zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbete a nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Yiti vuu ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari ɓang ka bii vuu, zang zi vuu ɓiɓɛ nung kaa gn ɓɛɛ. A mɛɛ nyaa nabm, ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ Laa a ri naa tɔ nɛɛ ri dang tipi nɛɛ waapo jĩng ɓɛɛ.
A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔ́ɔ dang rɛɛ tipi nɛɛ waapo, nɛɛ laa, jĩng gn kpang. Ruu ɓǎng rɛɛ zang shonang Laa ɓuru vuu ɓiɓɛ doo ka nyaating ka gbongkarɛ.”

A n tãayi, zang gã rɛɛ zang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓang ri vuu ka nyaating ɓɛɛ. Zang ri nandon, labang dakn laa maani tu laa ziti tu dɛ̃ɛti. Ri nwangnɛ teteng zɔ̃ng zang Isirela nandon.
Zang ɓang zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Yahuda.
Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Rubeng,
zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Gaadi.
Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Ashaa,
zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Nafitali,
a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Manase.
Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Simiyon,
zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Leevi,
a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Isaka.
Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Zebuluna,
zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Yusufu,
a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Biliyaminu.

Ka knti vuu keɓe, n shing jĩng, a n zirɛ zang ri kpalɛ yuu zingkãng zingkãng, daa naa gãnang kpang. Ri nwangnɛ teteng zɔ̃ng zang piti, nɛɛ nɔng piti ka koo keɓe, a ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ ka koo piti. Ri shiiri ka tĩng laa nwannang kpanti ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri hã̀lɛ̀ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, a ri ti yiti nasãng laa nung manja ka naa.
Ri nandon, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm nɛɛ, “Ɓi Laa ɓuru ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ rikɔ ta yuu ɓuru.”

A rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nandon, ɓɔɔ ri shiiyi ri kiiri rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti nɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng laa nwannang kpanti a ri bang Laa.
Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ,
“Ruu kasɛ tɔ,
dɔ̀ɔnang nɛɛ bannang,
nɛɛ zũnang nɛɛ zã̀anang nɛɛ zang sennang,
nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang nɛɛ kpanti roonang,
ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa ɓuru gbinggbing.
Wu nwang nɔngkɔ.”
A zang bang gbete hɛ̃ɛ m nɛɛ, “Zang kɔ ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru ɓee, mɔɔ zi ri nung tɔ ya? Mɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ ya?”
A n kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Dabang, ɓi mɔkɔ zirɛ.”
A kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri wɔ nɛɛ jĩng dannang bang kaɓa ɓɛɛ, a ri sɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ zĩi Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, a tu kaa puru shãa shãa.”
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ,
“Ri shii ka tĩng laa nwannang Kpanti Laa
ri bang wu nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ ka yeti Gãa ɓɔɔ zang bang wu kagn ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti yiti ri katɔ, wu gãng jĩng ka ri,
tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee ri naa kaa tɔ̀ɔ́ bii kpang.
Nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri takpang,
sutu ti mãa ri takpang.
A laa ɓɔɔ túu ɓɛɛ, nyɔ ri bii takpang.
Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ ɓɔɔ ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti gãng jĩng katɔ ka ri ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̀ɔ ri tĩng, atɛ ri ka rang mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
Laa ti naa àlɛ́ ri miiri nandon ka jĩng ɓarɛ.”
Ka knti ruu keɓe, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti ɓɛɛ, a zang voo nyaa kaa lapa selele, daa nung minti bmati tu kopi katɔ.
A n zi rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ manziti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ, a zang, a zang ɓu gboo ka naa.

A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gbete, arɛ naa shii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. Yiti waka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ka naa. A zang ɓɔɔ arɛ naa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ dɔɔli. Nɛɛ wu dɔɔyi nɛɛ gàanang rɛɛ zang Laa, ka tĩng laa nwannang kpanti. Ka yuu nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ́ Laa vuu kagn ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ.
A dɔɔ waa ka vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa, a zĩiri ɓiɓɛ gaayu paa seenang, a daa kaa lapa nɛɛ Laa gàanang zang Laa, ka bii Laa.

A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, see waa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kaɓa, a tɛ̃ɛ ka waka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ kaɓa, a tasɛ ka koo. Ɓɔɔ wu tasɛ, shala mɛɛyi, a shala ti mangnɛ, a tipi ruutu.
A ka knti vuu keɓe, rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, manziti, ɓɔɔ zang ɓu yiti gboo ka naa kaɓa ɓɛɛ, ri kpalɛ bii gboo jeenang kati.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang jee gboo ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, mii takong nɛɛ waa ri nwɛ̃ɛtɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ zĩi vuu a zang vang ri ka tipi. A tĩng gbete ka teteng koo ɓɔɔ zang basɛ tĩng taati ɓɛɛ, waa shaayi. A naa zang basɛ rɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi tĩng taati, waa shaa tĩng gbete, a waa shaa wisi bɛbɛtɛ jong nandon.
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ɓang ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ tuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwang kɔpɔ bang ɓɔɔ waa shaa kana ɓɛɛ, a tasɛ ka yeti waapo.
Naa zang basɛ waapo tìng taati, mii tìng gbete raa zĩi. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti waapo nandon naa zang basɛ ri tìng taati, ɓɔɔ tìng gbete, ri vɔlɔ. A tìng gbete ka teteng rɛɛ laana ɓɔɔ nandon ri shaarɛ.

A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa taati ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A sang bang watɛ nɛɛ lapa, waa shaa kagn naa zang mang waa ka wisi. A watɛ ka rang, nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔlɔng mii dang gbete, naa zang basɛ ri tìng taati ɓɛɛ.
(Zang ɓaa sang bìí nɛɛ Lanang.) Mii tìng gbete la kaa tɔ, a zang dɔɔli ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo mii, ri vɔlɔ ka ruu lanang ɓiɓɛ.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ daa kaa dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A tìng gbete ka teteng tìng taati ɓɔɔ zang basɛ làa, nɛɛ shala nɛɛ rɛɛ sang ɓɛɛ, ri tɔɔyi. Tìng gbete ɓɔɔ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔng zĩi yakɛ kpang.

N shing jĩng a n zi gangong tãa ka lapa, n tãayi mɛɛ nyaa nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ayìi rang, jĩng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo ɓɛɛ. Naa zang jee rɛɛ gboo ɓɔɔ yaa knti, kɔ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ri yaa taati, ri kpalɛ bii jeenang ɓa ɓɛɛ.”
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa maani ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n zi sang ɓɔɔ watɛ ka koo nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. A zang a wu saka ɓɔɔ wu puu too ɓɔɔ dii ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
A puu nyaa too, nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, zĩiri nwangnɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ shaa bang. Zĩiri kaɓa, zuu làa dɔ̃ɔ gbete, zang zi laa takpang, nɔng tɔ̀ɔ kaa nɛɛ laagɛ̃.
Zɔɔrɔ dɔɔli ri nwangnɛ yeti zĩiri kaɓa, ri arɛ ri zuu tipi nandon. A zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri ta zang naa ɓɔɔ gbuuri ta zang ɓɛɛ.

Zang kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri pálɛ̀ rɛɛ wisi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ takɛ ka tipi nɛɛ rɛɛ laa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang nɛɛ ri ta ɓarɛ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nung kagn nɛɛ ri zang Laa ka nyaating ɓarɛ kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
Zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang kaɓa vɔrɔ kpang. Zang nɛɛ ri dang ri jĩng shala maani kɔ nwani. Jĩng dannang kaɓa kɔng naa ɓɔɔ gbuuri nɛɛ ta zang tɔ, kɔng zang ɓɛɛ.
Ka shala maani keɓe, shɔnzang ri kãa vɔrɔ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri wɔ ka jĩng dannang kaɓa, a ri ĩi vɔrɔ kaa takpang. Zang ri wàá vɔrɔ katɔ a vɔrɔ nyɔ ri kaa takpang.

Zɔɔrɔ kaɓa ri ta bii naa gbantang ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ ri bii nɛɛ ri daa ka nyaa sĩiri ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri hãa ka yuu nwang lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. Waa nyaating ɓarɛ nwàng ɓɔɔ shɔnzang.
Suuyuu ɓarɛ bee naa suuyuu zang soro, tãri ɓarɛ ti wɔng naa ɓɔɔ zing.
Ri zùu danggn ɓarɛ nɛɛ saka, a nasãng ɓarɛ kaa nyaa nabm naa kɛkɛ sĩiri tanang ɓɔɔ gbantang ri gɔ̃kɔ ri daa nɔng nyaa sĩiri ɓɛɛ.
Ri takɛ dãng, shɔng kagn naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ gbuuri. Náa ɓɔɔ zang a ri nɛɛ ri dang zang jĩng shala maani keɓe, ka dãng ɓarɛ keɓe kɔ.

Kpanti rɛɛ zɔɔrɔ keɓe, ɓi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ gãng jĩng ka too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang kaɓa. Zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nyaa zang Yahudi nɛɛ Abadɔng, ka nyaa zang Heleni zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Apoliyɔng, dĩiri nung keɓe ɓi, “Zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ vuu ɓɛɛ.”
Wee kɔ jĩng dannang bang ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, jĩng dannang bang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ yaa kaa ziti.

A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa ka mangbete jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n tãa yee nwangnɛ yeti jée dɛ̃ɛti, ɓɔɔ ka yuu paa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ.
Yee kaɓa kɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ jee gboo ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Yaarɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ri ka nyaa rang Yufireti ɓɛɛ naa ta.”

Rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa bɛ̀ɛ́ zang mã ri ka nɔng kaɓa nɛɛ ri gã làá keɓe, nɛɛ diki keɓe, nɛɛ shala keɓe, nɛɛ saa keɓe. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang yaa ri naa kati ri nyɔkɔ zang tìng gbete vɔrɔ, naa zang basɛ zang koo tìng taati ɓɛɛ.
Zang sɔɔja ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri vang ɓarɛ gbantang ɓɛɛ, zang kɔɔ m nɛɛ ri labang labang, laa maani dakn ziti.

Wee naa ɓɔɔ n zi rɛɛ gbantang bìí, ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri vãlɛ gbantang bìí ri hãa saka ɓɔɔ zuu ri danggn ɓɛɛ, ta bii nwɛ̃ɛri naa waa, a ɓɔɔ ta bii naa bii sãmbong, a ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong. Rɛɛ gbantang, ri takɛ yuu naa ɓɔɔ zing. Waa nɛɛ zĩiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong, nwangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ.
Rɛɛ kɔnang taati kɔ nwangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa rɛɛ gbantang ɓee, waa nɛɛ zĩiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong ɓɛɛ, ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ shɔnzang tìng gbete nɛɛ wukɔ, naa zang basɛ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ koo tĩng taati ɓɛɛ.
Kaka rɛɛ gbantang kaɓa, ɓi ka nyaa ɓarɛ nɛɛ dãng ɓarɛ. Dãng ɓarɛ nwang naa sɔkɔ, ri ta yuu kagn. Ri shing zang nyaa vuu waa nɛɛ wukɔ.

A zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang kaɓa nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. Ri yi tĩng, ri bang ɓarɛ doo rɛɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ rɛɛ vaka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vaka ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zinariya, ɓɔɔ nɛɛ azurufa, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ saka nwɛ̃ɛri ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tari, a zang sèe ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa. Vuu keɓe ri rang yee kpang, ri ti tãa nɔng kpang, a ri ti ra kpang.
Zang kaɓa ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa zang nyɔkɔnang vɔrɔ, nɛɛ nvaa shaanang nɛɛ dũndũng palɛnang a ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ɓɔɔnang ɓarɛ kpang.

Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa. Sãmbong zuu wu naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a sɔkɔ mii kãng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Wàá nyaating ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ katɔ naa laa, a doo ɓiɓɛ naa nyɛlɛ waa ɓɔɔ kɔ nabm ɓɛɛ.
Yiti jaa labeenang tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ zang puu katɔ ɓɛɛ ka naa. Arɛ naa náa doo nakn ɓiɓɛ ka yuu waapo a náa doo nagang ɓi ka tipi.
Ɓaa nyaa nabm, yee ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ zing mɛɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa nyaa naa weɓe, rɛɛ shala mii manziti kaɓa ri mɛɛyi.
Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ shala mii manziti kaɓa ri mɛɛyi, bɛ̀ɛ́ n tɔɔ n bee vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kaa tɔ. A n tãa yee nɛɛ lapa kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nwangsɛ zang bii ruu kaɓa kpang, mɔɔ beere kpang.”
A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ naa doo ka waapo nɛɛ tipi kaɓa, tuu nakn ɓiɓɛ ka lapa.

A tũng vuu nɛɛ nung Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi ningkãari dòndòng, ɓɔɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ waapo nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, laa ɓɔɔ zang suukãng ɓɛɛ takpang.

Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti nɛɛ naa jee gboo ɓiɓɛ tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri waasɛ bii katɔ, ri nwangsɛ bii kati, tɔ̀ɔ, wu hangsɛ nyaa ɓarɛ kati naa ɓɔɔ wu nwàngsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
A yee ɓaasi n tãayi a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Daayi, mɔɔ ta labeenang ɓɔɔ zang puu katɔ kaɓa. Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ shii ka yuu waapo nɛɛ tipi, yiti ka naa ɓa.”

A n daayi, n daa kɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kaɓa nɛɛ wu a m jaa labeenang bìí. Kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Tá ta, mɔɔ shaayi. Tíng katɔ ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ naa nung warɛ, a nɛɛ daa tɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ, daa la kaa tɔ.”
A n ta jaa labeenang bìí nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ n shaayi. Tîng katɔ ka nyaa mɛɛ naa nung warɛ, a ɓɔɔ n mãrɛ, daa la kaa tɔ ka yeti mɛɛ.
A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Daa tɔkn mɔɔ daa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang koolaa ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓarɛ.”
Ka knti vuu keɓe, zang a m laa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɔng nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Yupaa mɔɔ daa gãsɛ Gãa Laa, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti gã zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
A mɔɔ gãsɛ dàbang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka biling ka nɔng Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yàa ɓi zang tipi ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ ri naa naalɛ Urushalima nɛɛ doo ɓarɛ shala laa ziti tu ziti ɓɛɛ.

N shong zang mɛɛ ziti ɓɔɔ ri daa kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa hã̀lɛ́ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri hã̀lɛ́ ɓɛɛ. N a ri naa ri kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ diki labang gbete tu laa maani dakn ziti, tu laa taati.”
Zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ keɓe, rikɔ laa zeetung ziti nɛɛ waa zàáng sɔɔ ziti ɓɔɔ ka tĩng Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo piti ɓɛɛ.

Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu palɛ ri vuu shi kpang, waa nwangnɛ nyaa ɓarɛ wu shaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ri kpang kaɓa. Wee naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ri kpang kɔ, tɔɔ ri wɔ kaa takpang.

Zang a ri naa vuu palɛnang katɔ ɓɔɔ ri zãa mii lapa anang katɔ ka làa ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔ́ zang Ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri ti zunung katɔ ri risi mii ɓɔɔ ka koo nandon, wu raa zĩi. Zang ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri atɛ jĩng dannang ka zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng ka koo keɓe ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ piti ɓɛɛ.
Ri nɛɛ hangsɛ Ruu Laa kɔɔnang tɔ, yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔɔli, ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ yeti too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang, wu naa ta sĩiri nɛɛ ri. Naa ɓa ri kaka, wu nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
Zang naa yaa vɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jɛ̃ɛnang, zang ɓaa nɛɛ Sɔɔdom nɛɛ Masara ɓɛɛ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓáa kpanti ɓarɛ naa ka laa kagn ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti, nɛɛ nɔng piti ka koo, ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ, ri naa pɛ̃ɛrɛ vɔrɔ ɓarɛ, diki ɓa katɔ taati nɛɛ nyaa gãasa. Ri zã́a zang vɔrɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe gbãanang katɔ.
Zang koo keɓe ri naa gaarɛ zɔɔ, ri tãa tĩnang ka ruu vɔrɔ zang ziti keɓe. Ri alɛ zɔɔ vuu waati ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shonang Laa kaɓa, ri kɔɔ Ruu Laa, ri dang zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo jĩng dɔɔli ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɔɔ diki taati nɛɛ nyaa gãasa naa ɓarɛ, ɔ̃kɔnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ bii Laa, a daa ka yeti ɓarɛ, a ri shii doo paa. Ɓɔɔ ri shii paa, zang kaɓa nandon, ɓɔɔ ri zi ri, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔɔli.
A zang ziti kaɓa, ri tãa yee nwangnɛ lapa, ɓaa ri nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ a ta ka lapa ka nihn.” A ri daa lapa ka yeti sãmbong, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jĩng nɛɛ ri kpang nandon, ri zi ri jĩng bii.

Nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, tipi ruutu nabm, a naa zang basɛ gari bang kaɓa tìng kopi, tìng gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ jirɛ. A tipi ɓɔɔ ruutu ɓee nyɔ shɔnzang labang manziti. A zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔɔli, a ri dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kati.
Jĩng dannang ɓɔɔ daa kaa ziti ɓa tɔ, ɓɔɔ ya gbete wu daa kaa taati a doo ka naa.

A zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ wàa rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri manziti nyaa knti ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n tãlɛ yee nwangnɛ lapa, ri rang yee nabm nɛɛ, “Kpanti roonang koo keɓe, raa ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kirisi ɓiɓɛ. Laa kɔ naa roo kpanti gbinggbing.”
A rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti, ɓɔɔ zang ɓu nwang ka yuu laa kpanti ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ka tĩng Laa ɓɛɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tĩng Laa, ri sòo yuu ka dii, ri bang Laa.
Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ,
“Ruu zãa mɔɔ tɔ kpanti ɓuru Laa,
ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang piti ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
Mɔɔ nwáng ɓaa doo ka tĩng,
a mɔkɔ ti nwang kãntang keɓe.
Ruu zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ,
ɓɔɔ bang,
mɔɔ gaayu kpanti roonang kana nɛɛ mani ka koo ɓɛɛ.
Zang koo ɓɔ̀ɔ́gn, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Laa kpang,
ri lasɛ yeti tɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ gbãng gbãng,
a diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lasɛ yeti jong nɛɛ ri ti a tɔ.
Diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ruu kagn,
mɔɔ ti sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ
rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ doo,
ka ruu shonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri a nung ɓaaɓɛ
bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ti ningsi zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ ri ningsi koo ɓɛɛ.”
A nyaa Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa puuyi, zang zǐ akpaati nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ katɔ, ka yeti Gãa Laa. A shala mangkɛ, zang mɛɛrɛ nyaa nabm, tipi ruutu, shala mɛɛrɛ, a mii takong a dɔɔli.

A vuu bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ, nwangsɛ bii ka lapa. Vuu keɓe ɓi Jaa soro zuu bii nɛɛ làa, a naa doo ɓiɓɛ ka yuu shala. A kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ, zang palɛ nɛɛ sàng kopi tu ziti ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
Bɛ̀ɛ́ tuu jaa ka yeti, a laa jaa yinang ɓiɓɛ a tɔ, kaa nyaa ka ruu jaa ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.
A vuu bang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn nwangsɛ bii ka lapa. Vuu keɓe ɓi sɔkɔ nwɛ̃ɛri bang, baabii katɔ, ta yuu manziti nɛɛ jee kopi, ti kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ka yuu manziti nandon.

Naa zang basɛ sang kɔ ka lapa ɓee tĩng taati. Sɔkɔ keɓe, waarɛ ɓɔɔ tĩng gbete nɛɛ dãng ɓiɓɛ, vang ri ka tipi. A sɔkɔ bìí daa shii ka tĩng jaa soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu yi kaa jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu shaa jaa ɓɔɔ jaa soro yi ɓɛɛ kati.

A jaa soro yi jaa zang varɛ, ɓɔɔ naa roo kpanti ka yuu zang koo nandon ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ kpanti yiti ka naa, ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, zang palɛ nɛɛ saka. Ka ɓɔɔ jaa nwang hn, zang tantɛ wu tuunang raayi, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Laa, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ.
A jaa soro bìí ti yurɛ daa ka jĩngti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa gbàrɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ. Zang gãng jĩng ka wu diki labang gbete tu laa maani dakn ziti a tu laa taati ɓɛɛ.

A sĩiri yupaa ka lapa. Zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ bang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maakel ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ri ta sĩiri nɛɛ sɔkɔ bang kaɓa. Sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa sɔkɔ keɓe, ri taarɛ yuu gbãng gbãng.
A Maakel nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ri shaa ri, a ri zãa rɛɛ sɔkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ nwannang ka lapa.

A ri nwangsɛ sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ lapa, ri tasɛ wu ka koo nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nandon. Sɔkɔ bang kaɓa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Sheetang, wukɔ kpanti rɛɛ suru shi kpang. Wukɔ ti nwãarɛ zang ka koo dɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ.
A n tãa yee mɛɛ nɛɛ lapa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
“Kãntang keɓe Laa ta yuu ɓuru tɔ,
zang ti zi naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ tɔ,
nɛɛ kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ.
A zang ti zi naa vuu palɛnang Kirisi ɓiɓɛ tɔ,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ shii ka tĩng Laa
kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang, ka yuu rɛɛ manzung ɓuru diki diki
nɛɛ zĩi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, zang hing wu tɔ nɛɛ lapa zang tasɛ wu tɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.
Ri ti ɓa wu yuu tɔ,
nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang zĩi Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́,
a ɓɔɔ ka ruu ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ɓi niizang ɓɛɛ.
Ri ti kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri vɔrɛ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ.
Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ri tãa tĩnang ta ka lapa.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka lapa piti ri tãa tĩnang.
A ɓɔɔ tipi nɛɛ waapo, jĩng dannang ɓi kagn yuu ɓarɛ,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang a tɔ,
ka nɔng ɓarɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ.
Gnvɔ shaa wu dɔɔli,
ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi tɔ nɛɛ diki ɓiɓɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ.”
Ka ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ bang zirɛ zang nwangsɛ wu tɔ nɛɛ lapa, gaayu ɓɔɔ wu hing jaa soro ɓɔɔ yi jaa zang varɛ ɓɛɛ.

A zang a jaa soro nasãng ziti naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ gangong, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tãayi yaa sɔkɔ bang. Tãayi daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbàrɛ̀ wu ka jĩngti ɓɛɛ. Daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ, zang gãng jĩng ka wu saa taati nɛɛ shala mangbete.
A sɔkɔ bang kaɓa, jeng mii nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ naa rang, ka knti jaa soro bìí nɛɛ mii wu tuu jaa soro kati.
A tipi yi jaa soro naa ka bii. Tipi puuyi a mii ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ bang jeng nɛɛ nyaa daa kagn nandon.

Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ jaa soro kaɓa dɔɔli. Daayi nɛɛ wu daa ta sĩiri nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng jaa soro kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri nandon ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ti shing danggn tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, niizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi tùsù ri ɓɛɛ.
A sɔkɔ bang kaɓa daa shii ka yuu seseele, ka nyaa waapo.
Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ yeti waapo. Yuu ɓiɓɛ manziti, a takɛ jee kagn kopi. Kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ka jee ɓu, a zang ti bee wu nung shi kpang ɓɔɔ dãa Laa ka yuu ɓu.

Yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ɓɛɛ, nwang gbɛ̃ɛ, doo ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔ̀ɔ́ vuu jĩngti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ bíyàa ɓɛɛ, a nyaa ɓiɓɛ nwang ɓɔɔ zing. Sɔkɔ bang tuu bannang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kpanti ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, a yɔpɔ kaɓa.

Yuu yɔpɔ jĩngti kaɓa gbete, nwàng naa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa bang kagn, a nyaa vuu waa bìí zũng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yɔpɔ kaɓa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang koo nandon ri gaayu ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ.
Zang piti ri bang sɔkɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu a yɔpɔ kaɓa naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri bang yɔpɔ kaɓa, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi naa yɔpɔ keɓe wiya? Ɓu wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu gaa nyaa nɛɛ wu wiya?”
Zang a yɔpɔ jĩngti kaɓa naa, wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a wu ti rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa. Zang a wu naa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, shala laa ziti tu ziti.
A gaayu ɓɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa, nɛɛ nung Laa, ɓɔɔ nɔng nwannang Laa, a ɓɔɔ kaa zang piti ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
A zang ti yaa wu nɛɛ wu ta sĩiri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Laa wu ti shaa ri. A zang a wu naa wu roo kpanti ka yuu zɔ̃ng zang ka nɔng piti ka koo, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ nyaa ka bm bm ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo nandon ri naa bang wu. Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang bee nung ɓarɛ doo tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ kpang, ka yeti labeenang Jaa Mɛ̀ɛrɛ́ Laa, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãa ruu keɓe.

Zang ɓɔɔ naa zang zɔ̃ng wu, nɛɛ zang naa yi wu katɔ ka nyaa sĩiri, zang ti yi wu ɓi katɔ niizang. Zang ɓɔɔ naa zang zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓi nɛɛ yere bang, zang ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓi nɛɛ yere bang niizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Laa ri mã danggn katɔ, ri ti yaa danggn shinnang ka bii Laa kpang.
Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ, shing baabii dɔɔli, nwangnɛ tipi. Ta jee ka yuu ziti, naa jaa mɛ̀ɛrɛ́, a ti ráng yee naa sɔkɔ bang.

Tuu naa vuu palɛnang yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ nandon, palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani ka jĩng ɓiɓɛ ka nɔngkɔ. A shing koo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo nandon nɛɛ ri bang yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, ɓɔɔ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa bang, a zũng tɔ ɓɛɛ.
Yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ doo knti, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ dɔɔli. Shingnɛ waa nwangnɛ lapa a ka tipi, ka jĩng zang piti.

Tuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang a wu naa palɛnang ka tĩng yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang kaɓa, a nwãarɛ zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo nandon nɛɛ mani. Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri pálɛ́ vuu ɓɔɔ nwang yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, ɓɔɔ bɛ̀ɛ́ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa ka bii nɛɛ yere bang a nwang doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ, ri a wu bannang nɛɛ mani.

A zang a yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ doo knti kaɓa naa, wu shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ tĩng shɔɔnang, wu ɔ̃kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu rang yee kati. Zang ti yaa wu nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ ri bang vuu keɓe kpang, wu nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.

Yɔpɔ jĩngti ɓɔɔ doo knti ti shingnɛ nɛɛ zang piti, zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ zang ying, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, jaafoo, nɛɛ jaa gãa, zang nɛɛ ɓang ri vuu ka nakn kpang, zang ɓang ri ka nyaating ɓarɛ.
